zh: 在新全球经济的精英和“知识工人”中间，已经产生出默示的跨国“阶级”忠诚。这种忠诚由于在意识形态上亲近新自由主义正统经济理论而得到巩固。
en: Among the elites and "knowledge workers" of the new global economy tacit transnational "class" allegiances have evolved, cemented by an ideological attachment to a neoliberal economic orthodoxy.

zh: 对于那些现在处于边缘的人来说，消费主义意识形态在全世界的扩散也强加给他们一种新的认同感，替代了传统文化和生活方式。
en: For those who are currently marginalized, the worldwide diffusion of a consumerist ideology also imposes a new sense of identity, displacing traditional cultures and ways of life.

zh: 自由民主在全球的扩展进一步强化了正在出现一种全球文明的感觉，这种文明的标志是经济政治组织的普遍标准。
en: The global spread of liberal democracy further reinforces the sense of an emerging global civilization defined by universal standards of economic and political organization.

zh: 最近关于世界体系和文明互动模式的历史研究对一个被普遍接受的观点提出了质疑。这个观点认为全球化首先是现代的现象（McNeill, 1995; Roudometof 和 Robertson, 1995; Bentley, 1996; Frank 和 Gills, 1996），中世纪出现的世界宗教和贸易网络便人们对这样一种观点更加敏感，它认为全球化是一个历史悠久的过程。
en: Recent historical studies of world systems and of patterns of civilizational interaction bring into question the commonly accepted view that globalization is primarily a phenomenon of the modern age (McNeill, 1995; Roudometof and Robertson, 1995; Bentley, 1996; Frank and Gills, 1996).The existence of world religions and the trade networks of the medieval era encourage a greater sensitivity to the idea that globalization is a process which has a long history.

zh: 这意味着要解释当代全球化的全新特征，需要使视野超越现代。
en: This implies the need to look beyond the modern era in any attempt to offer an explanation of the novel features of contemporary globalization.

zh: 总的说来，在当时，宗族和父系家族是中国社会上下层之间联系的唯一主要的纽带。
en: By and large then, the clan and patrilineal lineage emerge as the only important link between the upper and lower strata in Chinese society.

zh: 正因如此，它们的重要性不能低估。虽然象我们以后将要说到的，宗族还是起着双重的作用：它作为重要的工具使叛乱分子集合在了一起。
en: As such their importance should not be underestimated, though, as will appear in due course, the clan was double edged: it could also serve as the key mechanism holding rebellious groups together.

zh: 海因里希•希姆莱和党卫军是阿道夫•希特勒的种族主义意识形态的忠实信奉者。
en: Heinrich Himmler and the SS organization shared Adolf Hitler’s racial ideology.

zh: 党卫军肩负着纳粹党所称的最终解决犹太问题的责任，这就是，要彻底消灭犹太人。
en: The SS was given responsibility for what the Nazis called their Final Solution to the Jewish problem, the annihilation of the Jews.

zh: 莱因哈特•海因里希(1904-1942)是党卫军安全部门的首领，他受命负责最终解决的具体实施。
en: Reinhard Heydrich (1904--1942), head of the SS’s Security Service, was given administrative responsibility for the Final Solution.

zh: 在波兰被击败之后，海因里希命令他组建的党卫军持别行动队将所有的波兰犹太人都围捕起来，并将其集中在若干个城市中的犹太人区中。
en: After the defeat of Poland, Heydrich ordered the special strike forces (Einsatzgruppen) that he had created to round up all Polish Jews and concentrate them in ghettos established in a number of Polish cities.

zh: 反过来，这改变着全球体系内军事技术权力的分层。
en: This in turn is transforming the stratification of military-technological power within the global system.

zh: 因为这些处于商业技术革新前沿的国家和公司不再完全等同于现在的军事强国和军事工业公司。
en: For the cohort of states and corporations at the leading edge of commercial technological innovation is no longer entirely synonymous with the cohort of today's great military powers or military-industrial corporations.

zh: 从这个方面来看，我们应当从下面这个事实受到启发：在1989年，美国38%的军事半导体是进口的，五角大楼“如果没有3家日本公司的帮助，无法将其导弹和飞机升入天空，因为这3家公司提供了95%的陶瓷管壳来保护其电子”（OAT，1991，第38页；Economist Intelligence Unit，1994，第18页）。
en: In this respect, it is instructive to note that in 1989 38 per cent of US military semiconductors were imported while the Pentagon 'cannot put a single missile or aircraft up in the sky without the help of three Japanese companies that provide 95 per cent of the ceramic packages that protect their electronics' (OTA, 1991, p. 38; Economist Intelligence Unit, 1994, p. 18).

zh: 但是，与美国的联盟关系继续制约着日本生产什么以及怎样生产，并且也制约着日本更全面的防卫立场。
en: The alliance relationship with the US, however, continues to constrain both how and what Japan produces as well as its more general defence posture.

zh: 因此，三菱公司与标准动力公司之间的 “日-美先进战机”（FSX）合作的提高部分原因是，美国害怕日本独立发展驱逐舰的能力。
en: Thus the FSX fighter collaboration between Mitsubishi and General Dynamics arose in part because of US fears of an indigenous independent fighter capability in Japan.

zh: 武器出口贸易为日本宪法第九款所禁止，但它不适用于与防卫相关的两用设备。
en: Arms exports remain prohibited by Article 9 of the Japanese constitution, but this does not apply to defence-related dual-use equipment.

zh: 在1851年的万国工业博览会之后，英国获得了恩菲尔德军械厂（待建中）所需的美国先进的生产技术和机器设备，到1863年，它每年生产10.37万支来福枪 (McNeill, 1982，第233页-235页）。
en: Following the Great Exhibition in 1851, Britain acquired American advanced production techniques and machinery specifically for the (yet to be constructed) Enfield armoury and by 1863 it was producing 100,370 rifles per annum (McNeill, 1982, pp. 233-5).

zh: 到1870年欧洲的其他国家也达到了这个水平。
en: By 1870 the rest of Europe was doing the same.

zh: 工业资本主义正促进着军事生产能力和与军事相关的技术的大幅扩散与传播。
en: Industrial capitalism was contributing to a significant diffusion of military productive capability as well as military-related technology.

zh: 北宋建立后为了加强对地方的控制，改变唐末以来地方权力过大的现状，对地方体制进行了变动。
en: The local government had more and more power since late Tang Dynasty.In order to change this situation and keep control over the local government, rulers of Northern Song Dynasty made great changes to the local administrative system.

zh: 逐步取消节度使的财政、军事、司法权力，同时在地方采取中央派出机构来管理地方的模式，将全国划分为若干路，形成了以转运使司、提点刑狱司、提举常平司、安抚使司为主的路级机构，除安抚使由所在路的首州知州兼任外，其他三司号称"监司"，作为中央的派出机构，代表中央管理地方，加强了中央对地方的控制。
en: As a result, Jiedushi\'s power in finance, military affairs and judicature was weakened.

zh: 在中国地方行政机构从二级制向三级制的转变中起着承上启下的作用。
en: At the same time, a new government system was set up, according to which the whole country was divided into a number of lu\'s, and each was to be administered by a zhuanyunshisi, a tidianxingyushi, a tijuchangpingshi and an anfushi (or pacifier).

zh: "八纮"一词原出自我国古籍，意指四方四隅。
en: The term "eight directions" originates from Chinese ancient books, meaning "eight crown cords".

zh: 在日本则出自《日本书记》。
en: In Japan, it comes from the chronicle ‘Nihon Shoki'.

zh: 在所谓神武天皇建都诏书中说:"兼六合以开都，掩八纮而为宇"。
en: The edict of the Emperor Jimmu reads: "Hakkō wo ooute ie to nasan".

zh: 1903年田中智学把这句话概括为"八纮一宇"，字面上与"四海一家"同义，实则要求由日本独霸全世界。
en: In 1903, Tanaka Zhixue summarized this sentence as "Hakkō Ichiu", literally synonymous with "Four Seas and One Family".In fact, it requires Japan to dominate the world.

zh: 1940年7月26日，日本内阁在其《基本国策要纲》中正式写道:"皇国之国策乃基于八纮一宇之肇国伟大精神"。
en: On July 26, 1940, the Japanese Cabinet officially wrote in its Outline of Basic National Policy says, "The national policy of the imperial state is based on the great spirit of the founding of Hakkō Ichiu the country of Bakaniyu".

zh: 西汉八校尉是指武帝在京师长安设置的中垒、屯骑、步兵、越骑、长水、胡骑、射声、虎贲八个校尉。
en: The Eight Xiaowei in the Western Han Dynasty refers to the eight official titles, named and established by Emperor Wu in the capital of Chang\'an, including Zhonglei, Tunqi, Bubing, Yueqi, Changshui, Huqi, Shesheng and Huben.

zh: 古今众多学者认为中垒校尉统领其他七校，且这八校尉及其所率军队均属北军范围。
en: Many scholars from ancient times to the present hold that these eight officers as well as their troops belong to the North Army with Zhonglei as the general leader.

zh: 然在汉代史籍中，仅见中垒校尉掌北军营垒内军务的相关记载，尚未发现其统领其他七校尉的确凿证据。
en: But, the historical records of the Han Dynasty only shows that Zhonglei undertakes some military affairs of the North Army, and there is no evidence showing Zhonglei as the general leader of other seven Xiaowei.

zh: 此外，无论是从组织系统、驻军地点，还是建军意图方面分析，中垒校尉以外的七个校尉都不在北军之列。
en: Furthermore, judging either from the organizational system and the garrison location, or from the analysis of the intention of establishing the army, it is clear that the other seven Xiaowei are not in the rank of North Army.

zh: 巴蜀文化应该有狭义与广义之分。
en: The Ba-Shu Culture can be understood in different senses.

zh: 狭义的巴蜀文化，即中国西南地区以古代巴、蜀为主的族群的先民们留下的文化遗产，主要分布在四川盆地及其邻近地区，其时代大约相当于春秋战国秦汉时期，前后延续上千年。
en: In a narrow sense it refers to the cultural inheritance left by the people of the Ba and Shu ethnic groups, who lived in the southwest of China, especially in Sichuan Basin and its neighbourhood.This culture went on for nearly a thousand years, presumably from the Spring and Autumn Period to the Han Dynasty.

zh: 从考古学上确认巴蜀诸族群的文化和巴蜀文化区，是建国以来两周考古的一大收获。广义的巴蜀文化是指包括四川省与重庆市两者及邻近地域在内的、以历史悠久的巴文化和蜀文化为主体的、包括地域内各少数民族文化在内的、由古至今的地区文化的总汇。
en: It is a great achievement in the Western and Eastern Zhou Dynasty archaeology to confirming the culture of Ba-Shu ethnic group and determining a special Ba-Shu Cultural area.The Ba-Shu Culture in a broad sense means a hybrid from then on, which has the Ba-Shu Culture as a backbone and includes some minority cultures in Sichuan province, Chongqing and their adjacent regions.

zh: 荀子关于大一统王权政治的构想反映了儒家学说为适应战国末期的社会转型而发生的理论变迁。
en: Xunzi's blueprint of great-unity royal politics reveals the theoretical change of Confucianism to meet the social transformation of the late Warring States period.

zh: 荀子提出了礼法互补、王政霸政并用的系统理论，为大一统王权政治提供了最佳的治国模式。
en: He advocated the systematic theory of the complementarity of virtue and law and the combination of royal government and lord politics in Spring and Autumn Period, and thus proposed the best model of state governance for great-unity royal politics.

zh: 关于大一统王权政治的制度建设，荀子论述了他的王政和王制的思想。
en: For the systemic construction of the theory, Xunzi described his idea of royal politics and royal system.

zh: 荀子主张尊君，以树立和维护君主的权威，同时又主张以儒家的道统与民本思想为主，建立起对君主的权力与意志的制约机制。
en: He advocated great respect for rulers to keep their authority.On the other hand, he advocated a mechanism of restraining ruler power and will, while using the ideas of the Confucian Way and the people as the root.

zh: 入清以来，土默特地区的移民问题备受史学界关注，成为土默特地区社会生活史研究中的重要问题之一。
en: As a key subject in studies of Tümed's social life history, the immigration of Tümed area in the Qing Dynasty draws close attention of historians.

zh: 这一移民现象清以降由于其特定的时间和空间要素发生了深刻的变化。
en: The migration has undergone profound changes during and after the Qing Dynasty because of its specific elements of time and space.

zh: 尽管其承袭明朝“板升”移民的历史，但是从类型、方式、构成、数量、影响等方面都表现出新时期、新阶段的移民特性。
en: Although it inherited the history of "Baixing" immigration in the Ming Dynasty, it has shown features of immigration in a new era and at a new stage in terms of type, fashion, composition, quantity, impact, etc.

zh: 唐代刺史（或称部刺史、州刺史）最重要的使命，无疑是监督州内的税赋并上缴。
en: The primary duty of the Prefectural Governor in the Tang Dynasty was to supervise the collection of tax in this prefecture and turn in these tax to upper authority.

zh: 简单说，唐刺史本质上就是州最高一级的“收税官”，跟罗马帝国时代的总督也主掌收税类似。
en: Simply put, it served as a Prefecture-level tax collector, just like the provincial governor in the Roman Empire.

zh: 刺史的年终考课，基本上以他的税收业绩为依据。
en: The annual assessment of the Prefectural Governor was largely based upon the tax revenue he brought in.

zh: 公元992年，丁谓通过科举考试，成为饶州的财务总司。
en: In 992, Ding Wei passed the imperial examination and became the financial controller-general of Raozhou.

zh: 一年后，他陪同太子赵元侃视察福建。
en: A year later, he accompanied the crown prince Zhao Yuankan to inspect Fujian.

zh: 回来后，他呈上了一份关于盐茶的报告，并被任命为支度使。
en: Upon his return, he presented a report on salt and tea, and was made a fiscal commissioner.

zh: 火药和指南针发明后，国人既用于爆竹神鬼、堪舆风水，也用于兵器战争、航海指向。
en: Soon after the powder and compass were invented, the Chinese people used the powder for making crackers exorcising demons, and used the compass for geomancy and fengshui.Meanwhile, they also used these in making weapons for wars and navigation.

zh: 在郑和下西洋的壮举中，火器已是远洋海船的主要武器装备之一，指南针也是最主要的导航指向仪器。
en: When Zheng He led his fleet to the then-called Western Oceans during the early 15th century, firearms had been one of the main weaponries of the oceangoing ships and the compass was used as the major instrument for voyage guiding.

zh: 那种认为在中国古代火药长期主要只用于烟花爆竹、指南针到下西洋时仍只是辅助导航仪器的观点是不符合历史实际的。
en: These facts are contrary to the viewpoint that the powder was used only for fireworks and the compass was used only as auxiliary tools even by Zheng He's time.

zh: 如果按照户均5口计算，那么元代江西地区约有12396890口。
en: Assuming that there were 5 people on average in each family, approximately 12,396,890 people inhabited Jiangxi in the Yuan Dynasty.

zh: 至于诸色户计制度，据史料载，元代江西地区除了民户外，还有大量的其他户计存在。
en: As to the occupation registry system, there were other kinds of families besides those engaged in farmer's trade in Jiangxi Province in the Yuan Dynasty according to historical data.

zh: 总体上来说，诸色户计制度较为完备。
en: Overall, the occupation registry system was comparably complete.

zh: 贾谊提出众建诸侯的建议为文帝所采纳，并对后来晁错和主父偃很有启发。
en: Jia Yi puts forth the proposal of establishing the system of feudal lords, which is adopted by Emperor Wen and further inspires Chao Cuo and Zhufu Yan.

zh: 消除边患是贾谊治国方略之一。
en: Eliminating border unrests is also one of Jia Yi's tactics of administering the country.

zh: 对于匈奴侵扰，文帝和景帝采取和、战结合，武帝则是先和后战，不同做法与贾谊方案是一致的。
en: The different measures taken by Emperor Wen, Emperor Jing and Emperor Wu to resist the aggressions of Xiongnu are actually in accordance with Jia Yi's scheme.

zh: 重视经济是贾谊思想的重要内容。
en: Emphasizing economy is also an important part of Jia Yi's thought.

zh: 由于这样思想主张得到实行，文景之治带来经济的发展。
en: The fact that this idea has been effectively put into practice greatly stimulates the economic development in the regime of Emperor Wen and Emperor Jing.

zh: 武帝时币制改革，事实上也是贾谊思想在政策方面的实现。
en: The reform of the currency system during Emperor Wu's regime also reveals Jia Yi's thought concerning national policy.

zh: 转运司设置于五代时期。
en: The Transport Department was set up in the Five Dynasties period.

zh: 其主管官吏称转运使，始见于唐。
en: The officials in charge of the Transport Department first appeared in the Tang Dynasty.

zh: 转运司的权力在宋代发展至顶峰，兼管民事、司法、监察、财政及军事等职。
en: The title reached the height of its power in the Song Dynasty, which covered responsibilities for the civil, judicial, supervising, financial and military affairs, and so on.

zh: 至元代，转运司开始走向下坡路，权力范围明显缩小，只负责财政事务，如催征赋税、办理上供、转输物资等。
en: Later in the Yuan Dynasty, the Transport Department's duty was reduced to only the financial affairs, such as pressing and imposing the taxes, and transporting the goods and materials.

zh: 南外宗正司是宋代管理外居宗室的机构。宋金交战，为躲避战乱，它辗转迁入福建泉州。
en: In order to avoid the war between the Song Dynasty and the Jin Dynasty, the organization to manage the Zhao Imperial Clan moved into Fujian.

zh: 南外宗正司的机构非常健全，宗室在闽蓬勃发展。
en: The organization was very effective, and the Zhao Imperial Clan developed quickly.

zh: 南外宗正司的入闽，对提高泉州乃至福建的历史地位以及促进福建经济文化的繁荣均有深远的影响。
en: This organization made such positive influences as improving the historical position of Quanzhou and Fujian, and promoting the prosperity of the economy and culture of Fujian.

zh: 晋北的雁门、宁武、偏头三关一带在明代属边关要地。
en: The three districts—Yanmen, Ningwu and Piantou—were important border regions in the Ming Dynasty.

zh: 明中后期，大同总兵在边关地区大肆伐木，引发了山西巡抚与大同总兵之间多次的伐木纠纷。
en: In the middle and later Ming Dynasty, the commander-in-chief of Datong cut down a lot of trees in the border regions, triggering repeated logging disputes between the provincial governor of Shanxi and him.

zh: 纠纷显示，明初三关一带森林广布，较大的树木多是全新世温暖期森林的遗存，森林和地形结合构成天然军事防御体系是抵御北方游牧骑兵的屏障，但却无资料显示明代人已认识到生态保护的价值。
en: The disputes showed that there were extensive forests with large trees remaining in existence since the Holocene Warm Period, and that the combination of forestry and topography was a natural military defense system, which could help withstand the nomadic cavalry from the north.Yet no data displayed that people in the Ming Dynasty were aware of ecological protection.

zh: 双城总管府是蒙古在高丽东北部地区设立的统治机构，一直存在到元末。
en: Shuangcheng Zongguanfu was the ruling office in the northeast of Korea, which was established by the Mongol Empire and existed to the last years of the Yuan Dynasty.

zh: 双城总管府主要由归降蒙古的高丽人世袭管领，元廷派达鲁花赤进行监临控制。
en: It was mainly ruled by the Koreans hereditarily who pledged allegiance to the Yuan Dynasty.At the same time, the Yuan Dynasty sent supervisors to control it.

zh: 双城总管府的设立对元丽政治关系产生了深远的影响。
en: The establishment of Shuangcheng Zongguanfu greatly influenced the China-Korea relations during the Yuan Dynasty.

zh: 对于清初江南奏销案，一般论者大多从清廷对士绅的政策层面着眼。
en: For the case of financial receipts and expenditures reporting in Jiangnan Province in the early Qing Dynasty, scholars generally study it from the angle of the policy of the Qing Government to the gentries.

zh: 江南奏销案并不是一个孤立的事件，清廷之所以在全国范围内发动奏销案，是因为清初财政肩负双重使命，这种双重使命导致国家异常重视财政制度的完善和执行。
en: However, it was not an isolated event.The Qing Government started it all over the nation because the finance of the government shouldered the dual mission in the special social situation in the early Qing Dynasty, and this made it necessary for the nation to put exceptional emphasis on the perfection and execution of the financial system.

zh: 江南奏销案对绅士的打击比较广泛是江南特殊的情形使然。
en: Therefore the special situation in Jiangnan Province caused the broad attack on the gentries.

zh: 奏折制度起源于顺治时期，其原始形态是皇室戚属致送皇帝及皇太后之请安折。
en: It was verified that the system of memorials to the throne began in the Shunzhi period, and the original memorials, sent by members of the royal clan, were aimed at paying respects to the Emperor and the Empress Dowager.

zh: 康熙间，奏折使用范围扩及内外臣工，内容也改以政事为主。与之同时，在上行文书中的地位和作用也日益重要。
en: The ministers and officers began to use memorials to talk about political matters in the Kangxi period, and the memorials became more and more important.

zh: 作为奏折原始形态的继承，康熙朝诸皇子奏折亦呈现过渡状态。
en: Through a succession of the earliest memorials, those of the princes of Kangxi also had a development period.

zh: 这些变化，对于当时政局和此后奏折发展方向，都产生了重要而深远的影响。
en: All of these changes had made important and extensive influences on the political situation and the later style of memorials to the throne.

zh: 清中后期没有制定统一的租佃法律。
en: In the late Qing Dynasty, the Qing government did not make the uniform tenancy law.

zh: 因此，各政府制定租佃政策以弥补法律不足，其中以陕南与苏南为代表，但两者制定的政策在价值取向与具体内容上，有诸多不同。
en: Therefore, the local governments'policies could make up for the lack of such a law.The South of Shanxi and South of Jiangsu governments were the representatives.However, there were many differences in their value orientation and specific contents.

zh: 陕南地方政府租佃政策平衡地主与佃农关系，取得了良好效果，缓和租佃关系，促进了农业生产；苏南地方政府租佃政策压制佃农的合理诉求，不能缓解租佃矛盾，无法取得良好效果。
en: The former balanced the relationship and achieved good results, and eased the tenant-landlord relations and promoted agricultural production.In comparison, the latter did not cater to the reasonable requests of the tenants, was unable to achieve good effects, and could not ease the tenant-landlord conflicts and retain a good social order.

zh: 族刑是一种基于血缘关系的家族集体性惩罚，主要适用于政治性犯罪。
en: Family punishment was a form of collective punishment based on kinship, and it was mainly applicable to political crimes.

zh: 秦汉时期族诛的范围基本上是“父母妻子同产”，仅在特殊情况下有小范围伸缩。
en: Except for a small number of variances, the collective death penalty was meted out basically to "parents, wives and off-springs" of the accused during the Qin and Han Dynasties.

zh: 大约以宣元时期为界，族刑的施刑方式渐由诛杀向诛徙转变。
en: Starting approximately from the reign of Emperor Xuanyuan, the family punishment gradually changed from that of killing to banishment.

zh: 家族主义为族刑的存在提供了条件。族刑是古代小政府控制大国土的有效有段，并且可以提高刑罚上限，增强刑罚的威慑力。
en: The clan system provided the necessary conditions for collective punishment, which constituted an effective mechanism of small governments controlling a large state.It set up an upper limit of punishment while greatly enhancing the deterrent power of punishments.

zh: 先秦时期左史与右史的职位是否存在？“左史记言，右史记事”还是“左史记事，右史记言”？这两个问题一直是争论不休的话题。
en: The issues have been a topic of debate for a long time whether official positions like left history official and right history official really existed in the early Qin period, and which position was in charge of recording historical events or remarks.

zh: 从文献资料和甲骨卜辞的记载看，左史、右史的职位是存在的，只是随着人们尚右、尚左观念的发展变化，其地位有轻重之分。
en: According to the records and oracle inscriptions, the positions of left and right history officials did exist.But with people's changing ideas of esteem preference on the left or the right, the two official positions had different significances at different times.

zh: 而记言、记事只是当时史官众多职能中的一项，实则左史、右史皆可为之。
en: In the early Qin period, recording historical remarks and events was only part of responsibilities of historians, and both the left and the right history official could do it.

zh: 座上奴是一种越南皇帝蓄养的奴隶，存在于越南的陈朝。
en: ：Zuoshangnu was a kind of slaves who were kept by the Emperor of Vietnam, which existed in the Chen Dynasty in Vietnam.

zh: 他们要在脸上刺上“座上奴”三个字来表明自己的身份，并与其他类型的奴隶、如公侯蓄养的官中客区分开来。
en: The slaves had to have the words "zuoshangnu" tattooed on their faces to show their identity and to ditinguish themselves from other kinds of slaves, like guanzhongke, who were kept by baronage.

zh: 同时，这种做法也可以防止他们逃亡。
en: For another point, this could also prevent them from escaping.

zh: 这种制度是越南奴隶制度残存的一种反映。
en: This system was a reflection of the remnants of slavery in Vietnam.

zh: 尽管加尔文强调不可能有绝对的救赎，但是他的一些追随者并未能区分开这一点。
en: Although Calvin stressed that there could be no absolute certainty of salvation, some of his followers did not always make this distinction.

zh: 宿命论的实际心理后果是，给后来的加尔文教以一种不可动摇的信念，即他们在世间从事着上帝的事业。
en: The practical psychological effect of predestination was to give some later Calvinists an unshakable conviction that they were doing God’s work on earth.

zh: 这样，加尔文教成为一种动态和积极的信念。
en: Thus Calvinism became a dynamic and activist faith.

zh: 难怪加尔文教成为新教当中一种颇为好斗的跨国形式。
en: It is no accident that Calvinism became the militant international form of Protestantism.

zh: 爱因斯坦后来对一位记者做了简单解释：“以前曾经认为，假如宇宙中所有的物质都消失了，时间和空间却还是存在的。然而，依照相对论来看，时间和空间会与物质一同消失。
en: As Einstein later explained simply to a journalist, "It was formerly believed that if all material things disappeared out of the universe, time and space would be left. According to the relativity theory, however, time and space disappear together with the things."

zh: ”此外，爱因斯坦还提出，物质不是什么别的东西，仅仅是能量的另一种形式。
en: Moreover, Einstein concluded that matter was nothing but another form of energy.

zh: 他的划时代的方程式E=mc2——每一个物质粒子的能量都相当于它的质量乘以光速的平方——是解释原子内部所蕴藏的巨大的能量的关键理论。
en: His epochal formula E=mc2---each particle of matter is equivalent to its mass times the square of the velocity of light---was the key to explaining the vast energies contained within the atom.

zh: 它引领我们走向了原子时代。
en: It led to the atomic age.

zh: 座落在这个几英亩圣地上面的是金字形神塔，塔的顶部是为祭祀掌管这个城市神灵而修筑的神庙。
en: Occupying several acres, this sacred area consisted of a ziggurat with a temple at the top dedicated to the god or goddess who owned the city.

zh: 而这个神庙就是这个共同体的真正中心。
en: The temple complex was the true center of the community.

zh: 为主神塑造雕像并举行包括让神灵附身的祭祀仪式，以此象征主神居于此地，这样就给城市赋予了神的权力。
en: The main god or goddess dwelt there symbolically in the form of a statue, and the ceremony of dedication included a ritual that linked the statue to the god or goddess and thus supposedly harnessed the power of the deity for the city’s benefit.

zh: 在这方面，一个更有说服力的例子是在当代的国际法中，牢固地树立一个合法的国家必须是维护某些共同的民主价值的国家这一观念的倾向（参见Crawford和Marks， 1998）。
en: A further telling example in this regard is the tendency in contemporary international law to entrench the notion that a legitimate state must be a state that upholds certain common democratic values (see Crawford and Marks, 1998).

zh: 例如，《世界人权宣言》第21条宣称，民主原则与某些列举出的权利一起作为一种“所有人民和国家追求的共同标准”（参见UN， 1988，第2、5页）。
en: For instance, in Article 21 the "Universal Declaration of Human Rights" asserts the democratic principle along with enumerated rights as a ‘common standard of achievement for all peoples and nations’（see UN, 1988, pp. 2, 5).

zh: 但是，“民主” 一词却并未出现在《宣言》中，并且形容同“民主的”也只出现了一次（在第29条）。
en: However, the word ‘democracy’ does not itself appear in the Declaration and the adjective ‘democratic’ appears again only once (in Article 29).

zh: 相反，《联合国公民权利和政治权利国际公约》（1966，1976年开始实行）在第25条里详尽地阐述了这一原则，使很多不同的权利协议与协定形成一个有约束力的条约（参见UN， I988，第28页）。
en: By contrast, the "UN International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights" (1966) (which came into force in 1976) elaborates this principle in Article 25, making a number of different rights agreements and conventions into a binding treaty (see UN, 1988, p. 28).

zh: 《社会发展纲要》的思想前提和制度前提，同马克思主义的社会主义毫无关系。
en: The intellectual and institutional antecedents of the "Community Development Program" do not have the remotest connection with Marxist socialism.

zh: 而纲要中一个重要的因素是，甘地坚信理想化的印度村社是最适合文明人生活的社会共同体；第二个因素是英国 人的经验及其农业所不断发挥的作用；第三个因素是英国家长式统治的影响。
en: One important ingredient is Gandhi’s faith in an idealized version of the Indian village as the most suitable community for civilized man.A second element is American experience with our agricultural extension service.

zh: 具体来说，这表现为“提挈农村”的运动。
en: A third has been the influence of British paternalism and, more specifically, movements for "village uplift."

zh: 在这方面，一个更有说眼力的例子是在当代的国际法中，牢固地树立—个合法的国家必须是一个维护某些共同的民主价值的网家这一观念的倾 向（参见Crawford和Marks，1998）。
en: A further telling example in this regard is the tendency in contemporary international law to entrench the notion that a legitimate state must be a state that upholds certain common democratic values (see Crawford and Marks, 1998).

zh: 例如，《世界人权官言》第21条宣称，民主原则与某些列平出的权利一起作为一种“所有人民和国家追 求的共同标准”（参见UN，1988，第2、5页）。
en: For instance, in Article 21 the "Universal Declaration of Human Rights" asserts the democratic principle along with enumerated rights as a ‘common standard of achievement for all peoples and nations’（see UN, 1988, pp. 2, 5).

zh: 但是，“民主”一词却并未出现在《宣言》中，并且形容词“民主的”也只出现了一次（在第29条）。
en: However, the word ‘democracy’ does not itself appear in the Declaration and the adjective ‘democratic’ appears again only once (in Article 29).

zh: 相反，《联合国公民权利和政治权利国际公约》（1966，1976年开始实行）在第25条里详尽地阐述了这一原则，使很多不同的权利协议与协定形成一个有约束力的条约（参见UN，1988，第28页）。
en: By contrast, the "UN International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights" (1966) (which came into force in 1976) elaborates this principle in Article 25, making a number of different rights agreements and conventions into a binding treaty (see UN, 1988, p. 28).

zh: 在欧盟国家范围内，美国电影票房收入所占的平均份额下降到1996年的63%，在法国下降至53%，而在英国下降到81%。
en: The EU average for the share of US films in box office receipts dropped to 63 per cent in 1996, falling as low as 53 per cent in France and down to 81 per cent in the UK.

zh: 最后，值得注意的是，虽然日本已经有相对发达的电影业，美国电影似乎较难渗透进日本市场，但日本也还是被美国电影征服了。

en: Finally, it should be noted, Japan, which has had a relatively healthy domestic industry and appeared to be a relatively difficult market for US films to penetrate, has succumbed to US movies as well.

zh: 以美国电影为主的外国电影在日本总电影票房收入中占据的份额从1980年的45%上升至1990年的近60%，这个数字在90年代晚期继续向上攀升（Gyory和Glas，1994;《银屏摘要》，1996，1997c）。
en: Foreign receipts at the Japanese box office - predominately American - have risen from 45 per cent of the total in 1980 to almost 60 per cent in 1990, a figure that has continued to creep upwards in the late 1990s (Gyory and Glas, 1994; Screen Digest, 1996, 1997c).

zh: 另一方面，他们所控制的政权又为其他阶层强有力的挑战所胁迫。
en: On the other hand, they worked these levers within the context of strong challenges from other classes.

zh: 把注意力集中于乡绅与贵族在正式的甚至非正式的政治机构中的强固地位，可能会对他们的权力造成一种错误印象。拿1832年的议会改革来说，这一改革使工业资产阶级获得了选举的权力。尽管这一改革使更激进的支持者感到失望，令顽固的反对者感到恐惧，但改革法案的实现意味着资产阶级已经初歩显示出了自己的力量。
en: To concentrate on the strength of their position in the formal and even the informal apparatus of politics would give a misleading impression of the power of the gentry and the nobility，Even if the Reform Bill of 1832, which gave the industrial capitalists the vote, disappointed the hopes of its more ardent advocates and belied the fears of its more ardent opponents, its passage mean that the bourgeoisie had shown its teeth.

zh: 这种情况同样表现在1846年《谷物法》受冲击的过程中。
en: The same can be said about the striking down of the Corn Laws in 1846.

zh: 上层土地贵族并没有遭受灾难性的打击，但明白了他们所拥有权力的界限。
en: The landed upper classes suffered no disaster, but they learned the limits of their power.

zh: 概括地描述一下，这无非是英国从劫掠向官僚政治演化的过程。
en: Such then, if in sketchy outline, was the evolution of the British from piracy to bureaucracy.

zh: 以下的三个相互联系的阶段影响着印度杜会：起初，是英国人想通过建立法律秩序和固定税收，以及确立农村中的财产权的办法，来实现农业的商品化，结果这个做法失败了；第二步是农村手工业遭到局部破坏；最后一步是1857年试图挣脱英国人奴役的兵变的失败。
en: Three interrelated consequences for Indian society followed: the beginnings of an abortive commercialization of agriculture through the establishment of law and order, regular taxes, and property in the countryside; secondly, the partial destruction of rural handicrafts, and, finally, an unsuccessful attempt to throw off the British yoke in the Mutiny of 1857.In turn these three processes set the basic framework for what has taken place down to the present day.

zh: 反过来，这三个阶段又为从那时沿至今天的印度社会的多种变化提供了基本构架。
只说出9月屠杀的暴行而忘却隐藏于暴行之后的恐怖，无疑会落入偏见的陷阱。
en: To express outrage at the September massacres and forget the horrors behind them is to indulge in a partisan trick.

zh: 从这一意义上说，这里就没有什么神秘之处值得揭示了。
en: In that sense there is no mystery here.In another there is.

zh: 另—方面，进行这种揭示又确实有其意义。我们考察印度情况时就会更清楚地看到这一点。深重的苦难并不总是能导致革命的爆发，也并不一定会造成革命的形势。
en: As we shall see most clearly later, when we come to consider India, severe suffering does not always and necessarily generate revolutionary outbursts, and certainly not a revolutionary situation.

zh: 关于这一问题我暂时存而不论。
en: That problem must wait.

zh: 而时下，我姑且把普遍的绝望和愤恨看作为对环境的一种反应来理解。
en: For the moment we may take it that popular desperation and anger were comprehensible reactions to cirmumstances.

zh: 拜尔尼尔和其他旅游者提供的证据与我们从奥兰兹伯的谕令中所获悉的情况非常接近。
en: Bernier’s evidence, as well as that of other travellers, fits closely with what we know of the situation from Aurangzeb’s orders.

zh: 把他们的叙述归结起来可以看到，农民的负担沉重，处于严格的控制之下。与此同时，农民人数不断下降，其中一部分原因是逃离莫卧儿王朝辖区。
en: Together they portray a situation in which the peasants are heavily assessed and kept under strict discipline, while at the same time they are decreasing in numbers, partly through flight to areas outside the Mogul jurisdiction.

zh: 尽管困难重重，陆地上军事优势的平衡也开始转向西方。
en: Despite many setbacks, the balance of military advantage on land too began to shift towards the West.

zh: 在火力、军事组织、战术和后勤上的优势使得奥地利于1718年取得了对奥斯曼帝国的决定性胜利。
en: Superior firepower, military organization, tactics and logistics contributed to Austria's decisive military defeat of the Ottoman Empire in 1718.

zh: “这个时期欧洲人在军事上优越于那些以前与其军事地位同等或更好的民族，特别是相对于土尔其人而言更为明显”（Black，1994，第14页）。
en: The resulting Peace of Passarowitz witnessed the advent of 'the period when Europeans became militarily superior to peoples who in the past had been their equals or superiors, most notably the Turks' (Black, 1994, p. 14).

zh: 在中世纪的欧洲，火炮技术从意大利引入，不到20年的时间内，除了最边远的地区外，所有的地区都（通过竞争）拥有了自己的生产设施。
en: Within medieval Europe cannon and artillery technology spread from Italy, such that within the space of twenty years all but the most peripheral regions had acquired (through emulation) their own production facilities.

zh: 这种技术自从在欧洲首次出现50年之后就传到了巴尔干半岛和奥斯曼帝国。但是如果从制度机制和基础设施方面来看的话（通过此军事技术能力开始扩散），火药革命也代表了一个非常重要的阶段。
en: Five decades after first appearing in Europe the technology had reached the Balkans and the Ottoman Empire.But the gunpowder revolution also represented a quite important stage in respect of the institutional mechanisms and infrastructures by which military technological capability came to be spread.

zh: 罗马共和国的政府机构分为三大部分。
en: The government of the Roman Republic, then, consisted of three major elements.

zh: 两个最高执政官和后来增选的执法官掌管着政府。
en: Two consuls and later other elected officials served as magistrates and ran the state.

zh: 成年男性的大会（百人大会）由从最富裕公民中选出来的官员把持，而元老院则由一小部分大地主负责提建议。
en: An assembly of adult males (the centuriate assembly), controlled by the wealthiest citizens, elected these officials, while the senate, a small group of large landowners, advised them.

zh: 因此，罗马政府是一个少数特权集团控制的贵族共和国。
en: The Roman state, then, was an aristocratic republic controlled by a relatively small group of privileged people.

zh: 奥古斯都创建的新制度中，基本的政府构成是元首（奥古斯都）和贵族元老院，奥古斯都保留了元老院，作为罗马政府中的协商机构。
en: In the new constitutional order that Augustus created, the basic governmental structure consisted of the princeps (Augustus) and an aristocratic senate.Augustus retained the senate as the chief deliberative body of the Roman state.

zh: 它颁布的法令，经过元首的审査后，仍具有法律效力，元首这个称号本身并不承负权力，但奥古斯都一直到公元前23年每年都担任首席执政官，同时他也享有保民官的权力，这使他可以提交法律和有权否决任何公共事务。
en: Its decrees, screened in advance by the princeps, now had the effect of law.The title of princeps carried no power in itself, but Augustus held the office of consul each year until 23 B.C., when he assumed the power of a tribune, which enabled him to propose laws and veto any item of public business.

zh: 奥古斯都为其权力披上了合法的外衣，深受民众支持。
en: By observing proper legal forms for his power, Augustus proved highly popular.

zh: 第一次和第二次世界大战使人们逐渐认识到，如果针对人类暴力的大部分极端的形式都将被宣告为非法，并且国家间日益增强的相互秩序和依赖也得到公认的话，那么，国际治理就不能依赖于权力的平衡。
en: The First and Second World Wars led to a growing acknowledgement that international governance could not rely on the balance of power if the most extreme forms of violence against humanity were to be outlawed, and the growing interconnectedness and interdependence of nations recognized.

zh: 国际规制的威斯特伐利亚概念的主体、范围来源，特别是其国际法的概念，都逐渐受到了挑战 （参见 Bull，1977，第6章）。
en: Slowly, the subject, scope and very sources of the Westphalian conception of international regulation, particularly its conception of international law, were all challenged (see Bull, 1977, ch. 6).

zh: 对一些已经发生的、最重要的法律变革作归纳将是非常有益的，因为这些变革预示着在全球政治中所发生的根本性的变化。
en: It is useful to summarize some of the main legal transformations that have taken place, since these are indicative of underlying changes in global politics.

zh: 欧盟的15个成员国与共享制度提供了一个核心，欧洲其他活动都围绕它进行。
en: The fifteen EU members and their shared institutions provide a core around which the rest of European interaction is increasingly focused.

zh: 但即使在联盟内部，最初的6个成员国与后来的成员国之间也有明显的差别。
en: However, even within the Union there are clearly differences between the original six members and the later members.

zh: 除了欧盟这一核心，欧洲自由贸易联盟（EFTA） 和北约（NATO ）的欧洲成员形成了另外一个互动中心圈和制度形式，以防北约将欧洲锁定在全球军事网络中，斯堪的纳维亚国家的制度与相互联系切断欧盟的组织。问题：漏译和错译改1：欧洲剩余国家的互动越来越围绕它进行   ：在北约一案中，其将欧洲锁定在全球军事网络，而在 北欧国家一案中，其存在的制度与互动割断了欧洲的体系。
en: Beyond the EU core, EFTA and NATO membership produces a second concentric ring of interaction and institutional forms in the European region: in the case of NATO institutions lock Europe into global military networks, while in the case of the Scandinavian countries institutions and interactions exist which cut across EU regimes.

zh: 地区性市场构建的法律框架恰好能说明这个问题，如谈判中的单一欧洲市场或北美自由贸易区。
en: This is well illustrated by the extensive legal frameworks drawn up for regional markets, such as in the negotiation of the Single European Market or NAFTA.

zh: 因为世贸组织和经合发国家追求更大程度的贸易自由化，所以，它们活动的焦点已转向了国内竞争和商业规则的协调上来。在某种程度上，这些规则被认为是全球自由贸易的主要障碍。（Trebilcock, 1996； Jonquiéres, 1998）
en: As the WTO and OECD states seek greater trade liberalization, the focus of their activity has shifted towards the harmonization of domestic competition and business rules in so far as these are perceived as the major remaining barriers to global free trade (Trebilcock, 1996; Jonquiéres, 1998).

zh: 戴高乐作为新的总统，力图使法国重回大国行列。
en: As the new president, de Gaulle sought to return France to the position of a great power.

zh: 他相信，使法国在冷战中起到一种枢纽作用将会提升其地位。
en: He believed that playing a pivotal role in the Cold War might enhance France’s stature.

zh: 为此，他使法国从北约的司令部中退了出来。
en: For that reason, he pulled France out of the NATO high command.

zh: 另一方面，这样的过程如果没有鼓励解全球化的过程，那么也能够限制全球化。
en: On the other hand, such processes can impose limits to globalization, if not encouraging a process of deglobalization.

zh: 然而，没有理由认为本土化或区域化与全球化是对立或矛盾的关系。
en: However, there is no a priori reason to assume that localization or regionalization exist in an oppositional or contradictory relationship to globalization.

zh: 在经济或者其他领域中，这些过程如何相互联系更具有实证性，在后面的各章中我们将进行讨论。
en: Precisely how these processes interrelate in economic and other domains is more an empirical matter, and one which is dealt with in subsequent chapters.

zh: 在1967年英国货币贬值和加入欧共体后，出口和贸易水平在60年代晚期才开始上升。
en: Export and trade intensity started to rise in the late 1960s following the 1967 sterling devaluation and subsequent EEC entry.

zh: 70年代早期，由于英国货币浮动机制的支撑，其贸易依存度迅速增加。
en: Trade levels rose sharply in the early 1970s, aided by the floating of sterling.

zh: 到70年代中期，出口依存度和私人部门贸易依存度已经达到古典金本位时代的水平（见图3-5）。
en: By the mid-1970s ratios of exports and trade to private GDP had reached classical Gold Standard levels (see figure 3.5).

zh: 贸易的国际竞争，特别是来自发展中国家贸易的国际竞争，经常被认为是把工资、社会和环保标准减到了最低水平（例如，见Hines和Lang，1993）。
en: International competition through trade, especially from developing countries, is often assumed to reduce wages and social and environmental standards to the lowest common denominator (see, for instance, Hines and Lang,1993).

zh: 富于戏剧性的是，标准贸易理论预言不同国家的工资水平通过贸易将趋于一致；在劳动力密集的国家，工资起初很低，但随后会上升。在劳动力缺乏的国家，工资起初很高，但随后就会下降。
en: A little less dramatically, standard trade theory predicts that wages will converge between countries through trade, rising in labour-abundant countries, where they are initially low, and falling in labour scarce countries,where they are initially high.

zh: 尽管发展中国家外国直接投资仅占全球外国直接投资存量的不足10%，但它们已逐渐增长。
en: FDI outflows from developing countries are growing although they account for less than 10 per cent of global FDI stocks.

zh: 地理上的跨国并购又加强了这一趋势（见表5-2）。
en: This picture is reinforced by the geography of cross-border mergers and acquisitions (see table 5.2 above).

zh: 这种活动越来越少集中在经合发国家，而是广泛地分散开来。
en: Such activity is becoming less concentrated among OECD states and more widely diffused.

zh: 商业环境中的解除管制和自由化（参看第4章和第5章）已经对通信领域产生了重要影响。
en: Deregulation and liberalization of the business environment (see chapters 4 and 5) have had a major impact on the communications sector.

zh: 世界各地的电信公司已经私有化，外国竞争者已经进入了以前封闭的市场，而且出现了多国联盟的浪潮。
en: Telecommunication corporations have been privatized all over the world, foreign competitors have entered previously closed markets and there has been a wave of multinational alliances.

zh: 同时，取得跨媒体的所有权的障碍已经减少，外国公司被允许购买国内公司。
en: At the same time, barriers to cross-media ownership have come down, and foreign firms have been allowed to purchase domestic corporations.

zh: 临时政府同时还面对着另一个权威，苏维埃，或说工人士兵代表委员会，苏维埃在城市、工业城镇、部队和乡村地区中如雨后春笋般自发产生。
en: The Provisional Government also faced another authority, the soviets, or councils of workers’ and soldiers’ deputies.Soviets sprang up spontaneously in cities, factory towns, army units, and rural areas.

zh: 苏维埃代表着更为激进的下层阶级的利益，主要是由各种不同的社会主义者组成的。
en: The soviets represented the more radical interests of the lower classes and were largely composed of socialists of different kinds.

zh: 其中的一个团体，布尔什维克，逐渐开姶发挥关键作用。
en: One group, the Bolsheviks, came to play a crucial role.

zh: 第一次世界大战之后，全面裁军的提倡者们发现国际联盟为进一步的裁军提供了新的制度性论坛（Howard，1981）。
en: In the aftermath of the First World War the advocates of general and complete disarmament discovered, in the League of Nations, a new institutional forum within which to further the disarmament project (Howard, 1981).

zh: 从1932-1934年，世界上64个被承认的国家在日内瓦举行的世界裁军大会上聚集讨论全面裁军的过程。
en: From 1932 to 1934 all the worlds sixty-four recognized states met in Geneva at the World Disarmament Conference to initiate the process of general and complete disarmament.

zh: 但是谈判破裂，收效甚微，“现实主义”战胜了“理想主义”。
en: But ‘realism’ triumphed over ‘idealism’，with the conference breaking up having achieved little.

zh: 由于国际联盟转而讨论欧洲安全问题，德国侵略了苏台德地区，从而结束了全面裁军计划。
en: As the League returned to discussing the dangers of level-crossings in Europe, Germany invaded the Sudetenland, putting an end to the general and complete disarmament project.

zh: 大多数的国际贸易仍然集中在初级产品部门。
en: Most international business remained concentrated in the primary products sector.

zh: 主要的石油公司继续控制这些部门，而其他的跨国公司开始控制采矿和一系列的金属加工业。
en: The leading oil firms continued to dominate this sector, while other MNCs came to control the mining and processing of a range of metals.

zh: 主营水果的美国公司、经营茶叶和糖的英国公司投资于种植业，并逐渐控制这些产品的贸易往来。
en: US companies, in fruit, and British companies, in tea and sugar, invested in plantations and came to dominate trade in these commodities.

zh: 北部地区因不存在着这两大障碍，磨坊和磨坊主很快就几乎遍及每个采邑。
en: These obstacles were absent in the northern lands, so the mill and the miller soon were to be found in almost every manor.

zh: 在地中海盆地，水车原是专用于碾米的工具，中世纪时发展成一般性的原动机。
en: And whereas the water wheel had been employed in the Mediterranean basin as a specialized device for grinding grain, in the course of the Middle Ages it was developed into a generalized prime mover.

zh: 于是，水力开始用于银锤和锻炉风箱，用于大型锯机和车床，用于织布的浆洗机、造纸的纸浆机和碎矿的捣矿机。
en: Thus water power came to be used for forge hammers and forge bellows; for sawmills and lathes; and for fulling mills making cloth, pulping mills making paper, and stamping mills crushing ore.

zh: 领主－封臣关系总体上是自由民之间的荣誉关系，并无任何奴役的含义。
en: At all levels, the lord-vassal relationship was always an honorable relationship between free men and did not imply any sense of servitude.

zh: 鉴于9世纪外敌冲击之下国家分崩离析，国王无法提供安全保障，分封制迅速扩展。
en: Since kings could no longer provide security in the midst of the breakdown created by the invasions of the ninth century, the practice of subinfeudation became ever more widespread.

zh: 由于领主拥有司法权，采邑制赋予了领主事实上的政府权利。
en: With their rights of jurisdiction, fiefs gave lords virtual possession of the rights of government.

zh: 问题：不符合中文表达，错译改1：领主－封臣关系总体上是自由民之间的荣誉关系，并无任何奴役的含义。
鉴于9世纪外敌冲击之下国家分崩离析，国王无法提供安全保障，分封制迅速扩展。
由于领主拥有司法权，采邑制赋予了领主事实上的统治权利。
大体上说来，海森堡提出，没有人能够确知一个电子的运动轨迹，因为通过光来观测电子的这个行为本身将会扰乱电子的位置。
en: In essence, Heisenberg suggested that no one could determine the path of an electron because the very act of observing the electron by illuminating it with light affected the electron's location.

zh: 然而，测不准原理不止于对电子轨迹的解释；它是 一种新的世界观。
en: The uncertainty principle was more than an explanation for the path of an electron, however; it was a new world view.

zh: 海森堡击碎了人们对可预测性的信心，勇于宣布测不准原理是一切物理法则的基础。
en: Heisenberg shattered confidence in predictability and dared to propose that uncertainty was at the root of all the physical laws.

zh: 日益发展的交通基础设施便贸易活动大大便利。
en: Evolving transport infrastructures have facilitated trade greatly.

zh: 另外，一系列制度化的贸易安排的确立，也大大减少了长距离贸易中保护财产权的困难。
en: Moreover, the difficulties of securing property rights in long-distance trade have also culminated in the establishment of a variety of institutionalized trade arrangements.

zh: 全球贸易网络和市场在不同时期都出现过，但它们的历史形态不同。
en: Global trading networks and markets have emerged at various times, but they have taken a variety of historical forms.

zh: 随着调节国家和公司的行为与贸易政策的全球法律框架的出现，贸易关系也已制度化了。
en: Trade relations too have been institutionalized, as global legal frameworks have emerged governing the conduct and trade policy of nations and firms.

zh: 随着发展中国家增加了其低技术含量产品的出口，发达国家则在高技术含量产品的生产中日益专业化，这就使具有相间技能的工人集团的工资水平在国际上有趋同倾向（Wood，1994）。
en: As developing countries have expanded their exports of low skill products and developed countries have become increasingly specialized in high skill goods,this has produced significant international convergence in wages for groups of workerswith similar skill levels (Wood, 1994).

zh: 发达国家低技术工业的衰落大大地减少了对非熟练工人的需求，从而导致工资下降和失业增加。据伍德估计，同没有这样的产业内贸易的假定状况相比，对非熟练劳动力的需求以20%以上的速度下降（Wood，1994，1995）。
en: The decline in low skill industries within developed economies has sharply reduced demand for unskilled workers, leading to falling wagesand rising unemployment; in Wood's estimate, demand for unskilled labour has fallenby over 20 per cent compared to the hypothetical situation without such inter-industry trade (Wood, 1994, 1995).

zh: 随着产业内贸易的扩展，全球竞争跨越了国境，直接影响着地方经济。国内市场逐渐与其他市场融合在一起。
en: National markets are increasingly enmeshed with one another as intra-industry trade has expanded and global competition transcends national borders, impacting directly on local economies.

zh: 在这些方面，各个公司面对着一个潜在的全球性市场，同时，它们还要在其国内市场上面对多国公司的直接竞争。
en: In these respects individual firms are confronted by a potential global marketplace while they simultaneously face direct competition from foreign firms in their own domestic markets.

zh: 随着中世纪欧洲秩序的崩溃，这种无组织的“武器市场”的政治基础也瓦解了。
en: With the collapse of the medieval European order, the political foundations of this disorganized 'arms market' were undermined.

zh: 当各国开始发展更长久的军事组织形式（比如常备军和海军）之后，对更加有理性、有组织的武器生产的需求也随之增长。
en: As states began to develop more permanent forms of military organization, such as standing armies and navies, so the need for more rationally organized arms production grew.

zh: 各国政府都试图垄断与军事相关的生产与贸易，其发展也被一种自给自足的政策合法化。
en: State authorities sought to monopolize military-related production and commerce, developments legitimated by a policy of autarky.

zh: 另一原因是，希腊多数城邦都享有直接通达大海的便利，既有发展经济的优势，又能引进人才和技术。
en: Another was the direct access to the sea enjoyed by most of the Greek city-states, which gave them economic strength as well as intellectual stimulation.

zh: 确实，希腊人为各自为政的城邦付出了沉重代价：城邦间彼此征战不休，最终导致外部世界强加的统一，先来自马其顿，后来自罗马。
en: It is true that the Greeks paid a heavy price for their polis fragmentation in the form of continual wars.And war led eventually to unification imposed from without, first by Macedon and then by Rome.

zh: 但是，作为回报，他们在各自的城邦内享受到好几个世纪的自由；而这，似乎至少是希腊5世纪迸发出巨大创造力的先决条件。
en: But in the meantime they enjoyed centuries of freedom within their respective states, and this freedom was a prerequisite for the great creative outburst of the fifth century.

zh: 我们研究的6个经合组织成员国对气候变迁和臭氧消失问题都难辞其咎，目前，它们所释放的物质占了全球释放物的1/3（参看图8-4），但其拥有的人口却不到世界总人口的15%。这6个国家在环境问题上所负责任的差异性远远超过了它们作为西方工业化国家集团的一部分的基本相似性。
en: As contributors to the problems of climate change and ozone depletion, the differences between our six OECD countries are outweighed by their basic similarities as part of the bloc of Western industrialized countries who currently contribute over a third of global emissions (see figure 8.4), but contain less than 15 per cent of the world's population.

zh: 如果按人均平均释放量来计算，整个经合组织大大超过了平均数。
en: In per capita terms, the OECD as a whole is contributing far more than its fair share of emissions.

zh: 问题：错译改1：它们所释放的物质占了全球释放物的超过三分之一
两次大战期间政治和经济的不稳定刺激了世界军事费用的增长，使其超过了战前的开支水平（Sloutzki，1941，第23页）。
en: Political and economic instability during the interwar years encouraged a growth in world military spending which remained in excess of prewar levels (Sloutzki, 1941, p. 23).

zh: 随着军事开支的增长，武器贸易和武装力量也得以增长，这一直持续到1929年的大危机（参见图2-1）。
en: As military spending grew, so too, until the 1929 crash, did the trade in arms and armaments (A&A) (see figure 2.1).

zh: 即使在20世纪30年代的大萧条时期，武器出口下降的速率也要比其他方面出口下降的速率慢，并且它很快又得以恢复（Sloutzki，1941，第67页）。
en: Even throughout the 1930s depression, arms exports fell much less sharply than did exports in general and they recovered much more rapidly (Sloutzki, 1941, p. 67).

zh: 创新能力是外国直接投资进入发达国家的一个重要的决定性因素（Narula，1996，第4章）。
en: Innovatory capacity is now a significant determinant of inward FDI into developed countries (Narula, 1996,ch. 4).

zh: 随之而来的是，跨国公司不仅使生产多样化，而且使它们的研发行为多样化以保持创新和竞争优势，多样化的研发活动常常集中在经合发国家（Archibugi和Michie，1997a）。
en: Consequently MNCs are not just diversifying production but also their R&D operations to sustain innovation and a competitive edge.This diversification of R&D still tends to be highly geographically concentrated within OECD states (Archibugi and Michie, 1997a).

zh: 然而，许多跨国公司很少像以前那样依靠国内基础。
en: Nevertheless many MNCs are less reliant on their home base than was previously the case.

zh: 村舍工业是一种实实在在的家庭企业——女人和孩子们纺纱，男人则织布，这种收入可以贴补他们作为农业工人的可怜收入。
en: The cottage industry was truly a family enterprise--women and children could spin while men wove on the looms, enabling rural people to supplement their pitiful wages as agricultural laborers.

zh: 18世纪，村舍工业扩展到欧洲农村的许多地区。
en: The cottage system spread to many areas of rural Europe in the eighteenth century.

zh: 但是在该世纪后半叶，开始发生了重大变化，这些变化将很快改革工业生产模式。
en: But in the second half of the century, significant changes began to occur that would soon revolutionize industrial production.

zh: 存在主义是对20世纪文明价值观的明显没落引致的绝望的反应。
en: Existentialism was one response to the despair generated by the apparent collapse of civilized values in the twentieth century.

zh: 宗教复兴则是另外一种反应。
en: The revival of religion was another.

zh: 甚至从18世纪的启蒙运动开姶，基督教和其他宗教已经在进行防御。
en: Ever since the Enlightenment of the eighteenth century, Christianity and religion had been on the defensive.

zh: 但不少宗教思想家和宗教首领在20世纪让基督教获得了新的生命力。
en: But a number of council of the Catholic church.Known as Vatican II, the council liberalized a number of religious thinkers and leaders attempted to bring new life to Christianity in the twentieth century.

zh: 大分裂严重地破坏了基督教信徒的信仰。
en: The Great Schism badly damaged the faith of Christian believers.

zh: 教皇被民众认为是基督教界的领导者，正如卜尼法斯八世指出的，教皇手握通向天国之门的钥匙。
en: The pope was widely believed to be the leader of Christendom and, as Boniface VIII had pointed out, held the keys to the kingdom of heaven.

zh: 由于两派教皇公然谴贵对方是反基督者，这种公开的攻击不仅毫无裨益，反而破坏了构成教会重要基础的教阶制度。
en: Since both lines of popes denounced the other as the Antichrist, such a spectacle could not help but undermine the institution that had become the very foundation of the church.

zh: 大分裂给普通基督徒的日常生活带来了不稳定因素。
en: The Great Schism introduced uncertainty into the daily lives of ordinary Christians.

zh: 被称为党卫军特别行动队的流动杀戮队的行动是大屠杀中的第一阶段。
en: The activities of the mobile killing units known as the Einsatzgruppen were the first stage in the mass killings of the Holocaust.

zh: 图中所示照片是一位党卫军特别行动队的成员在屠杀一位犹太人。
en: This picture shows the execution of a Jew by a member of one of these SS killing squads.

zh: 旁观者包括德国军人、德国劳工组织的人员，甚至还有希特勒青年团的成员。
en: Onlookers include members of the German Army, the German Labor Service, and even Hitler Youth.

zh: 这种屠杀方式后来被认为效率不高，被死亡集中营所取代。
en: When it became apparent that this method of killing was inefficient, it was replaced by the death camps.

zh: 在战后几十年中，国际贸易、投资以及生产崩溃了。
en: In the decades after the war international trade, investment and production collapsed.

zh: 20世纪20年代的微小复苏被30年代的大萧条破坏了。
en: Small revivals in the 1920s were undercut by the Great Depression of the 1930s.

zh: 尽管华尔街的崩溃以及萧条的影响说明世界经济相互依存的程度，但球经济被分裂成为帝国集团。
en: Although the impact of the Wall Street crash and the depression indicated the degree to which the world remained economically interdependent, the result was a fracturing of what was left of the global economy into imperial blocs.

zh: 主要的欧洲国家都在自由主义实践方面取得了可观的进步，例如宪法、议会，尤其是大众政治的实现。
en: Within the major European states, considerable progress was made in achieving such liberal practices as constitutions and parliaments, but it was largely in western Europe that mass politics became a reality.

zh: 推动政治民主扩展的改革也引人注目，主要表现于男性选民范围的扩大以及大众政党的发展。
en: Reforms encouraged the expansion of political democracy through voting rights for men and the creation of mass political parties.

zh: 然而，与此同时，旧的政治势力仍很强大的欧洲国家中，这些发展受到了强有力的抵制。
en: At the same time, however, these latter developments were strongly resisted in parts of Europe where the old political forces remained strong.

zh: 1941年6月，党卫军特别行动队被授予新的责任，成为流动杀戮队。
en: In June 1941, the Einsatzgruppen were given new responsibilities as mobile killing units.

zh: 这些党卫军死亡小队跟随着正规军进入苏联境内。
en: These SS death squads followed the regular army’s advance into Russia.

zh: 他们的工作是围捕和杀戮村庄中的犹太人，将其埋葬在大墓坑中，这些大墓坑通常由受害者被枪决前所挖。
en: Their job was to round up Jews in their villages and execute and bury them in mass graves, often giant pits dug by the victims themselves before they were shot.

zh: 德川幕府通过赐予新俸的办法，一举消除了过去政治动乱的一个主要因素。
en: The Tokugawa Shogunate, by making them recipients of stipends, cut them off from independent bases of power in the countryside and eliminated at one stroke one of the chief sources of political instability of the preceding era.

zh: 同时，德川幕府通过使武士丧失在日本社会的任何功能，也使贫穷的武士成为一个日渐扩大的集团。他们在后来推翻幕府统治的斗争中起了关键作用。
en: At the same time, through the imposition of peace, the Shogunate deprived the samurai of any real function in Japanese society and contributed to the creation of a group - the impoverished samurai - that played a key role in its eventual overthrow.

zh: 战后初期的大部分时间里，直到70年代，除了英国以外，其他的欧洲国家都完全依赖美国许可生产的许多军事设备，德国和法国更是如此。
en: For much of the early postwar period, up until the 1970s, all except Britain relied considerably on US licensed production for a range of military equipment.This was particularly the case in respect of France and Germany.

zh: 这些国家建立了它们的国防工业基础后，本国的防卫产品生产扩大了。但是，当70年代国防开支持续上升而国家的采购预算却紧缩时，跨国的武器生产合作压力大幅度增加。
en: As these states rebuilt their national DIB, indigenous defence production expanded, but as defence costs continued to rise and national procurements budgets were squeezed in the 1970s, the pressures for transnational arms collaboration increased considerably.

zh: 动力之一来自贵族的行动以及国王在等级会议前后的犹豫不决和摇摆。
en: One impulse came from the actions of the nobility and the vacillations of the king preceding and following the meeting of the Estates General.

zh: 当然，农民对于究竟是按命令还是按自己的意志来选举这一类问题既不理解也不关心，尽管法国的其他人都在热烈地讨论这个问题。
en: Certainly the peasants neither understood nor cared much about such questions as voting by order or voting by head, which agitated the rest of France.

zh: 他们似乎也不很关心波旁王朝的财政摇摇欲坠的特点及其破产的前景。
en: Nor were they very likely to be deeply concerned about the rickety character of Bourbon finances and the prospect of bankruptcy.

zh: 日心说在当时几乎没有产生什么影响，大多数人并未打算接受哥白尼的学说。
en: The heliocentric theory had little immediate impact; most people were not yet ready to accept Copernicus’thinking.

zh: 但是对于托勒密体系的置疑却日渐增多。
en: But doubts about the Ptolemaic system were growing.

zh: 进一步摧毁地心说、支持哥白尼体系的工作落在了德国科学家约翰开普勒的肩上。
en: The next step in destroying the geocentric conception and supporting the Copernican system was taken by the German scientist Johannes Kepler.

zh: 世界军事秩序是一个相对较新的概念，它指的是政治实体（无论是民族国家、城市国家，还是帝国）之间的军事关系和军事活动（从战争到军事生产）构成一个复杂的互动领域（包括其结构和动力）的方式。
en: The concept of a world military order is of relatively recent origin.It refers to the ways in which military relations and activities (from war to military production) between political entities (whether nation-states, city-states or empires) constitute a complex field of interaction which embodies its own structure and dynamics.

zh: 虽然为了分析的目的有必要对这3个方式——战争体系、武器动态和地缘管理——进行区分，但军事全球化的历史形式是由它们之间的相互影响、相互作用共同构成的。问题：漏译改1:但历史上的世界军事秩序和军事全球化的历史形式是由它们之间的相互影响、相互作用共同构成的，认识到这一点至关重要。
en: Although for analytical purposes it is helpful to distinguish between these three facets - the war system, the arms dynamic, and geogovernance - it is crucially important to recognize that both historical world military orders and historical forms of military globalization are constituted by, and through, their interaction.

zh: 第一，具有重要战略意义的殖民地几乎从一开始就被卷入冲突中。
en: First, strategically significant imperial possessions were drawn into the conflict almost from the outset.

zh: 战争行动扩展到了非洲和中东地区；第二，工业化改变了现代战争的特质。
en: Hostilities spread to Africa and the Middle East.Second, industrialization had transformed the nature of modern warfare.

zh: 巨型战争武器被发明创造出来，但为了使它们能够有效地发挥其效能，就要求进行全民族甚至是全帝国范围的动员。
en: Huge war machines had been created.But in order to function efficiently they required the mobilization of entire nations and empires.

zh: 日本没有平民元首或领袖，而是由天皇充当民族的象征。
en: Japan had no plebeian Fuhrer or Duce.Instead the Emperor served as a national symbol in much the same way.

zh: 日本也没有真正有效率的单独的群众政党。
en: Nor did Japan have a really effective single mass party.

zh: 帝制促进会只是一种相当低劣的模仿品。
en: The Imperial Rule Assistance Association was a rather second-rate imitation.

zh: 最后，日本政府与希特勒反犹太人的做法不同，它并没有实行大规模的恐怖政策来消灭基本人口中的某个特殊部分。
en: Finally, the Japanese government did not engage in a massive policy of terror and extermination against a specific segment of the underlying population as did Hitler against the Jews.

zh: 首先这个保护层是对联邦本身的保护。与西部在战后发展起来后， 联邦却成了世界上最大的国内市场之一。
en: First among the ramparts was the preservation of the Union itself, which meant, as the West filled up after the war, one of the largest domestic markets of the world.

zh: 它也是截至当时美国历史上受最高关税保护的市场。
en: It was also a market protected by the highest tariff to date in the nation’s history.

zh: 根据第14条修正案，财产受到政府的保护，在实践中却往往带有不健康的倾向。
en: Property received protection from state governments with unsound inclinations through the Fourteenth Amendment.

zh: 同样，货币流通通过国家银行系统以及硬币支付措施的恢复，打下了牢固的基础。
en: Likewise the currency was put on a sound footing through the national banking system and the resumption of specie payments.

zh: 西方商业、贸易和政治组织的兴起所产生的影响就是改变了以往直接统治的做法，并推动了非领土全球化的新形式的产生—即没有领土的全球化（参见Pieterse，1997）。
en: The influence of Western commerce, trade and political organization was to outlive direct rule, giving rise to new patterns of non-territorial globalization - globalization without territory (see Pieterse, 1997).

zh: 那些强大的国家性经济实体通常可以在过去的殖民地区保持原有的支配地位，它们的做法就是用银行、公司和国际组织这些“看不见的政府”取代过去的“看得见的统治”（Ferro，1997，第349〜350页，参见后面的3〜5章）。
en: Powerful national economic interests were often able to retain hegemonic positions over former colonial territories through the replacement of 'a visible presence of rule' with the 'invisible government' of banks, companies and international organizations (Ferro, 1997, pp. 349-50: see chapters 3-5 below).

zh: 当然，在许多情况下，这一过程不得不在第二次世界大战之后，非殖民地化的正式过程最终完成之后才得以进行。
en: Of course, in many cases, this process would have to wait until after the Second World War and the formal initiation of decolonization to be finally completed.

zh: 从1990年到1996年，6年时间里，仅电话线路就从5.2亿条增加到了7.18亿条。最大的增长来自于亚洲（国际电信组织估计，Financial Times，1998年3月17日，第1页）。
en: In the six-year period from 1990 to 1996, the number of telephone lines alone increased from 520 million to 718 million, with the biggest growth coming from Asia (ITU estimates, Financial Times, 17 Mar. 1998, p. 1).

zh: 更有甚者，全世界的电视、广播频道和卫星轨道变得更加拥挤，国际电信组织在分配开发可用频率和不受干扰的卫星频道的权利方面的作用变得越来越重要。
en: Moreover, as the world's airwaves and satellite orbits have become more crowded, the role of the international telecommunications regime has become increasingly important in allocating international rights to exploit usable frequencies and satellite orbital slots free from undue interference.

zh: 计算机工业和生产电视、录像机这样的消费电器业之间有一些重要的共同特征，当然也还有一些关键区别。
en: There are important common features between the computer industry and that part of the electronics industry focused on consumer products such as televisions, VCRs, etc.; there are also some key differences.

zh: 东亚和北美的多数计算机出口到其他地区，而且有可能多数计算机贸易是在跨国公司内进行的（OECD.1996a，第3章）。
en: Most East Asian and North American computer exports are to other regions and probably most trade in computers is intrafirm (OECD, 1996a, ch. 3).

zh: 电子工业基本上受美国和日本的公司控制，欧洲的公司只拥有少量的份额。
en: The industry is dominated by US and Japanese firms, with European firms holding much smaller shares.

zh: 奥地利于是在7月28日向塞尔维亚宣战。
en: Austria then declared war on Serbia on July 28.

zh: 俄国仍在为其在1908年波斯尼亚危机中所受羞辱而耿耿于怀，因此决定支持塞尔维亚。
en: Still smarting from its humiliation in the Bosnian crisis of 1908, Russia was determined to support Serbia’s cause.

zh: 7月28日，沙皇尼古拉二世针对奥地利对俄国军队进行了部分动员。
en: On July 28, Tsar Nicholas II ordered partial mobilization of the Russian army against Austria.

zh: 政府只要一遇到抵抗，就马上后撤。
en: As the government encountered resistance, it drew back.

zh: 到了1771年，主要的推动力就消失了。
en: The main impulse died down by 1771.

zh: 胆怯是即将走向灭亡的旧统治者的主要特点。
en: Timidity was the dominant note of the ancient regime down to its end.

zh: 重农论者的进攻持续了很长时间，不过他们迟迟不敢进攻封建主义。
en: The physiocratic attack lasted longer.For a long time they did not dare attack feudalism.

zh: 但是在1776年杜尔哥内阁中的邦塞特（他是杜的朋友和秘书）提议：至少在下届政府中，应当恢复封建租金。
en: But in 1776 under Turgot’s ministry his friend and secretary Boncerf proposed, at least for the next generation, the financial redemption of feudal dues.

zh: 杜鲁门向国会提出，要给予希腊和土耳其4亿美元的经济和军事援助。杜魯门主义实际上意味着，美国将为任何声称受到共产主义扩张威胁的国家提供钱财支持。
en: Truman requested $400 million in economic and military aid for Greece and Turkey from the U.S. Congress.The Truman Doctrine said, in essence, that the United States would provide money to countries that claimed they were threatened by Communist expansion.

zh: 杜鲁门总统提出，假如苏联在希腊的扩张没有被制止的话，美国将会被迫面临共产主义在整个自由世界的扩张。
en: If the Soviets were not stopped in Greece, the United States would have to face the spread of communism throughout the free world.

zh: 然而，这样一种策略已经表明，它对发达资本主义国家的自主产生了更加内部的而不是外部的压力。
en: However, such a strategy illuminates a further domestic, rather than external, constraint on the autonomy of SIACS.

zh: 因为总的来说，发达资本主义国家不是文化交流有效的催化剂，尤其是在那些自由民主的社会，它们被剥夺了对教育和文化输出的任何形式的垄断。
en: For SIACS are, in general, poor catalysts for cultural change, and especially in liberal democratic societies where they are deprived of any kind of monopoly over education and cultural outputs.

zh: 发达资本主义国家希望实现一种真正的多元文化主义，这个想法必定是从一个更加开明的和多元文化的公民社会中得到启示和支持的。
en: SIACS wishing to implement a genuine multiculturalism will have to take their cue, and draw support, from a more enlightened and multicultural civil society.

zh: 但是，实现这个想法所需的资源总是非常少，需要经常补充。
en: But the resources for this often seem perilously small and in need of repair.

zh: 国家之间互相联络的增长越来越受到欧洲扩张的影响，尽管与此同时，其他地方的一些帝国（如俄罗斯）的扩张也正在进行（Ferro，1997，第2章）。
en: The growth of the interconnections between states became progressively shaped by the expansion of Europe, although imperial expansion elsewhere, for instance from Russia, ran concurrent with it (Ferro, 1997, ch. 2).

zh: 欧洲的扩张同时还导致了原有的、陈旧的、非欧洲国际体系的土崩瓦解。
en: The expansion of Europe led also to the dismantling of older, non-European interstate connections.

zh: 现代国家体系的主要特征—政治权力的集中化，政府管理职能的扩张，领土管理，外交体系，常备军队的出现—这些在16世纪和17世纪的欧洲尚处于萌芽阶段的东西，即将成为全球秩序的普遍特征。
en: Key features of the modern states system - the centralization of political power, the expansion of state administration, territorial rule, the diplomatic system, the emergence of regular, standing armies - which existed in Europe in embryo in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries were to become prevalent features of the global order.

zh: 起初，促使这些特征出现的主要动力指欧洲国家借助于军事力量，以及能够进行远洋航行的海军力量而拥有的进行海外活动的能力。
en: The main vehicle for this was, to begin with, the European states' capacity for overseas operations by means of military and naval forces capable of long-range navigation.

zh: 这样，即便战后发达国家的工资水平有明显的趋同，这也应归功于生产力水平的均衡，而不是因为贸易（Dollar和Wolff， 1993; Wolff， 1997）。
en: Thus, although there has been a marked convergence in postwar wage levels among developed countries, this has been due to the convergence in productivity levels rather than to trade (Dollar and Wolff, 1993; Wolff, 1997).

zh: 在已经保持明显技术优势的国家，这种状况促使它们付出较高工资。
en: Where countries have sustained specific technological advantages this has enabled them to pay higher wages.

zh: 在技术被用于非贸易品，征税以支持公共服务的国家，它们则有助于在其余经济部门保持可比的工资水平。
en: Where these are spent on nonreadable, and taxed to fund public services, they can help to maintain comparable wage levels in the rest of the economy.

zh: 但是，正如19世纪一样，当代迁移带来的经济利益是向国内汇款。
en: But, as in the nineteenth century, the main economic benefit of contemporary migration is the reverse flow of remittances from workers to their home country.

zh: 1990年，发展中闹家收到与移民有关的总汇款量为460亿美元，净汇款量为370亿美元（UNDP， 1994）。
en: In 1990 developing countries received a gross flow of $46 billion linked to migrants and net income of $37 billion (UNDP, 1994).

zh: 由于这些汇款有相当一部分没有经过官方的渠道，因此，总汇款量可能会更高，而且超过了官方对这些国家的发展援助资金（参看 Atalik 和 Beeley， 1993）。
en: Given that a very considerable volume of these flows does not pass through official channels, total remittances are likely to be much higher and, thereby, exceed official development aid flows to these states (see Atalik and Beeley, 1993).

zh: 直到80年代，工业化国家贸易开放的趋势才同发展中世界相符合。
en: Until the 1980s the trend towards greater trade openness among industrialized countries was not generally matched in the developing world.

zh: 许多发展中国家诞生于两次世界大战之间，怀疑开放的贸易体制能否带来收益，并且优先发展国内工业基础。
en: Many developing countries emerged from the interwar years sceptical of the benefits of an open trading system and gave priority to building a national industrial base.

zh: 它们采取的保护主义实际上更多地归因于当时的便利条件，不是国家的基本目标，但它对贸易政策有决定性的影响。
en: The resultant protectionism may in practice have owed more to temporary expediency than coherent national goals, but it had a decisive impact on their trade policies.

zh: 有些法国人移向了美国和魁北克更北的地区。
en: Some French emigration had occurred both to the USA and to Quebec further north.

zh: 然而，随着七年战争的失败、美国殖民地的丢失和法国大革命的影响，法国跨越大西洋的移民逐渐减少了。
en: However, with defeat in the Seven Years' War, the loss of American colonies and the cataclysm of the French Revolution, French transatlantic migration dwindled.

zh: 在17和18世纪，荷兰、葡萄牙和西班牙在非洲和太平洋建立的贸易站和港口只带来了少量的欧洲移民。
en: The establishment of trading posts and coastal forts by the Dutch, Portuguese and Spanish in Africa and the Pacific in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries had precipitated no more than a trickle of European migrants.

zh: 在1838——1848年这十年中间，面对宪章派的鼓动，也没有出现什么强硬的反动政策。
en: In the face of Chartist agitation too, during the decade 1838-1848, no very strong diehard policy of reaction emerged.

zh: 在维多利亚女王和烕灵顿公爵的促使下，保守党人政府的确曾动用过军队，拆检私人信件以收集情报，并对一些秘密集团的首领提出起诉——尽管陪审团对此反应不太积极，并有怜悯之意。
en: It is true that the Conservative government, under proddings from Queen Victoria and the Duke of Wellington, used troops, opened private correspondence in search of information, and prosecuted some of the leaders for conspiracy, though the jury responded leniently.

zh: 保守党人的政府还利用这个机会对当时的激进刊物发动了一次进攻。
en: The Conservative government also used the occasion to mount an attack on the radical press of the day.

zh: 在这个时代的开始和结束一直拥有很大势力的辉格党人，则抱着更为宽容的态度。
en: The Whigs, who were in power at the beginning and the end of this period, were much more lenient.

zh: 控制反人道的战争和犯罪的规则体系主要针对的是战争中反人民的暴力犯罪。
en: The rule systems governing warfare and crimes against humanity are mainly concerned with the perpetration of violence against people during war.

zh: 但是，许多针对个人的暴力迫害的形式以及许多权力滥用的形式并非发生在公开的战争行为之中。
en: However, many forms of violence perpetrated against individuals, and many forms of abuse of power, do not take place during declared acts of war.

zh: 事实上，最近已认为，战争与和平之间的区別，以及压迫与反抗之间的区别，已被变化的暴力模式消蚀了（Kaldor，1998）。
en: In fact, it has recently been argued that the distinctions between war and peace, and between aggression and repression, are eroded by changing patterns of violence (Kaldor, 1998).

zh: 从美国来看，社会、经济和国家机器军事化的结果，代表了一种对正常和平状态的历史性背离。
en: In the case of the US the resultant militarization of society, the economy and the state apparatus represented a historic departure from normal peacetime conditions.

zh: 当艾森豪威尔总统警告军事工业联合体的危险时，他说出了许多人的担忧，这些人担心为战争进行的不屈不挠的准备会腐蚀美国的民主制度和生活方式（Brodie，1973，第290页）。
en: When President Eisenhower warned of the dangers of the military-industrial complex he voiced the concerns of many who feared the corruption of American democracy and the American way of life from the unrelenting preparation for war (Brodie, 1973, p. 290).

zh: 随着冷战的结束，美国和欧洲社会经历了社会、经济和政治生活的“非军事化”，其历史影响还远远没有完全显现出来。
en: With the demise of the Cold War, American and European societies have experienced a significant demilitarization of social, economic and political life, the historical consequences of which are still far from completely evident.

zh: 从第二次世界大战开始，现代民族国家成为全球政治统治的主要类型。
en: Since the Second World War the modern nation-state has become the principal type of political rule across the globe.

zh: 随着非殖民地化运动的开展和苏联帝国的瓦解，民族国家的数目急剧增长。

en: With decolonization and the collapse of the Soviet empire the number of nation-states has grown rapidly (see figure 1.1 below, p. 54).

zh: 而且，现代民族国家获得了一种特殊的政治形式——它的主要变量具体化为自由民主或代议制民主。
en: Moreover, the modern nation-state has acquired a particular political form - its main variant has crystallized as liberal or representative democracy.

zh: 在冷战冲突之外，战后的另一个重要特征就是非殖民化。

en: In addition to the Cold War conflict, the postwar era was characterized by decolonization.

zh: 第二次世界大战之后，欧洲的殖民帝国基本都解体了，获得解放的非洲、亚洲和中东地区都成为主权国家。
en: After World War II, the colonial empires of the European states were largely dissolved, and the liberated territories of Africa, Asia, and the Middle East emerged as sovereign states.

zh: 到20世纪80年代后期，全世界大约160个主权国家正融为一个全球共同体。
en: By the late 1980s, the approximately 160 sovereign states of the world would become an emerging global community.

zh: 全球化改变着权力的组织、分配以及实施。
en: Globalization transforms the organization, distribution and exercise of power.

zh: 在这方面，不同历史时代的全球化可能与全球分层化的不同模式有关。
en: In this respect, globalization in different epochs may be associated with distinctive patterns of global stratification.

zh: 在勾画全球化历史形态的过程中，需要特别注意分层化的模式。
en: In mapping historical forms of globalization, specific attention needs to be paid to patterns of stratification.

zh: 领主—封臣关系总体上是自由民之间的荣誉关系，并无任何奴役的含义。
en: At all levels, the lord-vassal relationship was always an honorable relationship between free men and did not imply any sense of servitude.

zh: 鉴于9世纪外敌冲击之下国家分崩离析，国王无法提供安全保障，分封制迅速扩展。
en: Since kings could no longer provide security in the midst of the breakdown created by the invasions of the ninth century, the practice of subinfeudation became ever more widespread.

zh: 由于领主拥有司法权，采邑制赋予了领主事实上的政府权利。
en: With their rights of jurisdiction, fiefs gave lords virtual possession of the rights of government.

zh: 在此过程中形成的全球生产网络或系统涉及的不是直接所有权，而是相当规范的契约关系。
en: In the process global production networks or systems are created which involve not direct ownership but rather regularized contractual relationships.

zh: 但同样，一国内的中小企业可以通过特许权经营、与其他中小企业合作或者在其中进行有价证券投资等形式向国外扩展，以形成全球生产和销售链。
en: But equally SMEs in one country may expand abroad through franchising, or cooperative arrangements with or portfolio investment in other SMEs to form global production and distribution chains.

zh: 虽然大的跨国公司一直倾向于控制全球生产和分配系统，但现在并不一定如此。
en: Although big MNCs have tended to dominate global production and distribution systems this is no longer necessarily the case.

zh: 如果将我们的全球化概念模式应用到世界宗教上，那么，我们可以认为，世界宗教已经具有极大的广度。
en: Applying our conceptual model of globalization to the world religions, we can argue that they have assumed an extraordinary extensity.

zh: 尽管世界宗教的创立可以向前提早几千年，但是我们可以将它们最初的影响浓缩到从公元前300年到公元700年之间约1000年内：佛教和印度教在耶稣诞生前3个世纪就出现了类似当代形式的形式，而伊斯兰教到公元700年时已经到达了它的核心地区。
en: Although the foundation of world religions stretches back over a number of millennia, we can compress their initial impact to around a thousand-year period between 300 BCE and 700 CE.Buddhism and Hinduism assumed something like their contemporary form in the three centuries before Jesus's birth, while Islam had reached its core regions by about 700 CE.

zh: 在这1000年的时间内，宗教扩张的主要载体是有组织的牧师等级制度。
另外，因为贸易在原则上为一国创造了净福利收入，收益者能够补偿受损者的损失，而且会使其更富有。
en: Moreover, since trade in principle produces a net welfare gain for a country, the gainers could compensate the losers and still be better off.

zh: 从这一点来说，较为开放的经济一般都是具有更广泛福利的国家是不足为奇的（Rodrik，1997）。
en: In this light it is not surprising that more open economies generally have more extensive welfare states (Rodrik, 1997).

zh: 然而，贸易增长和贸易结构变化日益限制着发达资本主义国家在福利提供上的作用。

en: Nevertheless, the growth of trade and changes in the structure of trade have placed increasing strains on the welfare role of SIACS.

zh: 妇女参政论者有一个基本目标：女性在民族国家中的完全的公民权。
en: Suffragists had one basic aim: women's full citizenship in the nation-state.

zh: 英国的妇女运动是欧洲最有影响、最活跃的。
en: The British women' movement was the most vocal and most active in Europe.

zh: 艾米琳•潘克赫斯特 （1858—1928）和她的女儿克里斯贝特尔•潘克赫斯特和西里维亚•潘克赫斯特于1903年建立了妇女社会政治联盟，这是一个主要招收中产阶级和上层阶级妇女的组织。
en: Emmeline Pankhurst (1858--1928) and her daughters, Christabel and Sylvia, founded the Women’s Social and Political Union, which enrolled mostly middle- and upper-class women, in 1903.

zh: 事情发生在1771年，即路易十五临终前不夂，这如同捅了马蜂窝，立即遭到了强烈的反对。
en: The incident took place in 1771, shortly before the death of Louis XV and at once stirred up a hornet's nest of opposition.

zh: 在贵族的领导下，反对者们通过天赋人权、个人自由与政治解放，甚至社会契约等口号表达了自己反对废除合法接受贿赂以及反对废除官职买卖的意愿。
en: Led by the nobility, the opposition expressed itself in terms of the natural rights of man, freedom of the individual and political liberty, even the social contract.

zh: 伏尔泰看透了这个骗局并且支持了莫普。
en: Voltaire saw through the sham and supported Maupeou.

zh: 在任何情况下，伏尔泰都痛恨高等法院这个不仅迫害自己也迫害了象他这样的文人的镇压机构。
en: In any case he detested parlements as the persecutors not only of Calas but also of literary men such as himself.

zh: 在古典金本位鼎盛之时，资本流动的强度达到了只有最近时期才能超过的水平。
en: At the height of the classical Gold Standard era, the intensity of capital flows attained levels which have been surpassed only in more recent times.

zh: 世界帝国的存在和通信技术的进步大大扩展了“高级金融”的范围。
en: The existence of worldwide empires and the technological advances in communications greatly expanded the reach of 'haute finance'.

zh: 在此期间，几乎没有国家被排除在世界金融市场的运作之外。
en: Few economies in this period remained insulated from the operation of a world capital market.

zh: 德川后期农民社会的政治含义似乎非常明确。
en: The political implications of late Tokugawa peasant society seem fairly obvious.

zh: 人们显然不能作这样的解释，即在这大规模骚乱的时期没有爆发全面的农民革命，是由于家产非常平均的结果。
en: Clearly one cannot explain the absence of full scale peasant revolution in these fairiy turbulent times as a consequence of rough equality in holdings.

zh: 也不能解释成是由于没有财产的人与占有财产的人订有一系列的契约，才维持了稳定的局面。
en: Rather, it was the series of bonds that connected those without property to those who possessed it that helped to maintain stability.

zh: 但到了公元前2世纪时，帝国的形成开始弱化传统价值观。
en: By the second century B.C., however, the assembling of an empire had begun to weaken the old values.

zh: 罗马人开始关注势力、地位和财产。
en: The Romans began to focus more on affluence, status, and material possessions.

zh: 他们转向注重个人主义，摈弃曾让罗马昌盛的集体福祉。
en: Emphasis shifted toward individualism and away from collective well-being, the old public spirit that had served Rome so well.

zh: 关于军备控制的最早记录是1139年拉特兰公会的决议，它禁止基督教军队之间使用弩（Contamine，1984，第274页）。
en: One of the earliest recorded arms control initiatives is the decision of the Lateran Council in 1139 to prohibit the use of crossbows between Christian armies (Contamine, 1984, p. 274).

zh: 这一举措像多数军备控制和裁军努力一样，证明只具有暂时的、有限的作用。

en: This prohibition, like most arms control and disarmament initiatives, proved to have a very temporary and limited impact.

zh: 但是，它标志着国家之间试图管制（和预防）战争武器的获得、扩散、使用和部署的平淡无奇的历史开端。
en: Nevertheless, it represents the beginning of a somewhat uninspiring history of interstate attempts to regulate (and prevent) the acquisition, diffusion, use and deployment of the instruments of war.

zh: 公地在欧洲更重要，这里放牧的牲畜减轻了人类的负担。但亚洲也有公共土地，象日本，公共地是肥料等补充资源的来源。
en: Though commons are more important in Europe where cattle took some of the burden off human shoulders, they have existed also in Asia; for example, in Japan as a source of supplementary resources such as fertilizer.

zh: 尽管存在着形形色色的农村类型，然而与这种状况相适应的主要思想很清楚，每个社会成员都应得到足够的资源，从而有能力履行对社会的义务。
en: Despite considerable variation, the main idea connected with these arrangements stands out very clearly: every member of the community should have access to enough resources to be able to perform obligations to the community carrying on a collective struggle for survival.

zh: 为生存进行群体性的斗争，每个人，包括领主和牧师，也都应有所贡献。
en: Everyone, including the lord and the priest, has a contribution to make.

zh: 这种观念被各类知识分子理想化了，但在农民的经验事实中始终有着竖实的基础。
en: Romanticized by a variety of intellectuals, these notions have nevertheless a firm basis in the facts of peasant experience.

zh: 这种公司内贸易产生了无数的标准和资料收集问题；这些问题在一定程度上要视决定同一公司内买卖双方属何种商业关系的标准而定，特别是近20年来，人们已目睹了除全球附属公司外的一系列制度安排的出现。
en: This intrafirm trade presents numerous measurement and data collection problems; these turn partly on the criteria for deciding what kind of commercial relationship between the buyer and seller constitutes being within the same firm, particularly as the last twenty years have witnessed the emergence of a variety of institutional arrangements beyond simply wholly owned subsidiaries.

zh: 官方机构常常无法系统地收集公司内贸易的资料。
en: Official agencies often do not systematically collect data on intrafirm trade.

zh: 总之，即使如此，这些估计的数据也是基本一致的：本图里和深作（1993）发现，几个经合发国家1/4到1/3的贸易是在公司内进行的。
en: Overall, though, the estimated figures are broadly consistent: Bonturi and Fukasaku (1993) found that for several OECD countries between a quarter and a third of their trade is now intrafirm.

zh: 联合国贸易与发展组织（UNCTAD，1995，第23页）和经合发组织（OECD，1993c）都估计公司内贸易相当于世界贸易的大约1/3。
en: UNCTAD (1995, p. 23) and OECD (1993c) both estimated that intrafirm trade accounted for around a third of world trade.

zh: 激进分子的领导人物视战争为进步的资本主义同建立在奴隶制基础上的反动农业社会制度之间的革命性抗衡。
en: Leading members of this group perceived the war as a revolutionary struggle between a progressive capitalism and a reactionary agrarian society based on slavery.

zh: 正因为南北两方的冲突有如此性质，以致一些最重要的南北斗争实际上均发生于战后。这是激进共和党人一手造成的。
en: To the extent that the conflict between the North and the South really had such a character, a conflict some of whose most important struggles came after the actual fighting stopped, this was due to the Radical Republicans.

zh: 从100年以后的观点来看，这些人严格来说代表了资产阶级革命火花的最后闪烁，是中世纪市民发动反对封建领主暴动的最后继承者。
en: From the perspective of a hundred years later, they appear as the last revolutionary flicker that is strictly bourgeois and strictly capitalist, the last successors to medieval townsmen beginning the revolt against their feudal overlords.

zh: 内战以后的革命运动中，既有反资本主义分子，又有法西斯主义分子和支持资本主义的反革命分子。
en: Revolutionary movements since the Civil War have been either anticapitalist, or fascist and counterrevolutionary if in support of capitalism.

zh: 虽然国际股票在跨国股票流量中地位显著，但流量的较大来源出现在国内投资者在国外股票市场上购买股票的情况下。这样的股票仅在其地方股票交易所发行，但外国投资者可以而且确定购买了这些股票。
en: Although international equities are significant in cross-border equity flows, a much larger source of flows arises where investors in one country buy shares on foreign stock markets; such shares may only be issued on their local stock exchanges, but foreign investors can and do purchase them.

zh: 跨国股票总流量已经从80年代后期的1万亿多美元上升到90年代中期的大约2.5万亿美元（国际货币基金组织，1995，第189页）。
en: Gross cross-border equity flows have risen from over $1 trillion in the late 1980s to around $2.5 trillion in the mid-1990s (IMF, 1995, p. 189).

zh: 到1857年，严重的财政危机出现了。
en: In 1857 came a serious financial crash.

zh: 这一年通过了一项关税，它反映了南方当时的压力，却未能减轻这种压力，反倒减少了以上两方面的关税。
en: A tariff passed in that year, reflecting Southern pressures, gave no relief and actually reduced duties in these two areas.

zh: 这事竟没有在北方工业界引起强烈不满，其原因之一也许是随即而至的是经济繁荣、工业迅速发展的时期。
en: Partly because they followed a period of prosperity and rapid growth, it seems, these events aroused sullen indignation in Northern industrial circles.

zh: 让我们把对农民地位的适当讨论暂且放在一边，我们或许会注意到军阀时期某些更一般的特征。
en: Leaving the position of the peasantry aside for discussion at an appropriate point, we may notice certain more general features of the warlord era.

zh: 赋税制度代表了乡绅后裔与官贵阶层的政治关系，这种势力产生并扶持着经济势力，经济势力又反过来制造出新的政治力量。
en: The system of requisitions represented a continuation of the gentrys relation to politics under the mandarinate, whereby political power begat and supported economic power to generate political power once more.

zh: 随着中央政权的消失，上层地主阶级失去了使中国社会维系在旧有模式中的主要工具，这种工具如果不受损害的话是会再次起作用的。
en: With the disappearance of the central government, the landed upper class lost one of the main mechanisms that had helped to keep Chinese society in its ancient mold, if by no means unmarred by serious cracks and rifts.

zh: 第二次世界大战后，跨国公司广泛利用其竞争优势，并获得了长足进展。

en: MNCs have grown in the postwar period because they have exploited their competitive advantages internationally.

zh: 在某些情况下，这些竞争优势源自规模经济、卓越的管理或世界性的销售网。
en: In some cases, these competitive advantages derive from economies of scale and scope, superior management techniques and/or worldwide sales networks.

zh: 但是战后跨国公司竞争优势的主要来源是技术创新（Cantwell，L989；Clegg，1987）。
en: But the key source of competitive advantage for MNCs in the postwar period has been technological innovation (Cantwell, 1989; Clegg, 1987).

zh: 虽然某些贸易城市已经存在几个世纪了，怛是在相对封闭的中国和日本经济之外，其他城市的成长和繁荣常常是与不断增长的贸易联系在一起的。
en: While certain trading cities had existed for centuries, outside of the relatively closed economies of China and Japan the growth and increased prosperity of other cities was often connected with rising trade.

zh: 因为自身内部工业和商业的繁荣，这些城市具备了发展的经济动力。
en: These cities developed an economic dynamic as industry and commerce flourished within them.

zh: 贸易就其本性来说，能够提高不同地区间市场关系的广度和深度。
en: Trade by its very nature tended to increase the extensity and intensity of market relations between different regions.

zh: 一些发展中国家生产标准化和技能的提高，使一半以上的电视生产建立在经合发国家以外。
en: Standardization of production and rising skill levels in some developing countries have led to over half the world's television production being located outside the OECD.
