en: Sachs and Warner (1995) found that from 1960 until the late 1980s the proportion of the world's economies that could be classed as operating broadly open trade policies was stable at below a quarter measured by population and less than a half measured by GDP.

zh: 从那时起，二者的比例分别上升到一半以上和大约2/3。在中国加入世贸组织以后，这个数字还会上升。所以，贸易自由化趋势将持续下去。
en: Since then the proportions have risen to over a half and around two-thirds respectively, figures that will rise still further when China is admitted to the WTO and so long as the trend towards trade liberalization continues.

zh: 在每一次侵略之后，都有可能出现破坏、强制移民、征服以及瘟疫。
en: Devastation, forced migration, conquest and plague tended to follow each wave of invasion.

zh: 实际上，当这个时代结束的时候，前一个千年建立的许多长距离联系已经消失或弱化了。最后的结果是14世纪大范围流行的黑死病危机以及蒙古帝国的分裂和最终崩溃。
en: Indeed, this era closes with the dissolution and weakening of many of the long-distance connections established in the prior millennium, fractured as a result of the fourteenth-century crises of the pandemic Black Death and the destruction and final fall of the Mongol empire.

zh: 忽略那些为反动目的服务（用一种便利的理由为他们的既得特权辩护）的革命口号的出现是错误的。
en: It would be a mistake to dismiss the appearance of revolutionary slogans in the service of a reactionary cause as no more than an instance of selfish privilege seeking to justify itself by any convenient argument.

zh: 首先，正是孟德斯鸠在他著名的干预理论中为官职出售进行了辩护。
en: For one thing, no less a mind than Montesquieu's defended the sale of offices as part of his famous theory of intervening powers.

zh: 正如格林所指出的，财产神圣不可侵犯和个人自由的观念在这种具体的历史条件下得到了有力的推动。顽固的贵族依靠他们反动特权的帮助从而推动革命思想发展，这种事例并不是空前绝后的。
en: As Gohring points out, the conceptions of the inviolability of property and freedom of the individual received a.powerful impulse from this concrete historical situation” This was neither the first nor the last occasion when a stubborn aristocracy clinging to reactionary privileges helped to set in motion revolutionary ideas.

zh: 而要找出明显的例证来说明18世纪晚期标志着法国特点的官僚政治，封建主义和资本主义的相互渗透，这比说明上述革命思想何以在这种环境下产生出来更为困难。
en: Still it would be difficult to find a sharper illustration of the interpenetration of bureaucratic, feudal, and capitalist features characterizing French society in the late eighteenth century than the appearance of such ideas in this context.

zh: 凡在上述征收范围之外，余等如欲征收贡金与免役税，应用加盖印信之诏书致送各大主教、住持、伯爵与男爵指明时间与地点召集会议，以期获得全国公意。此项诏书之送达，至少应在开会以前四十日。此外，余等仍应通过执行史与管家吏普遍召集凡直接领有余等之土地者。召集之缘由应于诏书内载明。
en: And for holding a common council of the kingdom concerning the assessment of an aid otherwise than in the three cases mentioned above, or concerning the assessment of a scutage we shall cause to be summoned the archbishops, bishops, abbots, earls, and greater barons by our letters under seal; and besides we shall cause to be summoned generally, by our sheriffs and bailiffs all those who hold from us in chief, for a certain day, that is at the end of forty days at least, and for a certain place; and in all the letters of that summons, we will express the cause of the summons, and when the summons has thus been given the business shall proceed on the appointed day, on the advice of those who shall be present, even if not all of those who were summoned have come. . . .

zh: 召集之后，前项事件应在指定日期依出席者之公意进行，不以缺席人数阻延之。
我们可以把民主化进程归纳为3次“浪潮”（同时伴随着一些明显的挫折），这3次浪潮展现了随着时间的流逝，自由民主是如何得到巩固和最终得以完成的。第一次浪潮是从19世纪早期到20世纪20年代的中期；第二次浪潮是从第二次世界大战到20世纪60年代早期；第三次则是从1974年以来至今（参见专栏1-1; Huntington， 1991）。
en: It is possible to distinguish three ‘waves’ of democratization (with some notable concomitant setbacks) which have marked out the consolidation and reach of liberal democracy over time; the first from the early nineteenth century to the mid-1920s; the second from the Second World War to the early 1960s; and the third from 1974 onwards (see box 1.1; Huntington, 1991).

zh: 最近的这次民主化浪潮帮助确立了自由民主在世界许多地区的主导地位。
en: The most recent wave helped secure a dominant position for liberal democracy across many of the world’s regions.

zh: 它试图指出在一个有既定领土的共同体中，政治权威不仅有权决定规则 、管制以及政策的框架，而且有权根据这个框架进行统治。
en: It seeks to specify the political authority within a community which has the right to determine the framework of rules, regulations and policies within a given territory and to govern accordingly.

zh: 然而，如果考虑到全球化对现代民族国家的影响，有必要把主权（统治固定领土的权力）与国家自主（民族国家实际拥有的独立宣布和实现自己政策目标的权力）区别开来。
en: However, in thinking about the impact of globalization on the modern nation-state, one needs to distinguish the claim to sovereignty - the entitlement to rule over a bounded territory - from state autonomy - the actual power the nation-state possesses to articulate and achieve policy goals independently.

zh: 实际上，国家自主指的是国家代表、管理者以及代理人表达和追求自己的政策偏好的能力，即便这些偏好有时可能与国内和国际社会力量的要求和条件发生冲突（ Nordlinger，1981）。
en: In effect, state autonomy refers to the capacity of state representatives, managers and agencies to articulate and pursue their policy preferences even though these may on occasion clash with the dictates of domestic and international social forces and conditions (Nordlinger, 1981).

zh: 这当然不是说移民的公民地位问题可以避而不谈，相反，正是这种不做明确决定的态度使得移民被高度边缘化并被排斥，并便人们对这个问题保持政治沉默。在这种政治沉默的庇护下，越来越多的地方种族歧视得以存在。
en: This does not mean of course that the civic status of migrants is side-stepped; rather, it is a non-decision that ensures a high degree of marginalization and exclusion, and a cloak of political silence under which a more local racism can be practised.

zh: 从广义上讲，排他性模式是一种种族国家主义模式，在这种种族关系下，种族地位和语言状况是公民身份的基础。
en: The exclusionary model is broadly a model of ethnic nationalism in which kin, ethnic and linguistic status provide the basis of citizenship.

zh: 在瑞士、德国和比利时，这种模式非常流行，移民主要是通过规范化的客籍工人计划来到这些国家的。
en: In Switzerland, Germany and Belgium, where this model has tended to prevail, migrants have arrived primarily through highly regulated guest-worker programmes.

zh: 1850到1871年间，民族国家成为人们效忠的对象。
en: Between 1850 and 1871, the national state became the focus of people’s loyalty.

zh: 无论是内战还是外战都被用来创建统一的民族国家。
en: Wars, both foreign and civil, were fought to create unified nation-states.

zh: 政治民族主义在法国大革命时代就已出现。在19世纪前半段就成为推动变革的一种强有力的力量，但是直到1850年之后它的成就才逐渐显露出来。
en: Political nationalism had emerged during the French revolutionary era and had become a powerful force of change during the first half of the nineteenth century, but its triumph came only after 1850.

zh: 尽管巴黎和会被认为是遵循民族自治原则的，但是在东欧，民族的混杂使得沿着严格的民族界线划定边界成为不可能。
en: Although the Paris Peace Conference was supposedly guided by the principle of self-determination, the mixtures of peoples in eastern Europe made it impossible to draw boundaries along neat ethnic lines.

zh: 作为妥协的结果，实际上每个东欧国家中都留有一些少数民族问题，可能在未来会引发冲突。
en: As a result of compromises, virtually every eastern European state was left with a minorities problem that could lead to future conflicts.

zh: 波兰的德意志人，捷克斯洛伐克的匈牙利人、波兰人和德意志人，以及南斯拉夫内部塞尔维亚人、克罗地亚人、斯洛文尼亚人、马其顿人和阿尔巴尼亚人的混居，这些都是未来冲突的源泉。
en: Germans in Poland; Hungarians, Poles, and Germans in Czechoslovakia; and Serbs, Croats, Slovenes, Macedonians, and Albanians in Yugoslavia all became sources of later conflict.

zh: 凡此种种，并不意味着从16世纪以后，无情的命运把德国驱向法西斯主义是一种不可逆转的进程。
en: All this does not of course mean that some inexorable fate drove Germany toward fascism from the sixteenth century onward, that the process never could have been reversed.

zh: 还有其它因素会介入进来。其中十分重要的，是19世纪工业化起歩阶段各种力量的聚集，我们会在后面谈到这个问题。
en: Other factors had to intervene, some very important ones, as industrialization began to gather momentum during the nineteenth century.About these it will be necessary to speak in a moment.

zh: 导致法西斯主义的一般道路，存在着几种重要的分支和替换类型。以学术语言简而言之，也即是说自上而下的革命导致的保守型现代化主要选择模式中，存在着若干次一级的子模式。
en: There are also significant variants and substitutions within the general pattern that has led to fascism, subalternatives one might say if one wished to be very precise and technical, within the major alternative of conservative modernization through revolution from above.

zh: 在日本，对上级全面承担职责的观念来自封建领主，而不是政治天平另一端的皇权。
en: In Japan the notion of total commitment to authority apparently came out of the feudal, rather than the monarchical, side of the equation.

zh: 在意大利，当法西斯主义应时而起，这里却缺少强有力的全国性王权。
en: Again in Italy, where fascism was invented, there was no powerful national monarchy.

zh: 墨索里尼只能追溯到古罗马去寻找相应的象征。
en: Mussolini had to go all the way back to ancient Rome for the corresponding symbolism.

zh: 通过德川家族的各个支脉和亲藩大名，幕府拥有全国1/5到1/4的农业土地，从中搜刮大批的财物。
en: Together with various branches of the Tokugawa family and his immediate vassals, the Shogun possessed between one-fourth and one-fifth of the agricultural land of the country deriving the major part of his resources from this source.

zh: 将军指定了百十名领取薪俸的地方长官，以管理他的领地。因此，与同时期的欧洲一样，日本的封建制度也注入了强有力的官僚制度的因素。
en: To manage his domain lands, he appointed about forty intendents with regular salaries.Thus, as also in Western Europe at the same time, there was a strong bureaucratic infusion in Japanese feudalism.

zh: 每个本笃会修道士受到掌握着绝对权威的修道院院长或者叫修道院的“父亲”的严格控制，每个修道士要绝对服从院长的意志。
en: Each Benedictine monastery was strictly ruled by an abbot, or "father" of the monastery, who held complete authority over them; unquestioning obedience to the will of the abbot was expected of each monk.

zh: 每个本笃会修道院拥有土地，使其能够自给自足， 与世隔绝却能独立存在。
问题：关键术语没有翻译出来改1：每个本笃会修道士受到掌握着绝对权威的男修道院院长或者叫修道院的“父亲”的严格控制，每个修道士要绝对服从院长的意志。
每个本笃会修道院拥有土地，使其能够自给自足， 与世隔绝却能独立存在。
en: Each Benedictine monastery owned lands that enabled it to be a self-sustaining community, isolated from and independent of the world surrounding it.

zh: 随便看一下迁移起源的原因同样可以表明这一点。

en: A casual glance at the origins of migrations suggests as much.

zh: 征服和殖民的军事全球化模式产生了胜利的殖民者向被打败的社会的新的流动，或逃难者从战争区域向避难地的流动。
en: Patterns of military globalization, of conquest and colonization, generate new streams of colonizers from victorious to defeated societies or of refugees from war zones to places of asylum.

zh: 因此，正如我们可以预见到的，全球的和区域的迁移模式对迁入和迁出社会的影响通常是多方面的。
en: Accordingly, the impact of global and regional patterns of migration on host and home societies is, as we might expect, often multifaceted.

zh: 英国革命战胜了君主专制制度，使带有资产阶级思想的大地主腾出手来，在18、19世纪一举消灭了农民阶级。
en: The English Civil War checked royal absolutism and gave the commercially minded big landlords a free hand to play their part during the eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries in destroying peasant society.

zh: 法国革命打破了尚未进入商品经济领域的土地贵族的权力，但在一定阶段上，又反过来开始要求新的强制力量，以约束和控制自己的劳动力。
en: The French Revolution broke the power of a landed elite that was still mainly precommercial, though sections of it had begun to go over to new forms requiring repressive mechanisms to maintain its labor force.

zh: 在这层意义上，正如刚才提到的，法国革命建立了另一条路线，开创了一个逐渐趋向民主的社会。
en: In this sense, as already noted, the French Revolution constituted an alternative way of creating institutions eventually favorable to democracy.

zh: 美国内战同样消灭了种植园主的力量，这种力量一度作为资本主义的一部分兴起，到这时却成为民主进一步发展的障碍。
en: Finally, the American Civil War likewise broke the power of a landed elite that was an obstacle in the way of democratic advance but, in this case, one that had grown up as part of capitalism.

zh: 在本章中，我还将进一歩指出：16世纪，德国东部农民遭到反动庄园和再度实行的农奴制的压榨，他们不曾投身于流血暴动。倒是德国东部和西部的农民爆发了起义，而他们在很大程度上保存并延续了往昔的生活方式。
en: Again, as I shall have occasion to point out in more detail later in this chapter, it was not the peasants of eastern Germany rolled under by the manorial reaction and the reintroduction of serfdom who turned to bloody revolt in the sixteenth century but those of the south and west, who by and large retained and even extended their old way of life.

zh: 在适当的地方，我们将指出，与上述论点相反的假设也同样接近于历史的真实。
en: Indeed the very opposite hypothesis comes closer to the truth, as we shall see in due course.

zh: 除了法律和秩序，19世纪英国人还把铁路和大量的灌溉系统引入印度。
en: In addition to law and order, the British introduced into Indian society during the nineteenth century railroads and a substantial amount of irrigation.

zh: 农业的商业化和工业増长最重要的先决条件似乎已经具备。
en: The most important prerequisites for commercial agriculture and industrial growth would seem to have been present.

zh: 然而，这种所谓的增长最终证明是软弱无力的乃至先败的。

en: Yet what growth there was turned out to be abortive and sickly.

zh: 为保证对拉哥尼亚和美西尼亚奴隶的统治，斯巴达人有意识地决定建立军事国家。
en: To ensure control over their conquered Laconian and Messenian helots, the Spartans decided to create a military state.

zh: 公元前6世纪早期，他们把斯巴达改造成了军事营地（见附文）。
en: By the early sixth century B.C., they had transformed Sparta into a military camp (see the box on p. 48).

zh: 全体斯巴达人的生活具有严格的组织性。
en: The lives of all Spartans were now rigidly organized.

zh: 大西洋的奴隶贸易持续了400多年，从15世纪中叶一直到19世纪中叶。
en: The Atlantic slave trade persisted for over four hundred years, from the mid-fifteenth century to the mid-nineteenth century.

zh: 大西洋奴隶贸易是建立在印度洋盆地大规模的奴隶贸易基础上并与之相关联，后者将东非和中东、奥斯曼帝国和欧洲在印度洋的殖民地连接在一起。
en: It built on, and intersected with, an extensive slave trade in the Indian Ocean basin tying East Africa to the Middle East, the Ottoman Empire and European colonies in the Indian Ocean.

zh: 虽然像往常一样数据不完整，但是，估计的数字表明，在1500〜1900年间，从非洲的东北部、东部和中部地区运往中东和阿拉伯半岛的人口约有430万（Clarence-Smith，1989）。
en: As ever, data is sketchy, but estimates suggest that between 1500 and 1900 around 4.3 million people were taken from north east, east and central Africa to the Middle East and the Arabian peninsula (Clarence-Smith, 1989).

zh: 但是，奴隶制的存在对于政治民主和社会民主的建立，是一道障碍。这种理解不够明确。
en: But slavery was an obstacle to a political and social democracy.

zh: 有些模糊不淸的理解是论据本身引起的，它们将在我后面的分析中重点谈到；有些则更加隐晦，无论拿出多少证据也无法使它变得淸晰，这一点大家在本章末还可看到。
en: There are ambiguities in this interpretation.Those that stem from the character of the evidence are best discussed as the analysis proceeds.Others lie deeper and, as I shall try to show at the end of the chapter, would not disappear no matter what evidence came to light.

zh: 与伊斯兰教的传播一样，它们是唯一具有全球广度的重要因素的社会交往形式。
en: These were, alongside the spread of Islam, the only forms of social interaction to achieve significant elements of global extensity.

zh: 与后来的时代相比，前现代的全球化可能最好被描绘为一种“稀疏全球化”（请参见导论）。
en: Compared with subsequent eras, globalization in the premodern period might be best described as a form of ‘thin globalization’（see the introduction).

zh: 大洋洲和美洲的文明依然与欧亚和非洲文明隔绝。
en: The civilizations of Oceania and America remained separate from Eurasia and Africa.

zh: 在世界大部分地区，都有一种对应的法律结构和机制。
en: Within most of the world's regions there is an equivalent legal structure and machinery.

zh: 例如在欧洲，欧洲人权委员会、欧洲人权法院和欧洲安全与合作组织监督着人权问题，对践踏人权的行为进行审判。
en: In the case of Europe, the European Commissioner for Human Rights, the European Court of Human Rights and the Organization for Security and Cooperation inEurope (OSCE) oversee human rights issues and adjudicate on abuses.

zh: 非洲的《班珠尔宪章》和美洲的美洲国家组织所属的美洲国家间人权委员会也有相似的功能。
非洲的《班珠尔宪章》和美洲的美洲国家组织所属的美洲国家间人权委员会也有相似的功能。
en: In Africa, the Banjul Charter, and in the Americas, the Inter-American Committee on Human Rights of the Organization of American States (OAS), have similar functions.

zh: 各种各样的非政府组织在推动人权方面也同样重要，如大赦国际（又译“国际特赦协会”）、人权联盟和国际法学家委员会。
en: But perhaps as significant in promoting human rights, if not more so, are the multiplicity of international non-governmental organizations such as Amnesty International, the League of Human Rights and the International Commission of Jurists.

zh: 1979年建立的欧洲货币体制（EMS）在70年代通过“蛇形浮动”在其中确定利率的尝试失败后，为欧共体国家提供了一个固定汇率体制。
en: The European Monetary System (EMS) was founded in 1979 to provide a fixed exchange rate system for European Community countries following abortive attempts to fix rates between them in the 1970s through the 'snake'.

zh: 汇率机制为参与国家提供了正式的工具，把每种货币的浮动限制在协商的±2.25%之内，并且为成员国提供了干预的程序，防止任何货币脱离限制。
en: The Exchange Rate Mechanism (ERM) provided the formal apparatus for the participating countries, limiting fluctuations of each currency to 2.25 per cent either side of an agreed value, and providing procedures for member countries to intervene to support any currency moving towards the edge of its band.

zh: 1993年欧洲货币体制危机之后，浮动范围扩大到±15%。
en: Following the EMS crisis in 1993 these bands were widened to 15 per cent.

zh: 尽管宣言还不具有合法的约束力，但它已被广泛地看作正在创立一种国际法的未来的发展轨道。
en: While the Declaration is not yet legally binding, it is widely regarded as establishing a future trajectory of international law.

zh: 在其他的背景下，寻求对少数群体的权利的保护的推动也特别值得一提。
en: In other contexts, the impetus to secure protection for minority rights is particularly noteworthy.

zh: 在欧洲理事会内部，《地区和少数语言宪章》和《保护少数民族框架公约》（已被详尽地阐述。
en: Within the Council of Europe, a Charter for Regional and Minority Languages and a Framework Convention for the Protection of National Minorities have been elaborated.

zh: 黑帮运动的出现同这一时局背道而驰，他们在一定程度上学习了美国经验，把“私刑”一词导入俄语语汇，力倡私刑审讯。
en: Against this background appeared the Black Hundreds movement.Drawing partly on American experience, they made "lynch" into a Russian word and asked for the application of zakon lyncha, lynch law.

zh: 他们凭藉暴力手段，雷厉风行地镇压所谓“卖国”与 “叛乱”行为。
en: They resorted to violence in storm-trooper style to suppress "treason" and "sedition."

zh: 他们在宣传中声言：如果俄国人把犹太人和外国人扫地出门，一切人都将回到“真正的俄国方式”中快乐地生活。
en: If Russia could destroy the "kikes" and foreigners, their propaganda asserted, everyone could live happily in a return to "true Russian" ways.

zh: 这种反犹主义诉诸于落后状态，诉诸于前资本主义势力，诉诸于城市中的小资产阶级分子和少数贵族分子。
en: This anti-Semitic nativism had considerable appeal to backward, precapitalist, petty bourgeois elements in the cities and among the smaller nobility.

zh: 巴黎和会上的最终和约包括与五个战败国分别签订的五份和约，五国分别是德国、奥地利和匈牙利（现在是分立的两国了）、保加利亚和土耳其。
en: The final peace settlement of Paris consisted of five separate treaties with the defeated nations---Germany, Austria and Hungary (now separate nations), Bulgaria, and Turkey.

zh: 1919年6月28日签订的对徳和约是最重要的一份。

en: The Treaty of Versailles with Germany, signed on June 28, 1919, was by far the most important one.

zh: 德国人认为这是一个令人难以接受的和平，尤其对第231条款感到不满，这就是所谓的战争条款，该条款宣布徳国（和奥地利）对发动战争负有责任，要求德国对协约国政府和人民因战争所遭受的所有损失支付赔款。
en: The Germans considered it a harsh peace and were particularly unhappy with Article 231, the so-called War Guilt Clause, which declared Germany (and Austria) responsible for starting the war and ordered Germany to pay reparations for all the damage the Allied governments and their people suffered as a result of the war.

zh: 接下来的50年呈现出两个重要特征：权势人物角逐权力和由此引起的内战。
en: For the next fifty years, Roman history would be characterized by two important features: the jostling for power by a number of strong individuals and the civil wars generated by their conflicts.

zh: 有三个重要人物把持着大量的军队和政权，分别是克拉苏、庞培和尤利乌斯•恺撒。
en: Three men came to hold enormous military and political power -- Crassus, Pompey, and Julius Caesar.

zh: 克拉苏是罗马最富有的人，他成功镇压了斯巴达克斯领导的奴隶大起义。
en: Crassus, who was known as the richest man in Rome, had successfully put down the major slave rebellion led by Spartacus.

zh: 庞培是从西班牙凯旋归来的将军，被奉为军事英雄。
en: Pompey had returned from a successful military command in Spain in 71 B.C. and had been hailed as a military hero.

zh: 尤利乌斯•恺撒是从民众的代言人开始其政治生涯的，掌握着西班牙的军队。
en: Julius Caesar had been a spokesman for the populares from the beginning of his political career and had a military command in Spain.

zh: 公元前60年，恺撒联合克拉苏与庞培结成了同盟，史称前三头执政。
en: In 60 B.C., Caesar joined with Crassus and Pompey to form a coalition that historians call the First Triumvirate.

zh: 婆罗门的种种要求和强征勒索是公元前6世纪和5世纪印度进行宗教改革的一个因素。另一因素是上文提到过的经济发展，经济发展造成一个富裕的商人等级即吠舍种姓，吠舍种姓对在它之上的两个种姓享有种种特权极为怨恨。
en: The Brahman pretensions and exactions were one factor in the religious reformation in India in the sixth and fifth centuries B.C. Another was the economic growth noted above, which created a wealthy merchant, or Vaishya, caste that resented the special privileges enjoyed by the two upper castes.

zh: 最后，婆罗门与非雅利安人之间的关系非常紧张，因为虽然非雅利安人可以被吸收为印度教信徒，但他们对祭士居支配地位很不满。
en: Finally there was the tension between the Brahmans and the non-Aryans who had been admitted to the Hindu fold but who resented the priestly domination.

zh: 此外，尽管有徳川政府的中央集权制，我们涉及的日本封建单位，仍然处于分裂状态。
en: Furthermore, despite the centralization of the Tokugawa government, the feudal units in Japan still retained their separate identities as going concerns.

zh: 日本的各藩是独立的细胞，如果它们从徳川政治总体中分离出来的话，它们或许会更好地生存下去。
en: The Japanese fiefs were independent cells that probably could have survived reasonably well if they had been separated from the Tokugawa body politic.

zh: 各藩的藩主从德川统治的和平年代里得以安全地享受贵族特权。
en: What their leaders derived from the pax Tokugawa was the peaceful enjoyment of aristocratic privilege.

zh: 当整个制度受到突然袭击时，一些封建主要使自己从这一制度中脱身出来，发动一场政变并不是件十分困难的事情。
en: When the system as a whole was suddenly threatened, it was not too difficult for a few of the feudatories to detach themselves and execute a coup d^etat.

zh: 因此，王政复古犹如一场成功的法国投石党运动。
en: Thus the Imperial Restoration had some of the characteristics of a successful Fronde.

zh: 但正如索尔斯坦•维布伦50年前在他的著作《德意志帝国和工业革命》一书中所注意到的，与日本更为接近的是普鲁士。
en: But a better parallel, and one noticed nearly fifty years ago by Thorstein Veblen in his Imperial Germany and the Industrial Revolution, would be Prussia.

zh: 上面所列的各点有助于澄清全球化的特定含义。
en: The points set out above help clarify the meaning of globalization in very specific ways.

zh: 尤其是它们注意到把全球化等同于相互依存、整合、普世主义以及趋同这些概念的危险。
en: In particular, they draw attention to the dangers of eliding globalization with concepts such as interdependence, integration, universalism and convergence.

zh: 虽然相互依存概念假定社会或政治行为者在权力关系上是对称的，但是全球化概念承认存在等级和不平衡，也就是全球分层过程的可能性。
en: Whereas the concept of interdependence assumes symmetrical power relations between social or political actors, the concept of globalization leaves open the possibility of hierarchy and unevenness; that is, a process of global stratification.

zh: 整合也有非常专门的意思，因为它指的是经济和政治的统一过程，在这个过程中出现了共同体感、共同的命运以及共同的治理制度。
en: Integration too has a very specific meaning since it refers to processes of economic and political unification which prefigure a sense of community, shared fortunes and shared institutions of governance.

zh: 七国集团的集会明显地说明一个已经存在已久的事实：随着政府及其公民认识到一个跨国的流动和联系的世界的存在，全球政治的“制度化”正在进一步形成。
en: The G7 summits highlight what has been evident for some time: a growing 'institutionalization' of global politics as governments and their citizens come to terms with a world of transnational flows and connections.

zh: 这种全球政治的制度化并不是20世纪所特有的一个现象。
en: This kind of institutionalization is not simply a twentieth-century phenomenon.

zh: 正如前面详细描述的，从19世纪中叶以来，管理全球事务各个方面的国际机制就已经初露端倪（如果把“权力的制衡”算作是这种机制之一，那就更早了，见第2章）。
en: As highlighted previously, international mechanisms to 'govern' aspects of global affairs have been in evidence since the middle of the nineteenth century (and long before that if one counts the 'balance of power' as such a mechanism: see chapter 2).

zh: 英国有现成的资本用于投资购买新的工业机器和建造厂房。
en: Britain had a ready supply of capital for investment in the new industrial machines and the factories that were needed to house them.

zh: 在商业和棉花工业所带来的利润之外，英国拥有一个高效的中央银行，以及发展成熟、灵活应变的信贷体系。
en: In addition to profits from trade and the cottage industry, Britain had an effective central bank and well-developed, flexible credit facilities.

zh: 许多早期的工厂主都是在18世纪的棉花工业中获利的商人或企业家。
en: Many early factory owners were merchants and entrepreneurs who had profited from the eighteenth-century cottage industry.

zh: 问题：信息缺漏；错译改1：英国有现成的资本用于投资购买新的工业机器、建造用来放置机器的厂房。
在商业和棉花工业所带来的利润之外，英国拥有一个高效的中央银行，以及完善、灵活的信贷服务。
许多早期的厂主都是在18世纪的棉花工业中获利的商人或企业家。
汽车工业无疑是战后经济繁荣期间的主导工业。
en: The car industry was arguably the lead industry during the postwar economic boom.

zh: 美国的生产商，如福特和通用公司早已建立了经营机制。但是第二次世界大战后，它们的国际扩张，特别是进军欧洲市场的势头前所未有。
en: US producers, such as Ford and General Motors, had established operations, but the postwar period witnessed their unprecedented international expansion, into Europe particularly.

zh: 随着美国公司在欧洲和其他地方建立大规模的生产装配线，国内由场保护和运输成本使外同直接投资成为服务这些市场的明显方式。
en: Protection of national markets and transport costs made FDI the obvious tool for serving these markets as US firms replicated mass production assembly lines in Europe and elsewhere.

zh: 虽然大公司成功地赢得了市场份额，但在受保护的欧洲市场内，政府支持的国内竞争者出现了。
en: Although the big firms succeeded in gaining significant market shares, within protected European markets national competitors emerged, often championed by their governments.

zh: 不管是实际上还是在各国和国际模糊的迁移统计领域，这些种类之间的区別都是模糊不清的。
en: The distinctions between these categories are ever more blurred, both in reality and in the murky world of national and international migration statistics.

zh: 这些流动既出现在经合组织成员国和发展中国家之间，也发生在发展中国家范围内。
en: These movements of people occur between OECD and developing states and within the developing world itself.

zh: 它们的起因是复杂的。
en: Their roots are complex.

zh: 然而，这些国家渐渐成了缓冲区，迁移者（在前苏联和巴尔干半岛，迁移者已经开始进一步往南和往东迁移）在试图进一步往西迁移时，都先在这里停留一段时间。
en: However, these states have increasingly become buffer zones, where migratory flows (that have begun further south and east, in the states of the ex-Soviet Union and in the Balkans) pause before attempting to travel further westwards.

zh: 1991年，估计波兰有70万外籍工人，许多人正努力继续向西的迁移。
en: In 1991, Poland had an estimated 700,000 foreign workers, many seeking to continue their journey west.

zh: 自第二次世界大战以来，前南斯拉夫的国内战争造成大量的欧洲迁移人口进一步向南迁移。
en: Further south the civil war in the former Yugoslavia has generated the largest numbers of displaced persons in Europe since the Second World War.

zh: 现代早期，武器贸易几乎全部发生在每个分立的世界文明领域之内。
en: In the premodern era the trade in arms occurred almost exclusively within the confines of separate world civilizations.

zh: 例如，巴特莱特描述了在950年到1350年期间，法兰克人的武器和军事技术（比如城堡防御技术和炮击技术）是如何扩展到整个欧洲的（1994，第70〜84页）。
en: Bartlett, for instance, describes how in the period 950-1350 Frankish arms and military technology (such as castles and bombardment techniques) spread across Europe (1994, pp. 70-84).

zh: 通过征服和竞争，城堡、围城器械和弓弩成为欧洲战争的常用武器。
en: By means of conquest and emulation, castles, siege machinery and crossbows became familiar instruments of medieval warfare within Europe.

zh: 起初，新石器时代的居住形式仅仅是村落，但是随着居住者渐渐掌握了耕种技术，更加复杂的人类社会开始出现。
en: At first, Neolithic settlements were mere villages.But as their inhabitants mastered the art of farming, more complex human societies began to emerge.

zh: 伴随着财富的增加，社会衍生出了军队并且开始出现了带围墙的城市和城镇。
en: As wealth increased, these societies began to develop armies and to build walled towns and cities.

zh: 到青铜时代开始时，大量人口集中在美索不达米亚和埃及河谷，开创了一种全新的人类生活方式。
en: By the beginning of the Bronze Age, the concentration of larger numbers of people in the river valleys of Mesopotamia and Egypt was leading to a whole new pattern for human life.

zh: 一系列国际条约已经有效禁止了有害垃圾倾倒入海，而且禁止在海洋中焚烧垃圾。
en: A series of international treaties have effectively banned the dumping of hazardous wastes at sea and completely phased out the sea-based incineration option.

zh: 在陆地上，控制垃圾焚烧的规定已经防止了许多有害垃圾被存放在不恰当的地方。
en: On land, regulations governing the management of landfill sites have prevented many hazardous wastes from being stored in inappropriate sites.

zh: 这为人们提供了回收垃圾以及焚烧垃圾的选择。
en: This has left recycling and land-based incineration options.

zh: 18世纪大土地主所拥有的政治和经济的特权部分地是由国内战争以前的某些倾向所造成的。这些倾向主要是:地方显贵的权威，以及缺乏一种强有力的机构来限制这种权威，甚至在都铎和斯图亚特王朝时代也是如此。
en: The political and economic supremacy of the larger landlords during the eighteenth century was partly the result of trends that long antedate the Civil War, chiefly the authority of local notables and the absence of a strong bureaucratic apparatus to check this authority, even under the Tudors and the Stuarts.

zh: 国内战争的结果与法国大革命的成果形成了鲜明的对照，它加强了上层土地所有者的地位。
en: The outcome of the Civil War itself, in sharp contrast to that of the French Revolution, was to strengthen greatly the position of the landed upper classes.

zh: 我们始终可以看到某些证据，证明在清教徒革命期间土地所有者的分布情况只有一些很小的变动，除了少数特殊情况之外。
en: There has already been occasion to notice some evidence indicating relatively little change in the distribution of landed property during the Puritan Revolution.

zh: 1640年居住于北安普敦郡和贝得福郡的大家族在一个世纪之后仍居住于原地。
en: With only two exceptions, all the great families that were in Northamptonshire and Bedfordshire in 1640 were still there a century later.

zh: 正因为穆斯林社会是穆罕默德天才的结晶，所以他死后，这一社会也就面临着分裂的危险。
en: Precisely because the Moslem community was the product of Mohammed’s genius, it now seemed likely with his death to break up into its component dements.

zh: 部落酋长们认为他们对穆罕默德的服从已经随着他的死亡而完结。于是，他们停止纳贡，恢复行动自由。
en: The tribal sheikhs, who considered their submission to him ended with his death, stopped their tribute and resumed their freedom of action.

zh: 对这些概念进行更精确的定义，关键是要表明，全球化在这里与更有空间限制的过程不是对立关系，而是复合和动态的关系。
en: In offering a more precise definition of these concepts it is crucial to signal that globalization is not conceived here in opposition to more spatially delimited processes but, on the contrary, as standing in a complex and dynamic relationship with them.

zh: —方面，像区域化这样的过程能够创造必要的经济、社会以及物质基础，它们推动并且补充着全球化的深入。
en: On the one hand, processes such as regionalization can create the necessary kinds of economic, social and physical infrastructures which facilitate and complement the deepening of globalization.

zh: 在这方而，经济区域化（例如欧盟）并不是贸易和生产全球化的障碍，而是推动力。
en: In this regard, for example, economic regionalization (for instance, the European Union) has not been a barrier to the globalization of trade and production but a spur.

zh: 另一方面，这样的过程如果没有鼓励解全球化 的过程，那么也能够限制全球化。
en: On the other hand, such processes can impose limits to globalization, if not encouraging a process of deglobalization.

zh: 撒哈拉以南非洲在战后出现了重要的全球性迁移流，主要是迁往前殖民国家：尼日利亚、坦桑尼亚和乌干达人迁往英国；中非和西非人迁往法国；扎伊尔人迁往比利时（Curtin， 1978; Castles 和 Miller， 1993）。
en: Sub-Saharan Africa has generated significant global flows of migrants in the postwar era, mainly to ex-colonial states: Nigerian, Tanzanian and Ugandan Asians have migrated to the UK; Central and West Africans to France; Zairians to Belgium (Curtin, 1978; Castles and Miller, 1993).

zh: 然而，经合组织认为，这些迁移与非洲内部的区域性迁移相比相形见绌（经济合作与发展组织， 1993a）。
en: However, the OECD has argued that these movements are dwarfed by regional migrations within Africa (OECD, 1993a).

zh: 区域性的劳动力迁移主要是流向尼日利亚、南非、加蓬和象牙海岸。
en: Regional labour migrations have flowed primarily to Nigeria, South Africa, Gabon and the Ivory Coast.

zh: 冷战结束以后，在欧洲以外，区域关系的制度化速度显著加快，如美洲、亚太地区，以及程度稍慢的非洲。
en: Since the end of the Cold War, there has been a significant acceleration in the institutionalization of regional relations beyond Europe: in the Americas, Asia-Pacific and, to a lesser degree, in Africa.

zh: 但是这样的区域主义所采取的形式却与欧盟的一体化模式有着极大的差异。
en: But the forms taken by this regionalism are radically different from the integrationist model of the EU.

zh: 实际上，目前世界其他地方大部分反对将欧盟模式作为某种直接效仿的对象。
en: Indeed, to date the rest of the world has largely rejected the EU model as something to emulate directly.

zh: 然而，赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上对斯大林的批判在共产主义阵营中激起了骚动，并在苏联的东欧卫星国中激起了反抗。
en: Nevertheless, Khrushchev’s revelations about Stalin at the Twentieth Congress caused turmoil in Communist ranks everywhere and encouraged a spirit of rebellion in Soviet satellite countries in Eastern Europe.

zh: 1956年匈牙利爆发了反苏起义，苏联军队迅速镇压了这次起义。赫鲁晓夫和其他苏联领导人由于担心会进一步削弱苏联政权的根基，于是对去斯大林化运动进行低调处理。
en: Soviet troops reacted by crushing an uprising in Hungary in 1956, and Khrushchev and the Soviet leaders, fearful of further undermining the basic foundations of the regime, downplayed their campaign of destalinization.

zh: 全球变暖带来的结果是很难测量的。
en: The consequences of global warming are phenomenally complex to calibrate.

zh: 首先，这是因为全球平均气温的增加真正带来地方的气温和气候变化的方式是不断改变的。
en: In the first place this is because the way in which an average increase in ambient global temperatures is actually translated into local temperature and climate change is very variable.

zh: 而且，气候不仅仅包括气温，不断变化的气温与风、降雨和气压等的相互作用不可能以非常准确的方式来预测；第二，其他生态系统对全球变暖作出的反应也不甚清楚。
en: Moreover, climate is more than just temperature, and the interaction of changing temperatures with winds, rainfall and pressure is impossible to predict in any very accurate way.Second, the response of other ecological systems to global warming is unclear.

zh: 早期，领土与主权之间的联系不太紧密，像我们所说的那样，核心—边缘、都市—殖民地是描绘政治控制的有用模式。
en: In earlier eras when territory and sovereignty were less closely linked, core and periphery, metropole and colony were, as we have noted, useful models for describing political space.

zh: 在这种情况下，许多区域间和全球流动虽然改变着并扩大着这些领域，但是不一定跨越了国界。
en: As such, many interregional and global flows transformed and extended those areas rather than necessarily crossing boundaries.

zh: 而今天全球流动和相互联系达到了前所未有的程度，跨越了几乎完全由民族国家组成的世界。
en: Today, historically unprecedented levels of global flows and interconnections cross a world that is almost universally made up of nation-states.

zh: 几乎覆盖世界的民族国家与几乎涉及所有领域的全球化同时并存。
en: The near universality of the nation-state is paralleled by the extensity of globalization in nearly all domains.

zh: 作为全球共同财产的环境，其恶化程度虽然在各地不同，但是波及到这个星球的所有角落。
en: Environmental degradation of the global commons reaches, albeit unevenly, into every corner of the planet.

zh: 随着布雷顿森林体系的解体，美国在这个领域中的主导地位再次让位给更加多极的世界。
en: With the collapse of Bretton Woods, the dominance of the USA in this sphere has again given way to a more multipolar world.

zh: 在过去20年中，尽管不断出现经济动荡，东亚和拉丁美洲的工业化以及全球自由贸易网络的建立已经开始重新安排全球经济网络中的力量结构。
en: In the last two decades, the industrialization of East Asia and Latin America, and the creation of global free trade networks have looked set - despite periods of economic turmoil - to rearrange the structure of power within global economic networks once again.

zh: 而且，旧的南北关系已经让位给更复杂的全球经济和生产力量关系的立体结构——一种新的全球劳动分工（参见第3~5章）。
en: Moreover, the old North-South hierarchy has given way to a more complex geometry of global economic and productive power relations - a new global division of labour (see chapters 3 to 5).

zh: 从年代的角度来说，现代早期和现代整个时期的全球迁移总量在不断增加。
en: In terms of chronology the magnitude of total global migrations grew over the early modern and modern periods.

zh: 早期欧洲向美洲的移民数量很少，向拉美和加勒比海地区的移民数量也很少。
en: Early European migrations to the Americas were small, as were those to Latin America and the Caribbean.

zh: 18世纪和19世纪的奴隶贸易的纯数量当然比前两个世纪的迁移量更大。
en: The slave trade of the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries was certainly larger in terms of sheer numbers than the flows of the two prior centuries.

zh: 然而，现代整个时期全球迁移的高峰年代肯定是在19世纪晚期和20世纪早期。
en: However, the peak years for global migration during the modern period must be the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries.

zh: 90年代后期，跨国公司的活动和全球生产网络遍布世界各地。
en: In the late 1990s few economies were outside the reach of MNC activity and global production networks.

zh: 如表5-3所示，在不同程度上，全球所有地区都是跨国公司或其外国分支机构的母国和东道国。
en: As table 5.3 indicates, all regions of the globe, to a greater or lesser extent, are both the home of and host to MNCs or their foreign affiliates.

zh: 但最引人注目的是发展中国国家内部以及来自发展中国家的跨国公司的规模。
en: But what is striking is the scale of MNC activity within, and from, the developing countries.

zh: “全球政治”的概念对传统的国内/国际，内部/外部，领土/非领土政治之间的区分提出了挑战，而这些区分的基础是传统的“政治”概念（参见Walker，1993）。此外，“全球政治”还集中反映了国家间联系的丰富性和复杂性，这种联系在全球秩序中已经超越了国家和社会。
en: The idea of 'global politics' challenges the traditional distinctions between domestic/international, inside/outside, territorial/non-territorial politics, as embedded in conventional conceptions of 'the political' (see Walker, 1993).It also highlights the richness and complexity of the interconnections which transcend states and societies in the global order.

zh: 尽管政府和国家仍然理所当然地是强有力的行动者，但是，它们现在必须和一大群其他的机构和组织共享全球竞技舞台。
en: Although governments and states remain, of course, powerful actors, they now share the global arena with an array of other agencies and organizations.

zh: 国际规制体制标志着全球政治的日益制度化（Young，1989， 第11页）。
en: International regimes mark out the growing institutionalization of global politics (Young, 1989, p. 11).

zh: 它们构成了全球治理的形式，明显区别于传统的政府的概念，后者是在特定区域内最高的政治权力的基础上构想的。
en: They constitute forms of global governance, distinct from traditional notions of government conceived in terms of the specific sites of sovereign political power.

zh: 当然，在当代国际体系中，并不存在超越于国家权力之上的单个的政治权威。
en: In the contemporary international system there is, of course, no single political authority above the state.

zh: 尽管如此，国际规制体制的发展仍然非常迅猛，反映了全球和地区性卷入类型的强化。
en: But despite this, international regulatory regimes have developed rapidly, reflecting the intensification of patterns of global and regional enmeshment.

zh: 实际上，无套裤汉的革命热情本身并没有随着罗伯斯庇尔的被处决而有所削弱。
en: Actually the revolutionary elan of the sansculottes did not dissipate itself with Robespierre’s execution.

zh: 在“热月政变”和经济控制放松以后，巴黎贫民的物质条件仍然趋于恶化。
en: After Thermidor and the dismounting of the remaining economic controls, the material situation of the Parisian poor, if anything, deteriorated still further.

zh: 面对这种局面，他们在1795年春天举行了暴动。这次行动也许比先前的（即1789年7月14日、1792年8月10日和1793年5月31日）那些伟大革命行动更为激烈。
en: They responded with riots in the spring of 1795, perhaps even more violent than the great revolutionary days of July I4, 1789, August 10, 1792, and May 31, 1793.

zh: 与此相伴的是国际新规范在关于国际社会干预国家事务权利方面的新发展，这些权利针对已破坏或正在破坏人道主义的国家。（参看本书1.3.3部分） （参看本书1.
en: Associated with this expansion is the development of new international norms concerning the right of the international community to intervene in the sovereign  affairs of states where crimes against humanity are believed to have occurred or to be occurring (see section 1.
3.3 above).

zh: 从这个意义上讲，联合国的预防战争和冲突的角色变得越来越突出，即使它经常未能取得积极成效。
en: In this sense, the war and conflict prevention role of the UN has acquired increasing global salience even if the UN has often failed to achieve positive results.

zh: 行政权力的执掌者和政府官僚们经常同时获得经验和财富，这种情况促进了他们在面对地方组织和共同体时的自主性。
en: Executive powers and state bureaucracies frequently gained both in experience and assets, and this enhanced their autonomy in the face of local assemblies and groups.

zh: 那些拥有良好的行政管理基础，能够号召广大的人民，有着广泛的税收基础，并拥有强大的军队和造船工业的国家获得了优势地位。
en: Those states which were able to call on a sound administrative infrastructure, a substantial population and a wide tax base, alongside arms and ship-building industries, gained an advantage.

zh: 在17和18世纪，这种优势由绝对主义政府和立宪政府所享有；而到了19世纪，这种优势则由新出现的现代民族国家所享有。
en: This advantage was enjoyed by absolutist and constitutional governments in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries; in the nineteenth century it was enjoyed by the emergent modern nation-states.

zh: 然而，不管民族主义存在何种多样性以及它们与国家之间的关系通常是如何的模糊，民主理论想当然地把人民大众、市民、选举机制、赞同的本质以及民族国家之间的疆界联系在一起，尤其是当它在19世纪和20世纪获得了进一步发展后，情况就更是如此。
en: Nonetheless, despite the diversity of nationalisms and their frequently ambiguous relationships to states, the theory of democracy took for granted, particularly as it developed in the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, the link between the demos, citizenship, electoral mechanisms, the nature of consent, and the boundaries of the nation-state.

zh: 尽管不同的政治共同体的命运可能会遭到冲击和扭曲，但是，决定“国家命运”的基础的最合适的场所还是建立在一定领土基础上的政治共同体本身。
en: The fates of different political communities may be contested and intertwined, but the appropriate place for determining the foundation of 'national fate' was the territorially based, political community itself.

zh: 在当今世界，自由民主的关键原则和实践仍然几乎只与主权民族国家的原则和制度有关。
en: In the contemporary world the key principles and practices of liberal democracy remain associated almost exclusively with the principles and institutions of the sovereign nation-state.

zh: 国际法和人权体制的变革虽然冲击着国家主权，但是至少在实施的一致性上还没有影响到所有国家的自主性。
en: Transformations in international law and human rights regimes impinge on the sovereignty of states but not yet, at least in terms of consistency of application, on the autonomy of all states.

zh: 虽然合法统治权在一定程度上被改变了，但是国家的实际自主性可能还没有受到根本影响，当然原因在于执行机制出现了弱点。
en: The de jure entitlement to rule may to an extent be transformed, but the de facto autonomy of the state may not yet be radically affected, due, of course, to weaknesses in enforcement mechanisms.

zh: 一个形象的例子是金融全球化及其对宏观经济政策的影响，因为它不仅对主权本身而且对自主性产生了根本性的影响。
en: A contrasting case can be developed by reflecting on financial globalization and its impact on macroeconomic policy.For this is an example of the radical impact of globalization not on sovereignty per se but on autonomy.

zh: 人身赎金意思是“人的身价”，即人的金钱价值。
en: Wergeld, which means "man money," was the value of a person in monetary terms.

zh: 这个价值因社会地位的差别而迥异。
en: That value varied considerably according to social status.

zh: 例如，因侵犯贵族而受罚的金额要远远高于因侵犯自由人或者奴隶受罚的数额。
en: An offense against a nobleman, for example, cost considerably more than one against a freeman or a slave.

zh: 在15世纪前半期的人文主义中，另一个明显的趋势是对古希腊文明的兴趣的日益增长。
en: Also evident in the humanism of the first half of the fifteenth century was a growing interest in classical Greek civilization.

zh: 布鲁尼是第一批全面掌握希腊知识的学者之一。
en: Bruni was one of the first Italian humanists to gain a thorough knowledge of Greek.

zh: 他是拜占庭学者曼纽尔克里梭罗拉的狂热门徒，克里梭罗拉曾在1396—1400年间执教于佛罗伦萨。
en: He became an enthusiastic pupil of the Byzantine scholar Manuel Chrysoloras, who taught in Florence from 1396 to 1400.

zh: 人文主义者如饥似渴地研读若柏拉图以及古希腊的诗人的作品。戏剧家、历史学家和演讲家的作品，如修昔底德、欧里庇得斯和索福克勒斯的作品在中世纪盛期都完全被经院哲学家忽略了。
en: Humanists eagerly perused the works of Plato as well as Greek poets, dramatists, historians, and orators, such as Thucydides, Euripides, and Sophocles, all of whom had been neglected by the scholastics of the High Middle Ages.

zh: 荒谬的是，虽然基督教和犹太教的教徒遍布世界的大部分角落，但在每一块大陆或每一个地区，没有一种传统的世界宗教——基督教、伊斯兰教、儒教、印度教和佛教-—拥有绝对多数的信徒。
en: Paradoxically, none of the conventional list of world religions - Christianity, Islam, Confucianism, Hinduism, Judaism and Buddhism - is present in significant numbers in every continent or region, though Christianity and Judaism have spread their adherents to most corners of the globe.

zh: 印度教、佛教和儒教都在它们的所在地区有牢固的堡垒——南亚、东业和中国。
en: Hinduism, Buddhism and Confucianism are all more tightly concentrated in their regional strongholds - South Asia, East Asia and China.

zh: 伊斯教占据中间位置，在东非和北非中部非常强大，在非洲其他地方和东亚也有大量信徒。
en: Islam occupies a middling position, strong in the Middle East and North Africa with significant numbers in the rest of Africa and East Asia.

zh: 在平息了萨摩藩的叛乱后，明治政府完全掌握了政权。
en: After quelling the Satsuma Rebellion, the Meiji government was firmly in the saddle.

zh: 在将近9年的时间里，它力图革除封建机构并代之以许多现代社会的基本体制。
en: In the space of nine years it had managed to dismantle the feudal apparatus and replace it with much of the basic framework of modern society.

zh: 这实际上是一次自上而下的革命，比较起18世纪法国的左翼革命和20世纪俄国与中国的革命，日本革命的完成相对来说较少地使用暴力。
en: This was indeed a revolution from above and accomplished with a relatively small amount of violence in comparison with the leftist revolutions of France in the eighteenth century or of Russia and China in the twentieth.

zh: 大西洋地区的三角贸易经济。
en: Triangular Trade in the Atlantic Economy.

zh: 随着奴隶贸易的增长，它成为作为大西洋贸易特征的三角贸易路线的一部分。三角贸易就是欧洲西海岸、非洲海岸的奴隶供应站和南北美洲港口三者之间的货物与黑奴交换。
en: As the trade in slaves grew, it became a part of the triangular trade route that characterized the Atlantic economy, involving the exchange of goods and slaves between the western coast of Europe, the slave depots on the African coast, and the ports of North and South America.

zh: 例如，历史上西方人对汽车所具有的根深蒂固的偏好以及他们对能源毫无节制的使用，使得大量的导致温室效应的气体释放进入大气中，并大大促进了全球气温的升高。
en: For example, the historically and structurally ingrained Western predilection for the motor car and profligate energy use entails a very large release of greenhouse gases into the atmosphere and makes a significant contribution to global warming.

zh: 在西方人的驾驶习惯、西方的交通和能源政策与孟加拉或撒哈拉以南非洲不断变化的农业命运及其国内政治之间建立一条复杂而又合理的因果链，这并不困难，有关海洋防御的公共开支和防止沙漠化的决策是与别的地方作出的有关修建道路和能源效率的决策相关联的，而且取决于这些决策。
en: It is not difficult to establish a complex but plausible chain of causation between Western driving habits, Western transport and energy policies and the changing agricultural fortunes of Bangladesh or sub-Saharan Africa and their internal politics.Decisions on public expenditure on sea defences and desertification measures are tied to, and dependent on, decisions made elsewhere about roadbuilding and energy efficiency.

zh: 政治实际上是“扩展”的，而不同社会是相互交织在一起的，不同的政治体和社会是相互依夺地联系在一起的。
另一位历史学家风趣地提到印刷术的传播或许增加了官僚阶层的容量。
en: Another historian makes the interesting suggestion that the diffusion of printing may have increased the absorptive capacities of the mandarinate.

zh: 印刷术使得一些小商人获得了丰富的文化知识从而有可能踏上仕途使谋得宫职成为可能。
en: Printing made it possible for some of the smaller merchants to acquire sufficient literary culture to obtain an official post.

zh: 虽然为参加考试而付出昂贵的代价仍是一个很重要的障碍，但得到一官半职毕竟容易多了。
en: Though the expense of taking the examinations remained an important barrier, access to official posts became somewhat easier.

zh: 他提出了一些证据以证明帝国行政系统的诱人之处。
en: He presents some striking evidence of the attractiveness of the Imperial service.

zh: 某些商人甚至不惜自我阄割成为宦官，以享有靠近皇帝的位置。
en: A number of these merchants castrated themselves in order to become eunuchs and enjoy a position close to the throne.

zh: 而且这些阉人还因其受过教育而占优势，因为普通的宦官是禁止学习文化的，宦官的主要对手是朝廷中的士大夫。
en: Those who castrated themselves enjoyed a special advantage, since they already had the education ordinary eunuchs (the main competitors of the scholar-officials at court) were forbidden to seek.

zh: 宣言宣称，国家“应该保护少数群体的存在及其民族、文化、宗教和语言身份”。宣言指出，少数群体的成员应有能够“有效地参与文化、宗教、社会和公共生活”的权利。
en: Proclaiming that states "shall protect the existence and national, cultural, religious and linguistic identity of minorities", the Declaration sets out rights for members of minorities to be able "to participate effectively in cultural, religious, social and public life".

zh: 尽管宣言还不具有合法的约束力，但它已被广泛地看作正在创立一种国际法的未来的发展轨道。
en: While the Declaration is not yet legally binding, it is widely regarded as establishing a future trajectory of international law.

zh: 在其他的背景下，寻求对少数群体的权利的保护的推动也特别值得一提。
en: In other contexts, the impetus to secure protection for minority rights is particularly noteworthy.

zh: 接连几位民主党总统的执政支持了美国政治中的新政传统——1948年的哈里·杜鲁门总统，1960年的约翰·肯尼迪总统以及1964年的林登·约翰逊总统。
en: The New Deal tradition in American politics was bolstered by the election of Democratic presidents---Harry Truman in 1948, John Kennedy in 1960, and Lyndon Johnson in 1964.

zh: 即使是1952年和1956年当选为总统的共和党人德怀特·艾森豪威尔也没有改变新政的基本方向。
en: Even the election of a Republican president, Dwight Eisenhower, in 1952 and 1956 did not change the basic direction of the New Deal.

zh: 正如艾森豪威尔所说：“假如任何政党尝试着要取消社会保险和劳工法令，取消农场计划，那么你将不会再在我们的政治生活中看到它。”
en: As Eisenhower stated, "Should any political party attempt to abolish Social Security and eliminate labor laws and farm programs, you would not hear of that party again in our political history."

zh: 同样，帝国主义也被与社会达尔文主义及种族主义联系了起来，社会达尔文主义者相信，在民族的竞争中，适者将会是胜者，能够生存下来。
en: It was also tied to social Darwinism and racism.Social Darwinists believed that in the struggle between nations, the fit are victorious and survive.

zh: 优等种族必须通过军事力量统治劣等种族，以显示他们是多么地强大和有男子汉气概。
en: Superior races must dominate inferior races by military force to show how strong and virile they are.

zh: 一位英国人写道：“黑种人和黄种人一定会永远低于白种人的发展，随着白种人发展得越来越高级，另两个人种也将越发萎缩，不似人类而越发接近动物。”
en: As one Englishman wrote, "To the development of the White Man, the Black Man and the Yellow must ever remain inferior, and as the former raised itself hiA Global History: from Prehistory to the 21st Centuryer and yet hiA Global History: from Prehistory to the 21st Centuryer, so did these latter seem to shrink out of humanity and appear nearer and nearer to the brutes."

zh: 社会主义，尤其是它的马克思主义变体，都深深植根于欧洲19世纪资本主义工业化和城市化过程中—形成于哲学反思和实践斗争中。
en: Socialism, and particularly its Marxist variant, has its roots in the experience of European nineteenth---century capitalist industrialization and urbanization --- forged from both philosophical reflection and practical struggle.

zh: 然而，社会主义的思想和语言很快就传播到了世界经济更加落后的地区，最后传播到了几乎没有经历这些变迁的社会。
en: Yet the ideas and language of socialism swiftly spread to more backward regions of the world economy and ultimately to societies almost untouched by those changes.

zh: 这并不能够说明，那些思想在向东和向南传播的过程中不会发生深刻的变化。
en: That is not to suggest that those ideas did not undergo a profound transformation in their passage east and south.

zh: 俾斯麦的社会保障体系是当时世界上从未见过的最先进 的。
en: Bismarck’s social security system was the most progressive the world had yet seen.

zh: 然而，镇压和社会福利立法都未能阻止社会主义的发展。
en: Nevertheless, both the repressive and the social welfare measures failed to stop the growth of socialism.

zh: 面对着挫败，俾斯麦在1890年计划采取更多的反社会主义措施，但未等他实行之前，威廉二世（1888-1918)因急于推行自己的政策，就让这位年迈的首相告老还乡了。
en: In his frustration, Bismarck planned still more antisocialist measures in 1890, but before he could carry them out, the new emperor, William II (1888--1918), eager to pursue his own policies, cashiered the aged chancellor.

zh: 网格表C-3总结了全球化在所有关键领域中的影响——它们的一般趋势或模式。
en: A summary of these impacts --- their general tendencies or patterns --- in relation to all the key domains of globalization is displayed in grid C.

zh: 在决策影响方面，显然全球化在许多领域已经改变了政策选择的成本和收益、政策工具以及本土、国家、区域和全球政策选择之间的平等关系。
en: 3. In respect of decisional impacts it is clear that globalization in many domains has altered the costs and benefits of policy choices, policy instruments and the balance between local, national, regional and global policy options.

zh: 在经济和生态领域这一点特别明显，宏观经济政策或者环境保护方面的某些选择有可能代价更大（无论是社会意义上还是金钱意义上），而其他选择更有吸引力。
en: This is particularly evident in the economic and ecological domains where certain policy choices in respect of macroeconomic policy or environmental protection tend to become more costly (in a social as well as a monetary sense) while others become more attractive.

zh: 尽管中国大熊猫数量的下降及其生活环境的退化没有对地方上或国际上以及经济上或身体上的福利和舒适带来任何直接后果，但是，它们都可以归结为环境的退化。
en: The decline in the numbers of Chinese pandas and their habitat, although of no immediate consequence to either local or international, economic or bodily well-being, can be classed as environmental degradation.

zh: 因为大熊猫的减少与保存共同的环境遗产的利益相冲突，而且与承认非人类的但具有感情的生命的生存权利相矛盾。
en: For the loss of the panda comes into conflict with an interest in the preservation of a common environmental heritage and a recognition of a right to existence for non-human but sentient beings.

zh: 类似地，灌木篱墙的减少及其微生态系统的衰退很少对英国农村的经济生存能力带来良接后果，但是，它却在审美、生态和象征上具有重大意义。
en: Similarly, the decline of hedgerows and the micro-ecosystems they contain is of little direct consequence to the economic viability of the English countryside but is of enormous aesthetic, ecological and symbolic import.

zh: 热带雨林的消失影响着全世界的气候（因为热带雨林吸收一氧化碳并通过光合作用制造氧气）。并且也造成了大量的已知的和未知的动植物物种的灭绝。
en: Rainforest loss affects the world's climate (since rainforests are absorbers of carbon dioxide and producers of oxygen through photosynthesis) and it also effectively extinguishes a huge number of known and unknown plant and animal species.

zh: 与此同时，人们越来越感受到地球上生物多样性正在不断减少，人们发起了保护面临威胁的大哺乳动物——熊猫、大象、鲸鱼和老虎等——的运动。
en: This loss has been accompanied by a more general sense of the diminishing biodiversity of the planet, led by the most obvious and emotive campaigns for the preservation of threatened large mammals --- pandas, elephants, whales and big cats.

zh: 路德仅仅保留了天主教会七项圣礼中的两项：浸洗礼和圣餐礼。
en: Luther kept only two of the Catholic church’s seven sacraments: baptism and the Lord’s Supper.

zh: 浸洗礼意味着依靠上帝的恩典获得重生。
en: Baptism signified rebirth through grace.

zh: 路德根据圣餐礼否定了天主教的圣餐变体论，根据这种观点，圣餐礼上消费掉的面包和葡萄酒会奇迹般地转换成耶稣的血肉。
en: Regarding the Lord’s Supper or the Eucharist, Luther denied the Catholic doctrine of transubstantiation, which taught that the substance of the bread and wine consumed in the rite is miraculously transformed into the body and blood of Jesus.

zh: 然而他继续坚持认为，面包和葡萄酒中的耶稣血肉是真实存在的，它是上帝对原罪宽恕的证明。
en: Yet he continued to insist on the real presence of Jesus’ body and blood in the bread and wine given as a testament to God’s forgiveness of sin.

zh: 天主教的圣事让教会成为人们生活——从出生到死亡——不可或缺的一部分。
en: The sacraments of the Catholic church ensured that the church was an integral part of people’s lives, from birth to death.

zh: 有七种圣事（现在也是如此）是神职人员所专署的，诸如洗礼和圣餐礼（主的晚餐）这些圣事，是内在恩典（恩典是上帝给予的让人们获救的恩赐）的外在象征，也是基督教救世所必须的。
en: There were (and still are) seven sacraments, administered only by the clergy.Sacraments, such as baptism and the Eucharist (the Lord’s Supper), were viewed as outward symbols of an inward grace (grace was God’s freely given gift that enabled humans to be saved) and were considered imperative for a Christian’s salvation.

zh: 因此神职人员被认为是获得拯救的关键人物。
en: Therefore, the clergy were seen to have a key role in the attainment of salvation.

zh: 与重视圣徒作用关联密切的是圣物，对圣物的利用在中世纪盛期也显著增多。
en: Emphasis on the role of the saints was closely tied to the use of relics, which also increased noticeably in the High Middle Ages.

zh: 圣物通常是信徒认为值得膜拜的圣徒遗骨或是贴身物品。
en: Relics were usually the bones of saints or objects intimately connected to saints that were considered worthy of veneration by the faithful.

zh: 一位12世纪的修士对修道院圣物是这样描述的：“那里放的是比黄金更珍贵的东西……圣徒奥斯瓦尔德的右臂……这是我们亲眼看到过、亲吻过且亲手抚摸过的圣物……这里放的是他一部分肋骨和他去世时身下的土壤。”
en: A twelfth century English monk began his description of the abbey’s relics by saying, ‘‘There is kept there a thing more precious than gold,...the right arm of St. Oswald....This we have seen with our own eyes and have kissed, and have handled with our own hands....There are kept here also part of his ribs and of the soil on which he fell.’’

zh: 在19世纪晚期，克虏伯的出口量达到其所有武器产量的86.4%，而在第一次世界大战以前，施奈德的出口比例达50%，维克斯的出口比例达33%（McNeill, 1982, 第302页）。
en: In the late nineteenth century, Krupps exported 86.4 per cent of its arms output, while prior to the First World War Schneider was exporting 50 per cent and Vickers 33 per cent (McNeill, 1982, p. 302).

zh: 由于国内防务市场变得越来越饱和，导致军事工业超量、出口的动力变得更加强烈。
en: As domestic defence markets became increasingly saturated, resulting in militaryindustrial overcapacity, the drive for exports became even more intense.

zh: 另外，政府也允许大量的不受管制的武器贸易。
en: Moreover, governments sanctioned a largely unregulated trade in arms.

zh: 有个时期，人们曾认为，这些十字军东侵实际上对促进中世纪后期的各项富有建设性的发展，其中包括贸易、城市和文化的发展，起到了决定性的作用。
en: These Crusades were considered at one time to have been responsible for starting virtually every constructive development in the later Middle Ages, including the growth of trade and towns and the advances in culture.

zh: 现在，这种说法已不再为人们所接受。
en: This interpretation is no longer accepted.

zh: 相反，人们普遍认为，十字军东侵基本上是这些发展的结果而不是原因。
en: Instead it is generally agreed that the Crusades were the consequence rather than the cause of this progress.

zh: 当然，文化互动和文化相似性的程度将不断变化。
en: Of course, the degree of interaction and cultural similarity will vary.

zh: 因此，除了文化关系的延伸，我们还可以谈论文化关系的深化，一个地方的变化、争论和革新更可能在另一个地方被改变或被反对。
en: Thus, alongside stretching, we can also talk of the deepening of cultural relationships where changes, debates and innovations in one place are more likely to be transferred to (or rejected in) another.

zh: 将时间上和空间上本来分离的地方与人结合在一起吋以被看作是种时空压缩形式。
en: This bringing together of places and people separated in time and space can also be viewed as a form of time-space compression.

zh: 1871年之后，城市工人的物质境况的确有所改善。
en: Urban workers did experience a real betterment in the material conditions of their lives after 1871.

zh: 单就城市的发展而言，就意味着居住条件的改善。
en: For one thing, urban improvements meant better living conditions.

zh: 实际工资上涨，与之并行的许多消费品价格的下跌，尤其是在19世纪80、90年代，使得工人们能够消费得起食物和除住房以外的东西了。
en: A rise in real wages, accompanied by a decline in many consumer costs, especially in the 1880s and 1890s, made it possible for workers to afford more than just food and housing.

zh: 工人们的预算中现在也包括了更多的衣服开销，而随着罢工和劳工运动的斗争，工作时间缩短到每天十小时，并且星期六下午也成为休息时间，工人们甚至可以去进行休闲消费了。
en: Workers’ budgets now provided money for more clothes and even leisure at the same time that strikes and labor agitation were providing shorter (ten-hour) workdays and Saturday afternoons off.

zh: 贸易“强度”是全球贸易活动重要性的一个标尺。
en: The intensity of trade is a measure of the magnitude of global trading activity.

zh: 我们可以借助世界贸易与世界产出的比率来估计，即使这种全球估计是粗线条的。
en: It can be estimated by the ratio of world trade to world output, although global estimates of this are very crude.

zh: 国家贸易依存度（贸易额占国内生产总值的比例）标准会更精确些，而且，在这项研究中通过对6个国家的长期估计，我们可以提供贸易规模变化的详细的历史过程。
en: National trade to GDP measures are more accurate, and long-run estimates for the six countries in this study offer a detailed historical picture of the changing magnitude of trade.

zh: 标准贸易理论作出了许多假设。

en: The standard economic theory of trade makes a number of assumptions.

zh: 一旦一国开放贸易，其贸易品的价格就被认为反映世界价格（根据汇率调整）而不是国内价格。
en: Once a country opens up to trade, the prices of its tradable goods are assumed to reflect world prices (adjusted for the exchange rate) rather than domestic prices.

zh: 世界价格体现了在全球市场上而不是在国内经济中生产贸易品的相对成本。
en: World prices reflect the relative costs of producing tradable goods in the global market rather than in the national economy.

zh: 随着关税降至最小程度，贸易性质的变化，关贸总协定的框架已不足以应付局面。所以世界贸易组织诞生了（Hoekman and Kostecki，1995)。
en: With the reduction of tariffs to minimal levels and the changing nature of trade, the skeleton framework of the GATT was insufficient, hence the creation of the World Trade Organization (Hoekman and Kostecki, 1995).

zh: 因为贸易壁垒已经消除，人们的兴趣转向了不同国家中控制竞争的国内管制和法律的差异上去。
en: As formal barriers to trade have been eliminated, interest has shifted towards differences in the domestic regulations and laws governing competition in different countries.

zh: 因为国内政策可被看作是给予本国公司相对于其他公司的竞争优势，所以，它们也可被说成是潜在的贸易壁垒。
en: Since domestic regulations can be seen to give competitive advantage to firms from one country over another they can be construed as potential barriers to trade.

zh: 第二，已经有人反对国际法主要是针对政治和地缘政治事务这一信条。
en: Second, opinion has moved against the doctrine that international law is primarily about political and geopolitical affairs.

zh: 根据这一新的概念，国际法越来越关注于协调和规制经济、社会、通信以及环境事务。
en: According to this new conception, international law is concerned increasingly with coordinating and regulating economic, social, communication and environmental matters.

zh: 国际政治中的行动者和机构——例如，联合国本身、世界银行、国际电信联盟、联合国粮食及农业组织，以及世界卫生组织——的数目的不断膨胀，与之相关，扩大国际法范畴的压力也在不断增加。
en: Linked to the substantial expansion in the number of actors and agencies in world politics --- for example, the United Nations itself, the World Bank, the International Telecommunication Union, the Food and Agricultural Organization and the World Health Organization --- there have been many pressures to increase the scope of international law.

zh: 第二，已经有人反对国际法主要是针对政治和地缘政治事务这一信条。
en: Second, opinion has moved against the doctrine that international law is primarily about political and geopolitical affairs.

zh: 根据这一新的概念，国际法越来越关注于协调和规制经济、社会、通信以及环境事务。
en: According to this new conception, international law is concerned increasingly with coordinating and regulating economic, social, communication and environmental matters.

zh: 国际政治中的行动者和机构——例如，联合国本身、世界银行、国际电信联盟、联合国粮食及农业组织，以及世界卫生组织——的数目的不断膨胀，与之相关，扩大国际法范畴的压力也在不断增加。
en: Linked to the substantial expansion in the number of actors and agencies in world politics --- for example, the United Nations itself, the World Bank, the International Telecommunication Union, the Food and Agricultural Organization and the World Health Organization --- there have been many pressures to increase the scope of international law.

zh: 最后，好莱坞、微软和AT&T仍然在经营上有利可图——没有建立可替代的政治认同和合法性中心。
en: In the end, Hollywood, Microsoft and AT&T are in the business of making money --- not founding alternative centres of political identity and legitimacy.

zh: 然而，巨大信息流和人口流在全球范围内循环流动，而且在跨越国界时不受任何惩罚，己经改变了各种民族事业发展所必需的环境。
en: Yet the huge flows of information, people and imagery that circulate around the globe, crossing borders with impunity, have changed the context in which national projects of any kind must develop.

zh: 各种民族主义事业所受到的真正威胁也许更可能来自最初的文化世界主义，这种文化世界主义对作为主要的政治和文化共冋体的民族国家观念形成挑战，并要求对组织中的权力而不是民族国家的权力进行重新定位（参看第1章）。
en: The real threat to nationalist projects of all kinds is perhaps more likely to come from an incipient cultural cosmopolitanism that would challenge the idea of the nation as the primary political and cultural community and demand the relocation of power in institutions other than the national state (see chapter 1).

zh: 随着科学信仰的胜利，宗教信仰就不可避免地要受到损害，这将在欧洲的知识分子中催发日益增长的世俗化。
en: As the scientific beliefs triumphed, it became almost inevitable that religious beliefs would suffer, leading to a growing secularization in European intellectual life.

zh: 很多17世纪的知识分子都既信仰宗教又相信科学，他们相信这两者分裂的后果将是悲剧性的。
en: Many seventeenth-century intellectuals were both religious and scientific and believed that the implications of this split would be tragic.

zh: 一些人认为这种分裂是不必要的，另一些人则认为有必要将上帝、人类与机械论的宇宙整合进新的哲学综合体之中。
en: Some believed that the split was largely unnecessary, while others felt the need to combine God, humans, and a mechanistic universe into a new philosophical synthesis.

zh: 个人只有“通过参与城邦生活才能在学术上和道徳上逐渐成熟”。
en: An individual only "grows to maturity---both intellectually and morally---through participation" in the life of the state.

zh: 市民人文主义反映了意大利文艺复兴时期城市生活的价值观念。
en: Civic humanism reflected the values of the urban society of the Italian Renaissance.

zh: 人文主义者开始相信他们关于人文主义的研究应当服务于城邦。
en: Humanists came to believe that their study of the humanities should be put to the service of the state.

zh: 人文主义者担任城邦的大臣、议员和顾问这种现象不是偶然的。
en: It is no accident that humanists served the state as chancellors, councillors, and advisers.

zh: 改1：加洛林时期修道士在手抄室抄写的大量手稿对于保存古典遗产做出了重要贡献。
en: The production of manuscripts in Carolingian monastic scriptoria was a crucial factor in the preservation of the ancient legacy.

zh: 残存下来的加洛林王朝时期的手稿大约有8000本之多。
en: About eight thousand manuscripts survive from Carolingian times.

zh: 事实上，现存的大约90%的古典罗马作品都是靠加洛林时期的修道士们抄写保存下来的。
en: Virtually 90 percent of the ancient Roman works that we have today exist because they were copied by Carolingian monks.

zh: 最基本的原因是农村劳动力持续短缺。
en: The fundamental cause was an increasing shortage of rural labor.

zh: 乡村中贸易和工业的生长意味着大的土地所有者不得不把更多的土地分给依从他的小土地所有者，以便抗拒城镇对小土地所有者的吸引力。
en: The growth of rural trade and industry meant that the possessors of large holdings had to give more land to their dependent small holders in order to hold them against the pull of the towns.

zh: 而小的土地所有者也越来越发现靠手工业品能够赚钱。

en: Too, the small holders (nago) were finding more and more opportunities to make money in handicrafts.

zh: 格里高利七世在1073年当选教皇。他深信，是上帝选定了他，指定由他改革教会。
en: Elected pope in 1073, Gregory was convinced that he had been chosen by God to reform the church.

zh: 为了达到这些目标，格里高利宣称，他作为教皇是上帝的“世间代牧”，教皇的权威应当覆盖整个基督教世界，包括统治者。
en: In pursuit of those aims, Gregory claimed that he, as pope, was God’s “vicar on earth” and that the pope’s authority extended over all Christians, including rulers.

zh: 格里高利废除了授衣礼，只有教会才有授衣权，这意味着格里高利七世有权任命教会自己的教士，管理教会自己的事务。
en: Gregory sought the elimination of lay investiture.Only then could the church regain its freedom, by which Gregory meant the right to appoint its own clergy and run its own affairs.

zh: 在路线的起点和终点，更多的地方网络将欧洲的外围地区、日本和朝鲜与丝绸之路联系起来。
en: At either end of the route more local networks connected up the peripheral regions of Europe, Japan and Korea to the Silk Route.

zh: 这种贸易主要是贵重金属和奢侈品贸易，它将继续繁荣直至罗马帝国和汉王朝的衰落。
en: This trade was overwhelmingly in precious metals and luxury goods, and prospered until the fall of the Western Roman Empire and the Han empire.

zh: 贸易在公元1000年前的4个世纪里重新崛起，在公元1000年到1350年间达到鼎盛时期。
en: Trade was rekindled in the four centuries leading up to AD 1000 and blossomed between AD 1000 and 1350.

zh: 像邓(Deng)指出的，“中国长距离的土特产贸易显示了一种国际贸易系统……实际上……在前现代的亚洲存在着以中国为中心的贸易系统”（1997年）。
en: As Deng concludes, 'China's long-distance staple trade reveals a system of international exchange... in fact... the existence of a Chinacentred trading system in pre-modern Asia' (1997).

zh: 集体安全起源于“四国联盟”（1815〜1970年），它通过一套制度化的列强会议体系，在19世纪的大多数时间里维护了欧洲内部的相对和平与安全（I.Clark, 1989，第6页）。
en: The practice of collective security had its origins in the Concert of Europe (1815-70) which, through a system of institutionalized great power conferences, reinforced relative peace and security within Europe for much of the nineteenth century (I. Clark, 1989, ch. 6).

zh: “四国联盟”体系可以被描述成一个国际安全制度。
en: The Concert system could be described as an international security regime.

zh: 赞里诺（Zelikow) 认为，后冷战时代的欧洲安全模式开始模仿一个新的“四国联盟”体系（1992)。
en: Zelikow argues that security arrangements in post-Cold War Europe are beginning to resemble a new Concert system (1992).

zh: 苏联与美国之间的全球性对抗影响了世界政治近50年。
en: The global rivalry between the Soviet Union and the USA mediated world politics for almost five decades.

zh: 在这段时间里，世界成为一个统一了的战争竞技场，在其中，为了意识形态和军事霸权所进行的斗争渗透到每一个地区。
en: During this time the world became a unified strategic arena in which the struggle for ideological and military supremacy permeated every geographical region.

zh: 正如华尔兹（Waltz）指出的：“在一个两极世界里，没有边缘，只有两个能进行世界规模行动的大国，在任何地方发生的任何事情都可能与这二者相关”（1979，第171页）。
en: As Waltz observed: 'in a bipolar world there are no peripheries. With only two powers capable of acting on a world scale, anything that happens anywhere is potentially of concern to both of them' (1979, p. 171).

zh: 因为戈尔巴乔夫在是赫鲁晓夫改革时代受的教育，他决心要把那些改革进行到底，达到原来预期的目的。
en: Educated during the years of Khrushchev's reforms, Gorbachev seemed intent on taking those reforms to their logical conclusions.

zh: 20世纪80年代，苏联经济问题已经凸现。
en: By the 1980s, Soviet economic problems were obvious.

zh: 僵硬的中央计划政策导致管理不善并窒息了活力。
en: Rigid, centralized planning led to mismanagement and stifled innovation.

zh: 苏联在太空探索方面仍然领先，但在高科技尤其是私人和公共用途的计算机生产方面落后于西方。
en: Although the Soviets still excelled in space exploration, they fell behind the West in high technology, especially in the development and production of computers for private and public use.

zh: 对苏联人来说最明显的就是生活水平的下降。
en: Most noticeable to the Soviet people was the decline in the standard of living.

zh: 于是一开始，戈尔巴乔夫就宣扬要进行激进的改革。
en: From the start, Gorbachev preached the need for radical reforms.

zh: 贸易使所有产出部门的状况发生了革命性变化——今天，几乎没有一种产业仅仅依赖于国内市场或者国内生产部门和原材料。
en: Trade has revolutionized the prospects of all industrial sectors --- today few industries rely purely on domestic markets or domestically produced components and raw materials.

zh: 举例来说，虽然建筑业基本上是使用国内原料，雇佣本土劳动力和满足国内需求，但主要设备可能是进口的。而且，随着建筑公司国际所有权的增加，配套服务也许通过贸易才能实现。
en: For example, although the construction industry primarily uses domestic materials, employs local labour and satisfies domestic demand, capital equipment may be imported and, with increasing international ownership of construction firms, support services may also be traded.

zh: 虽然众多神秘宗教竞相吸引罗马世界的注意，但最重要的或许当属密特拉教。
en: Although many mystery cults competed for the attention of the Roman world, perhaps the most important was Mithraism.

zh: 密特拉神是波斯的索罗亚斯德教里的至尊的光神亚胡拉·马兹达最早的信使（参见第2 章）。
en: Mithras was the chief agent of Ahuramazda, the supreme god of light in Persian Zoroastrianism (see Chapter 2).

zh: 在罗马世界里，密特拉等同于太阳神，称为不可征服的太阳。
en: In the Roman world, Mithras came to be identified with the sun god and was known by his Roman title, the Unconquered Sun.

zh: 通过建立著名的厘金这样一种向行商坐贾征税的制度，帝国政府强化了分裂的趋势，这是太平军叛乱的产物。
en: By establishing the famous likin, a tax collected from shopkeepers and travelling merchants, the Imperial government intensified disruptive trends.

zh: 当传统的方法已不能征到足够的税赋时，厘金便作为提髙国库基金的新措施应运而生。
en: The tax was an emergency measure to raise funds needed as a result of the Taiping Rebellion that it could not collect through traditional methods.

zh: 和对土地课以重税相比，某些中兴时期的政治家更喜欢征收厘金，这一点并不值得惊讶。
en: It is scarcely surprising that several Restoration leaders favored the likin in preference to a heavier tax on land.

zh: 另一方面，税收又从帝国政府的控制下分离出来，转入地方。与此同时，乡绅利用征税权形成新的地方权威的经济基础，这是军阀时代的雏型。
en: Control of the tax fell out of the hands of the Imperial government, while the tax itself remained to help provide an economic base for new regional authorities, prototypes of the warlord era.

zh: 通过这些机制，重要的武器（如战斗机）由第一等级生产国扩散到第二等级生产国和第三等级生产国。
en: Through both these mechanisms, weapons technology and military production technology in key defence sectors, such as combat aircraft, dispersed beyond the primary first-tier producers to the second and third tiers.

zh: 即使如此，从两次世界大战间的前期开始，军事生产能力的等级结构几乎没有改变。
en: Even so, the hierarchy of military-productive capability altered little from the early interwar years.

zh: 随着战争的来临，军事技术的扩散越来越受到政府的管制，直到战后，特许生产才恢复到战前的水平。
en: With the approach of war, the diffusion of military technology became increasingly regulated by governments, such that it was well into the postwar period before licensed production attained its prewar levels.

zh: 最后,一场甘霖有如千军万马,突然降临到人间。
en: When the rain finally did come, it came with a vengeance.

zh: 最初是雨中带雹,旋即转为骤雨,稍停以后又是一阵骤雨,雨势一直延续到第二天。
en: First it was accompanied by hail; then followed more intermittent downpours that lasted into the next day.Relief was instant.

zh: 这场雨发生在阳历6月12日,距离皇帝徒步天坛求雨已将近一月,但是任何人也不敢妄议这不是圣心感动上苍的结果。
en: The fact that this occurred on June 12, almost a whole month after the imperial procession to the Altar of Heaven, in no way deterred the emperor from claiming credit for himself.

zh: 也正是这股强大的中立观点，使得一些象比尔徳那样明智的历史学家都怀疑奴隶制问题是否重要，值得那么讨论。
en: It is also this substantial body of opinion that has led intelligent historians such as Beard to doubt the importance of slavery as an issue.

zh: 我认为他们的这个态度是错误的，非常错误的。
en: That I hold to be an error, and a very serious one.

zh: 然而，这种温和势力的失败和瓦解是问题的关键部分，那些对南方抱有同情心的人便有力地说明了这个问题。
en: Nevertheless the failure and collapse of moderation constitute a key part of the story, one on which those with Southern sympathies have shed valuable light.

zh: 要使战争危险日益迫近，除南方外，美国其它地方也需要发生了变化。
en: For a situation to arise in which war was likely to occur, changes had to take place in other parts of the country besides the South.

zh: 通货膨胀是16世纪和17世纪早期的一个主要经济问题。
en: Inflation was a major economic problem in the sixteenth and early seventeenth centuries.

zh: 这种所谓的价格革命是整个欧洲的现象，尽管在不同时期不同地区受到的影响各不相同。
en: This so-called price revolution was a Europe-wide phenomenon, although different areas were affected at different times.

zh: 粮食价格最易增长，但是工资的增长赶不上价格的提高。
en: Foodstuffs were most subject to price increases.But wages failed to keep up with price increases.

zh: 工资赚取者，尤其是农业工人和城市的领薪工人见证了他们生活水平的下降。
en: Wage earners, especially agricultural laborers and salaried workers in urban areas, saw their standard of living drop.

zh: 我们在这里可以借用这样一种说法，那就是大不列颠帝国“把它的长手指伸到了世界各地”（FernAndez-Armesto, 1995，第264页）。
en: The British Empire, to borrow a phrase, 'stretched long fingertips over the world' (Fernández-Armesto, 1995, p. 264).

zh: 引起争议的不仅仅是欧洲早在几个世纪之前就已开始的连续扩张运动的进一步强化，而是在世界上主要地区所确立的包含新的统治和隶属关系的国际秩序。这种新秩序借助了新的信息传播工具和交通基础设施，后者有利于建立政治控制的新机制。
en: At issue was not simply an intensification of European expansion along a continuum that ran back through earlier centuries, but a new ordering of relations of domination and subordination among the major regions of the world, aided by new communications and transport infrastructures which facilitated new mechanisms of political control.

zh: 汽车工业无疑是战后经济繁荣期间的主导工业。
en: The car industry was arguably the lead industry during the postwar economic boom.

zh: 美国的生产商，如福特和通用公司早已建立了经营机制。但是第二次世界大战后，它们前所未有地进行国际扩张，特别是进军欧洲市场。
en: US producers, such as Ford and General Motors, had established operations, but the postwar period witnessed their unprecedented international expansion, into Europe particularly.

zh: 随着美国公司在欧洲和其他地方建立大规模的生产装配线，国内市场保护和运输成本使外国直接投资成为服务这些市场的明显方式。
en: Protection of national markets and transport costs made FDI the obvious tool for serving these markets as US firms replicated mass production assembly lines in Europe and elsewhere.

zh: 中国人一开始都是蒙古种人，他们在向东扩张至太平洋、向南扩张到越南的过程中，同化了那些游牧入侵者和较为原始的部落。
en: The Chinese were all Mongoloids to begin with, as were their nomadic invaders and the relatively primitive tribes that they assimilated in the course of their expansion eastward to the Pacific and southward to Vietnam.

zh: 因而，中国人在他们整个历史上享有同一种族和同一文化。
en: Thus the Chinese enjoyed racial and cultural homogeneity throughout their history.

zh: 在古典时期，这种同一性如我们将看到的，得到进一步加强，因为中国人统一了文字，它使操各种极为不同的方言的人能互相交往。
en: During the classical period this homogeneity was further cemented, as we shall see, by the standardization of the writing system, which enabled speakers of widely differing dialects to communicate with each other.

zh: 这种传统的陈词滥调的大泛滥通常发生在统治阶级发现自己处境困难的时刻。
en: Such an upsurge of traditional rhetoric often occurs when a ruling class finds itself in a tight 【该部分原缺失，待核实原文！

zh: 虽然“同治中兴”在短期取得了成功，但这种成功靠的是暂时加强那些反对从根本上重新改造中国社会的努力而取得的，这倒反而加速了他们自己末日的到来。
en: 】corner.Though the T’ung-chih Restoration succeeded for the moment, this very success may have hastened the ultimate end by temporarily strengthening those forces most opposed to a fundamental readjustment of Chinese society.

zh: 从这一点上讲，从事“中兴”的政治家们恰恰为暴力推翻他们想保有的阶级和社会结构作出了贡献。
en: In this way, Restoration statesmen may have contributed to the violent overthrow of the class and social institutions they sought to restore.

zh: 此外，一国的危机会使资金从其他国家流出。
en: Again, crises in one economy appeared to induce capital outflows from others.

zh: 尽管国际货币基金组织（及工业化国家）制定了历史上最大的救援计划，力图稳定东亚金融形势，但危机的影响逐渐吞没了许多新兴经济体。
en: Despite attempts by the IMF (and G7) to stabilize the financial situation in East Asia, through the provision of the largest rescue package in its history, the contagion effect of the crisis swiftly engulfed many emerging economies.

zh: 1998年年底时，投机导致了卢比的贬值，并且冲击了许多国家的货币。
en: By late 1998 speculation had led to the devaluation of the rouble and speculative attacks on many other currencies.

zh: 这些变动突出表明了短期资本流动在全球资本市场上造成的高度动荡和系统性风险的方式。
en: These developments underlined the ways in which short-term capital flows generate a high degree of volatility and systemic risk within global capital markets.

zh: 幸运的是，福斯特为我们提供了法国图尔兹主教教区的详细研究，这里商品化的刺激十分強烈。同时，贵族也出色地控制着用于出售的谷物的生产。
en: Fortunately Forster has presented us with a detailed study of the nobility in a part of France, the diocese of Toulouse, where the commercial impulse was strong and where grain growing for the market was a noble occupation par excellence.

zh: 他的描述对于准确指出英国商业化的乡绅与法国具有商业精神的贵族之间的异同提供了可能性。
en: His account makes it possible to put one’s finger rather precisely on the similarities and differences between the improving gentry in England and their no less businesslike counterpart in France.

zh: 暴乱(尽管它们很快被镇压下去了）展示了人们的激情以及社会的混乱状况。
en: The riots, though suppressed without great difficulty, reveal the state of excitement and disorder.

zh: 那些城市贫民由于通货膨胀也受到了猛烈的一击。
en: The city poor, too, were hard hit by increasing inflation.

zh: 军队的倒戈加剧了紧张的气氛。
en: Military reverses added to the highly charged atmosphere.

zh: 1792年8月10日的起义风暴，即图拉里风暴和瑞士卫兵大屠杀，是巴黎民众，主要是贫苦的工匠和熟练的工人的又一次革命行动。
en: The coup that cleared the air, the storming of the Tuileries and the famous slaughter of the Swiss Guards, August 10, 1792, was again the work of the Paris crowd, mainly poor artisans, journeymen, etc.

zh: 革命的中心在巴黎，但是这种普遍的激进行动也得到了其他省区人民的支持。
en: Though Paris was the center, the popular and radical movement received active support from the provinces.

zh: 在德川幕府的和平时期,武士几乎丧失了一切功能。
en: As warriors, they had already lost most of their function under the pax Tokugawa.

zh: 1873年开始实行征兵制，使得他们身上残留的某些特点几乎一扫而光。
en: The introduction of conscriptions in 1873 eliminated practically all of the distinctions that remained to them on that score.

zh: 最后，如桑塞姆在评论中所指出的：既然封建社会的基础是农民种地和封建主拥有土地，那么，土地所有权的开放，则是对封建尊严和特权的致命一击。
en: Finally, the opening up of property rights in land, as Sansom remarks, struck at the heart of feudal pride and privilege, since feudal society rested on the 'working of the land by the peasant and its ownership by the 1ord.

zh: 在法国南部的大部分地区，城市中较富裕的商业成员有一种与贵族和牧师携手联袂的强烈倾向；而这些贵族和牧师则希望利用吉伦特派和联邦主义运动做为君主复辟的阶梯。
en: Throughout much of southern France the wealthier commercial element in the towns showed a strong inclination to join hands with the nobility and the clergy, who hoped to use the Gironde and the federalist movement as an entering wedge for the restoration of the monarchy.

zh: 随着革命变得更为激进，斗争在一些城市呈现拉锯的状态。
en: As the Revolution became more radical, a seesaw struggle developed in several of the cities.

zh: 里昂、马赛、土伦和波沃多沦入与特权秩序结成联盟的富裕分子之手，并转而反对革命。
en: Lyon, Marseilles, Toulon, and Bordeaux fell under the control of the wealthier element in alliance with the privileged orders and turned against the Revolution.

zh: 中国的村庄，象其他国家一样，是农村社会的基本细胞。但和印度、日本甚至欧洲的一些地方相比较，中国的村庄显然缺少凝聚力。
en: The Chinese village, the basic cell of rural society in China as elsewhere, evidently lacked cohesiveness in comparison with those of India, Japan, and even many parts of Europe.

zh: 村中大部分成员为一项共同的工作而进行合作的情况很 少发生,而这类事在一定程度上可以培养成员间休戚与共的习惯和感情。
en: There were far fewer occasions on which numerous members of the village cooperated in a common task in a way that creates the habits and sentiments of solidarity.

zh: 同时，趁机报宿怨的部落之间也爆发了战争。
en: At the same time, fighting broke out between tribes taking advantage of the opportunity to repay old scores.

zh: 最严重的是，由于当地非洲政治家和比利时矿业集团结成邪恶的联盟，矿藏资源丰富的加丹加省实际上脱离了刚果。
en: Most serious was the virtual secession of the rich mining province of Katanga, owing to an unholy alliance of local African politicians and Belgian mining interests.

zh: 不断扩大的混乱状态迫使比利时政府重新进行考虑，将其军队派回要寨和飞机场。
en: The spreading anarchy caused the Belgian government to reconsider and to return its troops to key points and airfields.

zh: 在巴黎和会上，日本确保住了从前的德属岛屿，但只是作为三级托管地而不是作为地道的领地。
en: At the Paris Peace Conference Japan did retain control of the former German islands, but as Class C mandates under League of Nations auspices rather than as outright possessions.

zh: 威尔逊总统拼命反对日本对无可争辩的中国领土山东的要求。
en: President Wilson strenuously opposed Japanese claims to the Chinese Shantung peninsula.

zh: 作为妥协，日本被准许“暂时”占有这座半岛，但日本退一步承认它的“政策”是在某一日期把这片领土归还中国，“只保留‘以往一向’授与德国的经济特权”。
en: As a compromise, Japan was confirmed in "temporary" possession of the peninsula, but it conceded that it was its "policy" to restore the territory to China at an unspecified date, "retaining only the economic privileges [hitherto] granted to Germany.”

zh: 跨国公司海外活动强度的另一个标准可以通过海外分支机构的销售额与世界经济活动的比较来判断。
en: A further measure of the intensity of multinationals' overseas activity can be gauged by comparing sales of overseas affiliates to world economic activity.

zh: 外国分支机构的销售量增长已大大超过了世界出口：70年代和80年代，它们与世界出口水平大体相当，而90年代后期，它们则高出30%（UNCTAD，1994，第130页；1997，第4页）。
en: Sales of foreign affiliates have grown faster than world exports: in the 1970s and 1980s they had achieved levels comparable with world export levels but in the late 1990s they were around 30 per cent higher (UNCTAD, 1994, p. 130; 1997, p. 4).

zh: 外国分支机构的销售在世界国内生产总值中的比重从70年代的10〜15%上升到今天的大约25%。
en: Foreign affiliates' sales as a percentage of world GDP has risen from 10-15 per cent in the 1970s to around 25 per cent today.

zh: 在军事外交逐渐制度化的同时，欧洲和美国的军事组织模式以及战略、战术模式也逐渐扩散和被效仿（参看Ralston，1990)。
en: At much the same time as military diplomacy became institutionalized there was also a widening diffusion, as well as emulation, of European and American models of military organization, strategy and tactics (see Ralston, 1990).

zh: 在拉丁美洲、非洲和亚洲，西方国家帮助训练并武装本土的军事力量，其目的或者是为了补充帝国的军事力量，或是为了在争夺全球霸权的竞争中加强其非正式的军事联盟。
en: Throughout Latin America, Africa, and Asia, Western states trained and equipped indigenous military forces, either to supplement imperial forces or to cement informal military alliances in the struggle for global power.

zh: 甚至在日本和中国，军事和政治精英们积极寻求获得西方的军事支持和援助（Beasley，1995，第64页；Black，1998)。
en: Even Japanese and Chinese military and political elites actively sought and acquired Western military assistance (Beasley, 1995, p. 64; Black, 1998).

zh: 相应地，国际参与在今天已经不仅仅是某一个国家或者其外交部门可以简单地选择追求或者放弃的东西。
en: Accordingly, international engagement today is not something that a particular state, or its Ministry of Foreign Affairs, can simply choose to pursue or disregard.

zh: 因为单单在国际法层面上，国际参与已不再是一个随意的选择。
en: For at the level of international law alone, international engagement is not an option.

zh: 数量剧增的政府部门，国内法庭和立法机构的活动正式或者非正式地反映了国际规则制定的政治、标准以及关注点。
en: The activities of an increasing number of government departments, national courts and legislatures reflect the politics, standards and concerns of international rule-making, formal and informal.

zh: 在世界某个角落所作的政治决定和发生的政治行为会迅速地传遍世界，并获得世界性的反响。
en: Political decisions and actions in one part of the world can rapidly acquire worldwide ramifications.

zh: 此外，各个政治活动和（或）政策制定地可以通过快捷的信息传播途径连接成复杂的决策和政治互动网络。
en: In addition, sites of political action and/or decision-making can become linked through rapid communications into complex networks of decision-making and political interaction.

zh: 与这种“扩展”相连的是全球政治活动产生的，通常是“更向纵深发展的”影响。与古代和现代的帝国不同，“距离遥远的行为”可以以一种更强大的渗透力影响特定区域或政策共同体内的社会条件和认知世界。
en: Associated with this ‘stretching' is a frequent ‘deepening' impact of global political processes such that, unlike in ancient and modern empires, 'action at a distance' permeates with greater intensity the social conditions and cognitive worlds of specific places or policy communities.
