zh: 这种冲突在随后政治角逐（例如1815年拿破仑的失败和1832年的起义）中不断地表现出来。
en: Weakened imitations occurred again in subsequent political crises, Napoleon’s downfall in 1815 and in an ill-conceived Legitimist uprising in 1832.

zh: 旺代省的反革命动乱在今天看来仍然是一个有趣的话题。因为它是唯一的一次以农民为主体的反对左派的起义。
en: The counterrevolution in the Vendee is a particularly piquant topic today because it is the only major peasant uprising directed against what is loosely called the Left.

zh: 欧洲人第一次登上美洲的土地，带去了欧洲大陆上的动物、植物以及微生物，对于本土的各族来说，这是一个极为重要的事件（参见第6、8章）。
en: The initial arrival of Europeans in Latin America with their collection of Eurasian flora, fauna and microbes was a shatteringly important event for the indigenous peoples (see chapters 6 and 8).

zh: 向美洲的移民以及从俄罗斯向西伯利亚的移民虽然暂时没有产生影响，但是最终造成了这些地区的人口、生态以及政治的变迁。
en: Longer term flows of migration to the Americas and from Russia to Siberia had less immediate effect but eventually resulted in profound demographic, ecological and political shifts in these regions.

zh: 奴隶贸易对非洲各种社会也有不同的影响，有的社会崩溃或者解体了，有的则通过合作生存下来。
en: The impact of the slave trade on African societies varied as some societies collapsed or disintegrated while others thrived on collaboration.

zh: 20世纪晚期又出现了一股革新浪潮，与这次革新浪潮的速度和范围相比较，以前的技术相形见绌。这些技术包括；信息和图像的数字化、卫星广播和远程电话系统、新电缆和光纤技术以及计算机与通信网络的联合（计算机和通信网络的联合的最终的表现形式是互联网的全球化）。
en: In the late twentieth century a further wave of innovations has emerged whose speed and range dwarf earlier technologies: digitization of information and images, satellite broadcasting and telephony systems, new cable and fibre-optic technologies and the integration of computer and telecommunications networks whose ultimate expression are the global networks of the World Wide Web.

zh: 除了这些技术基础设施以外，许多国际机构和组织都努力寻求文化交流的全球规范。
en: Alongside these technological infrastructures a number of international agencies and organizations have sought some global regulation of cultural flows.

zh: 从大众文化的层次上说，初看起来似乎是同质化过程实际上呈现出混合化特征。
en: At the level of popular culture, what might at first sight appear to be processes of homogenization in fact display hybrid characteristics.

zh: 没有任何文化信息、没有任何美观的人工制品也没有任何符号会存在于不受时空限制的文化真空。
en: No cultural message, no aesthetic artefact, no symbol passes through time and space into a cultural vacuum.

zh: 从消费者和接收者的角度来说，产品的生产和传播的文化环境最终总是会遇见一种已经存在的参照框架。
en: The cultural context of production and transmission must always in the end encounter an already existing frame of reference in the eyes of the consumer or receiver.

zh: 持变革论观点的人认为，文化与人的相互融合与交流将产生混合文化和新的全球文化网络。
en: Those taking a transformationalist position describe the intermingling of cultures and peoples as generating cultural hybrids and new global cultural networks.

zh: 我们将在后面对这些争论的各个方面进行讨论，但是很明显，这些观点主要讨论的是文化全球化对民族社群带来的影响。
en: We will return to aspects of these debates later, but it is clear that these accounts are predominantly about the impact of contemporary cultural globalization on national communities.

zh: 这产生了3个问题。
en: This raises three problems.

zh: 尽管这与当代争论有着重要的相关性，但是，在没有解决民族国家和民族文化问题之前，要解决全球文化问题，这并不会有什么作用；第三，这些解释没有在以下两种影响之间作出仔细的区分，即国家文化认同和价值观发生的变化与国家文化构成的环境和过程发生的变化。
en: While this is of central relevance to contemporary debates, it is of little use in tackling the world before nation-states and national cultures.Third, the accounts fail to differentiate adequately between impact qua changes to a national cultural identity and values, and impact qua the transformation of the context and processes of national cultural formation.

zh: 正如我们将要看见的，这种区分具有重要意义。
en: As we will show, this distinction is of fundamental importance.

zh: 在这一章，我们既要努力对有关当代文化全球化的主要争论进行讨论，而且要利用在导论中建立起来的框架提出一种文化全球化的解释，这种解释可以反映不断变化的文化全球化的历史形态。
en: In this chapter we seek both to engage with the dominant debates about contemporary cultural globalization and, utilizing the framework established in the introduction, to develop an account of cultural globalization that is sensitive to its changing historical forms.

zh: 正如我们上面了解到的，早期的人类形成了小规模的群体，并产生了使自身得以生存的简单文化。
en: As we have seen, early human beings formed small groups that developed a simple culture that enabled them to survive.

zh: 随着人类社会的发展并更加趋于复杂，人类存在的一种新的形式——文明——开始形成。
en: As human societies grew and developed greater complexity, a new form of human existence---called civilization---came into being.

zh: 文明是一种复杂的文化，大量处于其中的人类拥有一些共同的基本特征。
en: A civilization is a complex culture in which large numbers of human beings share a number of common elements.

zh: 14世纪，伴随着黑死病和瘟疫的复发，出现了大量病态的作品，艺术在多个领域也同时兴起。
en: The fourteenth century produced an artistic outburst in new directions as well as a large body of morbid work influenced by the Black Death and the recurrence of the plague.

zh: 通过乔托的作品，中世纪的传统在佛罗伦萨第一次出现巨大突破，乔托被认为是意大利文艺复兴绘画的先驱。
en: The city of Florence witnessed the first dramatic break with medieval tradition in the work of Giotto (1266--1337), often considered a forerunner of Italian Renaissance painting.

zh: 他的足迹几乎遍及意大利，但他最著名的作品是在帕多瓦和佛罗伦萨完成的。
en: Although he worked throughout Italy, Giotto’s most famous works were done in Padua and Florence.

zh: 许多环境威胁产生的原因或带来的结果完全是地区性的，很少或根本就不存在任何社会关系的延伸或污染物质在时空上的运动。
en: Many threats are highly localized in both their origins and consequences with little or no stretching of social relationships or movements of pollutants through space and time.

zh: 许多种类的污染，如光化学烟雾和有毒重金属的泄漏等影响的范围非常小。
en: Many forms of pollution, like photochemical smogs and the release of toxic heavy metals, have a small radius of action.

zh: 同样，许多种类的水污染也都是地方性的或至多是国内的。
en: Similarly, many forms of water pollution result from local or at least national sources.

zh: 在募兵过程中，马略发起了军事改革，结果带来了巨大的影响。
en: In raising a new army, Marius initiated military reforms that proved to have drastic consequences.

zh: 罗马军队传统上是招募小农场主。
en: The Roman army had traditionally been a conscript army of small landholders.

zh: 马略征募的则是城市和乡下的亳无财产而自愿入伍的人，他们发誓效忠将军，而不是元老院，这样就开了征召不再受制于政府的职业型军队之先河。
en: Marius recruited volunteers from both the urban and rural proletariat who possessed no property.These volunteers swore an oath of loyalty to the general, not the senate, and thus inaugurated a professional-type army that might no longer be subject to the state.

zh: 此外，为了征募他们，将军要许诺给予他们土地，这样为了实现通过关于向其退伍老兵提供土地的立法，将军又不得不参政。
en: Moreover, to recruit these men, a general would promise them land, so the generals had to play politics to get legislation passed that would provide the land for their veterans.

zh: 马略留下丰厚的遗产，他创立了可以集多种大权于将军一人之手的新征募制度。
en: Marius left a powerful legacy.He had created a new system of military recruitment that placed much power in the hands of the individual generals.

zh: 甚至第三个五年计划也承认，租佃立法在实际上所造成的冲击远非原先希望的那样有效。因为地主们在佃农自愿放弃的托词下,大肆驱逐佃农。
en: Even the text of the Third Five Year Plan concedes that the impact of tenancy legislation in practice has been less than hoped for, because landlords have ejected tenants under the plea of voluntary surrenders.

zh: 到1963年末，据各邦记载，情況的改善在各个地区也很不一致。
en: The record of the states in improving matters remained very spotty down to the end of 1963, more than a decade after the changes began.

zh: 现场的观察和地区性的研究表明变化微乎其微。
en: Observations made on the spot and local studies indicate very little change.

zh: 丹尼尔•托那在1960年总结道：“从根本上说，大人物掌握着大量的土地，而他们役使许多人为自己种田。”
en: Daniel Thorner in 1960 concluded that "In essence the bigger people have held on to a lot of land, and they are getting others to cultivate it for them."

zh: 两个世纪后，类似的命运在等待着澳大利亚和新西兰的一些地方。
en: A similar fate awaited parts of Australia and New Zealand two centuries later.

zh: 美洲物种越过大西洋被带回到欧洲，对欧洲的环境和社会发展产生了重要作用。
en: The return journey across the Atlantic of American species also provided important forces in shaping the environmental and social development of Europe.

zh: 例如，马铃薯成了外围欧洲农民的主要农作物，它改变了他们的定居模式和人口增长模式，烟草带来的环境后果一点也不小(Salaman，1947)。
en: The potato, for example, became the staple crop of much of peripheral peasant Europe, transforming patterns of settlement and population growth.The environmental consequences of tobacco are scarcely smaller (Salaman, 1947).

zh: 不管他的理想、动机和对自我的看法如何，有一点事实很清楚：亚历山大确实开创了一个新时代——希腊化时代。
en: Regardless of his ideals, motives, or views about himself, one fact stands out: Alexander created a new age, the Hellenistic era.

zh: “希腊化”一词源于希腊语，意思是“仿效希腊”。
en: The word Hellenistic is derived from a Greek word meaning “to imitate Greeks.”

zh: 描绘这一时代的一个很恰当的说法就是，它是把希腊的语言和思想传播到近东地区非希腊世界的一个时代。
en: It is an appropriate way, then, to describe an age that saw the extension of the Greek language and ideas to the non-Greek world of the Near East.

zh: 犹太复国主义运动发展中的一个关键人物是西奥多·赫茨尔 (1860—1904)。
en: A key figure in the growth of Zionism was Theodor Herzl (1860--1904).

zh: 1896年，他出版了《犹太国》一书，书中宣称：“那些希望有自己国家的犹太人将会梦想成真。
en: In 1896, he published a book called The Jewish State in which he advocated that “the Jews who wish it will have their state.”

zh: ” 然而，当时在巴勒斯坦定居是件比较困难的事情，因为那里在当时还是奥斯曼帝国的一部分，而该帝国是反对犹太人移入的。
en: Settlement in Palestine was difficult, however, because it was then part of the Ottoman Empire, which was opposed to Jewish immigration.

zh: 于是这些农民或是逃亡北部边境地区，用武力赶走住居在那里的虾夷人，或是将自己连同土地一起交托给拥有采邑的贵族。
en: They in turn either fled to the northern frontier areas where the Ainu were being pushed back by force of arms, or else commended themselves and their lands to lords of manors.

zh: 这样，他们可以免税，并得到保护，但却因此变成农奴。
en: This freed them of taxes and provided them with protection, but at the cost of becoming serfs.

zh: 结果，到12世纪末，纳税土地只是整个耕地面积的百分之十，甚至更少，地方权力被新的农村贵族所接管。
en: The net result of this process was that by the end of the twelfth century, tax-paying land amounted to 10 percent or less of the total cultivated area, and local power had been taken over by the new rural aristocracy.

zh: 第五，文化全球化的分层现象正在迅速发生变化。
en: Fifth, the stratification of cultural globalization is changing rapidly.

zh: 从欧洲现代化开始，文化流动主要沿着帝国控制的路线，从西方流向世界其他地方。
en: Since the advent of European modernity, cultural flows were primarily from the West to the rest, following lines of imperial control.

zh: 在当代世界，文化流动仍然主要发生在西方，而且主要出现在西方越来越强大的文化机构范围内——广播公司、新闻机构、音乐和电影产业以及大学等。
en: In the contemporary world, the flows continue to be generated primarily in the West and in its more powerful cultural institutions---broad casters, press agencies, music and film industries, universities, etc.

zh: 本章将利用当代和历史的证据建构一个阐释自现代早期以来商品和服务的跨国生产、销售的组织是如何发展的大致框架。
en: Using contemporary and historical evidence this chapter seeks to construct a synoptic account of how the organization of cross-border production and distribution of goods/services has evolved since the early modern era.

zh: 总之，这是一次勾勒商业活动全球化的时空和组织范围概貌的尝试(见导论)。
en: Broadly it is an attempt to map historically the spatio-temporal and organizational dimensions of the globalization of business activity (see the introduction).

zh: 因此，我们将考察国际商业活动的广度、强度、速度及影响，以及分层化和制度化的重要模式、主导性互动模式和在不同历史时期支撑生产全球化的基础设施状况。
en: Thus it examines the extensity, intensity, velocity and impact of international business activity, as well as the significant patterns of stratification and institutionalization, the dominant modes of interaction and the infrastructural conditions which have underpinned the globalization of production in different historical epochs.

zh: 罗马人的艺术灵感也受希腊的影响。
en: The Romans were also dependent on the Greeks for artistic inspiration.

zh: 公元前2、3世纪时，他们吸收希腊化艺术风格的诸多特征。
en: During the third and second centuries B.C., they adopted many features of the Hellenistic style of art.

zh: 罗马人产生了对希腊雕塑的喜好，他们不仅把希腊雕塑立于公共建筑群中，还摆放在家中。
en: The Romans developed a taste for Greek statues, which they placed not only in public buildings but also in their homes.

zh: 一旦需求超过了原创艺术品的供应力，相应的复制品就会风行，罗马自己的肖像雕塑以浓厚的现实主义为特征，甚至包括令人不快的细节。
en: Once demand outstripped the supply of original works, reproductions of Greek statues became fashionable.The Romans’ own portrait sculpture was characterized by an intense realism that included even unpleasant physical details.

zh: 壁画以现实主义风格描绘了风景、肖像和神秘故事的场景。
en: Wall paintings and frescoes in the houses of the rich realistically depicted landscapes, portraits, and scenes from mythological stories.

zh: 俾斯麦经常被描绘为一位终极的现实主义者，一位19世纪的最优秀的现实主义政治的实践者。
en: Bismarck has often been portrayed as the ultimate realist, the foremost nineteenth-century practitioner of Realpolitik.

zh: 他对于任何反对他的人的厌恶之情也都溢于言表。
en: He was also quite open about his strong dislike of anyone who opposed him.

zh: 他曾在一个早晨对他的妻子说：“我整夜都无法入睡，我整晚都在愤恨。”
en: He said one morning to his wife, "I could not sleep the whole night; I hated throughout the whole night."

zh: 虽然后来为了书写方便简化为两种字体，但象形文字从没有演化成字母。
en: Although hieroglyphs were later simplified into two scripts for writing purposes, they never developed into an alphabet.

zh: 埃及象形文字最初刻在了石头上，但后来这两种简化字体写在了一种用长在尼罗河岸边的纸莎草制成的草纸上。
en: Egyptian hieroglyphs were initially carved in stone, but later the two simplified scripts were written on papyrus, a paper made from the papyrus reed that grew along the Nile.

zh: 大多数流传至今的埃及文学作品就是书写在了纸莎草纸书册和木板上。
en: Most of the ancient Egyptian literature that has come down to us was written on papyrus rolls and wooden tablets.

zh: 在1914年前，跨国公司就将新的产品和生产过程引入东道国。第一次世界大战后这一过程则有加速之势。
en: Even before 1914 MNCs were introducing new products and processes into host counties and this accelerated in the interwar period.

zh: 跨国公司引进了新制成的食品和饮料。此后，这些产品都变成了驰名世界的商标品牌。
en: MNCs introduced new processed food and drink products that have since become worldwide brand names.

zh: 美国的跨国公司开始在国外生产轿车和其他主要消费品；例如，此间福特和通用汽车公司在欧洲和日本建立了轿车生产工厂（Wilkins, 1974,第4章）
en: US multinationals began to manufacture cars and other major consumer goods abroad; for example, Ford and General Motors established car plants in Europe and Japan during this period (Wilkins, 1974, ch. 4).

zh: 另外，在1991年马斯特里赫特高峰会议上达成的条约所寻求的不仅是经济与货币联盟的范围的扩大，还有政治一体化的框架向其他领域的延伸。
en: The treaty agreed at the Maastricht summit of 1991 seeks, moreover, not only to extend the scope of economic and monetary union, but also to extend the framework of political integration to other spheres.

zh: 特別是，它推动了欧盟公民身份这一概念的发展：每一个欧盟成员国的国家公民，现在也是欧盟的公民，拥有在欧盟内部任何地方旅行和居住权、投票权以及抗议其居住国政治当局的权利。
en: In particular, it significantly advances the notion of EU citizenship: every national citizen of a member country of the EU is now also a citizen of the Union with the right to travel and reside anywhere within the EU and the right to vote and contest political office in the country of their residence.

zh: 相应地，旧的政治边界的重要性进一步减弱，领土消解的进程在继续。
en: Accordingly, the importance of old political borders further declines and the process of deterritorialization continues.

zh: 因为其他因素改变或强化了这个趋势，这些运动突然停止了国际趋同。
en: These movements stopped short of complete convergence as other factors modified or accentuated these trends.

zh: 在两次大战之间，随着贸易保护盛行，这种全球趋同的趋势停止了。30年代后期，工资、利润和租金实际上差别很大。
en: This tendency to global convergence ceased in the interwar years as protectionism increased, and wages, profits and rents actually diverged worldwide during the late 1930s.

zh: 在劳动力密集的欧洲国家，实际工资下降了，而富有土地的美国则经历了一次严重的农业萧条。
en: In labour-abundant European countries real wages fell, while the land-abundant USA experienced a severe agricultural depression.

zh: 大量的农民负债并丧失自己的耕地，这到底有多少人，在专家中还有争议。
en: A good many peasants fell into debt and lost their farms.How many is a matter of dispute among specialists.

zh: 虽然新政权允许农民有财产权，但在实际上，因为除了钱和口头惯例外别无所靠，所以小户人家经常失败。而“法律”在村里头人就代表了官方的法律——通常是站在大土地所有者一边的。
en: Although the new regime had granted property rights to the peasants, in the actual settlement the little man often lost out because, he had nothing but memory and oral tradition to rely upon, while the “law” 一in the person of the village headman as well as officials — generally sided with the large holder.

zh: 这些变化部分地反映了变化着的世界贸易结构。
en: These shifts partly reflect the changing composition of world trade.

zh: 尽管第二次世界大战以前初级产品占贸易的大部分份额，但是自80年代以来，制成品和日益增长的服务贸易主导着第二次世界大战后的贸易。
en: Whereas primary goods made up the majority of trade before the Second World War, postwar trade has been dominated by manufactures along with increasing levels of services trade since the 1980s.

zh: 但如前所述，发展中国家不再仅仅是初级产品出口国，而且开始从事制成品和服务贸易。
en: But, as noted, developing states are no longer simply exporters of primary products but are engaged increasingly in trade in manufactures and services.

zh: 一种新的劳动分工正在形成，并且对世界贸易分层有重要影响。
en: A new international division of labour is evolving which has important consequences for the stratification of world trade.

zh: 虽然国家内部特定的团体会因为全球竞争而受到损害，但是几乎所有的国家在生产特定商品上都有比较优势，可以长期利用。
en: While particular groups within a country may be made worse off as a result of global competition, nearly all countries have a comparative advantage in producing certain goods which can be exploited in the long run.

zh: 新马克思主义者和激进主义者认为这样“乐观的观点”没有根据，他们相信全球资本主义在国家内部和国家之间制造并且强化了不平等的结构模式。
en: Neo-Marxists and radicals regard such an ‘optimistic view' as unjustified, believing that global capitalism creates and reinforces structural patterns of inequality within and between countries.

zh: 但是他们至少在这一点上同意新自由主义的看法：社会保护的传统福利形式不断陷入困境并且难以维持。

en: But they agree at least with their neoliberal counterparts that traditional welfare options for social protection are looking increasingly threadbare and difficult to sustain.

zh: 对于许多激进共和主义者来说，变革的能动者来自观有的（批判的）社会运动，如环境、妇女以及和平运动，它们不仅挑战着国家和同际机构的权威，而且挑战着正统的“政治”定义。
en: For many radical republicans the agents of change are to be found in existing (critical) social movements, such as the environmental, women's and peace movements, which challenge the authority of states and international agencies as well as orthodox definitions of the 'political'.

zh: 通过一种抵抗和授权政治，这些新社会运动被认为在全球民主化中发挥了关键作用，如同像劳工运动这样的（传统的）社会运动在争取国内民主中的作用一样。
en: Through a politics of resistance and empowerment these new social movements are conceived as playing a crucial role in global democratization similar to the role of the (old) social movements, such as organized labour, in the struggle for national democracy.

zh: 这些新运动面对全球张态、经济和安全危机，积极动员着跨国共同体的抵抗和团结。
en: These new movements are engaged in mobilizing transnational communities of resistance and solidarity against impending global ecological, economic and security crises.

zh: 它们追求的是实现社会和经济平等，建立自我发展必需的条件，以及建立自我管理的共同体。
正是由于这种平等主义，无论是新石器时代的部落社会，还是今天的部落社会，其生产力都有着内在的妨碍因素。
en: Precisely because of this equality, tribal societies, whether of Neolithic times or of today, have a built-in brake on productivity.

zh: 产品的产量只要适应每个家庭有限的传统的需要就可以了，没有要求生产剩余产品的动力。
en: Output is geared to the limited traditional needs of the family, so there is no incentive to produce a surplus.

zh: 也就是说，劳动只是生活中的一个插曲，其内容多样，时间却相当有限。

en: This in turn means that labor is sporadic, diversified, and correspondingly limited.

zh: 贸易对发达国家最激烈的影响来自获得生产技术的低成本生产商。新兴工业化经济体中制成品出口商的兴起就是明证。
en: The most radical structural impact of trade on developed economies comes from low-cost producers acquiring production technology, as is evident in the rise of manufactures exporters in the NIEs.

zh: 此外，这种影响不是彻底使发达国家的所有生产商全部消失。
en: Again the effect of this is not to wipe out all producers in developed countries.

zh: 如果生产力水平低，即使是最先进的新兴工业化经济体也会落后于发达国家（Dollar和Wolff，1993，第8章）。
en: Even the most advanced NIEs still lag behind the leading industrial nations technologically, giving them significantly lower productivity levels (Dollar and Wolff, 1993, ch. 8).

zh: 尽管国际货币基金组织（及工业化国家）制定了历史上最大的救援计划，力图稳定东亚金融形势，但危机的影响逐渐吞没了许多新兴经济体。
en: Despite attempts by the IMF (and G7) to stabilize the financial situation in East Asia, through the provision of the largest rescue package in its history, the contagion effect of the crisis swiftly engulfed many emerging economies.

zh: 1998年年底时，投机导致了卢比的贬值，并且冲击了许多国家的货币。
en: By late 1998 speculation had led to the devaluation of the rouble and speculative attacks on many other currencies.

zh: 这些变动突出表明了短期资本流动在全球资本市场上造成的高度动荡和系统性风险的方式。
en: These developments underlined the ways in which short-term capital flows generate a high degree of volatility and systemic risk within global capital markets.

zh: 然而，通信基础设施的扩大并不只是增加了全世界的交往，而牺牲了国家交往，因为它既促进了国内交往的发展又促进了跨国文化交流。
en: The growth of infrastructures of communication did not, however, simply increase worldwide communication at the expense of the national, for it facilitated an increase both in national communication patterns and in transnational cultural flows.

zh: 20世纪晚期又出现了一股革新浪潮，与这次革新浪潮的速度和范围相比较，以前的技术相形见绌。这些技术包括：信息和图像的数字化、卫星广播和远程电话系统、新电缆和光纤技术以及计算机与通信网络的联合（计算机和通信网络的联合的最终的表现形式是互联网的全球化）。
en: In the late twentieth century a further wave of innovations has emerged whose speed and range dwarf earlier technologies: digitization of information and images, satellite broadcasting and telephony systems, new cable and fibre-optic technologies and the integration of computer and telecommunications networks whose ultimate expression are the global networks of the World Wide Web.

zh: 除了这些技术基础设施以外，许多国际机构和组织都努力寻求文化交流的全球规范。
en: Alongside these technological infrastructures a number of international agencies and organizations have sought some global regulation of cultural flows.

zh: 反理性、反工业社会前景的加图主义，把现代都市文明看作性的贬値，看作人际关系的冷漠化和非人格化。
en: As part of the generally anti-intellectual and anti-industrial outlook of Catonism, modern urban civilization is seen as somehow devaluing sex, as making human relationships cold and impersonal.

zh: 因此人们专注于性冷淡和阳萎，美化性关系，有如“查特莱女士之恶”一书所表现的那样。
en: Hence the preoccupation with frigidity and impotence, the glorification of sex, as for example in Lady Chatterley's Lover.

zh: 另外，因为性构成家庭、家族和国家的基础，加图主义又有一种邪恶的淫乱气氛 。
en: On the other hand, there is an air of guilty prurience about all this because sex has to be the basis of the home, the family, the state.

zh: 然而，早期的这些修道士无法获得孤独。
en: These early monks, however, soon found themselves unable to live in solitude.

zh: 他们神圣的业绩吸引着大量的追随者，并且随着修道士形象传遍东方，基于实际公共生活的新型修道院制度不久成为一种主导的形式。
en: Their feats of holiness attracted followers on a wide scale, and as the monastic ideal spread throughout the east, a new form of monasticism based on the practice of communal life soon became the dominant form.

zh: 修道士共同体成为了理想的基督教社会，可以向其周围更大范围的社会提供道德典范。
en: Monastic communities came to be seen as the ideal Christian society that could provide a moral example to the wider society around them.

zh: 期货仅仅是在商定的未来时间以商定的价格交易一定量产品——货币、商品、侦券、股票等——的合约。
en: Futures are simply an agreement to trade a quantity of a product --- currency, commodity, bonds, shares, etc. --- at an agreed future date for an agreed price.

zh: 期权则是给持有人一种权利，使其能够在特定时间的特定的价格购买特定量的产品。
en: An option gives the holder the right to buy an agreed quantity of a product at an agreed price on an agreed date.

zh: 掉期指的是经纪人交换两种资产的支付——例如，两个借贷者可以在固定和浮动利率贷款之间交换支付。
en: A swap is where agents swap the payments associated with two assets --- for example, two borrowers may swap payments between a fixed and a floating interest rate loan.

zh: 衍生品使经纪人可以对冲产品基本价格贬值带来的风险，它们还提供投机方式以防价格波动，因为首期支付只是合同名义价值的一部分，经纪人能够调动巨额资金。
en: Derivatives allow agents to hedge themselves against the risk of adverse movements in the underlying price of a product.They also offer the means to speculate heavily against movements in prices since the initial outlay is only a fraction of the notional value of the contract, enabling agents to gear up very large sums.

zh: 早期的德川统治者们把武士从土地上分离出来，就是打算把农民对国家的财政义务体现为向政府交纳公共税，而不是采取个人对封建主承担义务的形式。
en: The separation of the warrior from the land by the early Tokugawa rulers meant that the peasant’s financial obligations to the government took on the appearance of public taxes to the government rather than personal dues to the lord.

zh: 这并不是陈词滥调，早期的个人的徭役逐渐转变成了公众的徭役。
en: There were no banalities, and the earlier personal corvee was gradually being incorporated into the corvee for the public.

zh: 这种公众义务的形式，可能使农民对封建领主的忠诚更容易转变为对近代国家的忠诚，这种转变主要是在明治维新时完成的。
en: Very likely this appearance of public obligations helped to ease the peasant’s transfer of loyalty from the feudal Overlord to the modern state, when the time came to do so in the Meiji Reform.

zh: 业余乐趣可能是也始终是肤浅和无能的藉口。
en: The ideal of the amateur can and has served as an excuse for superficiality and incompetence.

zh: 虽然贵族们有助于美学目光的保留，但他们又对虚荣浮华和谄媚奉承产生了强烈影响。
en: If the aristocracy has helped to preserve the independence of the aesthetic dimension, it has also exerted very strong pressures toward mere decoration and flattery.Sheer snobbishness, i.e.

zh: 纯粹的势利眼，没有任何理性基础的竞富夸豪，在这里起了极端重要的作用。
en: , the drawing of social distinctions and the awarding of prestige without any rational basis, has played a tremendous part.

zh: 维希伦的“有闲阶级论一书”，并不是一幅高明的讽刺画，但却是洞中时弊的。
en: Veblen’s snide caricature in the Theory of the Leisure Class seizes essential aspects of the truth.

zh: 为了限制这种性方面过度的自由，教会逐渐强化自己在婚姻中的地位并将婚姻基督教化。
en: To limit such sexual license, the church increasingly emphasized its role in marriage and attempted to Christianize it.

zh: 应该说，婚姻是一种世俗的安排，教士极力在仪式中增加祈祷的程序，并强化婚姻仪式的特殊观念。
en: Although marriage was a civil arrangement, priests tried to add their blessings and strengthen the concept of a special marriage ceremony.

zh: 为了稳定婚姻，教会还开始宣传一夫一妻制和永久婚姻。
en: To stabilize marriages, the church also began to emphasize monogamy and permanence.

zh: 这一文明于公元前2500年左右达到成熟期，在以后的1000年中，实际上处于静止不变的状态，而且，甚至达到这样的程度，这些城市每遭到洪水毁灭性的破坏后，重建的新城市总是造得跟原来的城市一模一样。
en: After it reached its maturity about 2500 B.C., it remained virtually static during the following millennium.Even when cities were destroyed by floods, the new cities were built to duplicate the old.

zh: 如此一贯、连续的传统世上从来没有过，即使在埃及也没有，因而，产生这样一种假说：控制这一纪律严明的社会的也许是一种精神上的力量。
en: Such undeviating continuity of tradition has had no equal, even in Egypt, and has given rise to the theory that the authority regulating this disciplined society may have been spiritual.

zh: 没有军事装备，没有城防工事，也为这一假说提供了证据。
en: This hypothesis is supported also by the absence of military equipment and fortifications.

zh: 但是，联合国的宪章体系在许多方面还是具有独特的创新性和影响力的。
en: However, the UN Charter system has also been distinctively innovative and influential in a number of ways.

zh: 它提供了个国际审议论坛，在这里，原则上所有的国家在某些方面都是平等的；对许多发展中国家来说，对那些寻求对某些国际问题的“一致性的”解决方式的基础的国家来说，论坛具有独特的价值。
en: It has provided an international deliberative forum in which, in principle, all states are equal in certain respects, a forum of particular value to many developing countries and to those seeking a basis for 'consensus' solutions to international problems.

zh: 它为非殖民化，为寻求国际制度改革提供了一个正式的框架。
en: It has provided a formal framework for decolonization, and for the pursuit of the reform of international institutions.

zh: 所以，有成就的商人的志向是获取地产、购买陷入穷困的王室所出卖的爵位，从而抛弃自己的阶级，成为伊达戈。
en: Consequently, the ambition of successful merchants was to acquire estates and buy titles, which were sold by the impoverished crown; and thus abandon their class and become hidalgos.

zh: 这种伊达戈精神的破坏性影响在经济的各部门——在对牧羊业而非农业所显示的偏爱里，在对勤劳的犹太人和穆斯林的驱逐以及议会对商业和工业利益所持的否定态度中——均可感觉到。
en: The blighting influence of this hidalgo spirit was felt in all branches of the economy --- In the favoritism shown toward sheep farming as opposed to agriculture, in the expulsion of the industrious Jews and Moslems, and in the negative attitude of the Cortes assembly toward commercial and industrial interests.

zh: 因此，16世纪上半世纪中西班牙突然繁荣的经济最终衰退了。
en: As a result of these attitudes, the economic spurt that occurred in Spain in the first half of the sixteenth century ended in failure.

zh: 即使是美国，毫无疑问它有独立行动的军事能力，但它所卷入的全球责任和承诺的复杂网络，涉及到它跨越其邻近领土而使用武力时，也要斡旋各军事力量的行动，正如1998年的伊拉克危机所显示的。
en: But even in the case of the US, which undoubtedly has the military capability to act independently, the complex web of global commitments in which it is entangled mediates the exercise of military power in respect of the use of force beyond its immediate territory, as the 1998 Iraq crisis demonstrated.

zh: 尽管对绝大多数发达资本主义国家来说，与关于国家安全的最关键的决策相连的国家主权，无法被一个更高的权威所掠夺，但是，就军事和安全事务进行的决策，在某种程度上被国家卷入世界军事秩序的当代模式所削弱。在实践中，现存的军事和安全关系、义务和责任影响着不同政策选择的成本和收益，还可以确定多边的协商，甚至是联盟的共同决策。
en: Although for most SIACS national sovereignty with respect to the most critical decisions about national security has by no means been usurped by a higher authority, decision-making on military and security matters is, nevertheless, compromised by contemporary patterns of national enmeshment in the world military order to the extent that, in practice, existing military and security relations, obligations and commitments influence the costs and benefits of different policy choices, while they also presume multilateral consultation or even alliance co-decision.

zh: 由于受到奧斯曼帝国、蒙古帝国和伊斯兰国家的遏制，基督教的欧洲在十字军东征后一直处于一种防御性军事状态。
en: Contained by the considerable military might of the Ottoman Empire, the Mongols and Islam, Christian Europe had adopted a largely defensive military posture in the aftermath of the Crusades.

zh: 另外，欧洲的主权受到国内和洲内权力争夺的干扰。
en: Moreover, Europe's sovereigns were significantly exercised by domestic and continental power struggles.

zh: 但是值得注意的是，在18世纪末，欧洲列强总共获得了对世界35%陆地面积的政治控制(Headrick,1981,第3页)。
en: Yet, remarkably, by the close of the eighteenth century the major European powers together had acquired political control of 35 per cent of the world's land area (Headrick, 1981, p.3).

zh: 《古兰经》是穆斯林的圣书，类似于基督教的《圣经》。
en: The Qur’an is the sacred book of the Muslims, comparable to the Bible in Christianity.

zh: 这部分选自22章，标题为“朝圣”，该章探讨了前往麦加朝圣的重要性，朝圣是伊斯兰教五功之一。
en: This selection from Sura 22, titled "Pilgrimage," discusses the importance of making a pilgrimage to Mecca, one of the Five Pillars of Islam.

zh: 朝圣的最后目标是麦加的克尔白，那里供有黑石。
en: The pilgrim’s final destination was the Ka’ba at Mecca, containing the Black Stone.

zh: 但制药工业需要大量的研发投入，这种情况在地理上相当集中，总投入的一半以上分布在五大工业国和瑞士。
en: But pharmaceutical products require enormous research and development expenditures.This is heavily concentrated geographically, with over half of total expenditure located in the G5 countries plus Switzerland.

zh: 战后大部分时间里，制药工业反映了跨国公司在国内生产全球性竞争产品的逻辑。
en: For much of the postwar period pharmaceuticals reflects the logic of companies generating globally competitive products from their national base.

zh: 然而，渐渐地这也证明是不充分的。
en: Increasingly, however, this is proving to be insufficient.

zh: 我们将通过对边境控制和监督的讨论来阐述国家主权和自主的3个重要方面。
en: Three important aspects of state sovereignty and autonomy are illuminated by the discussion of border control and surveillance.

zh: 首先，国家与移民(尤其是那些寻求逃脱边境控制的人)之间的集体力量的对比已经随着时间的改变而变化了。
en: First, the balance of collective power between states and migrants --- particularly those who seek to evade border controls --- has shifted over time.

zh: 随着移民机构的建立、公民身份文件化以及通过港口和飞机场对移民进行控制等，发达资本主义国家的力量已经得到了增强。

en: The powers of SIACS have been increased by the establishment of immigration agencies, the documentation of citizenship and the funnelling of migrants through harbours and airports.

zh: 移民社群本身在创造工作和扩大交易方面也起着非常重要的作用（Li【该处人名拼写不确定，需核实原文】A Global History: from Prehistory to the 21st Centuryt和Bonacich,1988; Waldingcr等, 1990)。
en: Immigrant communities have also been significant in creating jobs and businesses themselves (Li【该处人名拼写不确定，需核实原文】A Global History: from Prehistory to the 21st Centuryt and Bonacich, 1988; Waldinger et al., 1990).

zh: 在英国，亚洲企业家使零售贸易重新出现新的活力，满足了纺织业和服装业的发展。
en: In Britain, Asian entrepreneurs have revitalized the retail, catering, textile and clothing industries.

zh: 德国的土耳其人、法国的阿尔及利亚人以及美国的韩国人和中国人都分別在这些国家作出了同样的贡献。
en: They have their counterparts among Turks in Germany, Algerians in France, and Koreans and Chinese in the USA.

zh: 同样，在其它方面，商人们在艺术和娱乐生活中发展出某种独特的社会特征和口味，使我们回忆起西方前清教主义的商业文化。
en: It is also true that in some of the arts and in the lighter pleasures of life the merchants developed some distinctive social traits and tastes that recall the pre-Puritan aspects of mercantile culture in the West.

zh: 这种商业文化在18世纪初达到了顶峰，但这并没有对德川体制构成威胁。这基本上是一种尚能容忍的越轨，主要限制在首都的一个特定地区，并起着安全阀的怍用。
en: But this merchant culture, that reached the height of its flowering by the beginning of the eighteenth century, was no real threat in itself to the Tokugawa system,  Essentially this tolerated licentiousness, mainly restricted to a particular quarter of the capital, served as a safety valve.

zh: 不管怎样，与其说它起了摧毁旧秩序的作用，还不如说起到了保存旧秩序的作用。
en: If anything, it helped to preserve rather than destroy the ancien regime.

zh: 尽管世界宗教的创立可以向前提早几千年，但是我们可以将它们最初的影响浓缩到从公元前300年到公元700年之间约1000年内。
en: Although the foundation of world religions stretches back over a number of millennia, we can compress their initial impact to around a thousand-year period between 300 BCE and 700 CE.

zh: 佛教和印度教在耶稣诞生前3个世纪就出现了类似当代形式的形式，而伊斯兰教到公元700年时已经到达了它的核心地区。
en: Buddhism and Hinduism assumed something like their contemporary form in the three centuries before Jesus's birth, while Islam had reached its core regions by about 700 CE.

zh: 在这1000年的时间内，宗教扩张的主要载体是有组织的牧师等级制度。

en: Over this thousand-year period the main agencies of religious expansion were organized clerical hierarchies.

zh: 卡米耶·毕沙罗（1830—1903)是印象派的奠基人之一，他曾经表述他们所寻求的目标：“精确的绘画干巴巴的，妨碍对于整体的印象，破坏了所有的感觉。不要过分逼真地追求事物的轮廓，应该在运用了正确的色彩和笔法的画笔下创作画作……要同时绘制天空、水面、树枝和大地，要使所有东西在一个同样的基础上表现出来，不停地画，直到你得到自己想要的东西为止……不要依照规则和原理作画，而要出你所现察到的和感觉到的。要大胆地、毫不犹豫地绘画，因为最好的情况就是不要去掉第一印象。
en: Camille Pissarro (1830--1903), one of Impressionism’s founders, expressed what they sought: “Precise drawing is dry and hampers the impression of the whole, it destroys all sensations. Do not define too closely the outlines of things; it is the brush stroke of the right value and color which should produce the drawing. . . .Work at the same time upon sky, water, branches, ground, keeping everything going on an equal basis and unceasingly rework until you have got it. . . . Don’t proceed according to rules and principles, but paint what you observe and feel. Paint generously and unhesitatingly, for it is best not to lose the first impression.”

zh: ” 诸如毕沙罗这样的印象派画家都试图将他们对于自然界事物中光线效果变化的印象付诸画笔。
en: Impressionists like Pissarro sought to put into painting their impressions of the changing effects of light on objects in nature.

zh: 最后，我们来看看东欧。东欧在1989年之前被完全与区域性和全球性迁移流隔离开来。
en: Finally, we turn to Eastern Europe, which up until 1989 was effectively cordoned off from regional and global migratory flows.

zh: 随着这些国家的解体及其限制严格的移民政策的废除，至少向欧洲迁移的模式发生了变化。
en: With the collapse of communist states and their highly restrictive emigration policies, patterns of European migration at least have been transformed.

zh: 90年代有200万苏联犹太人迁往以色列。
en: The 1990s have witnessed over 2 million Soviet Jews emigrate to Israel.

zh: 在过去的20年里，在经合组织成员国中，有害垃圾的处理规定日渐变得严格起来，而且因遵守这些规定而付出的成本也稳步上升。
en: Over the last two decades the regulation of hazardous waste disposal in OECD countries has become increasingly stringent and the costs of compliance have steadily escalated.

zh: 一系列国际条约已经有效禁止了有害垃圾倾倒入海，而且禁止在海洋中焚烧垃圾。
en: A series of international treaties have effectively banned the dumping of hazardous wastes at sea and completely phased out the sea-based incineration option.

zh: 在陆上，控制垃圾焚烧的规定已经防止了许多有害垃圾被存放在不恰当的地方，这为人们提供了回收垃圾以及焚烧垃圾的选择。
en: On land, regulations governing the management of landfill sites have prevented many hazardous wastes from being stored in inappropriate sites.This has left recycling and land-based incineration options.

zh: 另一方面，许多跨国公司为追求价廉物美的产品（见上面第3章）而将消耗大量资源的产品向国外的中小企业转移（“分割价值链”）。
en: On the other hand, many MNCs now outsource production to SMEs abroad ('slicing up the value chain') to achieve cheap high-quality production (see chapter 3 above).

zh: 在此过程中形成的全球生产网络或系统涉及的不是直接所有权，而是相当规范的契约关系。
en: In the process global production networks or systems are created which involve not direct ownership but rather regularized contractual relationships.

zh: 但同样，一国内的中小企业可以通过特许权经营、与其他中小企业合作或者在其中进行有价证券投资等形式向国外扩展，以形成全球生产和销售链。
en: But equally SMEs in one country may expand abroad through franchising, or cooperative arrangements with or portfolio investment in other SMEs to form global production and distribution chains.

zh: 虽然大的跨国公司一直倾向于控制全球生产和分配系统，但现在并不一定如此。
en: Although big MNCs have tended to dominate global production and distribution systems this is no longer necessarily the case.

zh: 通过专门的和有组织的教育，罗马的统治阶级，不论男人和女人几乎都普遍识字。
en: Through specialized and organized instruction, literacy was almost universal among the Roman ruling class, men and women.

zh: 帝国西部的拉丁文和东部的拉丁文与希腊文成了政治和文化上共同的官方语言。
en: Latin in the western half of the empire and Latin and Greek in the east formed the shared official languages of politics and culture.

zh: 罗马帝国有意在各省修建剧院和圆形剧场，戏剧和诗歌在整个帝国非常普及。
en: Theatres and amphitheatres were deliberately built in the provinces and drama and poetry spread throughout the Empire.

zh: 罗马共和国的政府机构分为三大部分。
en: The government of the Roman Republic, then, consisted of three major elements.

zh: 两个最高执政官和后来增选的执法官掌管着政府。
en: Two consuls and later other elected officials served as magistrates and ran the state.

zh: 成年男性的大会（百人大会）由从最富裕公民中选出来的官员把持，而元老院则由一小部分大地主负责提出建议。
en: An assembly of adult males (the centuriate assembly), controlled by the wealthiest citizens, elected these officials, while the senate, a small group of large landowners, advised them.

zh: 因此，罗马政府是一个少数特权集团控制的贵族共和国。
en: The Roman state, then, was an aristocratic republic controlled by a relatively small group of privileged people.

zh: 尼禄（54-68)肆意剪除了那些有碍自己行动的人，包括他的母亲，也被谋杀了。
en: Nero (54--68) freely eliminated people he wanted out of the way, including his own mother, whose murder he arranged.

zh: 元老因为没有军队支持，也无法反抗这些过分行为。
en: Without troops, the senators proved unable to oppose these excesses.

zh: 然而，尼禄的骄奢淫逸激起了罗马军团的反叛。
en: However, Nero’s extravagances did provoke a revolt of the Roman legions.

zh: 卫兵也抛弃了他，尼禄临终时说完“多么伟大的艺术家，就这么死去了”之后就割喉自杀了。
en: Abandoned by the guards, Nero chose to commit suicide by stabbing himself in the throat after uttering his final words, "What an artist the world is losing in me."

zh: 69年，新的内战爆发，这一年因为有四个皇帝而出名。
en: A new civil war erupted in 69, known as the year of the four emperors.

zh: 塔西佗精确地总结了公元69年的重要意义，“元首制隐藏很深的秘密暴露出来了，似乎皇帝很可能不再出自罗马”。
en: The significance of the year 69 was summed up precisely by Tacitus when he stated that "a well-hidden secret of the principate had been revealed: it was possible, it seemed, for an emperor to be chosen outside Rome."

zh: 在现代早期，距离原材料和军事政治权力中心的远近是武器生产分布的主要决定因素。
en: In the early modern period, proximity to raw materials and to centres of military and political authority were the predominant determinants of the geography of arms production.

zh: 在世界各大文明中，毫无疑问武器是被大规模地生产和制造。
en: Within the world's major civilizations, arms were undoubtedly produced on a significant scale.

zh: 战争，征服和帝国扩张是军事技术由一个地方转移到其他地方的主要机制。
en: War, conquest and empire-building were the primary mechanisms by which military technologies in one locale were transferred to others.

zh: 从经济角度说，通过陆上交通大批量运输农产品和制成品——而不仅仅是小量的奢侈品——成为可能。
en: Bulk flows across land of agricultural and manufactured products --- rather than merely a trickle of prestige goods --- became economically feasible.

zh: 政冶和军事控制能够从海岸前哨扩展到内陆国家的腹地。
en: Political and military control could be extended from coastal outposts into the interior of landlocked societies.

zh: 帆船被蒸汽船代替，巴拿马和苏伊士运河开通，这些都大大减少了主要的远洋运输路线的距离和危险。
en: The shift from sail to steam along with the construction of the Panama and Suez canals combined to reduce dramatically the distance and hazards of key oceanic shipping routes.

zh: 国际贸易和移民的运输成本（以及某些不确定性）大幅度减小而且规模不断增加。
en: The transport costs (and some of the uncertainties) of international trade and migration fell precipitously and volumes rose.

zh: 另一方面，随着全球化的加强，它产生了社会——经济活动重新领土化的压力。这些活动的形式包括次国家的、区域性的、超国家的经济区，治理机制以及文化复合体。
en: On the other hand, as globalization intensifies it generates pressures towards a reterritorialization of socio-economic activity in the form of subnational, regional and supranational economic zones, mechanisms of governance and cultural complexes.

zh: 全球化也强化了社会的“本土化”和“国家化”。
en: It may also reinforce the 'localization' and 'nationalization' of societies.

zh: 因此，全球化涉及到政治经济权力复杂的解领土化和再领土化。
en: Accordingly, globalization involves a complex deterritorialization and reterritorialization of political and economic power.

zh: 从这个角度，最好把全球化理解为“无领土的”（aterritorial）。
en: In this respect, it is best described as being "aterritorial".

zh: 伊斯兰教是一种直接的，简单的信仰，它强调遵从安拉意志的必要性。
en: Islam was a direct and simple faith, emphasizing the need to obey the will of Allah.

zh: 这意味着遵从一项以五功为内容的基本的伦理规范，即信仰安拉、尊穆罕默德为先知；每天例行五次标准的祈祷，每周五中午参加共同的敬拜安拉的祷告，遵守神圣的斋月（伊斯兰历法中的第九个月）的规定，从日出到日落期间禁食，若有可能要参加朝圣，即著名的麦加朝圣，一生至少去麦加朝圣一次（见附文），向穷人和不幸的人施舍。
en: This meant following a basic ethical code consisting of the Five Pillars of Islam: belief in Allah and Muhammad as his Prophet; standard prayer five times a day and public prayer on Friday at midday to worship Allah; observance of the holy month of Ramadan (the ninth month on the Muslim calendar) with fasting from dawn to sunset; making a pilgrimage (known as the hajj), if possible, to Mecca at least once in one’s lifetime (see the box above); and giving alms to the poor and unfortunate.

zh: 严格遵守规定的信徒能够确保获得永生。
en: The faithful who observed the law were guaranteed a place in an eternal paradise.

zh: 占卜有多种多样的形式。
en: Divination took a variety of forms.

zh: 至少国王和神职人员都能做的一种普通形式就是，宰杀绵羊或者山羊并检査它们的肝脏和其他器官。
en: A common form, at least for kings and priests who could afford it, involved killing animals, such as sheep or goats, and examining their livers or other organs.

zh: 通过被宰杀动物器官看到的征状臆测某事将要发生。
en: Supposedly, features seen in the organs of the sacrificed animals foretold events to come.

zh: 一本小册子这样预言，如果动物的器官呈x状，那么战斗的结局就是y。
en: One handbook predicted that if the animal organ had shape x, the outcome of the military campaign would be y.

zh: “战时共产主义”政策包括对银行和大部分工业企业的国有化，从农民手中强制征收粮食，以及在布尔什维克控制下的国家管理机构的中央集权化。
en: War communism included the nationalization of banks and most industries, the forcible requisition of grain from peasants, and the centralization of state administration under Bolshevik control.

zh: 布尔什维克的另一个工具是“革命恐怖”，尽管旧的沙皇制的秘密警察已经被取消了，被称作契卡的新的红色秘密警察取而代之。
en: Another Bolshevik instrument was “revolutionary terror.”Although the old tsarist secret police had been abolished, a new Red secret police---known as the Cheka---replaced it.

zh: 由契卡来实现的红色恐怖孜孜以求的就是镇压一切反对新政权的人。
en: The Red Terror instituted by the Cheka aimed at nothing less than the destruction of all opponents of the new regime.

zh: 前面已经讨论过，人权体制与人权法律与如下观点很难融洽相处，即：认为国家主权单独作为政治社会内部或政治社会之间的组织关系的恰当原则。
en: It has already been argued in the previous section that human rights regimes and human rights law sit uneasily with the idea of accepting state sovereignty alone as the proper principle for the organization of relations within and between political communities.

zh: 因其在当代全球政治中的中心地位，它们已被区别对待（1.3.2部分）。
en: They have been treated separately (section 1.3.2) because of their centrality to contemporary global politics.

zh: 但是它们能够与战争法、防止战争犯罪和反人道主义犯罪的法律以及环境法一起，被看作是世界法的组成部分。
en: But they could be thought of as an element of cosmopolitan law, along with the law of war, the law governing war crimes and crimes against humanity, and environmental law.

zh: 这些法的领域共同构成了一套不断发展的标准和限制，对国家主权原则不受限制的观点施加影响和进行限定。
en: Together, these domains of law constitute a developing set of standards and constraints which bear upon and qualify the notion of an untrammelled principle of state sovereignty.

zh: 实际上，其他国家境内的正统性原则在很大程度上受到了忽视。
en: In fact, however, the principle of legitimacy was largely ignored elsewhere.

zh: 在维也纳会议上，各强权都在为自己的国家抢占土地。
en: At the Congress of Vienna, the great powers all grabbed land to add to their states.

zh: 他们相信自己在重建欧洲的均势，从而可以避免任何一个国家控制全欧洲。
en: They believed that they were forming a new balance of power that would keep any one country from dominating Europe.

zh: 这样的借贷大部分是通过政府债券进行的，所以欧洲的国际债券市场（特别是伦敦）扩大到全球范围（Vos，1994，第4章）。
en: Since this borrowing was largely through government bonds, the European markets for international bonds (especially London) acquired a more global reach (Vos, 1994, ch. 4).

zh: 随着政府债券的国际发行和交易，这些金融工具的供需在全球市场中起到了决定性作用。
en: With the international issuing and trading of government bonds, demand and supply for these financial instruments was determined increasingly in a global market.

zh: 全球债券市场基本上是私人组织的，政府对交易几乎不加限制。
en: The global bond market was essentially privately organized, with governments placing few if any restrictions on trading.

zh: 当罗马扩张到整个地中海时，又增设了执法官负责管理新征服的省区（公元前227年增加了两名，公元前197年又增加了两名）。
en: As Rome expanded into the Mediterranean, additional praetors were established to govern the newly conquered provinces (two in 227, two more in 197).

zh: 可是，随着行省数量继续增长，罗马人创建了新的体制，即最高执政官和执法官在一年任期期满后，将被任命为地方最高执政官和地方执法官，作为省督到地方赴任。
en: But as the number of provinces continued to grow, the Romans devised a new system in which ex-consuls and ex-praetors who had served their one-year terms were given the title of proconsul and propraetor and sent out as provincial governors.

zh: 这再次说明罗马切实解决了当时紧迫问题。
en: This demonstrates once again the Romans’ practical solution to an immediate problem.

zh: 有理由认为，富有管理经验的官员将会胜任地方长官，虽然这并不总是正确，因为这样使各省存在着经济腐败的机会。
en: It was reasonable to assume that officials with governmental experience would make good provincial administrators, although this was not always true in practice due to the opportunities for financial corruption in the provinces.

zh: 在某种程度上，这种组织形式普遍存在于冶矿和农业部门，一些制造业组装企业是按照严格的生产线等级组织并跨国运行的（这种情况述可能出观在服务部门和制造业）：例如，美国跨国公司运用数据控制在中美洲和加勒比地区的生产，欧洲公司甚至在远及南亚的地方也这样做。
en: Some manufacturing assembly is organized with the strict hierarchy of the production line operating at the transnational level.It may also be reflected in the services sector as well as manufacturing: for example, US firms use data inputting offices in Central America and the Caribbean, and European firms do likewise as far afield as South Asia.

zh: 它还包括一些情形，跨国公司从事商品和服务的地方性生产，但保持对产品和质量的集中控制。就许多国际名牌商标和服务来说，商标（如贝纳通）被看成是世界范围内同一品质的保证。
en: It also covers cases where MNCs produce a good or service locally but retain central control over production and quality; for many internationally recognized goods or services, the trademark (such as Benetton) is intended as a guarantee of consistent quality over the world.

zh: 不过，极端爱国主义者即使在这一阶段也是一支重要的政治力量。
en: Nevertheless, patriotic-extremism was even during this period an important political force.

zh: 第一次世界大战以后的几年，农村和城市的激进主义分子经常展开暴力斗争。
en: The early years following World War I were a period of rural as well as urban radicalism that at times took violent forms.

zh: 极端爱国主义组织破坏佃户和工人的罢工斗争；与此同时，受雇的地痞恶棍破坏工会，捣毁自由派的报纸。
en: Patriotic organizations helped to break tenant and worker strikes, while hired bullies smashed labor unions and liberal newspapers.

zh: 政府通过教育部发起了主要针对学生的“反危险思想”运动。
en: The government too reacted with a campaign by the Ministry of Education against "dangerous thoughts," directed mainly against students.

zh: 在1925年4月，政府通过了治安法（比1887年的更为具体)，对那些旨在改变政府体制或私有制而参加社团者，要予以监禁。
en: In April of 1925 the government passed a Peace Preservation Law (far more specific than that of 1887), punishing with imprisonment those who joined societies) aimed at altering the system of government or repudiating private property.

zh: 这一法律为日本大规模监禁政策开了先例。
en: This law inaugurated in Japan the policy of mass incarcerations.

zh: 只是近年来，日本和澳大利亚人在国际旅游中所占的份额有了很大的提高（OECD，1986)。
en: It is only in recent years that the Japanese and Australians have significantly increased their shares of international travel (OECD, 1986).

zh: 较近期的数字表明，这种不均匀性一直存在。

en: More recent figures suggest that this unevenness persists.

zh: 1994年，只有近2.5%的国际旅游者来自非洲，1.2%来自中东，0.6%来自南亚。
en: In 1994 only 2.5 per cent of international tourists came from Africa, 1.2 per cent from the Middle East and 0.6 per cent from South Asia.

zh: 生产和销售网络的全球化指的是世界主要经济域内公司活动和贸易网络的延伸。
en: The globalization of production and distribution networks refers to the stretching of corporate activity and business networks across the world's major economic regions.

zh: 其最直观和制度化的形式是巨型跨国公司组织和管理跨国商业活动，这种活动是借助于在不同国家拥有工厂、出口和附属公司来实现的。
en: In its most visible and institutionalized form it involves the operations of huge MNCs organizing and managing cross-border business activity through the ownership of plants, outlets or subsidiaries in different countries.

zh: 另一方面，许多跨国公司为追求价廉物美的产品（见上面第3章）而将消耗大量资源的产品向国外的中小企业转移（“分割价值链”）。
en: On the other hand, many MNCs now outsource production to SMEs abroad ('slicing up the value chain') to achieve cheap high-quality production (see chapter 3 above).

zh: 在此过程中形成的全球生产网络或系统涉及的不是直接所有权，而是相当规范的契约关系。
en: In the process global production networks or systems are created which involve not direct ownership but rather regularized contractual relationships.

zh: 这就减少了运作成本，而且使经营活动符合客户的特殊需要。
en: This reduces operating costs and it allows deals to be tailored to clients' specific needs.

zh: 虽然它表明资本经营脱离了传统信贷，但是银行在筹划和分销债券过程中起着关键的作用。

en: While this represents a move away from traditional bank lending, banks often play a key role in arranging and underwriting these bond issues.

zh: 这种交易对银行很有吸引力，因为它是“资金平衡表外的”（即不包括在银行标准资产和债务中），因此，不受国家中央银行对银行有价证券的限制的影响。
en: Such business is attractive to banks because it is "off-balance sheet" (that is, not included in banks' standard assets and liabilities) and therefore not subject to the restrictions national central banks place on banks' portfolios.

zh: 在消除了一些疑团后，我们可以得出这徉一个结论：美国南北战争是可被称之为城市或资产阶级民主革命中的最后一次攻势。
en: The conclusion, reached after much uncertainty, amounts to the statement that the American Civil War was the last revolutionary offensive on the part of what one may legitimately call urban or bourgeois capitalist democracy.

zh: 再次应该说明一点：种植园蓄奴制并不是工业资本主义发展的经济桎梏。
en: Plantation slavery in the South, it is well to add right away, was not an economic fetter upon industrial capitalism.

zh: 如果说它对工业资本主义有什么影响的话，它并未起阻碍作用，与之相反，它促进了早期工业的发展。
en: If anything, the reverse may have been true; it helped to promote American industrial growth in the early stages.

zh: 但是，奴隶制的存在对于政治民主和社会民主的建立，是一道障碍。
en: But slavery was an obstacle to a political and social democracy.

zh: 这种理解不够明确。
en: There are ambiguities in this interpretation.

zh: 有些模糊不清的理解是论据本身引起的，它们将在我后面的分析中重点谈到；有些则更加隐晦，无论拿出多少证据也无法使它变得清晰，这一点大家在本章末还可看到。
en: Those that stem from the character of the evidence are best discussed as the analysis proceeds.Others lie deeper and, as I shall try to show at the end of the chapter, would not disappear no matter what evidence came to light.

zh: 美国在一定程度上跨越了这些趋势。
en: America stands somewhat astride of these trends.

zh: 从美国诞生之日起，种族划分和民族认同就是一个有争议的领域。
en: Ethnicity and national identity have been a contested terrain since the inception of the USA.

zh: 而且，由于新的移民浪潮以及60年代出现的一浪高过一浪的公民权抗议运动，美国旧的主张社会同化的熔炉式认同模式开始被拋弃。
en: Moreover, the rejection of the older assimilationist melting-pot model of American identity was initiated not by new waves of immigration but by the explosive protests of the civil rights movement in the 1960s.

zh: 因此、后面各章的最后两个部分都将努力把对每个领域中全球化的形态和历史的分析与6个发达资本主义国家的命运联系在一起。
en: Accordingly, the penultimate and concluding sections of subsequent chapters will seek to relate the analysis of the shape and history of globalization in each domain to the fate of the six SIACS.

zh: 这将涉及到对它们卷入各领域的不同程度进行专门分析，并且检验它对国家主权和自主性的影响。
en: This will involve a specific exploration of their differential levels of global enmeshment in each domain and an examination of its implications for state sovereignty and autonomy.

zh: 我们分析的首要目的是提供一个对当代全球化的本质和不同的政治影响更系统的理解。
en: The primary purpose of this analysis is to deliver a more systematic understanding of the nature and differential political consequences of contemporary globalization.

zh: 出于比较的目的，也会提到其他国家，特别是发展中国家，但只在有关的情况下才这样做。
en: For comparative purposes, other individual states --- particularly those with developing economies --- will be referred to and discussed only where relevant.

zh: 技术差异、规模经济和生产要素相对供应的差异促进了贸易的发展。
en: Trade is driven by technological differences, scale economies and differences in the relative supplies of factors of production.

zh: 在古典金本位时代，存在着工资水平国际融合的趋势。
en: During the classical Gold Standard period there was a marked international convergence in wages.

zh: 当国家间交换采用同样的技术生产不同的商品时，这种融合就导致了生产的专业化，第二次世界大战后贸易的性质己经改变了这些趋势。
en: Such convergence arose from increasing specialization as countries exchanged dissimilar goods produced with broadly similar technology.The nature of postwar trade has modified these trends.

zh: 如前所述，第二次世界大战后大多数发达国家间的贸易都集中在相似的产品上，而这些国家的生产力水平已大体持平。
en: As noted, much of the postwar trade between developed countries has been in similar products, while these countries have converged in productivity levels.

zh: 这样，即便战后发达国家的工资水平有明显的趋同，这也应归功于生产力水平的均衡，而不是因为贸易（Dollar 和 Wolff，1993；Wolff，1997)。
en: Thus, although there has been a marked convergence in postwar wage levels among developed countries, this has been due to the convergence in productivity levels rather than to trade (Dollar and Wolff, 1993; Wolff, 1997).

zh: 在专制主义达到顶峰的时候，其内部的矛盾与谬误也日益明显化，不求助于官位的出售，“吗哪（这是一种圣经中所说的神赐食——译者注）不会从天而降”。
en: At the height of absolutism the contradictions and paradoxes of the system were already visible.

zh: 路易十四也许必须通过大财团来筹得资金从而获得国民的支持。
en: Without resort to the sale of offices, "the manna that never fails," Louis XIV would probably have had to seek the consent of the nation through the Estates General to raise money.

zh: 因此，官位出售的根源在于国王对贵族的独立性，以及不受任何国会的控制。
en: Hence the sale of offices was at the root of the king’s independence of the aristocracy, of any effective control by a parliament.

zh: 这种独立性是王权专制主义的主要支柱。
en: It was the key prop of royal absolutism.

zh: 虽然发展中国家的国际信贷总量在80年代大幅度下跌，90年代保持较低水平，但在70年代，它却占有世界总量的1/4〜1/3。
en: During the 1970s developing countries accounted for between a quarter and a third of total international bank loans, although this declined in the 1980s, remaining low until the mid-1990s.

zh: 从那时起，发展中国家的国内金融市场向国际投资者开放，这些国家和转轨经济体吸引了大量的资金流入。
en: Since then domestic financial markets in developing countries have been opened up to international investors and these countries, alongside transition economies, have received significant financial inflows.

zh: 最突出的是，拉丁美洲重新获得进入私人国际资本市场的权利，所以，1983〜1989年间1160亿美元的净流出变成了1990〜1994年2000亿美元的净输入。
en: Most notably, Latin America has regained access to private international capital markets so that net outflows over 1983-9 of $116 billion have switched to net inflows of $200 billion over 1990-4.

zh: 关于国际资本市场连续性的数据只是到了70年代才真正出现。
en: Consistent data on international capital markets really only commence in the 1970s.

zh: 这不仅仅是一个统计上的意外事件，而且直接反映了此间国际资本市场的迅速扩张。
en: This is more than a statistical accident and directly reflects the huge expansion of these markets in this period.

zh: 从60年代很低的水平起，私人资本流量增长了，因此1997年新发放的国际贷款和债券净额总量已达8900亿美元，而未偿还的贷款和债券存量在1998年3月总量达76350亿美元（BIS,1998a)。
en: From negligible levels in the 1960s, private capital flows grew so that in 1997 the total net new issues of international loans and bonds amounted to $890 billion while stocks of outstanding loans and bonds totalled $7,635 billion in March 1998 (BIS, 1998a).

zh: 因为资本主义的扩展己经带来了经济货币化。所以今天的金融全球化已经涉及到了一个金融深化的过程。其中，世界金融市场的动力直接影响到几乎所有经济的日常运作和组织。
en: As the spread of capitalism has brought with it the monetization of economies, financial globalization today has involved a process of financial deepening in that the dynamics of world financial markets reach directly into the day-to-day functioning and organization of all but a few economies.

zh: 在这方面，国内利率和汇率受到全球金融市场的严重制约。
en: In this respect domestic interest rates and exchange rates are significantly conditioned by the operation of global financial markets.

zh: 尽管资本流量在经合发国家的集中度有所下降，但是把这看作世界金融市场在全球扩张并产生全球影响则是误导性的。
en: The concentration of capital flows in OECD states, though diminishing, is therefore a misleading indicator of the global reach and impact of world financial markets.

zh: 对于国家主权的效力的挑战可以被另一个领域正在出现的规则进一步说明：管理环境及自然资源使用的法律。
en: The challenge to the efficacy of state sovereignty can be illustrated further by another arena of emerging regulation: the law governing the environment and the use of natural resources.

zh: 在这一领域里，对于传统的规制领土与资源分配的原则已提出了质疑。
en: In this domain there has been a questioning of the traditional principles regulating the appropriation of territory and resources.

zh: 古典的威斯特伐利亚国际法的核心，即将土地、海洋和空气置于国家主权权威的控制之下被认为是合法现象，“任何拥有领土并对其成功地实施了实际的控制的主体就取得了一种合法的所有权” (参见Cassese，1996,第376〜377页）。
en: At the heart of classical Westphalian international law, the earth, sea and air were recognized as phenomena legitimately falling under the sovereign authority of states on the condition that "whoever possessed a territory and exercised actual control over it successfully secured a legal title" (see Cassese, 1986, pp. 376-7).

zh: 在御宇48 年之后，万历皇帝平静地离开了人间。他被安葬在他亲自参与设计的定陵里，安放在孝端皇后和孝靖皇后即恭妃王氏的棺椁之间。
en: After reigning for forty-eight years, the Wan-li emperor died peacefully and was buried, along with his empress and Lady Wang, in the mausoleum that he himself had helped to design.

zh: 他所宠爱的贵妃郑氏比他多活了10 年。
en: The woman he loved, Lady Cheng, was left behind to outlive him for ten years.

zh: 由于她被认定是国家的妖孽，她得不到任何人的同情。这10 年，她住在紫禁城里一座寂寞的冷宫中，和她的爱子福王永远睽离。
en: Accused of every sort of intrigue and considered a curse on the empire, she was forced to spend her old age in a desolate lodge within the Forbidden City, separated forever from her beloved son, Prince Fu, cause of all the controversy.

zh: 外地对初级产品出口的需求是许多富有自然资源的发展中国家增长的主要根源，也是较发达的初级品出口国如澳大利亚、加拿大、阿根廷和南非经济增长的主要原因。
en: Elsewhere demand for primary exports was a major source of growth for many developing countries rich in natural resources and for the more developed primary exporters of the time, notably Australia, Canada, Argentina and South Africa.

zh: 对这些国家商品的需求直接有助于经济增长，并且刺激了这些国家加工业的发展。
en: Demand for their goods contributed directly to growth and stimulated the development of associated processing industries.

zh: 各国政府利用出口收入来进行主要的基础设施建设，这种建设通常是借助于预支未来出口收入的方式来支撑的。
en: Governments used export revenues to undertake major infrastructure projects, often supplemented by borrowing abroad against future export earnings.

zh: 然而，随着发达国家先行一步放开对通信业的管制，一个多国公司组成的跨国联盟出现了要求实行更自由的国际电信规制。
en: However, as deregulation of the communications sectors in advanced economies has proceeded apace, a transnational coalition of multinational corporations has emerged to press for a more liberal international telecommunications regime.

zh: 由于依赖廉价的通信服务的国际金融和银行利益集团的支持，要求进一步背离平等的决策程序，追求一个更为自由化的全球通信市场的压力也非常大。
en: Backed also by a transnational community of finance and banking interests, which are reliant on cheap communications, the pressures for liberalization of the global communications market-to move further away from equity in decision-making-remain intense.

zh: 1998年2月5日生效的世界贸易组织关于基础电信业国际服务的贸易自由化协议将这一压力推向高峰，作了最为清楚的表达。
en: These pressures reached their clearest expression in the run-up to the WTO agreement to liberalize international trade in basic telecommunications services which came into effect on 5 February 1998.

zh: 这种自由贸易制度的一个影响在于它使武器在国际体系中扩散到更大范围。
en: One of the consequences of this free trade regime was that arms were diffused ever more widely throughout the interstate system.

zh: 帝国的征服以及日益发展的全国贸易和通信基础设施，增进了私营武器制造商全球性出口的前景。
en: Imperial conquest, combined with an increasingly well-developed global trade and communication infrastructure, enhanced the global export prospects of private arms manufacturers.

zh: 结果，南美、亚洲、远东和非洲的市场都越来越与欧洲的武器出口商接轨。
en: As a result, markets in South America, Asia, the Near East and Africa became increasingly accessible to European arms exporters.

zh: 而且，现代民族国家获得了一种特殊的政治形式——它的主要变量具体化为自由民主或代议制民主。
en: Moreover, the modern nation-state has acquired a particular political form---its main variant has crystallized as liberal or representative democracy.

zh: 自由民主当然意味着影响一个共同体的决定是由该共同体中一小部分代表产生的，这些代表通过法律上的选举程序被挑选出来，即合法化，并在法治框架的基础上实施管理。
en: Liberal democracy means, of course, that decisions affecting a community are taken by a subgroup of representatives who have been chosen, that is legitimated, through the electoral process to govern within the framework of the rule of law.

zh: 在国家政治的竞技场上，自由民主是以一大堆规则和制度的存在为显著特征的，这些规则和制度是自由民主成功运转必不可少的条件。
en: In the arena of national politics, liberal democracy is distinguished by the presence of a cluster of rules and institutions all of which are necessary to its successful functioning; without any of these, liberal democracy cannot be fully realized.

zh: 到处都是梅特涅的密探，搜寻着自由主义者或民族主义者密谋的证据。
en: Metternich’s spies were everywhere, searching for evidence of liberal or nationalist plots.

zh: 梅特涅在1815年有点担心过度了。
en: Metternich worried too much in 1815.

zh: 尽管自由主义和民族主义都在徳意志诸邦国和奥地利帝国出现了，但由于中欧还是倾向于接受土地贵族阶级和专制的、中央集权化的君主的统治，两种意识形态在起初都还很弱小。
en: Although both liberalism and nationalism emerged in the German states and the Austrian Empire, they were initially weak as central Europe tended to remain under the domination of aristocratic landowning classes and autocratic, centralized monarchies.

zh: 在女真族建立的金朝，与中国古代历代王朝一样，宗室作为统治者的血亲成员会享受到诸多优厚的经济待遇。
en: In the Chin Dynasty, similar to other cases of Chinese dynasties, the royal clans who were the kin of the emperors, had a variety of economic privileges.

zh: 宗室成员因此大多过上了富裕的生活，但也有部分宗亲的生活由于种种原因并不富足。
en: Taking advantage of these economic privileges provided by the state, most royal clans lived an affluent life.However, some royal clan's life was still difficult as a result of some reasons.

zh: 出于追求财富的天性，宗室成员中也常有经济犯罪行为发生。
en: Due to the human nature of pursuing wealth, some people of the royal clans might also commit crimes for economic benefits.

zh: 金朝宗室阶层后期，汉化程度加深，生活奢靡，其对财富的追求和渴望加深也应该看做是金朝走向覆灭的原因之一。
en: In the later stage of the Chin Dynasty, as the sinicization of royal clans went deep, they pursued an even more luxurious life, which should also be regarded as one of the factors that resulted in the downfall of their country.

zh: 这种奇特的历史渊源所产生的两个主要思想构成了《社会发展纲要》的中心原则。
en: This bizarre parentage has produced two main ideas that constitute the central doctrines of the "Community Development Program".

zh: 其一是印度农民会渴望经济进步，一旦他们感受到了经济进步的好处，他们就会靠自己的努力去发展经济。
en: One is that India’s peasants will want economic progress and sustain it through their own efforts as soon as they have been shown its advantages.

zh: 第二个原则是，变化必须而且必将随民主方式而来，也就是说，新的变化将切实地反映农民的要求，农民将通过某种方式参与规划更好的生活。
en: The other theme is that the changes must and will come about democratically, that is, in response to the "felt needs" —a favorite phrase - of India’s villagers, who will somehow be able to participate in the planning of a better life for all.

zh: 与《世界人权宣言》 及其以后的《联合国权利公约》相比， 《欧洲公约》关注的关注点不同。正如其前言所指出的，“采取首要的步骤以共同实施《世界人权宣言》（所阐述的某些权利）”。
en: In marked contrast to the "Universal Declaration of Human Rights" and the subsequent UN Covenants on Rights, the European Convention was concerned, as its preamble states, ‘to take the first steps for the collective enforcement of certain of the rights stated in the Universal Declaration’.

zh: 欧洲这一创举从建立之初至今仍然是最彻底的立法创新：抵制国家历史的潮流，允许公民个人采取行动反对他们自己的政府。
en: The European initiative was and remains a most radical legal innovation: an innovation which, against the stream of state history, allows individual citizens to initiate proceedings against their own governments.

zh: 在这一框架里，国家不能再随意地对待它们自己的公民（Capotorti，1983，第977页）。
en: Within this framework, states are no longer free to treat their own citizens as they think fit (Capotorti, 1983, p. 977).

zh: 第三，近年来，由于技术和规范的变迁，这些转变正在逐渐加快。
en: Third, these shifts have been accelerated in recent years by technological and regulatory changes.

zh: 最重要的技术变化就是卫星和有线电视的出现。
en: The most important technological shifts have been the advent of satellite and cable television.

zh: 例如，在欧洲，如果将有线电视和卫星算在内，1988〜1993年这5年的时间内，其频道的数量已经从104个增加到165个，而在欧盟国家范围内，其频道数量从77个增加到129个（IDATE，1993，第39页）。
en: When cable and satellite are included, the number of channels in Europe, for example, increased in the five years from 1988 to 1993 from 104 to 165 and within the EU from 77 to 129 (IDATE, 1993, p. 39).

zh: 在1997年，欧洲电视广播的频道总数量已增加到250多个（《银屏摘要》，1997a）。
en: In 1997, the total number of channels broadcasting in Europe had risen to over 250 (Screen Digest, 1997a).

zh: 最后，土地贵族也无须镇压农民，他们的目的无非是农民在进入商品化农业的过程中不要碍手碍脚。总之，经济手段足以提供他们所需要的劳动力。
en: Finally, the landed upper classes themselves did not need to repress the peasants.Mainly they wanted to get them out of the way in order to go over to commercial farming; by and large, economic measures would be enough to provide the labor force they needed.

zh: 这种特殊形式的经济成功，使他们几乎没有必要借助强制手段延续其统治地位。
en: Succeeding economically in this particular fashion, they had little need to resort to repressive political measures to continue their leadership.

zh: 因此，英国的制造业和农业利益在19世纪的其余时间里为争取公众支持展开角逐，双方分庭抗礼，以种种自私自利的措施彼此攻击，互争短长（如1832年改革法、废除谷物法、乡绅支持工厂立法等等）
en: Therefore in England manufacturing and agrarian interests competed with one another for popular favor during the rest of the nineteenth century, gradually extending the suffrage while jealously opposing and knocking down each other’s more selfish measures (Reform Bill of 1832, abolition of the Corn Laws in 1846, gentry support for factory legislation, etc).

zh: 在政治方面，起义的结果是使立法议会（它在1791年10月代替了制宪议会）实际上放弃了它的职权，并废黜了国王（这一点到1792年底才真正做到）。
en: In national politics the consequence was the virtual abdication of the Legislative Assembly, which had replaced the Constituent Assembly in October 1791; the trial of Louis XVI, which did not take place until the end of 1792; and, more immediately, popular vengeance in the September 1792 massacres.

zh: 更为直接的是，起义带来了1792年9月大屠杀时期的普遍报复，这些屠杀似乎是作为一种自发的民众活动而开始的。
en: These massacres appear to have started about as spontaneously as mass actions ever do.

zh: 大群的市民抓住并处决了在警察押护下的犯人。
en: A waiting crowd seized and summarily executed a batch of prisoners under escort.

zh: 后来屠杀又扩展至监狱，大约有1100至1400人丧生，其中绝大部分是普通的盗贼、妓女、伪造犯和游民。
en: Then the massacres spread to the jails.Between 1100 and 1400 lost their lives, the great majority common thieves, prostitutes, forgers, and vagrants.

zh: 大约仅有1/4的被杀者是牧师、贵族或各种各样的“政治犯”。
en: Only about a quarter were priests, nobles, or "politicals" of any sort.

zh: 类似的情形在法国其他城市和集镇中也出现了。
en: Similar scenes took place in other French cities and towns.

zh: 这种屠杀的意义在于，它显示了一种盲目的非理性的普遍报复行为，而下一阶段将要出现的恐怖行动（上述拫复行为不过是它的一个序幕）则变得更有组织，其结果也更为确定了。
en: The massacres are significant mainly as revealing the blindness and irrationality of popular vengeance.The Terror, of which they were a prelude and which appeared in the next phase, was more organized and less capricious in its results.

zh: 还有许多规模较小的商业企业愿意出口军事生产技术或把民用技术用于军事方面。
en: There were also a host of other smaller commercial concerns willing to export military production technology or civil technologies with military applications.

zh: 20世纪初，俄国在一些重要的欧洲武器生产制造商的直接帮助下实现了军事生产能力的现代化（Krause，1992，第66页）。
en: Russia modernized its military production capability at the turn of the century with the direct assistance of the major European arms producers (Krause, 1992, p. 66).

zh: 日本、中国、意大利、奥匈帝国、奥斯曼帝国、西班牙和拉丁美洲一些新独立的国家也都从国外进口军事技术，并将其作为实现经济现代化的一个战略（Mc.Neill，1982；Krause，1992）。
en: Likewise Japan, China, Italy, Austro-Hungary, the Ottoman Empire, Spain and newly independent nations in Latin America imported foreign military technology as part of a strategy of economic modernization (McNeill, 1982; Krause, 1992).

zh: 早期罗马社会构成最显著的是划分成贵族与平民两大阶级。
en: The most noticeable element in the social organization of early Rome was the division between two groups--the patricians and the plebeians.

zh: 罗马贵族由王政时代委任的最早元老的后代家族组成。
en: The patrician class in Rome consisted of families who were descended from the original senators appointed during the period of the kings.

zh: 他们最初的政治优势地位可能源于他们作为大地主拥有财富。
en: Their initial prominence was probably due to their wealth as great landowners.

zh: 这样贵族就构成了贵族统治集团。
en: Thus patricians constituted an aristocratic governing class.

zh: 只有他们才能当选最高执政官、执法官和元老。
en: Only they could be consuls, other magistrates, and senators.

zh: 因为蓄养大量的门客，他们控制了百人大会以及罗马社会的诸多方面。
en: Through their patronage of large numbers of dependent clients, they could control the centuriate assembly and many other facets of Roman life.

zh: 控制反人道的战争和犯罪的规则体系主要针对的是战争中反人民的暴力犯罪。
en: The rule systems governing warfare and crimes against humanity are mainly concerned with the perpetration of violence against people during war.

zh: 但是，许多针对个人的暴力迫害的形式以及许多权力滥用的形式并非发生在公开的战争行为之中。
en: However, many forms of violence perpetrated against individuals, and many forms of abuse of power, do not take place during declared acts of war.

zh: 事实上，最近已认为，战争与和平之间的区别，以及压迫与反抗之间的区別，已被变化的暴力模式消蚀了（Kaldor，1998）。
en: In fact, it has recently been argued that the distinctions between war and peace, and between aggression and repression, are eroded by changing patterns of violence (Kaldor, 1998).

zh: 很明显，这6个国家在过去的50年里都已改变了其卷入全球政治的状态和形式。
en: It is readily apparent that the enmeshment of each of the six countries in global politics has changed shape and form over the last five decades.

zh: 尽管各国在战争刚刚结束时有很大的差异，但事实上，它们都已废弃了以前的殖民协定，其中4个是北约的成员，瑞典最近加入了一个与北约相关的组织——“和平伙伴关系”。
en: While each of the countries began life very differently in the immediate postwar years, they have practically all shed their previous colonial commitments, four are members of NATO and Sweden recently joined a linked NATO programme, the Partnership for Peace.

zh: 另外，有4个国家现在是欧盟的成员，所有的国家都是国家与全球政治的主要行动者——尽管其对政府间组织和国际非政府组织的参与程度不同。
en: In addition, four countries are now members of the European Union, and all are major players - albeit with somewhat different levels of enmeshment in IGOs and INGOs - in international and global politics.

zh: 北美自由贸易区是在美国、加拿大和墨西哥之间建立的自由贸易区，它没有对其他地区釆用保护政策。亚太经合组织或东盟也是如此（Petri，1983）。
en: NAFTA is a free trade area between the USA, Canada and Mexico, and has not increased protection against the rest of the world; nor has APEC or ASEAN (Petri, 1993).

zh: 事实表明，贸易区域化是区域间贸易的补充，或与区域间贸易并驾齐驱。
en: The evidence suggests that trade regionalization is complementary to, and has grown alongside, interregional trade.

zh: 许多德国人和西方人对南朝鲜会落入北朝鲜的共产主义力量的控制之下的忧虑，使他们担心西德本身的安全，这就使许多人提出要重新武装西徳。
en: The fear that South Korea might fall to the Communist forces of the North led many Germans and Westerners to worry about the security of West Germany and led to calls for the rearmament of West Germany.

zh: 尽管很多人都担心德国军国主义复活，谴责了这种提议，但冷战的压力是决定性的。
en: Although many people, concerned about a revival of German militarism, condemned this proposal, Cold War tensions were decisive.

zh: 1955年，西德重新武装起来，成为北约的一员。
en: West Germany rearmed in 1955 and became a member of NATO.

zh: 全球化也强化了社会的“本土化”和“国家化”。
en: It may also reinforce the "localization" and "nationalization" of societies.

zh: 因此，全球化涉及到政治经济权力复杂的解领土化和再领土化。
en: Accordingly, globalization involves a complex deterritorialization and reterritorialization of political and economic power.

zh: 从这个角度，最好把全球化理解为“无领土的”。
en: In this respect, it is best described as being aterritorial.

zh: 在发展中国家，这种影响可能会大些。非关税壁垒对发展中国家贸易影响很大，原因是这些国家在农业、纺织和其他几个工业部门具有比较优势（Page，1994，第3章）。
en: They are probably higher in developing countries and have a greater impact on their trade since they are particularly prevalent in agricultural, textiles and several other industrial sectors in which many developing countries have a comparative advantage (Page, 1994, ch. 3).

zh: 再者，受非贸易壁垒影响的产品只占发展中国家出口的一小部分。乌拉圭回合谈判的一个结果就是这些壁垒已经削减，特别是逐渐结束限制纺织品贸易的多种纤维协议。
en: Again, they appear to cover only a minority of the exports of developing countries and some of these barriers have been reduced as a result of the Uruguay Round, notably with the phasing out of the Multi-fibre Agreement which limits textiles trade.

zh: 在西欧，战后早期的迁移通常是区域性的。
en: In Western Europe, early postwar migration was often regional in its scope.

zh: 欧洲国家后来才卷入到范围更加广泛的迁移中。
en: European countries then became enmeshed in more extensive migrations.

zh: 在20世纪50年代和60年代，比利时、法国、德国和瑞士开始积极雇佣海外劳工，首先吸收的是南欧外围围家的移民，然后逐渐扩展深入到土耳其和北非。
en: In the 1950s and 1960s, Belgium, France, Germany and Switzerland began active programmes of overseas labour recruitment, drawing first on the Southern European periphery before extending their reach to Turkey and North Africa.

zh: 资本主义的出现是划时代的。
en: The emergence of capitalism was epoch making.

zh: 它不仅影响了经济，还影响了人们生活的方方面面。
en: It affected not merely the economic but all aspects of life.

zh: 尽管货币在中世纪还处于边缘，很少使用，但到中世纪晚期它已经为欧洲日后流星般的崛起提供了能量。
en: Whereas in the early Middle Ages money had been peripheral and little used, by the late Middle Ages it provided energy that was responsible for Europe's future meteoric rise.

zh: 在此前的社会和经济体制中，没有一个是建立在成长的观念上的——它们的目的只是保持、而不是提高过去物质生活的水平——但是资本主义却恰恰与之相反。
en: No earlier societies or economic systems had been based on the notion of growth.Their aim had been only to maintain the material well-being of the past rather than to enhance it.

zh: 然而，这是一个制度化的体制，其中国际货币基金组织监督着国际金融秩序的规则应用。
en: It was, however, an institutionalized system in that the IMF policed the rules of the international financial order.

zh: 国际货币基金组织监督着该体制的运作，监控着国家的经济运行，并准备预防措施以“拯救”存在收支平衡困难的国家。
en: The IMF oversaw the operation of the system, monitoring countries, economic performance and providing reserve facilities to ‘bail out' countries that experienced balance of payments difficulties.

zh: 为防止两次世界大战之间毁灭性的贬值竞争，面临短期收支赤字的国家可以自动获得贷款，数额等于它参加基金组织时获得的成员配额（根据它们缴纳的资金规定）。
en: To prevent the disastrous competitive devaluations of the interwar period, countries facing a short-term balance of payments deficit could draw automatically on a loan equivalent to their initial membership quota (fixed in relation to their IMF subscription).

zh: 这造成了一种非常严重的安全困境：各国竭力通过增加或改进它们的军事能力追求它们自己的安全，这“将很容易威胁到其他国家对权力和安全的渴望”（Buzan 1991；也可参见本书1.2和1.3部分）。
en: This creates a severe security dilemma in that through simply pursuing their own security, by adding to or improving their military capability, states 'can easily threaten the power and security aspirations of other states' (Buzan, 1991; and see sections 1.2 and 1.3 above).

zh: 由于潜在竞争对手都通以相同的行为方式作出反应，其结果是造成国际不安全的螺旋式上升。
en: The consequence is a spiral of international insecurity as potential rivals respond in a like manner.

zh: 因此，在一个无政府的国际体系中，国家安全永远无法从全球的系统环境中完全脱离出来。问题：搭配不当，建议增译。“不安全”此处作为一个名词与“上升”搭配不当。改1：其结果是不安全感的螺旋式上升。
en: Accordingly, national security, in an anarchic interstate system, can never be disentangled entirely from global systemic conditions.

zh: 列宁认为士兵、工人和农民苏维埃是现成的权力工具。
en: Lenin maintained that the soviets of soldiers, workers, and peasants were ready-made instruments of power.

zh: 布尔什维克必须努力控制这些团体，然后运用它们来推翻临时政府。
en: The Bolsheviks must work toward gaining control of these groups and then use them to overthrow the provisional government.

zh: 同时，布尔什维克清晰地表达了人民的不满和愿望，保证要结束战争，为所有的农民重分土地，将工厂从资本家手中转移到工人委员会手中，并将政府权力从临时政府手中剥夺掉，使其转归苏维埃。
en: At the same time, the Bolsheviks articulated the discontent and aspirations of the people, promising an end to the war, redistribution of all land to the peasants, the transfer of factories and industries from capitalists to committees of workers, and the relegation of government power from the provisional government to the soviets.

zh: 三条简明的口号总结出布尔什维克的计划：“和平、土地、面包”，“工人控制生产”和“一切权力归苏维埃”。
en: Three simple slogans summed up the Bolshevik program: “Peace, Land, Bread,” “Worker Control of Production,” and “All Power to the Soviets.”

zh: 随着冷战的到来，以原子弹和其他大规模杀伤性武器等为对象的裁军计划获得新的动力。
en: With the onset of the Cold War a new impetus for disarmament arose in the form of the atomic bomb and other weapons of mass destruction.

zh: 结果，战后进行了最持久、最频繁的也是挫折最多的多边军备控制谈判（不仅包括大面积杀伤性武器，还包括常规武器）。
en: As a result, the postwar period has witnessed the most sustained, intensive - as well as frustrated - attempts at multilateral control not just of weapons of mass destruction, but of conventional arms too.

zh: 军备控制成为国际政治的一个永久性特征。
en: Arms control has become a permanent feature of international politics.

zh: 世界各大国都设有军备控制和裁军机构来管理这一连续的外交过程，设在日内瓦的联合国裁军大会也保证军备控制问题一直处在全球安全议程的核心地位。
en: Agencies for arms control and disarmament (or sections within foreign ministries) exist within all the worlds major states, managing what has become a continuous diplomatic process.A permanent UN Disarmament Conference in Geneva also ensures that arms control issues are kept high on the global security agenda.

zh: 一个原因是，各省统治者太喜欢优美的京都，往往将他们的权力和职责授予地方部属。
en: One reason for this was the tendency of provincial governors, who were too fond of the pleasures of Kyoto, to delegate their powers and responsibilities to local subordinates.

zh: 另一原因是，有势力的地方家族和佛教团体对土地总是垂涎欲滴，经常用武力强占土地。只要免税制度继续存在，他们就想开垦荒地。
en: Another was that powerful local families and Buddhist communities were always hungry for land and often able to seize it by force.

zh: 这些倾向使纳税土地的数量减少，意味着拥有耕地的农民的捐税负担增加；于是这些农民或是逃亡北部边境地区，用武力赶走住居在那里的虾夷人，或是将自己连同土地一起交托给拥有采邑的贵族。
en: These trends reduced the amount of taxpaying land, which meant an increased tax load for the peasant owner-cultivators.The latter in turn either fled to the northern frontier areas where the Ainu were being pushed back by force of arms, or else they commended themselves and their lands to lords of manors.

zh: 最后，封臣在下列情况下有提供帮助或者资助的义务：领主的长子行骑士礼、领主的长女出嫁以及一旦领主被俘后将他赎出等。相应地，领主对封臣也承担职责。
en: Finally, vassals were also responsible for aids, or financial payments to the lord on a number of occasions, including the knighting of the lord’s eldest son, the marriage of his eldest daughter, and the ransom of the lord’s person in the event he was captured.

zh: 他的主要义务是军事上保护他不受侵害，或者在法庭上给与必要的支持。
领主通常通过授给采邑的方式解决封臣的日常开支。
问题：原文信息漏译改1：最后，封臣在下列情况下有提供帮助或者资助的义务：领主的长子行骑士礼、领主的长女出嫁以及一旦领主被俘后将他赎出等。
相应地，领主对封臣也承担职责。
en: In turn, a lord had responsibilities toward his vassals.

zh: 他的主要义务是军事上保护他不受侵害，或者在法庭上给与必要的支持。
en: His major obligation was to protect his vassal, either by defending him militarily or by taking his side in a court of law if necessary.

zh: 领主也有义务通过授给采邑的方式解决封臣的日常开支。
en: The lord was also responsible for the maintenance of the vassal, usually by granting him a fief.

zh: 定期贸易需要制度化结构来保障交易中的产权。
en: Regular trade needs institutional structures to secure property rights in exchange.

zh: 货物集散港口是传统上组织贸易的商人团体的基地。
en: Entrepot ports were home to merchant communities which traditionally organized trade.

zh: 商人们对当前和未来的货场状况作详细的判断，以在各地区间调剂货物的价格。
en: Merchants made sophisticated judgements about current and future market conditions, leading to some convergence in the prices of commodities between areas.

zh: 但是正义战争的教义对于世俗权的影响非常有限，而且它经常被用于使欧洲的内部征服和外部征服合法化。
en: But the just war doctrine - jus ad bellum - had only limited impact on secular powers and was used to legitimize both intra-European and extra-European conquest.

zh: 这部分是因为国家仍只是一个空壳，那时没有常备军，而且战争的行为主要是一种私人的事务。
en: In part this was because states were still rather hollow shells, there were no standing armies and the conduct of war was a largely private affair.

zh: 正式的外交体系的发展以及国家垄断的巩固为更加全面和系统管制战争行为的尝试提供了制度基础。
en: The development of formal systems of diplomacy and the consolidation of the states' monopoly over the means of violence provided the institutional infrastructure for more comprehensive and systematic attempts to regulate the conduct of war.

zh: 古典希腊的宗教是城邦生活的一个组成部分，渗透到城邦生活的每一方面。
en: Religion in classical Greece was an integral part of polis life and accordingly affected every aspect of that life.

zh: 它解释了物质世界、日常献祭活动和各种社会制度，也是激起诗人和艺术家创作灵感的一个主要源泉。
en: Religion offered an interpretation of the natural world, a consecration of daily work and of social institutions, and was also one of the chief sources of inspiration for poets and artists.

zh: 每一座希腊庙宇都是地方文化和民族文化的中心。
en: Every Greek temple was a focus of local and national culture.

zh: 对于所有的民族或共同体来说，它们经历的全球相互联系程度不同，而且方式也不同。
en: So too is the association of globalization with 'universalism' for clearly the global is not a synonym for the universal; global interconnectedness is not experienced by all peoples or communities to the same extent or even in the same way.

zh: 从这个角度也要把全球化与趋同区别开来，为全球化不认为同质化和和谐不断增强。
en: In this respect, it is also to be distinguished from convergence since it does not presume growing homogeneity or harmony.

zh: 相反，正如布尔和布赞两人所说，相互联系的不断加强既是强烈冲突（而不是合作）的根源，也是共同忧虑和深刻敌意的结果（Bull，1977; Buzan，1991）。
en: On the contrary, as both Bull and Buzan have argued, growing interconnectedness may be both a source of intense conflict (rather than cooperation) as well as a product of shared fears and deeply held animosities (Bull, 1977; Buzan, 1991).

zh: 随着苏联的解体，美国现在正如它在战后初期那样主导着武器供应业。
en: With the demise of the Soviet Union the US now dominates, as in the immediate postwar period, the arms supply business.

zh: 即使如此，现在与1945年时相比武器供应国更多了。随着世界大多数地区军事开支的减少，它们对武器出口的竞争也就更为激烈。
