en: Even so, many more arms suppliers exist today than in 1945 and with defence expenditures in most parts of the world in decline the competition for arms exports is intense.

zh: 18世纪欧洲纺织品生产的一个重要组成部分就是村舍工业，这是一种真正的家庭企业。
en: One important source of textile production in the eighteenth century was the cottage industry, truly a family enterprise.

zh: 图中显示的是一个家庭正在生产毛织品。
en: Shown here is a family at work producing knitwear.

zh: 村舍工业中的一个惯例就是妇女纺纱并将其缠起来，男人则在织机上将纱织成布。
en: It was customary in the cottage industry for women to spin and wind the yarn and for men to weave the yarn into cloth on looms.

zh: 当代迁移开始于第二次世界大战结束之时，第二次世界大战的结束导致了大规模人口流动（参看上面6.
en: The contemporary era of migration begins with the end of the Second World War, which induced massive population displacements (see section 6.
2.7 above).

zh: 要勾画战后迁移相互交叉的地理范围以及时间进度是非常复杂的。
en: Charting the overlapping geographies and time-scales of the postwar migrations that followed is complex.

zh: 从强度和地理范围的广度方面来说，最重要的迁移流就是在西欧、大洋洲和北美的经合组织成员国的经济移民。
en: In terms of intensity and geographical extensity, the most significant flows have been the economic migrations to OECD countries, in Western Europe, Oceania and North America.

zh: 然而，这些迁移的性质并不都是一致的。
en: However, these migrations were not all of a piece.

zh: 世界范围的通信网络不仅在陆地上空，而且在海底下建立起来。
en: Worldwide communications networks were installed both over land and under the sea.

zh: 到1900年，在世界各大洋大约铺设1.9万英里的海底电缆。英帝国所有的地区都可以直接同其在伦敦的军事指挥所取得联系 （Headrick，第162页）。
en: By 1900 some 19,000 miles of underwater cable had been laid across the world's oceans and the entire British Empire was connected directly to its military command posts in London (Headrick, 1981, p. 162).

zh: 各种各样的定量指标可以用来帮助勾画军事全球化的时空和组织维度。
en: Various quantitative indicators may be utilized to help map the spatio-temporal and organizational dimensions of military globalization.

zh: 它们包括帝国的扩张范围、外国的军事存在、军事外交代表、军火贸易、军火支出、国防开支、联盟成员数量、军事合作协议、国防工业的联系、军事干预的发生率以及军事援助的模式。
en: These include the reach of imperial expansion; foreign military presence; military diplomatic representation; the arms trade; arms expenditure; defence expenditure; alliance membership; military cooperation agreements; defence industrial linkages; the incidence of military intervention; and patterns of military assistance.
Indicators such as these make it feasible to track significant shifts in historical forms of military globalization and national profiles of enmeshment in the world military order.

zh: 这样一个系统的评估能够对军事全球化的历史形式和历史上的世界军事秩序进行更加全面的勾画和描写。
en: Such a systematic appraisal holds out the prospect of a more comprehensive mapping and representation of both historical forms of military globalization and historical world military orders.

zh: 这种体制的时间边界是模糊的。
en: The historical boundaries of such systems are often somewhat blurred.

zh: 往大处估计，德国这一时期自斯担因改革至第一次世界大战终结；在日本，则从德川幕府垮台到1918年。
en: At a rather generous estimate, one might hold that to this species belong the period from the Stein-Hardenberg reforms in Germany to the end of the First World War and, in Japan, from the fall of the Tokugawa Shogunate to 1918.

zh: 这类专制政府常赋有某种民主色彩，主要体现在拥有一个权力有限的议会。
en: These authoritarian governments acquired some democratic features: notably a parliament with limited powers.

zh: 在19世纪70年代，德国的贸易制度是世界上最自由的制度之一。
en: In the 1870s Germany had one of the most liberal trade regimes in the world.

zh: 到了80年代，这种情况发生了变化。国内生产总值中的贸易份额下降了，并导致了贸易程度降低，如图3-1和图3-2所揭示的那样。
en: This was reversed in the 1880s and trade as a share of GDP fell, leading to declining trade levels, as figures 3.1 and 3.2 reveal.

zh: 随着出口增长，19世纪90年代又恢复了原状，其原因不仅是德国工业的发展，而且还因为鼓励出口的激励政策。
en: These recovered from the 1890s with rising exports, not simply because of the development of German industry but also because of aggressive export promotion policies.

zh: 另一方面，这些问题引起大部分有教养市民的热烈争论。
en: On the other hand, all these questions very definitely agitated a large portion of educated townsfolk.

zh: 贵族正试图通过等级会议来接管国家政权。
en: The nobility was trying - to take over the state through the mechanism of the Estates General, a natural continuation of what they had been trying to do during the so-called feudal reaction.

zh: 他们在这些问题上的勉强妥协使第三等级统一了政治思想，而第三等级本来不过是一种法律标志，用来指郡些既非僧侣又非贵族的阶层。
en: Their reluctance to compromise on these issues made for the moment what was no more than a legal label for all that was neither noble nor clergy -the Tiers Etat -into something resembling a single political mind.

zh: 就其在不同地点的人们之间交换商品和服务这一意义而言，贸易已有很长的历史。
en: Trade in the sense of the exchange of goods and services between people over distance has a long history.

zh: 在正常的长距离旅行成为可能以后，庞大的贸易帝国呈周期性地诞生。
en: Great trading empires have arisen periodically ever since regular long-distance travel became possible.

zh: 但是，国际贸易，即在国家间交换商品和服务，实际上是伴随着民族国家的建立出现的。
en: But international trade, the exchange of goods and services between nations, by definition only emerged with the establishment of the nation-state.

zh: 从第二次世界大战开始，现代民族国家成为全球政治统治的主要类型。
en: Since the Second World War the modern nation-state has become the principal type of political rule across the globe.

zh: 随着非殖民地化运动的开展和苏联帝国的瓦解，民族国家的数目急剧增长。
en: With decolonization and the collapse of the Soviet empire the number of nation-states has grown rapidly (see figure 1.1 below, p. 54).

zh: 而且，现代民族国家获得了一种特殊的政治形式，它的主要变量具体化为自由民主或代议制民主。
en: Moreover, the modern nation-state has acquired a particular political form - its main variant has crystallized as liberal or representative democracy.

zh: 自由民主意味着影响一个共同体的决定是由该共同体中一小部分代表产生的，这些代表通过法律上的选举程序被挑选出来，即合法化，并在法治框架的基础上实施管理。
en: Liberal democracy means, of course, that decisions affecting a community are taken by a subgroup of representatives who have been chosen, that is legitimated, through the electoral process to govern within the framework of the rule of law.

zh: 冷战构建了一个独特的全球权力关系体系。它一方面将全球分裂为对抗的集团，而另一方面又在一个战略上相互联系的世界军事秩序中将其统一起来。
en: The Cold War constituted a unique system of global power relations which, paradoxically, both divided the globe into rival camps and yet unified it within a strategically interconnected world military order.

zh: 它包括广阔的、高度密集的区域性和全球性的军事权力网以及庞大的军事基地，至少对于超级大国来讲，这可使它对世界上的几乎任何一个地点发动史无前例的毁灭性打击。
en: It involved extensive and intensive regional and global networks of military power and, for the superpowers at least, enormous military infrastructures to project unparalleled destructive power to almost any single site on the world's surface.

zh: 这种权力关系体系也被高度地制度化和分层化（分为第一世界、第二世界和第三世界）（参看地图2-3）。
en: It was also highly institutionalized and stratified (into the First World, Second World and Third World) (see map 2.3).

zh: 有趣的是，全球通信网络自身是跨国活动中管制最严格的一个部门。
en: Interestingly, the global network itself is one of the most highly regulated sectors of transnational activity.

zh: 它受到国际电信规制体制的管理。这一规制体制包括国际电信同盟（它包括一个无线电通信部分，世界无线电通信联盟和国际卫星组织）以及各种各样的地区性组织（见专栏1-2）。
en: It is governed by the international telecommunications regime, embracing the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) (which in turn embraces a Radiocommunication Sector, the World Radiocommunication Conferences and the International Satellite Organization) and various regional organizations (see box 1.2).

zh: 80年代，日本电子工业巨擘实际上增加了海外投资。例如，在欧洲和北美寻求对外直接投资，随着日元升值和国内劳动力成本上升开始在东亚大规模投资生产。
en: In the 1980s Japanese electronics giants substantially increased their overseas investment, with market-seeking FDI in Europe and North America and more extensive production in East Asia in the wake of the yen appreciation and rising labour costs at home.

zh: 结果，整个亚洲形成了有等级的生产组织。
en: As a consequence a hierarchy of production organization has developed across Asia.

zh: 多数劳动密集型生产过程从先进工业国，特别是韩国迁至欠发达国家，如中国。
en: The most labour-intensive production processes have migrated from the leading economies, notably Korea, to less advanced economies, including China.

zh: 结果，俄国政府只得在明知道德国会将其行为视作对德战争的情况下，于7月29日对俄国军队进行全面动员。
en: Consequently, the Russian government ordered full mobilization of the Russian army on July 29, knowing that the Germans would consider this an act of war against them.

zh: 德国立即做出反应，向俄国发出最后通牒，要求俄国必须在12小时内停止动员。
en: Germany responded to Russian mobilization with its own ultimatum that the Russians must halt their mobilization within twelve hours.

zh: 俄国不予理睬，德国随即于8月1日对俄宣战。
en: When the Russians ignored it, Germany declared war on Russia on August 1.

zh: 杜尔哥成了这些力量的代言人。
en: Turgot served as a spokesmanfor these forces.

zh: 他在任职期间，信奉开明专制主义，主张自由生产并使工业和农业发生了变化。
en: He took office, a firm believer in enlightened despotism and in liberty of production and exchange in both industry and agriculture.

zh: 传统看法认为资本主义是一种建立在私人财产和竞争基础之上而无需前资本主义制度的支持力量。只要注意一下他所试图进行的那些改革以及这些改革所引起的反对，就能够帮助我们估计到传统的看法所没有看到的资本主义背后的力量。
en: A glance at his attempted reforms and the opposition they aroused helps us to gauge the strength of the forces behind a classical version of capitalism, that is, one based on private property and free competition without support from precapitalist institutions.

zh: 虽然从武器供应国和购买国方面来看，冷战后的时代趋势更加多元化，但是整个体系仍然存在明显的等级。
en: Although the trend over the postwar era has been towards greater diversity in terms of suppliers and purchasers, the system remains distinctly hierarchical.

zh: 从这个方面看，武器供应市场变得越来越不集中（Laurance， 1992）。
en: In this respect, the supplier market has become less concentrated(Laurance, 1992).

zh: 但尽管这样，最顶端的6个武器供应国（美国、英国、法国、中国、俄罗斯和德国）仍占世界武器转移的大部分。
en: Yet despite this, the top six arms suppliers (US, UK, France, China, Russia, Germany) continue to account for the bulk of world arms transfers.

zh: 当技术在国际上广泛扩散，比较优势受相对要素供给决定时，社会对劳动力产生最强烈的影响。
en: The most radical effects of trade on labour arise when technology has become widely diffused internationally and comparative advantage is largely determined by relative factor supplies.

zh: 如果特有的优势丧失，规模效应不起决定作用，那么支持高工资的基础就会动摇，人们就会期望工资的趋同。
en: If specific advantages are eroded and scale effects do not predominate, the basis for sustaining higher wages falls and wage convergence may be expected.

zh: 这种情况既适用于发达国家间的贸易，也适用于发达国家和发展中国家的贸易。
en: This can apply to trade between developed countries as well as between developed and developing countries.

zh: 80年代以来，伴随着贸易壁垒的广泛减少，发展中国家发生了一系列变化。这些变化既是其国内战略，又是多边组织如世界银行、国际货币基金组织和世贸组织压力所致。
en: From the 1980s there has been a sea change among developing countries, with widespread reductions in trade barriers, undertaken both as a domestic strategy and under pressure from multilateral institutions like the World Bank, the IMF and WTO.

zh: 萨克斯和华纳（1995）发现，从60年代到80年代后期，在全世界范围内，采取广义的贸易开放政策的经济体在人口数量上稳定在不足世界人口总量的1/4，国内生产总值不足世界国内生产总值的一半。
en: Sachs and Warner (1995) found that from 1960 until the late 1980s the proportion of the world’s economies that could be classed as operating broadly open trade policies was stable at below a quarter measured by population and less than a half measured by GDP.

zh: 从那时起，二者的比例分别上升到一半以上和大约2/3。在中国加入世贸组织以后，这个数字还会上升。所以，贸易自由化趋势将持续下去。
en: Since then the proportions have risen to over a half and around two-thirds respectively, figures that will rise still further when China is admitted to the WTO and so long as the trend towards trade liberalization continues.

zh: 在70年代和80年代，所有西欧国家都加紧了它们的移民立法并加强了警力。
en: All western European countries tightened up their immigration legislation and enhanced policing powers in the 1970s and 1980s.

zh: 这些措施有：对航空运输的严格要求、更严格的签证要求、拒绝寻求避难者的进入并要求一定的法律程序以及对不被官方认可的外来人口进行惩罚等。
en: These measures included strict sanctions on airline carriers; tighter visa requirements; denying access and the due process of law to asylum seekers; and the active penalization of undocumented aliens.

zh: 然而，尽管它们控制了非法越境移民量的增长，但是，仍然没有人能够将不断加剧的非法越境移民潮的方向扭转过来。
en: Yet none has been able to reverse the broad tide of rising migratory flows from illegal cross-border entry, though they may have contained its growth.

zh: 同样的事情在德国也发生了。但是，这里我们必须再次注意到两国的背景差別。
en: Roughly the same thing happened in Germany, and once again it is instructive to view England against the German background.

zh: 容克地主能够利用政府的力量去维护自己的地位，并且和德国其它地区的自耕农组成一个联合阵线来对抗这种冲击。
en: There the Junkers were able to use the state in the effort to preserve their position and also to form a united agricultural front with the peasant proprietors in the rest of Germany.

zh: 在任何意义上，德国都没有经过类似废除“谷物法”这样的过程。
en: At no point did Germany go through experience comparable to the abolition of the Corn Laws.

zh: 相反，工业领导部门加入了钢铁与黑麦的联姻（1902年的关税政策使这种联姻达到完满的程度）。作为贸易条件，还通过了增加海军建设项目的计划。
en: Instead, leading sectors of industry entered the marriage of iron and rye (fully consummated in the tariff of 1902), gaining as their part of the bargain a program of naval construction.

zh: 在一种帝制的和反动的方案的基础上所实现的容克地主、农民和工业利益集团的整个联合，给德国的民主带来了灾难性的结果。
en: The whole coalition of Junker, peasant, and industrial interests around a program of imperialism and reaction had disastrous results for German democracy.

zh: 总的说来，战争规则、治理反人道的罪行的法律、关于自然资源的使用的立法思想的创新以及人权体制都标志着国际法所涉及的主体与范畴的方向的转换。
en: In sum, the rules of war, laws governing crimes against humanity, the innovations in legal thinking on the use of resources and human rights regimes all mark a shift in direction so far as the subject and scope of international law are concerned.

zh: 上述观点已转而反对国际法必须是只存在于国家之间的、排他性的法律这一信条。
en: Opinion has moved against the doctrine that international law must be a law between states only and exclusively.

zh: 大量的规则、准规则以及立法变化的出现正处于争论之中，这些新的规则和变化正开始转变全球秩序中共存与合作的基础。
en: At issue is the emergence of a vast body of rules, quasi-rules and legal changes which are beginning to alter the basis of coexistence and cooperation in the global order.

zh: 它为非殖民化，为寻求国际制度改革提供了一个正式的框架。
en: It has provided a formal framework for decolonization, and for the pursuit of the reform of international institutions.

zh: 更为重要的是，它有助于一种复杂的提供“国际公共物品”的治理体系的发展，其所提供的“国际公共物品”的范围从国际空中交通控制、电信和邮政（将一些早先建立的国际组织置于自己的领导之下），到对传染病的控制，对难民和自然灾害的受害者的人道主义救济，以及对共同的环境的保护（特别是臭氧层和气候的变化，参见Imber， 1997；下面的第2、8章）。所有这些“物品”都需要国际合作来进行分配并对之进行有效的保护。
en: Moreover, it has aided the development of an elaborate system of governance for the provision of 'international public goods’，from international air traffic control, telecommunications and posts (bringing some of the earlier established international organizations under its auspices) to the control of contagious diseases, humanitarian relief for refugees and victims of natural disasters, and the protection of the environmental commons (especially the ozone layer and climate alteration) (see Imber, 1997; and see chapters 2 and 8 below). All these 'goods' require international cooperation in order to deliver and safeguard them effectively.

zh: 上层穿袍贵族通过高等法院，支持并加剧了封建领主的反动活动。
en: Through the parlements the higher echelons of the noblesse de robe supported and intensified the seigneurial reaction.

zh: 正如我们已经看到的，王权官僚政治在以前曾被用于榨取商品化了的财富来为王权服务。
en: Formerly, as we have seen, the royal bureaucracy had served to attract commercial wealth to the royal cause.

zh: 然而，它也造成了如下的结果，就是使一些弱小的仅有一定影响的资产阶级变成个人私有财产特权的有力维护者。
en: However, it had also had the consequence of turning a small but influential section of the bourgeoisie into vehement defenders of privileges conceived of as private property attached to the individual.

zh: 在这种情况下，金融全球化改变了经济利益的平衡，偏向资本和偏离劳动力。
en: In this context financial globalization shifts the balance of economic advantage further towards capital and away from labour.

zh: 但全球金融市场并不像许多全球化论者所说的那样是福利国家的终结。
en: But global financial markets do not, as many hyperglobalists imply, simply spell the end of the welfare state.

zh: 如上所述，扩张的经济政策和坚实的福利工程不会被金融全球化所排除，而市场则使政府的国际借贷或汇率下降代价更大（Garrett， 1996）。
en: As noted above, expansionary economic policies and strong welfare programmes are not precluded by financial globalization, but rather markets impose on governments higher costs of international borrowing or falling exchange rates (Garrett, 1996).

zh: 许多跨国组织超越领土界线，跨越世界主要地区，组织利益团体，实现远距离的一致行动（可参见以下第8章对环境组织的探讨）。
en: Many of these transnational organizations function to coordinate action at a distance, organizing communities of interest across territorial boundaries and across the world's major regions (see, for instance, the discussion of environmental groups in chapter 8 below).

zh: 有些组织代表了特殊的跨国团体，如代表了天主教会或者社会运动，例如一些生态保护组织和妇女运动组织等。
en: Some represent particular transnational communities, for example, the Catholic Church, or social movements such as that of ecology or the women's movement.

zh: 其他还有一些恶性的组织如恐怖组织或者犯罪集团等。
en: Others are less benign forms of transnational organization such as terrorist and criminal organizations.

zh: 上层穿袍贵族通过高等法院，支持并加剧了封建领主的反动活动。
en: Through the parlements the higher echelons of the noblesse de robe supported and intensified the seigneurial reaction.

zh: 正如我们已经看到的，王权官僚政治在以前曾被用于榨取商品化了的财富来为王权服务。
en: Formerly, as we have seen, the royal bureaucracy had served to attract commercial wealth to the royal cause.

zh: 然而，它也造成了如下的结果，就是使一些弱小但有一定影响的资产阶级变成个人私有财产特权的有力维护者。
en: However, it had also had the consequence of turning a small but influential section of the bourgeoisie into vehement defenders of privileges conceived of as private property attached to the individual.

zh: 这里资产阶级的行动和思维方式再次通过旧秩序的毛孔渗透进来。
en: Here again capitalist ways of thinking and acting were seeping through the pores of the old order.

zh: 在18世纪期间，这些倾向继续增长并得到了加强。
en: During the eighteenth century these trends continued and intensified.

zh: 战后，一些内在的缺陷变得更加突出。
en: After the war, certain inherent shortcomings became more obvious.

zh: 虽然我们仍然对他们早期成功所付出的一部分代价记忆犹新，但现在不妨把它们暂且放在一旁。
en: For the moment we may leave these aside, though it is essential to remember they formed part of the price of earlier success.

zh: 在农业社会关系里，上述一切情况的发生并没有伴随在何和平的或暴力的革命，这是一项令人瞩目的成绩。
en: The feat was a rather remarkable one because it took place without any revolution, peaceful or violent, in agrarian social relationships.

zh: 个人主义和世俗主义是意大利文艺复兴的两个主要特征，在知识界和文艺界尤为夺目。
en: Individualism and secularism---two characteristics of the Italian Renaissance---were most noticeable in the intellectual and artistic realms.

zh: 意大利的文化到14世纪末已经成熟。
en: Italian culture had matured by the fourteenth century.

zh: 在接下来的两个世纪中，意大利成为欧洲文化的引领者。
en: For the next two centuries, Italy was the cultural leader of Europe.

zh: 这种新型的意大利文化主要是相对富裕的城市上层社会的产物。
en: This new Italian culture was primarily the product of a relatively wealthy, urban lay society.

zh: 与文艺复兴相伴生的最为重要的文学运动是人文主义。
en: The most important literary movement associated with the Renaissance is humanism.

zh: 表2-1概括了当代全球武器生产的结构，其中5个方面的特征值得详尽阐述。
en: The structure of contemporary global military production is summarized in table 2.1. Five features are worth elaboration.

zh: 第一，战后的大部分时间，苏联和美国主宰了全球的武器生产不足为奇，但是今天美国毫无疑问是最主要的武器生产国。
en: First, the Soviet Union and the US, not surprisingly, dominated global arms production for much of the postwar period but today the US is, without doubt, the leading arms producer.

zh: 如果不是因为19世纪早期的军事工业革命，列强和附属国家之间的军事生产能力的差距也不会如此之大。
en: Not since the military-industrial revolution of the early nineteenth century has the gap in military production capacity between the great powers and subordinate powers been so dramatic.

zh: 第三部分通常由森林、河流与牧场组成，如人们所知，这是领主和农奴共同使用的公用地。人们在这里采薪、狩猎和放牧。
en: A third part, generally consisting of woods, streams, and pasture, was known as the commons and served as a source of valuable fuel, game, and pastureland for both the lord and his peasants.

zh: 为了确保领主获得适宜的劳动力，农奴们以种种方式被束缚于土地上。
en: Partly in order to assure the lord an adequate supply of labor, the peasants were tied in various ways to the soil.

zh: 昔斯特和米勒勾勒了西方国家存在的4种公民身份模式。西方国家的公民身份既是公民身份和民族认同观念的代名同，又是产生那种文化情境下的各种公共政策的体现：移民政策、归化政策和教台与文化政策。
en: Castles and Miller outline four models of citizenship in Western countries which serve as proxies both for attitudes to citizenship and national identity and for clusters of public policies that emerge from that cultural context: immigration policies, naturalization policies and educational and cultural policies.

zh: 这4种模式或策略是：虚幻的 、排他性的、共和帝国的和多文化的。
en: Those four models/strategies are: illusory; exclusionary; republican-imperial; and multicultural.

zh: 同样，激进共和党人也获得了北方工人的有力支持。
en: The Radical Republicans also received substantial support from Northern labor.

zh: 北方工人尽管对废奴主义者的宣传态度冷淡，担忧黑人的到来会制造竞争，认为新英格兰的废奴主义者是工厂主的哗众取宠的代表，但是，他们对于保护关税和延缓北方货币贬值的思想给予了热切关注。
en: Even though Northern workers were very cool to abolitionist propaganda, fearing Negro competition and regarding New England abolitionists as hypocritical representatives of the mill owners, they were enthusiastic about Radical conceptions of tariff protection and going slow on the contraction of inflated Northern currency.

zh: 在另一方面，金融界和商业界对于激进分子处之漠然，因此，战争结束后，主要激进分子把矛头指向了“北方富豪统治集团”。
en: Financial and commercial interests, on the other hand, were unenthusiastic about the Radicals.After the war, principled Radicals turned against the "plutocracy of the North."

zh: 在第一章和第二章我们将看到，现代民族国家与以前的政治统治形式的区别作于：前者在主权、领土、合法性以及民主（经历了19、20世纪的奋斗之后才获得的）之间实现了恰当的对称和对应关系。
en: Modern nation-states, as will be seen from chapters 1 and 2, distinguish themselves from previous forms of political rule by claiming a proper symmetry and correspondence between sovereignty, territory, legitimacy and, with the passage of the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, democracy.

zh: 主权概念明确提出政治权力有权在固定领土内行使 （参见Skinner， 1978，第2卷；Held， 1995，第2章）。
en: The concept of sovereignty lodges a distinctive claim to the rightful exercise of political power over a circumscribed realm (see Skinner, 1978, vol. 2; Held, 1995, ch. 2).

zh: 它试图指出在一个有既定领土的共同体中，政治权威不仅有权决定规则、管制以及政策的抿架，而且有权根据这个框架进行统治。
en: It seeks to specify the political authority within a community which has the right to determine the framework of rules, regulations and policies within a given territory and to govern accordingly.

zh: 90年代，流量的增长已经将它们的股票市场与世界市场紧密地联系起来。
en: In the 1990s increased flows have linked their stock markets more closely with world markets.

zh: 但是最贫穷国家处于私人国际资金的边缘，仅能依靠政府援助。
en: But the poorest countries have remained on the margins of private international finance and reliant on official aid flows.

zh: 实际上，1998年，大约90个国家受国际货币基金组织的各种形式调整计划的影响。
en: Indeed, in 1998 some ninety countries were under various forms of IMF adjustment programmes.

zh: 政府看起来对于危机束手无策。
en: Governments seemed powerless to deal with the crisis.

zh: 对付萧条的经典的自由主义办法就是采取一种通货紧缩的政策以平衡预算，包括削减工资以降低成本，提高关税以将其他国家的商品排挤在本国市场之外，但这些办法都加剧了经济危机，并使大众感到更为不满。
en: The classical liberal remedy for depression, a deflationary policy of balanced budgets, which involved cutting costs by lowering wages and raising tariffs to exclude other countries' goods from home markets, served only to worsen the economic crisis and create even greater mass discontent.

zh: 这反过来引发了严重的政治危机。
en: This in turn led to serious political repercussions.

zh: 正因为这种混合物构成了国民党的主要社会基础，所以它的农业政策便在于维护或恢复当时的状况。
en: As this fusion formed the main social basis of the Kuomintang, its agrarian policy was one of trying to maintain or restore the status quo.

zh: 而独立的共产党对抗力量的存在，造成了两极对峙的形势，使国民党日趋反动和专横。
en: In addition, the presence of the Communist rival with de facto independence tended to polarize.the situation and make Kuomintang policy more reactionary and oppressive.

zh: 一位同情国民党的美国学者描述了这种情况的一般特征：“共产党的活动是狂热的周期性农民起义的延续，而国民政府和国民党则是占支配地位的达官贵人的后继者。”
en: An American scholar sympathetic to the Kuomintang offers this general characterization: "The Communists act as the inheritors to temporarily fanatical peasant rebellions: the National Government and the Kuomintang to ascendant mandarinates."

zh: 70年代，日本生产商贏得竞争并开始控制这一工业部门。同汽车工业一样，起关键作用的是它们创新的管理技术。
en: In the 1970s, Japanese producers achieved notable competitive success and came to dominate sectors of the industry; as with the car industry, their innovative management techniques were crucial.

zh: 直到80年代中期，日本公司比美国公司更趋于国内导向：它们保持着国内生产的相当份额，并且从国内公司索取甚多，因为它们依靠国内生产贏得竞争优势。
en: Until the mid-1980s, Japanese firms were much more domestically oriented than US firms: they retained a greater share of production domestically and sourced more from domestic firms as they derived a competitive advantage from producing at home.

zh: 由于石化工业的规模经济，跨国公司将生产集中在几个地方，并通过出口满足市场需求。
en: With high scale economies in petrochemicals, firms concentrated production in a few locations and served markets by exporting.

zh: 相对标准化的技术使跨国公司愿意在地理上集中生产，而不是采取特许生产，以保持其技术优势。
en: Even with relatively standardized technology MNCs generally preferred to concentrate production geographically, rather than licensing it, in order to preserve technological advantages.

zh: 因为主要的市场都位于经合发国家，工资在总成本中占相对较小的比例，所以，不像其他工业那样有什么经济刺激可以促使生产向发展中国家转移。
en: Since the major markets are located in OECD economies and wages are a relatively small proportion of total costs there has been little economic incentive to shift production to developing countries as in other industries.

zh: 这种结合仅仅产生于西欧。
en: This complex arose only in Western Europe.

zh: 只是在这里，才发生了王权过强或过弱的微妙平衡。对于议会民主，这是一种重要的推动力量。
en: Only there did that delicate balance occur between too much and too little royal power which gave an important impetus to parliamentary democracy.

zh: 在其他国家，也出现过形形色色的具有局部意义的等级会议，但比之西欧，它们不是缺少重要的成分，就是没有关键性的均衡。
en: A wide variety of partial resemblances do occur elsewhere but seem to lack either a crucial ingredient or the crucial proportion among them found in Western Europe.

zh: 俄国社会曾发展出一种等级机构。
en: Russian society did develop a system of estates, the soslovii.

zh: 但独立的贵族遭到伊凡雷帝的沉重打击，经过彼得大帝的强权统治以后，恢复贵族特权的希望终成泡影。贵族虽取得某些权利，但在统治过程中已不再拥有法人代表及相应的契约。
en: But Ivan the Terrible broke the back of the independent nobility.The attempt to recover their privileges came after the strong hand of Peter the Great had been removed and resulted in obtaining privileges without corresponding obligations or corporate representation in the process of governing.

zh: 后来，如同在希腊那样，君主政体被废除，贵族成为社会的统治者。
en: Then, as in Greece, the monarchy was abolished, and the patricians became the dominant element in society.

zh: 从前由国王掌握的帝权这时转到两名执政官手中；执政官由选举产生，任期一年，总是由贵族担任。
en: The sovereign power formerly held by the king was now delepted to two consuls, who were elected for one-year periods and who were always patricians.

zh: 元老院是主要立法机关，也是贵族团体，甚至在接纳若干平民后其性质仍然不变。
en: The Senate, which was the principal legislative body, was also an aristocratic institution and remained so even after a few commoners, or plebeians, were admitted.

zh: 正如本章前面部分所论述的，当今时代代表了全球武器贸易和武器采购的组织和性质上的重大变迁。
en: As earlier sections of this chapter have recounted, the contemporary era represents a significant transformation in the organization and nature of the global arms trade and of arms procurement.

zh: 在这里所讨论的6个发达资本主义国家中，最近20年见证了国防工业基础跨国化的重大发展。
en: Among the six SIACS discussed here, the last two decades in particular have witnessed a notable transnationalization of the defence industrial base.

zh: 削减国防采购预算和国防工业生产过剩能力共同推动了所有国家国防工业在国内外的重组。
en: Declining defence procurement budgets and defence industrial overcapacity have combined to produce a major (ongoing) restructuring of the defence industry both within and across all states.

zh: 正如本章前面部分所论述的，当今时代代表了全球武器贸易和武器采购的组织和性质上的重大变迁。
en: As earlier sections of this chapter have recounted, the contemporary era represents a significant transformation in the organization and nature of the global arms trade and of arms procurement.

zh: 在这里所讨论的6个发达资本主义国家中，最近20年见证了国防工业基础跨国化的重大发展。
en: Among the six SIACS discussed here, the last two decades in particular have witnessed a notable transnationalization of the defence industrial base.

zh: 削减国防采购预算和国防工业生产过剩能力共同推动了所有国家国防工业在国内外的重组。
en: Declining defence procurement budgets and defence industrial overcapacity have combined to produce a major (ongoing) restructuring of the defence industry both within and across all states.

zh: 这3种趋势有助于界定一种历史背景，在其中发达资本主义国家卷入世界军事秩序的模式得到诠释。
en: These three trends help define the historical context within which patterns of national enmeshment in the world military order among SIACS are to be interpreted.

zh: 这些模式能从对战后趋势的检验中得出，这些趋势包括国家用于国防的资源、国防工业基础、武器贸易和国际安全结构中的成员地位等，以及军事力量在外部的部署和使用。
en: These patterns will be constructed from an examination of postwar trends in national resources devoted to defence; the DIB; the arms trade; membership of international security structures; and the external use or deployment of military force.

zh: 本研究中的每一个国家——美国、日本、瑞典、英国、徳国和法国——的个体肖像将从各国卷入世界军事秩序的结构中出现。
en: For each of the countries in the study - US, Japan, Sweden, UK, Germany and France - an individual portrait will emerge of the structure of national enmeshment in the world military order.

zh: 与20世纪早期相比，正如大战的灾难性后果所显示的，那时使用武力（或威胁使用武力）的决定是国家政府单独享有的独一无二的权力，但是多边防御和安全部署的增长，使得没被削弱的政府在此方面的决策变得错综复杂。
en: In comparison with the early twentieth century when, as the catastrophe of the Great War demonstrated, decisions to (threaten to) use military force were the unquestioned preserve of national governments alone, the growth of multilateral defence and security arrangements complicates, if it does not compromise, government decision-making in this regard.

zh: 条约义务、军事和防御承诺、军事能力、后勤和军队的连锁性质，国际化的国防生产与武器采购，以及其他因素，改变了政治环境和涉及国防政策所有方面的成本与利益的国家决策政治学，但最突出的还是军事力量使用或宣布战争。
en: Treaty obligations, military and defence commitments, the interlocking nature of military capabilities, logistics and forces, internationalized defence production and weapons procurement, among other factors, transform the political context and the politics of national decision-making with respect to the costs and benefits of all aspects of defence policy, but most especially the use of military force or the declaration of war.

zh: 尽管所有的发达资本主义国家最终保有宣布战争或使用武力的法理上的主权，但是军事行动的可选择过程的成本和利益在某些关键方面受到正式或非正式承诺的限制。
en: Although all SIACS ultimately retain the de jure sovereign power to declare war or to (threaten to) use military force, the costs and benefits of alternative courses of military action are circumscribed, in some key respects, by both formal and informal commitments.

zh: 在这方面，一个更有说服力的例子是在当代的国际法中，牢固地树立—个合法的国家必须是一个维护某些共同的民主价值的国家这一观念的倾向（参见Crawforcl和Marks，1998）。
en: A further telling example in this regard is the tendency in contemporary international law to entrench the notion that a legitimate state must be a state that upholds certain common democratic values (see Crawford and Marks, 1998).

zh: 例如，《世界人权官言》第21条宣称，民主原则与某些列举出的权利一起作为一种“所有人民和国家追求的共同标准”（参见UN，1998，第2、5页）。
en: For instance, in Article 21 the Universal Declaration of Human Rights asserts the democratic principle along with enumerated rights as a 'common standard of achievement for all peoples and nations' (see UN, 1988, pp. 2, 5).

zh: 但是，“民主”一词却并未出现在《宣言》中，并且形容同“民主的”也只出现了一次（在第29条）。
与前几个世纪相比，战后时代的一些重要的联盟协定都更加正式、更加制度化。
en: Compared to previous centuries the major alliance arrangements in the postwar era have been much more formal and institutionalized.

zh: 联盟表示一种手段，通过该手段，国家对军事权力的使用在国家之间层次上受到管制。
en: Alliances represent one means by which the state's employment of military power is regulated at an interstate level.

zh: 在不同程度上，它们也体现了一种军事国际化的过程。
en: To varying degrees they also represent a process of the internationalization of military security.

zh: 最初这种货币都是贵金属如黄金。
en: Initially this was usually precious metals such as gold.

zh: 金银的跨洲流动可追溯到20世纪（Watson，1967），自那时起，洲际贸易的兴起在贸易者之间产生了交错的金融关系。
en: Transcontinental movements of gold and silver can be dated back to the twelfth century (Watson, 1967), and the rise of intercontinental trade from that time brought intermittent financial relations between traders.

zh: 有组织的国际金融基本上可上溯到14世纪，那时佛罗伦萨商人银行如著名的Peruzzi公司，通过建立“外国的”机构或与外国银行的互惠制度发展了跨国联系（Abulafia, 1997；Hunt, 1994）。
en: Organized international finance dates primarily from the fourteenth century when Florentine merchant banks, such as the famous Peruzzi Company, developed multinational links by establishing either 'foreign' operations or reciprocal arrangements with foreign banks (Abulafia, 1997; Hunt, 1994).

zh: 第一次世界大战之后，全面裁军的提倡者们发现国际联盟为进一步的裁军提供了新的制度性论坛（Howard，1981）。
en: In the aftermath of the First World War the advocates of general and complete disarmament discovered, in the League of Nations, a new institutional forum within which to further the disarmament project (Howard, 1981).

zh: 从1932-1934年，世界上64个被承认的国家在日内瓦举行的世界裁军大会上聚集讨论全面裁军的过程。
en: From 1932 to 1934 all the worlds sixty-four recognized states met in Geneva at the World Disarmament Conference to initiate the process of general and complete disarmament.

zh: 但是谈判破裂，收效甚微，“现实主义”战胜了“理想主义”。
en: But "realism" triumphed over "idealism", with the conference breaking up having achieved little.

zh: 即使是冷战的结束也未能瓦解它，因为它已经扩展到将一些前华沙条约成员国包括进来（比如波兰、匈牙利和捷克共和国），并且通过和平伙伴计划，将俄罗斯、瑞典和其他欧洲国家包括进来。
en: Even the ending of the Cold War has not undermined it, since it has expanded to include some former Warsaw Pact members (such as Poland, Hungary and the Czech Republic) and, through the Partnership for Peace (PFP) arrangement, Russia, Sweden and other European states.

zh: 无论是从其日常事物还是在国际危机时刻，北大西洋公约组织都为多边决策和军事合作提供了一种制度化的机制，从而使国家安全和军事自主的观念成为可能。

en: In both the routine conduct of its affairs and in times of international crisis, NATO provides an institutional mechanism for multilateral decision-making and military cooperation which significantly qualifies the idea of national security and military autonomy.

zh: 安全不再仅仅是按照国家地理疆界的防御来进行定义，而是根据集体防御和国际安全来确定。
en: Security is no longer simply defined in terms of the defence of national territorial boundaries, but rather in terms of collective defence and international security.

zh: 发展中国家对外国直接投资和跨国公司的政策在第二次世界大战后有了很大改观。
en: Among developing countries policy towards FDI and MNCs has altered considerably during the postwar period.

zh: 很早时候起，一些国家就欢迎外国直接投资，而其他国家则限制跨国公司。
en: Earlier on, while some actively welcomed inward FDI, others placed a variety of restrictions on MNCs.

zh: 除限制外国直接投资进入某些领域外，发展中国家常常对跨国公司的经营施加规定。
en: Besides limiting FDI in certain areas, developing countries often imposed operational requirements on MNCs.

zh: 另外，50年代和60年代，发展中国家还存在相当规模的国有化和没收私产的措施，其中大部分是在初级工业部门。
en: Moreover, there were a number of significant nationalizations and expropriations in developing countries in the 1950s and 1960s, largely in the primary sector industries.

zh: 但是，国有化和没收私产现在已经几乎不存在了。因为日益增长的制造业外国直接投资意味着国有化使一国经济丧失必要的引进新技术的机会。
en: But nationalizations and expropriations have declined to negligible levels since the growing significance of manufacturing FDI means that nationalization would deprive an economy of vital inflows of new technology.

zh: 当然，小国的国家融入全球和区域文化交往及其过程的程度是不同的。
en: Of course, the extent of national enmeshment of individual countries in global and regional cultural flows and processes varies.

zh: 例如，从信息和文化产品占据国内市场的主导地位以及在国际市场中所处的位置这个角度来看，在我们所研究的个案国家中，美国是独一无二的。
en: In the context of our case study countries, the US is in a class of its own in terms of its domination of its own home market as well as its place in the international markets for information and cultural products.

zh: 英国、日本、法国和德国的文化产业在其国内市场中占据相当大的份额。
en: The UK, Japan, France and Germany have significant shares of their domestic markets, served by their own culture industries.

zh: 到1927年，国民党依靠中国共产觉和苏联的重要支持，已从南方的基地进而控制了中国的各个重要省份。
en: With important native Communist and Soviet assistance, the Kuomintang by late 1927 had won control of a substantial part of China, working out from its base in the south.

zh: 直到那时，国民党的胜利主要还是由于成功地利用和支配了工农大众普遍的不满情绪。
en: Up to this moment, its success had been mainly due to its ability to harness and ride the tides of discontent among the peasants and the workers.

zh: 因此，国民党的社会纲领有别于军阀的纲领，并远在他们之上。
en: Thus the Kuomintang’s social program distinguished it from the warlords and gave it an advantage over them.

zh: 有一段时间，人们对国民党军事力量寄以厚望，希望他们打败军阀势力，在革命纲领的基础上统一中国。
en: For a time, hopes ran high that the Kuomintang’s military force might overcome the warlords and unify China on the basis of a revolutionary program.

zh: 第五，国内事务与国外事务之间、内部政治问题与外部政治问题之间、一个民族国家的主权与国际权利之间的区別，已不能再清楚地划分。
en: Fifth, the distinctions between domestic and foreign affairs, internal political issues and external questions, the sovereign concerns of a nation-state and international considerations, are no longer clear cut.

zh: 政府面临着诸如毒品、艾滋病、疯牛病、非再生资源的利用、核废弃物的控制、大规模杀伤性武器的扩散以及全球变暖等问题，用这些词语并不能将其进行有意义的分类。
en: Governments face issues such as drugs, AIDS, BSE (Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy), the use of non-renewable resources, the management of nuclear waste, the spread of weapons of mass destruction, and global warming which cannot meaningfully be categorized in these terms.

zh: 此外，多国公司的定位及投资策略、全球金融市场的规范、在全球劳动分工与缺乏资本控制的背景下对个国家的税收基础的威胁等问题都对国家经济政策的一些关键措施的存在价值提出了质疑 （参见第3-5章）。
en: Moreover, issues like the location and investment strategy of MNCs, the regulation of global financial markets, the threats to the tax base of individual countries in the context of a global division of labour and the absence of capital controls all pose questions about the continued value of some of the central instruments of national economic policy (see chapters 3-5).

zh: 不仅范围逐渐扩大，跨国公司活动的强度在逐渐加深。
en: Just as the reach of MNCs has grown, so has the intensity of their activities.

zh: 虽然有全面的外国直接投资资料，但关于跨国公司全部活动及其海外生产的资料却非常不系统。
en: Although there are comprehensive FDI data, there are less systematic data available on the total activity of MNCs and their overseas production.

zh: 然而随后的分析显示，第二次世界大战后跨国公司在世界经济中的重要性无疑有显著增强。
en: But the importance of MNCs in the world economy has undoubtedly grown in the postwar period, as the following analysis suggests.

zh: 据联合国计算，在战后的头几十年里，熟练劳动力的国际迁移人数约为30万~40万。
en: In the first few decades of the postwar era, the UN has calculated that international migration of highly skilled labour was around 300-400,000 people.

zh: 精英迁移的主要来源是印度、中国、斯里兰卡和加纳。
en: The major sources of this burst of elite migration were India, China, Sri Lanka and ghana.

zh: 美国吸收了12万精英迁移者，英国和加拿大分别吸收了8万人（A.Segal，1993）。
en: The USA absorbed 120,000 of these migrants and the UK and Canada over 80,000 each (A. Segal, 1993).

zh: 从70年代开始，海湾国家已经变成了熟练劳动力的重要输入国，但是流向西方的人数，加上来自菲律宾、巴基斯坦、阿根廷和巴西的移民，仍然继续急剧增加。
en: Since the 1970s, the Gulf states have become key importers of highly skilled labour, but flows to the West continue apace with the addition of people from the Philippines, Pakistan, Argentina and Brazil.

zh: 这个地区的主要劳工进口国是科威特、沙特阿拉伯、卡塔尔、阿曼、巴林和阿拉伯联合酋长国以及北部的伊朗和伊拉克。
en: The main labour-importing states in the region have been Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, Bahrain and the United Arab Emirates, as well as Iran and Iraq to the north.

zh: 主要的输出国是埃及、也门、约旦、黎巴嫩和苏丹。
en: The main exporters have been Egypt, Yemen, Jordan, Lebanon and Sudan.

zh: 在海湾战争期间，这些国家的移民总数估计有近200万~300万（A.Segal，1993；根据Martin，1991）。
en: The estimate for all migrants among these states prior to the Gulf War is around 2-3 million (A. Segal, 1993, based on Martin, 1991).

zh: 本项研究中涉及的欧洲国家的海岸线的长度极其不同，而且它们也有通往共同海洋环境的不同通道（有关欧洲海洋和污染，请参看P.Haas，1990，1993）。
en: The European countries in this study have radically different lengths of coastline and access to common marine environments.(On European seas and pollution see P.Haas, 1990, 1993.)

zh: 对这些国家来说，最重要的区域性海洋是北海、波罗的海和地中海。
en: The most important regional seas for these states are the North Sea, the Baltic and the Mediterranean.

zh: 这些海洋都被广泛利用，而且除北海外沿海地区人口稠密。
en: These are heavily used and densely populated on much of their shoreline, though less so for the North Sea.

zh: 只是在这些情况下，我们才有理由谈论海洋污染的区域化和全球化问题。
en: It is only in these cases that we can reasonably talk of the regionalization or globalization of marine pollution.

zh: 不幸的是，我们很难准确地用这种方式分解数据统计，因为不同污染物的发源地和最终的目的地是很难跟踪的。因此，对我们所做个案研究的国家的海洋污染情况，我们只能作出相对令人满意的描述。
en: Unfortunately, it is difficult to disaggregate statistics accurately in this way-the origins and destinations of different pollutants are notoriously hard to track-so only a fairly impressionistic picture of marine pollution in our case study countries can be drawn.

zh: 结果，整个亚洲形成了一种有等级的生产组织。
en: As a consequence a hierarchy of production organization has developed across Asia.

zh: 多数劳动密集型生产过程从先进工业国，特别是韩国迁至欠发达国家，如中国。
en: The most labour-intensive production processes have migrated from the leading economies, notably Korea, to less advanced economies, including China.
Korea has become a significant producer of finished electronic products in its own right and poses a competitive challenge to existing producers.

zh: 韩国自力更生，成为相当重要的电子产品生产商，并对已有的生产商形成威胁。
en: Korea has become a significant producer of finished electronic products in its own right and poses a competitive challenge to existing producers.

zh: 非洲国家的状况差异很大，但许多国家在90年代已经取消了对跨国公司的限制和规定。
en: The position varies widely among African countries, but many have removed restrictions and requirements on MNCs during the 1990s.

zh: 在转轨国家，特别是较发达的国家中，对外直接投资的许多限制已经减少或取消。当然，在某些情况下，人们更青睐与国内公司联合的合资公司而不是全资的外国分支公司。
en: Among transition economies, particularly the more advanced, many restrictions on FDI have been reduced or eliminated, although in some cases there remains a strong preference for joint ventures with domestic firms rather than wholly owned foreign subsidiaries.

zh: 因此，核电产生的环境威胁包括放射性原料泄漏；来自提炼、电厂和再加工工厂的含有放射性的水和气体；以及不同程度的核废料泄漏。
en: Thus the environmental threats presented by nuclear power include the escape of radioactive materials into the environment; the emission of radio-active water and gases from refining, power and reprocessing plants; and the escape of radioactivity from low-level, medium-level and high-level nuclear waste.

zh: 最后，也是最具威胁性的是反应堆故障带来的潜在问题。反应堆故障中，一旦控制失灵，反应堆就可能“融毁”，这将导致更多放射性物质泄漏出来。
en: Finally, and most threatening of all, there is the potential problem of reactor malfunction, in which control is lost and a 'meltdown' is possible, leading to infinitely larger emissions of radioactive substances.

zh: 没有没收和重分土地，只靠新的劳动力体系，种植园体制就恢复了。
en: In the absence of confiscation and redistribution of land, the plantation system recovered by means of a new system of labor.

zh: 最初，种植园主曾打算使用雇佣劳力，但却失败了——因为黑人只想在清闲季节挣钱，当摘棉花的繁忙季节来到时，他们却逃之夭夭。
en: At first there were attempts with wage labor.These failed, at least partly because Negroes were inclined to draw their wages in slack months and abscond when the cotton had to be picked.

zh: 于是一种便于种植园主控制劳力的交谷租种方式开始广泛流行起来。
en: Hence there was a widespread turn towar.d sharecropping which gave the planters superior control of their labor force.

zh: 这一变化是很有意义的，就象我们在一定时候将要看到的，在亚洲很多地方，交谷租种成了一种从农民那里获取盈余的途径。这主要是通过经济手段，当然有时也借助些政治手段，因此，注意到美国在没有农民历史的情况下，这时却也出现了与亚洲基本类似的农村经济是有意义的。
en: The change was significant.As we shall see in due course, sharecropping in many parts of Asia has constituted one way of extracting a surplus from the peasant through economic rather than political methods, though the latter are often necessary to buttress the former.Hence it is instructive to see fundamentally similar forms appear in America without the prior existence of a peasantry.

zh: 黑死病是七个世纪以来袭击欧洲的首例重大传染病。此间中世纪欧洲的人口一度激增，原因之一就在于没有传染病流行。
en: The Black Death was the first major epidemic disease to strike Europe in seven centuries, an absence that helps explain medieval Europe’s remarkable population growth.

zh: 而这场巨大的瘟疫最初源于亚洲。
中世纪时期，淋巴腺鼠疫在欧洲和中东地区一度消失，但在中国西南部曾持续一段时间，尤其是在偏僻的农村。
en: Having disappeared from Europe and the Middle East in the Middle Ages, bubonic plague continued to haunt parts of southwestern China, especially isolated rural territories.

zh: 在80年代中期，武器出口达到战后最高点480亿 〜500亿美元，之后在1991年又迅速回落到低于高峰期开支的一半（参看图2-2）。
en: Arms exports reached a postwar peak of $48-50 billion in the mid-1980s after which they declined precipitately to below half that figure in 1991 (see figure 2.2).

zh: 即使如此，后冷战时代世界武器出口的总值仍高于60年代。
en: Even so, in the post-Cold War era the value of world arms exports remains above that of the 1960s.

zh: 但是这些全球性的数据掩盖了武器转移模式在结构上的重大变迁。
en: But global figures disguise a significant structural shift in the pattern of arms transfers.

zh: 后现代主义在文学上也表现得很明显。
en: Postmodernism was also evident in literature.

zh: 后现代主义的中心之一是中欧和东欧，捷克斯洛伐克人米兰·昆徳拉（1929—  ）的作品尤其突出。
en: One center of Postmodernism was in central and eastern Europe, especially in the work of Milan Kundera (b. 1929) of Czechoslovakia.

zh: 昆徳拉把幻想揉进现实主义，用幻想去检视仍对人类生活状况保持乐观的道德问题。
en: Kundera blended fantasy with realism, using fantasy to examine moral issues while remaining optimistic about the human condition.

zh: 实际上，从他1984年出版的第一部小说《不能承受的生命之轻》中可以看出，他没有因为他描写了家乡的政治压抑而感到绝望，而是让他笔下的人物形象以爱作为通向美好生活的方式。
en: Indeed, in his first novel, The Unbearable Lightness of Being, published in 1984, Kundera does not despair because of the political repression that he so aptly describes in his native land but allows his characters to use love as a way to a better life.

zh: 人的精神可以被磨炼但不能被毁掉。
en: The human spirit can be diminished but not destroyed.

zh: 前苏联及其东欧的卫星同样不可能阻止西方无线电和电视广播的接收或外国文本的输入。
en: The Soviet Union and its East European satellites were unable to prevent the reception of Western radio and TV broadcasts or the import of foreign texts.

zh: 互联网为这些国家的公民避免政府对信息的控制提供了另外一种渠道，同时，这些渠道使得国家政府越来越难以控制那些“坏消息”被泄漏出去。
en: The World Wide Web provides yet another channel through which citizens in such states can evade the information controls of government.Simultaneously, these channels make it more difficult for national governments to control 'bad news' from leaking out of the country.

zh: 换句话说，国家政府管理文化信息和文化发展的环境及其能力发生了变化，控制策略的成本和收益已经不可避免地出现了变化。
en: In other words, there has been a transformation in the context of national governments and in their capacity to manage cultural formation and development; the costs and benefits of control strategies have ineluctably changed.

zh: 对于大多数怀疑论者来说，如果现有的事实说明什么问题的话，那就是经济活动正在经历着一场意义深远的“区域化”，世界经济正在按照3个主要金融和贸易集团——欧洲、亚洲太平洋地区以及北美洲——的方向发展（Ruigrok和Tulder，1995；Boyer和Drache，1996；Hirst和Thompson，1996b）。
en: For most sceptics, if the current evidence demonstrates anything it is that economic activity is undergoing a significant 'regionalization' as the world economy evolves in the direction of three major financial and trading blocs, that is, Europe, Asia-Pacific and North America (Ruigrok and Tulder, 1995; Boyer and Drache, 1996; Hirst and Thompson, 1996b).

zh: 与古典金本位时代相比，世界经济现在整合的意义并没有当时那样大（Boyer和Drache，1996；Hirst和Thompson，1996a）。
en: In comparison with the classical Gold Standard era, the world economy is therefore significantly less integrated than it once was (Boyer and Drache, 1996; Hirst and Thompson, 1996a).

zh: 在怀疑论者中，全球化和地区化被认为是矛盾的趋势。
en: Among the sceptics, globalization and regionalization are conceived as contradictory tendencies.

zh: 在18世纪，尽管怀疑主义日渐兴盛，知识分子们也越来越转向自然神论和自然宗教，但大众对宗教的投入和热情似乎并未受过多影响。
en: Despite the rise of skepticism and the intellectuals’ belief in deism and natural religion, religious devotion remained strong in the eighteenth century.

zh: 很难精确评价欧洲天主教徒的宗教虔诚。
en: It is difficult to assess precisely the religiosity of Europe’s Catholics.

zh: 天主教教区教堂仍然是整个社区的生活中心。
en: The Catholic parish church remained a center of life for the entire community.

zh: 有多少人经常去教堂很难精确地统计出来，但我们已经确知天主教人口中的百分之九十到九十五会去参加教会最重要的庆典之一，复活节的弥撒。
en: How many people went to church regularly cannot be known exactly, but 90 to 95 percent of Catholic populations did go to Mass on Easter Sunday, one of the church’s most important celebrations.

zh: 威廉·迈克尼尔已经对人类定居和迁移与混杂在我们中间生存、移动的微生物和寄生虫之间的互动进行了全球历史性的阐述 （McNeil1，1976）。
en: William McNeill has constructed a global historical narrative around the interaction of human settlement and movement and the microbes and parasites that have stayed, moved and mixed among us (McNeill, 1976).

zh: 的确，在现代以前有记载的人类历史上，惟一具有全球规模的环境变迁的形式就是那些因有害动物和微生物的地理位置发生变化以及遗传基因的突变等引起的环境变迁。
en: Indeed, prior to the modern era the only forms of environmental changes during recorded human history to achieve global dimensions are those caused by the geographical shift and genetic mutation of pests and microbes.

zh: 在我们的叙述中，我们也将考虑这种环境变迁，尤其是全球性的人口移动将被包括在内（参看第6章）。
en: We have included some consideration of this kind of environmental change in our narrative, especially where movements in population at a global level are involved (see chapter 6).

zh: 当这些因素加上许多现代技术中固有的巨大变革力量和生态危险等因素时，如新化学制品产业、依赖矿物燃料的公共交通系统以及核技术等，环境退化就肯定会呈现出全球化形式（参看图8-3中关于当代含氯氟烃的生产情况）。
en: When these forces were combined with the immense transformative powers and ecological risks inherent in many modern technologies - new chemicals industries, mass transport systems dependent on fossil fuel, nuclear technologies - environmental degradation acquired a decisively global form (see figure 8.3 regarding CFC production in this era).

zh: 当代跨国污染、全球环境公共品问题以及资源短缺等所达到的水平是历史上绝无仅有的。
en: No historic parallel exists for the contemporary levels of transboundary pollution, environmental commons problems and resource squeezes.

zh: 因此，对于今天的环境运动、环境条约和国际环境机构来说，其数量和作用前所未有也毫不令人吃惊。
en: Nor, unsurprisingly, is there any significant historical comparator for todays environmental movements, treaties and international agencies.

zh: 以本章中提出的（以及在前而的网格表8-1和8-2中列出的）证据为基础，我们不难得出关于当代环境全球化模式的许多结论。
en: It is not difficult, on the basis of the evidence presented in this chapter (and set out earlier in schematic form in grids 8.1 and 8.2), to draw a number of conclusions about contemporary patterns of environmental globalization.

zh: 首先，尽管环境问题有着很长的历史，无论是地方性的、区域性的和全球性的环境问题都如此，但是，我们可以认为，当代环境退化形式比人类历史上任何其他时候都更具有全球性，而且它们对人类生命造成的一系列危害和威胁具有最重要的历史意义。透过西方繁荣来看待这种前景，不仅可以发现因果联系而且其有讽刺意味。
en: First, although environmental issues - local, regional and global - have a long history we can argue that contemporary forms of environmental degradation are more global than at any other point in human history and carry with them the most historically significant set of risks and threats to human life.That we view such a prospect from the dizzying heights of Western prosperity is causally related and a little ironic.

zh: 当这些因素加上许多现代技术中固有的巨大变革力量和生态危险等因素时，如新化学制品产业、依赖矿物燃料的公共交通系统以及核技术等，环境退化就肯定会呈现出全球化形式（参看图8-3中关于当代含氯氟烃的生产情况）。
en: When these forces were combined with the immense transformative powers and ecological risks inherent in many modern technologies - new chemicals industries, mass transport systems dependent on fossil fuel, nuclear technologies - environmental degradation acquired a decisively global form (see figure 8.3 regarding CFC production in this era).

zh: 当代跨国污染、全球环境公共品问题以及资源短缺等所达到的水平是历史上绝无仅有的。
en: No historic parallel exists for the contemporary levels of transboundary pollution, environmental commons problems and resource squeezes.

zh: 因此，对于今天的环境运动、环境条约和国际环境机构来说，其数量和作用前所未有也毫不令人吃惊。
en: Nor, unsurprisingly, is there any significant historical comparator for todays environmental movements, treaties and international agencies.

zh: 当代环境全球化模式在许多重要方面都是前所未有的。
en: Contemporary patterns of environmental globalization, in many significant respects, are historically unprecedented.

zh: 环境运动的乐天派宣称，对全球环境依赖性的认识的提高以及全球环境运动的道德言辞正在向民族国家的政治合法性和政治认同的传统观点提出挑战。
en: The optimists of the environmental movement claim that growing recognition of global environmental interdependence, and the moral rhetoric of the global environmental movement, are challenging the traditional locus of political legitimacy and the locus of political identification in the nation-state.

zh: 当然，他们也指出，有关环境的国际政治话语出现了一些真正的转变。
en: Certainly, they can point to some real shifts in the terms of international political discourse on the environment.

zh: 这在一定程度上是由于日本远离亚洲大陆以及风向和气候条件造成的。
en: This is partly explained by the distance of Japan from mainland Asia and the prevailing winds and climatic conditions.

zh: 然而，也有越来越多的证据表明，在东亚和环太平洋地区，区域性的跨国酸雨问题正变得越来越严重。
en: However, there is a growing body of evidence to suggest that regional transboundary problems of acid rain are becoming more important in East Asia and the Pacific rim.

zh: 由于工业化步伐加速以及能源需求猛增，这个人口稠密的地区正开始感受到各种跨国界的污染流。
en: As industrialization gathers pace and energy requirements soar, this densely populated region is beginning to experience a variety of cross-border flows of pollution.

zh: 如果汇率是高估的和不稳定的，那么投机者的攻击是不可避免的。
en: If an exchange rate is simply overvalued and unsustainable then a speculative attack is inevitable.

zh: 投资者通过衍生品市场周转大量基金，就像乔治·索罗斯所做的那样。1992年9月，英镑被迫退出欧洲汇率机制，但最关键的是机构投机者的行为以及感到危险就退出的跨国公司的行为。
en: Speculators can mobilize massive funds through derivatives markets, as George Soros did when sterling was forced out of the ERM in September 1992, but more critical are the actions of institutional investors and MNCs who tend to move out of a currency if they believe it to be under threat.

zh: 如果政府对固定汇率的承诺是可信的，这样的投机就会失败，但还有一些途径可以实现投机目的（Obstfeld， 1996）。
en: If a government’s commitment to a fixed exchange rate is credible such attacks will simply fail, but there are several ways in which such attacks can become effectively self-fulfilling (Obstfeld, 1996).

zh: 蓟州军开始训练，就接受了优厚的财政接济以购买军马、制造火器及战车。
en: At the outset the Chichou command received an extra allocation of combat horses and funds for manufacturing firearms and wagons.

zh: 这种和其他军镇的不平等待遇，惹来了大量的反感。
en: Though not prodigious in quantity, the appropriation nevertheless caused jealousy and contention.

zh: 接着又有一连串的矛盾跟着产生，诸如北兵和南兵的磨擦、军职的继承者和其他出身者的争执、因循守旧和锐意革新的冲突。
en: There was also rivalry between northerners and southerners, between local conscripts and recruits, and between officers of the old school and those of the new training program.

zh: 在这种倒退的后果中，精英和政府干预态度的转变以及将巴黎作为国际金融中心的愿望促使当局将金融领域自由化和取消资本控制。
en: In the aftermath of this reversal, shifting elite attitudes to government intervention and a desire to promote Paris as an international financial centre encouraged the authorities to liberalize the financial sector and abolish capital controls.

zh: 80年代末以来，国内货币政策的目标一直是在欧洲汇率机制中维持高汇率，其目的是将通货膨胀率减至德国水平或低于德国水平。1993年欧洲汇率机制危机后，这样的政策继续发挥作用。
en: Since the late 1980s, domestic monetary policy has been focused on maintaining a high exchange rate within the European Exchange Rate Mechanism (ERM) with the aim of reducing inflation rates to German levels or below, a policy that has largely continued since the ERM crisis of 1993.

zh: 尽管一神教是犹太人的创造。但是，一神教的潜在范围和力量却由于基督教和伊斯兰教的传播而成倍增长，基督教和伊斯兰教将单一的道德规范与所有人开放的拯救观结合起来。
en: The innovation of monotheism, although a Jewish creation, was multiplied in its potential reach and power by Christianity and Islam, both of which joined a singular moral code to a vision of salvation potentially open to all.

zh: 早在18世纪的时候，伊斯兰教就出现在许多地方，尽管它在许多地方的传播不算广泛，但是它保留了下来（Gellner， 1981）。
en: Islam achieved a presence in diverse regions as early as the eighth century, a presence it has retained, although it remains thinly spread in many places (Gellner, 1981).

zh: 不过，极端爱国主义者即使在这一阶段也是一支重要的政治力量。
en: Nevertheless, patriotic-extremism was even during this period an important political force.

zh: 第一次世界大战以后的几年，农村和城市的激进主义分子经常展开暴力斗争。
en: The early years following World War I were a period of rural as well as urban radicalism that at times took violent forms.

zh: 极端爱国主义组织破坏佃户和工人的罢工斗争；与此同时，受雇的地痞恶棍破坏工会，捣毁自由派的报纸。
en: Patriotic organizations helped to break tenant and worker strikes, while hired bullies smashed labor unions and liberal newspapers.

zh: 政府通过教育部发起了主要针对学生的“反危险思想”运动。
en: The government too reacted with a campaign by the Ministry of Education against "dangerous thoughts," directed mainly against students.

zh: 虽然就某些产品而言全球贸易体制已经历了几个世纪，但极端全球主义者和变革论者认为，在贸易关系的广度和深度方面，当代是无与伦比的。
en: Although for some products a global trading system has operated for centuries, both the hyperglobalizers and the transformationalists regard the contemporary era as unique in respect of the extensity and intensity of trading relations.

zh: 在多大程度上当代的贸易往来符合贸易全球化定义，在多大程度上现在商品和服务的市场是在全球范围内运作的，这是分析所需表明的两个关键问题。
en: How far contemporary flows of trade are consistent with this notion of trade globalization, and how far markets for goods and services now operate at the global level, constitute key questions which the analysis addresses.

zh: 但是什么是全球市场呢？
en: But what is a global market?

zh: 要解释日本式的极权主义的主要特征，有些人倾向于谈论日本价值体系的连续性、特别是武士传统等因素。
en: To this explanation of the main features of the Japanese variant of totalitarianism some might be inclined to add the factor of continuity in the Japanese system of values, particularly the warrior tradition of the samurai.

zh: 连续性当然是存在的。
en: Continuity of a sort there certainly was.

zh: 但人们必须解释为什么这一传统能够延续。
en: But one has to explain why the tradition continued.

zh: 人类的感情并不是简单地保持原有的方向。
en: Human sentiments do not persist simply of their own momentum.

zh: 家长就是权威。他死后，儿子或者最亲近的男性亲属承担保护人的角色。
en: The paterfamilias exercised that authority; on his death, sons or nearest male relatives assumed the role of guardians.

zh: 然而，共和国后期，尽管男性作为保护人的权利仍然有效，但上层妇女找到了篡夺她们保护人权力的办法。
en: By the late Republic, however, although the rights of male guardians remained legally in effect, upper-class women found numerous ways to circumvent the power of their guardians.

zh: 另一方面，许多跨国公司为追求价廉物美的产品（见上面第3章）而将消耗大量资源的产品向国外的中小企业转移（“分割价值链”）。
en: On the other hand, many MNCs now outsource production to SMEs abroad ('slicing up the value chain') to achieve cheap high-quality production (see chapter 3 above).

zh: 在此过程中形成的全球生产网络或系统涉及的不是直接所有权，而是相当规范的契约关系。
en: In the process global production networks or systems are created which involve not direct ownership but rather regularized contractual relationships.

zh: 但同样，一国内的中小企业可以通过特许权经营、与其他中小企业合作或者在其中迸行有价证券投资等形式向国外扩展，以形成全球生产和销售链。
en: But equally SMEs in one country may expand abroad through franchising, or cooperative arrangements with or portfolio investment in other SMEs to form global production and distribution chains.

zh: 尽管僭主政治统治时期很短暂，但在希腊历史演进中也发挥了很重要的作用——结束了贵族寡头的统治。
en: Although tyranny did not last, it played a significant role in the course of Greek history by ending the rule of narrow aristocratic oligarchies.

zh: 僭主政治的结束为大多数人进入政府敞开了大门。
en: The end of tyranny opened the door to greater numbers of people in government.

zh: 虽然在一些城邦中民主政治达到了顶峰，可其他城邦中各种寡头执政团扩大并继续掌权。
en: Although this trend culminated in the development of democracy in some communities, in other states expanded oligarchies of one kind or another managed to remain in power.

zh: 希腊各邦统治形式各异。透过对两个最著名最强大的城邦——斯巴达和雅典的研究，或许才能清晰地明白这一点。
en: Greek states exhibited considerable variety in their governmental structures; this can perhaps best be seen by examining the two most famous and most powerful Greek city-states, Sparta and Athens.

zh: 当然，也出现了一些有意义的变化。
en: There were, of course, significant variations.

zh: 大坂的商人比起首都江户的商人来说从属性就小些。
en: The merchants of Osaka were less dependent than those of the capital, Edo.

zh: 并且，在幕府统治后期，乡间商人在物资和市场上对封建关系的依赖性就比旧的城市垄断者们要少。
en: And, in the latter part of the period, the provincial merchants showed themselves less dependent on feudal relationships for their materials and markets than did the older urban monopolists.

zh: 就全球市场而言，必须有区域间相当水平的定期的商品（或服务）交换。
en: For a global market to exist there must be significant levels of regularized exchange of goods (or services) at the interregional level.

zh: 在以运输成本或保护主义等形式出现的贸易壁垒大大减弱或减少的情况下，外国生产商可以和另一国家的国内生产商公平竞争。
en: Where barriers to trade, either in the form of transport costs or protection, have fallen sufficiently, foreign producers from one region may compete with domestic producers in another.

zh: 随着区域竞争的展开，商品供需逐渐达到全球范围：国内公司向世界供应商品，而且必须应对来自外国公司的竞争。
en: As this transregional competition evolves, the demand and supply of goods increasingly operate at the global level: firms supply goods across the world and have to respond to competition from foreign firms.

zh: 在教育领域，英国的思想和文化实践通过早期殖民地教育系统的制度结构扩散并且渗入到当地教育系统中去。
en: In the educational field, British, or rather English, ideas and cultural practices were diffused through the institutional structure of early colonial educational systems and in their content.

zh: 在全世界范围内，英国的公立学校模式和基础学校教育模式在培养地方精英的子女中被使用，而课本和课程的来源和主题总是英国的。
en: Across the world, the English models of public school and grammar school education were replicated for the children of local elites, while textbooks and curriculum were invariably English in origin and subject matter.

zh: 最重要的是，教育和培养的主要语言是英语。
en: Above all, the main language of education and instruction was English.

zh: 但是，只要我们回顾一下抵制英货或地方自治的整个纲领，部分矛盾便自然而然地化解了。这一切使得“购买印度货物”的原则 真正生效，从而有助于减少英国商品的竞争。
en: Part of the contradiction disappears as we recall that the whole program of Swadeshi or local autonomy was in effect a doctrine of "buy Indian" and helped to cut down the competition of British goods.

zh: 况且，从富裕阶级的立场来看，甘地提出的劳工自尊的原则也是有非常有利的一面。
en: Furthermore, from the standpoint of the wealthy classes, there were useful aspects to Gandhi’s doctrine of the dignity of labor.

zh: 与新兴工业化经济体以及其他发展中国家的贸易导致了发达经济体的生产重组而不是制选业的普遍衰落（解工业化）。
en: Trade with NIEs, and other developing countries, has induced a domestic reorganization of production rather than a general decline in manufactured production (deindustrialization) within developed economies.

zh: 实际上，发达国家与发展中国家的贸易是顺差，因为后者的工业化增加了对机械和其他先进产品的需求。
en: Indeed developed countries have a trade surplus with developing countries as the latter's industrialization increases demand for machinery and other advanced goods.

zh: 全球技术扩散和新的生产商出现进一步加剧了全球竞争。所以，持续的结构调整已经变成了发达经济体的一个永久性特征。
en: The global diffusion of technology and the emergence of new producers have speeded up the dynamics of global competition such that continuous structural adaptation has become a permanent feature of the operation of advanced economies.

zh: 现代金融市场的规模和全球扩张已加大了特定的制度风险，金融制度可能更容易受承负债务和延迟支付之苦。
en: The magnitude and global reach of modern financial markets have increased certain systemic risks.Financial institutions may have become more exposed to default or delayed payments.

zh: 90年代借款给发展中国家使制度暴露在与70年代相同的风险之下。但还有另外的风险，各种基金日益联合起来，冲击着新兴市场的股票交易以及其他市场。
en: Lending to developing countries in the 1990s exposes institutions to risks similar to those faced in the 1970s, but also to additional risks to the extent that these funds are linked increasingly to performance on emerging market stock exchanges and other markets.

zh: 70年代以来，全球金融一直以指数增长，因此，当代全球金融流量和网络的广度、强度、速度和影响都是空前的。
en: Since the 1970s there has been an exponential growth in global finance such that the extensity, intensity, velocity and impact of contemporary global financial flows and networks are largely unprecedented.

zh: 国内金融市场和世界主要的金融中心日益植根于同一全球金融体系之中。
en: National financial markets and the world's key financial centres are increasingly embedded within a global financial system.

zh: 在这些发展的同时，还有一个金融深化的过程。这样，几乎没有国家能将其自身置身于世界金融市场的运作之外。
en: Alongside these developments there has occurred a process of financial deepening, such that few economies can insulate themselves from the daily operations of world financial markets.

zh: 巨额的资本需求和周期性的大量现金盈余使跨国公司成为国际金融市场的主角。
en: Their huge capital demands and periodic large cash surpluses have made them key players in international financial markets.

zh: 它们在贸易、金融、技术和文化全球化，以及军事技术的扩散中发挥着重要的作用，但跨国公司主要活动领域是生产和服务的国际化。
en: They play a significant role in the globalization of trade, finance, technology and (through output and media ownership) culture, as well as in the diffusion of military technology.But MNCs are implicated most centrally in the internationalization of production and services activity: they can be conceived as stretching business across regions and continents.

zh: 人们普遍认为跨国公司是区域和洲际间贸易的延伸。
大多数的单独债权人和借款人一样都不可能具有全球眼光。然而，世界主要金融中心之间的流量大得足以证明全球资本市场正在形成。
en: Although most individual creditors, like borrowers, may not take a fully global perspective, nevertheless flows between the world's major financial centres are now sufficiently large to suggest that a global capital market is emerging.

zh: 有证据表明，资本成本实际上趋于国际统一（Fukao，1993，1995）。
en: There is evidence for this in the fact that the cost of capital has tended to converge internationally (Fukao, 1993, 1995).

zh: 对于潜意识的日益增加的关注也使人们对于心理学有了越来越大的兴趣。
en: The growing concern with the unconscious also led to greater popular interest in psychology.

zh: 弗洛伊徳的思想的冲击力直到第一次世界大战之后才被完全感受到。
en: The full impact of Sigmund Freud’s thought was not felt until after World War I.

zh: 20世纪20年代，他的观念得到了全世界的接受。
en: The 1920s witnessed a worldwide acceptance of his ideas.

zh: 弗洛伊德的术语如潜意识、抑制、本我和自我等成为流行词汇。
en: Freudian terms such as unconscious, repression, id, and ego entered the popular vocabulary.

zh: 弗洛伊德理论的大众化也带来了对其理论的广泛误解，人们以为放荡不羁的性生活对于精神健康是必要的。
en: Popularization of Freud’s ideas led to the widespread misconception that an uninhibited sex life was necessary for mental health.

zh: 尽管有着这么多误解，心理分析还是发展成为一种重要的职业，尤其是在美国。但是弗洛伊德的理念并非没有遇到挑战，有些挑战甚至直接来自他的学生。
en: Psychoanalysis developed into a major profession, especially in the United States, but Freud’s ideas did not go unchallenged, even by his own pupils.

zh: 最重要的一个挑战来自卡尔•荣格。
en: One of the most prominent challenges came from Carl Jung.

zh: 鉴于世界宗教产生的影响，说它们是人类最重要的文化革新之一几乎毋庸置疑。
en: In terms of their impact, there is little doubt that the world religions are among humanity’s most significant cultural innovations.

zh: 世界宗教已经培育了具有巨人权力和资源的宗教精英和政治精英，他们有能力动员军队和人民，能够形成跨文化的认同感和效忠感，或者能够提供根深蒂固的神学基础和合法的社会基础。
en: World religions have furnished religious and political elites with immense power and resources, be it in their capacity to mobilize armies and peoples, in their development of transcultural senses of identity and allegiance or in their provision of the entrenched theological and legal infrastructure of societies.

zh: 在这些方面，世界宗教毫无疑问构成了前现代时期最强有力的和最重要的文化全球化形式，而且无论何时都的确如此。
en: In these respects, world religions unquestionably constitute one of the most powerful and significant forms of the globalization of culture in the premodern era, indeed of all time.

zh: 70年代，日本生产商贏得竞争并开始控制这一工业部门。同汽车工业一样，起关键作用的是它们创新的管理技术。
en: In the 1970s Japanese producers achieved notable competitive success and came to dominate sectors of the industry; as with the car industry, their innovative management techniques were crucial.

zh: 直到80年代中期，日本公司比美国公司更趋于国内导向： 它们保持着国内生产的相当份额，并且从国内公司索取甚多，因为它们依靠国内生产贏得竞争优势。
en: Until the mid-1980s Japanese firms were much more domestically oriented than US firms: they retained a greater share of production domestically and sourced more from domestic firms as they derived a competitive advantage from producing at home.

zh: 1793年初，国民公会又通过一个法令宣判路易十六死刑。
en: At the beginning of 1793, the Convention passed a decree condemning Louis XVI to death.

zh: 1793年1月21日，国王被执行死刑，对旧制度的摧毁终于完成了。
en: With his execution on January 21, 1793, the destruction of the old regime was complete.

zh: 法国革命已经没有退路了。

en: There could be no turning back.

zh: 布雷顿森林体系体现了追求开放的全球市场的自由贸易者与追求国内繁荣和充分就业的社会民主主义者之间的妥协。
en: The BWS embodied a compromise between the free traders, who desired open global markets, and the social democrats, who desired national prosperity and full employment.

zh: 鲁杰将其描述成为世界贸易自由化提供证明的“复合的自由主义”。同时，它通过资本控制和固定汇率，确保政府没有必要牺牲社会保障制度和目标是完成就业和增长的宏观经济政策（1982年）。
en: As Ruggie describes it, this 'embedded liberalism, provided for the liberalization of world trade while ensuring, through capital controls and fixed exchange rates, that governments did not have to sacrifice systems of social protection and macroeconomic policy geared to the achievement of domestic objectives, such as full employment and growth (1982).

zh: 这不意味着国家解除负担，不必调整国内经济政策以解决收支赤字和盈余，而意味着这种调整会逐渐发生且同国内经济优先权相符合。
en: This did not mean that countries were relieved of the need to adjust domestic economic policy in response to balance of payments deficits or surpluses, but rather that adjustment could occur incrementally and in accordance with domestic economic priorities.

zh: 在19世纪60年代早期，农民问题与创建一支近代军队的难题纠缠在一起。
en: In the early 1860s the peasant question became intertwined with the problem of creating a modern army.

zh: 这个问题的解决不仅影响到日本作为一个主权国家的独立性，而且还严重地影响着日本社会的性质。
en: The solution to this question affected not only Japan’s independenceas a sovereign state but the very character of the society.

zh: 实质上，政府不得不就是否武装农民以保卫日本抵御外敌这一问题作出决定。
en: In essence the government had to decide whether or not to arm the peasant in order to defend Japan against the foreign enemy.

zh: 的确，列强的权力结构及其行动仍然对它们彼此的军事姿态以及所有其他国家的军事观点发挥主导性的作用，这仅仅是因为列强制定各种规则和标准。
en: Indeed, the structure of power and the actions of the great powers remain dominant influences on the military postures of each other and of all other states.

zh: 但是从军事技术或军事力量层次的标准来看，所有其他的国家都根据其来最终确定它们的防御能力。
en: At one level this is simply because the great powers set the standards, be it in military technology or force levels, against which all other states ultimately calibrate their defence capability.

zh: 因此美国的防御政策要比吉里巴斯（西太平洋群岛）的防御政策具有更大范围的全球性影响。
en: Thus US defence policy has more wide-ranging global effects than does that of Kiribati.

zh: 在考察当代武器转移体系的特征之前，将其置于战后全球军费开支、军事能力和武器销售的主要潮流和模式这样一个大环境中来研究，或许对我们的讨论有所帮助。
en: Before examining the distinctive features of the contemporary arms transfer system, it might be helpful to place this in the context of the key trends and patterns in postwar global military expenditure, military capabilities and arms sales.

zh: 在1945年后，世界军费开支以相当快的速度增长，一直保持到50年代早期。60年代保持稳定不变，接着又恢复到上升的态势。
en: Following demobilization in 1945, world military expenditure grew fairly rapidly until the early 1950s, stabilized until the 1960s, and then resumed an upward trajectory.

zh: 英国的海军和军事力量加强了伦敦作为世界贸易和金融中心的地位（参见第3和第4章）。
en: British naval and military power reinforced London's position as the centre of world trade and finance (see chapters 3 and 4).

zh: 然而，直到这个时候为止，没有哪一个单独的国家是居于霸权地位的。在欧洲，至少有两个强大的国家总是在争夺支配地位，并且它们经常会在殖民区域上发生利益冲突。
en: However, until this moment no one single power was hegemonic; at least two powerful states were always contending for dominance in Europe itself, and their interests constantly clashed in colonial territories.

zh: 此外，世界贸易的扩张还将那些非国家组织卷入了这场争夺战之中（Tilly，1990，第189页）。
en: In addition, the expansion of world commerce drew non-state actors into these struggles (Tilly, 1990, p. 189).

zh: 空想社会主义者通过他们重建社会的计划吸引了一批女性支持者，她们相信只有重建社会秩序才会有助于妇女地位的改善。
en: With their plans for the reconstruction of society, utopian socialists attracted a number of woman supporters who believed that only a reordering of society would help women.

zh: 有一位欧文的信徒，叫做弗朗西斯•赖特的富有女性， 购买了一些奴隶，试图在田纳西州的纳绍巴建立一个模范社区。
en: One of Owen's disciples, a wealthy woman named Frances Wright, bought slaves in order to set up a model community at Nashoba, Tennessee.

zh: 这个社区最后失败了，但赖特仍继续为妇女的权利而奋斗。
en: The community failed, but Wright continued to work for women's rights.

zh: 第二次世界大战后，美国公司开风气之先，扩展其外国直接投资：50年代和60年代，外国直接投资的全部流量的至少一半来自美国。
en: The initial expansion of FDI in the postwar era came from US companies: in the 1950s and 1960s at least half of all FDI flows originated from the US.

zh: 美洲的公司主要投资全球的采矿业和农业，特别是石油工业。
en: American corporations invested in mining and agriculture around the globe, notably in the oil industry.

zh: 由于拉丁美洲国家为实现工业化实施贸易保护主义，所以美国制造业跨国公司减少了出口机会，而把生产直接设在这一地区，但是投资的扩大主要是通过在欧洲和加拿大建立的海外公司实现的。
en: As Latin American countries industrialized behind protectionist barriers, US manufacturing MNCs responded to reduced export possibilities by locating production in the region.But the major source of expansion was through overseas manufacturing in Europe and Canada.

zh: 不管其组织形式如何，跨国公司的地理位置仍是一个重要的问题：跨国公司不能随意设置。
en: Whatever their organizational form, geography still matters: MNCs cannot simply locate anywhere or everywhere.

zh: 在多数部门，进入市场的机会是选择区位的重要限制和吸引跨国生产的主要刺激。在这方面，生产和销售的全球化有其自身的局限性。
en: In most sectors, access to major markets is both an important constraint on location and a major incentive for multinational production; in this respect, the globalization of production and distribution has its limits.

zh: 生产不可能仅仅随人的意志而组织或转移。
en: Production cannot be simply shifted or reorganized at will.

zh: 在这个时代重要的是要把全球流动的影响——文明或者宗教之间的相遇或接触经常是一次性的——与持续的关系的影响区分开来。
en: It is important in this era to distinguish between the impact of global flows -- often one-off encounters or engagements between civilizations or regions -- and the impact of sustained relationships.

zh: 最初的流动，如外敌入侵、皈依世界性宗教或者传染病的流行经常造成重大影响，导致现有国家的解体或混乱。
en: The impact of initial flows such as external invasions, proselytizing world religions or the arrival of pandemics was often immense, resulting in the collapse or dislocation of existing states.

zh: 这方面的例子包括：蛮族部落入侵拉丁欧洲，伊斯兰教最初对亚洲西南部以及北非造成的影响，黑死病对中华汉帝国的冲击以及蒙古人入侵带来的军事技术的传播。
en: Examples of these flows include the barbarian invasions of Latin Europe, the initial impact of Islam on south-western Asia and North Africa, the impact of the Black Death on Han China, and the spread of military technologies across Eurasia in the wake of the Mongol invasions.

zh: 合成染料的发明，使蓝靛的贸易破产了，黄麻种植只限于孟加拉和阿萨姆地区，虽然不排除有在其他地区种植黄麻的可能性。
en: The discovery of synthetic dyes ruined the indigo trade.Jute was grown only in one area, Bengal and Assam, though the possibility of growing it in other places cannot be excluded.

zh: 主要的限制似乎具有社会学的意义：小农经营的各种农业生产组织效率很低因为很难控制众多小农的活动；另一方面，使用奴隶或半奴隶劳动力的典型种植园，刚需要有效的压迫工具。
en: The main limitation seems to be a sociological one.The agrarian variation of the putting-out system is not very efficient because it is difficult to control the practices of numerous small cultivators.On the other hand, a straightforward plantation system employing servile or semiservile labor is likely to need an efficient repressive apparatus.

zh: 要想创立这种类型的大规模的种植园，则超出了英国和印度的力量，随着时间推移，要这样做变得越来越不可能了。
en: To create one on any large scale was beyond British or Indian resources, increasingly so as time went on.

zh: 全球殖民扩张在这个时代继续进行，但是，随着欧洲军事机器一同进入非洲和亚洲的欧洲生态系统的能力被当地更强大的免疫能力和生态资源抵消了。1492年的事件是历史上独一尤二的，然而，它使西方资本和市场需求对殖民地资源过度开采的过程开始了。例如，砍伐森林就可以追溯到19世纪晚期的爪哇和印度。与环境退化带来的地方性和国家性的影响相比较，它带来的全球性影响是有限的。
en: Global colonial expansion continued in this era but the capacity of European ecology to follow the European military machine into Africa and Asia was thwarted by their more robust immunological and ecological resources.There would be no parallel to the experience of 1492.Rather, it would require the power of Western capital and market demand to begin processes of environmental overexploitation in the colonies - deforestation, for example, can be traced back to the late nineteenth century in Java and India, Once again, global environmental degradation was limited in its impact by comparison with local and national impacts.

zh: 但是，帝国主义也开始辨认、研究、检查并控制地方性的环境影响（Grove，1997）。
en: But imperialism too generated the first attempts to identify, study, monitor and control local environmental impacts (Grove, 1997).

zh: 浪漫主义的另一个重要特性是个人主义，它是个人所禀有的对独特个性的兴趣。
en: Another important characteristic of Romanticism was individualism, an interest in the unique traits of each person.

zh: 浪漫主义者顺从内心热望的冲动使他们背叛中产阶级的习惯。
en: The Romantics’ desire to follow their inner drives led them to rebel against middle-class conventions.

zh: 长发、胡须、奇装异服更进一步强化了年轻的浪漫主义者所想要表达的个人主义特性。
en: Long hair, beards, and outrageous clothes served to reinforce the individualism that young Romantics were trying to express.

zh: 正象我们已经注意到的那样，这种地区的差异序列反映了历史发展的不同阶段。
en: As already noted, these regional differences reflect successive stages of historical development.

zh: 一些偏僻的内地村落，在西方人看来生活水准十分低下。在那些地区少数大户仍然带有某种有闲阶级的特性，比如不从事体力劳动，信奉知足者常乐的哲学，间或还抽点鸦片烟等等。
en: In some remote interior villages, by accepting what would seem to Westerners an abysmally low standard of living, a few leading families could still take on some of the traits of a leisure class, such as freedom from physical labor and adherence to a philosophy of contentment, aided in some instances by opium smoking, though they fell far short of the ideal of the classically educated gentry.

zh: 冷战结束以后，在欧洲以外，区域关系的制度化速度有了显著的加快，如美洲、亚太地区，以及程度稍慢的非洲。
en: Since the end of the Cold War, there has been a significant acceleration in the institutionalization of regional relations beyond Europe: in the Americas, Asia-Pacific and, to a lesser degree, in Africa.

zh: 但是这样的区域主义所采取的形式却与欧盟的一体化模式有着极大的差异。
en: But the forms taken by this regionalism are radicallydifferent from the integrationist model of the EU.

zh: 实际上，当前世界其他地方大部分反对将欧盟模式作为某种直接效仿的对象。
en: Indeed, to date the rest of the world has largely rejected the EU model as something to emulate directly.

zh: 除了这些技术基础设施以外，许多国际机构和组织都努力寻求文化交流的全球规范。
en: Alongside these technological infrastructures a number of international agencies and organizations have sought some global regulation of cultural flows.

zh: 它们有：那些明确涉及全球交往和文化的组织，如联合国教科文组织；全球技术基础设施的调整机构，如国际电信联盟或国际电信卫星通信机构 （参看第1.
en: These include those explicitly concerned with global communications and cultures such as UNESCO, the global regulators of technological infrastructures such as the ITU or INTELSAT (see section 1.

zh: 2.3节）；以及世界贸易组织，这个组织主要涉及文化保护政策问题，它对贸易自由化产生重要影响。
en: 2.3) and the World Trade Organization, which has become enmeshed in the issue of cultural protectionism where this impacts on the liberalization of trade.

zh: 这些规范并没有阻碍交流；事实上，包括国家、区域以及全球在内的各个层次的交流继续增加。
en: This regulation has not hindered communication; in fact, communication continues to increase at all levels - national, regional and global.

zh: 评估通常带有相当大的推测性。
en: As usual, estimates are fairly speculative.

zh: 例如，在80年代初期，粮农组织认为，在未来的45年内，16%〜18%的世界热带雨林将消失。
en: FAO, for example, argued at the start of the 1980s that 16-18 per cent of the world's tropical rainforest would be lost over the next forty-five years.

zh: 到80年代末时，粮农组织估计的数字已经变成到2035年时将失去30%〜35%的热带雨林。
en: By the end of the decade this had risen to a 30 to 35 per cent loss by 2035.

zh: 十月份开始新的一轮劳作，农民开始为冬播做准备。
en: A new cycle began in October, when the peasants prepared the ground for planting winter crops.

zh: 二三月份主要是种植春季作物：燕麦，大麦、豌豆、蚕豆、扁豆等。
en: In February and March, the land was plowed for spring crops--oats, barley, peas, beans, and lentils.

zh: 早夏季节农民相对清闲，但这一时期仍然有割草、剪羊毛之类的活计。
en: Early summer was a comparatively relaxed time, although there was still weeding and sheepshearing to be done.

zh: 每个季节里，农奴不仅要耕作自己的土地而且要为领主耕作私有地。
en: In every season, serfs worked not only their own land but also the lord’s demesne.

zh: 他们在自己的家庭居所旁经营小菜园，菜园中种植的蔬菜构成他们日常食物的主要来源。
en: They also tended the small gardens attached to their dwellings where they grew the vegetables that made up much of their diet.

zh: 他们在这种情况下提出这样的议案，例如“风月法令”，仅仅是出于政治策略的动机，还是其他更多的考虑，对这一点人们的看法尚未统一。
en: Whether or not the proposals they made at this time, known as the Ventose decrees,were more than a political maneuver is a question still under discussion.

zh: 不过这一情况至少表明，罗伯斯庇尔和圣·鞠斯特对农民问题了解甚少，他们的提议离满足农民所表达的要求还差得很远。而这一切，作为革命的领导者，本来是应该充分了解的。
en: What the episode does demonstrate is that Robespierre and Saint-Just knew very little about the peasants’ problems and that their proposals fell far short of meeting demands of the peasants expressed in petitions whose general content the revolutionary leaders must have known.

zh: 本书对一种变革尤其关注，它就是人类共同体随着时间的变化相互深深地卷入，尽管彼此的程度不同。
en: One type of transformation has been of particular concern in this volume: the significant, albeit uneven, enmeshment of human communities with one another over time.

zh: 虽然在第一个千年的后期罗马帝国和伊斯兰教的扩张无论在范围还是时间上都非常强大，但是只是在过去几百年中，世界几乎所有地区的人类共同体相互间的接触才开始逐渐正规化；人类共同体的共同命运交织在一起。
en: Although the Roman Empire and the spread of Islam in the second half of the first millennium constituted formidable projections of power over space and time, it has only been in the last few hundred years that human communities have come into increasingly regularized contact with each other in nearly all regions of the world; the collective fortunes of human communities have become intertwined.

zh: 这种转变及其对全球化的文明化和民主化事业的意义是最后这部分的中心。
en: This shift, and its implications for the project of civilizing and democratizing globalization, are the concern of this final part of the conclusion.

zh: 由于石顶极为沉重，罗马式教堂需要厚重的石柱和墙体支撑。
en: Because stone roofs were extremely heavy, Romanesque churches required massive pillars and walls to hold them up.

zh: 这使得窗户所占的空间被迫缩小，结果罗马式大教堂内部光线黯淡。
en: This left little space for windows, making Romanesque churches quite dark inside.

zh: 厚重的石墙和石柱使得罗马式教堂给人一种稳固感，这样的外形令人不禁想起城堡的样子。
en: The massive walls and pillars gave Romanesque churches a sense of solidity and a look reminiscent of a fortress.

zh: 洛可可风格的另一特性是其装饰性风格可以很容易地应用于巴洛克式建筑之上。
en: Another aspect of Rococo was that its decorative work could easily be used with Baroque architecture.

zh: 凡尔赛宫的建筑对欧洲有着极大的冲击。
en: The palace of Versailles had an enormous impact on Europe.

zh: 奥地利皇帝、瑞典国王、德国亲王、意大利亲王甚至一位俄国沙皇在建筑他们的宏大宫殿时，“向波旁家族看齐”都成为他们的重要指导思想。
en: "Keeping up with the Bourbons" became important as the Austrian emperor, the Swedish king, German princes, Italian princes, and even a Russian tsar built grandiose palaces.

zh: 在战后，这些官僚体制不得不处理大大增加的移民量和越来越多的各国旅游者。
