en: Whereas, in the past, advanced industrial processes tended to be concentrated in developed economies, companies now locate segments of the production process in lower wage countries or subcontract to local companies in Asia or Latin America, which leads to higher levels of trade between developed and developing countries.

zh: 仅仅在50年前，欧洲还处在自我毁灭的关头。
en: Just over fifty years ago Europe was at the point of self-destruction.

zh: 从那时起，欧洲创造了新的合作机制、新的维护人权的工具以及政治制度，目的不仅是使成员国对广泛的问题负责，而且要抽取它们的部分主权。
en: Since that moment Europe has created new mechanisms of collaboration, new instruments of human rights enforcement and political institutions in order not only to hold member states to account across a broad range of issues, but to pool aspects of their sovereignty.

zh: 而且，有众多区域性和全球性跨国行动者正在参与全球化条件的争论——不只是公司，还有像环境运动和妇女运动这样的新社会运动。
en: Furthermore, there are many regional and global transnational actors contesting the terms of globalization --- not just corporations but new social movements such as the environmental movement and the women's movement.

zh: “跨国公民社会”中出现了“新的”声音，它们来自里约热内卢的环境大会、开罗的控制人口大会以及北京的世界妇女大会。
en: These are the ‘new' voices of an emergent 'transnational civil society', heard for instance at the Rio Conference on the Environment, the Cairo Conference on Population Control and the Beijing Women's Conference.

zh: 有一时期，人们曾认为文明的摇篮是尼罗河流域，但现在一致同意，最早的文明中心是苏美尔，也就是《旧约全书》中的“希纳国”（Land of Shinar）。
en: Although at one time it was believed that the Nile valley gave birth to civilization, it is now agreed that the earliest centers were in Sumer, the Old Testament's "land of Shinar."

zh: 苏美尔位于过去称为“美索不达米亚”——大致相当于现在的伊拉克共和国——的南部，南临波斯湾，由若干块荒芜的、被风乱吹的小平原组成。
en: This area comprised the barren, wind-swept plains at the head of the Persian Gulf, in the southern part of what used to be known as Mesopotamia and is now the state of Iraq.

zh: 约公元前3500年时，一些已改进生产技术，正在耕种这片干旱的荒原的农业公社，成功地完成了从新石器时代的部落文化到文明的过渡。
en: About 3500b.c. certain communities of agriculturists who had developed techniques for cultivating this arid wasteland successfully completed the transition from Neolithic tribalism to civilization.

zh: 在当代世界，它们的作用已经被大型媒体产业和个人与群体越來越多的流动所取代。
en: In the contemporary world their role has been displaced by that of large media industries as well as by the greater flows of individuals and groups.

zh: 多国公司位于这些相互联系的过程的中心。
en: MNCs are at the heart of these interconnected processes.

zh: 尽管大型的通信公司并不是过去50年的独有现象——而且我们可以将国际新闻机构和出版公司的历史追溯到19世纪。国际电影出版公司的历史可以追溯到两次战争之间的年代——但是，它们带来的文化影响及其力量在历史上都是空前的（参看Herman和McChesney,1997)。
en: Although large communications corporations are not unique to the last five decades --- and we can trace the origins of international news agencies and publishers back into the nineteenth century, and those of international film exporters to the interwar era --- their cultural reach and power is historically unparalleled (see Herman and McChesney, 1997).

zh: 一定程度上，这些发展是各国中央银行通过国际清算银行合作的结果。国际清算银行的成员，范围已超出了10个最初创始国，包括世界上所有关键的新兴经济体。
en: These developments, in part, have been the product of cooperation between national central banks through the Bank for International Settlements (BIS), whose membership is expanding beyond the original ten major economies (G10) to include all the key emerging economies in the world.

zh: 然而，国际清算银行只是一个多边论坛。各国政府，特別是美国政府在促进更广泛的国际金融管理体制的发展中起着关键作用（T.Porter, 1993,第3章；Kapstein，1994b）。
en: BIS, nevertheless, is only a multilateral forum，and governments，particularly the US, have played a key role in encouraging the development of a more comprehensive international regulatory regime for finance (T. Porter, 1993, ch. 3; Kapstein, 1994b).

zh: 结果，达成了关于跨国证券交易管理的国际协议（T.Porter, 1993，第4章）。
en: As a result international agreements have been reached with respect to the regulation of cross-border securities trading (T. Porter, 1993, ch. 4).

zh: 奥古斯丁生于北非，依靠身为热心的基督徒的母亲养育成人。
en: Born in North Africa, Augustine was reared by his mother, an ardent Christian.

zh: 384年，他终于成为米兰的一名修辞学教授。
en: He eventually became a professor of rhetoric at Milan in 384.

zh: 在经历了一番深刻动人的宗教生活后，他放弃了自己的教职回到北非,从396年起，他在那里担任希波的主教直至430年去世。
en: After experiencing a profound and moving religious experience, he gave up his teaching position and went back to North Africa, where he became bishop of Hippo from 396 until his death in 430.

zh: 7、8世纪的修女在基督教的传播中也发挥了重要作用。
en: Nuns of the seventh and eighth centuries also played an important role in the spread of Christianity.

zh: 伟大的英国传教士本尼法在英国就依靠修女提供图书和金钱。
en: The great English missionary Boniface relied on nuns in England for books and money.

zh: 他还请求女修道院长选派修女到新皈依的日耳曼地区建立修道院。
en: He also asked the abbess of Wimborne to send groups of nuns to establish convents in newly converted German lands.

zh: 一个名为例奥巴的修女在日耳曼的比索夫斯海姆建立了第一个修道院。
en: A nun named Leoba established the first convent in Germany at Bischofsheim.

zh: 随着1972年芝加哥期权贸易市场的建立，衍生品急剧增长。
en: The growth of derivatives trading, following the establishment of the Chicago Options Exchange in 1972, has been astronomical.

zh: 国际衍生品的交易热潮只是在80年代中期才真正开始，但表4-8显示，未偿总价值已增长7倍，达到大约100亿美元，而场外交易增长更快，是外汇交易市场规模的两倍。
en: Trade in international derivatives only really began in earnest in the mid-1980s but, as table 4.8 shows, the total value of contracts outstanding has risen over sevenfold to around $10 trillion, while OTC contracts have risen even faster to over twice the size of the exchange-traded market.

zh: 如此考虑，衍生品的名义未偿价值要高于世界国内生产总值。
en: To put this in perspective, the notional outstanding value of derivatives is higher than world GDP.

zh: 如果有人为业余乐趣作辩护，强调其积极贡献，那么，同样可以提出许多相反的评价意见。
en: If there is some justification for regarding the conception of the amateur as a positive contribution, there are clear grounds for a negative assessment of several other ideas.
Those about to be discussed, however, arise in quite a different social context.

zh: 各执一辞的纷纭议论，前因后果和来龙去脉各不相同。反动的社会理论容易在土地贵族中滋生繁衍，他们总算保住了政治权力，却丢掉了经济权力，或者说，为陌生的新兴经济权力所威胁。
en: Reactionary social theories are liable to flourish in a landed upper class that manages to hang onto political power successfully although it is losing out economically or perhaps is threatened by a new and strange source of economic power.

zh: 例如，在中国，汉族的明朝取代了蒙古族的元朝，整个国家又完全回到老路上来。
en: In China, for example, the native Ming dynasty replaced the Mongol Yuan, and the country returned with a vengeance to age-old ways.

zh: 在庞大的穆斯林世界里，土生土长的希腊-罗马人、伊朗人、闪米特人以及埃及人的各自传统，非但未被湮灭，反而溶汇成一种综合的伊斯兰教文明。
en: In the sprawling Moslem world the indigenous Greco-Roman.Iranian.Semitic, and Egyptian traditions were not wiped out but rather were fused into the civilization of Islam.

zh: 同样，东罗马帝国又以拜占廷帝国的名称继续生存了整整1000年。因此，直至近代，其居民仍称自己为“罗马人”。
en: Likewise the East Roman Empire continued without interruption for a full millennium as the Byzantine Empire, so that its inhabitants referred to themselves in modern times as "Romaioi," or Romans.

zh: 从这个角度来看,15世纪以来，欧洲帝国扩张带来的迁移更接近于中国或罗马式的定居国家向外扩张带来的移民。
en: Viewed in this perspective the migrations that initially accompanied the outward push of European empire-building from the fifteenth century onwards are closer to the Chinese or Roman pattern of settled states expanding outwards.

zh: 然向，已经建立的帝国和移民社区与原来的扩张中心往往被广阔的海洋隔开，从这个意义上说，这种迁移又更加接近伊斯兰国家模式，伊斯兰国家跨越了中东并到达了印度洋附近。
en: However, established imperial outposts and emigrant communities were separated from the metropolis by vast transoceanic distances and in that regard are closer to the network of Islamic states which spread out across the Middle East and around the Indian Ocean.

zh: 但是，欧洲人在大洋洲和美洲建立的帝国与罗马、中国或伊斯兰国家不同，它们与当地的文明发生了冲突，欧洲人可以一点一点地从人口上和政治上将它们消灭掉。
en: But, unlike Rome, China or Islam, European empires in Oceania and the Americas encountered civilizations that they were able, quite literally, to obliterate, demographically and politically.

zh: 伊斯兰教是一种直接的、简单的信仰，它强调遵从安拉意志的必要性。
en: Islam was a direct and simple faith, emphasizing the need to obey the will of Allah.

zh: 这意味着遵从一项以五功为内容的基本的伦理规范，即信仰安拉、尊穆罕默德为先知；每天例行五次标准的祈祷，每周五中午参加共同的敬拜安拉的祷告；遵守神圣的斋月(伊斯兰历法中的第九个月)的规定，从日出到日落期间禁食；若有可能要参加朝圣，即著名的麦加朝圣，一生至少去麦加朝圣一次，向穷人和不幸的人施舍。
en: This meant following a basic ethical code consisting of the Five Pillars of Islam: belief in Allah and Muhammad as his Prophet; standard prayer five times a day and public prayer on Friday at midday to worship Allah; observance of the holy month of Ramadan (the ninth month on the Muslim calendar) with fasting from dawn to sunset; making a pilgrimage (known as the hajj), if possible, to Mecca at least once in one’s lifetime (see the box above); and giving alms to the poor and unfortunate.

zh: 严格遵守规定的信徒能够确保获得永生。
en: The faithful who observed the law were guaranteed a place in an eternal paradise.

zh: 第二就是由于危害环境的产品跨国运输而导致的环境退化。这种跨国运输经常是从那些因环境的原因而禁止销售这种产品的国家到这种产品仍然属于合法的那些国家。
en: Second, environmental degradation can result from the export of environmentally hazardous products across borders; often from countries where the sale of a product is banned for environmental reasons to countries where it remains legal.

zh: 杀虫剂和药品就是这种现象的最好例子（ Paarlberg ，1993)。
en: Pesticides and pharmaceuticals are the best examples of this practice (Paarlberg, 1993).

zh: 卡斯特和米勒勾勒了西方国家存在的4种公民身份模式。西方国家的公民身份既是公民身份和民族认同观念的代名词，又是产生于那种文化情境下的各种公共政策的体现：移民政策、归化政策和教育与文化政策。
en: Castles and Miller outline four models of citizenship in Western countries which serve as proxies both for attitudes to citizenship and national identity and for clusters of public policies that emerge from that cultural context: immigration policies, naturalization policies and educational and cultural policies.

zh: 这4种模式或策略是：虚幻的(illusory )、排他性的（exlusionary）、共和帝国的（republican-imperial)和多文化的（multicultural)。
en: Those four models/strategies are: illusory; exclusionary; republican-imperial; and multicultural.

zh: 对移民的虚幻态度与其说是一种公民身份模式，还不如说是故意忽视移民社群。
en: Illusory attitudes to immigrants are not so much a citizenship model as the deliberate disregard of immigrant communities.

zh: 表4-12显示，虽然国际债券这些基金集中程度很高，但发展中国家现在拥有这些国际债券总量的10%以上。
en: As table 4.12 indicates, developing countries now account for over 10 per cent of total international bonds, although such funds are highly concentrated.

zh: 债券市场上非洲越来越边缘化，南非则占有这些资金的相当部分。
en: Africa is largely marginalized from the bond market, with South Africa accounting for the majority of such flows.

zh: 在欧洲，匈牙利和土耳其拥有这些流量的大部分，以色列拥有流向中东的大部分资金。
en: In Europe, Hungary and Turkey account for the majority of these flows and Israel accounts for the majority of flows to the Middle East.

zh: 英国东印度公司经皇家特许于1600年成立，1858年解散，英国政府代行其功能。
en: The British East India Company was incorporated by royal charter in 1600 and effectively wound up in 1858 when the British government assumed its functions.

zh: 建立东印度公司是为了保护和增强英国对印度贸易的控制，尤其是为了与荷兰相抗衡。随着对印度大部分贸易，如香料、农业原料、鸦片和丝绸的有效垄断，东印度公司发展成为一家联合股票公司。
en: Established to defend and increase Britain's control over Indian trade, against the Dutch in particular, it developed into a joint-stock company with an effective monopoly of much Indian trade, notably in spices, agricultural raw materials, opium and textiles.

zh: 核电和潜在的核危害情况明显是灾难性环境退化在范围和危险程度上的历史分水岭；而且在过去的30年中，由于越来越多的国家已经建立了越来越多的核电站，因此，这些危险也日益加剧。
en: The case of nuclear power and potential nuclear hazards is clearly a historical watershed in the scope and dangerous potential for catastrophic environmental degradation; and the last thirty years have seen an intensification of those risks as more and more countries have built more nuclear power stations.

zh: 更重要的是，核技术的转变已经产生了复杂的再生和再循环系统，相应地，这也带来了大规模和越来越多的核废料贸易。
en: Moreover, the shifts in nuclear technologies have introduced complex systems of reprocessing and recycling which have in turn generated a large-scale and growing trade in nuclear waste.

zh: 很明显，这已经给跨国污染和污染威胁增加了新的、重要的维度。
en: This has clearly added a new and important dimension to transboundary pollution and pollution threats.

zh: 在80年代，核废料国际贸易是与其他污染性垃圾的国际贸易的迅速扩张同时进行的（Greenpeace，1993）。
en: The international trade in nuclear waste has been paralleled by a rapid expansion in the international trade of other hazardous wastes in the 1980s (Greenpeace, 1993).

zh: 国际货币基金组织（1993)是这样定义外国直接投资的:“直接投资指的是这样的投资：其目的是获得一个经济体中的一家企业，而不是投资者的企业发展的持久利益，投资者的目的是在该企业的管理中拥有有效的发言权。
en: The IMF (1993) defines FDI thus: 'Direct investment refers to investment that is made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise operating in an economy other than that of the investor, the investor's purpose being to have an effective voice in the management of the enterprise.'

zh: ”在这本书中把证券投资描绘为“长期的债券和公司证券，不包括直接投资和储备”。

en: The same manual describes portfolio investment as 'long-term bonds and corporate equities other than those included in the categories for direct investment and reserves'.

zh: 在实践中应用这些定义有些困难。
en: There are several difficulties in applying these definitions in practice.

zh: 广泛利用的技术意味着英国一家小公司出版的书，可以在世界各地的书店中订阅到。
en: Widely available technology means that a book published by a small company in Britain can be ordered in bookshops around the world.

zh: 贸易使所有产出部门的状况发生了革命性变化——今天，几乎没有一种产业仅仅依赖于国内市场或者国内生产部门和原材料。
en: Trade has revolutionized the prospects of all industrial sectors --- today few industries rely purely on domestic markets or domestically produced components and raw materials.

zh: 举例来说，虽然建筑业基本上是使用国内原料，雇用本土的劳动力和满足国内需求，但主要设备可能是进口的。而且，随着建筑公司国际所有权的增加，配套服务也可能进行贸易。
en: For example, although the construction industry primarily uses domestic materials, employs local labour and satisfies domestic demand, capital equipment may be imported and, with increasing international ownership of construction firms, support services may also be traded.

zh: 全球交往基础设施中的一系列变革一直支撑着所有的全球和区域交往的大幅度增加。
en: The immense increase in global and regional interactions of all kinds has been supported by a series of transformations in the infrastructure of global interaction.

zh: 我们要强调的是，虽然其中某些技术的发明本身不足以解释其利用、普及和增长，但是无可置疑的是，它们推动了当代全球化量的增长和质的改变。
en: We emphasize that the invention of some of these technologies is not sufficient by itself to account for their deployment, use and growth; but their contribution to both the increased volume and transformed character of contemporary globalization is undeniable.

zh: 从运输技术角度来看，战后的岁月不仅见证了像内燃机和铁路这样的旧技术的广泛使用和全球普及，也见证了新的运输方式的发展。后者包括喷飞机和集装箱运输，它们在长距离运输大宗货物方面更快，或者说更有效率。
en: In terms of transport infrastructurethe postwar era has witnessed the intensified use and global spread of older technologies like the internal combustion engine and railways.It has also seen the development of new forms of transport that are considerably quicker, or considerably more efficient, for moving bulk goods over long distances: jet airliners and containerized shipping, respectively.

zh: 逃出去的叙利亚人跟随法官哈拉维，于斋月来到巴格达。
en: Refugees from Syria reached Baghdad in Ramadan, among them the qadi Abu sa’d al-Harawi.

zh: 他们在哈里发的法庭上陈述经过，如泣如诉，感人肺腑。
en: They told the Caliph’s ministers a story that wrung their hearts and brought tears to their eyes.

zh: 星期五，叙利亚人来到大清真寺痛哭求援，讲述伊斯兰教徒在圣城遭受的痛苦：男人被杀，妇女和孩子遇抢被俘，闻者莫不热泪盈眶。
en: On Friday they went to the Cathedral Mosque and begged for help, weeping so that their hearers wept with them as they described the sufferings of the Muslims in that Holy City: the men killed, the women and children taken prisoner, the homes pillaged.

zh: 他们历经此巨难，因此中断了斋戒。
en: Because of the terrible hardships they had suffered, they were allowed to break the fast.

zh: 国家受到无数的跨越不同的空间范围的政府间组织（IGOs）、国际机构和体制的挑战。同时还不得不面对诸如欧盟那样的准超国家机构。
en: The state is confronted by an enormous number of intergovernmental organizations (IGOs), international agencies and regimes which operate across different spatial reaches, and by quasi-supranational institutions, like the European Union.

zh: 非国家主体或超国家实体，例如多国公司、跨国压力集团、跨国职业协会、社会运动等等，也都紧密参与了全球政治。
en: Non-state actors ortransnational bodies, such as multinational corporations, transnational pressure groups, transnational professional associations, social movements and so on, also participate intensively in global politics.

zh: 货币、政府债券、场内交易衍生品和其他主要的金融产品遍及世界主要的金融中心。
en: For currencies, government bonds, exchange-traded derivatives and other leading financial products, trading spans the world's major financial centres.

zh: 伦敦、纽约和东京市场联系如此紧密，以至于它们作为全天候单一市场发挥功能。它们占这些资产交易的大部分，并开始为世界价格设定了一个基点。
en: The London, New York and Tokyo markets have become so enmeshed that they function as a twenty-four hour single market; they account for the majority of trade in these assets and act to set benchmark world prices.

zh: 源于《十二铜表法》的民法也已不能满足后来罗马人的需求，只好由执法官加以修正和增补。
en: Civil law derived from the Twelve Tables proved inadequate for later Roman needs, however, and gave way to corrections and additions by the praetors.

zh: 就职伊始，执法官就会签署法令，列出处理各种案例的指导纲领。
en: On taking office, a praetor issued an edict listing his guidelines for dealing with different kinds of legal cases.

zh: 执法官深谙法律，可他在拟订法令时，还需依靠罗马法官(他们也是业余法学专家）提供建议。
en: The praetors were knowledgeable in law, but they also relied on Roman jurists---amateur law experts---for advice in preparing their edicts.

zh: 法学家的司法解释，常常体现在执法官签发的法令中，这些解释形成了大量的法律条文。
en: The interpretations of the jurists, often embodied in the edicts of the praetors, created a body of legal principles.

zh: 相互交叉的区域性和全球性安全制度的存在标志着国际安全事务新的历史模式的出现，几乎没有一个国家和地区被排除在现存的国际（区域性和全球性）安全机制之外。
en: The existence of overlapping regional and global security regimes defines a new conjuncture in the historical pattern of international security affairs.For few states, and certainly no major global regions, are excluded from participation in existing international (regional and global) security regimes.

zh: 另外，这些各种各样体制的制度化及其相互之间的影响有助于全球规制基础结构的形成。尽管其权威有限，它也深深地嵌入（虽然是不均衡的）到世界大多数国家的军事和安全实践中。
en: Moreover, the institutionalization of and mutual interaction between these diverse regimes have contributed to the formation of a global regulatory infrastructure which, irrespective of its limited authority, is embedded (however unevenly) in the military and security practices of the majority of the world's states.

zh: 总之，在变化着的区域和全球秩序进程和结构中，传统的国家主权和自主概念正在被重新讨论和重新表述。
en: In sum, traditional conceptions of state sovereignty and autonomy are being renegotiated and rearticulated within the changing processes and structures of regional and global order.

zh: 而且，国家被锁定在多样的、复合的、重叠的政治领域中——我们在前面把它称作多层次治理。
en: States, moreover, are locked into diverse, complex overlapping political domains --- what we earlier referred to as multilayered governance.

zh: 因此，国家主权和国家自主性必须被视为处在更广泛的治理框架中，在这些框架中，它们只是支持政治权威行使的众多原则之一。
en: Thus national sovereignty and national autonomy have to be thought of as embedded within broader frameworks of governance in which they have become but one set of principles, among others, underlying the exercise of political authority.

zh: 对于智者来说，没有什么绝对正确和错误的东西——对一个人是正确的东西或许对另一个人就是错误的。
en: To the Sophists, there was no absolute right or wrong---what was right for one individual might be wrong for another.

zh: 真正的智慧应该是能够觉察并能够满足自己的利益。
en: True wisdom consisted of being able to perceive and pursue one’s own good.

zh: 正是因为他们持有这些思想观点，很多人认为智者有害于社会，尤其是会危及年轻人的价值观念。
en: Because of these ideas, many people viewed the Sophists as harmful to society and especially dangerous to the values of young people.

zh: 但同样，一国内的中小企业可以通过特许权经营、与其他中小企业合作或者在其中进行有价证券投资等形式向国外扩展，以形成全球生产和销售链。
en: But equally SMEs in one country may expand abroad through franchising, or cooperative arrangements with or portfolio investment in other SMEs to form global production and distribution chains.

zh: 虽然大的跨国公司一直倾向于控制全球生产和分配系统，但现在并不一定如此。
en: Although big MNCs have tended to dominate global production and distribution systems this is no longer necessarily the case.

zh: 以阿根廷一家小型女内衣零售企亚卡罗·库里（Caro Cuori)为例，其销售额不及福特汽车公司的0.5%，但它已在西班牙、葡萄牙、厄瓜多尔、加拿大、美国和南非等地设有分支机构（Financial Times，10/2/1998，第32页）。
en: Take, for instance, Caro Cuori, a small Argentinean lingerie retailer (with sales of less than 0.5 per cent of the Ford Motor company) which has outlets in Spain, Portugal, Ecuador, Canada, the US and South Africa (Financial Times, 10 Feb. 1998, p. 32).

zh: 这种观点与事实明显冲突，即银行和其他金融机构为了其自身的有效运作仍依赖国内的和国际的管理机构。商业银行要求中央银行作为最后贷款人以防银行破产。
en: Such a view is contradicted by the fact that banks and other financial institutions still rely on national and international regulatory authorities for their effective operation.Commercial banks require central banks to act as lender of last resort to prevent bank collapses.

zh: 正像80年代的债务危机和90年代末东亚危机所显示的那样，当银行陷入困境时。经济上最强大的国家（主要是美国）和国际公共机构，如国际货币基金组织，就得介入以阻止金融崩溃。
en: As the debt crises of the 1980s and the East Asian crisis of the late 1990s showed, when banks get into difficulties the most economically powerful states (mainly the US) alongside international public authorities, such as the IMF, have to step in to prevent financial collapse.

zh: 至少在原则上可以这样假设：客观地找到这些必要条件是可能的——就象生物学家可以客观地找出生物所赖以繁殖、生存的条件一样，比如：需要某种营养、适量的水份等等。
en: I assume that, in principle at any rate, it is possible to discover what these requirements really were in the same.objective sense that a biologist can discover for any living organism the conditions necessary for reproduction and survival, such as specific kinds of nourishment, amounts of moisture, and the like.

zh: 还有一点应弄清楚：种植园蓄奴制和早期工业资丰主义发展所需要的条件远远超出了经济领域，已涉及到政治制度的问题，蓄奴制社会与自由劳动力社会的政治形式是不同的。
en: It should also be clear that the requirements or structural imperatives for plantation slavery and early industrial capitalism extend far beyond economic arrangements as such and certainly into the area of political institutions.Slave societies do not have the same political forms as those based on free labor.

zh: 现在，还是让我们回到中心问题上来，探究一下南北双方非打不可的原因。
en: But, to return to our central question, is that any reason why they have to fight?

zh: 希腊重装步兵是佩带宽大圆盾和长矛的步兵。
en: The Greek hoplites were infantrymen equipped with large round shields and long thrusting spears.

zh: 他们在战斗中严格按方阵行军，只要他们的阵形没有破坏，他们就是很危险的对手。
en: In battle, they advanced in tight phalanx formation and were dangerous opponents as long as this formation remained unbroken.

zh: 这个公元前7世纪的希腊瓶饰画上描绘的是交战状态下的两支重装步兵。
en: This vase painting of the seventh century B.C. shows two groups of hoplite warriors engaged in battle.

zh: 左边的吹笛者正引领着另一排士兵投入战斗。
en: The piper on the left is leading another line of soldiers preparing to enter the fray.

zh: 到17世纪末，欧洲不再仅仅是一些政治组织的拼凑体，而是逐渐进化为一个“国家社会”，主权原则和领土原则占据了优先地位。
en: By the end of the seventeenth century Europe was no longer simply a mosaic of polities, but an evolving 'society of states' in which the principles of sovereignty and territoriality became supreme.

zh: 各个单独的国家的权力巩固过程同时也是一个完整的国家间体系形成的过程（Giddens，1985，第91页）。
en: The consolidated power of each individual state was at the same time part of the process of overall interstate formation (Giddens, 1985, p. 91).

zh: 因为对每个国家无可争议的权威的承认就是承认其他国家，其他国家在它们自己的疆域内有同等的权利，即自治的权利和要求受到尊重的权利。
en: For a concomitant of each and every state's claim to uncontestable authority was the recognition that such a claim gave other states an equal entitlement to autonomy and respect within their own borders.

zh: 国家主权观念的发展是国家间互相认可过程的核心，由此国家之间互相承认了对方在各自的领土和共同体内的管辖权力。
en: The development of state sovereignty was central to the process of mutual recognition whereby states granted each other rights of jurisdiction in their respective territories and communities.

zh: 全球市场的发展已经导致了国家间的生产专业化，所以，有利可图的生产和无利可图的生产在很大程度上受全球竞争条件的影响。
en: The evolution of global markets has led to specialization among countries so that what is profitable to produce, and what is not, is significantly influenced by global competitive conditions.

zh: 关键是国家的定位并不是静止不变的：当经济充分发展和需要新技术时，它们的相对位置就会改变。
en: Crucially the positions of countries are not static: as economies mature and acquire new technology their relative positions change.

zh: 因为比较优势的国际模式正随着时间而改变，所以，国内经济面临着重新配置资源的压力，而不仅仅是对贸易增长的简单回应。
en: Since international patterns of comparative advantage are shifting over time, national economies face pressures to reallocate resources continually and not just as a one-off response to rising trade.

zh: 在这个意义上，贸易对国内经济结构有重要影响。
en: In this sense trade has significant impacts on the structure of national economies.

zh: 王权专制主义能够制服和控制在建立独立经济基础时处境艰难的贵族。
en: Royal absolutism was able to tame and control an aristocracy that had difficulty in establishing an independent economic base.

zh: 正如托克维尔很久以前已认识到的，革命完成了波旁王朝的使命，其结果是右翼独裁统治所必需的社会基础之一被消灭了。这种独裁统治在先进工业浪潮的冲击下会使法西斯倾向达于顶点。
en: The Revolution finished the work of the Bourbons, as de Tocqueville recognized long ago.The consequence was the destruction of one of the indispensable social bases of right-wing authoritarian regimes that show a strong tendency to culminate in fascism under the impact of advanced industry.

zh: 表4-11详细说明了流向发展中国家和转轨经济体的私人资本。
en: Table 4.11 details private capital flows to developing countries and to transition economies.

zh: 虽然转轨经济体已吸引了相当的份额，但东亚和拉丁美洲仍继续控制着这些流量。
en: East Asia and Latin America continue to dominate these flows, although the transition economies have attracted an increasing share.

zh: 到90年代末流向发展中国家的私人资本占其国内生产总值或投资的比例高于70年代。
en: By the late 1990s private capital flows to developing economies were higher relative to either their GDP or investment levels than during the 1970s.

zh: 然而，这些流量在1997〜1998年东亚货币危机之后急剧下降。
en: However, these flows declined sharply following the East Asian currency crises of 1997-8.

zh: 最穷的国家特别是非洲国家的外国直接投资流量仍保持在不及总暈1%的水平。
en: FDI flows to the poorest economies, notably in Africa, remain less than 1 per cent of the total.

zh: 然而，跨国公司因担心国内税收机构的行为而受到限制，这种行为监控着公司经营（至少从7 0 年代开始）和日常的往来信息。
en: However, companies are limited by fear of action by national tax authorities, which have monitored the practice (at least since the 1970s) and regularly exchange information.

zh: 再者，转移定价可能会与内部会计和控制机制发生冲突。
en: Further, transfer pricing may conflict with internal accounting and control systems.

zh: 这些证据表明，转移定价正大规模地实践着，但同利润和政府税收收入相比，其重要性仍是第二位的。
en: Such evidence as there is indicates that transfer pricing is practised on a significant scale, but it is of secondary importance to profits and government tax revenues.

zh: 关于50年代和60年代闪际金融流动强度的数据很不一致，这表明了其低水平。除一些外国直接投资以外，资本仍然牢牢限于国家边界以内。
en: Data on the intensity of international financial flows in the 1950s and 1960s are patchy at best, reflecting its low levels; apart from some FDI, capital remained firmly rooted within national borders.

zh: 这并不奇怪，因为存在着国内资本控制并缺乏私人国际资本流动的基础设施；对布雷顿森林体系的研究表明了国家的利率间有重大差异。
en: This is not surprising given both the existence of national capital controls and the limited infrastructure for private international capitalflows.

zh: 这反映了国内资本控制影响的性质 (Dooley 1980; Marston, 1993)。
en: Studies of the BWS indicate a significant divergence between countries' interest rates, reflecting the impact of national capital controls (Dooley and Isard, 1980; Marston, 1993).

zh: 在18世纪，英国和法国的势力不断增强。而到了 19世纪，则是英国处于霸主地位。
en: British and French influence were ascendant in the eighteenth century, and Britain was quite dominant in the nineteenth.

zh: “可能是因为它们主要是围绕着英国发展起来的”，正如霍布斯鲍姆（Hobsbawrn)所说的那样，“19世纪的资本主义世界经济在自由流动的单一体系中发展了起来，在这一体系中，资本和商品 的国际交换主要是通过英国及其机构来进行的，通过航行于各大洲之间的英国远洋货轮来运输货物，并以英国的货币单位作为标准计算单位”（1969,第14页，Cf.第314页)。
en: "Perhaps because it was so largely built round Britain," as Hobsbawm put it, "the world economy of nineteenth-century capitalism developed as a single system of free flows, in which the international transfers of capital and commodities passed largely through British hands and institutions, in British ships between the continents, and were calculated in terms of the pound sterling" (1969, p. 14, cf. p. 314).

zh: 共同遗产概念的关键要素包括：占有权的排他性；为了人类的利益开发资源的责任；以及只为了和平的目的而开发和利用资源的责任（Cassese，1986，第390页）。
en: Among the key elements of the concept of the common heritage are the exclusion of a right of appropriation; the duty to exploit resources in the interest of humankind; and the duty to explore and utilize resources for peaceful purposes only (Cassese, 1986, p. 390).

zh: 共同遗产概念的引入指出了基于平等与合作的法律秩序的可能性。
en: The introduction of the concept of the common heritage points to the possibility of a legal order based on equity and cooperation.

zh: 尽管对于这一原则确切地应该在哪里、怎样被运用，以及由开发新资源所增加的利益应如何分配等问题还存在着大量的争论，但这一概念的引入却是国际法律思想的一个转折点。
en: Although there is still a great deal of argument as to exactly where and how this principle should be applied, and how the benefits accruing from the exploitation of new resources should be distributed, the introduction of the concept was a turning point in international legal thinking.

zh: 身为天子的万历，在另一种意义上讲，他不过是紫禁城中的一名囚徒。
en: He began to realize that he was less the Ruler of All Men than a prisoner of the Forbidden City.

zh: 他的权力大多带有被动性。
en: His power was basically negative.

zh: 他可以把他不喜欢的官员革职查办，但是很难升迁拔擢他所喜欢的官员，以致没有一个人足以成为他的心腹。
en: He could remove or punish an official or a group of officials, but he could hardly promote a favorite or grant him an unusual honor.

zh: 在《物种起源》一书中，达尔文只讨论了植物和动物的物种。
en: In On the Origin of Species, Darwin discussed plant and animal species only.

zh: 他最初并未考虑人类的问题，只是到后来才将其自然选择的理论应用于人类。
en: He was not concerned with human beings and only later applied his theory of natural selection to humans.

zh: 在发表于1871年的《人类的由来及性选择》一书中，达尔文提出了人类的动物起源：“人与其他的哺乳动物一样，是一个共同祖先的后代。”
en: In The Descent of Man, published in 1871, he argued for the animal origins of human beings: “Man is the co-descendant with other mammals of a common progenitor.”

zh: 20多年来，矿物储备、有机原材料祜竭以及动植物物种的灭绝一直是环境保护主义者最为关心的问题。
en: The exhaustion of mineral reserves and organic raw materials and the extinction of plant and animal species have been a preoccupation of environmentalists for over two decades.

zh: 当然，正如第8.2节中指出的，真正的资源枯竭和短缺问题有着深远的原因。
en: Of course, as argued in section 8.2, the practical problem of resource depletion and shortages has a long pedigree.

zh: 根据观察者的描述和我们对价格数据（这些数据反映出即将到来的或实际的资源短缺）的分析，无论在定量还是在定性上，我们都有足够的证据来说明前现代时期存在严重的资源短缺。
en: We have ample evidence, both quantitative and qualitative, of severe resource shortages in premodern societies through both observers' accounts and the analysis of price statistics which reflect impending and actual shortages.

zh: 然而，只是在70年代早期，随着罗马俱乐部的《增长的极限》以及“生态学家”的《生存蓝图》的出版，自然资源的有限性质才被明确提到环境议事日程上来（Meadows等，1972；《生态学家1972)。
en: However, it was in the early 1970s, with the publication of the Club of Rome's Limits to Growth and The Ecologist's Blueprint for Survival, that the finite nature of natural resources was brought firmly on to the environmental agenda (Meadows et al.,1972; The Ecologist, 1972).

zh: 到70年代，在几乎所有的经合发国家都建立了高度自由的贸易秩序。80年代以来，这种由贸易秩序扩展到发展中国家，以及前苏联和东欧国家：结果是现在存在着一个全球贸易体制。
en: By the 1970s a largely free trade order had been established among all the OECD countries and since the 1980s this has been extended to developing countries and countries formerly closed to trade under communism, with the result that a global trading system now exists.

zh: 从历史上看，贸易保护程度低于以前时代，而贸易自由化可能会继续发展。
en: Historically, protection levels are lower than in previous eras while trade liberalization is likely to continue.

zh: 贸易水平无论在绝对数量上还是在占产出比例上都更高。
en: Trade levels are higher, both absolutely and in relation to output, than ever before.

zh: 主要的变化发生在一些较大的并多少有些向外扩张的农村地区，这里的人其地位一般在贵族之下而在自由民（即绅士）之上，他们有着更强烈的进取心，成功地适应了新的情况。

en: The main rural body whose more enterprising members adapted successfully was that large and somewhat diffuse body below the peerage and above the yeomanry, in other words, the gentry.

zh: 但是，由于农业活动的孤立性，他们的成功并不是完全的。
en: But their success was not entirely due to agricultural activities alone.

zh: 那些看来走在前面的绅士们同上层市民以及资产阶级（就这一术语已经被接受的狭意来说）有着各种各样的个人的或商业方面的联系。
en: The gentry who looked ahead had all sorts of personal and business connections with the upper ranks of the townsmen or bourgeoisie in the accepted narrower sense of the term.

zh: 最近的这次民主化浪潮帮助确立了自由民主在世界许多地区的主导地位。
en: The most recent wave helped secure a dominant position for liberal democracy across many of the world's regions.

zh: 在1974年，世界上至少有68%的国家可以被合乎情理地称作是威权主义国家；而到了1995年末，将近75%的国家已经建立了竞争性选举的程序，并采纳了对政治权利和公民权利的一些正式的保护措施。
en: In 1974 at least 68 per cent of all countries could reasonably be called authoritarian; by the end of 1995, nearly 75 per cent of all countries had established procedures for competitive elections and adopted some formal guarantees of political and civil rights.

zh: 在现阶段，采取自由民主形式的国家的数目看起来仍然在增长。
en: At the current juncture, the number of liberal democracies appears to be still growing.

zh: 自由主义是众多意识形态中的一种，它从18世纪的启蒙运动及18世纪后期的美国、法国革命中吸取了很多东西。
en: One of these ideologies was liberalism, which owed much to the Enlightenment of the eighteenth century and the American and French Revolutions at the end of that century.

zh: 自由主义的一个基本信仰就是，人们应该尽可能地不受限制。
en: It was based on the belief that people should be as free from restraint as possible.

zh: 这种理念在经济自由主义和政治自由主义中都体现得很明显。
en: This opinion is evident in both economic and political liberalism.

zh: 民族和人口的大规模移动有着极其悠久的历史（Fagan, 1990; Emmer, 1993)。
en: The large-scale movement of people and peoples has an enormously long history (Fagan, 1990; Emmer, 1993).

zh: 自从6000年前最早的初级形态的国家出现以来，人类迁移已经跨越了政治界限并扩展和重新塑造了新的政治界限。
en: Since the emergence of the first rudimentary states over six thousand years ago human migrations have crossed political boundaries as well as extending and reshaping them.

zh: 流动的迁移者已经跨越了大洲并开创了新帝国。
en: Mobile nomads have crossed continents and carved out new empires.

zh: 一些原有的政体获得了一种内在的动力，使得它们可以从中心向外国发展。
en: Some older polities have acquired an internal dynamism that allowed them to push outwards from the centre.

zh: 宗教和经济推动了传教士和商人跨越大洲。
en: Religion and economics have propelled missionaries and merchants across continents.

zh: 尽管大流士没有引入省区制，但他确实看到这种体系组织更加合理。
en: Although Darius had not introduced the system of satrapies, he organized it more rationally.

zh: 他创立了一套控制岁入的合理制度，即每个总督归属中央政府，并规定各个省区特定的民事与军事义务。
en: He created a sensible system for calculating the tribute that each satrapy owed to the central government and gave satraps specific civil and military duties.

zh: 他们收取贡赋，负责司法和治安，为帝国军队征兵，在其辖区内例行统领军事力量。
en: They collected tributes, were responsible for justice and security, raised military levies for the royal army, and normally commanded the military forces within their satrapies.

zh: 就实际权力而言，这些总督也有类似于帝王的宫廷，俨然是帝国中的小王国。
en: In terms of real power, the satraps were miniature kings with courts imitative of the Great King’s.

zh: 埃塞俄比亚东北部荒芜的达那基尔洼地阿法尔民族提供了一个专门化的例子。
en: One example of specialization is afforded by the Afar people of Ethiopia's Danakil Depression.

zh: 阿法尔人是盐矿开采者，从古代以来，一直在东非从事盐的贸易。
en: Afar men are miners of salt, which since ancient times has been widely traded in East Africa.

zh: 盐是从广阔的盐原地表上开采得到的，采到盐是既有风险又很艰难的事。
en: It is mined from the crust of an extensive salt plain in the north part of the depression, and ro get it is a risky and difficult business.

zh: 分清人类学中三种比较类型（参见Sarana 1975):案例比较、 全球比较和控制比较（包括区域比较），是很有用的。
en: It is useful to distinguish three types of comparison in anthropology (see Sarana 1975): illustrative, global, and controlled (which includes regional comparison).

zh: 案例比较（Illustrative comparison)需要选择一些实例来分析文化差异或相似之处。
en: Illustrative comparison involves choosing examples to make some point about cultural difference or similarity.

zh: 它是许多人类学导论教学的基础。
en: This is the basis of much introductory teaching in anthropology.

zh: 这一种族思维方式，在19世纪和20世纪初期达到顶峰，但它并没有就此消失。
en: This racial way of thinking reached its peak in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries, but it is by no means dead.

zh: 种族主义至今仍在世界各地流行，不论是在美国的白人与黑人、澳大利亚人与澳洲土著、华人与马来人中，还是在印度婆罗门与贱民之间。
en: Racism is rife throughout the world, whether among American whites describing blacks; Australians, the Aborigines; Chinese, the Malays; or Hindu Brahmins, the "untouchables."

zh: 种族解释模式经常没有恶意地出现于大众文化中。
en: The racial mode of explanation appears constantly and innocently in popular culture.

zh: 例如，《收视指南》上在解释20世纪七八十年代当红女歌手盖尔（Crystal Gayle)的个性时，将其归因于“切罗基印第安人和爱尔兰血液在她的血液中奔流”。
en: An issue of TV Guide, for example, explains the personality of singer Crystal Gayle as being due to "Cherokee Indian and Irish blood coursing through her veins." 

zh: 而要决定边界线应该划到哪里，是否举行投票，在哪儿举行投票，争议都很大。
en: The question of whether, and where, to hold such plebiscites is extremely controversial.

zh: 通常认为，自决原则有导致“巴尔干化”的危险。
en: The principle of self-determination is commonly said to lead to the danger of ‘balkanisation’.

zh: 事实上，它正是导致大群体分裂为小群体的主要因素，这也是1945年之后当代国际政治的一个显著特征——总体上不是一个消极的进展。
en: It has indeed been a major contributory factor in the process of "fission of larger units into smaller ones which has been such a notable feature of international politics in the post-1945 period – not in principle a negative development.

zh: 如果整个社今只分成两个主要的继嗣群体，无论它们是相尚于氏族或联族，还是牵涉到甚至更无所不包的层次，那么其中每一个群体就叫作半偶族（moiety）（因法语“一半”这个单词得名）。
en: If the entire society is divided into only two major descent groups, whether they are equivalent to clans or phratries or involve an even more all-inclusive level, each group is called a moiety (after the French word for "half").

zh: 半偶族的成员相信他们自己拥有一个共同的袓先，但无法通过确切的系谱联系证明。
en: Moiety members also believe they share a common ancestor but cannot prove it through definite genealogical links.

zh: 一般而言，世系群和氏族成员的亲属感情要比联族和半偶族成员亲属感情更强。
en: As a rule, the feelings of kinship among members of lineages and clans are stronger than those of members of phratries and moieties.

zh: 这可能由于后者的规模更大，而且更分散。
en: This may be due to the larger size and more diffuse nature of the latter groups.

zh: 不用说，在北美社会，包办婚姻不是常见的事情，但它们的确也发生了。
en: Arranged marriages, needless to say, are not commonplace in North American society, but they do occur.

zh: 在少数民族中，人们可能致力于保护传统价值,他们担忧要不然的话，传统也许会丧失。
en: Among ethnic minorities, they may serve to preserve traditional values people fear might otherwise be lost.

zh: 在富贵又有权力的家族中，婚姻可能是这样包办的：他们把自己的儿女隔离在私立学校中，小心翼翼地引导他们走向“合适的”婚姻。
en: Among families of wealth and power, marriages may be arranged by segregating their children in private schools and carefully steering them toward "proper" marriages.

zh: 这里举例证明的一般问题，是通常所说的“保健实施”。
en: The general problem exemplified here is sometimes termed "health care delivery".

zh: 有时可利用的医疗技术也会遇到文化抵抗。
en: Available medical techniques meet cultural resistance.

zh: 例如，一项在迈阿密多种族人群中进行的医疗保健研究显示了使用诊所和医院的文化及物理阻碍。
en: A study of health care among varied ethnic groups in Miami, for example, showed cultural as well as physical barriers to using clinics and hospitals.

zh: 对马萨诸塞一女性主义诊所的人类学研究表明，女性主义运动的文化模型会怎样影响医疗保健实施。
en: An anthropological study of a feminist clinic in Massachusetts showed how the cultural patterning of the feminist movement affected health-care delivery.

zh: 一项对埃及工人阶级妇女的人类学研究表明，她们对身体独特的文化想象，怎样影响其对避孕药品的使用。
en: An anthropological study of working-class women in Egypt showed how their distinctive cultural images of the body affected use of contraceptives.

zh: 在有关著作中，这两种环境决定论的分歧主要表现在：一种观点认为环境可以适应当代的工业社会结构，而另一种则要求从根本上改变这种社会结构（Milbrath 1984:72)。
en: The most pervasive distinction in the literature is between an environmentalism which can be accommodated within the structures of contemporary industrial society and one which demands fundamental change to those structures (Milbrath 1984:72).

zh: 在这个意义上，把这两种环境决定论区分为“保守派”和“激进派”是有益的；“保守主义”和“激进主义”的本质似乎是经常通过细微的、渐进的方式从一种分析视角转向另一种分析视角，甚至是在一种分析视角内相互变换。
en: In this sense it is useful to speak of the two environmentalisms as "conservative" and "radical"; it is the nature of the conservatism and radicalism that appears to shift, often in quite subtle ways, from one analytical perspective to another, or even within a single analysis.

zh: 阔特格如夫（Cotgmve)对这两种环境决定论（包括保守主义者和保护主义者）作了如下区分：一种观点不反对主流经济价值体系的主导地位，另一种则希望以“福利价值体系取代与纯经济目的不相协调或冲突的经济价值体系”(Cotgrove 1976:24)。
en: Cotgrove made a distinction between those environmentalists (including conservationists and preservationists) whose policies offer no challenge to the dominant economic value system, and those who would wish to replace economic goals with "welfare values which are incompatible with or in conflict with purely economic ends" (Cotgrove 1976:24).

zh: 不同的民族志游戏规则正在世界的许多地方出现。
en: Different rules of the game for ethnography are now emerging in many parts of the world.

zh: 一个研究美洲土著文化的外来者可能期待——也许作为继续研究的必要条件——为支持土著的土地要求而在诉讼中作证。
en: An outsider studying Native American cultures may expect, perhaps as a requirement for continuing research, to testify in support of land claim litigation.

zh: 国家和地方的本土政府如今对民族志的田野工作提出了各种各样的正式限制。
en: And a variety of formal restrictions are now placed on fieldwork by indigenous governments at national and local levels.

zh: 上述情况以新的方式决定了关于特定的人什么能够说，特别是什么不能说。
en: These condition in new ways what can, and especially cannot, be said about particular peoples.

zh: 一类新人物出现了，那就是“本土民族志学者”（Fahim，ed.1982；Ohnuki-Tierney l984）。
en: A new figure has entered the scene, the "indigenous ethnographer" (Fahim, ed. 1982; Ohnuki-Tierney 1984).

zh: 研究自己的文化的局内人提供了新的视角和理解的深度。
en: Insiders studying their own cultures offer new angles of vision a n d depths of understanding.

zh: 以独特的方式，他们的叙述既获得了力量也受到限制。
en: Their accounts are empowered and restricted in unique ways.

zh: 更为特别的是，人文主义使人类学摆脱了本质论的禁锢，例如“文化”、“性别”和“种族”。
en: In particular, humanism offers anthropology an escape from imprisoning essentialisms such as ‘culture’, ‘gender’ and ‘race’.

zh: 这些概念在人类学话语中是构建异己性的手段：在人之间找出差异并进行区分，从而不可避免地造成等级性和不平等。
en: For these concepts have operated in anthropological discourse as means of making alterity: creating differences between people and enforcing separations which have come to imply inevitable hierarchy and inequality.

zh: 在这一分类（“文化”、“性别”和“种族”）的内部同样存在着同质性、连续性和确定性。
en: Sameness within the category (‘culture’, ‘gender’, ‘race’), meanwhile, has come to imply inexorable homogeneity, coherence and determination.

zh: 就像普遍主义（共性论）补充了特殊主义（个性论），比较方法则补充了田野工作。
en: The comparative method complements fieldwork, just as universalism complements particularism.

zh: 在民族志的比较方法中，民族志学者分析了许多相互联系的文化，而不是集中分析一个特定的文化或一种特定的情况。
en: In the comparative method of ethnography the ethnographer analyzes many cultures in relation to one another, rather than focusing on a particular culture or situation.

zh: 与田野工作一样，比较方法也是很难真正做到的。
en: Like fieldwork, the comparative method is difficult.

zh: 它并不是简单地欢呼全球多样性，例如享受食物市场或国际节日。
en: It is not simply a celebration of global variety, such as is enjoyed in food fairs or international festivals.

zh: 那些背景设置试图将多样性统一起来，但是它们也呈现出一种经常是混乱的混合物。
en: Those settings attempt to unite diversities, but they also present an often confusing mixture.

zh: 尽管目前在象征人类学和比较符号学领域涌现出很多优秀的专著和论文，但是针对同一主题的系列丛书的出版及其所能引起的共同关注和讨论目前还不多见。
en: Although excellent individual monographs and articles in symbolic anthropology or comparative symbology have recently appeared, a common focus or forum that can be provided by a topically organized series of books has not been available.

zh: 因此，这套丛书的出版意在弥补这一空缺。
en: The present series is intended to fill this lacuna.

zh: 这套丛书不仅计划收录人类学家的田野专著、理论著述以及比较研究，而且还包括其他学科学者的作品，其中既有科学类的也有人文类的。
en: It is designed to include not only field monographs and theoretical and comparative studies by anthropologists, but also work by scholars in other disciplines, both scientific and humanistic.

zh: 一些学者的著作中表现出与英国进化论的连接，但最明显的是在德籍英国东方学学者弗里德里克·马克斯· 缪勒的著作中。
en: The connection to British evolutionism runs through the work of several scholars, but none as obviously as that of the German-British orientalist, Friedrich Max Müller.

zh: 在其教父费利克斯· 门德尔松劝诫下，年轻的缪勒放弃学习音乐，转而学习梵语，他先在莱比锡求学，后到柏林转投博普门下。
en: Dissuaded by his godfather Felix Mendelssohn from studying music, the young Max Müller turned to Sanskrit, first at Leipzig and then, under Bopp, at Berlin.

zh: 1846 年，缪勒进入牛津大学深造，并最终在那里确立了自己在现代语言和比较语言学领域中的地位。
en: In 1846 further studies took him to Oxford, where he settled and eventually took up chairs in modern languages and comparative philology.

zh: 团体的暴力是20世纪90年代印度的特点，带来了持续增长的针对妇女的暴力，以陪葬、殉夫、使用羊水穿刺限制女婴人数的形式表现出来。
en: The communal violence which characterises India in the 1990s has brought with it increasing violence against women in the form of dowry deaths, sati and the use of amniocentesis as a way of limiting the numbers of female children.

zh: 印度教原教旨主义者描画了一个丰富多彩的、性别的神话。
en: Hindu fundamentalists have drawn on a rich and gendered mythology.

zh: 他们诉诸武装反对敌人伊斯兰世界，保卫自己的祖国和妇女的纯洁：她们是边界的护卫者，传统的承载者，但也是必须加以控制的潜在的敌人。
en: Their call to arms against the enemy, Islam, is in defence of the motherland and the purity of its women: they are the boundary keepers, the bearers of tradition, but also potentially the enemy within who must be kept under supervision.

zh: 他也反对“ 文化的科学” 的观点 ( Radcliffe - Brown 1957 : 106 - 9; cf 1957 : 117 -  23)  ,  并含蓄地扞击博厄斯对此的强调。
en: He also rejected the idea of a ‘science of culture’ (1957: 106–9; cf. 1957: 117–23) and implicitly attacked the Boasian emphasis on this.

zh: 对他来说，博厄斯人类学中真正重要的是“社会”（作为人们彼此间的关系），不属于“文化”的变幻莫测，是不能被科学分析的。这是当时美国占  据统治地位的观点。
en: What really mattered to him was that in Boasian anthropology, the dominant version in America at the time, ‘society’ (as relations between people) was lost to the vagaries of ‘culture’, which could not be analysed scientifically.

zh: 与博厄斯及其追随者的文化概念不同，拉德克  利夫－布朗的“ 文化” 概念本质上是濡化 ( enculturation ) 或（更确切说） 社会化 ( socialization ）的同义词， 即习得如何在一个社会中生存的途径。
en: In fairness to Boas and his followers though, Radcliffe-Brown’s notion of ‘culture’ was essentially synonymous with enculturation or (more accurately) socialization: a way of learning to live in a society.

zh: 1992年，一个名为“生物人类学中的政治-经济方法”的研讨会的组织者艾伦˙古德曼（Alan Goodman) 和托马斯·莱瑟曼 （Thomas Leatherman) 希望扭转这一趋势。
en: The organizers of a 1992 symposium on "Political-Economic Approaches in Biological Anthropology," Alan Goodman and Thomas Leatherman, hoped to reverse this trend.

zh: 他们希望促进对“当地文化和历史情境中”的生物学容量和福利的研究，“它们反过来也受到跨区域和全球进程的形塑并且与之发生互动。
en: They wanted to foster the study of biological capacities and well-being in the "context of local cultures and histories, which in turn are shaped by and interact with interregional and global processes."

zh: ”他们是少数开始注意到“外界的刺激因素通过了一个文化过滤器并且与社会不平等密切相连”的生物人类学家。
en: They are among a small number of biological anthropologists who are beginning to see that stressors move through a cultural filter and are intimately linked with social inequality.

zh: 这门子学科的主流倾向于贬低这样的观点，认为它们不合适地将政治注人科学中。
en: The mainstream of the subdiscipline has tended to discount such views as inappropriately injecting politics into science.

zh: 称民族志为虚构（fictions)可能会激怒经验主义者。
en: To call ethnographies fictions may raise empiricist hackles.

zh: 但是近年的文本理论很普遍地使用的这个词，已经没有了虚假、不过是真理的对立面这样的含义。
en: But the word as commonly used in recent textual theory has lost its connotation of falsehood, of something merely opposed to truth.

zh: 它表达了文化和历史真理的不完全性（partiality)，暗示出它们是如何成为系统化的和排除了某些事物的。
en: It suggests the partiality of cultural and historical truths, the ways they are systematic and exclusive.

zh: 民族志写作可以被很正确地称为虚构，在“制作或塑造出来的东西”——这个词的拉丁文词根“fingere”的主要含义——的意义上。
en: Ethnographic writings can properly be called fictions in the sense of "something made or fashioned," the principal burden of the word's Latin root, fingere.

zh: 但保存此词中不仅是制造而且是捏造、是发明并非真实的事物这样的意义也是很重要的。
en: But it is important to preserve the meaning not merely of making, but also of makingup, of inventing things not actually real.

zh: （“fingere”的某些用法暗含着一定程度的虚假的意思。）
en: (Fingere, in some of its uses, implied a degree of falsehood.)

zh: 假如它们不是族性的组成部分，那么它们是什么特性的基础？
en: And if they were not the ingredients of ethnicity, what identities did they underlie?

zh: 科恩的质疑强化了来自非洲自身的另一个更古老的质疑。在1984年，我在赞比亚发表了一个有关部族制 (tribalism)发明的讲演。
en: Cohen's challenge reinforces an older challenge from within Africa itself.In 1984, I gave a lecture in Zambia about the invention of tribalism.

zh: 在听众散场时，我听到那位赞比亚的人文科学系主任对同僚说，“那时我们是谁?
en: As the audience filed out, I heard the Zambian Dean of Arts say to a colleague, "Who were we then?"

zh: ”一旦族性被想象 (imagined)出来，它的确像是原生的，而且想象之前的任何身份都变得不可能。
en: Once it has been imagined, ethnicity certainly seems primordial, and it becomes impossible to conceive of any prior identity.

zh: 根据神话所说，当多贡人在如今他们居住的地方安定下来的时候，每个村子都是由一些兄弟建立的，这些兄弟是如今的一个或几个宗族的祖先（Beaudoin 1984）。
en: When the Dogon settled where they live now, according to the myth, each village was founded by several brothers, who were the ancestors of one or several present-day clans (Beaudoin 1984).

zh: 一个祖先的所有后代居住在同一个小村里，叫做吉那（ginna）。
en: All the descendants of an ancestor live in the same hamlet, called a ginna.

zh: “吉那”这个单词与宗族的土地、宗族的首领吉那巴那（ginna bana） 居住的家庭房屋以及与各个家户居住的较小房屋等有关。
en: The word ginna is used about the clan's land, about the family house where the clan chief (ginna bana) lives and about the smaller houses where the households are based.

zh: 大多数土地是被管理起来的，并且由吉那巴那在家户的头领们中间进行分配。
en: Most of the land is administered, and distributed among the heads of household, by the ginna bana.

zh: 因而，“吉那”这个概念把人类学家所谓的财产、居住地、社会权利和义务，以及政治等集合在一个简单的家族关系术语中。
en: The concept of ginna thus groups what anthropologists see as property, place of residence, social rights and duties, and politics, in a single kinship term.

zh: 只有男人和他们的孩子才是家系的成员。
en: Only men and their children are members of the lineage.

zh: 妻子/母亲属于另外的不同中心的家系。
en: The wives/mothers belong to other lineages which are centred elsewhere.

zh: 婚姻通常由两位父亲组织起来，他们用这种方式加强了友谊的非正式纽带。
en: Marriage is usually organised by the two fathers, who strengthen informal ties of friendship in this way.

zh: 其二，在酋邦和国家中，经授权的第三方可公布具有约束力的决定，而争端双方不得不尊重这一决定。
en: Second, in chiefdoms and states, an authorized third party may issue a binding decision the disputing parties will be compelled to respect.

zh: 这一过程被称为裁决(adjudication)。调解和裁决之间的区别从根本上说在于授权。
en: This process is referred to as adjudication.The difference between mediation and adjudication is basically a difference in authorization.

zh: 在裁决解决争端中，争端各方都尽可能强硬地坚持 自己的立场，但他们不参与最终裁决。
en: In a dispute settled by adjudication, the disputing parties present their positions as convincingly as they can, but they do not participate in the ultimate decision making.

zh: 在一些社会，置办嫁妆成了一个相当大的经济负担。
en: In some societies, the payment of dowry entails a considerable economic burden.

zh: 与女儿出嫁相关的费用是导致印度的杀死女婴高比率的一个主要原因。
en: The costs associated with daughters getting married are a main cause of the high rates of female infanticide in India.

zh: 在许多社会，尤其是非洲，彩礼（有时被叫做聘金）比嫁妆更为常见。
en: Bridewealth (sometimes spoken of as "bride-price") is more common than dowry in many societies, particularly in Africa.

zh: 在此，新郎的家族不得不转让一些资源给新娘的家族，作为对拥有新娘的劳动力和生殖力的一种回报。
en: Here the groom's kin is obliged to transfer resources to the bride's kin in return for his rights to her labour and reproductive powers.

zh: 彩礼的给付使男人对女人及其孩子拥有了权利。
en: The payment of bridewealth establishes the rights of the man in the woman and her children.

zh: 然而，历史上更为常见的是，形式上的停滞与个体的创造发明并存。
en: More historically usual, however, is the situation of formal inertia and individual invention proceeding side by side.

zh: 因此，当文化形式“凝固”且变得独立时，就会从创造它们的力量中分离出来，使得世界中充满着习惯，而个体也就会创造出新的形式，为世界带来进一步的变化和变迁。
en: Hence, as cultural forms ‘congeal’ and become independent, detached from the energies which produced them, and fill the world with habit, individuals are also creating new forms, and causing a world of further heterogeneity and flux.New energies, not incorporatable within old forms, create new forms.

zh: 在形式的混乱中要发生这些，首先要求，个体有可能在众多相互竞争的选择中（宗教和科学；弗洛伊德和荣格的心理分析；积家、阿曼尼和马莎的服饰；曼城、曼联、狼队和系伯尼安等足球队）进行筛选；并且把这些形式按照一定的顺序和频率组织起来，形成新的产成品（拉康心理分析；朋克服饰）。
en: This happens as, first, amid the clutter of forms, individuals have the possibility of choosing between a number of often competing options (religion and science; Freudian and Jungian psychoanalysis; Jaeger, Armani and St Michael tailoring; Manchester City, Man. Utd, Wolves and Hibernian football); and also of putting these formstogether in a sequence and frequency which amounts to a new bricolage (Lacanian psychoanalysis; Punk tailoring).

zh: 韦伯对有关“阐释”（Verstehen)的性质的早期争论也有贡献，他的文章讨论了价值、客观性和原因解释。
en: Weber made contributions to early debates on the nature of ‘interpretation’ (Verstehen), and his writings consider values, objectivity, and causal explanation.

zh: 他的思想为后来的人类学家所采用，其中包括20世纪50年代的曼彻斯特学派，该学派至今仍然对人类学界有所影响。
en: His ideas were picked up by anthropologists, including those of the Manchester School in the 1950s, and they still influence anthropology today.

zh: 从韦伯的社会学中，互动论和阐释主义者都可以找到其思想的重要因素的根源。
en: Both transactionalists and interpretivists derive important elements of their thinking from their roots in Weberian sociology.

zh: 有时，这个包含了进化论和传播论的较大的理论观点被称为历时性观点（意指跨越时间的事物之间的联系）。
en: Sometimes the larger perspective which embraces both evolutionism and diffusionism is called the diachronic one (indicating the relation of things through time).

zh: 其对立面是共时性观点（意指同一时间存在的事物之间的联系）。
en: Its opposite is the synchronic perspective (indicating the relation of things together in the same time).

zh: 共时性研究包括功能主义、结构主义、阐释主义，以及其他试图在不涉及时间前提下解释特定文化运作的研究。
en: Synchronic approaches include functionalism, structuralism, interpretivism, and other ones which try to explain the workings of particular cultures without reference to time.

zh: 尽管这些态度很顽固，但正在慢慢消失。
en: Such attitudes, though they persist, are diminishing.

zh: 今天，很少有人类学家会接受那种民族志逻辑，它在弗朗兹˙博厄斯时代被阐述为决定生死的急救手术。
en: Few anthropologists today would embrace the logic of ethnography in the terms in which it was enunciated in Franz Boas's time, as a last-chance rescue operation.

zh: 然而，关于抢救的寓言却根深蒂固。
en: But the allegory of salvage is deeply ingrained.

zh: 事实上，我即将论证，它是作为一种写作，尤其是作为文本化的过程被添造进民族志的构思和实践中的。
en: Indeed, I shall argue in a moment that it is built into the conception and practice of ethnography as a process of writing, specifically of textualization.

zh: 每一种将自己设想成“让文化变成写作”的描述或解释，从口头上东拉西扯的经验（“本地人”的田野工作者的）发展到这种经验的完成版本（民族志文本），都在制定着“抢救”的结构。
en: Every description or interpretation that conceives itself as "bringing a culture into writing, "moving from oral-discursive experience (the "native's," the fieldworker's) to a written version of that experience (the ethnographic text) is enacting the structure of "salvage."

zh: 从民族志过程被视为铭写（而不是，例如抄写或对话）的角度看，表述将继续制定一种有效的、有问题的、寓言性的结构。
en: To the extent that the ethnographic process is seen as inscription (rather than, for example, as transcription, or dialogue) the representation will continue to enact a potent, and questionable, allegorical structure.

zh: 尽管只有凯卢瓦和莱利斯是莫斯的嫡传弟子，但他们所有人都受到了莫斯和赫兹对象征符号和仪式的研究，以及莫斯倡导的新法国民族志的极大鼓舞。
en: They were all greatly inspired by Mauss's and Hertz's work on symbols and rituals, as well as by the new French ethnography initiated by Mauss, though only Caillois and Leiris were directly Mauss's students.

zh: 甚至也是这两个人与艾尔弗雷德·梅特罗一道，促使巴塔耶在对文学和哲学的兴趣之外，对社会学也产生了兴趣。
en: Indeed, it was these two, together with Alfred Métraux, who led Bataille to add sociology to his existing interests in literature and philosophy.

zh: 莱利斯和凯卢瓦早期还涉猎过超现实主义，后来又抛开了它；而巴塔耶对这一运动一点也不感兴趣。
en: Leiris and Caillois also flirted early on with surrealism, but later broke with it; Bataille was never interested in that movement.

zh: 它既不以科学话语的方式来自我完善，也不以政治话语的方式来总体化；它既不被一种对其自身规则的反思性关注所限定；也不被这些规则的表述手段所限定。
en: Neither self-perfecting in the manner of scientific discourse nor totalizing in the manner of political discourse, it is defined neither by a reflexive attention to its own rules nor by the performative instrumentality of those rules.

zh: 既不被形式也不被与一个外部客体的关系所限定；它既不产生形式与表演的理念化，也不产生虚构的现实或现实的虚构化。
en: Defined neither by form nor by relation to an external object, it produces no idealizations of form and performance, no fictionalized realities or realities fictionalized.

zh: 它的超越性不是一种元语言——因更完美的形式而优越的语言——的超越,不是由综合和扬弃所创造的统一体的超越，也不是实践和实际运用的超越。
en: Its transcendence is not that of a meta-language — of a language superior by means of its greater perfection of form — nor that of a unity created by synthesis and sublation, nor of praxis and practical application.

zh: 于是，超越，既不通过理论，也不通过实践，也不通过它们的综合；它不描写知识也不生产行动。
en: Transcendent then, neither by theory nor by practice, nor by their synthesis, it describes no knowledge and produces no action.

zh: 它是通过唤起（evoking)那些不能以话语的方式来认识或完美地表现的东西来超越，尽管所有的人似乎都以话语的方式来认识它，似乎都完美地表现它。
en: It transcends instead by evoking what cannot be known discursively or performed perfectly, though all know it as if discursively and perform it as if perfectly.

zh: 它是几条河道中最大的河流，流过有很多可狩猎野兽的森林。
en: The largest of a number of watercourses, it flowed through forests abounding with game.

zh: 就像人一样，每个动物也由躯体和灵魂构成。
en: Like humans, each animal also was composed of a body and a spirit.

zh: 与这些动物一起还有各种水居的、山居的或自由出没于森林的准人类的超自然存在物。在这些超自然存在物中，格鲁斯卡比由于杀死了过去垄断了世界水供应的贪得无厌的巨大青蛙而创造了这条极其重要的佩诺布斯科特河。
en: Along with the animals were various quasi-human supernatural beings that inhabited bodies of water and mountains or roamed freely through the forest.One of these, Gluskabe, created the all-important Penobscot River by deceiving a greedy giant frog that had monopolized the world's water supply.

zh: 在第一种类型中，人不自觉地把自己投射到外部世界之中，依据他自己的精神过程描述和解释世界。
en: In the first type, man unconsciously projects himself into the external world, describing and interpreting it in terms of his own psychic processes.

zh: 全部世界因而被当作是有生命的和由像人那样感觉和行事的神灵们栖息着.
en: The whole world is thus made alive and peopled with spirits who feel and behave as men do.

zh: 这些神灵像人那样有其愿望，喜爱某些食物和饮料；他们性喜嫉妒，易于接受阿谀奉承；他们互相争斗而又彼此相爱。
en: They have desires like men, show preferences for certain foods and drink; they are susceptible to jealousy and flattery; they fight and make love.

zh: 一位神灵创造了世界，另一位则带来甘露，而第三位为这个世界带来欢乐，使百物生长。
en: One spirit makes the earth, another brings rain, a third sends game or brings forth crops.

zh: 这些神灵支持或反对某呰经济和政治制度，井且对那些他们中意的国家的军队给予援助。
en: The gods favor or oppose certain types of economic and pohtical systems, and aid the armies of their chosen nations.

zh: 这样，人按照他自己的形象创造出一个世界，这就是超自然主义的、泛灵论和拟人论的哲学。
en: Thus man creates the world in his own image.This is the philosophy of supernaturalism : of animism and anthropomorphism.

zh: 因此，共同体以及朝圣语境中的记忆并没有将社会和文化结构加以摒弃，而是缓解了结构所产生的各种分歧和差异的对立性和不相容性，各种群体以及各种对立的关系从而被很好地整合在一个复杂的多样性的统一体中，成为众人均可接受的形式。有的学者可能会认为纯粹的共同体只存在和谐，不存在任何不和谐及相对立的冲突关系。我的观点是，与所有的朝圣行为相适应的社会模式体现了结构和共同体之间的一种相互妥协却也充满活力的关系。
en: Thus social and cultural structures are not abolished by communitas and anamnesis, but the sting of their divisiveness is removed so that the fine articulation of their parts in a complex heterogenous unity can be the better appreciated.Some might say that pure communitas knows only harmonies and no disharmonies or conflict; I am suggesting that the social mode appropriate to all pilgrimages represents a mutually energizing compromise between structure and communitas;

zh: 对上述观点需要做出的评论是，即便基督教世界中的朝圣活动范围远比伊斯兰教的朝觐小得多，但是同样可以将人们联系在一起。这种联系尽管十分短暂，但在一定的社会生活层面上，大量的基督教男女信徒们依然通过朝圣被联系在一起。由于封建的地方主义以及乡村政治和经济生活的边缘化，这些人平日难有相互接触的机会。
en: One must comment here that even if Christian pilgrimages did not have the immense scope of the hadj, they had similar effects in bonding together, however transiently, at a certain level of social life, large numbers of men and women, who would otherwise have never come into contact, due to feudal localism and rural decentralization of economic and political life.

zh: 事实上，包括西班牙北部孔波斯特拉在内的主要圣地每年都会吸引大量欧洲各国的信徒前往朝圣。
en: Indeed, some of the major pilgrimage centers, such as Compostella near the northwest corner of Spain, attracted huge crowds of pilgrims from every country in Europe.

zh: 通过界定这四种成分，我们就能定义什么是 " uncle" 。
en: By specifying each of these four components, we define what it means to be an uncle.

zh: 但除了这种语义，有时我们还需 考虑 " uncle" 一词的隐含意义，比如“ 伯父般的" ( avun cular) 的行为，等等。
en: Yet in addition to such signification, it is sometimes useful to consider the connotations (connotata) of being an uncle, for example, the characteristic features of ‘avuncular’ behaviour, whatever that might be in particular.

zh: 这虽与成分分析的恰当性无关，但在亲属术语中确实有这种隐含意义。
en: These are not part of the componential analysis proper, but they do hint at its limitations.

zh: 人类学理论究竟是对事件的顺序、时间框架的更替、多种观念的体系、一套平行共存的国家传统的最贴切的理解，还是一种“程式跳转" (agenda hopping)的过程，将是这章结尾部分探讨的主题。
en: Whether anthropological theory is best understood as a sequence of events, a succession of time frames, a system of ideas, a set of parallel national traditions, or a process of ‘agenda hopping’ is the subject of the last section of this chapter.

zh: 在某种程度上，这个问题指引着我贯彻本书始终的研究。
en: In a sense, this question guides my approach through the whole of the book.

zh: 但是，首先让我们看看普遍意义上的人类学的性质，看看一些界定人类学的术语的意义。
en: But Wrst let us consider the nature of anthropology in general and the meaning of some of the terms which define it.

zh: 灵长目动物齿系的演化一般已趋于经济，用较少、较小的牙齿做较多的工作（参见图3.1）。
en: The evolutionary trend for primate dentition generally has been toward economy, with fewer smaller teeth doing more work (Figure 3.1).

zh: 在早期阶段，上颌和下颌的每一边各有一颗门齿消失了，使得灵长类动物与其他哺乳动物进一步分化。
en: In the early stages, one incisor on each side of the upper and lower jaws was lost, further differentiating primates from other mammals.

zh: 人多数灵长目动物的犬齿长得较长，形成匕舒形的牙齿，使它们能够咬碎果实和其他食物的坚硬外壳。
en: The canines of most of the primates grew longer, forming daggerlike teeth that enabled them to rip open tough husks of fruit and other foods.

zh: 经过几千年的演化，第一颗和第二颗前臼齿变得越来越小，直至最后消失；而第三颗和第四颗前臼齿却越长越大，而且增加了第二尖突或齿尖，因此变成“双尖”齿。
en: Over the millennia, the first and second premolars became smaller and eventually disappeared altogether; the third and fourth premolars grew larger and added a second pointed projection, or cusp, thus becoming bicuspid.

zh: 1960年代早期，沿海的萨米人在文化上属于劣等群体，也就是说他们被优势的挪威人所看不起。
en: In the early 1960s the coastal Sami were a culturally stigmatised group, meaning that they were looked down upon by the dominant Norwegians.

zh: 因为这个原因，他们在公共背景下会掩饰他们的种族身份，如在商店里、本地的轮船上，等等。
en: For this reason, they undercommunicated their ethnic identity in public contexts, in the shop, on the local steamer and so on.

zh: 然后他们假装自己是挪威人，并过度传达他们眼中的挪威人的文化以逃避耻辱。
en: They then presented themselves as Norwegians, and overcommunicate what they saw as Norwegian culture to escape from the stigma.

zh: 从某种程度上说，每一天都是一样的，每一天都是前一天的放大或者重复。
en: Every day is, in a sense, the same day, writ large or repeated.

zh: 但是，隐修或中介生活也可能包含着一段伊利亚德所说的“充满奇迹的时光”——带着面具、象征着神灵、祖先、冥王的各种人物会以不同的面目出现在仪式的主体面前，他们或者稀奇古怪，或者面目狰狞，抑或美丽潇洒。
en: Then again, seclusion and liminality may contain what Eliade calls "a time of marvels."Masked figures, representing gods, ancestors, or chthonic powers may appear to the novices or neophytes in grotesque, monstrous, or beautiful forms.

zh: 虽然并不绝对，但通常情况下仪式的主体需要背诵神话传说，以便记住这些居于中介地带的诸位古怪神灵从何而来以及 他们的丰功伟绩。
en: Often, but not always, myths are recited explaining the origin, attributes, and behavior of these strange and sacred habitants of liminality.

zh: 除此之外，仪式的主持者还可能要向参与者展示圣物，这些圣物可能就是非常一般的物品，比如骨头、陀螺、球、铃鼓、苹果、镜子、扇子以及雅典神话中类似于依洛西斯（Eleusis）神秘仪式中使用的羊毛皮等等。
en: Again, sacred objects may be shown to the novices.These may be quite simple in form like the bone, top, ball, tambourine, apples, mirror, fan, and woolly fleece displayed in the lesser Eleusinian mysteries of Athens.

zh: 像次级氏族一样，氏族也是引人注目的公共活动场所。氏族拥有最重要的舞蹈场地和祖先崇拜堂。
en: Like the subdan, the clan is an arena for dramatic public activities,The clan owns a main dance ground and an ancestral cult house.

zh: 在这些庆典中心,举行公众集会，强调群体统一，以对抗其他氏族。
en: At these ceremonial centers, public gatherings take place that emphasize the unity of the group as against other dans.

zh: 萨克谢维斯基……把这看作是一项基本策略,用来克服恩加人家庭的强烈独立性，在家里“每个人自己作决策”。
en: Sackschewsky ... sees this as an essential tactic to overcome the fierce independence of Enga households, where "each man makes his own decisions".

zh: 这种家庭独立性给头人造成难题，头人促进家庭之间的统一，在竞争激烈和危险的社会环境中，致力于增强氏族的力量。
en: Such familistic independence creates problems for Big Men, who encourage interfemily unity in the effort to enhance the strength of their own dans in a fiercely competitive and dangerous social environment.

zh: 对于实验者或调查分析员来说，抽样是一个关键技术。
en: For the experimenter or the survey analyst, sampling is a key technique.

zh: 所谓抽样，就是选择大量相互平等但又相互独立的单位。
en: To sample is to select a large number of equal but independent units.

zh: 假定一个调查员调查了一个300人的样本是否会投民主党或共和党的票。
en: Say that a surveyor asks a sample of persons if they will vote Democratic or Republican.

zh: 然后，他就可以从这300人的样本中推论出镇、乡、州或国家所有人在投票上的大致看法。
en: He then generalizes from this sample of to the total population of the town, country, state, or nation.

zh: 这正是民意测验得以完成的方式，就像在对投票结果的预测中经常会出现的那样。
en: This is the way polling is done, as in predictions of election results.

zh: 非洲卡拉哈里沙漠中的朱瓦西布须曼人的出神之舞就是一例。
en: One example of this is afforded by the trance dances of the Juhoansi Bushmen of Africa Kalahari Desert.

zh: 在这些人当中，在任何一个群体中平均约有一半的男人和三分之一的年长妇女是萨满。
en: Among these people shamans constitute, on average, about half the men and a third of the older women in any group.

zh: 他们进入出神状态最常见的原因是为了祈雨、控制动物以及——就像在下面这个例子中一样——为了治病(这永远是萨满的一项重要活动，不论他们来自哪里）。
en: The most common reasons for their going into trance are to bring rain, control animals, and—as in the present example—to heal the sick (always an important activity of shamans, wherever they are found).

zh: 异例就像特纳的仪式过程模型中的阈限阶段一样，既在外面，又在里面，它对确立的秩序是一种威胁。
en: The anomaly, like the liminal phase in Turner's model of the ritual process (Chapter 9), is both outside and inside; it threatens the established order.

zh: 有一些规则是针对这些异类动物的：只能在特定的场合下吃它们，女人不能触摸它们，诸如此类。
en: Anomalous animals are subject to certain rules; one can only eat them under specific circumstances, women are not allowed to touch them, and so on.

zh: 厘哩人最重要的异类动物是穿山甲（Manis tricuspis），根据厘哩人的解释，穿山甲有鱼的尾巴和身体，并且全身覆盖了鱗片，但是它繁殖后代的方式又和哺乳动物一样，它有四条腿，并且还会爬树（Douglas 1975，p.33）。
en: The most important anomalous creature among the Lele is the pangolin (Manis tricuspis).It has, the Lele explain, the tail and body of a fish and it is covered with scales, but it gives birth like a mammal.It has four small legs and climbs trees (Douglas 1975, p. 33).

zh: 事实证明，这种动物在厘哩人的神话和仪式生活中有着重要的位置，有一种生殖崇拜的仪式就是以它为中心。
en: This animal, it turns out, has an important place in the mythology and ritual life of the Lele.There is a cult of fertility centred on it.

zh: 道格拉斯认为，其原因在于，穿山甲以一种重要的方式成为了异类：在其他那些不同之处以外，它每次只生育一个后代。
en: The reason, argues Douglas, is that the pangolin is anomalous in a crucial way: in addition to everything else, it gives birth to only one offspring at a time.

zh: 从这个角度看，它比其他动物更像人。
en: In this regard it resembles a human more than an animal.

zh: 1920年代正是博厄斯的第二代弟子成长起来的时期，传播论和罗列特质的历史主义这时都已经成为了陈词滥调。
en: It was during the 1920s that the second generation of Boas's students came of age.

zh: 由于受到精神分析法和格式塔心理学的影响，心理学/整合心理学这一支成为了博厄斯学派中的主流。
en: Diffusionism and trait-list historicism were becoming old hat, and the psychological/integrationist thread in Boas came into prominence, influenced now by psychoanalysis and Gestalt psychology.

zh: 那些遵循博厄斯这一支系的人们重新塑造了这一理论，他们在一起组成了所谓的文化与人格学派，其中包括了本尼迪克特、米德、欧文˙哈洛韦尔（Irving Hallowell)(斯佩克的学生）以及克莱德˙克拉克洪（Clyde Kluckhohn)。
en: Those who followed this Boasian strand, reshaping it as they went along into what became known as the culture-and-personality school, included Benedict, Mead, Irving Hallowell (a student of Speck), and Clyde Kluckhohn.

zh: 来自哈佛阵营的拉尔夫˙林顿（Ralph Linton)也加入到这一传统中，并将其与来自英国社会人类学的影响相融合。
en: Ralph Linton, from the Harvard line, joined in this tradition, which he merged with an influence from British social anthropology.

zh: 进化论是一种人类学观点，它强调文化复杂性随着时间发展而增强。
en: Evolutionism is an anthropological perspective which emphasizes the growing complexity of culture through time.

zh: 传播论是一种强调理念从一个地方传播到另一个地方的观点。
en: Diffusionism is a perspective which emphasizes the transmission of ideas from one place to another.

zh: 由于这两种理论对同一件事，即文化是如何变迁的，提出了不同的解释，它们彼此互相对抗。
en: They compete because they offer different explanations of the same thing: how cultures change.

zh: 然而，这二者其实都是一个重大理论 社会变迁理论的一部分。
en: Yet both are really part of the same grand theory: the theory of social change.

zh: 一方面，这种深刻的个人记忆的汇集被整合为一段“生命史”或“生命周期”，以适于科学的典型化。
en: On one side, this intensely personal collection of memories is made suitable for scientific typification as a "life-history" or "life cycle."

zh: 另一方面,尼萨的生活启动了一种有效的、普遍的机制，以在西方产生意义——一个有代表性的、连贯的自我（或者更准确地说，一个在自传中丰满起来的自我）。
en: On the other, Nisa's life brings into play a potent and pervasive mechanism for the production of meaning in the West—the exemplary, coherent self (or rather, the self pulling itself together in autobiography).

zh: 关于传记和自传的虚构过程没有任何普遍的或本质的东西（Gusdorf 1956；Olney 1972；Lejeune 1975）。
en: There is nothing universal or natural about the fictional processes of biography and autobiography (Gusdorf 1956; Olney 1972; Lejeune 1975)- Living does not easily organize itself into a continuous narrative.

zh: 生活不会轻易地把自已组织成一种连续的叙亊，当尼萨说，她经常这样说，我们住在那个地方，吃东西。然后我们离开，到别的地方去”或者只是“我们过了一天又一天”（第69页）时，我们可以听到不被注意的嗡嗡声、非个人的存在。
en: When Nisa says, as she often does, "We lived in that place, eating things. Then we left and went somewhere else," or simply, "we lived and lived" (69), the h um of unmarked, impersonal existence can be heard.

zh: 从如此模瑚不清的背景中，一个叙事的轮廓在与自己、同吋与另一个人交谈时显现了。
en: From this blurred background, a narrative shape emerges in the occasion of speaking, simultaneously to oneself and another.

zh: 尼萨讲述她的生活，这一过程在肖斯塔克的书中从文本上被戏剧化了。
en: Nisa tells her life, a process textually dramatized in Shostak's book.

zh: 社会工作者和传教士在走出去做好事、给予帮助，以及可能的宗教救赎上与医师非常相似。
en: The social worker and the missionary resemble the physician in that they are out to do good, to give aid, and perhaps ultimately religious salvation.

zh: 社会工作者经常被限制在他们的办公室。
en: Social workers are normally more confined to their offices.

zh: 传教士则会进入田野领域很长时间，并且会比我们能想到的任何其他类型的人们作出更多自我牺牲；实际上，许多最好的民族志一直都是由传教士完成的。
en: Missionaries move into the midst of the field for longer periods and with more complete commitment of self than any other people of the types we have considered; in fact, much of the best ethnography has been done by missionaries.

zh: 在整个人类历史中，人们一直都要了解：他们是谁，他们从哪里来，为什么他们如此这般行为。
en: Throughout human history, people have needed to know who they are, where they came from, and why they behave as they do.

zh: 从传统看，神话和传说提供了关于这些问题的答案。
en: Traditionally, myths and legends provided the answers to these questions.

zh: 自人类学产生以来的200多年里，它提供了回答人们关于自身问题的另一种研究方式。
en: Anthropology, as it has emerged over the past 200 years, offers another approach to answering the questions people ask about themselves.

zh: 人类学是对人类的研究。
en: Anthropology is the study of humankind.

zh: 人类学家运用科学的研究方式，试图对人类的差异和所有人类共有的那些事情提出合情合理的、客观的理解。
en: In employing a scientific approach, anthropologists seek to produce a reasonably objective understanding of both human diversity and aspects all humans have in common.

zh: 人类学的两个主要分支学科是体质人类学和文化人类学。
en: The two major branches of anthropology are physical and cultural anthropology.Physical anthropology focuses on humans as biological organisms.

zh: 通过民族主义而表达的传统主义因而具有深刻的现代特征。
en: The traditionalism which is expressed through nationalism is thus deeply modern in character.

zh: 民族主义者声称维京人（Vikings)是挪威人的事实并不意味着民族主义者也是维京人。
en: The fact that the nationalists claim the Vikings were Norwegians does not mean that the nationalists are Vikings.

zh: 我们现在需要更加深入地考察民族主义和现代性之间的关系，这与前面对社会规模、科技和社会整合的不同形式的讨论有着密切的关系。
en: We now need to examine more closely the relationship between nationalism and modernity, which has a strong bearing on earlier discussions of social scale, technology and forms of social integration.

zh: 另一方面，很明显，特罗布里恩德的文化遭遇了殖民以后，远非毫无变化。
en: On the other hand, it is clear that Trobriand culture is far from unchanged after its colonial encounter.

zh: 对现代化的一种不同类型的反应以美拉尼西亚和波利尼西亚的所谓船货崇拜为代表（Worsley 1968）。
en: A different kind of reaction to modernisation is represented in the so-called cargo cults of Melanesia and Polynesia (Worsley 1968).

zh: 这些千禧年的政治或宗教崇拜最初出现于第一次世界大战之后，作为与外界越来越多的交往的一种后果，而其中有些崇拜是最新出现的。
en: These millenary political or religious cults first emerged as a result of increased contact with the outside world after the First World War, and some are much more recent.

zh: 他们具有双重目的：重建传统权威，并获得对外来者（大多数是美国人）的巨大财富的控制权。
en: They have a double aim: to re-establish traditional authority and to achieve control of the immense wealth of the foreigners (mostly Americans).

zh: 规范的存在并不意味着任何社会的所有人都完全赞同或遵从它们。
en: The existence of norms does not imply that there is total agreement on them or total obeisance towards them in any society.

zh: 例如，很多地方可能都有一条婚后住在男方家里的规则（新婚夫妇应该搬到男方家里居住,参见第八章），但却未必被所有社会成员所遵守。所有规范共有的一点是，它们都与约束力相关。
en: For instance, there may very well be a rule about virilocality (that a newly wed couple should move in with the groom’s family; see Chapter 8) without it being followed by all members of society.All norms have in common that they are connected with sanctions.

zh: 原则上存在积极约束和消极约束。
en: In principle, both positive and negative sanctions exist.

zh: 积极约束包括对遵守规范的奖赏，而消极约束则带来对违背规则的惩罚。
en: A positive sanction involves a reward for following the norms, while a negative one entails punishment for breaching the rules.

zh: 不过，“约束力”这个术语通常用来描述消极约束——轻微和严重的惩罚形式。
en: However, the term "sanction" is usually used about negative sanctions – mild and severe forms of punishment.

zh: 从舅居(avunculocal residence)是指一对已婚夫妇和新郎的舅舅生活在-起（参见图9.3)。支持从舅居的因素与促成从父居的因素一样，但是它只发生在女性继嗣对于重要权利和财产的转移至关重要的社会中。
en: Avunculocal residence, in which a married couple goes to live with the groom's mother's brother (Figure 9.3) is favored by the same factors that promote patrilocal residence, but only in societies where descent through women is deemed crucial for the transmission of important rights and property.

zh: 特罗布里恩德群岛的居民就是采取这种居处模式,在那里，每一个个体生来就是一个亲属群体的成员，这些亲属通过他们的母亲，他们母亲的母亲，以此类推，直到最初那个衍生广所有后代的女性，来追溯他们的祖先。
en: Such is the case among the people of the Trobriand Islands, where each individual is a member from birth of a group of relatives who trace their descent back through their mother, their mother's mother，and so on to the one woman all others are descended from.

zh: 如果生态环境使女性在维持生计中占主导地位的作用。那么，从母居（matrilocal residence)，即男丁离开他在其中长大的家庭，到他妻子父母家去居住，就是一种可能的结果。
en: Matrilocal residence, where the man leaves the family he grew up with to go live with his wife in her parents' household, is a likely result if ecological circumstances make the women's role predominant in subsistence.

zh: 这种居处模式在园艺农业社会中最常见，那里的政治组织相对来说比较松散，而妇女之间的合作很重要。
en: It is found most often in horticultural societies, where political organization is relatively uncentralized and where cooperation among women is important.

zh: 霍皮印第安人提供了一个实例，尽管从事农耕的是男子，但控制土地使用权和收获物的却是妇女。
en: The Hopi Indians provide one example; although the men do the farming, the women control access to land and "own" the harvest.

zh: 而且，甚至不允许男子进入谷仓。
en: Indeed，men are not even allowed in the granaries.

zh: 在这方面，社会与政治革命问题是一个极好的、反复出现的車例。
en: The question of social and political revolutions is an excellent, perennial case in point.

zh: 对于民族志作者来说，这在很大程度要依靠幸运和机缘——民族志作者身处何时何地，从而与这事件发生关联。
en: For the ethnographer, much depends on serendipity and opportunity — where and when the ethnographer was situated in relation to the event.

zh: 关注重大革命事件的民族志通常采取的做法是在村落研究的形式下，叙述革命对日常生活造成的影响。
en: Ethnography that has concerned itself with great revolutions has usually been situated to recount the effects of revolution on everyday life in the form of village studies.

zh: 在我看来，村落层次上的民族志中最生动地记录了后革命状态的是威廉˙欣顿的《翻身1966》，它生动深刻地记述了一种革命的社会理论是如何被运用于对一个地方村落社会进行阶级重划与社会重塑的。
en: For me, the most vivid village-level ethnography registering post-revolutionary conditions is William Hinton's Fanshen (1966), with its striking account of how a revolutionary social theory is applied in the reclassification and reshaping of local village society.

zh: 我们可以描述某一特定文化模式的标志——例如，将人们匆匆忙忙或悠闲自在作为其时间观念的标志——但是，文化是我们基于这样的标志作出的一种抽象的东西。
en: We can describe indications of a certain cultural pattern – people hurrying or loitering as clues to their assumptions about time, for example – but culture itself is an abstraction that we make based on such indications.

zh: 抽象并没有错，只要我们认可它代表的是什么。
en: There is nothing wrong with an abstraction so long as we recognize it for what it is.

zh: 然而，我们不可避免地会受到诱惑将抽象的东西视作具体的事物。
en: But inevitably we are tempted to treat the abstraction as a thing.

zh: 这正是怀特海（Alfred North Whitehead) 所称的“错置具体感的谬误”(fallacy of misplaced concreteness), 即错把抽象的东西当成具体的东西。
en: This is what Alfred North Whitehead called the "fallacy of misplaced concreteness", that is, to mistake an abstraction for a concrete thing.

zh: 当前的人类学和所有其他人文科的“高”(high)理论话语-一能权威性地统合本领域的思想主体一一还处于一片混乱。
en: In anthropology and all other human sciences at the moment, "high" theoretical discourse—the body o f ideas that authoritatively unify a field—is in disarray.

zh: 目前最有意思、最有激发力的理论著作正是那些指向实践的作品[参见奥特纳的论述（Ortner，1984)]，即对经典问题进行自下而上的再阐述，面这取决于以往髙理论中那些被想当然地接受的事实将如何被重新表述。
en: The most interesting a n d provocative theoretical works now are precisely those that point to practice (see Ortner 1984), that is, to a bottom - up reformulation of classic questions, which hinges on how the previously taken-for-granted facts of high theory are to be represented.

zh: 这些作品构成了对实证主义视角的新一轮攻击，它们装备上了战后大陆哲学中的解释学、现象学和符 号学等诸般手段，并终于开始对英美的社会理论产生冲击。
en: 2 These works constitute renewed assaults on positivist perspectives, rearmed by the postwar hermeneutic, phenomenological, and semiotic fashions in Continental philosophy that are finally having an impact on Anglo-American social thought.

zh: 例如，在苏格兰的学校中，人们承认苏格兰英语是一种有效的和受尊重的说话方式，并被用来教授标准英语。
en: In Scotland, for example, Scots English is recognized in the schools as a valid and valued way of speaking, and it is used in teaching Standard English.

zh: 因此，个人就逐渐擅长于在两种方言间来回转换，视他在什么情境中讲话而定。
en: As a consequence，individuals become skilled at switching back and forth between the two dialects, depending on the situation.

zh: 虽然我们没有意识到它，但当我们从正式的谈话向非正式的谈话转换时，根据我们在什么地方以及我们与谁交谈，我们也在做同样的事情。
en: Without being conscious of it, we all do something similar when we switch from formality to informality in our speech, depending upon where we are and whom we are talking to.

zh: 根据情境要求从一种语言层面向另一种语言层面的转变过程，无论是从一种语言向另一种语言，还是从一种方言向另一种方言的转变过程, 都被称为代码转换(code switching)，而且这已成为一些社会语言学研究的主题。
en: The process of changing from one level of language to another as the situation demands, whether from one language to another or from one dialect of a language to another, is known as code switching, and it has been the subject of a number of sociolinguistic studies.

zh: 单系继嗣(unilineal descent，有时也叫单边继嗣）只通过男子一系或者只通过女子一系来确立继嗣群体的成员资格。
en: Unilineal descent (sometimes called unilateral descent) establishes descent group membership exclusively through the male or the female line.In non-Western societies, unilineal descent groups are quite common.

zh: 在非两方社会，单系继嗣群体相当普遍。
en: In non-Western societies, unilineal descent groups are quite common.

zh: 个体一出生就归属于一个特定的继嗣群体，该群体根据不同的文化或者通过母系继嗣（matrilineal descent)经由女子一系，或者通过父系继嗣（patrilineal descent)——经由男子一系向上溯源。
en: The individual is assigned at birth to membership in a specific descent group, which may be traced either by matrilineal descent, through the female line, or by patrilineal descent, through the male line, depending on the society.

zh: 在父系社会中，男性远比女性重要，因为他们被认为要对群体的延续负责。
en: In patrilineal societies the males are far more important than the females, for they are considered responsible for the group's perpetuation.

zh: 在母系社会中，这一责任落在群体的女性成员身上，她们的重要地位因而得以强化。
en: In matrilineal societies, this responsibility falls on the female group members, whose importance is thereby enhanced.

zh: 德˙塞尔托注意到，文学语的虚构在科学上被谴责（而在美学上被欣赏），是由于其缺乏“单义性”一一据说自然科学和标准的历史叙述都是绝不模棱两可的。
en: De Certeau notes that the fictions of literary language were scientifically condemned (and esthetically appreciated) for lacking "univocity," the purportedly unambiguous accounting of natural science and professional history.

zh: 按照这一公式，文学与虚构的话语与生俱来是不稳定的；它“在意义的分层上大做文章；它意在言外；它以那样一种语言描绘自己，从中它不断取得的效果就是其意义不可能被框定或控制”（de Certeau 1983:128）。
en: In this schema, the discourse of literature and fiction is inherently unstable; it "plays on the stratification of meaning; it narrates one thing in order to tell something else; it delineates itself in a language from which it continuously draws effects of meaning that cannot be circumscribed or checked" (1983: 128).

zh: 这一话语不可救药地是比喻性的和多义的，它不断地被从科学中驱逐出去，但并非总是很成功。
en: This discourse, repeatedly banished from science, but with uneven success, is incurably figurative and polysemous.

zh: （只要它的效果开始过于公开地被感觉到，一个科学文本就显得太“文学”了，比如说似乎用了太多的隐喻，似乎依赖风格和形象描绘，等等。）
en: (Whenever its effects begin to be felt too openly, a scientific text will appear "literary"; it will seem to be using too many metaphors, to be relying on style, evocation, and so on.)
