zh: 调适一词也指有机体在其环境中造成的变化与环境在有机体中造成的变化之间的相互作用过程。
en: The term adaptation also refers to the interaction process between changes an organism makes in its environment and changes the environment makes in the organism.

zh: 镰状细胞性贫血基因的传播是一个恰当的例子：很久以前，在中非热带地区，在人类种群中出现了基因突变,在低氧压力的情况下，引起具有镰状红血细胞的生成。
en: The spread of the gene for sickle-cell anemia is a case in point.Long ago, in the tropics of central Africa, a genetic mutation appeared in human populations, causing the manufacture of red blood cells that take on a sickle shape under conditions of low oxygen pressure.

zh: 因为从每一父母经遗传而带有这种特质基因的人通常发生严重的贫血症，并在童年时代死去，所以对抗这种基因传播的选择压力在地方人群中发挥作用。
en: Since persons who receive a gene for this trait from each parent usually develop severe anemia and die in childhood, selective pressure was exerted against the spread of this gene in the local gene pool.

zh: 后来，新的文化实践——刀耕火种的园艺——被引进到这一地区，通过刀耕火种，因自然植被的消除而造成自然环境的变化。
en: Then slash-and-burn horticulture was introduced into this region, creating a change in the natural environment by removal—through cutting (slashing) and burning—of the natural vegetative cover.

zh: 这有利于蚊子的繁殖，这种蚊子会携带引起严重疟疾的寄生虫。
en: This was conducive to the breeding of mosquitos that carry the parasite causing falciparum malaria.

zh: 当寄生虫传染给人时，它们就生长在红血细胞内，并引起总是使人衰弱而且经常致命的疾病。
同时，这种程度的个人投入会具有重要的道德暗示，友谊和其他私密关系会发展到“真”或“假”的田地吗？面对受访者，民族志学者有什么样的道德义务？
en: At the same time, this degree of personal involvement has important ethical implications.Are friendships and other confidential relationships developed in the field "real" or "fake"; what are the moral obligations of the ethnographer vis-à-vis the informants?

zh: 当地受访者可能不支持把他们的个人关注点“人类学化”，也不愿意他们的“外国好朋友”突然消失，再也不回来，为了保护受访者，AAA（美国人类学学会）和其他职业团体，以及一些大学院系已经制定了相关道德章程。
en: The AAA (American Anthropological Association) and other professional bodies, as well as many university departments, have developed ethics codes for the protection of informants, who may both disapprove of the "anthropologification" of their personal concerns and of their "close friends from abroad" who suddenly vanish, never to return.

zh: 另一些不同的问题与个人的背景经历所造成的职业偏见有关，这些个人经历可能使民族志学者只能看到一部分社会事实，即在他们的早期经验看来有意义的那部分事实。
en: A different set of problems concerns professional bias caused by personal biography, which may lead ethnographers to see only those parts of social reality that make sense in terms of their earlier experiences.

zh: 另一方面，民族志学者自己已有的相关研究也会提高田野工作的质量（参见Okely and Calloway 1992）。
en: On the other hand, existential involvement in one's own research can also improve the quality of the work (see Okely and Calloway 1992).

zh: 也就是说，他们在寻求能够把“公共”纳入到女性内在的事务中，例如养育孩子，以及所有其他的我们每天都会碰见并关注的责任。
en: In other words they are trying to find ways in which 'the public' can responsibly include the female domestic matters of child-rearing and all the other normal concerns and responsibilities with which we are daily and intimately most concerned.

zh: 这些作者假定这些“内在”的事务，以及对关心和信任的需要，主要与性别有关，只是女性的兴趣。
en: These writers assume 'the domestic', and the concern for care and trust, to be largely a matter of gender, of interest to females but not males.

zh: 对这些人来说，不同性別具有不同的道德视野：男人倾向于在责任、契约和公正中定义道德，女人则更多的是关注与养育孩子相关的道德，例如爱、关心、信任和合作。
en: For them, the genders have different moral outlooks: while men tend to phrase morality in terms of obligation, contract and justice, women are most concerned with a morality relevant to the bringing up of children, engendering of love, care, trust and cooperation.

zh: 根据其他地方采取的行动者视角和系统视角之间的区别，应该注意到，博安南对提夫社会的变化的分析代表了一种典型的系统视角。
en: In accordance with the distinction between actor perspectives and systemic perspectives employed elsewhere, it should be noted that Bohannan's analysis of change in Tiv society represents a typical systemic perspective.

zh: 在他的分析中，变化是由外因（外部因素）对整个系统的调整而引起的。
en: Change, in his analysis, is caused by exogenous factors (outside factors) modifying the system as a whole.

zh: 在另一个以行动者定位的分析中，巴思（Barth 1967）研究了另一个非洲社会（苏丹西部的福尔人）经济领域的衰退，他却强调变化的内部因素。
en: In an actor-oriented analysis of the breakdown of economic spheres in another African society, the Fur in western Sudan, Barth (1967) instead emphasises endogenous factors of change.

zh: 他展示了一个富有进取心的个人（企业家）如何发现有利可图的、通过不同领域之间的转换，来交换商品的新方式，而结果大致与提夫社会相同：道德经济的崩溃，以及基于供需关系的货币交换的市场原则的普遍化。
en: He shows how an enterprising individual (an entrepreneur) discovers new, profitable ways of exchanging goods through conversion between spheres, and the result is roughly the same as in Tiv society; a breakdown of the moral economy, and the universalisation of the market principles of monetary exchange based on supply and demand.

zh: 照常，以行动者为中心的视角和系统的视角都能有助于理解社会进程。
en: As usual, both the actor-centred and the systemic perspective can be illuminating in understanding social process.

zh: 在这讲中，我认为存在一个与其名字相称的德国启蒙运动。
en: In this lecture I assume that there was a German Enlightenment worthy of that name.

zh: 这不是一个无关轻重的事情，也不是毫无争议的。
en: This is not an unimportant matter; nor is it uncontested.

zh: 许多人类学史研究者倾向于沿用诺贝特˙埃利亚斯（Norbert Elias)的方法，沿着一种完全不同的路线描述欧洲大陆的学术史（1969)。
en: A number of historians of anthropology prefer to follow Norbert Elias in portraying continental Europe's intellectual history along a different line (1969).

zh: 在埃利亚斯看来， 法国不仅是欧洲大陆启蒙运动的主要中心（我也赞成这一立场），而且它同苏格兰一起几乎是这一运动唯一的发生地。
en: In Elias's view, France was not only the primary center of the continental European Enlightenment (a position to which I, too, subscribe), but also, together with Scotland, its almost exclusive locus.

zh: 这种“唯法独尊”的观点认为，启蒙运动的社会历史维度是同文明的概念连在一起的，这同德语国家中几乎唯一的浪漫主义传统截然对立。
en: In that exclusivist perspective, the sociohistorical dimension of the Enlightenment is tied to the concept of civilization, as opposed to the almost exclusively Romantic tradition of culture in the German-speaking countries.

zh: 格莱恩˙佩尼（H.Glenn Penny)对那个时代德国人类学博物馆的分析非常精彩（2002)。安德鲁˙齐默曼的书 (Zimmermann 2001)有用也精确，但对弗里茨˙格雷布纳和贝纳德˙安科曼1904年的范式转变持有的观点太过热情。
en: H. Glenn Penny's analysis of German anthropology museums in that period is excellent (2002), whereas Andrew Zimmermann's 2001 volume is useful and accurate but gives too enthusiastic a view of Fritz Graebner's and Bernard Ankermann's 1904 paradigm shift (Gräbner 1905; Ankermann 1905).

zh: 对于前纳粹时期的德语区人类学，读者可以参考科克（Kdcke 1979)、布朗德维（Brandewie 1990)以及多斯特尔和金格里奇（Dostal and Gingrich 1996)的论述。
en: For anthropology in German of the pre-Nazi period, readers might want to refer to Köcke 1979, Brandewie 1990, and Dostal and Gingrich 1996.

zh: 对于纳粹时期，英语中非常少有的几部文献中有一个是多斯特尔的著述（Dostal 1994)。
en: For the Nazi period, one of the very few pieces available in English is Dostal 1994.

zh: 对于1945以后的发展，英语中没有很好的概论。
en: There is no good overview in English of post-1945 developments.

zh: 来自印度西南部的纳亚尔人组成一个拥有土地的武士等级（不是独立社会）。
en: The Nayar constitute a landowning, warrior caste (rather than an independent society) from southwest India.

zh: 在他们中间，地产由各种社团掌握，这些社团由根据女性家系联系起来的男亲属组 220成。
en: Among them, estates are held by corporations of sorts made up of kinsmen related in the female line.

zh: 这些男亲属都一起住在大家庭里，有一个最高辈分的男子做当家人。过去,男子的军事训练约在7岁就开始了，而且从这时起到他们整个青年成年期，在战争需要的时候，他们就远离家庭。这里值得我们关注的有纳亚尔人的三项事务。
en: These kinsmen all live together in a large household, with the eldest male serving as manager.Three Nayar transactions are of interest here.

zh: 第一项事务是在一个女孩第一次来月经后不久发生的。
en: The first occurs shortly before a girl undergoes her first menstruation.

zh: 这包括这样一个仪式，它使这个姑娘与一个青年男子在临时婚姻中结合在一起。
en: It involves a ceremony that joins together in a temporary union the girl with a young man.

zh: 这种婚姻,可以有性关系，也可以没有性关系，持续几天后终止。
en: This union, which may or may not involve sexual relations, lasts for a few days and then breaks up.

zh: 现代美国人类学已经成形，一方面是受博厄斯学派及其相对论关注点的驱动，另一方面是感知到在本土文化不幸消失之前进行记录的需要。与此同时，在殖民强国大不列颠的情况却非常不同。
en: While modern American anthropology had been shaped, on the one hand by the Boasians and their relativist concerns, and on the other hand by the perceived need to record native cultures before their feared disappearance, the situation in the major colonial power, Great Britain, was very different.

zh: 殖民机构和在殖民地工作的人类学家之间存在多大程度的共谋，一直是个引起争论的问题（Goody 1995）。但是帝国主义的事实对于英国人类学家来说，即使是含蓄的，也是一个无可逃避的前提，至少在去殖民地化之前如此。
en: The degree of complicity between colonial agencies and anthropologists working in the colonies is debatable (Goody 1995), but the very fact of imperialism was an inescapable, if usually implicit, premise for British anthropology at least until de-colonisation.

zh: 被拥戴为现代英国社会人类学奠基人的是波兰移民马林诺夫斯基（1884 —1942）。1914—1918年间，他在特罗布里恩德群岛（Trobriand Islands）花了两年时间进行的田野调査为民族志资料的收集建立了一个标准，至今基本上仍然没有受到挑战。
en: The man who is often hailed as the founder of modern British social anthropology was a Polish immigrant, Bronislaw Malinowski (1884–1942), whose two years of fieldwork in the Trobriand Islands (between 1914 and 1918) set a standard for ethnographic data collection that is still largely unchallenged.

zh: 任何情况（不论是5分钟的交易，还是持续数世纪的一个社会）下的演员，都要参与一场斗争，即把文化和社会意义强加到混乱的存在上面。
en: The actors in any situation – whether it be a five minute exchange or a society enduring for centuries – are engaged in a struggle to impose cultural and social meaning on the chaos of existence.

zh: 这一斗争不仅为对意义的搜寻所激励，同时也为政治、经济和自然因素所激励，并且文化是追寻的而不是给定的。
en: This struggle is motivated not only by the quest for meaning but also by political, economic, and natural forces, and culture is sought rather than simply given.

zh: 当然，在不稳定的第三世界的情景中，事情尤其是这样，但即使在一位地方医师舒适的候诊室的背景下，模式也是可见的。
en: This is especially the case, of course, in the unstable third world situations where anthropologists have increasingly found themselves since the end of World War II, but the pattern is visible even in the antiseptic, cozy setting of a local physician's waiting room.

zh: 如果人性是一个因素，那么在解决问题时，人文科学与我们的努力就是相关的。
en: If humanity is a factor, then the human sciences are relevant to our efforts at solving problems.

zh: 尽管在这些人文科学中，人类学可能会显得最不相关，因为它处理的是异乎寻常和遥远，而不是在家乡的熟悉和亲近——在后者那里我们的问题可能看起来像是一种谎言。
en: Among these human sciences, though, anthropology may appear the least relevant, for it deals with the exotic and faraway, not the familiar and close at home, which is where our problems seem to lie.

zh: 不过，这一观点有些短视。
en: This viewpoint is myopic.

zh: 实际上，多数世界都关心世界各地发生的民族冲突。
en: In fact, much of world concern is with localized ethnic conflicts all over the world.

zh: 然后出现一个第四世界，约有十亿人忍饥挨饿，缺乏卫生保健，并被剥夺最低生存条件——他们是否不是我们的关注焦点？
en: Then there is the fourth world, that population of almost a billion humans who are starving, lacking medicalcare, and deprived of the minimal conditions necessary for survival; are they not our concern?

zh: 受伊达尔戈偏爱的“光复”这一术语便回荡着西班牙人推翻摩尔人的统治、光复西班牙那一时代的精神。
en: The Conquest negated indigenous society;Independence, in Hegelian terms, was the negation of that negation.The new indigenous revival reversed indigenous subjugation in the Conquest.Hence the term favored by Hidalgo "Reconquest" with further echoes from the time of the reconquest of Spain from Moorish domination.

zh: 莫尔洛斯替伊达尔戈所领导的革命想出了“受命于美洲光复新政府”这样一种名义。
en: Morelos conferred on himself the title "Commissioned by the Reconquest and New Government of America."

zh: 历史学家阿纳斯塔索˙布斯塔曼特（Anastasio Bustamante）则刻意颠倒了当年科尔特斯及其所率部众的行军路线并以此对这场光复革命加以复制，很多细枝末节的事件都被他——加以使用，如此复制出来的历史也曾流行一时。
en: Anastasio Bustamante popularized the idea of a war which replicated in reverse the adventure of Cortes and his companions, even down to the smallest incidents.

zh: 这种巧妙的颠倒所产生的历史观点还有很多，在此不一一列举。
en: Many other instances exist of this precise reversal.

zh: 地理学、动物学和植物学都顺理成章地发展为博物学家学术领域内影响普遍的学科传统，并产生了包括进化论在内的一系列划时代的学术成就。
en: Geography, zoology, and botany were in due course developed into the generalizing traditions of academic scholarship of the naturalists, and they produced epochal intellectual achievements, such as the theory of evolution.

zh: 但类似的发展并没有出现在人文科学中。
en: Similar developments did not take place in the humanities.

zh: 关于在日益扩张的帝国境内及其疆域之外的民族的社会、语言和文化知识甚少得到研究，并且是以较为局限的东方学的模式些出色的研究也没能汇聚成一种能变成人类学的归纳性观点，如E.W.莱恩（E.W. Lane)的《现代埃及礼俗记》（1836)以及备受推崇的芒斯图尔特˙埃尔芬斯通（Mountstuart Elphinstone)的《考布尔王国纪实》 (1839/1972)。
en: Scholarship regarding the societies, languages, and cultures of the peoples of the growing empire and beyond its boundaries was pursued sparingly and in the particularizing mode of Orientalism, and outstanding studies such as E. W. Lane's An Account of the Manners and Customs of the Modern Egyptians (1836) and the honorable Mountstuart Elphinstone's An Account of the Kingdom of Caubul (1839/1972) failed to converge into a generalizing perspective that could become anthropology.

zh: 尽管严肃的旅行文学拥有很大的公众市场，但旅行作者们通常在扩展其视野的创作尝试中着眼于历史和地理，而“野蛮人”的生活并没有得到太多严肃的关注。
en: While there was a large public market for serious travel literature, travel authors looked to history and geography for their wider perspective, and the lives of "savages" did not receive much serious attention.

zh: 许多学者（Foreman 1986，Manes l990，Eckersley 1992）都曾经试图在激进环境决定论和动物权利运动之间划分一个界限。
en: Several writers (Foreman 1986, Manes 1990, Eckersley 1992) have gone to some lengths to identify a boundary between radical environmentalism and the animal rights movement.

zh: 佛曼（Foreman）指出，支持动物权利是关注个体动物的健康，狭义上的“深度生态学”（deep ecology）的基础是尊重“生物群落”；“动物权利运动是怜悯性的，希望消除磨难和痛苦”，而广义上的“深度生态学（Deep Ecology）是纯生态学的，认为物物相依，磨难和痛苦是自然所固有的，死亡不是罪恶”，简而言之，“自然知其道。”（Foreman 1986:2，引自 Manes 1990:146）。
en: Foreman pointed out that support for animal rights is concern for the wellbeing of individuals, whereas "deep ecology" is based on respect for "the life community": "Animal Rights is compassionate, desiring to eliminate suffering and pain", while "Deep Ecology is ecological, recognizing that life depends on life, that some suffering and pain is inherent in nature, that death is not evil", in short, "that nature knows best" (Foreman 1986:21, quoted in Manes 1990:146).

zh: 相比之下，独立训练（Independence training）强调个人的独立性、自力更生和个人成就。一个人成为他自己的自我和能力的拥有者。
en: By contrast, independence training emphasizes individual independence, self-reliance, and personal achievement.

zh: 它一般与这样一些社会有 关，在这些社会里，核心家庭由丈夫、妻子和他们的后代组成，它们是独立的而不是较大家户群体的一部分。
en: It is typically associated with societies whose nuclear families, consisting of a husband, wife, and their offspring, are independent rather than a part of a larger household group.

zh: 独立训练是诸如美国那样的丄业社会和后工业社会特具的特点。在那些社会里，自力更生和个人成就，特别就男人而言，是生存的重要特质。
en: Independence training is particularly characteristic of industrial societies such as that of the United States, where self-reliance and personal achievement, especially for men, are important traits for survival.

zh: 这种模式也包括鼓励和劝阻。
en: Again, this pattern of training involves both encouragement and discouragement.

zh: 在消极的方面，不太重视长期的口头满足，喂奶与其说是由要求推动的，还不如说是由时间表推动的。
en: On the negative side, little emphasis is placed on prolonged oral gratification, and feeding is prompted more by schedule than demand.

zh: 科学的理想模式，即倡导符码化的（codified)田野调査方法、专业上的公正客观和系统性的详细描述，似乎对他们产生了深刻的影响。
en: The scientific ideal seems to press on them acutely, calling for codified field methodology, professional detachment, a systematic write-up.

zh: 异文化中任何有碍于这些工作的因素，既是一个民族志事实，也是民族志研究的障碍。
en: Whatever about the other culture impedes these tasks is an ethnographic obstacle, as well as anethnographic fact.

zh: 例如两位作者都抱怨不能与被访人进行私人性交谈，好像私人性交谈一旦成为一种实地研究方法，就应该在任何文化背景中都能够实现。
en: Both writers complain, for instance, about the impossibility of having private conversations with informants, as if private conversation, once baptized as a field method, ought to be culturally possible everywhere.

zh: 随着研究方法日益符码化，“客观性和主观性实践”之间的冲突也就曰渐激烈。
en: As methodology gets increasingly codified, the clash between "objective and subjective practices" becomes increasingly acute.

zh: 传统人类学采用的是“类推”而不是“对话”。
en: Instead of dialogics, traditional anthropology has practised ‘analogies’.

zh: 传统人类学曾经以一种封闭且预设的方式对待他者，试图通过推理而不是从当地的对话中去理解他者，采用来自它自己的逻辑体系进行外在的推理。
en: It has treated others in a closed, presumptive way, attempting to understand them via a priori reasoning; instead of having knowledge emerge from local dialogue, traditional anthropology employed extraneous analogies which derived from its own system of rationality.

zh: 然后传统人类学就会以独白方式展示自己的资料，即所谓的客观主义风格。
en: It then presented its data in a monologic, so-called objectivist fashion.

zh: 与血缘家庭相反，夫妻家庭以丈夫与妻子的婚姻纽带为基础。
en: Conjugal, as opposed to consanguine, families are formed on the basis of marital ties between husband and wife.

zh: 夫妻家庭最低限度由已婚的夫妻及其扶养的孩子组成，又被称为核心家庭（nuclear family）；夫妻家庭的其他形式是一夫多妻制家庭和一妻多夫制家庭，这可被设想为有一个共同配偶的梭心家庭的集合。一夫多妻制家庭包括一个丈夫多个妻子,而一妻多夫制家庭则包括一个妻子的多个丈夫。
en: Minimally, a conjugal family consists of a married couple with their dependent children, otherwise known as the nuclear family; other forms of conjugal families are polygynous and polyandrous families, which may be thought of as aggregates of nuclear families with one spouse in common.A polygynous family includes the multiple wives of a single husband, while a polyandrous family includes the multiple husbands of a single wife.

zh: 两种家庭经常列在多配偶制家庭的标题之下。
en: Both are often lumped together under the heading of polygamous families.

zh: 男女诸神是伟大而遥远的存在，他们通常被视为控制着宇宙。如果一个宗教有多个这样的神的话，就被称为多神教（polytheism）,其中每一位神掌管宇宙的某一特殊部分。
en: Gods and goddesses are the great and more remote beings.They usually are seen as controlling the universe, or, if several are recognized (known as polytheism), each has charge of a particular part of the universe.

zh: 例如，古希腊的男神和女神是这样分工的：宙斯是天神，波塞冬是大海的统治者，哈得斯则是冥界之神和死者的统治者。
en: Such was the case of the gods and goddesses of ancient Greece: Zeus was lord of the sky, Poseidon was ruler of the sea, and Hades was lord of the underworld and ruler of the dead.Besides these three brothers were a host of other deities, female as well as male, each similarly concerned with specific aspects of life and the universe.

zh: 分类体系不仅根据内容变化，而且根据内容的性质发生变化：从自然物到事物的各种属性（颜色、重量、形状、尺寸和声音）、合成物、提取物。
en: Not only may classifications vary according to what content is assigned where, then, but also what kind of content: from physical things, to attributes of things (colour, weight, shape, size, sound), to synthetic things, to abstractions.

zh: 分类不仅随着范畴内容的范围变化，而且也与范畴定义的复杂程度有关：从单一或共同的称谓到多样称谓或“家庭形似物”（Wittgenstein 1978)。
en: Not only may classifications vary according to the scope of categorial content but also the complexity of the latter's definition: from monothetic or common denominations, to polythetic denominations or "family resemblances" (Wittgenstein 1978).

zh: 最终，各个类别将以各种方式与其他类别关联：作为特定分类或等级整体的一部分，也成为类比和隐喻转化的对象（Ellen 1997)。
en: Finally, different categories may relate to one another in a variety of ways: as parts of taxonomic or hierarchical wholes certainly, but also as opposites, by analogy or other metaphoric transformation (cf. Ellen 1997).

zh: 城市变迁的众多力量和现代民族国家的普适结构威胁着（如果不是已经控制了）传统的秩序和地方。
en: A traditional order and localness threatened (if not already overcome) by the massificating forces of urban change, by the universalistic structures of the modern nation-state.

zh: 因此，乡村被认为是组织严密的、平等的，不喜欢炫耀差别并尊重按常规办事的能力。

en: Hence, the rural village is depicted as close-knit and isolated, egalitarian, shunning ostentatious differentiation and esteeming conventional competencies.

zh: 它所体现的文化是自愿共享的、均匀统一的，所形成的社会系统相当于一个环绕的整体，其基础是地位关系、多元角色、密集的互动网络、均衡的社会结构，以及归属感（Frankenbei 1966: 286-99；Harris 1974: 38-9)。
en: It is seen as embodying a culture which is consensually shared, homogeneous and uniform, and as engendering a social system which amounts to an encompassing whole and is based on status relations, multiplex roles, dense interactional networks, equilibrial social structures, and ascription (cf. Frankenberg 1966:286–92; Harris 1974:38–9).

zh: 这些尝试中有一些蓬勃发展并且作出了重要的研究，其他的则半途而废。
en: Some of these efforts flourished and produced significant research; others fell by the wayside.

zh: 许多尝试随后被规模更广的多元文化主义（multiculturalism)运动所吸纳。
en: Many were subsequently absorbed into a broader movement for multiculturalism.

zh: 尽管多元文化主义使用人类学的标志性概念，但它通常脱离人类学家而向前发展，而人类学家则批评隐藏其中的本质主义（essentialism)。
en: Despite its use of anthropology's signal concept, multiculturalism generally went forward independently of anthropologists, who were critical of the essentialism implicit in it.

zh: 多元文化主义运动通常的策源地则是新的文化研究领域。此外，该领域还抢占了人类学对文化概念的所有权，使人类学家们倍感恼怒。
en: The new cultural studies, which, much to our annoyance, also preempted anthropology's claim to the culture concept, was its usual home.

zh: 按照弗洛伊德的看法，儿子对母亲有情欲(熟悉酿成尝试），造成与父亲的对抗关系弗洛伊德称之为恋母情结。
en: According to him, the son desires the mother (familiarity breeds attempt), creating a rivalry with the father.(Freud called this the Oedipus complex.)

zh: 儿子必须压抑这种感情，否则就激起远比他强有力的父亲的愤怒。
en: The son must suppress these feelings or earn the wrath of the father, who is far more powerful than he.

zh: 同样，女儿迷上父亲，即恋父情结，使她与其母亲处在对抗关系之中。
en: Similarly, the attraction of the daughter to the father (the Electra complex) places her in rivalry with her mother.

zh: 要理解儿童养育实践对与性别相关的人格发展的重要性，我们可以简略考察一下纳米比亚和博茨瓦纳的卡拉哈里沙漠的原住民朱瓦西（发音为zhutwasi)人的儿童是如何成长的。
en: To understand the importance of child-rearing practices in the development of gender-related personality characteristics, we may look briefly at how children grow up among the Juhoansi (pronounced zhutwasi), a people native to the Kalahari Desert of Namibia and Botswana.

zh: 朱瓦西人是曾经广泛分布在南非大部分地区被称为布须曼人的几个民族屮的一支。
en: The Juhoansi are one of a number of people traditionally referred to as Bushmen who once were widespread through much of southern Africa.

zh: 最近，人类学家已把这些民族称为桑人，认为布须曼这个词具有侮辱含义。
en: In recent times, anthropologists have referred to these people as the San, thinking the word Bushman insulting.

zh: 不幸的是，桑人——个纳玛语词汇——有极为鄙视的意思。
en: Unfortunately, San, a Nama word, has highly pejorative associations.

zh: 而且，人类学家误解了布须曼人这个词的词源，该询源来自荷兰语Bossiesman，意思是“强盗”或“歹徒”这个民族因拒不屈从殖民主义统治而贏得了这一称号，因此，把他们称之为布须曼人，这是对他们长期和勇敢地——如果代价极高的话——抵抗殖民化的尊重。
en: Moreover, anthro-pologists misunderstood the derivation of the word Bushman, which comes from the Dutch Bossesw，meaning "bandit" or "outlaw".This designation the people earned for their refusal to knuckle under to colonial domination, so to refer to them as Bushman honors their long and valiant, if costly, record of resistance to colonialization.

zh: 所有变迁的终极来源都是创新，创新是指在一个群体内部得到广泛接受的任何新的做法、工具或原理。
en: The ultimate source of all change is innovation: any new practice, tool, or principle that gains widespread acceptance within a group.

zh: 我们把那些涉及对一个新原理的偶然发现的活动叫作首次创新（primary innovations），而把那些由对已知原理的有意应用而产生的事物叫作二次创新（secondary innovations）。
en: Those that involve the chance discovery of a new principle we refer to as primary innovations; those that result from the deliberate applications of known principles are secondary innovations.

zh: 后者最接近西方文化关于变迁的模型，即可预测的和既定的，时前者则关涉到某些偶然事件。
en: The latter corresponds most closely to Western cultured model of change as predictable and determined, while the former involves accidents of one sort or another.

zh: 其次，在这点上，被错误地归类地大量的非工业社会或曰“传统”社会的内部也存在巨大的差异。归属的/获得的区别在政治的比较研究中却是一个重要的区别，假如我们没有从类别上将它与特定的社会类型相联系的话。
en: Second, there are also great differences within the vast and inaccurate category of nonindustrial, or "traditional", societies in this regard.The ascribed/achieved distinction may nevertheless be an important one in the comparative study of politics, provided we do not link it categorically to specific societal types.

zh: 更确切地说，这种二分法是每个政治体系的一个方面。
en: This dichotomy is rather an aspect of every political system.

zh: 我们可能会问，个人的属性在多样的政治体系中有多么重要，并且那些世袭的和遵循归属的方面有多么重要呢？
en: How important are personal qualities in various political systems, we may then ask, and how important are those aspects which are hereditary and follow ascription?

zh: 利奇自己对结构主义的研究具有广泛的探索性和热情，且在某些方面非常有力。他把它广泛地应用到社会结构、艺术、建筑、非语 言沟通、辱骂用语、仪式、神话和其他领域。
en: Leach's own pursuit of structuralism was widely explorative, intense, and, in certain respects, rigorous, and he applied it widely to social structure, art, architecture, nonverbal communication, terms of abuse, ritual, myth, and other areas.

zh: 他的分析使用了少许源自通信工程的逻辑操作，主要涉及了二元对立、倒置和其他变型、对变体和对立的重复的研究以及介于中间地位之物的作用，后者即具有二分法所蕴涵的“被驱除的中间地位”的反常的两可状态的事物 (根据利奇的二分法公式，“P即为非P所不是的东西”）
en: His analyses make use of a few logical operations derivable from communication engineering, mainly those involving binary oppositions, inversions and other transformations, the exploration of the redundancies of variations and contradictions, and the effects of mediators, that is, anomalous occupants of the "excluded middle" that is implied by a dichotomy (a dichotomy of the type, in Leach's formulation, "p is what not-p is not").

zh: 涂尔干—莫斯的传统甚至看上去似乎已经被颠覆。
en: Even seemingly revolutionary advances were grounded in the Durkheim—Mauss orthodoxy.

zh: 列维-斯特劳斯（1969a）认为正是集体的分类体系规约着逻辑上普遍的生活。
en: Thus, Lévi-Strauss (1969a) explored the logical—universal life to which he claimed collective systems of classification could be seen to lead.

zh: 如果乔姆斯基（Chomsky）所说的是任何语言与发音的底层语法结构都是可以相互转换的话，那么列维-斯特劳斯所定义的比较性的无意识、象征分类的深层结构，虽然目前看上去是源自文化，实则根植于社会化了的个体的思想中。
en: If Chomsky could argue for underlying grammatical structures of which every language and every speech-act might be said to be transformations, then Lévi-Strauss determined that comparably unconscious, deep structures of symbolic classification, albeit now culturally derived, inhabited the minds of socialized human individuals.

zh: 结构人类学将源自不同文化和时代的分类体系之间繁多的转换与变异的图景看作是相互联系的，其中存在一定转化规则（比如二元对立）。
en: A structural anthropology might chart the vast network of transformations and variations by which the classificatory systems of different cultures and times were linked and the transformatory principles (such as binary opposition) by which this was effected.

zh: 正如我们已经注意到的，社会人类学中，最小的积木不是单个的行动者而是两个行动者之间的关系。
en: The smallest building-block in social anthropology is, as already noted, not the isolated actor but a relationship between two actors.

zh: 最小的社会系统因此就是这种二元关系。
en: The smallest social system is thus the dyadic relationship.

zh: 世界上很少有这么封闭的系统；而且在这么狭窄的系统框架内，相对来说，也只有很少的社会行动发生。
en: There are few systems of this modest compass in the world; and there are relatively few social activities which take place within the framework of a system this narrow.

zh: 因此，当田野工作者到达一个地方，他或她通常很快就会发现，最小、最容易接近并且发生密集而重要的互动的社会系统是家户。
en: When the fieldworker arrives in a locality, therefore, he or she will usually soon find out that the smallest and most easily accessible social system where intensive and important interaction takes place is the household.

zh: 在许多个案里，人类学家在田野调査期间，事实上成为了某一家户的客人，再加上家户（尽管它们在成分上有所不同）在每个社会都存在，所以，从探究这个社会系统入手去开展经验研究似乎是合理的。
en: In many cases, the anthropologist will actually be a guest in a household during fieldwork.Therefore, and because households (although they differ in their composition) exist in every society, it seems reasonable to begin an empirical study by exploring this social system.

zh: 在西方思想中，古希腊人逐渐树立起一种具有深远意义的二元论。
en: The Greeks instilled a profound dualism in Western thought.

zh: 在许多世纪中，心身之分、形式与实质之分，彻底渗入西方思想。
en: Distinctions between mind and body, form and substance, thoroughly penetrated Western thinking for centuries.

zh: 在这一二元论框架内，罗马人发展出一种“自然”概念，作为一件事情最内在最本质的性质。
en: Within this dualistic framework, the Romans developed a notion of "nature" as the basic qualities inherent in a thing.

zh: 直到“自然”变成一个自我包容的物质世界，这一概念才得到扩展。
en: This meaning was extended until "nature" became a self-contained material world.

zh: 这一准备工作，为我们现代的“自然科学”概念，也为什么是“不自然”（后来命名为“文化”)这一概念打下了基础。
en: The ground work was laid for our modern notions of natural science and also for a notion of what is not-nature (later named "culture").

zh: 另一类别的发嗓音是由语音修饰（vocal qualifiers）构成的。
en: Another category of vocalizations consists of vocal qualifiers.

zh: 有一种比嗓音特征表露更短暂的音延，一般限于单个语调空隙里，而不是遍及整条短语。
en: These are of briefer duration than vocal characterizers, limited generally to the space of a single intonation, rather than over whole phrases.They modify utterances in terms of intensity—loud versus soft; pitch—high versus low; and extent—drawl versus clipping.

zh: 它们根据强度音的响亮与柔和、音调的高与低、迟缓与快速来修饰话语这些表示说话人对诸如“滚出去”这类特殊短语的态度。
en: These indicate the speaker's attitude toward specific phrases, such as "Get out!"

zh: 第三类别是由发声间隔（vocal segregates) 构成的。
en: The third category consists of vocal segregates.

zh: 此外，20世纪50年代所听到的“英国结构主义者”这个词，是要将拉德克利夫-布朗的思想同列维-斯特劳斯的思想或称“法国结构主义”区别开（在第八章中叙述）。
en: Furthermore, the term ‘British structuralist’ was heard in the 1950s to distinguish Radcliffe-Brownianism from Lévi-Straussianism or ‘French structuralism’ (described in chapter 8).

zh: 令人不解的是，20世纪60年代初，新一代英国人类学家开始转向列维-斯特劳斯，他们给他们自己戴上了“英国结构主义者”的标签。
en: Confusingly, when in the early 1960s a new generation of British anthropologists turned to Lévi-Strauss, they assumed the label ‘British structuralist’ for themselves.

zh: 从广义上说，后来这个“英国结构主 义”实际上是“法国结构主义”的英国版！
en: In broader terms, the latter ‘British structuralism’ was actually a British version of ‘French structuralism’!

zh: 它在理论与实践之间以及教学与研究之间的分离，它所具有的可观的理论连续性，以及它相对来说较晚的学科建制以及田野工作转向都使得法国人类学可以声称自己是一种具有真正独特性的国别化人类学流派。
en: In its separation of theory and practice and of teaching and research, and in its considerable theoretical continuities and its relatively late institutionalization and turn to fieldwork, French anthropology can claim true distinction as a national anthropological school.

zh: 然而虽然这种独特流派对于更加宽泛的法国学术传统来说也仍然是这样的，但它并不是孤立的。
en: Yet although this school has remained true to French intellectual traditions more widely, it has not been isolated.

zh: 现代法国社会思想既汲取了自身的理性主义和普遍主义传统，也借鉴了德国诠释学和现象学以及英国的经验主义；它还扩展了自己的海外影响力，不仅是对英国——在那里它或许可以说是主导性的——而且还对美国和德国。
en: Modern French social thought has drawn on German hermeneutics and phenomenology and on British empiricism as well as on its own more rationalist and universalist traditions; it has also spread its influence abroad, not only to Britain, where it has perhaps been dominant, but also to America and Germany.

zh: 因此，法国被列为当今世界最重要的社会思想和民族志实践生产者之一，实属实至名归。
en: France therefore fully deserves its status as one of the world's leading producers of social thought and ethnographic practice

zh: 在公众心目中，人类学通常等同于找回远古人类祖先的尸骨，发掘古代营地和“消失的城市”，或者研究现代部落民族，他们的生活方式被错误地看成是“来自过去的”某种事情。
en: In the public mind, anthropology often is identified with the recovery of the bones of remote human ancestors, the unearthing of ancient campsites and "lost cities", or the study of present-day tribal peoples whose way of life is erroneously seen as something "out of the past."

zh: 人们经常没有注意到的是人类学知识的实际应用。
en: People often are unaware of the many practical applications of anthropological knowledge.

zh: 应用人类学的一个领域被称为法医人类学（Forensic Anthropology）为合法的目的专门从事人的骨骼遗体的辨别。
en: One field of applied anthropology——known as forensic anthropology——specializes in the identification of human skeletal remains for legal purposes.

zh: 法医人类学通常根据警察和其他权成机构的要求辨别凶杀受害者、失踪人员或如飞机坠毁等突难中死亡人员的遗体。
en: Forensic anthropologists are routinely called upon by police and other authorities to identify the remains of murder victims, missing persons, of people who have died in disasters such as plane crashes.

zh: 德里达认为把全部文本作为分析单位是荒谬的 （例如 Derrida 1976[1967];1978[1967]), 在这一点上他的思想与结构主义产生分歧。
en: Derrida (e.g., 1976 [1967]; 1978 [1967]) broke with structuralism in an attempt to expose what he saw as the fallacy of any analysis which accepts the totality of a text as a unit of analysis.

zh: 他声称任何文本都离不开矛盾。
en: Any text, he argues, will entail contradictions.

zh: 索绪尔的“差异”（后索绪尔结构主义者用来说明有区分的特征或二元对抗）观念被转化成一个复杂的概念，其中既有“差异”（来自法语的différence，即“差异”) ，又有“服从”（来自法语的différance [sic]，是德里达为这一现象杜撰的新词）的意思。
en: The Saussurian notion of ‘difference’ (referred to by post-Saussurian structuralists in terms of distinctive features or binary oppositions) is transformed into a complex concept where meaning is both ‘different’ (through différence, ‘difference’) and ‘deferred’ (through différance [sic], Derrida’s neologism for this phenomenon).

zh: 这些文章可能会被指责说走得太远了——诗歌将再次在城邦中遭禁，权力也不许踏上科学的殿堂。
en: These essays will be accused of having gone too far: poetry will again be banned from the city, power from the halls of science.

zh: 极端的自我意识的确有它的危险：精英主义、唯我论，将整个世界打上引号。
en: And extreme self-consciousness certainly has its dangers—of irony, of elitism, of solipsism, of putting the whole world in quotation marks.

zh: 但我相信读者发出这些危险信号（如本书中一些文章所做的），将是在他们已经与既有再现形式的变化的历史、修辞和政治短兵相接之后。
en: But I trust that readers who signal these dangers will do so (like some of the essays below) after they have confronted the changing history, rhetoric, and politics of established representational forms.

zh: 在符号学、后结构主义、阐释学和解构的觉醒中，有大量关于回到朴素的言谈和现实主义的议论。
en: In the wake of semiotics, post-structuralism, hermeneutics, and deconstruction there has been considerable talk about a return to plain speaking and to realism.

zh: 特纳对涂尔干的框架做了一些改动。
en: Turner rings yet another change on the Durkheimian framework.

zh: 涂尔干强调群体生活中已经建立的结构，特纳则强调他所命名的“反结构”。
en: Where Durkheim emphasizes the established structures of group life, Turner emphasizes what he terms "anti-structure."

zh: 例如，反结构在线性状态中可以被找到，在这一状态中，当人们在生命礼仪中经过童年进人成年，新加人的人会暂停下来。
en: Anti-structure, for example, is found in the "liminal" state in which initiates are suspended as they pass from childhood to adulthood in rites of passage.

zh: 新加入的人既不是孩子也不是成人，而是位于这两个确立状态“之间”。
en: Initiates are neither child nor adult, they are "betwixt and between" these established statuses.

zh: 在当今的美国也有一些反文化群体，就像东方的圣人一样，他们也留着长发、蓄着胡须，穿着打扮各式各样，有的像城市里的贫民，有的像农村里地位低下的少数群体——如印第安人和墨西哥人。
en: In America today we have the counterculture people, who like holy men of the East wear long hair and beards and dress in a variety of ways ranging from the clothes of the urban poor to the attire of underprivileged rural and ethnic groups, such as Amerindians and Mexicans.

zh: 不久之前，一些极具反叛精神的嬉皮士甚至拒绝美国主流的着装方式，在充满竞争的生意场上他们偏偏不去穿那些能体现男子气概和职业进取精神的服装，而是戴着项链、手镯和耳环。20世纪60年代后期他们所倡导的“权力归花儿”。也正是为了反对军事力量和经济发展才提出来的，在这一点上，他们与中世纪时期印度南部的维拉塞瓦（Virasaiva)圣徒们所倡导的原则十分类似。
en: So critical were some hippie men, not long ago, of the principles underlying the structure out of which they hadopted that they even rejected in their dress the dominant American stress on virility and successful aggressiveness in a competitive business milieu by wearing beads, bangles, and earrings, just as "flower power," in the late 1960's, was opposed to military strength and business aggressiveness.

zh: 博厄斯于1886年在柏林巴斯蒂安那里取得了从业资格后设法赴美国定居。
en: After Boas attained his habilitation with Bastian in 1886 in Berlin, he managed to establish himself in the United States.

zh: 他带来了巴斯蒂安的反进化论取向和对经验的强调，并带有某种对历史的以及温和的传播论的重视。
en: He took with him Bastian's antievolutionist orientation and empirical emphasis, with certain historical and moderate diffusionist priorities.

zh: 博厄斯从德国带来的“知识行李”中还有对地方语言、体质人类学和民俗研究的兴趣，以及某种程度上温和形式的民族主义。
en: Boas's intellectual luggage from Germany also included interests in local languages, physical anthropology, folklore studies, and, to an extent, moderate forms of nationalism.

zh: 在俾斯麦统治下的德国中所崛 起的反自由主义和反犹太主义也是博厄斯更广泛的移民动机中的部分政治因素。
en: The rise of antiliberalism and anti-Semitism in Bismarck's Germany certainly were part of the political side in Boas's wider motives for emigration.

zh: 但作为军刀决斗学生社团的成员，博厄斯移民前对民族主义并不陌生（D.Cole 1999，38—62；Girtler 2001，572)。
en: The saber-dueling student fraternity member Boas, however, had himself been no stranger to German nationalism before his emigration (D. Cole 1999, 38–62; Girtler 2001, 572).

zh: 刚才插述的澳大利亚原住民猎人的食物分配习惯是泛化互惠（generalized reciprocity）的一个实例。
泛化互惠可以被定义为不计算所赠送东西的价值，偿还 时间也不确定的交换。
en: This may be given is not calculated, nor is the time of repayment specified.

zh: 在不谋私利意义上的礼物赠送也属于这一范畴。
en: Gift giving, in the altruistic sense, also falls in this category.

zh: 因此，富有同情心的行为也属此类，例如,某人停下来帮助抛锚的摩托车手或某个处在困境 中的人，拒不接受报酬并劝告说“把它转给下一位需要帮助的人”。
en: So, too, does the act of a Good Samaritan who stops to help a stranded motorist or someone else in distress and refuses payment with the admonition aPass it on to the next person in need.

zh: 然而，泛化互惠大多发生在近亲属之间或者有另外密切关系的人们之间。
en: Most generalized reciprocity, though, occurs among close kin or peo­ple who otherwise have very dose ties with one another.

zh: 一般说来，参与者会否 认交换是经济交换，并且会明确地根据亲属关系和朋友义务来表述它们。
en: Typically, participants will deny that the exchanges are economic and will couch them ex­plicitly in terms of kinship and friendship obligations.

zh: R. R.马雷特将这种关于非人格的力量或潜能的观念称为泛生信仰(animatism)。
en: R. R. Marett called this concept of impersonal power animatism.

zh: 这两个概念——泛生信仰（它是无生命的）和泛灵信仰(对精神存在物的信仰)——并不相互排斥。
en: The two concepts, animatism (which is inanimate) and animism (a belief in spirit beings), are not mutually exclusive.

zh: 它们常常在同一种文化中被发现，比如在美拉尼西亚和前面提到过的印第安人社会中。
en: They often are found in the same culture, as in Melanesia, and also in the Indian societies just mentioned.

zh: 人们有三种可能的方式可以提髙他们的地位。
en: A person has three possible ways of improving his or her situation.

zh: 他或她可以试图改变种姓身份（这在一个小村子里是极其困难的），试图提高他或她自己的种姓相对等级，或者抛弃整个种姓制度并试图在外面获得事业。
en: He or she may try to change caste membership (which is exceedingly difficult in a small village), try to improve his or her own caste's relative rank, or dismiss the entire caste system and try to make a career outside it.

zh: 几十年来，比斯帕拉的制酒者（distiller）已经稳步地提高了他们的经济地位，但这并没有使其仪式化洁净度也获得提高。
en: The distiller caste in Bisipara had improved its economic condition steadily for decades, but this did not entail an improvement of its ritual purity.

zh: 事实上，人们可以非常富裕但却是肮脏的，反之亦然，尽管富裕程度和仪式化洁净程度往往相互关联。
en: One may, in fact, be well-off and ritually polluting and vice versa, although there tends to be a correlation between wealth and ritual purity.

zh: 种姓的首领因而努力要将他们的经济资本转化成仪式化洁净度。
en: The leaders of the caste thus tried to convert their economic capital into ritual purity.

zh: 首先他们必须通过被总称为梵语化（sanskritisation）的过程使自己的行为得到净化，他们还要停止举行低级种姓的典型仪式行为（例如动物献祭），同时，在其他方面要采取婆罗门教的规范，成为素食者，等等
en: First they had to purify their own practices through what is generally known as Sanskritisation.They ceased to perform typical low-caste rituals (such as animal sacrifice) and adopted Brahmanic rules in other respects as well, becoming vegetarians and so on.

zh: 里弗斯和塞利格曼在托雷斯海峡待了几个月后，很明显已被民族志发现活动所带来的兴奋及其多产的潜能所折服。
en: Rivers and Seligman were clearly smitten with the excitement and productivity of ethnographic discovery after their few months in the Torres Straits.

zh: 里弗斯很快就参与到更多的田野作业中。他在1901年来到南印度并在托达人 (Todas)中待了五个月，展开了对这个最迷人、最复杂的、近乎童话般社区的研究。
en: Rivers soon left for more fieldwork, this time in South India in 1901, where he spent five months among the Todas and produced a study of a most intriguing, intricate, and almost fairy-tale community.

zh: 来自旅行者和探险者的报告已经积累了许多零散的关于托达人奇风异俗的民族志描述，但在里弗斯的手里，托达人变成了一个复杂社区里的成员，拥有独特的生活方式，因此《托达人》 (1906)长期以来都被认为是以新的、集中式田野研究方法论完成的人类学专著的典范。
en: Many snippets of strange ethnography had already been accumulated about the Todas from the reports of travelers and adventurers.But in Rivers's hands Todas emerged as members of a complex community with a distinctive way of life, and so The Todas (1906) was long regarded as a model of what an anthropological monograph could be when based on the new, intensive field methodology.

zh: 群体间的语音差异同样可以被视为词汇差异。
en: Phonological differences between groups may be regarded in the same light as vocabulary differences.

zh: 例如，在有阶级结构的社会中，上层阶级的成员可能试图保持他们与下层阶级成员不同的发音。
en: In a class-structured society, for example, members of the upper class may try to keep their pronunciation distinct from that of lower classes.

zh: 缅因州一些海岸社区尤其提供了不同种类的实例，虽然沿新英格兰海岸的其他地方也可能不同程度地看到这些例子。
en: An example of a different sort involves coastal communities in Maine, in particular, though it may be seen to varying degrees elsewhere along the New England coast.

zh: 过去，在这些社区中的人们逐渐形成一种地区方言，有一种完全不同于“外来人”的发音语调。
en: In the past, people in these communities developed a regional dialect with a pronunciation style quire distinct from those of "inlanders".

zh: 最近，外来人已迁到这些海岸社区，有的来避暑, 有的永久定居，传统的海岸语调已逐渐认同那些坚持海岸价值的人，与那些不坚持 海岸价值的人形成对立。
en: More recently, as outsiders have moved into these coastal communities, either as summer people or as permanent residents, the traditional coastal style has come to identify those who adhere to traditional coastal values, as opposed to those who do not.

zh: 这种等式包括了社会文化因素，也包括各种环境因素——换句话说，文化和社会不仅是果，也是部分的因。
en: This kind of equation includes sociocultural factors as well as environmental ones – in other words, culture and society are not mere effects, but also part of the cause.

zh: 人类并不是机械地作用于环境因素，即使这些因素直接或间接地影响了他们的行动。
en: Humans do not act mechanically on environmental factors, even if such factors affect their actions directly and indirectly.

zh: 一些对放牧者进行研究的人类学家已经设计出正确的公式，可以用来描述既定区域内的动物数目、家户生存能力的极限和可持续的生态之间的精确的相互关系。
en: Some anthropologists writing on pastoralists have worked out accurate formulas which describe the exact interrelationship between the number of animals in a given area, viability limits for households and ecological sustainability.

zh: 在富拉尼人中（参见第五章），对于一个年轻的家户来说，生存的下限被设定为21头母牛和1头公牛。
en: Among the Fulani (see Chapter 5), the lower limit for viability was set at 21 cows and a bull for a young household.

zh: 也有上限规定了放牧的规模：既有社会的限制（一个家户顶多只能放养这么多的牲畜）也因为太大规模的放牧会导致牧场土地的退化以及最终导致沙漠化。
en: There was also an upper limit to the size of herds; both due to social limitations (a household can only herd so many animals) and because too large a herd would lead to the degradation of the grazing land and ultimately lead to desertification.

zh: 如果有人能像看动作片一样注意到社会过程并且能够仔细审视“静止”的部分——即一个社区中与社会过程并存的社会关系，那么他可能就会发现这些暂时性的结构既不完整也并非完 美无缺，而是需要不断地进行调整。
en: If one were able to arrest the social process as though it were a motion film and were then to examine the "still," the coexisting social relations within a community, one would probably find that the temporary structures were incomplete, open-ended, unconsummated.

zh: 此外，这些结构不可避免地会趋于消亡。但如果有人能像科幻小说中描写的那样可以潜人到社会行为者思想的深处，他肯定能发现行为者在其全然的有意识的注意力与无意识的混沌黑暗的深处这二者之间的任何层面上都存在着一系列的观念、意象和概念，我们可以将其称作“非时间性结构”
en: They would be, at most, on their way to an endingBut if one had the science-fiction means of penetrating into the minds of the arrested actors, one would undoubtedly find in them, at almost any endopsychical level existing between the full brightness of conscious attention and the darker strata of the unconscious, a set of ideas, images, concepts, and so on, to which one could attach the label "atemporal structures."

zh: 第一种做法是，通过连续性的叙事和共时的效果，民族志作者可以尝试在一个单一文本中来表现多重的、随机相互依存的场所，对每个场所进行民族志式的探索，而这些场所又通过发生于其中的行动的预期和非预期的结果而相互连接在一起。
en: First, by sequential narrative and the effect of simultaneity, the ethnographer might try in a single text to represent multiple, blindly interdependent locales, each explored ethnographically and mutually linked by the intended and unintended consequences of activities within them.

zh: 如果这种做法的目的只在于展示现代社会中个人之间的随机相互依存性（由此个人以不可预期的方式与他人联系在一起），那么只要细想下，就会发现这是个荒唐和毫无意义的方案——这就好比要试图说明美国人的心理健康和中国的茶叶价格之间的联系一样。
en: If the intent were merely to demonstrate random interdependencies by which everyone is unexpectedly connected to everyone else in the modern world, if only you looked hard enough, this would be an absurd and pointless project — to show, say, the connection between mental health in America and the price of tea in China.

zh: 相反，这一方案的要点应该是从某种预设的体系观入手，通过展示此体系所包含的地方生活的各种形态而提供一种关于此体系的民族志记述，用更人性的语言（human terms)来转写其抽象的性质，从而使我们对这一体系自身之本质生发出新颖并有所修正的理解。
en: Rather, the point of this kind of project would be to start with some prior view of a system and to provide an ethnographic account of it, by showing the forms of local life that the system encompasses, and then leading to novel or revised views of the nature of the system itself, translating its abstract qualities into more fully human terms.

zh: 要他们去追踪这些事情也很难；不过，世界上的许多国家，非正式经济其实比正式经济还要重要。
en: It is also difficult for them to track; yet, in many countries of the world, the informal economy is, in fact, more important than the formal economy.

zh: 在许多地方，被限制进入正式部门的大量未充分就业和失业的人员，实际尽其最大的努力临时利用各种手段，依靠贫乏的资源 “勉强生活”。
en: In many places, large numbers of under- and unemployed peoples who have only limited access to the formal sector in effect improvise as best they can various means of "getting by" on scant resources.

zh: 同时，社会比较富裕的成员，为了使他们的回报最大化，也逃避各种各样的管理，而且面对日益增加的政府管理，当他们感到自主性丧失时，也发泄其沮丧情绪。
en: Meanwhile, more affluent society members may evade various regulations to maximize returns and to vent their frustrations at their perceived loss of self-determination in the face of increasing government regulation.

zh: 同一小群具有相同想法的学者一起，泰勒继续为此新学科设计出问题和概念，并在其具有影响力的《原始文化》（1871)中为其提供了一个连贯的表述。
en: With a small handful of likeminded scholars, Tylor proceeded to work out the issues and concepts for the new discipline and gave them a coherent formulation in his influential Primitive Culture (1871).

zh: 他明确提出的理论前提-—“人类心智同一性” 极为重要：这一理念巧妙地运用其多义性将人种学者的废奴主义和人道主义信念转变为对全人类平等和其精神价值的承认。
en: Of greatest importance was his explicit premise of "the psychic unity of man"—a felicitously polysemous transformation of the ethnologists' abolitionism and humanitarian commitment to the equality and moral value of all of humankind.

zh: 这为人类学引入了一种相对主义，以调和维多利亚时代的民族中心主义。
en: It introduced into anthropology a relativism with which to temper Victorian ethnocentrism.

zh: 分层社会（society）基本上是分成两个或两个以上类别人群的社会、这些类别彼此之间有相对的高低等级之分。
en: Basically, a stratified society is one divided into two or more categories of people ranked high and low relative to one another.

zh: 当我们把这样一个层次或者阶层的人与另一个层次或阶层的人进行比较的时候，他们在特权、报酬、限制和义务等方面的差别就变得很明显了。
en: When the people in one such stratum are compared with those in another, marked differences in privileges, rewards, restrictions, and obligations become apparent.

zh: 较低阶层的成员与那些较高阶层的成员相比拥有较少的特权和权力。
en: Members of low ranked strata tend to have fewer privileges and less power than those in higher ranked strata.

zh: 此外，他们一般不会得到同等的报酬，并且没有获得基本资源的平等途径。
en: In addition, they tend not to be rewarded to the same degree and are denied equal access to basic resources.

zh: 他们的义务和受到的限制通常也更加繁多，尽管较髙阶层的成员也要对付他们自己独特的限制和义务。
en: Their restrictions and obligations, too, are usually more onerous, although members of high ranked strata usually have their own distinctive restrictions and obligations to attend to.

zh: 总之，社会分层等于制度化的不平等。
en: In short, social stratification amounts to institutionalized inequality.

zh: 没有等第之别——髙与低——分层就不存在，社会差别没有这一点也不构成分层。
en: Without ranking—high versus low—no stratification exists; social differences without this do not constitute stratification.

zh: 他们被指望耕作祖先的土地，同时也被指望挣钱，后者只能通过移民而实现了。
en: They are expected to till the land of their ancestors, but also to earn money, which can only be achieved through migration.

zh: 这类社会的内在区别模糊不清，不像前一类型那样具有强烈的“仪式化”的社会关系。
en: Internal differentiation is unclear and ambiguous, unlike the strong "ritualisation" of social relationships in the previous type.

zh: 道格拉斯（Douglas 1970）列举的第三种社会类型被她称为“强栅极”，这一类型的群体内聚力较弱。
en: The third societal type exemplified in Douglas (1970) is the kind she calls "strong grid", where group cohesion is weak.

zh: 她认为，这类社会也许更适合用暂时的关系网而非合作群体来进行描述，没有首领，也没有严格的边界。
en: This is a sort of society, she argues, which might be better described in terms of temporary networks than in terms of corporate groups; where there are no chiefs and no rigid boundaries.

zh: 不过，她也注意到，社会的意义和分类知识是被共享的。
en: Nevertheless, she notes, the meanings and classifications of society are shared.

zh: 总之，人类个体是能动的世界参与者。
实际上，由于他们的能量决定了世界上一定的关系和事物的特征，个体可以说是世界的创造者。被理解为“有序”或“无序”的是指那些被个体当作是正常规范的或是非正常病态的一定事物之间的特定关系；这只是从事物和关系的无数种可能的排列组合中的一部分，对其分类和评价有赖于观察者的眼睛。
en: For what could be understood by ‘order’ or ‘disorder’ were certain relationships between certain objects which individuals came to see as normal and normative or as abnormal and pathological; here were some from an infinite number of possible permutations of objects and relations in the world, whose classification and evaluation were dependent on the eye of the perceiver.

zh: 新国家中的某些民族对这个国家忠诚度不高，他们往往想脱离它，建立自己的独立国家。
en: Distinct peoples within a new state, to which they may feel little allegiance, often seek to secede and set up their own separate state.

zh: 但是追溯欧洲的非殖民化进程，就可以看到，只有一部分分离主义运动获得了成功，从而建立起新的国家，新加坡、孟加拉和厄立特里亚就是其代表。
en: Following European decolonisation, only a few such secessionist movements have managed to create new states: Singapore, Bangladesh and Eritrea are leading examples.

zh: 实际上，分离常常遭到强烈反对。

en: There is a strong presumption against secession.

zh: 阿诺尔德·范·根纳普在人类学的一本经典著作中分析了生命礼仪，这种仪式帮助个人度过他们生命中的重要关头，比如出生、青春期、结婚、为人父母、踏入史高阶层、职业专业化以及死亡。
en: In one of anthropology's classic works, Arnold Van Gennep analyzed the rites of passage that help individuals through the crucial crises of their lives, such as birth, puberty, marriage, parenthood, advancement to a higher class, occupational specialization, and death.

zh: 他发现，将所有谊些为生命关口准备的典礼分三个阶段：分离（separation)、过渡（transition)和融入（incorporation)——是有用的。
en: He found it useful to divide ceremonies for all of these life crises into three stages: separation, transition, and incorporation.

zh: 个人首先会被仪式性地从社会整体中排除出去，然后隔离上一段时期，最后重新融入社会，获得其新地位。
en: The individual first would be ritually removed from the society as a whole, then isolated for a period, and finally incorporated back into society in his or her new status.

zh: 欧洲的分离运动可能会破坏欧洲大陆的和平。
en: In Europe, fragmentation could undermine the peace of the continent.

zh: 苏格兰和威尔士的分离主义最终可能会导致英国的分裂，这将威胁到欧洲的稳定。
en: Scottish and Welsh separatism may ultimately lead to the break-up of the United Kingdom.This could threaten the stability of Europe.

zh: 在欧洲大陆，德国对欧洲的影响将会更大，因为迄今统一的德国以及使用德语的民族的影响力还被其周边的国家平衡着，可以想见，英国的分裂将会加大新德国的相对地位。
en: On the Continent, German influence would become preponderant, for until now the weight of a united Germany and of German-speaking peoples was balanced by the states on its periphery.The not inconceivable fragmentation of the United Kingdom would increase the relative weight of the new Germany.

zh: 据说，目前有233个不安分的民族和族群正在要求自决。
en: Two hundred and thirty-three often restive peoples and national communities are said now to be advancing claims for self-determination.

zh: 用前联合国秘书长加利的话来说，就是：“如果每一个种族、宗教或语言群体都宣布建立国家，那么分裂会无休无止，全人类的和平、安全和经济繁荣将更加难以实现。”
en: In the words of the former UN Secretary General, Boutros Ghali, ‘if every ethnic, religious or linguistic group claimed statehood, there would be no limit to fragmentation, and peace, security and economic well-being for all, would become even more difficult to achieve’.

zh: 很多部落社会赋予氏族以政治权威，氏族是一群自认为来自同一祖先的人们的联合体。
en: Many tribal societies vest political authority in the clan, an association of people who consider themselves descended from a common ancestor.

zh: 一群长者或男女头人管理其成员的各种事务，并在与其他氏族打交道时充当本群体的代表。
en: A group of elders or headmen or headwomen regulate the affairs of members and represent their group in relations with other clans.

zh: 关于部落中的权威，还有另一种不同情況，即美拉尼西亚的头人，他得先累积财富和政治权力，直到人们承认他是首领分支世系群制度与氏族的运作相似，是以亲属关系为基础的部落组织的罕见形式。
en: Another variant of authority in tribes in Melanesia is the Big Man, who builds up his wealth and political power until he must be reckoned with as a leader.The segmentary lineage system, similar in operation to the clan, is a rare form of tribal organization based on kinship bonds.

zh: 这里我们正在追溯一种特别新近的对于与我们最主要的本性（激情）相联系的自我的看法。
en: Here we are tracing a particular recent view of self in relation to our baser natures, the passions.

zh: 这是一种西方观点，但是我们也可以在东方的宗教运动中找到对应物，特别是伊斯兰教和佛教，这些东方宗教运动大致与基督教的诞生处在相同时期。
en: This is a Western view, but one also finds parallels in Eastern religious movements, roughly contemporaneous with the origin of Christianity, notably Islam and Buddhism.

zh: 中国的例子在李约瑟的研究中得到详尽的阐释。
en: Chinese examples are noted in studies by Joseph Needham.

zh: 伊斯兰教认为，激情可以通过理智和道德伦理来控制。
en: Islam sees passions (nafsu) controlled by reason (akal) and ethics (achlak).

zh: 爪哇神秘主义教派，将伊斯兰教与佛教的影响融合到一起，将激情描述成颜色（像红色），这一颜色除非是受到其他颜色（像黑色和白色）的阻拦（一种由沉思产生的控制方式），否则就有可能爆发出来。
en: Javanese mystical cults that unite Muslim and Buddhist influences depict the passions as colors (such as red) that threaten to explode unless dampened by other colors(such as black and white) – a kind of control brought about by meditation.

zh: 我们离开纳亚尔人之前，重要的是要指出，在他们的社会，没有任何东西是与北美社会的已知家庭类似的。
en: Before we leave the Nayar, it is important to note that nothing in this society is comparable to the family as we know it in North America.

zh: 形成家户的群体不包括姻亲(affinal kin),即由婚 姻建立夫妻关系(conjugal bond)所加入的那些个人就如在第九章我们将证明的，家户并不非得是像我们所知道的那种家庭。
en: The group that forms the household does not include affinal kin, or individuals joined by a conjugal bond established by marriage.As will be shown in Chapter 9, a household group does not have to be a family as we know it.

zh: 在纳亚尔人中，家户完全是由我们通常所谓的“血缘”亲属组成的，“血缘”亲属技术上被称为血亲（consanguineal kin)。
en: Among the Nayar the household is composed wholly of what we often call "blood" relatives,lechnicallknowacon-sanguineal kin.

zh: 性关系是与非血亲、因此而住在另一个家户的那些人的关系。
en: Sexual relations are with those who are not consanguineal kin and thus live in other households.

zh: 这把我们引 向另一个人类普遍的问题:乱伦禁忌。
en: This brings us to another supposed human universal, the incest taboo.

zh: 如果丈夫去世了，留下妻子和儿女，通常有这种风俗，这个妻子就与已故丈夫的兄弟之一结婚，这种风俗被称为夫兄弟婚（levirate）。它不仅为寡妇及其儿女 提供了社会保障，而且也是这个丈夫的家族维护对于她的性权利和对于她未来儿女权利的一种方法。它的作用在于保持先前已经确立的关系。
en: If a husband dies, leaving a wife and children, it is often the custom that the wife marry one of the brothers of the dead man.This custom, called the levirate, not only provides social security for the widow and her children but also is a way for the husband's family to maintain their rights over her sexuality and her future children: It acts to preserve relationships previously established.

zh: 如果一个男子与其已故妻子的姐妹结婚，就被称为妻姐妹婚从本质上说，“嫁妻”的家庭给“娶妻”的家庭提供了另一个配偶来代替死者的位置。
en: When a man marries the sister of his dead wife, it is called the sororate; in essence, a family of "wife givers" supplies one of "wife takers" with another spouse to take the place of the one who died.

zh: 从1840年到1917年，随着欧洲殖民地的奴隶制的废除，几百万印度人被运送到遥远的殖民地，并在那里永久定居。
en: From 1840 to 1917, following the abolition of slavery in the European colonies, several million Indians were transported to remote colonies where they settled permanently.

zh: 这次大群迁移的原因是奴隶解放以后的种植园对于新的人力的需要。
en: The cause for this mass migration was the need for fresh manpower in the plantations after the freeing of the slaves.

zh: 许多人已经指出，这些印度人，被劳动合同所诱惑，实际上是被诱骗了，他们在种植园侨民区的真实处境很难比原先的奴隶更好。
en: Many have argued that these Indians, tempted by promising labour contracts, were virtually shanghaied and that their actual situation in the plantation colonies were scarcely better than that of the slaves had been.

zh: 休·廷克 （Hugh Tinker 1974）把这种服务契约期间的制度描述为《一种新的奴隶制形式》（也可参见Mintz 1974）。
en: Hugh Tinker (1974) has described the system of indentureship as A New Form of Slavery (see also Mintz 1974).

zh: 大部分印度人来自比哈尔邦 （Bihar）和北方邦（Uttar）——印度的一些最贫穷的地方——但也有相当数量的人是说德拉威语（Dravidian）的，来自泰米尔纳德 （Tamil Nadu）和安德拉邦（Andhra）。
en: Most of the Indians came from Bihar and Uttar Pradesh – some of the most impoverished parts of India – but a fair number were also Dravidian speakers from Tamil Nadu and Andhra Pradesh.

zh: 还有其他原因导致漂流者形象成为民族志作者所向往的乌托邦式的自我形象。
en: There are other reasons why the image of the castaway is an evocative and Utopian self-image for the ethnographer.

zh: 因为正如海伦娜˙瓦莱罗、弗洛林达˙多内尔和汉斯˙施塔德这些例子所揭示的那样，漂流者与俘虏在很多方面实现了参与观察者的理想。
en: For as the figures of Helena Valero, Florinda Donner, and Hans Stade suggest, castaways and captives in many ways realize the ideal of the participantobserver.

zh: 民族志作者高于“单纯的旅行者”的权威性主要来自于这样一种观念：旅行者只是走马观花_面民族志作者是和他所研究的群体一同生活的。
en: The authority of the ethnographer over the "mere traveler" rests chiefly on the idea that the traveler just passes through, whereas the ethnographer lives with the group under study.

zh: 但是，这当然也正是漂流者和俘虏通常所做的，他们在另一种文化中以各种身份生活，髙到王子，低到奴隶，他们学习当地人的语言和生活方式，所达到的程度是任何民族志作者都会嫉妒的，而且他们经常记叙自己的故事，这些记述内 容充实、丰富和准确，也真正达到了民族志本身的标准。
en: But of course this is what captives and castaways often do too, living in another culture in every capacity from prince to slave, learning indigenous languages and lifeways with a prohciency any ethnographer would envy, and often producing accounts that are indeed full, rich, and accurate by ethnography's own standards.

zh: 同时，俘虏的经历在许多方面与田野工作的经历有共通之处——依赖感、缺乏控制、不是完全被孤立就是永远不得独处。
en: At the same time, the experience of captivity resonates a lot with aspects of the experience of fieldwork— the sense o f dependency, lack of control, the vulnerability to being either isolated completely or never left alone.

zh: 符号分析是一种通过对某个特殊形式进行详细分析来阐释文化意义的方式。
en: Symbolic analysis is a way of interpreting the meanings of a culture through detailed analysis of a particular form.

zh: 这方面的一个例子就是格尔茨对巴厘人的斗鸡所倣的解释。
en: An example is Clifford Geertz’s interpretation of the Balinese cockfight.

zh: 在巴厘岛，公鸡是一种极其可贵的东西，人们与它们有着密切的关系。
en: In Bali, cocks are greatly prized, and men identify strongly with them.

zh: 格尔茨分析斗鸡，将其作为巴厘人看待社会现实的一种标志。
en: Geertz analyzes cock fights as a symbol of the Balinese view of social reality.

zh: 土著人保护协会为相关讨论和出版物提供了首个平台，通过这个平台，关于“未开化部落的性格、习惯和需求的真实信息”（Aborigines Protection Society 1837，4)得到编辑和系统化，由此为人类学发展提供了第一个契机。
en: The Aborigines Protection Society provided the first forum for discussions and publications in which "authentic information concerning the character, habits and wants of the uncivilized tribes" (Aborigines Protection Society 1837, 4) was compiled and systematized, and thus the first point of growth for an anthropological perspective.

zh: 尽管成员们都共享人文主义情感，但在那些更强烈地认为福音主义是改善土著人状况理所当然的道路的人与那些认为研究土著人群的任务更具优先性的人之间出现了矛盾。这很快就导致了1844年独立的伦敦人种学学会（Ethnological Society of London)的建立。该学会发展了一个成熟的学术项目，即“对居于或曾经居于地球上的不同人类种群相互区別的身体及精神特征进行研究，并确认产生这些特征的原因”。
en: Though the members shared the humanitarian sentiments, tensions emerged between those more strongly committed to evangelism as the self-evident course for the betterment of aborigines, and those who would give greater priority to the task of studying the aboriginal This soon led to the separate establishment in 1844 of the Ethnological Society of London, with a full-fledged scholarly program to "inquire into distinguishing characteristics, physical and moral, of the varieties. of Mankind which inhabit, or have inhabited, the Earth [and] ascertain the causes of such characteristics." populations.

zh: 列维－斯特劳斯对人类心智共同性的另一重要探寻，就是我们前面所说的第二个例子：以雅克布森的“辅音三角”和“元音三角” 理论为基础的所谓“烹饪三角”。
en: One of the most indicative of Le ́vi-Strauss’ excursions into the universality of the human mind is that of our second example: the ‘culinary triangle’, based on Jakobson’s ‘consonant triangle’ and ‘vowel triangle’.

zh: 列维－斯特劳斯最早在 1965 年的一篇文章中提出这一观点。而后又对此进行了数次论证，特别是在《神话学》第三卷的结尾部分。（Le ́vi-Strauss 1978b [1968]: 471-95)
en: Le ́vi-Strauss Wrst published on the idea in an article in 1965, and this was followed by several discussions, notably in the conclusion to the third volume of the Mythologiques (Le ́vi-Strauss 1978b [1968]: 471–95).

zh: 语言是声音或姿势系统，当这些声音或姿势按某些规则组合起来，就产生所有说话者都可理解的意义。
en: Language is a system of sounds or gestures that, when put together according to certain rules results in meanings intelligible to all speakers.

zh: 虽然人类首先依靠语言相互交流，但它不是唯一的交流 手段。
en: Although humans rely primarily on language to communicate with one another, it is not their sole means of communication.

zh: 语言根植于手势一呼叫系统，由辅助语言—与语言相伴的语言外的动作—和肢体语言或用来传递意义的身体运动构成。
en: Language is embedded in a gesture-call system that consists of paralanguage—extralinguistic noises that accompany language—and kinesics, body motions that convey messages.

zh: 姿势-呼叫系统的第二个成分是辅助语言（paralanguage），它由不是语言的一部分而又总是伴随着语言的叫喊和其他声音组成的。
en: The second component of the gesture-call system is paralanguage, consisting of cries and other sounds that are not part of language but always accompany it.

zh: “关键不在于说了什么，而 在于怎么说的”，这个评论暗示了辅助语言的重要性。例如，目前的研究业已表明，在措辞、节奏、回答的时间长短等等中，看起来较小的差异所传达的潜意识信息，在法庭诉讼中比最敏锐的出庭律师所可能认识到的远为重要。
en: The importance of paralanguage is suggested by this remark: It's not so much what was said as how it was said, Recent studies have shown, for example, that subliminal messages communicated by seemingly minor differences in phraseology, tempo, length of answers and the like are far more important in courtroom proceedings than even the most perceptive trial lawyer may have realized.

zh: 除此以外，在证据中有不一致的情况中，证人给出证据的方式，改变了证据从法官那里得到承认的程度，而且也影响证人的可信度。
en: Among other things, how a witness gives testimony alters the reception it gets from jurors, and bears on the witness credibility where inconsistencies exist in testimony.

zh: 的确，人们通常期待孩子的父亲为孩子提供资助，但是，就50%的婚外出生儿童而言，父权是不可能确立的。
en: To be sure, fathers of children are usually expected to provide child support but in 50% of the cases of children born out of wedlock, paternity cannot be established.

zh: 此外，父亲无法履行其义务也决不是罕见的。
en: Furthermore, failure of fathers to live up to their obligations is far from rare.

zh: 为了得到其他成年人的资助，未婚女子的一种解决办法是结婚(经常是，再婚）。
en: One solution for unmarried women is to marry (often, to remarry) to get the assistance of another adult.

zh: 在家系社会中，交换妇女的是以团体为单位而不是以个人。
en: In lineage societies, it is corporations rather than persons who exchange women.

zh: 如果一个社会由两个相互间有规律地交换妇女的家族群体组成，这个社会就可以分为两个半偶族。
en: If a society consists of two kin groups who regularly exchange women between them, the society is divided into moieties.

zh: 通常，半偶族在交换妇女以外，也有一种劳动的分工。
en: Frequently, moieties have a division of labour in addition to exchanging women.

zh: 交换的半偶族系统在澳洲民族中流行很广。
en: The moiety system of exchange is widespread among Australian peoples.

zh: 对这些婚姻系统的研究显示，半偶族系统的后果最终就是交表婚的一种类型。
en: In studies of these marriage systems, it has been pointed out that the outcome of a moiety system is eventually a kind of classificatory cross-cousin marriage.

zh: 它是这样发生的：在一个很小的群体中，就像澳洲中部的卡瑞拉（Kariera），社会中的所有成员互为亲戚。
en: It happens like this: in a fairly small group, like the Kariera of Central Australia, all members of society define themselves as relatives.

zh: 他们计算父系血统并以两个异族通婚的“婚姻种类”的形式被组织起来，他们能够与任何一个没有被归类为同胞的性别合适的人结婚。
en: They reckon patrilineal descent and are organised in two exogamous "marriage classes".They can marry anyone of the right gender who is not classified as a sibling.

zh: 毫不奇怪，因为由妇女当家的家户数增加，所以生活在贫困线以下的妇女 (当然还有她们的孩子）的数目也增加了（参见图9.5）。在美国，超过三分之一的由妇女当家的家户归入这一类别，还有四分之一的儿童生活在贫困之中。
en: Not surprisingly, as the number of female-headed households has increased, so has the number of women (and, of course, their children) who live below the poverty line.More than one third of all female-headed households in the United States now fall into this category, and one quarter of all children are poor (Figure 9.4).

zh: 此外，这些妇女和儿童还是受1980年以来社会福利计划开支削减影响最深的一批人。
en: Moreover, these women and children are the ones most severely affected by cutbacks made in social welfare programs since 1980.

zh: 即使在那之前，妇女的购买力也在下降，并且从那以后，对妇女和儿童帮助最大的政府计划又到了程度最深的削减。
en: Even before then, the purchasing power of women was declining, and, ever since, the programs that most assisted women and children have suffered the deepest cuts.

zh: 格鲁克曼描绘传统社会的关系为“复合”，意思是说每种关系都包括许多层面和方面。
en: Max Gluckman has characterized relationships in traditional societies as "multiplex", by which is meant that every relationship includes many levels and aspects.

zh: 一个人的表兄弟也是一个人的合作者、邻居、老师、首领和公公。
en: One's cousin is also one's co-worker, neighbor, teacher, chief, and father-in-law.

zh: 建立在这样一种复合社会关系基础之上的社区，就像缠绕一起错综复杂的绳索织成的一张大网。
en: A community based on such multiplex social relationships is like a net of inextricably tangled thick ropes.

zh: 在这样一个社区，社会秩序以一种深刻得从未体验过它的我们无法想象的方式无所不包，并深深地影响到所有人。
en: In such a community, the social order is heavy and all-encompassing, in a way too profound for those of us who have never experienced it to imagine.

zh: 这位历史学家借用民族志的权威，使他自己能够以一种未经调适的方式来理解中世纪晚期农民的生活形式。
en: The historian adopts ethnographic authority to enable him to apprehend, in unmediated fashion, late medieval peasant forms of life.

zh: 他觉得他有资格这样做的意识容许他去直接地理解在历史上遥远的制度和文化的意义。
en: His sense of entitlement allows the direct apprehension of historically distant institutions and cultural meanings.

zh: 勒华拉杜里不是去担心翻译的问题，而是采用虚假的关于复调（让他的声音和农民们的声音同样地被听到）的民族志权威，让那些用斜体写下的段落代表直接从往昔传承下来的直接引文[其实，这些农民——必须牢记在心的是，他们是在一个宗教裁判法庭坦白交代——通常都是讲奥克西坦尼话（Occitan)。他们所讲的，在当时被翻译成拉丁文记载下来，现在这位历史学家又把记录翻译成现代法语]。
en: Rather than worrying over problems of translation, Le Roy Ladurie deploys the false ethnographic authority of polyphony, his voice and peasant voices equally heard, by citing in italics passages that represent direct quotations transmitted directly from the past (though the peasants—who were, it must be kept in mind, confessing before an inquisition court—usually spoke Occitan, which scribes then translated into Latin, which the historian has translated into modern French).

zh: 对话模式原则上不是自传性的；它们并不必然导致过度的自我意识或自我专注。
en: Dialogical modes are not, in principle, autobiographical; they need not lead to hyper self-consciousness or self-absorption.

zh: 如巴赫金（Bakhtin 1981)指出的，在任何复杂地再现的话语空间（民族志的话语空间，或者在巴赫金的例子里，现实主义小说的话语空间对话过程都层出不穷，众声喧哗。
en: As Bakhtin (1981) has shown, dialogical processes proliferate in any complexly represented discursive space (that of an ethnography, or, in his case, a realist novel).Many voices clamor for expression.

zh: 在传统民族志中，通过给一个声音以压倒性的权威功能，而把其他人当作可以引用或转写其言语的信息来源，“被访人”，复调性受到限制和整编。
en: Polyvocality was restrained and orchestrated in traditional ethnographies by giving to one voice a pervasive authorial function and to others the role of sources, "informants," to be quoted or paraphrased.

zh: 一旦承认对话论和复调是文本生产的模式，单声部的权威就受到质疑，这种权威也被揭示为一门主张再现文化的科学的特性。
en: Once dialogismi and polyphony are recognized as modes of textual production, monophonie authority is questioned, revealed to be characteristic of a science that has claimed to represent cultures.

zh: 但现在所称的复兴运动（revitalization movements），绝不仅仅局限于殖民地界，仅在美国就有数百起这样的运动爆发。
en: Yet revitalization movements, as they are now called, are by no means restricted to the colonial world, and in the United States alone hundreds of such movements have sprung up.

zh: 比较广为人知的有创立于19世纪的摩门教，最近由文鲜明教士所创的统一教会，还有以大卫˙科里什为“先知”的大 卫教派信徒，以及由马歇尔·赫夫˙阿普尔怀特和邦尼卢·特鲁兹戴尔·内特尔斯领导的天堂之门。
en: Among the more widely known are Mormonism, which began in the 19th century; the more recent Unification Church of the Reverend Sun Myung Moon; the Branch Davidians whose "prophet" was David Koresh; and the Heaven's Gate cultled by Marshall Herf Applewhite and Bonnie Lu Trousdale Nettles.

zh: 正如这四个例子暗示的，复兴运动极其多样的表现形式，一些形式比另一些要成功得多。
en: As these four examples suggest, revitalization movements show a great deal of diversity, and some have been much more successful than others.

zh: 在一个极端，田野工作导致参与一个特定的群体，了解关于那一群体的知识。
en: At one extreme, fieldwork leads to involvement with a particular group and to learning about that group.

zh: 民族志学者与那一群体产生共鸣/身份认同，那一群体变成“我的村庄”、“我的部落 ”或“我的人民”。
en: The ethnographer identifies with that group, which becomes "my village," "my tribe," or "my people."

zh: 然后他成为一名臭名远扬的反对者。
en: He then becomes a notorious nay-sayer.

zh: 对每一关于人类行为的概化，他都想要说：“我的人民不那样去做它。”（就像印度尼西亚谚语所说的，“不同的村庄有着不同的习惯”；特殊化阻止概化。）
en: To every generalization that is posed about human conduct, he is tempted to say, "My people don't do it that way." (As the Indonesian proverb has it, “Lain desa, lain adat" ["another village, another custom"]; particularism blocks generalization.)

zh: 因为早期灵长目动物变成栖树者，所以在牙齿、感官、脑和骨骼结构等许多方面发生了改变，这就有助于他们调适于环境。
en: As the early primates became tree dwellers, various modifications occurred—in dental characteristics, sense organs, the brain, and skeletal structure—that helped them to adapt to their environment.

zh: 另外，习得的社会行为对他们来说变得越来越重要。
en: In addition, learned social behavior became increasingly important to them.

zh: 通过研究现时灵长目动物的行为，人类学家寻找线索，重建可能具有像类人猿那样灵长目动物特点的行为模式，这些灵长目动物既是人类也是现时类人猿的祖先。
en: By studying the behavior of present-day primates, anthropologists seek clues for reconstructing behavioral patterns that may have characterized the apelike primates ancestral to both humans and present-day apes.

zh: 正如贝特森（Bateson 1958:96)说的那样，在人的世界中，贝克莱的名言不容置疑：“存在就是被感知”。
en: In the world of human being, as Bateson has it (1958:96), the Berkeleyan motto cannot be faulted:" To be is to be perceived".

zh: 此外，很重要的一点就是必须强调个体才是感知或理解世界过程中的“能量源泉”（Bateson 1972: 126)。
en: Moreover, it is important to emphasize that it is the individual who is the "energy source" behind this act of worldly perception or interpretation (Bateson 1972:126).

zh: 知识是个体性的、主观的，源自个体具有感知能力的身体.其背后的动机、活动和习惯都体现了个体的能动性。
en: Knowledge is individual and subjective, deriving from individuals' sensitive bodies, and the drive, the work and the habitude behind this are exemplifications of individual agency.

zh: 带有习惯的认知特别重要。
en: This is especially important to recognize with regard to habit.

zh: 就刚才引述的这个例子而言，由于人类学坚守文化相对主义的立场，使得我们能理解门徳人女性成年礼割除阴蒂的这一做法。
en: In the case just cited, the anthropological commitment to cultural relativism permits an understanding of the practice of clitoridectomy (removal of the clitoris) in the Mende female initiation rites.

zh: 但正如在本书前面部分（参见第二章）讨论过的那样，文化相对主义并不排除人类学家对一种既定习俗提出批评。
en: But as discussed earlier in this book (see Chapter 2), cultural relativism does not preclude the anthropologist from criticizing a given practice.

zh: 在这个案例中，割除阴蒂(如同切除包皮一样)是一种生殖器伤残形式，而且是特别危险的那种形式。
en: In this case, removal of the clitoris (like male circumcision) is a form of genital mutilation, and a particularly dangerous one at that.

zh: 某些形式的生殖器伤残——从割除阴蒂到切除整个女性外阴, 包括封闭部分的阴道口（在需要性交时就用外科手术打开，或者甚至撕开，生完孩子后重新封闭，直到男性再次有性交欲望才打开)一直到今天仍影响着世界上大约8000万的妇女，而在非洲尤其普遍，在28个国家中时有发生(每年至少有200万少 女面临这种危险）。
en: Some form of genital mutilation, ranging from the removal of the clitoris to the removal of the entire external female genitalia, including the partial closing of the vaginal opening (surgically opened for intercourse and closed again after a birth until the male again desires intercourse), affects an estimated 80 million women in the world today and is particularly widespread in Africa, where it occurs in 28 countries.

zh: 第十版的大部分新内容（在下面列出）以某种方式与性别相关。
en: Much of the new content for the ninth edition (listed below) relates to gender in some way.

zh: 这些变化一般至少属于下述三个范畴之一：学科内关于性别的思想变化；在特殊社会或文化中，在性别方面有重要分歧的实例；以及关于性别和性別关系的跨文化含义。
en: These changes generally fall into at least one of three categories: changes in thinking about gender within the discipline, examples that have important ramifications on gender in a particular society or culture, and cross-cultural implications about gender and gender relations.

zh: 新素材的实例包括：对同性恋身份和同性婚姻的讨论，有关类人猿社会雌性角色的当前思考，以及关于女性割阴的最近新闻。

en: Examples of new material range from an expanded definition of marriage and additional material on homosexual identity to current thinking on the role of Hadza women in food provisioning and recent news in regard to female genital mutilation.

zh: 音位/主位是在某种语言或文化中有意义区别的层次。
en: The emic is the level of meaningful contrasts within a particular language or culture.

zh: 我们可以根据许多框架（framework)和格栅（grid)来解释音位/主位的特征。
en: We can explain emic distinctions in terms of various frameworks or grids.

zh: 最典型的例子包括：林奈氏分类系统、医学中疾病、光波长度的测量、音乐中半音音阶的衡量，还有最重要的谱系的格栅。
en: Classic examples include Linnaean taxonomy; disease, in medical science; the measurement of the wavelength of light; the chromatic scale in music; and above all, the genealogical grid.

zh: 道格拉斯早期的著作很直截了当，对经济和宗教有特殊的兴趣。
en: Douglas’ early work was quite straightforward, with special interests in economics and religion.

zh: 后者促使她研究莱勒人、古希波来人和英国人中的纯洁和败坏。
en: The latter led her to studies of purity and pollution among the Lele, among the ancient Hebrews, and in Britain.

zh: 她第一本成名作（但不是处女作）是《纯洁和危险》（Douglas 1966)。
en: Her frrst famous book (though not her first book) was Purity and Danger (1966).

zh: 书中她考察了这些概念，并暗示了这种分析方式，很快这种分析方式在她的《自然符号》（Douglas 1969)—书中得到发展：《自然符号》和她其后的许多大部分著作都使用了她所谓的“格栅/群分析法”（参见 Douglas 1978; 1982; 1996)。
en: There she examined concepts such as these and hinted at the form of analysis which she was soon to develop in Natural Symbols (1969): Natural Symbols and most of her many subsequent publications have utilized the framework she calls ‘grid/group analysis’ (see also, e.g., Douglas 1978; 1982; 1996).

zh: 要强调社会或文化的一统，就会忽略多样性；要强调稳定性，就会忽略变动。

en: To emphasize constancy is to ignore change.

zh: 为了简化或概括主要特征，强调这些重点是有必要的，但是人类学家已经发现，与此同时也很有必要增加其他方法，以更好地应对多样性和变动性。
en: These characteristic emphases are necessary in order to simplify and summarize major features, but anthropologists have found it necessary to add other approaches better able to cope with diversity and change.

zh: 其中一种这样的方法就是源出于功能主义的个案研究，另一种方法则是源出于结构主义的符号分析。
en: One such approach is the case study method, growing out of functionalism, and the other, symbolic analysis, growing out of configurationalism.

zh: 个体主义从属于特定的历史 和文化对个人或自我的概念化过程。
en: Individualism pertains to a particular historico-cultural conceptualization of the person or self.

zh: 这一过程包含人作为个体的终极价 值和尊严、他在道德和精祌上的自治、他的理性和自我知识、他的灵 性、隐私权、自我统治、自我发展以及自愿选择加人某一社会、市场或 政治组织的权利（Lukes 1990)。
en: Included within this conceptualization would be notions of the ultimate value and dignity of the human individual, hismoral and intellectual autonomy, his rationality and self-knowledge, spirituality, right to privacy, self-sovereignty and self-development, and his voluntary contracting into a society, market and polity (cf. Lukes 1990).

zh: 与此相对，个体性指的是人的普遍特征，即只有个体才具有能动性。
en: Individuality, by contrast, refers to the universal nature of human existence whereby it is individuals who possess agency.

zh: 不过，由于个体通过各种各样的感知机制（神经系统和大脑）与其他个体相关联，例如各个身体中的意识的各种各样的认识中心，所以他们的能动性总是必须符合世界的某些特定方面。
en: Moreover, since individuals engage with others by virtue of discrete sense-making apparatuses (nervous systems and brains)—discrete centres of consciousness in discrete bodies—their agency necessarily accords withdistinct perspectives on the world.

zh: 个体主义将整体看成是由部分组成。
en: Individualism sees the whole made from the parts.

zh: 一个人从部分（即个体）开始，逐步构建整体（即社会）。
en: One starts with the parts, namely individuals, and builds wholes, namely societies.

zh: 部分，即个体，是最基本、最真实、最自然的现实。
en: The parts, the individuals, are the basic, real, and natural reality.

zh: 就像霍布斯所说，一个人也可以构建起一个联邦共和国，但是这一整体是人为的和易碎的。
en: One can,as Hobbes suggested, construc a commonwealth, but this whole is artificial and fragile.

zh: 我的理论视角和历史学家的不尽相同，但我却依靠了他们的研究和发现。此外，我的理论视角也不同于法律史学家，但是我会引用他们的观点和结论。
en: My theoretical concern is not quite that of the historians, though I rely upon their findings, nor is it that of the constitutional historians, though I am indebted to their conclusions.

zh: 我也不会像一位结构人类学家那样从“神话分析”的角度将贝克特传奇故事的诸多不同版本与原初的加以对照分析——以此区别于需要详尽文献资料的贝克特历史研究。
en: Nor am I operating as a structural anthropologist who might fruitfully analyze the variations of the original Becket legend—as distinct from the abundantly documented Becket history—in terms of "mythemic" analysis.

zh: 我本人是一名社会人类学家，长期以来倾向于微观事件的研究。社会戏剧这一理论框架形成于我对中非小型村落社会的研究过程中，此后我将这一理论运用于冰岛中世纪地方血仇的研究，因此我也试图运用这一理论对贝克特进行研究。
en: Since I am a social anthropologist with a long-term bias toward the analysis ofniicjoevents I shall use the social dramatistic framework that I developed first in the study of small-scale central African village societies and have later begun to apply to the local feuds of medieval Iceland.

zh: 我认为在那些主要社会参与者的头脑中存在着一些文化模式，他们肯定清楚地意识到了这些文化模式的存在 (但却不能有意识地对其加以把握），我将这些文化模式称作根范式。
en: But I shall use this framework primarily as a device for isolating from the sequence of events dominated by the Becket-Henry confrontation those which unambiguously evince the presence and activity of certain consciously recognized (though not consciously grasped) cultural models in the heads of the main actors which I shall call root paradigms.

zh: 布莱克更倾向于使用“概念性原型"（conceptual archetype）这一术语来替代“根隐喻”，他对“概念性原型”的解释是“任何一个思考者进行描述时都必须借助的系统性的思想的全部，人们只有通过类比性的延伸才能对一些领域进行描述，因为这些系统性的思想尚不能直接运用于这些领域”（Black，1962:241）。
en: Black prefers the term "conceptual archetype" to "root metaphor," and defines it as a "systematic repertoire of ideas by means of which a given thinker describes, by analogical extension, some domain to which those ideas do not immediately and literally apply" (1962:241).

zh: 他认为，如果我们对一种特定的原型进行详尽的描述，就必须使用一系列的关键词和表述方式，并且还要说明它们之间的联系以及它们在最初的那一领域中的范式意义。
en: He suggests that if we want a detailed account of a particular archetype, we require a list of key words and expressions, with statements of their interconnections and their paradigmatic meanings in the field from which they were originally drawn.This should then be supplemented

zh: 最后，还需要分析最初的意义通过何种途径延伸其隐喻的用法。
田园诗的形式毕竟起源于宫廷，并且我们会发现，其中的牧羊人通常实质上就是穿着乡村服装的皇室成员。
en: The pastoral mode, after all, derives from the court, and its shepherds usually turn out to have been royalty dressed in rustic garb.

zh: 作为一种文学肜式，它与中世纪晚期法国的牧羊人毫不相干，也与当代尼罗河流域那些养牲口的人毫不相干。
en: As a literary mode, it stands far removed from either late medieval French shepherds or contemporary Nilotic cattle herders.

zh: 恰怡相反，它表现了一种明显的殷勤的感觉，肯尼思˙伯克曾经灵敏地把它概括为“形成鲜明对比的社会阶级之间求爱的修辞”（Burke 1969:123)。
en: Instead it embodies a distinctive sense of courtesy that Kenneth Burke has aptly characterized as "the rhetoric of courtship between contrasted social classes" (1969:123).

zh: 在较早的文学发展阶段，这种求爱在贵族与平民之间、在王公与封臣的阶级之间、在主子与仆从之间一再发生。
en: In earlier literary epochs this courtship occurred between nobles and commoners, lords and vassals, and masters and servants.

zh: 作为类比，这种移植的现代田园诗又出现在城镇与乡村、中产阶级与工人阶级、殖民者与被殖民者之间的互动之中。
en: The displaced modern pastoral analogously emerges in interactions between town and country, middle class and working class, and colonizer and colonized.

zh: 即使在第一个国家出现以后，大多数人仍然过着集体生活，政府、共同体和亲属关系都排在个体前面。
en: Even after the first states were organized, most of life was lived collectively, with government, community, and kinship having priority over the individual.

zh: 像我们现今所了解的“个体”概念，是宗教改革、文艺复兴和工业革命的一个产物，其真正存在只有几百年时间。即便如此，它也仅局限在西欧和它的殖民地。
en: The concept of the individual as we know it really came to exist only a few hundred years ago, as a product of the Reformation, Renaissance, and industrial revolution, and even then it was confined to Western Europe and its colonies.

zh: 在人类历史上，集体主义比个体主义占有更大的位置。
en: Collectivism has a larger place in human history than individualism.

zh: 随着欧洲和北美的工业化，核心家庭变得更加独立于其他亲戚。
en: With the industrialization of Europe and North America, the nuclear family became further isolated from other kin.

zh: 其原因之一是，工处经济需要流动的劳动力。人们必须准备随工作而迁移，而这只有在没有拖带多余亲戚的情况下才最容易做到。
en: One reason is that industrial economies require a mobile labor force; people must be prepared to move where the jobs are, which they do most easily without excess kin in tow.

zh: 另一个原因是，人们认为公共世界对其隐私意识和独立自主构成威胁，家庭则是避开这种威胁的避难所家庭内部的关系想必是持久的和非偶然的，需要爱和情感，建立在合作的基础之上，并受感情和道德的支配。
en: Another reason is that the family came to be seen as a kind of refuge from a public world people saw as threatening to their sense of privacy and self-determination.Within the family, relationships were supposed to be enduring and noncontingent, entailing love and affection, based upon cooperation, and governed by feeling and morality.

zh: 仪式过程中， 参与者要通过阙限阶段 ( liminal phase) (在拉丁文“ 开端” 之后，范盖内普的术语），特纳以公共域 ( communitas ) 一词来说明其特征。
en: In the ritual process, participants pass through a liminal phase (as van Gennep termed it, after the Latin for ‘threshold’), which is characterized by what Turner called communitas.

zh: 公共域是“社会结构”的“非结构”界域，在该界域中，正式的个体等级常常会颠倒过来，或者等级的象征会颠倒过来。
en: Communitas is an ‘unstructured’ realm of ‘social structure’, where often the normal ranking of individuals is reversed or the symbols of rank inverted.

zh: 按照结构主义观点（很明显 ， 特纳是曼彻斯特学派中的结构主义者），公共域可能会被看成同时既是某一物又不是那一物这样一种界域（见维恩图， 图表 6.I）
en: In structural terms (and there is a clear sense in which Turner was the structuralist of the Manchester School), one might envisage it as a realm which is simultaneously one thing and not that thing (as in the Venn diagram, Wgure 6.1)

zh: 人们认为需要进入政治团体的正是受人尊敬的工薪阶层男性。
en: It was respectable working men who were deemed to be ready for inclusion in the body politic.

zh: 有关哪些英国男人应该授予公民权，哪些人总受制于改革联盟(Reform League)的政治流动的讨论持续了两年。
en: Two years of debate took place over precisely which British men should be ‘given’ the franchise, debate which was always framed by the political mobilisation of the Reform League.

zh: 法案通过前，工人大规模的游行延续了几个月，向议员显示了其他形式的力量。
en: Enormous demonstrations of men took place in the months preceding the passing of the act, reminding those in parliament of other forms of power.

zh: 我们可以设想，一个平稳地发挥功能的社会，就像一个健康的有机体，是由整合在更大体系中的许多部分构成的；而这些体系每一个都有自己的特定的功能效用，与其他体系一起协同工作。
