en: We can imagine a society functioning smoothly like a healthy organism, made of many parts put together in larger systems; and these systems, each with its own special purpose of function, working together with the others.

zh: 社会具有与那些有机体类似的结构。
en: Societies have structures similar to those of organisms.

zh: 社 会制度就像身体的组成部分，一起在更大的体系中发挥功能。
en: Social institutions, like the parts of the body, function together within larger systems.

zh: 作为民族志分析的一个模型，功能主义的目标主要是为了展现一个群体如何发挥各自的功能正常运转——它将群体描述成一个持续运转的系统。
en: As a mode of ethnographic analysis, the objective of functionalism is simply to show how a group functions – to depict the group as a working system.

zh: 这方面的一个例子来自民族志功能主义之父马林诺夫斯基（Bronislaw Malinowski)。
en: An example comes from the father of ethnographic functionalism, Bronislaw Malinowski.

zh: 马林诺夫斯基描述了一种位于特罗布里恩岛的交换模式，它被叫作库拉（Kula)圈。
en: Malinowski portrays a pattern of exchange in the Trobriand Islands known as the Kula ring.

zh: 库拉圈的伙伴们在延伸到周围数百英里的海岛的范围内，按照顺时针方向用项链交换镯子，另一方则按照反方向进行交换。
en: Kula partners exchange bracelets for necklaces between islands stretching for hundreds of miles, one set of items passing clockwise Method around the circle and the other counterclockwise.

zh: “功能主义”是一个含义宽广的术语。
en: ‘Functionalism’ is a broad term.

zh: 最广义说，它包括（狭义的）功能主义和结构—功能主义。
en: In its widest sense, it includes both functionalism (narrowly defined) and structural-functionalism.

zh: 我主要用该词较窄的含义，也就是涉及到与布罗尼斯拉夫•马林诺夫斯基及其追随者、著名的雷蒙德•弗思爵士有关的理念。
en: I use it mainly in the narrower sense, that is, to refer to ideas associated with Bronislaw Malinowski and his followers, notably Sir Raymond Firth.

zh: 这种观点主要关注个体行为，关注社会制度强加给个体的限制，关注个体需求与那些需求通过文化与社会框架实现满足之间的关系。
en: It is the perspective concerned with actions among individuals, the constraints imposed by social institutions on individuals, and relations between the needs of an individual and the satisfaction of those needs through cultural and social frameworks.

zh: 与类形学倡导共变和规律相对，定律则是明确地陈述那些共变。
en: Whereas typologies suggest covariations and regularities, laws state those covariations explicitly.

zh: 就像在刚刚提到的演化模式中，一个人能够看到一般的趋向，像运动从简单到复杂（例如，在具体的社会组织的意义上，狩猎和采集社会趋向于是平等主义，农业和工业社会则趋向于有不同的阶级）。
en: In an evolutionary scheme like that just mentioned, for example, one can see general trends such as the movement from simple to complex (in the specific sense of social organization, for example, where hunting and gathering societies tend to be egalitarian, whereas agrarian and industrial societies differentiate into classes).

zh: 我们可以将这样一种趋向描述成一条定律，比如说，能量使用增加，社会复杂性就会随之增加。
en: Such a trend can be stated as a kind of law, to the effect, say, that an increase in energy use increases social complexity.

zh: 由于共同利益社团在性质上很有弹性, 所以无论是在城市，还是传统的乡村，他们在弥补社会结构在这方面的差异的作用愈加显著。
en: Because common-interest associations are by nature quite flexible, they are increasingly, both in cities and in traditional villages, filling this gap in the social structure.

zh: 然而，共同利益社团不只存在于现代化的社会，它们也存在于很多传统社会之中。而且我们有理由相信，它们随第一批园艺农业村庄兴起而产生。
en: Common-interest associations are not, however, restricted to modernizing societies alone.They also are found in many traditional societies, and there is reason to believe they arose with the emergence of the first horticultural villages.

zh: 此外,传统社会中的社团可能像诸如美国和加拿大等国家中的社团一样复杂和具有高度的组织性。
en: Furthermore, associations in traditional societies may be just as complex and highly organized as those of countries such as the United States and Canada.

zh: 在利奇之前，前功能主义田野民族志在描述克钦人时，认为他们基本具有统一的文化和社会组织。
en: Before Leach, pre-functionalist ethnographic accounts of the Kachin described them as having an essentially uniform culture and social organization.

zh: 当利奇写作时，功能主义人类学正处于全盛期，该理论认为存在一种稳定平衡，并想当然地认为，田野民族志作者要调查的社会中存在着一种单一的社会体系。
en: The functionalist anthropology prevalent when Leach wrote his book assumed a balanced equilibrium, and it took for granted the existence of a single social system within which the ethnographer would work.

zh: 与此相反，利奇集中探讨了两个关系密切的氏族分类的亲属制度和政治制度的不同结构安排一种制度是平等主义的贡老制（gumko),另一个是对同样事务安排的等级制的贡萨制（gumsa)。
en: In contrast to both, Leach focuses on the different structural arrangements in the kinship and political systems of two closely related groupings of clans, one system being egalitarian (gumlao) and the other a hierarchical version of the same thing (gumsa).

zh: 当一个人进入更深的出神状态时，大脑就开始试图“理解”这些抽象的形式，就好像它在正常意识状态下对接收到的感觉进行处理一样。
en: As one goes into deeper trance, the brain tries to "make sense" of these abstract forms, just as it does of sensations received when in an unaltered state of consciousness.

zh: 这一过程被称为解释构建(construal)，在这里，文化和经验的差别开始起作用了。
en: This process is known as construal, and here differences in culture and experience come into play.

zh: 一般来说一个处于出神状态中的布须曼人,会把格子图案解释成长颈鹿皮肤上的斑纹，而把网状曲线解释成一个蜂巢(蜂蜜是布须曼人的一种美食，而经常伴随着出神产生的“嗡嗡嗡”的听觉则加重了幻觉），而点则被解释成“那母”——只有处于出神状态中的萨满才能看见的力量。
en: Commonly, a Bushman in trance will construe a grid pattern as the markings on a giraffe's skin, nested curves as a honeycomb (honey is a Bushman delicacy, and the auditory sensation of buzzing that often accompanies trance promotes the illusion), and dots as the potency only shamans in trance see.

zh: 显然，我们不会期望一个伊努伊特人，或某个来自洛杉矶的人,也以同样的方式来解释这些图案。
en: Obviously, we would not expect an Inuit or someone from Los Angeles to construe these patterns in the same way.

zh: 从“思想史”角度看，古希腊哲学家和旅行家、中世纪阿拉伯史学家、中世纪和文艺复兴时期的欧洲旅行家，后来的欧洲哲学家、法理学家及各种各样的科学家们，都似乎可以算作是人类学的先驱。
en: From a "history of ideas" point of view, the writings of ancient Greek philosophers and travellers, medieval Arab historians, medieval and Renaissance European travellers, and later European philosophers, jurists, and scientists of various kinds, are all plausible precursors.

zh: 然而，我个人则倾向于联系“社会契约”的概念和人类天性、社会，以及源自该概念的文化多样性等观念开始探讨人类学。
en: My choice, though, would be with the concept of the "social contract", and the perceptions of human nature, society, and cultural diversity which emerged from this concept.

zh: 这就是我在本书中的起点。
en: This is where I shall begin.

zh: 另外一个原本无关的起点是生命巨链（Great Chain of Being)的观点，它将人类位置确定在神和动物之间。
en: Another, essentially unrelated, beginning is the idea of the Great Chain of Being, which deWned the place of the human species as between God and the animals.

zh: 他对最后一个问题在不同时期的著作中表述了不同的观点，但是，其经典观点在《习俗与冲突》一书中已经阐明：将忠诚纽带关系横切加强了社会秩序，社会凝聚力源自冲突本身，甚至“整个系统的存在依赖于更小的亚系统中的冲突的存在”（Gluckman 1955: 21)。
en: This last issue was one on which he expressed somewhat different views in different publications, but his classic statements in Custom and Conflict assert that cross-cutting ties of loyalty strengthen the social order, that social cohesion results from conflict itself, and even that ‘the whole system depends on the existence of conflicts in smaller sub-systems’ (Gluckman 1955: 21).

zh: 格拉克曼对非洲土著民族法律感兴趣，包括他们处理争论的方式等。他也给社会人类学带来了新的方法论工具，即著名的“广泛的个案研究”（extended case study)。
en: Gluckman’s interest in indigenous African law, including the ways in which disputes are handled, also brought into social anthropology new methodological tools, notably the ‘extended case study’.

zh: 文明社会的结构分化号功能专门化，需要一种特殊机构来协调社会的各个部分和各个阶级，将它们结合为一个富于内聚力和卓有成效的整体。
en: The differentiation of structure, the specialization of function, of civil society required a special mechanism to co-ordinate the various segments and classes of society and to integrate them into a coherent and effective whole.Such an integrative mechanism was produced.

zh: 这种整合机构产生了，它就是“国家—教会”，即具有世俗与宗教这两个侧面的一种机构,这个国家一教会机构的职能，是维系社会的完整性，防止内部解体和外部力量的破坏。
en: It was the "State-Church" i.e., a mechanism having temporal and ecclesiastical aspects.The function of the state-church is to preserve the integrity of society against dissolution from within and against destruction from outside forces.

zh: 换言之，这个整合机构一方面必需协调各种社会因素，如职业群体，社会阶层与阶级等等，使之和谐相处；另一方面,必须保证社会生活的安全，防止邻邦的侵犯。
en: In other words, this integrative mechanism must co-ordinate the various elements of society—occupational groups, social strata and classes—and relate them to one another harmoniously, on the one hand, and on the other, the life of the society must be made secure against the aggression of its neighbors.

zh: 这场革命虽然最终并未成功，但由于过程化单位无论其数量如何微不足道，都必然会在社会时间中留下符号的沉淀物供我们挖掘。伊达尔戈起义最终失败了，然而这一事件的确切本质却足以使我们产生理论分析的兴趣，它在现实的历史时间中所留下的符号沉积物对于其后发生的戏剧和革命的进程具有潜在的影响力。
en: This was an abortive revolution; nevertheless since processual units, even the least of them, leave symbolic deposits in social time, the precise nature of the failure of the Hidalgo Insurrection is of theoretical interest, and its symbolic deposit in actual historical time had potent effects on subsequent dramas and revolutionary processes.

zh: 对于伊达尔戈这个人而言，起义确实是失败了，然而在某种意义上而言他又是成的，因为它奠定了一个新的神话，神话中包含着一整套全新的范式、目标，并且激励着墨西哥人为自由独立而奋斗不息。
en: It was a failure for Hidalgo the man, but a success in establishing a new myth containing a new set of paradigms, goals, and incentives for Mexican struggle.

zh: 过程化分析以文化分析为前提，正如它同时也以结构一功能分析为前提一样，包含了更为静止的比较形态分析。
en: Processual analysis assumes cultural analysis, just as it assumes structural-functional analysis, including more static comparative morphological analysis.It negates none of these, but puts dynamics first.

zh: 过程化分析并没有忽视任何一种静态分析模式，而是更强调动态的重要性。
然而，在对事实进行陈述的时候也须按照一定的顺序来进行，因此以系统化的纲领的形式对制度化的社会结构赖以建构的规则进行陈述是一种非常有用的策略，同时，与这些规则相关的意义、强度以及变化形式也应置于不同的情况之下并尽可能使用数字或者统计资料进行量度，这一点同样有用。
en: Yet in the order of presentation of facts it is a useful strategy to present a systematic outline of the principles on which the institutionalized social structure is constructed and to measure their relative importance, intensity, and variation under different circumstances with numerical or statistical data if possible.

zh: 阿诺尔德·范·根纳普在人类学的一本经典著作中分析了生命礼仪,这种仪式帮助个人度过他们生命中的重要关头，比如出生、青春期、结婚、为人父母、踏入史高阶层、职业专业化以及死亡。
en: In one of anthropology's classic works, Arnold Van Gennep analyzed the rites of passage that help individuals through the crucial crises of their lives, such as birth, puberty, marriage, parenthood, advancement to a higher class, occupational specialization, and death.

zh: 他发现，将所有谊些为生命关口准备的典礼分三个阶段：分离（separation)、过渡（transition)和融入（incorporation)——是有用的。
en: He found it useful to divide ceremonies for all of these life crises into three stages: separation, transition, and incorporation.

zh: 个人首先会被仪式性地从社会整体中排除出去，然后隔离上一段时期，最后重新融入社会，获得其新地位。
en: The individual first would be ritually removed from the society as a whole, then isolated for a period, and finally incorporated back into society in his or her new status.

zh: 变迁的机制是创新、传播、文化遗失和涵化。
en: The mechanisms of change are innovation, diffusion, cultural loss, and acculturation.

zh: 如果社会中的某个人发现了某些新事物，后来这种新事物又被其他社会成员接受了，这就是发生了创新。
en: Innovation occurs when someone within a society discovers something new that is then accepted by other society members.

zh: 传播是从另一个群体借用某些东西，而文化遗失则是对现存的习俗或特征的遗弃，不论有无替换。涵化是在殖民条件下因与外来文化密集和直接接触而发生的大范围变迁。
en: Diffusion is the borrowing of something from another group, and cultural loss is the abandonment of an existing practice or trait, with or without replacement Acculturation is the massive change that comes about with the sort of intensive firsthand contact that has occurred under colonialism.

zh: 在田野点，许多人类学家不知不觉中扮演了小丑的角色。
en: Many anthropologists involuntarily take on the role of the clown when in the field.

zh: 他们可能用错误的语法说了奇怪的话，他们询问一些令人吃惊有时是不得体的问题，而且在事情应该怎么做的问题上倾向于打破一些规则。
en: They may speak strangely with a flawed grammar; they ask surprising and sometimes tactless questions, and tend to break many rules regarding how things ought to be done.

zh: 这样一个角色对于田野工作来说，可能是一个精彩的起始点，即使很少人这么干：通过发现当地人对某人自己的行为有怎样的反应，某人获得一个关于他们的思维方式的先期提示。
en: Such a role can be an excellent starting-point for fieldwork, even if it is rarely chosen: through discovering how the locals react to one's own behaviour, one obtains an early hint about their way of thinking.

zh: 濡化是文化从一代人传递到下一代人的过程,通过这一过程，个人成为其社会的成员。
en: Enculturation is the process by which culture is passed from one generation to the next.

zh: 从出生不久，当自我意识开始形成，即一个人开始能够感到自己是时间和空间中的一个对象并评价自己的行动时濡化就开始了。
en: It begins soon after birth, as self-awareness—the ability to perceive oneself as an object in time and space and to judge one's actions—starts to develop.

zh: 自我意识要发生作用，个人必须要有行为环境。
en: For self-awareness to function, the individual must be provided with a behavioral environment.

zh: 首先，个人学习有关不同于自我的客体世界的知识，而这些总是在他或她由以成长的文化所指定的范围内感知到的。
en: First, one learns about a world of objects other than the self, and these always are perceived in terms the culture he or she grows up in specifies.

zh: 与我居住的美国大学城的电话号码簿上列出的名单相比，英国牛津的电话号码簿上只列出了一小部分精神病医生和心理学家的名字，即使牛津要远远大于我所住的大学城。
en: The telephone directory of Oxford, England, lists only a fraction of the number of psychiatrists and psychologists listed in the American university town where I live, even though Oxford is much larger.

zh: 这一区别无疑反映出美国的心理学化，但是英美文化也有一个共同之处，即都注重控制激情。
en: This difference doubtless reflects the psychologizing of America, but Anglo-American culture shares the emphasis on controlling passions.

zh: 在美国有许多类型的控制心理学——从卡内基到行为矫正。
en: There are numerous American psychologies of control: from Dale Carnegie to behavior modification.

zh: 施奈德的生平和他的理论转向则颇为不同。
en: Schneider's biography and theoretical twists were quite different.

zh: 二战之前，他在耶鲁的人类关系学院开始他的研究生学习。人类关系学院是一个跨学科计划，这与它在哈佛和芝加哥相对应的院系类似，但在这里占主导的是行为主义。
en: He began graduate work before World War II in the School of Human Relations at Yale, an interdisciplinary program like its counterparts at Harvard and Chicago but dominated by behaviorism.

zh: 在缺乏有效控制生育办法的情况下，异性个人之间性活动的一般结果是，妇女迟早要怀孕。
en: In the absence of effective birth-control devices, the usual outcome of sexual activity between individuals of opposite sex is that, sooner or later, the woman becomes pregnant.

zh: 在纳亚尔人中，如女人怀孕，一些男人(他们可能是，也可能不是生物学意义上的父亲)就必须正式承认自己是父亲。
en: When this happens among the Nayar, some man must formally acknowledge paternity, the third transaction.

zh: 他通过送礼物给这个妇女和助产婆来承认自己是父亲，虽然他还会很关注这个孩子，但他没有进一步的义务，因为教育和供养孩子是这个孩子母亲兄弟们的责任，孩子与其母亲和他们住在一起。
en: He does this by making gifts to the woman and the midwife.Though he may continue to take much interest in the child, he has no further obligations, for the child's education and support are the responsibility of the child mother's brothers, whom the child and its mother live with.

zh: 这第三项事务确立了孩子的合法性。
en: This transaction establishes the child's legitimacy.

zh: 在任何地方，在寻食以及在生产食物的地方，在非工业社会以及在工业社会，我们都吋以找到合作工作的群体。
en: Cooperative work groups can be found everywhere in nonliterate as well as literate and in non-industrial as well as industrial societies.

zh: 如果努力做的事涉及整个社区，那么工作中通常就弥漫着一种喜庆的情结。
en: Often, if the effort involves the whole community, a festive spirit permeates the work.

zh: 基库尤人部落的男子约摩·肯雅塔,他就学于英国教会学校，在剑桥大学研究人类学，并成为独立的肯尼亚的第一任总统，他描述了在其国家一天劳动后的欢乐时光：如果一个陌生人碰巧从这里经过，他肯定想不到，这些唱歌跳舞的人已完成了他们一天的工作。
en: Jomo Kenyatta, the anthropologist who later became a respected statesman and a father, of an independent Kenya, described the time of enjoyment after a day's labor in his country: If a stranger happens to pass by, he will have no idea that these people who are singing and dancing have completed their day work.

zh: 这就是为什么大多数欧洲人会出现错谈的原因，他们没有认识到，非洲人在他自己的环境里并不以钟表的走动来计算时间或工作，而是以饱满的精神和热情去完成面前的工作。
en: This is why most Europeans have erred by not realizing that the African in his own environment does not count hours or work by the movement of the clock, but works with good spirit and enthusiasm ro complete the tasks before him.

zh: 与血缘家庭相反，夫妻家庭以丈夫与妻子的婚姻纽带为基础。
en: Conjugal, as opposed to consanguine, families are formed on the basis of marital ties between husband and wife.

zh: 夫妻家庭最低限度由已婚的夫妻及其扶养的孩子组成，又被称为核心家庭(nuclear family)；夫妻家庭的其他形式是一夫多妻制家庭和一妻多夫制家庭，这可被设想为有一个共同配偶的梭心家庭的集合。
en: Minimally, a conjugal family consists of a married couple with their dependent children, otherwise known as the nuclear family; other forms of conjugal families are polygynous and polyandrous families, which may be thought of as aggregates of nuclear families with one spouse in common.

zh: 一夫多妻制家庭包括一个丈夫的多个妻子,而一妻多夫制家庭则包括一个妻子的多个丈夫。
en: A polygynous family includes the multiple wives of a single husband, while a polyandrous family includes the multiple husbands of a single wife.

zh: 两种家庭经常列在多配偶制家庭的标题之下。
en: Both are often lumped together under the heading of polygamous families.

zh: 与血缘家庭相反，夫妻家庭以丈夫与妻子的婚姻纽带为基础。
en: Conjugal, as opposed to consanguine, families are formed on the basis of marital ties between husband and wife.

zh: 夫妻家庭最低限度由已婚的夫妻及其扶养的孩子组成，又被称为核心家庭（nuclear family）；夫妻家庭的其他形式是一夫多妻制家庭和一妻多夫制家庭，这可被设想为有一个共同配偶的核心家庭的集合。
en: Minimally, a conjugal family consists of a married couple with their dependent children, otherwise known as the nuclear family; other forms of conjugal families are polygynous and polyandrous families, which may be thought of as aggregates of nuclear families with one spouse in common.

zh: 一夫多妻制家庭包括一个丈夫的多个妻子，而一妻多夫制 家庭则包括一个妻子的多个丈夫。
en: A polygynous family includes the multiple wives of a single husband, while a polyandrous family includes the multiple husbands of a single wife.

zh: 两种家庭经常列在多配偶制家庭的标题之下。
en: Both are often lumped together under the heading of polygamous families.

zh: 对国民性格的替代性研究——考虑到并非所有人格都与文化理想相一致——是人类学家许烺光的研究。
en: An alternative approach to national character —one that allows for the fact not all personalities conform to cultural ideals—is that of anthropologist Francis Hsu.

zh: 他的研究方式是研究一个国家文化的核心价值(core value)以及相关的人格特征。
en: His approach was to study the core values of a country's culture and related personality traits.

zh: 他表明，中国人特别看重亲属关系，合作高于其他一切。
en: The Chinese, he suggested, value kin ties and cooperation above all else.

zh: 对他们来说，相互依存是个人关系的真正本质，而且已延续数千年了。
en: To them, mutual dependence is the very essence of personal relationships and has been for thousands of years.

zh: 顺从和使自己的意愿服从家族和亲属胜于其他一切，自力更生既得不到提倡也不是引为骄傲的本钱。
en: Compliance and subordination of one's will to that of family and kin transcends all else, while self-reliance is neither promoted nor a source of pride.

zh: 我列举一个极端的例子。
en: I shall give just one, admittedly extreme, example.

zh: 1989年南非种族隔离解除以前，黑人、白人、有色人和亚洲人是彼此分离的。同时黑人又被再分成不同的族体：祖鲁人（Zulu)、茨瓦纳人（Tswa-na)、科萨人（Xhosa)等等。
en: Until the end of legal apartheid in South Africa in 1989, blacks, whites, coloureds and Asians were legally separated from one another, while the black section of the population was subdivided into ethnicities – Zulu, Tswana, Xhosa etc.

zh: 分界线可能在心理、地理、社会或经济的方面，而这些方面往往不是很清楚。
en: Boundaries may be psychological, geographic, social, or economic, and they are not always very clear.

zh: 就地区方言来说，经常有过渡地带，或可能是缓冲地带，就如在中国的中部与南部之间的地带，在那里可以找到并理解两种方言的各种特点。
en: Re-gional dialects frequently have a transitional territory, or perhaps a buffer zone, where features of both are found and understood, as between central and southern China.

zh: 事实在于，如果你学会北京话，那么你不可能与来自广东或香港的某人交流，尽管两种语言——或方言——按惯例被称为汉语。
en: But if you learn the Chinese of Beijing, you cannot communicate with someone who comes from Canton or Hong Kong, although both languages—or dialects—are conventionally called Chinese.

zh: 在单个社会内部使一个群体可能与另一个群体区别开来的一个经典例子，是许多市中心非洲裔美国人所说的语言。
en: A classic example of the kind of dialect that may set one group apart from others within a single society is one spoken by many inner-city African Americans.

zh: 技术上称之为“美国黑人方言英语”，人们经常称它为“黑人英语”，而（最近）称之为“黑人语（Ebonics）”。
en: Technically known as African American Vernacular English, it often has been referred to as Black English and (more recently) as Ebonics.

zh: 生活在热带区域的人们常让蜂蜜引路鸟（honey guide bird）引导他们寻找野生蜜蜂的巢穴，鸟儿反过来也受益于人类提炼蜂蜜的能力。
en: Human beings in tropical regions allow the honey guide bird to show them the way to wild bees' nests, and the bird in turn benefits from the human beings' ability to extract the honey.

zh: 一只被工作人员教会了美国手势语的大猩猩（Gardner等 1989）也会将其所学的知识传递给它的伙伴（Fouts等 1989）。
en: Chimpanzees have been taught American Sign Language (Gardner et al. 1989) and have then taught it to each other (Fouts et al. 1989).

zh: 我建议我们放弃任何声称文化是人类独一无二特性的企图，借此假装人类是“不同”的，并以这种方式将人类与其他动物截然分开。
en: I suggest that we abandon any attempt to claim culture as a uniquely human characteristic, and with it the pretence that human beings are "different" in a way that sets them significantly apart from the rest of the animal kingdom.

zh: 就任何物种都不同于其他物种而言，以自己的方式生存于世，并以自己特有的方式影响世界而言，人类是独特的。
en: Human beings are different in the sense that any species is different from the rest, in having its own way of living in the world and its own distinctive impact on the world.

zh: 在牛津，人类学是在几个背景下被教导的。
en: At Oxford, anthropology is taught in several settings.

zh: 一 ，大学博物馆和皮特河博物馆的史前史和民俗学部门，教导一个宏观视角，主要强调事实。
en: One, the Department of Prehistory and Ethnology at the University Museum and Pitt-Rivers Museum, teaches a brand of anthropology reflected in the museums: a macro view, emphasizing material factors.

zh: 二，社会人类学研究所，教导社会人类学。
en: Another, the Institute of Social Anthropology, teaches social anthropology.

zh: 这一研究所没有博物馆，它的布局也与后者有所不同。
en: This institute has no museum; its layout is different.

zh: 社会人类学研究所在底层有一个普通的房间——一个相当破旧但却非常舒适的聊天和喝咖啡的地方，墙上贴着许多著名社会人类学家的照片。
en: The Institute of Social Anthropology has a common room on the ground floor – a rather shabby but pleasant setting for coffee and conversation, overseen by photographs of notable social anthropologists displayed on a wall.

zh: 即使是一直持续着的构建宏观视野的努力也已融进了微观描述和解释的因素。
en: Even continuing efforts to build macro perspectives are infused with concerns about matters of micro description and interpretation.

zh: 在政治经济学领域——这一领域可视为是用最切合于西方的官场和国家管理技术的术语来对世界局势所作的连续解说一一建立宏大体系的努力方面，最近一项重大创新是伊曼纽尔˙沃勒斯坦（Immanuel Wallerstein）1970年代早期提出的世界体系视角。
en: In the field of political economy, which can be seen as a continuing commentary upon world conditions in terms most relevant to Western officialdom and statecraft, the major recent innovation in efforts at macro system building has been the world-system perspective introduced by Immanuel Wallerstein during the early 1970s.

zh: 沃勒斯坦的有关中心-边缘体系的论述以及他对历史的总括性解释是否恰当，已成为各种激烈争论的焦点，并富有意味地取决于对地方状况的讨论。
en: The adequacy of Wallerstein's center-periphery formulation and his overview interpretations of history are the subject of lively debate, dependent significantly on discussions of local situations.

zh: 可是，文化相对主义则走得更远，成为一种彻底的反人文主义的批判，近来打着“结构主义”和“后结构主义”的旗号得以体现。
en: Cultural relativism can be taken much further, however, and become a thoroughgoing anti-humanistic critique, as has recently transpired under the monikers of "structuralism" and "post structuralism".

zh: 如果意识的形式与内容并不优先于它所处的文化的象征话语和社会实践的话，那么不仅人、个体这些身份认同要从属于文化中心（可能依旧是无意识的），而且整个人类思想、人文主义和人的尊严等等都是历史暂时性的文化产品：例如种族中心主义、神话、技术。
en: If consciousness, its form and content, are not prior to the symbolic discourses and social practices in which it is culturally embedded, then not only is identity—human, individual, whatever—subordinate to cultural matrices (which may remain unconscious), but the whole idea of humankind, humanism, human dignity, and so on, is a historically contingent cultural product: ethnocentric, mythical, teleological.

zh: 福柯说：“人不过是近期的一个发明，一个存在了不到两百年的形象”（Foucault l972:115)。
en: "Man", as Foucault put it, "is only a recent invention, a figure not yet two centuries old".(1972:115).

zh: 人类学理论中第三类较大的理论观点可以被称为互动观点。
en: A third large grouping of anthropological theories is what might be termed the interactive perspective.

zh: 这个理论观点更确切说是一组同时包含了历时和共 时两方面的理论。

en: This perspective or, more accurately, set of perspectives, has both diachronic and synchronic aspects.

zh: 该理论追随者拒绝大部分共时分析的静态特性,也拒绝古典进化论和传播论传统中的简单历史假设。
en: Its adherents reject the static nature of most synchronic analysis, and reject also the simplistic historical assumptions of the classical evolutionist and diffusionist traditions.

zh: 也许墨西哥裔美国人写作的最引人瞩目的特征是跨语言游戏：互扰 （interference）、交替使用、交互参照；这些东西其他族群写作中也有，但墨西哥裔美国人将其发挥到最清晰和最戏剧化的水平。
en: Perhaps the most striking feature of Mexican-American writing, present in other ethnic writing too, but brought to its most explicit and dramatic level here, is interlinguistic play: interference, alternation, inter-reference.

zh: 这也是前面所引的第一首亚美尼亚诗歌的主题。
en: This was the subject of the first Armenian poem cited above.

zh: 它在黑人英语构成的文本中表现得很明显。
en: It is clear in the texture of black English.

zh: 一些墨西哥裔美国作家使用西班牙语，另一些使用英语，还有一些在不同页或不同章中交替/对照使用西班牙语和英语（相互翻译）。
en: Some Mexican-American writers use Spanish, others English, some have alternating/ mirroring pages or chapters of Spanish and English (reciprocal translations).

zh: 奇卡诺人（Chicano）文学杂志坚决地使用双语。
en: Chicano literary journals (El Grito, Entrelinas, Revista Chicano-Riquena) are resolutely bilingual.

zh: 英语语流中会出现西班牙语短语，西班牙语的词汇和语法结构也受到英语的影响而变化。
en: Spanish phrases occur within the flow of English, and Spanish words and grammatical structure take on changes influenced by English.

zh: 实际上，对某些波丘语 （pochismo）或卡委语（calo）来说，奇卡诺俚语具有优越地位。
en: Indeed, for some pochismo or calo, the Chicano slang, takes on a privileged role.

zh: 两个基本要素对这样做是不可或缺的：想象力和怀疑态度。
en: Two basic ingredients are essential for this: imagination and skepticism.

zh: 想象力虽然可能使我们误入歧路，但是，为了我们能认识现象可能被排列的意外方式，能以新方式思考旧事物，它是必须的。
en: Imagination, though capable of leading us astray, is required for imagining the ways phenomena might be ordered and for thinking of old things in new ways.

zh: 没有想象力，就不可能有科学。
en: Without it, science cannot exist.

zh: 怀疑态度使我们能够区分事实（fact）与幻想，检验我们的思辨能力，防止我们失去想象力。
en: Skepticism is what allows us to distinguish fact from fancy, to test our speculations, and to prevent our imaginations from running away with us.

zh: 由于世界饥荒的同时存在，源自污染的结构性暴力在世界上较贫穷国家是很严重的，因为这些国家仍在广泛使用在诸如美国这样的国家禁止使用的化学药剂。
en: As with world hunger, the structural violence from pollution tends to be greatest in the poorest countries of the world, where chemicals banned in countries such as the United States are still widely used.

zh: 并且，工业国家利用“不发达”国家松懈的环境法规来处理有危害的废弃物。例如，贝宁总统在年以前与一个欧洲废品公司签了一项合同，同意后者将有毒的和低放射性的废弃物倾倒在其政治对手的土地上。
en: Moreover, industrial countries have taken advantage of the lax environmental regulations of instance, the president of Benin (in West Africa) not long ago signed a contract with a European waste company to dump toxic and low-grade radioactive waste on the lands of his political opposition.

zh: 在美国，政府和工业界双双劝说保留区中正经历严重经济衰退的印第安人，要他们相信，其问题的解决办法，就在于允许政府和工业界在他们的土地上处理梭废物和其他的有害废弃物。
en: In the United States, both government and industry have tried to persuade Indians on reservations experiencing severe economic depression that the solution to their problems lies in allowing disposal of nuclear and other hazardous waste on their lands.

zh: 按照这一公式，文学与虚构的话语与生俱来是不稳定的；它“在意义的分层上大做文章；它意在言外；它以那样-种语言描绘自己，从中它不断取得的效果就是其意义不可能被框定或控制”（de Certeau 19S3:128）。
en: In this schema, the discourse of literature and fiction is inherently unstable; it "plays on the stratification of meaning; it narrates one thing in order to tell something else; it delineates itself in a language from which it continuously draws effects of meaning that cannot be circumscribed or checked" (1983: 128).

zh: 这一话语不可救药地是比喻性的和多义的，它不断地被从科学中驱逐出去，但并非总是很成功。
en: This discourse, repeatedly banished from science, but with uneven success, is incurably figurative and polysemous.

zh: （只要它的效果开始过于公开地被感觉到，一个科学文本就显得太“文学”了，比如说，似乎用了太多的隐喻，似乎依赖风格和形象描绘，等等。）
en: (Whenever its effects begin to be felt too openly, a scientific text will appear "literary"; it will seem to be using too many metaphors, to be relying on style, evocation, and so on . )

zh: 绘画艺术既可以被看成是具象的，也可以被看成是抽象的，而实际上，送些类别只是代表一个连续变化体的两极。
en: Pictorial art may be regarded as either representational or abstract, though in truth these categories represent polar ends of a continuum.

zh: 非洲南部的岩石艺术说明了研究艺术可采用的三种研究方式。
en: The rock art of southern Africa illustrates three ways the study of art may be approached.

zh: 美学的和叙事的研究方式集中关注事物怎样得到描绘，以及什么事物得到描绘。
en: The aesthetic and narrative approaches focus on how and what things are depicted.

zh: 它们本身很少揭示艺术究竟是什么，并可能表达出有关创造该艺术的民族的歪曲看法。
en: By themselves they reveal little about what the art is all about and may convey a distorted view of the people responsible for it.

zh: 只有阐释的研究方式能够揭示另一个民族艺术的意义。
en: Only the interpretive approach can reveal the meaning of another peopled art.

zh: 这种研究方式需要借用丰富的民族志和其他各祌可靠的资料。
en: This approach requires drawing on a rich body of ethnography and often other sets of data.

zh: 这样的努力是值得的，因为它可能证明，这种艺术远比人们可能预料的要复杂得多。
en: The effort is worthwhile, as it may reveal the art to be far more complex than one might otherwise expect.

zh: 将这种研究方式应用于非洲南部的岩石艺术，我们看到，当殖民主义者侵入布须曼人地区时，绘画和雕刻实际上怎样成为布须曼人解决变化中的权力关系的那种战略的组成部分。
en: Applied to southern African rock art, it shows, among other aspects of the culture, how paintings and engravings were actually part of Bushman strategy for negotiating changing power relations as colonists invaded their lands.

zh: 为什么与性别相关的材料要整合起来？
文化人类学本身是整合的学科；围绕性别的概念和问题往往太复杂了，以至于不能从其上下文中去掉，而且，在所有各章安排这种材料在于强调，对性別的看法如何成为人们所做的任何事情的一部分。
第十版的大部分新内容（在下面列出）以某种方式与性别相关。
en: Much of the new content for the ninth edition (listed below) relates to gender in some way.

zh: 这些变化一般至少属于下述三个范畴之一：学科内关于性别的思想变化；在特殊社会或文化中，在性别方面有重要分歧的实例；以及关于性别和性別关系的跨文化含义。
en: These changes generally fall into at least one of three categories: changes in thinking about gender within the discipline, examples that have important ramifications on gender in a particular society or culture, and cross-cultural implications about gender and gender relations.

zh: 新素材的实例包括：对同性恋身份和同性婚姻的讨论，有关类人猿社会雌性角色的当前思考，以及关于女性割阴的最近新闻。
en: Examples of new material range from an expanded definition of marriage and additional material on homosexual identity to current thinking on the role of Hadza women in food provisioning and recent news in regard to female genital mutilation.

zh: 通过这样有稳定节奏的叙述，第十版避免使性别 “集中于”前后无呼应的单独章节内。
en: Through a steady drumbeat of such coverage, the ninth edition avoids a thunderous crash of relegating ugenderw to a single chapter that is preceded and followed by silence.

zh: 梅拉索克斯认为，由于两性劳动分工情况本身就会导致社会政治对女性的压制，从而使“女人成为男人的仆人（或奴隶）”（Meillassoux 1981: 21）。
en: Meillassoux argues that it was the formation of the sexual division of labour, itself, that led to the socio-political subjugation of women, and thus made ‘the woman (or slave) a servant of men’ (Meillassoux 1981:21).

zh: 亲属制度对此负有责任，因为正是通过亲属制度的发展，才实现了对女人的压制。
en: Kinship institutions are the culprit, for it was through their development that the subjugation of women was achieved.

zh: 婚姻、联姻和父系制度都是男人用来控制和约束女人的手段。
en: Marriage, conjugality and paternal filiation, all were imposed upon women by men to be the means through which men could constrain women.

zh: 人类地理学方法不能解释人们所观察到的事物真相，这一点在早些时候就已经证实。
en: It became clear at an early stage that the anthropogeographic approach could not account for observed realities.

zh: 文化之所以会出现类聚现象是因为它们具有相同的地理类型以及若干看似重要的相同特征。
en: Cultures were grouped together on the grounds that they occupied the same type of habitat and shared a few seemingly significant features.

zh: 而某些深深扎根于人类学家头脑中的文化特征，如亲属制度与称谓、婚姻规则及政治体制等，在不同的地理区域内有着显著的差异性。
en: And yet some of the cultural characteristics which most occupied anthropologists’ minds, such as kinship terminologies, marriage rules and political systems, varied quite markedly within geographical areas.

zh: 很明显，不管环境如何影响这些既定的规则，它们并不直接构成因果关系。
en: It appeared that, whatever the effects of the environment on such institutions, they were not directly causal.

zh: 在英国，受杜尔凯姆（Durkheim) (1964[1895])、拉德克利夫一布朗及马林诺夫斯基等人的影响，人类学家将注意力转向了文化制度的社会功能方面，而不是生态方面的研究。
en: In Britain, following the influence of Durkheim (1964 [1895]), Radcliffe-Brown and Malinowski, anthropologists responded by turning their attention to the social, rather than the ecological, functions of cultural institutions.

zh: 不过威利斯确实是摆出了一副挑战人类学民族志传统的姿态，后者或许是以一种不能按字面意义理解的、不可能达到的整体主义理想为基础的，而威利斯要将民族志应用于具有更为广阔的目标和理论意味的工程，如他自己所做的那样。
en: Nonetheless, Willis does pose the challenge for the anthropological tradition of ethnography, underlain perhaps by an unattainable ideal of holism not to be taken literally, to apply ethnography to projects of broader purpose and theoretical significance, like his own.

zh: 这就需要一种混合体裁文本（mixed-genre texts）的写作，类似于雷蒙德˙威廉斯所设想的社会现实主义的文本，民族志的再现和权威是其中的组成部分、其在文本中的地位则可不一而足。
en: This entails the writing of mixed - genre texts, similar to those envisioned by Raymond Williams for social realism, in which e thnographic representation and authority would be a variably salient component.

zh: 与威利斯所认为的人类学民族志已过时的看法相反，这种混合体裁的文本对对象的内在生活和历史政治经济学世界的本质都保持着敏感，这类文本是我们一直在讨论的当代人类学实验潮流的一个重要方面。
en: Contrary to Willis's outmoded perception of the state of ethnography within anthropology, such mixed-genre texts, sensitive to both the inner lives of subjects and the nature of world historical political economy, are a major concern of the trend of experimentation in contemporary anthropology that we have been discussing.

zh: “精神一肉体”的问题与活力论同机械论的争论有关。
en: The "Mind-Body" problem is of one piece with the Vitalism-Mechanism controversy.

zh: 从来没有人能“证明”活力论是错误的，但科学家和许多哲学家们都认为，应把活力论当作陈腐的、畸形的尤其是贫瘠的理论加以否定的时刻已经来临。
en: No one has ever "disproved" the theory of Vitalism, but scientists, and many philosophers, are agreed that the time has come when it should be ignored as obsolete, outgrown and, above all, sterile.

zh: 这并不是说，机械论哲学就是真理（即是大写字母的“真理”），而活力论哲学则是谬误；而是说机械论一向是富于成效的。
en: It is not that the philosophy of Mechanism is True (with a capital T) and that of Vitalism False.It is that Mechanism has been fruitful, productive; Vitalism barren and sterile.

zh: 活力论则是不结果实的花朵。纽曼（H˙H˙Newman）教授宣称：活力论“作为一种理论观点，与那些导致已经取得的全部科学进步的观点正相对立。”
en: Vitalism as "a view is exactly opposite to those which have led to all the scientific piogTcss that has been made," declares Professor H. H. Newman.

zh: 伯尔德建议用 “procurement”（获得）这个词来描述狩猎一采集民与他们环境之间的关系： 动词“procure”（根据《牛津简明辞典》）是指“致使、用心或费力获得、说服、劝诱或说服某人去做某事名，“Procurement”。
en: Bird-David suggested the term "procurement" to describe the relationship between huntergatherers and their environment: "to procure" (according to the Shorter Oxford Dictionary) is "to bring about, to obtain by care or effort, to prevail upon, to induce, to persuade a person to do something".

zh: 是指经营、发明、获得、得到、 收入之意。
en: "Procurement" is management, contrivance, acquisition, getting, gaining.

zh: 这两个词都能准确地描述那些富有关心、经验和知识的现代狩猎一采集民；他们的活动涉猎采集大自然所提供的丰富资源，他们为获取资源而说服自然、维护自然（1992b:40)。
en: Both terms are accurate enough for describing modern hunter-gatherers who apply care, sophistication and knowledge; whose activities range from collecting what the environment gives to prevailing upon it, persuading it and managing it in order to get resources.

zh: 最强烈地关注这类社会生活的人类学分支就是社会人类学，它的灵感可以一直追溯到许多人，尤其是前面特别提到的法国社会哲学家涂尔干。
en: The branch of anthropology most intensely focused on this kind of social life is known as social anthropology, and it traces its inspiration especially to the French social philosopher mentioned earlier, Emile Durkheim.

zh: 这方面的一个重要来源是涂尔干1893年发表的博士论文，《社会劳动分工论》，在这篇论文中他指出了“机械团结”与“有机团结”之间的区别。
en: An important source was Durkheim's doctoral dissertation, The Division of Labor in Society, in which he set forth the distinction between "mechanical" and "organic" solidarity.

zh: 有机团结描述的是像我们自己的当代、都市化的社会。
en: Organic solidarity characterizes contemporary, urbanized society like our own.

zh: 这样的顺序共有十一项，每一项都由一种“冲动”、 一种伴随的生理“行为”以及一种从行为中获得的“满足”组成。
en: There are eleven of these sequences, each composed of an ‘impulse’, an associated physiological ‘act’, and a ‘satisfaction’ which results from that act.

zh: 例如，困倦的冲动伴随着睡觉这一行为，并导致“恢复能量的醒来”这样的满足 (Malinowski 1944 : 77 ) 。
en: For example, the impulse of somnolence is associated with the act of sleep, resulting in satisfaction by ‘awakening with restored energy’ (1944: 77).

zh: 他随后又将这个十一项的范式略微简化。
en: He follows this eleven-fold paradigm with a slightly simpler one.

zh: 这是一个建立在七项“基本需求”和各自对应的“文化反应”之间关系之上的范式 (Malinowski 1944 : 91 - 119 )
en: This is the one built on the relationship between seven ‘basic needs’ and their respective ‘cultural responses’ (1944: 91– 119).

zh: 这类经验其实也就是人类学家尼达姆（Rodney Needham)举例说明“信仰”并不是一个描述多数宗教体验合适的术语时所暗示的。
en: This sort of experience is what anthropologist Rodney Needham implies when he demonstrates that "belief" is not a suitable term for describing much of religious experience.

zh: 实际上，信仰最适合起源于近东有着独特经典和神学传统的宗教——像犹太教、伊斯兰教和基督教。
en: Belief, in fact, best suits those peculiarly textual and theological traditions of Near Eastern origin – Judaism, Islam, and Christianity.

zh: 信仰就是主张：我相信有上帝；我相信有天堂。
en: A belief is a proposition: I believe there is a God; I believe there is a heaven.

zh: 但是，人类与宗教/魂灵之间的联系要比这更深、更复杂。
en: The relation of humans to the spiritual is deeper and more complex than this.

zh: 20世纪社会文化人类学的大趋向却突出“教养的”多过“天生的”，强调的是，在不同的环境下，通过我们共同的天生器官所创造的千变万化。
en: The general trend in twentieth-century social and cultural anthropology has nevertheless been to emphasise "nurture" over "nature", to stress the enormous variations generated, under differing circumstances, by our shared inborn apparatus.

zh: 右下格描述的是可从生物性角度进行区分的人种之间的差异。
en: The bottom right field depicts differences between humans which can be accounted for biologically.

zh: 直到1930年代或1940年代，人们才普遍认识到在不同人群之间存在着重要的基因差别，即“人种差别”，这可以用来解释某些文化变化。
en: Until the 1930s or 1940s, it was commonly held that there are important genetic differences between human populations, that is "racial differences", which account for some cultural variation.

zh: 但是，有资料表明，世界上的基因差异只有很微小的比例与我们习惯上认为的人种差别有关（Cavalli-Sforza et al 1994）。
en: However, it has been shown that only a tiny proportion of the genetic variation in the world is related to what is conventionally thought of as racial variations (Cavalli-Sforza et al. 1994).

zh: 哈里斯（Harris 1979: 119-40)批评社会生物学是生物简化论。
en: Harris (1979: 119–40) attacked sociobiology as biological reductionism.

zh: 他采用生物学家自己的术语，指出“基因类型从不能解释显性行为的所有多样性”（Harris 1979: 121)，甚至在简单有机体中，习得性行为也是一个要素。
en: Taking on the biologists in their own terms, he pointed out that ‘genotypes never account for all the variations in behavioural phenotype’ (1979: 121): even in simple organisms, learned behaviour is a factor.

zh: 按照哈里斯的说法，文化是“自由基因”（gene free)。
en: Culture, as he says, is ‘gene free’.

zh: 从人类起源的时间到大约一万年前近东与亚洲第一个国家建立，人类生活在地球上一些小的地域范围。
en: From the time of human origins to the first states in the Near East and Asia some 10,000 years ago, humans lived in small bands.

zh: 即使在第一个国家出现以后，大多数人仍然过着集体生活，政府、共同体和亲属关系都排在个体前面。
en: Even after the first states were organized, most of life was lived collectively, with government, community, and kinship having priority over the individual.

zh: 像我们现今所了解的“个体”概念，是宗教改革、文艺复兴和工业革命的一个产物，其真正存在只有几百年时间。即便如此，它也仅局限在西欧和它的殖民地。
en: The concept of the individual as we know it really came to exist only a few hundred years ago, as a product of the Reformation, Renaissance, and industrial revolution, and even then it was confined to Western Europe and its colonies.

zh: 在人类历史上，集体主义比个体主义占有更大的位置。
en: Collectivism has a larger place in human history than individualism.

zh: 经济体制是物品生产、分配和消费的手段。
en: An economic system is a means of producing, distributing, and consuming goods.

zh: 研究无文字、非工业社会的经济只有在每个社会的整体文化背景中才能进行。
en: Studying the economics of nonliterate, nonindustrial societies can be undertaken only in the context of the total culture of each society.

zh: 每个社会都按其自己的原则配置原料、土地、劳动和技术，并分配物品，解决生存问题。
en: Each society solves the problem of subsisting by allocating raw materials, land, labor, and technology and by distributing goods according to its own priorities.

zh: 阔特格如夫的第二种观点和欧里奥旦（O’Riordan)的观点类似，认为环境决定论者有“技术中心论”和“生态中心论”之分 (O’Riordan 1981/1076:1—19)。
en: Cotgrove's second formulation is similar to O'Riordan's distinction between the "technocentric" and "ecocentric" forms of environmentalism (O'Riordan 1981 [1976]:1–19).

zh: 技术中心论者坚信技术而且假设人类掌握着主动权，他们甚至希望通过改变政策和实践来营造一个环境更加和谐的工业社会，但他们并不质疑工业发展的目标，也不怀疑追逐工业发展的价值观念，他们因此走向环境决定论的保守派。生态中心论认为人类应该臣服于自然而 不是去控制自然。他们宣传对自然界应采取人性化的态度，应该尊重自然过程和自然物。这种观念的实践意义包括低影响的技术和一种自我依赖，如果不对工业社会的根基进行彻底的革新，这种理念便没有任何现实意义。
en: Technocentrists have faith in technology and assume that humankind is in control.They may wish to make industrial society more environmentally benign, through changes in policy and practice, but they do not question the goals of industrial development, nor the values which drive it; they thus represent a conservative form of environmentalism.

zh: 为寻找较好的畜牧草地，巴赫蒂亚里人的畜牧生活围绕两个季节性的迁移转变。
en: The pastoral life of the Bakhtiari revolves around two seasonal migrations to find better grazing lands for the flocks.

zh: 每年人们都要迁移两次:秋天，从他们在山区的夏季营地迁走；春天，从他们在低地的冬季营房迁出。
en: Twice a year the people move: in the fall from their summer quarters in the mountains and in the spring from their winter quarters in the Jowlands.

zh: 这种严格的季节性迁移模式通常被称为季节性牲畜迁移 (transhumance)。
en: This patcern of strict seasonal movement is known as transhumance.

zh: 相反，在“法律的”领域，继嗣和世系群的规则规范着成员资格并提供了统治和隶属的法律主干，和睦和家族之间平常基本上是不相关的。
en: In contrast, within the ‘jural’ domain the everyday relations of amity and filiation were for the most part irrelevant, for the principles of descent and lineage ruled its membership and provided the backbone for its jural structures of dominance and subordination.

zh: 法律领域包含了政治并为社会提供了秩序和持续性的保障。
en: It was the jural domain that comprised the polity and thus provided society with its order and continuity.

zh: “原始”民族就是靠亲属关系政治（包括“法人继嗣群”）的命令和规范来统治和约束的。
en: The prescriptions and regulations of the kinship polity (comprising its ‘corporate descent groups’) were what ruled and constrained ‘primitive’ people.

zh: 一个人在社会中的地位、权利和义务本质上都取决于他在其诞生的继嗣群中的位置。
en: A man’s status, rights and obligations within society were in essence provided by his place within the lineage of his birth.

zh: 特罗布里恩德群岛的居民就是采取这种居处模式，在那里，每一个个体生来就是一个亲属群体的成员，这些亲属通过他们的母亲，他们母亲的母亲，以此类推，直到最初那个衍生出所有后代的女性，来追溯他们的祖先。
en: Such is the case among the people of the Trobriand Islands, where each individual is a member from birth of a group of relatives who trace their descent back through their mother, their mother's mother，and so on to the one woman all others are descended from.

zh: 每一个继嗣群体都拥有财产，包括小村落、灌木丛和林地，有时候还有海滩，群体中的每一个成员对它们都有享用权。
en: Each of these descent groups holds property, consisting of hamlet sites, bush and garden lands, and, in some cases, beachfronts members have access rights to.

zh: 这些财产每一代由一名男性首领或其他男性头领控制，他继承了这些权利和义务，但因为继嗣只通过女性追溯，所以一个男性无法从他的父亲那里继承这些东西。
en: These properties are controlled each generation by a male chief or other leader who inherits these rights and obligations, but because descent is traced exclusively through women, a man cannot inherit these from his father.

zh: 尽管大多数考古学家专门研究人类的过去，但其中有些考古学家涉及当代背景中的物质对象的研究。
en: Although archaeologists have concentrated on the human past, significant numbers of them are concerned with the study of material objects in contemporary settings.

zh: 一个实例是亚里桑那州立大学的“垃圾调研项目”对家庭废弃物小心谨慎加以控制的研究，不断形成有关当代社会问题的信息。
en: One example is the University of Arizona's Garbage Project, which, by a carefully controlled study of household waste, continues to produce information about contemporary social issues.

zh: 除了它的成就之外，该调研项目还检验了访谈调查技术的有效性，社会学家、经济学家、其他社会科学家和政策制定者，为其数据的缘故，都极为依赖这一调査技术。
en: One aim of this project has been to test the validity of interview-survey techniques, which sociologists, economists, other social scientists, and policymakers rely heavily on for their data.

zh: 纽约市最初的犹太人继嗣群体是家庭圈。
en: The original Jewish descent groups in New York City are known as family circles.

zh: 一个家庭圈的潜在成员由同一对袓先的所有活着的后代及其配偶组成。
en: The potential members of a family circle consist of all living descendants, with their spouses, of an ancestral pair.

zh: 实际上，并非所有有资格的人都会加入这个圈子，因此就有某种自由选择的因素。
en: In actuality, not all who are eligible actually join, so an element of voluntarism exists.

zh: 但资格很明确是由血统决定的，包括男女双方的亲属纽带，没有性别上的主次之分这是为了同时与祖先夫妇确立联系。
en: But eligibility is explicitly determined by descent, using both male and female links, without set order, to establish the connection with the ancestral pair.

zh: 这样，个体有资格加入的群体或“圈”通常便不止—个。
en: Thus, individuals are normally eligible for membership in more than one group or "circle".

zh: 虽然民族志的田野工作是民族学的基础，但它不是民族学家的唯一工作。
en: Although ethnographic fieldwork is basic to ethnology, it is not the sole occupation of the ethnologist.

zh: 民族志的性质大致是描述性的，它为（有较多理论志向的）良族学家提供基础数据，然后民族学家就可能利用这些数据，通过把一种文化的某个特殊方面与其他文化中的相同方面做比较而对它加以研究。
en: Largely descriptive in nature, ethnography provides the basic data the ethnologist (who is more theoretically oriented) then may use to study one particular aspect of a culture by comparing it with that same aspect in others.

zh: 人类学家始终如一地做这种跨文化比较，这也是该学科的另一个标志。
en: Anthropologists constantly make such cross-cultural comparisons, and this is another hallmark of the discipline.

zh: 当你比较人们从事于北美人视为“家务”的时间，通过跨文化比较就可能产生对你自己的信念和实践的令人感兴趣的深刻见解。
en: Interesting insights into our own practices may come from cross-cultural comparisons, as when one compares the time people devote to what we consider housework.

zh: 他们被分成许多异族结婚的宗族（也就是有一个共同祖先的团体），并且被要求与和自己所在的家系祖先不同的人结婚。
en: They are divided into a number of exogamous clans (named groups with a common ancestor), and are required to marry persons who do not trace their genealogy to the same ancestor as they do.

zh: 因为他们是根据男性血脉（父系）计算家族的，你的父亲的姐妹的孩子和母亲的兄弟的姐妹都不属于你自己的宗族（他们是跨堂表亲的），因此他们都被归类为是可以与之结婚的。
en: Since they reckon kinship along the male line (patrilineality), father's sister's children and mother's brother's sister do not belong to one's own clan (they are cross-cousins) and are thus classified as marriageable.

zh: 在许多中东人那里，却相反，与父亲的兄弟的孩子结婚（平行的堂兄弟姐妹）相当普遍。
en: Among many Middle Eastern peoples, on the contrary, marriage with father's brother's child (one's parallel cousin) is widely practised.

zh: 某种程度上，所有的人类群体都既是同族婚配的，又是异族婚配的，只是程度不同：你被指望与一个“自己的同类”结婚，但却不是某个被归类为你的近亲的人。
en: In a sense, all human groups are both endogamous and exogamous to varying degrees: one is expected to marry "one's own kind", but not someone classified as a close relative.

zh: 换句话说，关于区分高级种姓和低级种姓的价值观和标准，似乎已达成了普遍的共识。
en: There seems, in other words, to be widespread agreement concerning values and criteria for distinguishing a low caste from a high one.

zh: 在印度乡村，传统的以迦提为基础的劳动分工被称为贾吉摩尼（jajmani）制度。
en: The traditional jãti-based division of labour in Indian villages is called the jajmani system.

zh: 它由一整套惯例构成，规定了不同种姓成员之间的产品交换和服务。
en: It consists of a set of traditional rules about the exchange of products and services between the members of different castes.

zh: 也就是说，每个种姓对其他种姓都具有特定的义务。
en: In other words, each caste has specific commitments towards the others.

zh: 从全局来看看，幸亏有了不同种姓之间的相互依赖，整个村子才能被维持成一个社会系统；从参与者的角度看，你可以说，它创造意义重大的对于个人机会的结构性约束。
en: Seen from a systemic perspective, one may say that the village is upheld as a social system thanks to the interdependence between the castes; seen from an actor perspective, one may say that it creates significant structural constraints on individual opportunities.

zh: 一个重要区别就在程序上。
en: An important difference concerns procedure.

zh: 在实证主义模型中，系统观察或实验导致对假说和普遍定律公式化的检验。
en: In the positivist model, systematic observation or experiment leads to tests of hypotheses and formulation of general laws.

zh: 反过来，定律则归类并进而解释具体现象，像观察及实验的结果。
en: Laws, in turn, subsume and thus explain specific phenomena such as the results of the observations and experiments.

zh: 这类模型被称作“假设一推理”；实验则检验从法则或理论推论出的假设。
en: This kind of model is known as "hypothetico-deductive"; an experiment tests a hypothesis that is deduced from a law or theory.

zh: 从20世纪70年代以来，这在一些研究结果中产生了一些张力。
en: This produced some tension in the research findings from the 1970s.

zh: 尽管那一时期的性别研究学者拥有一种很强的意识，即男性占据主导地位是错误的，但这与他们的文化相对主义的感觉则相互冲突。
en: Although the scholars of gender during that period operated with a strong sense that male domination was wrong, this conflicted with their sense of cultural relativism.

zh: 相对主义要求了解处在某一特定文化背景下的每种现象，这破坏了“男性占据主导地位是错的”这一普遍价值。
en: That is, relativism called for understanding every phenomenon in a particular cultural context, which undermined the universal value that male dominance is wrong.

zh: 具有讽刺意味的是那些证明在其他文化中有多少女性享有权力位置的研究。
en: Ironically, the result was research that proved how many women enjoyed positions of power in other cultures.

zh: 家族的声誉至上看来是基本原则。
en: The basic rule seems to be that a family's reputation is most important.

zh: 人们明白，配偶只有在同一种姓和一般社会阶级内部加以安排，如果新娘与新郎家族的阶级地位是相似的话，种姓分支之间稍有交叉也是允许的。虽然印度现在法律禁止嫁妆，但每次婚姻都发生范围广泛的礼物交换。
en: It is understood that matches would be arranged only within the same caste and general social class, although some crossing of subcastes is permissible if the class positions of the bride's and groom's families are similar Although dowry is now prohibited by law in India, extensive gift exchanges took place with every marriage.

zh: 即使男青年家庭没有“提出要求”，每个姑娘的家庭仍感到有义务送给姑娘、男青年和男青年家庭传统的礼物。
en: Even when the boy's family do not "make demands", every girl's family nevertheless feels the obligation to give the traditional gifts, to the girl, to the boy, and to the boy's family.

zh: 尤其是夫妻两人在将要住在联合家庭——这类家庭甚至在印度都市的中上阶级中仍是相当普遍的——即该夫妻与男青年的父母、他已婚的兄弟以及未婚的同胞兄弟姐妹住在一起，姑娘的家庭渴望在其家庭与男青年的家庭之间建立和谐的关系。
en: Particularly when the couple would be living in the joint family—that is, with the boy's parents and his married brothers and their families, as well as with unmarried siblings—which is still very common even among the urban, upper-middle class in India, the girl's parents are anxious to establish smootli relations between their family and that of the boy.

zh: 对于如今的人类学（也许还在乡村“里”研究，却不再研究它们本身[Geertz 1973: 22]），牧歌式的他性的习语已经变得多样化了。
en: In contemporary anthropology (study ‘in’ villages, perhaps, but no longer ‘of’ them (Geertz 1973:22)), idioms of idyllic otherness have become increasingly diverse.

zh: 我们强调性别的他性、身体的他性、全球性的他性、从属性的他性；我们从本质上理想化（“牧歌化”）了他性（作为差别，作为间生性[hybridity]，作为东方学）。
en: We emphasize the otherness of gender, of the body, of globality, of subalternality; we idealize (‘idyll-ize’) otherness per se (as difference, as hybridity, as Orientalism).

zh: 然而，我们应该记住的仍旧是关于牧歌的习惯用语和它们要描述的经验现实之间的裂缝。
en: What should be borne in mind still, however, is the gap between idyllic idioms and the empirical realities they purport to describe.

zh: 二，民族国家的统治者对族性的攻击。
en: Second, ethnicity has also been under attack from rulers of nation-states.

zh: 当然，我所讨论的是这样一种民族-国家，其疆域内的人民有着不同的族裔起源， 他们被要求服从整体的民族利益。
en: I am talking of course of that type of nation-state which contains within its territory people of different ethnic origin who are asked to subordinate that origin in the interests of the nation as a whole.

zh: 与阶级问题不同，民族被视为人们关爱的客体，而不仅仅是促进某种利益的载体。
en: Unlike the case of class, the nation is offered as an object of affection, not merely as a vehicle for advancing an interest.

zh: 由于我们已根据性接触权定义了婚姻，所以我们必须明确把婚姻制度与交配分别开来。
en: Having defined marriage in terms of sexual access, we must at this point make clear the distinction between systems of marriage and mating.

zh: 所有动物，包括人类，都交配——有的是终身的，而有的则不是；有的与单个相反性别的个体交配，有的则与几个个体交配。
en: All animals, including humans, mate—some for life and some not, some with a single individual of the opposite sex, and some with several.

zh: 婚姻是社会賦予的权利，与婚姻相反，交配仅通过个体努力得到保证和维持。
en: Mates are secured and held solely through individual effort, as opposed to marriage, which is a right society confers.

zh: 只有婚姻以法律的、经济的、社会 的力量为后盾。
en: Only marriage is backed by legal, economic, and social forces.

zh: 甚至在纳亚尔人那里，婚姻也很少包括性关系以外的其他东西，一个女子的丈夫依法有义务每隔一定时期要送她礼物。
en: Even among the Nayar, where marriage seems to involve little else than a sexual relationship, a woman's husband is legally obligated to provide her with gifts at specified intervals.

zh: 迈克尔·奥克肖特（Michael Oakeshott 1962）认为，交谈就是人类文化所要实现的，也是人类社会固有的特征。
en: For Michael Oakeshott (1962), conversation is what human cultures accomplish and what human societies inherit.

zh: 交谈是代表不同的习惯和方式的个体的声音的汇集。
en: Conversation is a meeting of individual voices speaking in different idiom or mode.

zh: 科学、诗歌、实践行动以及历史都是各种不同的讲述形式。
en: Science, poetry, practical activity and history are such modes of speech, different universes of discourse.

zh: “构成”交谈的各个不同的声音，出于不同的习惯和方式，十分多样化。
en: It is the very diversity, the manifold of different voices, speaking in different idioms or modes, which ‘makes’ conversation.

zh: 这些声音无需构建一定的层次，也无需针对某个言论，其多样性的差异之间可能没有所谓的相互不适宜，在谈论相同主题时也未必非要求一致不可。
en: The voices need not compose a hierarchy, and the conversation need not amount to an argument; the diverse voices may differ without disagreeing, and they may appear to be saying the same without agreeing.

zh: 因此交谈不是质疑和争论，也不是注释和辩论，也不是为了劝说、驳斥或告知。
en: Hence, conversation is not an inquiry or contest, exegesis or debate; it does not set out to persuade, refute, or inform.

zh: 交谈不打算揭示什么真理，也不证明什么，它不寻求结论，其推理既不是完备的也不是最重要的，不存在保卫某个实体的持续要求。
en: Conversation has no truth to discover, no proposition to prove, no conclusion to seek; reason is neither sovereign nor primary, and there is no accumulating inquiry or body of information to safeguard.

zh: 相反，作为“各异的思想片断的翱翔与纠葛”的空间，即在相互刺激与反应中进行有限关联而非同化，从而使个体的思考者参与社会文化生活的“智识推动的练习”中（1962: 198）。
en: Instead, as ‘thoughts of different species take wing and play round one another’— responding to and provoking one another’s movement, obliquely interrelating without assimilating—so their individual thinkers engage in the ‘unrehearsed intellectual adventure’ of socio-cultural life (1962:198).

zh: 个体间的交谈无论是在公众面前还是在内部进行，最终都会形成每个人行动和言论的背景。
en: Going on in public and inside themselves, a conversation between individuals ultimately contextualizes every human activity and utterance.

zh: 有句名言说，经济学是研究人们如何作出选择，而社会学则解释人们为什么别无选择。
en: According to the bon mot, economics is about how people make choices while sociology is about why people do not have any choices to make.

zh: 人类学对交易的社会文化背景的强调，及其对“交易论”或“行动/实践理论”的理论化过程，都力图协调上述不同的立场。
en: An anthropological emphasis on transaction within socio-cultural milieux, and its theorization as "transactionalism", or "action/practice theory", amounts to an attempt to mediate between these positions.

zh: 交易论对以前强调功能或结构的做法提出了重要修正，后两者都努力使社会生活（办公室、规则、权利与义务）的制度化特征具体化，并阐明团结的群体的本质，因此它们都固执地忽略了独立个体的行为。
en: Transactionalism has represented an important corrective to earlier functional and structural emphases which managed to reify the institutional features of social life (offices, rules, rights and duties), and essentialize corporate groups so that they somehow persisted irrespective of the actions of distinct individuals.

zh: 种姓是社会阶级的一种特殊形式，在种姓中，成员身份由出生决定且终生固定。
en: Caste is a special form of social class in which membership is determined by birth and fixed for life.

zh: 等级内部特别规定内婚制，子女自动属于其父母所在的等级。
en: Endogamy is particularly marked within castes, and children automatically belong to their parents' caste.

zh: 社会阶级结构以角色分化为基础，尽管这一点本身对于分层而言是不充分的。
en: Social class structure is based on role differentiation, although this by itself is not sufficient for stratification.

zh: 对各种角色持开放式的肯定和否定态度，以及限制较重要角色的获得机会，也是必要的。
en: Also necessary are formalized positive and negative attitudes toward roles and restricted access to the more valued ones.

zh: 对角色理论的一种常见批评是声称其缺少一种处理社会中的权力关系的能力。
en: A common criticism of role theory is its alleged lack of ability to deal with power relationships in society.

zh: 很明显，社会习俗、角色期望、社会中角色和身份的真正分配，都对权力的系统差异有所影响。
en: For it is clear that social conventions, role expectations and the very distribution of roles and statuses in society contribute to systematic differences in power.

zh: 一些行动者能够对其他人施加相当大的力量；另一些人对他们自己的生活只具有很少的控制能力，更别提别人的生活了。
en: Some actors are able to exert considerable power over others; some have very limited control of their own lives, let alone other people's.

zh: 戈夫曼和其他角色理论家在他们的著作中，只是间接地谈到过社会生活的这个维度。
en: This dimension of social life is only dealt with indirectly in the work of Goffman and other role theorists.

zh: 权力是一个令人难以捉摸的概念。
en: Power is an elusive and difficult concept.

zh: 哲学家罗素（Bertrand Russell）曾经说过，社会科学中的权力，就像物理学中的能量：是少数极其核心的概念之一，但是对之进行准确定义却是不可能的。从这个角度来说——不存在一个被普遍认同的权力的定义，他是正确的。
en: The philosopher Bertrand Russell once said that power is to the social sciences what energy is to physics: it is one of a handful of extremely central concepts, but it is impossible to define it accurately.Russell is still right to the extent that no definition of power exists which is universally agreed upon.

zh: 然而，从权力关系角度来说，不同社会之间存在显而易见并且意义重大的差别，不论是在公共领域还是私人领域。
en: Yet there are obvious and clearly very significant differences between societies regarding power relationships, both in the public and the private spheres.

zh: 而在法律领域，对教会法规的学习却呈现出繁荣兴盛的势头，博洛尼亚大学的情况更是如此。西罗马皇帝格拉提安以及教皇亚历山大三世（在其出任教皇之前）都曾在这所大学任教，贝克特也曾在这所大学学习过。如此一来，教会法庭和皇家法庭围绕几类主要违法行为的司法处决权的争夺也日趋激烈。此外，两者在关于谁有权起诉和惩治犯有严重罪行的神职人员的问题上也争得不可开交。
en: In the legal sphere, the burgeoning of studies in canon law, especially at the University of Bologna where the great Gratian and Pope Alexander III (before his elevation to the papacy) taught and Becket for a while studied, exacerbated the struggle between ecclesiastical and royal courts for jurisdiction over several important categories of offences and for the right to indict and punish clerics who had committed serious crimes.

zh: 教派组织的主要特点是其成员的加人是自愿性的（弱区格），对公共利益（强群体）的承诺将他们团结在一起。
en: The chief characteristic of sects is that their membership is voluntary (low grid); they are held together by commitment to communal interests (high group).

zh: 道格拉斯和维达夫斯基认为，20世纪60—70年代之所以在美国兴起 环保热是与教派组织的壮大相关的。
en: Douglas and Wildavsky suggested that the rise in environmental concern in America in the 1960s and 1970s was related to a growth in sectarian organization.

zh: 教派组织通过反对中心 (即阶层制度与市场组织）来维持自我。环境关怀或环保是反对中心的一种适宜的机制，因为他们对阶层制度与市场组织形式的延续所依赖的价值与假设表示怀疑，比如对科学技术以及现行法律和程序的过度依赖（Douglas和Wildavsky 1982: 126)。
en: Sects sustain themselves by opposing the centre.Environmental concerns are an appropriate mechanism for doing this because they question the values and assumptions on which the continuation of hierarchical and market forms of organization depend, such as the supremacy of science and technology and confidence in established laws and procedures (Douglas and Wildavsky 1982:126ff.).

zh: 例如，在特定社会中，政治权力和智力声望可能是同等重要的。
en: Political power and intellectual prestige could, for instance, be just as important in a given society.

zh: 关于阶级和阶层的视角之间的重要差别涉及对冲突的意义的看法。
en: An important difference between perspectives on classes or strata concerns the significance placed on conflict.

zh: 阶级理论几乎就是一种冲突理论，将不同阶级之间的冲突看做是根本性的。
en: Class theory is nearly always a kind of conflict theory, seeing the conflicts between different classes as fundamental.

zh: 马克思认为阶级斗争是社会变化中最核心的因素，因为成功的阶级斗争最终会导致生产关系（财产关系）的变化和社会秩序的质的改变。
en: Marx saw class struggle as the most central factor in social change, since successful class struggles eventually led to changes in the relations of production (property relations) and qualitative changes in the social order.

zh: 马克思主义关于阶级的思想和其他有关社会分层或阶级的理论都被批判为是种族中心主义的。
en: Both Marxist thought about social class and other theories of social strata or classes have been criticised for being ethnocentric.

zh: 他着重关注的是那12个男孩中所表现出来的对抗文化，并不时把关注点转向工场和家庭环境（与孩子的父母们讨论），以展示他所着重表现的、产生于学校体验的对抗文化是如何在这些其他重要场所中获得冋应的（家庭场所以及父母的观点表明，这种文化在代际之间不断被再生产，但它形成的地点是在学校，而不是在家庭；而对工场这一场所的描写则表明对抗文化在职业环境中得以延续，并产生了各种极为不同的结果）。
en: Centrally he is concerned with a representation of the oppositional culture among his twelve lads, and with some shifting to shop floor and home environments (discussions with parents) to show how the focally represented oppositional culture created from school experience resonates in these other critical locales (the home locale and parental perspective show that the culture is generationally reproduced, but also that the school, not the home, is its site of formation; the shop floor locale shows the continuity of oppositional culture in the work context and its very different consequences).

zh: 可见，为了达到论证的目标，威利斯在文本中对这一体系作了特定的、策略性的限定。
en: So there is a very specific and strategic circumscribing of the system portrayed in the text for the purposes of Willis's argument.

zh: 他也多少注意到了体现在教职工和其他学生中的中产阶级文化，并认识到女孩、西印度群岛裔人和亚洲裔人之间视角的不同，但他主要还是把自己限定在写作一部选点于学校的，关于他的12个叛逆男孩的民族志。
en: He pays some attention to middle class culture, as manifested in staff and other students, and he recognizes distinct perspectives for girls, West Indians, a n d Asians, but mainly he keeps to a school-situated ethnography of his twelve nonconformist boys.

zh: 弗雷泽的第二条原则被称为“接触巫术”(contagious magic)，它指这样一种观念，即事物或人之间一旦发生接触就能彼此影响，即使此后不再接触。
en: Frazer's second principle was called contagious magic—the concept that things or persons once in contact can afterward influence one another.

zh: 关于接触 巫术的一个最常见的例子是，一个人和他或她身体的任何一个部分——比如头发、 指甲或者牙齿——之间有永久的联系。
en: The most common example of contagious magic is the permanent relationship between an individual and any part of his or her body, such as hair, fingernails, or teeth.

zh: 弗雷泽引用了这样一个例子：住在非洲南 部的莱索托王国的巴苏陀人，总是很小心地藏匿他们被拔掉的牙齿，因为这些牙齿可能会落入某些神秘的存在之手，而后者可以通过对这些牙齿施以巫术来伤害牙 齿的主人。
en: Frazer cites the Basutos of Lesotho, in southern Africa, who were careful to conceal their extracted teeth, because these might fall into the hands of certain mythical beings who could harm the owners of the teeth by working magic on them.

zh: 与此相关的是，在西方社会中，人们有珍藏特殊人物触碰过的东西的习俗。这些东西有圣人的遗物、其他受人敬佩的或偶像化个人的所有物等。
en: Related to this is the custom, in Western societies, of treasuring objects that have been touched by special people.

zh: 我已借用道格拉斯的模式阐述了文化理论是如何被用来分析环境決定论的，但是，我并不希望证明她研究文化的方法就是最合适的。事实上，她的文化理论中也有矛盾，确认这些矛盾便于我们从她的理论中选择哪些是有用的。
en: I have used Douglas' model as an illustration of how cultural theory has been used in the analysis of environmentalism, but I would not wish to argue that her approach to culture is the most appropriate.In fact, there are contradictions in it which make it impossible to swallow whole, and it is important to identify these in order to be able to select from it what is valuable.

zh: 道格拉斯的文化理论中最突出的问题是断言社会组织形式模塑或决定文化视角。
en: The most controversial feature of Douglas' theory is the assertion that forms of social organization cause or determine cultural perspectives.

zh: 决定论被认为是人类学中不同结构主义方法的主要祸首之一（尤其是像道格拉斯的模式等结构功能主义严重地受到杜尔凯姆的影响），而后结构主义人类学家也试图摒弃决定论。
en: Determinism was seen as one of the major evils of the various structuralist approaches in anthropology (in particular, structural-functionalism which, like Douglas' model, was heavily influenced by Durkheim) and which post-structuralist anthropologists sought to leave behind.

zh: 决定论的主要问题和缺陷是完全否认了选择的可能性，因而也就否认了变迁的可能性，而在后结构主义的方法中，变迁是人们选择以不同的方式从事活动或进行思考的结果。
en: The main problem with determinism is that it appears to deny the possibility of choice and therefore of change, since change is assumed, in post-structuralist approaches, to result from people choosing to act or think differently.

zh: 国家层次或全球层次的种族隔离，不论是官方的还是非官方的，其后果之一是出现大量的结构性暴力（structural violence）:由处境、制度以及社会、政治和经济结构造成的暴力。例如，在亚洲南部国家中，有25%—50%的初生儿体重不足。这对儿童的大脑发育和今后的健康都有严重影响。
en: One of the consequences of a system of apartheid, whether official or unofficial and on the state or global level, is a great deal of structural violence: violence exerted by situations, institutions, and social, political, and economic structures.

zh: 造成这个问题的原因是母亲和胎儿的营养不足和营养不良。
en: To survive, these countries will have to make drastic cuts in social services, while industry downsizing and failures will cause untold numbers of people to lose their jobs.

zh: 对于这种情况的受害者来说，其效果就是暴力，尽管它不是由某个特定个休的敌意行动引起的。
en: As far as the victims of this economic calamity are concerned, the effect is violent, even though the cause was not the hostile act of a specific individual.

zh: 这种暴力的来源是一个匿名的结构 (经济），而这就是所谓结构性暴力的全部含义。
en: The source of the violence was an anonymous structure (the economy), and this is what structural violence is all about.

zh: 世界观的不同只是人们对其周围世界的解释不同而已。
en: World views would be different simply because the worlds they depict are different.

zh: 极端建构主义形式的一个更具说服力的观点是，社会建构了特殊的世界，但相同的原材料却组成了不同的社会事实。
en: A more reasonable reading of the extreme form of constructivism is that societies construct distinct worlds, composed of different truths, out of the same raw material.

zh: 建构主义的形式越折中，就越能凸现出它奠定了以象征人类学与语义人类学名义进行写作的基础。
en: The more moderate form of constructivism is the more familiar, in that it forms the basis of much that has been written in the name of symbolic or semantic anthropology.

zh: 建构主义坚持世界多样性的观点，其多样性不同于对一般现实的多种解释。
en: It holds that diverse world views are different interpretations of a common reality.

zh: 因此与其说多样性的社会事实构成了文化，不如说文化构建于多重意义之上。
en: Rather than being composed of diverse truths, cultures are composed of diverse meanings.

zh: 如今萨特的某些措辞看起来有些老套、大男子主义或者洋洋自得；但这可以以安全富足的资产阶级的信条形式出现，能够对自身进行反思，也能够决定“他”与这些处境或者他生活的环境的关系，能够主张特定的生命尊严。事实上.这使得一些人类学家反对这种简单的存在主义倾向。
en: Some of Sartre's phraseology seems old-fashioned now, sexist and selfsatisfied; it can appear the credo of the secure and resourceful bourgeois, able to reflect on the self, to determine "his" relations to the conditions or circumstances of his life, and to lay claim to a certain lifesome dignity Indeed, this has led some anthropologists to reject such an existentialist orientation tout court.

zh: 不过这种解读是肤浅的，也是错误的；避免特定性别的语言形式依然不那么容易，可是萨特却通过他的话简洁地指出了众多重要的事实。以下就详细阐述他的一些观点。
en: However, such a reading is superficial, and mistaken; avoiding gender-specific linguistic formulations may still not be easy, but by his words Sartre succinctly points up a number of important truths.Let me elaborate upon a number of his phrases in turn.

zh: 这种批评可能会引发众多的反应。
en: There are a number of possible responses to this critique.

zh: 一种是简单的坚持存在主义和理性主义的立场，认为文化相对主义和解构不过是种朴素的错误。
en: One is simply to reassert an existentialist and rationalist position and say that cultural relativism and deconstruction are just plain wrong.

zh: 科学、医学、历史、文学和旅行都证明了存在普遍的人性以及其中所包含的意识和经验天生的个体性（Rapport 1994a，1997a）。
en: Science, medicine, history, literature and travel prove the existence of a universal humanity, and the inherent individuality of consciousness and experience through which it is embodied (cf. Rapport 1994a, 1997a).

zh: 虽然解剖学方面的调适对灵长目动物来说是重要的，但它不是对付环境的唯一方式。
en: Important though anatomical adaptation has been to the primates, it has not been the only way of coping with the environment.

zh: 对现代猴子和类人猿的研究表明，习得的社会行为在调适中起重要作用。虽然现存的灵长目动物显示的行为范围很大，但是通过考察与人类关系最近的种——特别是黑猩猩、倭黑猩猩，以及其他类人猿——或者考察如狒狒这样的种 (它们已适应的环境，在某种程度上类惊于我们袓先数百万年前面对的那些环境），我们就可以发现对人类文化行为产生做出贡献的那些模式的线索。
en: Studies of monkeys and apes living today indicate that learned social behavior plays an important role in adaptation.The range of behavior living primates show is great, but by looking at the behavior of the species most closely related to humans—chimpanzees in particular and the other great apes as well—or of ones such as baboons that have adapted to environments somewhat similar to those our own ancestors faced millions of years ago, we may discover clues to patterns that contributed to the emergence of human cultural behavior.

zh: 在哲学上，人类解释上的同义反复或循环的特点被称为“解释循环”。
en: In philosophical deliberation, the tautological or circular nature of human interpretation has become known as ‘the hermeneutic circle’.

zh: 对人而言，除了事物的熵和流量外，还没有什么是必定或简单的存在于世界“那儿”。
en: For human beings, there is nothing that is necessarily or simply ‘there’ in the world besides the entropy of matter, or flux.

zh: 存在的只是我们所期望在那的，且只有通过特定的参与活动，我们才可作出有意义的解释，并就此“稳固”我们的世界。
en: What is there is a matter of what we anticipate to be there, and only by courtesy of a system of anticipations do we make meaningful interpretations and hence ‘fix’ our world.

zh: 然而，不应就此认为，后殖民时代的安排就比一战后的安排更理想、更高级，它们显然是不同的，因为它们基于不同的背景和环境。
en: However, it would be wrong to conclude that the post-colonial arrangements were ideal or ‘superior’ to the post-World War I model.They were simply different because they were dictated by different circumstances.

zh: 随后，情况改变了。
en: The subsequent experiences have varied.

zh: 尽管在总体上后殖民时代的安排依然可行，但出现了一些情况，诸如印度的分裂和巴基斯坦的解体，以及换个视角来看，还有印尼的领土扩张。
en: Although on the whole the post-colonial arrangements were viable, there were also such experiences as the partition of India and the dissolution of Pakistan, as well as, on the other side of the spectrum, the territorial expansion of Indonesia.

zh: 进化论描述了自然对文化、陌生的对熟悉的、唯心论视角对唯物论视角。
en: The theory of evolution portrays the relationship of the natural to the cultural, the exotic to the familiar, ideational perspectives to materialistic perspectives.

zh: 所有这些关系被构想成一个全景故事。
en: All these relationships are envisioned as a panoramic story.

zh: 人类的进化从“自然”开始，结束于“文化”——从细胞到动物，从类人猿到猿人，最后从野人到文明人。
en: Humans evolve from "natural" beginnings to cultural endings – cell to animal, hominoid to hominid, and finally savage to civilized.

zh: 不论是生物上还是文化上的变异，都可通过自然（或文化）选择原理来进行解释——在多样的情境中，每个特质都是适应某一个特殊环境的产物。
en: Variation, whether biological or cultural, is explained by the principle of natural (or cultural) selection operating in varying circumstances such that each trait results from adaptation to a particular environment.

zh: 历史过程和进化过程在具有时相特性方面是类似的，两者都是非重复和不可逆的过程。
en: The historic process and the evolutionary process are alike in being temporal in character, i.e., non-repetitive and irreversible.

zh: 但历史过程仅仅是时相性的，而进化过程则兼备形态持性，它是形态的时相顺序（temporal-sequence-of-forms)。
en: But, whereas the historic process is merely temporal, the evolutionary process is formal as well: it is a temporal-sequence-of-forms.

zh: 从历史上看，艾利·惠特尼（Eli Whitney)和发明轨棉机在编年顺序上似是不可分割的事件。
en: Historically Eli Whitney and the invention of the cotton gin are inseparable events in a chronological sequence.

zh: 但是，如果惠特尼在童年殃折，技术的进化过程仍然会产卡出一架轨棉花的机器。
en: But had Whitney died in his cradle the evolutionary process expressed in technology would have produced a machine for ginning cotton.

zh: 现代化理论在区域研究计划中占据着主导地位。
en: This work was dominated by modernization theory.

zh: 因为单线进化论的复苏以及它与极化类型（polar types)的社会学传统的结合，现代化理论造成了传统社会和现代社会之间的对立以及对传统社会将不可避免地转变为现代社会的期许。
en: In a revival of unilineal evolutionism combined with the sociological tradition of polar types, modernization theory posed an opposition between traditional and modern societies and an expectation that the traditional would inevitably be transformed into the modern.

zh: 研究的焦点是在不同的情境下促进或阻碍这种进步的条件。
en: The focus of research was on the conditions in different settings that aided or impeded that progress.

zh: 这种方法在公共政策讨论中变得十分流行，在这些讨论中，这一方法又被当时更具影响力的政治学学者往前推进。
en: This approach became common currency in public-policy discussions, where it was advanced by the more influential political scientists of the time.

zh: 在人类学中，在任何既定框架中的一套互为对立的理论观点方面和在理论层次的一个层面方面的思考都是大有裨益的。
en: Within anthropology, it is useful to think in terms of both a set of competing theoretical perspectives within any given framework, and a hierarchy of theoretical levels.

zh: 我们以进化论和传播论为例。
en: Take evolutionism and diffusionism, for example.

zh: 进化论是一种人类学观点，它强调文化复杂性随着时间发展而增强。
en: Evolutionism is an anthropological perspective which emphasizes the growing complexity of culture through time.

zh: 传播论是一种强调理念从一个地方传播到另一个地方的观点。
en: Diffusionism is a perspective which emphasizes the transmission of ideas from one place to another.

zh: 这样的概化可以是全方位的，就像第2章提到的瑟维斯的进化潜在律，也可以是范围有限和精确的。
en: Such generalizations may be global, as in Service's law of evolutionary potential, mentioned in Chapter 2, but they may also be more restricted and precise.

zh: 考古学家麦克尼什认为，在墨西哥的提华坎（Tehuacan)谷，允许部分永久性的小村庄社区出现、有可持续的农业，必须满足一些条件，包括增长的人口、定居不动和市场上不断增加的地方交换。
en: One archeologist, R. MacNeish, states a set of conditions that are necessary and sufficient to permit the emergence of semi-permanent hamlet communities with subsistence agriculture in the Tehuacan Valley in Mexico; such conditions include increasing population and sedentariness and increasing local exchange in markets.

zh: 这类概化建立在对历史进程——什么随着什么出现——仔细的追踪基础之上，有时也会补充使用比较方法，以了解全球分布的因素的共变。
en: These kinds of generalizations are based on careful tracing of sequences in history – what follows what – and are sometimes supplemented by the comparative method, which traces covariation among elements distributed globally.

zh: 早期的遗传学研究者认为，乱伦禁忌防止近亲繁殖的有害后果。
en: Early students of genetics argued that the incest taboo precluded the harmful effects of inbreeding.

zh: 尽管这一点是真的，但是就家畜方面看，近亲繁殖除了增加有害的特质外,也会增加有利的特质，这也是实情。
en: Although this is so, it is also true that, as with domestic animals, inbreeding can increase desired characteristics as well as detrimental ones.

zh: 此外，不良结果比没有近亲繁殖的暴露得要快，因此，造成不良结果的无论是什么基因，很快就从种群中根除了。
en: Furthermore, undesirable effects show up sooner than without inbreeding, so whatever genes are responsible for them are quickly eliminated from the population.

zh: 然而，対不同基因配偶的偏爱,确实往往在种群内维持比较高的基因多样性水平，在演化中它一般根据种群优势起作用。
en: However, a preference for a genetically different mate does tend to maintain a higher level of genetic diversity within a population, and in evolution this generally works to a species' advantage.

zh: 从生物学方面看，没有基因的多样性，在调适变得必要的时候，一个种群就不可能调适于变化了的环境。
en: Without genetic diversity a species cannot adapt biologically to a changed environment when and if this becomes necessary.

zh: 人类形成许多种类的群体，每一种群体都适合于解决人们必须对付的问题。
en: Humans form many kinds of groups, each geared coward solving different kinds of problems people must cope wich.

zh: 社会群体对人类来说是至关重要的，还因为它们给予其成员以身份和支持人类社会的基本组成部分是家户。人们在家户中组织经济生产、消费、继承、儿童养育和居住。
en: Social groups are important to humans also because they give identity and support to their members.The basic building block of human societies is the household, where economic production, consumption, inheritance, child rearing and shelter are organized.

zh: 家户的核心通常是由某种形式的家庭构成的，家庭是一群源自父母一子女联系和男女之间相互依赖的亲属。
en: Usually, the core of the household consists of some form of family, a group of relatives that stems from the parent-child bond and the interdependence of men and women.

zh: 虽然家庭可能有不同的结构，但它永远提供男女之间的经济合作，同时也提供儿童养育所必需的那种环境。
en: Although it may be structured in many different ways, the family always provides for economic cooperation between men and women while furnishing the kind of setting required for child rearing.

zh: 无论有效的交流和教育对于文化的持续存在有多么重要，倘若文化不能够满足按其规则生活的个人的基本需要，那么它们就是无用的。
en: Important as effective communication and education are for the survival of a culture, they are of no avail unless the culture can satisfy the basic needs of the individuals who live by its rules.

zh: 因此，文化的第三个必要条件，是因时因地为其成员提供食物、水和保护的能力。
en: A third requirement of culture, therefore, is the ability to provide its members with food, water, and protection from the elements.

zh: 第六章讨论文化应付人们基本需要的方式以及社会通过文化调适于环境的方式。
en: Chapter 6 discusses the ways cultures handle people's basic needs and the ways societies adapt to the environment through culture.

zh: 因为这导致物品生产、分配和消费——经济人类学主题——所以我们在本编最后一章（第七章）讨论经济体系。
en: Since this leads to the production, distribution, and consumption of goods—the subject matter of economic anthropology—we conclude this section with a chapter (Chapter 7) on economic systems.

zh: 事实上，个体总是在不断地再造他们的意义、感知、评价以及行动；他们否定自己创造物的本质并加以重塑。
en: Indeed, individuals are for ever in the process of remaking their meanings, senses, evaluations and actions; they negate the essence of their own creations and create again.

zh: 他们看上去似乎被环绕在客观的历史社会文化的当下中的“真实现实”里，可是他们不过是延续了后者的粗暴，通过意义想象的持续的可能性来超越纯粹的事物核心。
en: They might seem to be surrounded by the ‘actual facts’ of an objective historico-socio-cultural present, but they can nonetheless transcend the latters’ brutishness, and hence surpass a mere being-in-the-midst-ofthings by attaining the continuous possibility of imagined meanings.

zh: 在（结构）已给定的可能性和那些成为个体生活一部分的可能性之间存在长期（单一）的相互影响；个体经验不可简约为客观决定性（Kearney 1988: 255-41）。
en: Between the (structurally) given and what this becomes in an individual life there is a perennial (and unique) interplay; individual experience cannot be reduced to objective determinants (cf. Kearney 1988:225–41).

zh: 它在理论与实践之间以及教学与研究之间的分离，它所具有的可观的理论连续性，以及它相对来说较晚的学科建制以及田野工作转向都使得法国人类学可以声称自己是一种具有真正独特性的国别化人类学流派。
en: In its separation of theory and practice and of teaching and research, and in its considerable theoretical continuities and its relatively late institutionalization and turn to fieldwork, French anthropology can claim true distinction as a national anthropological school.

zh: 然而虽然这种独特流派对于更加宽泛的法国学术传统来说也仍然是这样的，但它并不是孤立的。
en: Yet although this school has remained true to French intellectual traditions more widely, it has not been isolated.

zh: 现代法国社会思想既汲取了自身的理性主义和普遍主义传统，也借鉴了德国诠释学和现象学以及英国的经验主义；它还扩展了自己的海外影响力，不仅是对英国——在那里它或许可以说是主导性的——而且还对美国和德国。
en: Modern French social thought has drawn on German hermeneutics and phenomenology and on British empiricism as well as on its own more rationalist and universalist traditions; it has also spread its influence abroad, not only to Britain, where it has perhaps been dominant, but also to America and Germany.

zh: 因此，法国被列为当今世界最重要的社会思想和民族志实践生产者之一，实属实至名归。
en: France therefore fully deserves its status as one of the world's leading producers of social thought and ethnographic practice.

zh: 以性行为的问题为例，就像人们做的任何事情一样，它是由文化塑造的。
en: Take, for example, the matter of sex, which, like anything people do, is shaped by culture.

zh: 在任何社会，性行为都是重要的，因为它有助于巩固男女之间的合作关系，并确保社会本身绵延不绝。
en: Sex is important in any society, for it helps to strengthen cooperative bonds between men and women and ensures the perpetuation of the society itself.

zh: 然而，性对社会生存也可能是破坏性的；如果谁对谁有性享用权没有明确的规定，对性特权的竞争就可能摧毁人类生存所依赖的合作关系。
en: Yet sex can be disruptive to social living; if who has sexual access to whom is not clearly spelled out, competition for sexual privileges can destroy the cooperative bonds human survival depends upon.

zh: 没有控制的性活动也可能导致使社会人口超过其资源的生殖率。
en: Uncontrolled sexual activity, too, can result in reproductive rates that cause a society's population to outstrip its resources.

zh: 因此，每一种文化在塑造性行为时，它必须使社会需要与个人充分满足保持平衡，免得失望情绪不断增长达到破坏社会本身的地步。
en: Hence, as they shape sexual behavior, every culture must balance the needs of society againsr the need for sufficient individual gratification, lest frustration build until it causes disruption.

zh: 本尼迪克特借用19世纪的哲学家和文学评论家弗里德里希•尼采(Friedrich  Nietzsche )始创的对希腊悲剧的划分方法，把祖尼人与其他北美土著进行比较。
en: Benedict contrasts the Zuñi to them, using a distinction invented by the nineteenth-century philosopher and literary critic, Friedrich Nietzsche.

zh: 尼采认为希腊悲剧中有两种因素：“日神精神”和“酒神精神”。
en: He had distinguished two elements of Greek tragedy: the ‘Apollonian’ and the ‘Dionysian’.

zh: 日神精神指审慎、克制、和谐。酒神精神指情感、激情、无节制。
en: The Apollonian aspect is that of measure, restraint, and harmony; the Dionysian aspect, that of emotion, passion, and excess.

zh: 后来，拉德克利夫－布 朗 (Radcliffe - Brown 1952 [1924]: 15 - 31) 和列维－斯特劳斯（Lévi - Strauss 1963 [ 1945 ] : 31 - 54 ) 先后讨论过这种亲子和甥舅之间的经典关系。
en: Much later, RadcliVe-Brown (1952 [1924]: 15– 31) and Le ́vi-Strauss (1963 [1945]: 31–54) were to debate this classic set of relations between a boy and his father and a boy and his mother’s brother.

zh: 马林诺夫斯基对他特别感兴趣的“舅权" (avunculate)问题的贡献在于其论据来自深刻的田野民族志洞察力，而不仅仅来自跨文化比较。
en: What makes Malinowski’s contribution to the ‘avunculate’ problem of special interest is that his argument is from deep ethnographic insight and not simply from cross-cultural comparison.

zh: 这可能使得他具有优势，至少能对弗洛伊德的观点提出异议。

en: This is perhaps what gave him the edge, at least against Freud.

zh: 这幕戏剧开始的场景颇有一些奇特的暗示：在贝克特所经历的多数通过仪式中，通常是他自己来面对新的人生历程，并且要由自己来亲身经历各种磨难，但是这一次的仪式却完全掌握在国王的手里，国王不知不觉中成了这一仪式的始作俑者。在修道院中，贝克特完全与世俗的社会相隔绝——修道院无疑就成为一个具有中介潜质的场所。也就在此时，国王和他的贵族们也聚集在城堡中召开法律一政治会议。
en: And there is about all this still the curious suggestion of an initiation scenario: just as in many initiation rituals Becket the neophyte went through ordeal, in this case at the king's hands, the king being an unconscious initiator.Becket was enclosed from secular society in his abbey—a liminal place if ever there was—while the king and his baronry were lodged in the castle where the jural-political meetings also were held.

zh: 传教士的梦想就是一个梦想，因为它拒绝认可非洲的遗产，试图抹去那些历史。
en: The missionary dream was indeed a dream, for it refused to recognise the African legacy, and tried to wipe clean those histories.

zh: 那注定要失败，但它在牙买加人的想象中和民族归属的性别形式上留下烙印，而且后者一直延续到现在。
en: It was doomed to failure, but it has left its mark on the Jamaican imagination and on the gendered forms of national belonging which have survived into the present.

zh: 围绕着民族和民族主义的性别问题也许在军事冲突时期表现得最为尖锐，那时男人和女人的身体成为冲突的场所。
en: Gender issues around nation and nationalism are perhaps most sharply articulated during periods of military conflict, when men's and women's bodies become the site of that conflict.

zh: 那些允许大量流动的社会被称为开放的阶级社会（open-class societies)。
en: Those that permit a great deal of mobility are referred to as open-class societies.

zh: 但是，甚至在这种社会中，流动通常也比人们能够想象的更有限。
