en: In "voodoo death", for example, if the group declares a person dead, he dies.

zh: 相反，在治愈仪式中，如果群体宣称一个人好了，他就好了。
en: Conversely, in rituals of healing, if the group declares a person well, he gets well.

zh: 在这里，个体意识是如此深陷于群体意识中，以至于谈论像我们所知道的个体主义是不准确的。
en: Here individual consciousness is so deeply enmeshed with group consciousness that it is not accurate to speak of individualism as we know it.

zh: 的确，自20世纪60年代以来，巫技在美国开始经历某种程度的繁荣，并不只有北美人才相信巫技。
en: Although many North Americans suppose witchcraft is something that belongs to a less enlightened past, in fact, it is alive and well in the United States today.Indeed, starting in the 1960s, witchcraft began to undergo something of a boom in this country.

zh: 例如，虽然尼日利亚的伊比比奥人已经接受了越来越多的现代教育和科学训练，但他们在解释不幸事件时，对巫术的依赖性却增强了此外，经常是伊比比奥社会中受过较多教育的年轻人指控别人对自己施巫术。
en: North Americans are by no means alone in this; for example, as the Ibibio of Nigeria have become increasingly exposed to modern education and scientific training, their reliance on witchcraft as an explanation for misfortune has increased.Furthermore, it is often the younger, more educated members of Ibibio society who accuse others of bewitching them.

zh: 而受到指控的通常是社会中更年老和更传统的成员；因此，我们有一种代际敌意的表现方式，这种敌意往往存在于快速变迁的社会之中。
en: Frequently, the accused are the older, more traditional members of society; thus we have an expression of the intergenerational hostility that often exists in fast-changing traditional societies.

zh: 尽管很多北美人相信，巫技只属于未开化 的过去时代的东西，但事实上，在今天的美国它依然存在，而且很兴盛。
“无家可归者（the unhomely)”是霍米·巴哈巴哈（Homi Bhabha) 创造的词，用来概括那些“没有家的人”——难民、移民、被殖民者、解放的奴隶、妇女和同性恋者——的困境，这些人“在系统内”是没有家的。
en: "The unhomely" is a Homi Bhabha turn of phrase (1994) which he employs to highlight the plight of "unhomeliness" of all those people—refugees, migrants, the colonized, ex-slaves, women, gays—who have no home within "the system".

zh: 今天，世界上大多数土著居民都被划到了这个范围里。
en: Today, most indigenous peoples of the world also belong to this category.

zh: 作为一种建构，它被用来指一种“混合”的状态（既不在这儿，也不在那儿），同时也适用于后殖民的争论。
en: As a construct it refers to the state of "hybridity" (being neither here nor there), and as such is situated within post-colonial debate.

zh: 经验告诉人们，他们所自鸣得意地对之抱有幻想的无限权力，始终是他的弱点的一个根源。他对事物的控制权，只有当他承认事物有其自己的本性，并使自已甘心情愿地了解这一本性时，才真正地产生出来，然而，这种反复重现的经验却为人视而不见。
en: In vain have repeated experiences taught him that this omnipotence, the illusion of which he complacently entertains, has always been a cause of weakness in him; that his power over things really began only when he recognized that they have a nature of their own, and resigned himself to learning this nature from them.

zh: 为其他科学所摒弃的上述可悲的偏见，却牢牢地盘踞在社会学[文化学]之中。
en: Rejected by all other sciences, this deplorable prejudice stubbornly maintains itself in sociology [culturology].

zh: 再也没有比把我们的科学从这种偏见中解脱出来更为紧迫的任务了，而这正是我们努力所欲达到的目的。
en: Nothing is more urgent than to liberate our science from it, and this is the principal purpose of our efforts.

zh: 无言贸易（silent trade）是不进行口头交流的物物交换的一种特殊形式。
en: Silent trade is a specialized form of barter with no verbal communication.

zh: 其实，它可能根本没有面对面的接触。
en: In fact, it may involve no actual face-to-face contact at all.

zh: 这种情况经常是寻食民族与其生产食物的邻居之间交易的特征，因为在过去大约2000年的时间里前者已提供世界经济所需的各种各样的商品。
en: Such cases often have characterized the dealings between foodforaging peoples and their food-producing neighbors, as the former have supplied for the past 2000 years various commodities in demand by the world economy.

zh: 但是，他指出，这并不意味着我们应当追求一种统一的波普尔式的真理王国，而是像保罗˙费耶阿本德(Paul Feyembend)那样，我们应尽可能开放地让我们的选择接受探询。
en: But, he argues, this does not imply that we should search for a unified Popperian realm of the true; rather, a la Paul Feyerabend, we should keep our options in inquiry as open as possible.

zh: 哈金提醒我们，古希腊人没有统计学的槪念，并且从未使用过统计方法，这一事实既未使古希腊科学、也未使统计学失去其价值。
en: The Greeks, Hacking reminds us, h a d no concept, or use, of statistics, a fact that invalidates neither Greek science nor statistics as such.

zh: 这一立场并不是相对主义的，但也不是经验主义的。
en: This position is not relativism, but it is not imperialism either.

zh: 罗蒂将他眼中的这一切命名为解释学，哈金则称其为“无政府的理性主义"（Anarcho-rationalism)。
en: Rorty calls his version of all this hermeneutics.Hacking calls his anarcho-rationalism.

zh: 无政府的理性主义是把“对他人的宽容与自身的真理和理性标准相结合”（第65页）。
en: "Anarcho-rationalism is tolerance for other people combined with the discipline of one's own standards o f truth and reason" (65).

zh: 在此，让我们将其称为良善的科学。
en: Let us call it good science.

zh: 宗教的程序远不是理性的和解释性的行为，也不是以试验定理或对理性构想的假设的验证为基础的。
en: The procedure is far from being intellectual or explanatory activity, based on experimental propositions or the testing of rationally formulated hypotheses.

zh: 宗教根本就不是基于一个机械论的宇宙，就宗教信仰对待经验事实、原因和功能的态度来说（在努尔人中，乱伦导致麻风病），这些对它们的目标都是第二位的，并且是被直觉地诗意地获得的，完全没有通过理论或试验的中介。
en: Religion is not grounded in a mechanistic universe at all, and to the extent that religious beliefs treat empirical facts, causes and functions ("among the Nuer, incest causes leprosy"), then these are secondary to their main purpose, and arrived at intuitively or poetically, and without theoretical or experimental mediation.

zh: 更确切地说，宗教仪式和信仰的主要目标是，通过诅咒、牺牲和祈祷去影响一个充满人格化的现实的有目的的宇宙。
en: The main purpose of religious ritual and belief is, rather, to influence, by imprecation, sacrifice and prayer, an intentioning universe replete with personalized beings.

zh: 在20世纪50年代以前，虽然“肢体语言”很少得到科学的关注，但自那时起, 特别在北美人那里有许多研宄。
en: Although little scientific notice was taken of body language prior to the 1950s, since then a great deal of research, particularly among North Americans, has occurred.

zh: 然而，跨文化研究已经表明，全世界在诸如微笑、 笑、哭，以及愤怒的面部表情等基本面部表情方面有许多相似之处。
en: Cross-cultural research has shown, however, many similarities around the world for such basic facial expressions as smiling, laughing, crying, and variations of anger.

zh: 我们从灵长目动物祖先那里遗传来的这种得意的笑、皱眉等等，很少需要学习，而且比习惯的姿势更难“伪装”。
en: Such smirks, frowns, and so forth that we have inherited from our primate ancestry require little learning and are harder to fake than conventional gestures.

zh: 全世界在远距离打招呼的惯例方面都很相似。
en: Great similarity, too, exists around the world in the routine for greeting over a distance.

zh: 社会结构并非自成一格，也不是靠惯性存在，而是有赖于各个个体持续的有意识的协调行动来进行延伸、生长和维系（Holy and Stuchlik 1981; 15-16）。
en: Social structure, here, is not sui generis, and does not exist through inertia; it depends on the continuing, conscious, concerted activity of different individuals to intend, produce and sustain it (cf. Holy and Stuchlik 1981:15–16).

zh: 而且社会结构并非总是导致一致性、稳定性、连续性或者协调。
en: Furthermore, social structure does not inexorably give rise to homogeneity, stability, consistency or communication.

zh: 作为散漫的俗语和一种编造，它总是创造性解释的主题，个体操纵和再演绎的对象，改变文化的行动的靶心（Handler and Segal 1990: 87）.
en: As a discursive idiom, a fiction, it is always subject to creative interpretation, to individualmanipulation and re-rendering, to ‘alter-cultural action’ (Handler and Segal 1990:87).

zh: 人类学已经开始以这种方式更加致力于弥合民族志描述中习俗与创造、社会结构与个体能动性之间的间隙。
en: In this way, anthropology has begun more concertedly to fill in the gaps in the ethnographic record of relations between convention and creativity, social structure and individual agency.

zh: 这些人中最著名的无疑要数詹姆斯·乔治·弗雷泽爵士（James George Frazer, 1854-1941）。作为一位正统派学者，弗雷泽在三一学院和剑桥拥有教职，终其一生都在编纂和精简他那部研究巫术和宗教的13卷本《金枝》。这一时期的英国人类学作品有许多共同的特征。
en: The most famous of them all was no doubt Sir James George Frazer (1854–1941), a classical scholar who held a fellowship at Trinity College, Cambridge, and spent his life compiling and abridging his thirteen-volume study of magic and religion named The Golden Bough.The work of this period in British anthropology has a number of shared features.

zh: 它们全部都是以现成的文字材料而非直接的田野观察为基础，遵照研究经典和历史的学者所设定下的模式。
en: It is all based on written sources, not direct field observation, conforming to the pattern set by the scholars of classics and history.

zh: 就如在入类种群中常见的那样，这些旧石器时代晚期民族（Upper Paleolithic Peoples）也显出身体方面相当大的差异，但是，一般说来，他们都具有独特的现代人模样的面部。
en: As is usual in human populations, these Upper Paleolithic peoples reveal considerable physical variability, but, generally speaking, they all had characteristically modern-looking faces.

zh: 就如我们在讨论直立人时指出的那样，专门的工具和烹饪，通过逐步承担曾经由大的牙齿和有力的颌担当的咀嚼和软化功能，有助于达到这种现代化。
en: As suggested in our discussion of Homo erectus, specialized tools and cooking helped achieve this modernization by gradually assuming the chewing and softening functions once served by large teeth and heavy jaws.

zh: 自然选择看来已有助于咀嚼肌的减少,因而这些肌肉附着其上的骨头也变得不太大了。
en: Selection seems to have favored diminished muscles for chewing, and consequently the bones these muscles were attached to became less massive.

zh: 当人类学家从不同的角度对现代化理论提出批评时，一个主要的替代理论却来自人类学之外，它由经济学家安德烈˙冈德˙弗兰克（Andre Gunder Frank)提出。
en: While anthropologists were offering critiques of modernization theory from a variety of perspectives, a major alternative came from outside of anthropology, from the economist Andre Gunder Frank.

zh: 其观点的前身可以在早期的马克思主义文献以及冈纳˙米达尔（Gunnar Myrdal)和一些拉美发展经济学家的著作中觅得端愧，但依附理论（dependency theory)仍然主要是通过弗兰克进入到人类学中的。
en: His ideas had precursors in the earlier Marxist literature and in the writings of Gunnar Myrdal and some Latin American development economists, but it was mainly through Frank that dependency theory entered anthropology.

zh: 根据他的“不发达的发展”（the development of underdevelopment)概念，弗兰克指出从不发达到发展并不是一个线性序列，相反，它们是一个硬币的正反两面，是资本主义内部矛盾的表现形式（Frank 1966，1967)。
en: With his notion of "the development of underdevelopment," Frank argued that there was not a linear sequence from underdevelopment to development; rather, these were opposite sides of the same coin, manifestations of internal contradictions of capitalism (Frank 1966, 1967).

zh: 另一方面，安东尼的话意在说明他是反创造论者。
en: What Anthony is saying, on the other hand, is that he is anticreationist.

zh: 他相信我们有太多的肚脐，而且它们绝对必要。
en: He believes that we have this plethora of navels and that they are absolutely essential.

zh: 他说，现代主义只讲述了一半故事，我想这是我与他之间分歧的症结所在。
en: He says – and I think this is the crux of the disagreement between us – that modernism only tells half the story.

zh: 但是，即便现代主义只讲述了一半故事，与我而言也足矣。
en: But if it tells half the story, that is enough for me.

zh: 我们看到人类学的现实主义并非纯粹的价值无涉，不过是一种相当独特的色彩性很强表达方式。
en: We see then that anthropological realism is not an innocent, value-free task, for it is a highly coloured presentation of a very specific kind.

zh: 作为对“关于他者的事实”的创造而非表达，它有着自己的“现实影响力”（Mason 1990)。
en: As such it is a creation of "the reality of the other", and not a representation; as a creation it has its own "reality effect" (cf. Mason 1990).

zh: 这种表达方式和其他人文学科在试图与自然科学匹配中所创造的对他者的想象世界一样取得自身的位置并获得特定的权力。
en: Such presentations acquire their special signifying power by taking their place within a network of other imaginary worlds also created in the modernist spirit by the rest of the human sciences as they made their fit with the natural sciences.

zh: 他们很少说明这里所说的“复杂性”意谓着什么，更不曾试图证明现象的复杂性势必意味着科学成就的不足。
en: They seldom explain what they mean by "complexity," and more rarely do they attempt to prove that complexity of phenomena must mean meagerness of scientific achievement.

zh: 他们仅仅假设，首先，人人都通晓复杂性的含义；其次，他们设想，复杂性无可争辩地意谓着困难。
en: They merely assume, in the first place, that everyone knows what is meant by complexity, and,in the second place, they assume without argument that complexity means difEculty.

zh: 我们认为这样的推论是毫无根据的。
en: We regard their reasoning as unsound.

zh: 在“难以科学地探讨”的意义上，社会现象并不比物理现象和生理现象更为复杂。
en: Social phenomena arc no more complex in the sense of "difficult to treat scientifically" than physical or physiological phenomena.

zh: 然而当我用受访者的语言同他们交谈的时候（刚开始的时候这对我而言是极为困难的），一种被巴塞尔˙伯恩斯坦（Basil Bernstein）称作话语的“限制性符码”（restricted code of discourse）的规则便显著地表现出来。
en: But when I conversed with informants in their own tongue (however ineptly, at first, on my part), there prevailed the conventions of what Basil Bernstein has called a "restricted code" of discourse.

zh: 文化以及社会结构的很多前提和属性都被省略，和受访者使用同样的语言看来意味着对这种文化的价值观念和信仰的认同。
en: Many premises and features of culture and social structure were left unstated; use of a common language implied a consensus as to values and beliefs.

zh: 如此一来，受访者似乎也就忽略了交谈的双方是否具有共同的经验、动机以及情感等因素了。
en: Shared experience, motives, and feelings were also taken for granted.

zh: 借助翻译的访谈迫使受访者在谈论他们的习俗和信仰之前必须三思而后行，更确切地说，类似的情形迫使受访者意识到了规则的存在，而在此之前他们可能仅仅隐约感觉到自己的谈话是否恰当。
en: The translation situation forced informants to think carefully before they spoke about their customs and beliefs and, indeed, compelled them to become aware of principle and regularity where before there was merely an obscure sense of fitness.

zh: 乡村牧歌的概念关注的是在城市势不可挡的发展的社会文化背景下，“乡村”所具有的某些意义和价值。
en: The concept of the rural idyll concerns the way that "the rural" possesses a certain meaning and value in socio-cultural milieux which are overwhelmingly urban.

zh: 它是关于人们在多大程度上根据自己声称的“乡村性”或“城市性”来斟酌自己的身份和使自己的生活风格有意义，尤其是“乡村”如何成为了更自然、完整和和谐的生活方式的宝库（Strathern 1982)。
en: It pertains to the extent to which people measure their identities and make sense of their lifestyles in terms of their purported "rurality" or "urbanity", and, in particular, how "the rural" comes to be a repository for ways of life which are regarded as more natural, holistic and harmonious (cf. Strathern 1982).

zh: 人类学家和他们对乡村共同体及共产主义的描述也以这祥的方式受到了 “乡村”概念的影响。
en: Among those affected in this way by notions of the rural can be included anthropologists and their depictions of village communities and of communitarianism.

zh: 贝尔诺随后参与了在列维-斯特劳斯的支持下进行的一项对一个法国北部乡村社区的初期人类学研究（Bernot and Blancard 1953）。
en: Bernot then participated in an early anthropological study of a northern French rural community under the auspices of Lévi-Strauss (Bernot and Blancard 1953).

zh: 1951-1952年间，他在马尔马人（Marma）中做田野研究。这是一个讲藏缅语并生活在当时还属于东巴基斯坦（现在是孟加拉国）吉大港地区的族群。他在1970年代把这次调查扩展到了对缅甸的研究（Bernot and Bernot 1958；Bernot 1967a,1967b）。
en: In 1951-1952 he was with the Marma, a Tibeto-Burmesespeaking group in the Chittagong area of what was then East Pakistan (now Bangladesh), which he extended into a study of Burma in the 1970s (see Bernot and Bernot 1958; Bernot 1967a，1967b).

zh: 有点战战兢兢地编出这样一本有争议的论文集，希望它得到严肃的对待，面不是简单的反对，比如，说它是对科学的又一次攻击抑是或相对主义的煽动。
en: One launches a controversial collection like this with some trepidation, hoping it will be seriously engaged — not simply rejected, for example, as another attack on science or an incitement to relativism.

zh: 诸如这样的反对意见至少应该说清楚，为什么对于民族志学者所做的主要事情——这就是写作一一的切近分析，不应该在对科学研究结果的评估中占据核心地位，本书中的作者没人认为任何文化描述都一样好坏。
en: Rejections of this kind should at least make clear why close analysis of one of the principal things ethnographers do — that is, write — should not be central to evaluation of the results of scientific research.The authors in this volume do not suggest that one cultural account is as good as any other.

zh: 如果他们支持一种如此无足轻重和自我拆台的相对主义，他们就不会投入那么多精力冒着惹麻烦的风险写那么详尽的、批判性文章了。
en: If they espoused so trivial and self-refuting a relativism, they would not have gone to the trouble of writing detailed, committed, critical studies.

zh: 相异性这一概念只是在20世纪90年代以来才在人类学的词汇中获得重要的位置。
en: The concept of alterity has only recently, in the 1990s, acquired an important place within the vocabulary of anthropology.

zh: “他者”的概念作为人类学的主要关怀被广泛接受，导致过去二十年中众多作品深深卷入对那些冠名为“某种主义”的现代思想（进化主义、功能主义、结构主义如此等等）的批判，这些现代思想曾经代表着西方文明中的帝国主义和资本主义。
en: This more general acceptance of the notion of ‘otherness’ as a major concern for anthropological consideration comes in the wake of innumerable writings over the past two decades that have been seriously engaged in a critique of all those grand ‘isms’ of modernist thought (evolutionism, functionalism, structuralism, and so forth) that are implicated in Western civilization’s imperialist and capitalist past.

zh: 这一思潮的显著特点是总在模糊哲学、社会学、人类学和历史学这些学科之间的界限。
en: A striking characteristic of this literature is that it consistently blurs the boundaries normally held between such disciplines as philosophy, sociology, anthropology, history.

zh: 例如“社会学家”鲍曼（Zygmunt Bauman）的著作涉及人文学科中的众多相邻领域，也涉及文学和文化研究。
en: For instance, the writings of Zygmunt Bauman, a ‘sociologist’, are relevant to all the neighbouring fields of study within the human sciences, and also those of literary and cultural studies.

zh: 跨学科的两个志趣和突出的特征是：（1）除非谁完全了解内情，否则往往很难指出一个学者归属哪个学科；（2）社会科学和人文学科间传统的学科界限基本上正在消融。
en: Two very interesting and significant results of such crossing of disciplinary boundaries are that (1) unless one is ‘in the know’ it is often very difficult to pinpoint the author’s disciplinary attachment, and (2) the traditional boundaries between the social sciences and the humanities are being systematically dissolved.

zh: 造成后者的原因源于近来关于“相异性”的讨论，换句话说，关于相异的客观化的他者的概念和比较，已经动摇了对人文学科及其所声称的科学权威和客观性的固有信任的基础。
en: The reason for the latter is that the primary resolve of this recent talk about ‘alterity’—about, in other words, the concept and treatment of the alien objectified other—is to shake the foundation of the objectifying thrust of the human sciences, along with all its claims of scientific authority and objectivity.

zh: 而且图恩瓦尔德在一些人的学术晋升方面起到了很大作用，如英格堡·赛多（Ingeborg Sydow）和伊娃·尤斯廷，这些人积极地帮助——正如在后者的论文中反映的——将集中营里的罗马人、辛迪人和犹太人推向死亡。然而，图恩瓦尔德成为德语国家所有人类学家中最著名的一位并非偶然。
en: Moreover, Thurnwald substantially contributed to the academic promotion of some persons, like Ingeborg Sydow and Eva Justin, who actively helped—as was reflected in the latter’s thesis—to send Roma, Sinti, and Jews to death in concentration camps.Yet it is no coincidence that Thurnwald stands out as one of the best known anthropologists of all time from the German-speaking countries.

zh: 有鉴于他那极富争议的一生所固有的象征意义，他的这种特殊地位仍然还要维持一段时间也许倒是个好事。
en: Perhaps it is good that this will remain so for a while to come, given the inherent symbolism of his profoundly contradictory biography.

zh: 在出神的第三个也是最深的阶段，主体不再是他们的幻觉的观察者，而倒像是这些幻觉的一部分了。
en: In the third and deepest trance stage, subjects cease to be observers of their hallucinations but seem to become part of them.

zh: 当这种情况发生的时候，他们感到自己正在经过一个旋转的隧道或者一个有着格子状侧壁的旋涡，在那上面浮现出动物、人和各种怪物的形象。
en: As this happens, they feel themselves passing into a rotating tunnel or vortex with latticelike sides and on which appear images of animals, humans, and monsters of various sorts.

zh: 在这一过程中，早期阶段产生的各种内视形式被整合进了这些所谓的肖像意象（iconicimages）之中。
en: In the process, the entoptic forms of the earlier stages become integrated into these iconic images, as they are called.

zh: 内视图案离开主要的意象就很难被看出来，尽管有时候它们看起来像是一种背景。
en: The entoptics may be hard to discern apart from the main image, although sometimes they appear as a kind of background.

zh: 肖像意象是因文化而异的，个体看见的是他们的文化 让他们看见的东西，这些意象往往含有很强的情绪性内容。
en: Iconic images are culture specific； individuals "see" what their culture disposes them to see; often these images have high emotional content.

zh: 特罗布里恩德人是园艺农业者，他们的主食是山药（一种富含碳水化合物的块茎植物）。
en: The Trobrianders are horticulturalists and the staple food is the yam (a tuber rich in carbohydrates).

zh: 但每个家户耕种的首要目的并非用于个人消费，实际上却是为了他们的母系亲戚而种植山药。
en: However, each household does not primarily cultivate yams for its own consumption.Rather, they grow yams for their matrilineal relatives.

zh: 一个男人和他的家户因此是为了他的姐妹而种山药（女人也会在园子里种些日常所需的山药，这些园地是为此目的而留下的），岛民也把山药给其他亲戚。一个男人可能会对那些由其妻子的兄弟给予他的妻子的山药进行再分配。
en: A man and his household thus grow yams for the man's sister.(Women also grow some yams for daily consumption in gardens allocated to this purpose.)The islanders also give yams to other relatives, and a man may redistribute yams given to his wife by her brothers.

zh: 消极互惠（negative reciprocity）是交换的第三种形式。在消极互惠中赠与人试图在交易中胜出。
en: Negative reciprocity is a third form of reciprocity exchange, in which the giver tries to get the better end of the deal.

zh: 交易双方有着对立的利益，通常是不同社区的成员，而且关系不太密切。
en: The parties involved have opposing interests, usually are members of different communities, and are not closely related.

zh: 消极互惠的极端形式是用暴力把东西抢走。
en: The ultimate form of negative reciprocity is to take something by force.

zh: 不太极端的形式包括欺诈、诈骗或至少拼命讨价还价。
en: Less extreme forms involve guile and deception or, at the least, hard bargaining.

zh: 在美国，一个例子也许是对汽车销售员的一种刻板印象：他声称那辆汽车“是老小姐上教堂驾驶的”，而事实并非如此，或许在它拍卖出去后不久，问题就逐渐显露出来了。
en: In the United States, an example would be the stereotype of the car salesperson who claims a car was "driven by a little old lady to church" when in fact it was not and is likely to develop problems soon after it leaves the sales lot.

zh: 据人类学家克莱德·克拉克洪的报道，在美国西南部的纳瓦霍人中，“在与外来人交易时，从伦理角度上说，欺骗是为公众所接受的。”
en: Among the Navajo, according to anthropologist Clyde Kluck- hohn, "to deceive when trading with foreign peoples is morally accepted".

zh: 先秦巴蜀地区各族，除巴、蜀两族外，主要为百濮和氐羌两大民族系统。巴蜀地区的百濮，多为商周时代即已在当地定居的族群，也有春秋时代从江汉地区迁徙而来的濮人支系，主要分布在四川盆地、四川西南和四川东部。
en: Baipu and Diqiang were the main ethnic groups in the BaShu region in the Pre-Qin period besides the Ba and Shu nationalities.Most of the Baipu ethnic group had settled in the BaShu region in the Shang and Zhou dynasties, but a small party migrated there during the Spring and Autumn period and were distributed mainly in the Sichuan Basin, Southwest Sichuan and East Sichuan.

zh: 巴蜀地区的氐羌民族系统至少在夏商时代就已出现，主要分布在川西高原。
en: Main party of the Diqiang ethnic groups were distributed in the West Sichuan Plateau, who had appeared in BaShu as early as the Xia and the Shang dynasty.

zh: 拜树节是仡佬族民间传统节日，流行于广西隆林等地。
en: Baishu Festival is a Gelao traditional folk festival that is in particular prevalent in Longlin,Guangxi province.

zh: 拜树节这天家家户户带上酒、肉、糯米饭、鞭炮，轮流向房前屋后及山上的树木举行仪式，预祝林木旺盛，果树丰收，并刨掉树根周围的野草，选远山上一棵高大的树作"代表"去拜。
en: On this day every household takes out wine, meat, rice, and firecrackers, and the family members take turns to conduct specific rituals towards the trees in front of and and behind their house.They wish the trees to grow stronger in hope of a fruit harvest, and they remove the weeds around the roots of these trees.They also choose to worship a tall tree on a distant hillside.

zh: 拜树节后全寨就自发地进行造林活动，形成习俗，成了绿树造林的一个好传统。
en: After the Baishu Festival, they spontaneously carry out afforestation activities, which has become a good tradition of planting trees.

zh: 根据所提出的界定礼器的标准，认为山东龙山文化时期已经形成了一套礼器组合——以黑陶器物群为主、包括白陶鬶在内的陶礼器，由玉冠饰、玉钺、玉锛等玉器组合而成的玉礼器及少量的乐礼器。
en: ：According to the standard for ritual vessels, a combination of ritual vessel had been formulated during Shandong Longshan Culture, which included the pottery ritual vessels featuring black potteries and white pottery Gui, and the jade ritual vessels featuring jade crown jewel, jade tomahawk, jade adz,as well as the ritual vessels for playing music.

zh: 以此为基础，对山东龙山文化礼器的总体特征、承继关系、传播影响及发展演变等问题作进一步探讨，对山东龙山文化礼器的艺术特点及对后世艺术的影响作综合分析，对山东龙山文化礼器与文明起源的关系问题进行研究。
en: On the basis of this research, this article discussed about the overall characteristic, inheritance, evolution and influence of the ritual vessels that belonged to the Shandong Longshan Culture.Besides, this article makes an analysis about the artistic characteristics of the ritual vessels of Shandong Longshan Culture.Finally, this article discusses the relationship between the ritual vessels of Shandong Longshan Culture and the origin of the civilization.

zh: 通过研究山东龙山文化礼器，为海岱地区及其它地区新石器时代礼器乃至整个新石器时代礼器的发展历程提供一套系统的研究模式。
en: The main purpose of this article is to provide a systematic model for the research on the development of ritual vessels of Haidai region and other regions of the Neolithic Age, by researching the ritual vessels of Shandong Longshan Culture.

zh: 关于春秋时代晋县的性质，学术界多认为是卿大夫的采邑。
en: Lots of scholars regard counties of Jin in the Spring and Autumn Period as the feuds of the ministers and high officials.

zh: 但从晋县主官不世袭和赋税受国家支配等情况来看，晋县当为国君的直属地。
en: However, according to the facts that the position of major officials couldn't be inherited and the taxes were dominated by the country, counties of Jin should be the territories directly subordinate to the emperor.

zh: 至于对卿大夫赏与县，是指委任其做县大夫，并非所谓的授以为采。
en: The county rewarded to ministers and high officials didn't represent the feud but rather the appointment of senior

zh: 20世纪国内藏戏研究可分为两个阶段。第一阶段是1930～1970年代末，可视为国内藏戏研究的初发期；第二阶段是1980～1990年代，可视为国内藏戏研究的兴盛期。
en: Studies on Tibetan opera in the 20th century in our country can be divided into two stages: the first stage is from 1930s till late 1970s, which can be regarded as the incipient period.
The second stage is the era from 1980s to 1990s, which can be regarded as the flourishing period.

zh: 与前一阶段相比，后一阶段有关藏戏研究的文章和论著不仅在数量上有了大幅度的提高，且在历史渊源、剧种流派划分、藏戏剧目、面具艺术、表演音乐和现状发展等研究内容方面也有了进一步的拓展和深入。
en: Comparing to the previous stage, articles and books on Tibetan opera in the later stage have not only increased in amount but also further expanded and deepened in contents including historical origins, opera divisions, opera play lists, opera masks, music performance and current researches.

zh: 民族传统节日是民族文化和文明发展的标志性符号，反映了民族的生活方式、历史传统、宗教信仰、心理特征和民族情感。
en: National traditional festivals are the symbolic symbols of national culture and civilization development, reflecting the lifestyle, historical traditions, religious beliefs, psychological characteristics and national sentiments of a minority nationality.

zh: 插花节作为彝族的传统节日之一，它的形成和发展经历了十分漫长的历史。
en: The Flower Arrangement Festival is one of the traditional festivals of the Yi people.Its formation and development have experienced a very long history.

zh: 插花节肩负着凝聚民族智慧，承载着传承民族文化的历史使命，经历了从虚幻到真实、从单一到多元、从小村落到大社会的不断变化和发展的过程。
en: The flower arrangement festival carries national wisdom, bears the mission of inheriting national culture, and has experienced the process of constant change and development from illusory to real, from single to plural, and from a small village to a big society.

zh: 闽南歌，发扬于闽南地带，在台湾则称为台语歌，流行于上世纪80年代。
en: The song of Minnan is carried forward in southern Fujian.In Taiwan, it is called the Taiwanese song.

zh: 在泉州，厦门，漳州一带非常流行，男女老少都会唱，特别是《出帆歌》，《欢喜就好》外出的闽南人有时候听到故乡的歌曲，会热泪盈眶。
en: It was prevailing in the 1980s.These folk songs are so popular in Quanzhou, Xiamen and Zhangzhou that all men,women and children can sing, especially Sailing Ballad and the Best Joy.Minnan people sometimes hear native songs abroad, and tears always come to their faces.

zh: 台湾八九十年代代表歌手有周华健、叶启田、李茂山等，进入21世纪，有林姗、黄思婷、龙千玉、蔡小虎和王识贤等。
en: Famous singers at that time include Emil Chau, Ye Qitian, Lee Mao Shan, and in the the 21st century Lin Shan, and Huang Ssu Ting, long Qian Yu, Cai Xiaohu Wang Shixian and etc.

zh: 侗族大歌作为民间歌曲中的一株艺术奇葩，在多声思维、多声形态、合唱技艺、文化内涵等方面都属举世罕见，尤其是其文化教育功能在培养人的智力因素和非智力因素方面具有鲜明特色。
en: Songs of Dong ethnic group occupies a unique position worldwide in terms of its varieties of thoughts, voices, chorus, cultural connotation, etc.The style of singing is characterized particularly by its educational function in cultivating singers on a intellectual and non-intellectual basis.

zh: 但随着时代的变迁，这一传统音乐文化的传承方式也不同程度地发生了危机。在侗族大歌变迁的脚步日趋加快的今天，我们必须要探寻出一条适合其发展的有效途径，使之成为中国乃至世界音乐文化遗产中的有机组成部分。
en: Nowadays, as the times changes, the inheritance of this traditional music culture has also experienced crisis to varying degrees, which necessiates the search for a new way to inherit the gem of ancient Chinese art, making it an integral part of the musical heritage of China and the world.

zh: 毛南族分龙节又称庙节，是广西环江毛南族最重要的传统节日。
en: Dragon Raining Festival of Maonan is also called Miao festival, which is the most important and traditional festival in Maonan, Huanjiang county, Guangxi province.

zh: 分龙节的习俗在宋代就已广泛流行于中国各地。
en: The custom of Dragon Raining Festival has become widely popular throughout China since Song Dynasty.

zh: 在历代中原文化向广西少数民族地区的传播与渗透的过程中，毛南族古老的土俗神崇拜宗教仪式受到中原和江南地区"分龙日"、"分龙节"节俗和道教文化的影响，形成了毛南族分龙节。
en: In the process of cultural transmission and permeation from the central plains of China to minority areas in Guangxi, the customs of Fenlong festival along with Taoism in the Central Plains and the regions south of the Yangtze River have had an influence on the old religious rites of worshiping local God in Maonan.In this way, Dragon raining festival of Maonan has formed．

zh: 火把节古称"星回节"，流行于滇、贵、川等地的彝、白、汉等民族之中，一般在六月下旬和十二月下旬举行，节日的意义在于以此标志新年。有学者认为，火把节与星回节来源不同。
en: Torch festival is Xinghui festival in ancient times, which is popular in Yi, Bai, Han and other ethnic groups in Yunnan, Guizhou, Sichuan and other places and generally held in late June and late December, and its significance lies in the fact that it marks the beginning of the new year．

zh: 但联系彝族历法中"一年两截"制遗迹和彝族传统的恒星观测法，可以论证这两个节日习俗有共同的原初本质和古老渊源，从文化积累角度看，"星回"是"火把"的底层。
en: However, according to the remains of "two parts a year"  and the traditional stellar observation method of the Yi people in the Yi calendar, it can be argued that these two festival customs have a common original essence and ancient origin.From the perspective of cultural accumulation, "Xinghui" is the bottom layer of a torch.

zh: 火把节起源研究启示我们，中国民族学研究应注意"高文化"问题，重视文献、文物资料对于民族文明研究的意义。
en: The study of the origin of the Torch Festival reveals us that the reasearch of Chinese ethnology should pay attention to the issue of "high culture" and attach importance to the significance of literature and cultural relics for the study of national civilization.

zh: 土家族大都深居在崇山峻岭，深山峡谷酉水流域，以伙耕水耨、渔猎山伐为业。
en: Tujia, mostly secluded in the mountains and the Youshui basin of deep valleys, make a living by group farming, water weeding, fishing, hunting, and mountain cutting.

zh: 因此，土家族民族文化，有别于其它游牧文化、高原文化与海洋文化。
en: Therefore, the Tujia ethnic culture is different from other nomadic, plateau and maritime cultures.

zh: 高山、峡谷、河流阻碍了土家文化的发展；隔断了民族文化的传播。
en: Mountains, valleys and rivers have hindered the development of Tujia culture and cut off the spread of national culture.

zh: 恰恰就是这种阻碍和隔断，铸就了土家文化的封闭性和稳定性。
en: It is precisely this kind of obstacle and partition that has created the closure and stability of Tujia culture.

zh: 教坊是赵宋王朝最重要的俗乐机构，北宋教坊覆灭于靖康二年(1127)。
en: IImperial music office was the most important secular music body in the Zhao and Song dynasties.The imperial music office in the Northern Song dynasty declined in the 2nd year of Jingkang(in 1127).

zh: 随着北宋政权的灭亡，教坊的主体——教坊乐人以各种方式大量损失，其方式大约有三种:一是在宋金战争中获罪，或被处死，或叛归金人；二是宋金战争前后，背井离乡，流落四方；三是被攻陷汴京的金军劫往金国。
en: As the Northern Song fell, the main body of the imperial music office, a lot of musicians, disappeared in various ways.Some were convicted, or sentenced to death, or became the people of Jin dynasty in the Song-Jin war;some left their hometown and became homeless before or after the Song-Jin War;others were taken to Jin by Jin soldiers who occupied Bianjing, the capital of the Northern Song dynasty, at what is Kaifeng today.

zh: 教坊乐人的流散一方面使宋代音乐文化的发展遭到了重大挫折；另一方面也促进了教坊音乐文化的传播。
en: The wandering of musicians gave a heavy blow to the music development of the Song dynasty, and on the other hand, promoted the transmission of imperial music culture.

zh: 元代宫廷尚金之俗直接推动了中国织金技术的发展，使得元代的中国织金技术达到了鼎盛时期。采用以文献资料为主、图像和实物资料的借鉴为辅的方法，分析了元代宫廷尚金之俗兴起的缘由，梳理了元代织金锦与纳石失发展脉络，认为元代尚金主要源自于金人用金风气习惯的承袭、游牧民族对贵金属特殊的爱好与追求，以及蒙古民族的文化传统，并使得元代织金锦形成了鲜明的时代特征，成为中西、南北交流的象征。
en: The gold fashion in the palace in Yuan dynasty has directly promoted the development of gold weaving technology in China, making Chinese gold weaving technology in Yuan dynasty reach a golden age.The paper analyzes the reason of emergence of gold fashion in the palace in Yuan dynasty, sets the development course of gold weaving brocade and Nasich in Yuan dynasty mainly through document literature and assistance of the reference of images and real object data, considers that the gold fashion in Yuan dynasty mainly came from the inheritance of gold using custom of Jin people, horde's special interest in and pursuit of precious metal and cultural tradition of mongols and made gold weaving brocade in Yuan dynasty form a distinct feature of the age and become a symbol of Sino-western and north-south communication.The paper further discusses functions of apparel gold weaving fabric in Yuan dynasty.

zh: 进一步探讨了元代服饰织金面料的功能，表面物服饰织金面料功用织金锦的主要用途不仅仅用于帷幔、茵褥、仪仗、舆辂等，更主要是用作服饰面料方面。
en: Functional gold weaving brocade of surface apparel gold weaving fabric is not only used for purdah, cotton-padded mattress, ceremonial weaponry, and vehicles, but more used as apparel fabric.

zh: 坎儿井是干旱地区劳动人民在适应自然环境过程中的智慧创举，是具有很高人文价值的地下水利工程，是人类宝贵的文化遗产。
en: Karez was created with the wisdom of the working people of the arid regions in the process of adaptation to the natural environment initiative, one of the underground water conservancy projects with high human value, and the precious cultural heritage of mankind.

zh: 它在我国文化史、科技史、水利史研究中具有非凡的意义，对于新疆历史的研究也具有极高的价值。
en: It has great significance in our cultural history, history of science, and irrigation history research, and has a very high value for the study of the history of Xinjiang.

zh: 科学、准确的认识坎儿井，需要多学科、多角度研究坎儿井的特点及历史发展过程，充分认识和挖掘坎儿井的文化内涵和实用价值，这对于更有效地保护和利用坎儿井这一文化遗产具有重要的现实意义。
en: Scientific and accurate understanding of the Karez requires multi-disciplinary, multi-angle studies of the Karez characteristics and historical development, fully understanding and mining Karez cultural connotation and practical value, which is of great practical significance for the effective protection and use of the Karez.

zh: 喇嘛教在内蒙古地区有着广泛的群众基础，影响到政治、经济、文化等各个领域。
en: In Inner Mongolia, with abroad mass participation Lamaism exerted influence on the fields of politics, economy, culture, etc.

zh: 以乌兰夫为首的共产党人为了解决蒙古民族全民信教所致的诸多社会问题进行了宗教改革。其重点是对喇嘛教的庙仓经济和上层喇嘛的生产资料进行社会主义改造，通过教育使喇嘛逐步转变为自食其力的劳动者，改造喇嘛庙中不合理的制度。
en: The communists led by Wulanf implemented a religious reformation to dispel various social problems resulted from mass religious belief in Lamaism, focusing on socialist transformation on the temple economy and upper-strata lamas' own production means, educating lamas for earning their own living and reforming the irrational lamasery institutions.

zh: 内蒙古宗教改革是我党解决民族问题与宗教问题的典范。
en: This religious reformation on Lamaism establishes a model of the Party's solving the religious and national problems.

zh: 勒勒车是北方草原上应用历史悠久的交通运输工具，曾在草原牧民的生活中发挥了非常重要的作用，成为蒙古族文化的一个重要特征。
en: Mongolia Lele Cart is one kind of the most important transportation tools of northern grassland in ancient China.It has played a very important role in the life of Mongolia Nation and has become an important feature of Mongolian culture.

zh: 然而随着现代物质文明的发展，勒勒车的实际应用越来越少，以至于其传统制作工艺逐渐消失。
en: However, with the development of modern economics and technology, the practical application of the Lele car has become less and less, so that the crafts of making Lele Cart are going to be lost gradually.

zh: 根据现场调查，结合文献资料，本文对这项传统工艺进行了有效记录,详细叙述了勒勒车使用的历史概况以及制作勒勒车的工艺流程。
en: According to the on-site investigation, combined with the literature, this article has effectively recorded the traditional process and has also stated in detail the procedure of making Lele Cart based on the investigation and a brief history of the application of Lele Cart as well.

zh: 在中国历史上，桂西原是一个边陲社会，明清以来经历了从"化外"到"化内"，从封闭到开放的转变过程。
en: In our view, western Guangxi is a border community and has experienced the changing process from the "thrust" into the "inside" and from a closed to an open one.

zh: 明初政府在桂西实行土司制度，保持了当地少数民族原有的村、峒"自治"传统以及"村老"治理模式。与此同时，土司为了加强社会控制能力，也引进了户籍、黄册与里甲制度。
en: In the early Ming dynast, the government implemented Chieftain System, intended to rule the suburban areas indirectly.On the one hand, Chieftain region maintained the "autonomy"　tradition of village、cave and "cun lao" governance system; on the other hand, basic-level Chieftain had introduced Residence、Yellow Book and Lijia systems.

zh: 土州县的里甲主要行使赋役征派职能，但编户数目偏少，赋税较轻，而兵役负担较重。
en: Tax-collection was the the main function performed by Lijia of the Soil County, but the number of the household is small.The tax burden was light while the burden of military servic was heavier.

zh: 广西的俍与"傜僮"的界限是以进入里甲系统为标准的，可见里甲还有族群区分的意义。
en: Whether or not entering the Lijia system was the standard to draw the boundary between "lang soldiers" and "Yao zhuang" of Guangxi.It follows that it was meaningful for Lijia to distinguish ethnic groups.

zh: 明清时期，桂西土州县的"俍人"村寨，基本上被编入里甲体系，从而被视同"民村"。
en: In the Late Ming dynasty, the village of "lang sodiers" of the Soil County in West Guangxi, was basically compiled into the Lijia system, which was regarded as a "village of people".

zh: 清中期，作为基层行政组织的里甲体制基本终结，个别地方则一直延续到民国时期。
en: In the middle period of the Qing dynasty, as a basic administative organization, Lijia system ended by and large, with some places continuing the system until the Republican period.

zh: 佤族猎头祭鬼和剽牛祭神的仪式和内容，为我们展示出了原始宗教仪式的典型方式，即有血(猎头)有肉(剽牛)。
en: Head-hunting and ox-slaughtering as a religious sacrifice of the Va people, characterizes the primitive religious sacrifice.

zh: 人头祭是人对神最彻底的信服，牺牲肉体，奉献头颅；剽牛祭，对神最虔诚的态度，献上最好的食物牛肉和牛头。
en: Offering the head of a man and oxasa sacrifice expressed men's full devotion and pious attitude to the god, in which man is willing to dedicate the best food or even themselves to the deity.

zh: 猎头祭鬼和剽牛祭神，是佤族文化的重要特征，同时在原始宗教仪式中具有典型代表性。
en: This typical sacrificial rite displays the features of the Wa Culture.

zh: 桂林饮食文化历史悠久，特色鲜明。
en: Guilin catering culture boasts its longstanding history and distinctive features.Local rice cultivation culture also has a long history.

zh: 本土稻作文化源远流长，秦代灵渠的开凿沟通了中原与岭南，也促成了桂林米粉的产生；佛教从印度传入桂林，也为桂林带来了马蹄；桂林三花酒在宋代已经名扬湖广；桂林食狗保留了中原汉族饮食孑遗。
en: The construction of the Lingqu canal in the Qin dynasty contributed to the communication between Zhongyuan areas and Lingnan areas as well as the birth of Guilin rice noodles.Introduction of Buddhism into Guilin from india, introduced water-chestnut into Guilin.Guilin Sanhua liquor was a household name across Zhongyuan and Lingnan areas.Guilin customary practice of eating dogs preserves epibiotic catering practice of the Han nationality in Zhongyuan areas.

zh: 这些特色美食为桂林饮食文化增色颇多。
en: Those discussed cuisines glorify Guilin catering culture.

zh: 西汉成帝在位期间修建了两座陵墓: 延陵与昌陵。
en: Emperor Cheng of the Western Han dynasty built two mausoleums during his reign, i.e., the Yan Mausoleum and the Chang Mausoleum.

zh: 延陵位于咸阳原上的西汉主陵区内，地理形势和历史传统十分优越；昌陵位于汉长安城东南的戏乡，地势平坦，交通便利。
en: The Yan Mausoleum is situated inside the main mausoleum area of the Westerm Han dyansty on Xiangyang hills, having quite a favorable position and historical tradition, while Chang Mausoleum is situated in the Xi Township in the southeast of Han's capital---- Chang'an, having a flat terrain and convenient communications.

zh: 昌陵是在延陵建设了近十年之后开始修建的，由于其所在地势等原因，建设了五年即被放弃，又返回延陵。
en: The Chang Mausoleum was initiated after nearly a decade of the construction of the Yan Mausoleum.For a mumber of reasons such as its physiognomy, Chang Mausoleum was abandoned after five years of construction and returned to Yan Mausoleum.

zh: 广西北部湾经济区的文化原型就是骆越文化。骆越文化历史悠久、内涵丰富。
en: The cultural prototype of Guangxi Beibu Gulf Economic Zone is Luo Yue culture, which evolves in a long history and enjoys rich connotation.

zh: 稻作文化是骆越文化的本质，它磨炼了骆越人及其后裔的性格；骆越古医药文化是骆越文化的衍生及其扩展，使骆越后裔得以长寿；铜鼓文化是骆越文化在文化艺术宗教信仰等方面的载体，使骆越人及其后裔的精神生活得以丰富。
en: The rice culture is seen as the essence of Luo Yue culture, forging the personalities of Luo Yue people and their descendants;the ancient medicine culture is believed to be derived and develop from Luo Yue culture, insuring longevity of the people;the drum culture is the carrier of Luo Yue Culture in the arts and religious belief and so on, enriching ideological life of local people.

zh: 骆越文化要复兴，必须实现现代转型。要实行现代转型，教育是关键，文化产业是手段。
en: Therefore, to revive Luo Yue culture requires modernizational transformation, which relies heavily on education and cultural industry.

zh: 马头琴是蒙古族特有的弓弦乐器，并且历史悠久。
en: Morinhuur is a kind of the stringed instrument of the Mongolia nationality, and has a long history.

zh: 在传统社会中不同的部落之间对马头琴类乐器有不同的称谓和演奏方式。
en: In the traditional society, the musical instruments of morihuur have different names and different play modes in different tribes.

zh: 新中国成立后马头琴艺术得以迅速发展并取得成功。
en: After the founding of new China, morinhuur art has developed rapidly and achieved success.

zh: 这种发展模式可称为"专业化"的发展模式。其中马头琴乐曲创作方面取得了最为瞩目的成绩。
en: This kind of development mode can be described as "specialized", with which the morinhuur has achieved impressive success in terms of its musical creation.

zh: 苗族古歌对于苗族来说是百科全书般的史诗，是对苗族的历史和文化的综合反映。
en: The Miao epic song, an encyclopedia-like epic poem for the Miao ethnic minority, is a comprehensive reflection of the history and culture of the Miao people.

zh: 苗族古歌表达了丰富的文化信息和元素，所以它是创意产业发展的重要文化资源。
en: The Miao epic song boasts rich cultural information and elements, so it is an important cultural resource for the development of the creativity industry.

zh: 利用其独有的特色，把苗族古歌发展为一种文化产品是有其可行性和实用性的。
en: It is feasible and practical to develop the Miao epic song into a cultural product with its unique characteristics.

zh: 1912 年民国肇兴，千年帝制宣告终结，财产的重新分配问题也伴随而来。
en: After the founding of the Republic of China in 1912, the feudal monarchies in China as long as more than 2000 years ended.And with it comes the division of property.

zh: 河北旗地，这一清代所特有的土地形态，随着朝代更替，因其归属及地域的特殊性而在新的时代中引发了错综复杂、涉及深广的利益争夺。
en: The banner legacy in Hebei, one special land of the Qing dynasty, raised the complex competition due to its particularity of ownership and location.

zh: 对此，民国政府成立了专门机构对其进行了较长时间的清理和处分。
en: Therefore, the special institution was established to resolve the banner legacy for a long time by the government of the Republic of China.

zh: 辛店文化的墓葬形制以长方形竖穴土坑墓为主，还有一些横穴洞室墓。
en: In Xindian culture, the tomb construction are dominated by the rectangle tombs with vertical earthen shaft graves besides catacombs.

zh: 葬式以仰身直肢葬为主，其次为二次葬与屈肢葬。
en: Funeral customs are dominated by backward extended burials, besides twice burials and flexed burials.

zh: 随葬陶容器的数量不太多，常见的有双耳陶罐、彩陶壶与双大耳彩陶罐等。
en: Accessories of pottery vessels in buries are not too many, and the most common vessels of pottery are two-handled earthenware jars, painted pottery pots and two big ear painted earthenware jars.

zh: 辛店文化的经济形态应是以农业为主，兼营畜牧和狩猎的混合经济。
en: The economy of Xindian culture is based on the agriculture, and it is also a mixed economy of animal husbandry and hunting.

zh: 辛店文化的族属可能就是青铜时代中国西北地区的古代羌人。
en: The clan of Xindian culture probably dates to the Qiang people in northwestern China during the Bronze Age.

zh: 《老子》是中国传统文化的重要经典之一，老子将"慈"、"俭"和"不敢为天下先"视为"三宝"。
en: Laozi is one of the important classics of the Chinese traditional culture.Laozi has regarded kindness, thrift and  not being the first as the three treasures.

zh: "慈"即爱民，"以百姓之心为心"，"俭"即俭朴、寡欲，反对奢靡，"不敢为天下先"即无为而无不为。
en: Kindness is loving the people and thinking for the people.Thrift is saving and fighting against luxury.Not Being the first is inaction.

zh: "三宝"思想具有重要的现代廉政建设价值。
en: The three-treasure theory has an important value in modern clean government construction.

zh: 挖掘"三宝"思想的廉政建设元素，为当代中国廉政建设服务。
en: And thus the three-treasure thought should be explored to help build a clean government in contemporary China.

zh: 内蒙古三河牛是我国自主培育的乳肉兼用型品种，它是呼伦贝尔各族人民一百多年来辛勤劳动的结晶。
en: Sanhe cattle in Inner Mongolia is a local dual-purpose breed formed and approved in China with more than 100 years' developing history in Hulunbuir pasture.

zh: 从1986年育成以来，三河牛以核心家系选育的方式延续严格的保种制度，在呼伦贝尔草原严酷环境中保持良好的生产性能和繁殖力。
en: Since it was approved as a breed in 1986, this breed was preserved by adopting selection within family lines in the nucleolus herd, and both its performance and reproduction efficiency were preserved under the harsh condition in Hulunbuir pasture.

zh: 虽然在近20年不断受到荷斯坦牛等高产品种的挑战，但对当地气候的高度适应性和良好的兼用性让三河牛始终立于不败之地。
en: Although Sanhe cattle was challenged by high-yield breeds during the past 20 years, such as Holstein, it remains as a major breed because it was highly adapted for the local environment and had excellent performance in meat and milk production.

zh: 西汉早期的石槨画像常见菱形纹饰、玉璧、树木、人物、楼阁等画像。
en: There were diamond ornamentations and patterns of jade discs, trees, figures, pavilions, etc. in the early Western Han dynasty mastaba.

zh: 比较当时大型墓葬的棺槨装饰得知，菱形纹饰以及玉璧画像可谓模拟当时贵族的漆棺镶玉装饰。
en: Compared with ornamentations in other large tombs at that time, the diamond ornamentation was copied from the pattern of aristocratic sarcophaguses, while the jade disc pattern was from the real jade disc of aristocratic funeral objects.

zh: 相对于此，树木纹饰可谓象征良木棺槨自身，进而象征墓上的封树等。
en: On the other hand, the tree pattern was a symbol of coffins and trees surrounding the tomb.

zh: 除此，人物纹饰则是如同人俑一般，可谓服侍墓主的象征。
en: In addition, lifelike patterns of figures were symbols of servants in tombs.

zh: 拓跋鲜卑是我国古代北方少数民族之一，曾建立北魏，统一中国北方，在历史舞台上发挥了重要作用。
en: Tuoba Xianbei is one of the northern ethnic minorities and played an important role in Chinese ancient history, which found the Northern Wei and united northern China.

zh: 在与两晋的交往中，双方在政治上建立了封赐、朝贡与质子关系，在军事上则相互联合。
en: Tuoba Xianbei and the Jin dynasty (Western Jin and Eastern Jin) built a political relation in the form of ennoblement, tribute and hostage and united in military affairs.

zh: 此外，拓跋鲜卑还十分重视对汉族士人的招抚与任用。
en: Besides, Tuoba Xianbei also attached great importance to offering amnesty and enlistment to the Han senior personage.

zh: 凉山彝族服饰种类繁多，体系复杂，异彩纷呈。彝族服饰因明快、古朴而闻名。
en: Dressings of Lis in Liangshan are various, complicated and colorful, which are also famous for their brightness and ancientness.

zh: 同时，黎族人认为男人不留胡须为最美，所以他们经常把自己的胡须刮得非常干净。
en: Meanwhile, no beard is considered beautiful by the Lis, so they shave off their beard all the time.

zh: 佛虽说“凡诸有相，皆为虚妄”，但于现世仍然通过形象来传达教理教义，以使着相的有情众生得以度脱成为可能。
en: Although Buddhism states that everything is sunya, but in order to release people in real life from attaching to appearance, images were used to deliver the messages of doctrines.

zh: 其中佛菩萨的体姿、法器、坐骑、手印等，无一不使佛教思想与典籍内容通过它们传达给人们。
en: And through diversified images of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas including their different postures, dharma-vessels,  mounts and mudras, basic ideas of Buddhism and the contents in scriptures are conveyed to common people.

zh: 我们熟悉的普贤形象，无论是显宗的还是密宗的，几乎都可以在佛经中找到用以比喻普贤思想的依据。正是这些经典的传译留存，给研究普贤形象以及挖掘蕴涵于其中的佛教思想提供了参考。
en: Different images of Samantabhadra, no matter in exotoric Buddhism or esoteric Buddhism, serve to better understand the ideas of Samantabhadra in sacred writings which are in the process of transmission and reinterpretation and lead us to either study Samantabhadra figures or dredge up the Buddhist ideas.

zh: 广西龙胜瑶族多数人的母语依然是瑶语。其中，单语人占19.15%，双语人占80.85%。
en: Yao language is still the mother tongue of Yao nationality in Longsheng, Guangxi, among whom 19.15% are monolingual and 80.85% are bilingual.

zh: 家庭内部主要使用瑶语。
en: Yao language is mainly used within a family.

zh: 在教学语言上，多数人主张在中小学使用普通话(约占三分之二)。
en: In language teaching, the majority of people have suggested the use of Mandarin in primary and secondary schools(about two-thirds).

zh: 有一半左右的瑶族，对瑶语的媒体功能、市面用语功能和用立法手段促进瑶文工作，感到信心不足。
en: About half of the Yao are not confident enough about the media features of Yao language, function of market language, legislation means to promote the work of Yao language.

zh: 瑶族对普通话的认可度较高，认为普通话有用，其认同是功能优先性的。
en: Yao people attach great recognition to Mandarin, which is regarded to be useful.Such recognition is considered from a functional perspective.

zh: 阴山风景画既既保留了本民族的文化，又具有当代的本土文化特色，发扬本土文化元素研究本土文化，积极的与当代艺术进行交融与发展，使其成为中国艺坛上不可缺少的一朵奇葩。
en: The Yinshan landscape paintings not only retain the national culture but also blend with the contemporary art.These paintings promote the native cultural elements as well as develop with the contemporary art, which makes themselves become a vital part of Chinese art.

zh: 《阴山风景系列》以阴山岩画表现内容中所反映的游牧文化为创作源点，从构图、线条、画面表现内容及表现手法上，展现草原民族天人合一的自然、真实的生活状况。
问题：语病优化：阴山风景画既既保留了本民族的文化，又具有当代的文化特色，在发扬本土文化元素研究本土文化，积极地与当代艺术进行交融与发展，使其成为中国艺坛上不可缺少的一朵奇葩。
《阴山风景系列》以阴山岩画表现内容中所反映的游牧文化为创作源点，从构图、线条、画面表现内容及表现手法上，展现草原民族天人合一的自然、真实的生活状况。
en: The Yinshan landscape series refers to the creative source of the nomadic culture reflected by the contents of Yinshan Rock paintings.The series presents the natural harmonious real life of the ethic group by composing, lining, giving surface content of pictures and techniques of expression.

zh: 白银在我国货币史上曾一度独领风骚。
en: Silver had been the most important money in Chinese monetary history.

zh: 自从明朝中后期成为我国经济交往和贸易生活的主要货币后，白银便在中国近代社会的经济发展、政治稳定和外交延伸上起着重要的历史作用。
en: Ever since it took the role as the prominent currency in the Ming dynasty in terms of business and trade, silver had played an important historic role in the economic development, political stability and diplomatic extension of China.

zh: 虽然我国不产白银，但由于当时我国以白银为最主要货币，使得世界其它国家的白银大量地流入我国。
en: Although China did not produce silver by itself, the silver of other places of the world flowed into China in large quantities due to its need of large amount of silver as the main currency.

zh: 瑶族度戒源于早期正一道的授科仪，瑶族度戒仪式中的诸多道教因素，反映出瑶族宗教道教化的特质。
en: Originating from the rite of talisman conferred in the Way of Orthodox Unity (an early sect of Taoism), the rite of dujie reflects many Taoist elements and the convert to Taoism in Yao religion.

zh: 道教在瑶族社会的传播及其与瑶民族文化相结合而发生的衍变，通过在瑶族社会具有深远影响的度戒可以得到说明。
en: The far-reaching rite also shows the spread of Taoism in the Yao society and the combination of Taoism and the native culture among the Yao people.

zh: 度戒作为瑶族吸取道教思想而形成的仪礼，在瑶族社会中发挥的宗教功能，具有深刻的人类学意义。
en: As a rite representing the Taoist thought, dujie plays a religious part with profound anthropological significance in the Yao society.

zh: 在中国，传统中秋节是历史悠久的总要节日。
en: The traditional Mid-Autumn Festival has a long history in China.

zh: 在几千年的发展进程中其早已成为人们生活不可或缺的一部分，早已成为创造与传承民族精神的重要载体。
en: During thousands of years' development, it has already become an indispensable part of people's life and an important carrier for the shaping and inheriting of national spirit.

zh: 然而，随着社会的不断进步，全球化的慢慢形成，传统中秋节日文化正被人们逐渐淡忘。
en: However, with the progress of society as well as globalization, traditional Mid-Autumn Festival culture has been gradually forgotten.

zh: 因此为了传承和发扬中国传统文化，对传统中秋节进行改革和创新使之适应现代人的需求是极有必要的。
en: Therefore, in order to inherit and carry forward traditional Chinese culture, it is quite necessary to reform and make innovation in the traditional Mid-Autumn Festival to meet the needs of modern people.

zh: 对于壮锦这一能够在新的社会语境背景下获得生存与发展空间的民族传统来说，它自身深厚的文化底蕴和现实价值是其在现代资本运作的基础。
en: For the Zhuang Brocade, which is an ethnic tradition that can survive and develop under the background of new social context, the rich cultural connotation and realistic value are the basis for its modern capital operation.

zh: 在多种话语并置的现代社会，衍生于传统的壮锦文化符号在当代的发展，虽然不可避免地离开了原初语境，使得原生形态亦逐渐淡化，但却是在原初文化语境的影响场域之下得以重塑。
en: In the modern society with the coexistence of multiple discourse, though the development of the Zhuang Brocade cultural symbol which derives from tradition inevitably departs from the original context and its primitive state fades gradually, it's reshaped under the influence of the original cultural context.

zh: 历史积淀和民族文化是壮锦文化品牌打造的核心要素，一步步地将其编织为壮族文化符号的代表。
en: The historical accumulation and the ethnic culture are the core elements for the brand building of the Zhuang Brocade culture.

zh: 北路壮剧孕育于北部壮族生产生活的土壤中，是在壮族民间歌舞的基础上发展而成的艺术形式，它反映了壮族民众的文化心理和审美情趣，曾在北部壮族人民的精神生活中有着不可替代的地位，有较高的艺术价值。
en: Beilu Zhuang opera, based on Zhuang people's folk songs and dances, is an art form developing from the work and life of Zhuang people in the northern part.It reflects Zhuang people's cultural psychology and aesthetic interest.Zhuang opera has artistic value and plays an irreplaceable role in Zhuang people's spiritual life.

zh: 然而在知识全球化的今天，北路壮剧的发展现状不容乐观，已出现青黄不接的态势。
en: But nowadays with the globalization of knowledge, the development of Beilu Zhuang opera is not optimistic.

zh: 为此，怎样保护和传承北路壮剧，是当下一个亟待解决的问题。
en: Therefore, how to protect and inherit Beilu Zhuang opera is a problem demanding prompt solution.

zh: 全面性是贝特森的关键字；把我们人类放到整体的“生活系统”中进行理解对于我们的生存本质来说显得至关重要。
en: Holism was a key word for Bateson; an understanding of our human part in the whole "living system" that was the world he saw as crucial for our earthly survival.

zh: 此外，人类学必须要成为作专门化的“跨学科的学科”，因为只有整体综合（也许似乎有些业余性）运用各种形态的信息才有望抓住处于文化建构和社会互动中的世界的“巨大的复杂性” (Bateson 1959:296)。
en: Furthermore, anthropology had to be a non-specialist, "interdisciplinary discipline" because only in a holistic (however seemingly seeming amateurish) use of all manner of information could it expect to tackle the "vast intricacies" of the worlds of cultural construction and social interaction (Bateson 1959:296).

zh: 因此，人类学理解需要与人种学、生态学、生物学、哲学、美学以及心理分析联系起来。
en: Hence the need for an anthropological understanding to connect up with ethnology, ecology, biology, philosophy, aesthetics and psychoanalysis.

zh: 这将会带来新的生态世界观，美学和意识能在此合二为一的形成“神圣的”关于生活唯一性以及生活一元实体论的认识。
en: This might then give onto a new ecological world-view where aesthetics and consciousness combined to form a "sacred" recognition of the one-ness of life, of life's ontological monism.

zh: 二战后美国人类学的标志是存在于唯物主义和心智主义之间的紧张关系，这两种思潮各自都随着时间而经历了转变，但这种紧张关系持续到了1990年代。
en: After World War II American cultural anthropology was marked by the tension between materialisms and mentalisms; each of these underwent shifts over time, but the tension continued into the 1990s.

zh: 尽管它很大程度上受到了来自国外出生的学者（这些学者从卡尔˙维特弗格尔和卡尔˙波拉尼到埃里克˙沃尔夫和维克托˙特纳）的贡献的影响，但它主要是一个土生土长的发展过程并且成为了一个独特的美国式争论。
en: Although much influenced by the contributions of foreign-born scholars from Karl Wittfogel and Karl Polanyi to Eric Wolf and Victor Turner, this was primarily a homegrown development, and it became a singularly American argument.

zh: 例如，双方都回应了1960年代的政治剧变和学术界中新声音的加人.但它们是通过以不同方式重塑人类学来实现这一回应的。
en: For example, both sides reacted to the political upheavals of the 1960s and to the entry of new voices into the academy, but they did so with different kinds of reinventions of anthropology.

zh: 另一个主要观点，深受列宁（Lenin）和托洛茨基（Trotsky）对帝国主义的分析的影响，他们强调了富裕国家对贫穷国家的剥削，而且两者的经济和政治的接触不会导致后者的“发展”，相反，而是导致它们激烈的欠发达状态。
en: The other main view, which is influenced by Lenin's and Trotsky's analyses of imperialism, instead emphasises the ways in which the rich countries exploit the poor ones and that economic and political contact does not lead to the "development" of the latter, but instead to their active underdevelopment.

zh: 巨大的国家债务、贫穷国家售出商品（多数是原材料）的低廉价格、跨国公司对利润的榨取都是这种结构不平等的症状（例如，参见Frank 1979）。
en: Large state debts, low prices put on the goods the poor countries sell (mostly raw materials) and the extraction of profits by multinational companies are symptoms of this situation of structural inequality (see for instance Frank 1979).

zh: 因此，战后几十年的去殖民化并没有为贫穷国家带来真正的独立和解放，因为它们被牢固地绑缚在他们注定会输掉的资本主义体系之中。
en: Thus the de-colonisation of the post-war decades did not lead to the true independence and emancipation of poor countries, since they were tied up with a global capitalist system in which they were bound to lose out.

zh: 此外，从文化的层面上说，受到新帝国主义理论影响的学者会认为，以前被殖民过的民族变得要依赖前殖民者的各种模式和知识体系了。
en: At the level of culture, moreover, writers influenced by the theory of neo-imperialism have argued that formerly colonised peoples become dependent on the models and knowledge systems of the former colonisers.

zh: 由于博厄斯的影响，从摩根开始的唯物论传统在20世纪上半叶的美国隐至幕后，而在后来以文化生态学和新进化论的面目重现江湖，摩根的理论遗产也被许多马克思主义人类学家所认可。
en: Due to Boas's influence, the materialist tradition from Morgan fell into the background in the USA during the first half of the twentieth century.It would later re-emerge as cultural ecology and neo-evolutionism, and Morgan's legacy would also be acknowledged by many Marxist anthropologists.

zh: 但是现在，摩根的进化主义被牢牢地转移到了次要地位，这可能是受到达尔文的进化理论的影响。
en: But for now, Morgan's evolutionism was firmly sidetracked, as was any potential influence from Darwin's theory of evolution.

zh: 现代美国人类学已经成形，一方面是受博厄斯派学者及其相对主义关注点的驱动，另一方面是感知到在本土文化不幸消失之前进行记录的需要。与此同时，在主要的殖民强国大不列颠的情况却非常不同。
en: While modern American anthropology had been shaped, on the one hand by the Boasians and their relativist concerns, and on the other hand by the perceived need to record native cultures before their feared disappearance, the situation in the major colonial power, Great Britain, was very different.

zh: 殖民机构和在殖民地工作的人类学家之间存在多大程度的共谋，一直是个引起争论的问题（Goody 1995）。但是帝国主义的事实对于英国人类学家来说，即使是含蓄的，也是一个无可逃避的前提，至少在去殖民地化之前如此。
en: The degree of complicity between colonial agencies and anthropologists working in the colonies is debatable (Goody 1995), but the very fact of imperialism was an inescapable, if usually implicit, premise for British anthropology at least until de-colonisation.

zh: 在新居制（neolocal residence）中，一对已婚夫妇在另一个地方独立门户。
en: Under neolocal residence, a married couple forms a household in an independent location.

zh: 这种情况发生在核心家庭独立性受到重视的地方。
en: This occurs where the independence of the nuclear family is emphasized.

zh: 在像美国那样的工业社会中，大 部分经济活动都发生在家庭之外而非其内部，而且对个体来说重要的是能够搬迁到能找到工作的地方去，因此新居制就比其他任何一种居处模式都适合于美国。
en: In industrial societies such as the United States, where most economic activity occurs outside rather than inside the family and where it is important for individuals to be able to move where jobs are found, neolocal residence is better suited than any of the other patterns.

zh: 从舅居（avunculocal residence）是指一对已婚夫妇和新郎的舅舅生活在-起（参见图9.3）。支持从舅居的因紊与促成从父居的因素一样，但是它只发生在人们认 为通过女性继嗣对于重要权利和财产的转移至关重要的社会中。
en: Avunculocal residence, in which a married couple goes to live with the groom's mother's brother (Figure 9.3) is favored by the same factors that promote patrilocal residence, but only in societies where descent through women is deemed crucial for the transmission of important rights and property.

zh: 事物的形式是它的结构、框架和语法。
en: The form of something is its structure, its skeleton, its grammar.

zh: 形式带来分类以及同类的汇聚、类别、分类、图式、语言、循环和分类体系。
en: Forms amount to categories and collections of categories, taxonomies, schemata, languages, rotas, systems of classification.

zh: 而且世界及其各个方面只在形式的组织下才可能成为经验和知识的对象。
en: Moreover, the world and its aspects only become possible matters of experience and knowledge when constituted by forms.

zh: 形式通过在事物之间划定界线加以区分，从而否定事物的连续性。
en: Forms negate the continuity of matter by introducing the distinctions that make things separate.

zh: 所以，形式指出了限定的条件，只有在这些前提条件下才可能获得特定的经验和知识。
en: Thus, forms specify the conditions under which it is possible to have a certain kind of experience and acquire a certain kind of knowledge.

zh: 语言的语法（grammar）最后由所有关于其词素和句法的观察资料组成。
en: The grammar of the language ultimately will consist of all observations about its morphemes and syntax.

zh: 进一步的工作可能是借助替换框架确立语言的所有形式类（form classes）：在句子中以相同方式起作用的言语部分或词类。
en: Further work may include the establishment, by substitution frames, of all the form classes of the language: that is, the parts of speech or categories of words that work the same way in any sentence.

zh: 例如，我们可以确立我们称之为“名词”的一个类别，把它界定为适合于“我看到……”这一替换框架的任何词。
en: For example, a linguist may establish a category called nouns, defined as anything that will fit the substitution frame "I see".

zh: 我们简单地制定这种替换框架，在其中试验一些单词，就这些单词是否适合，让当地说话人表明“是”或“否”。
en: The researcher simply makes the frame, tries out a number of words in it, and has a native speaker indicate "yes" or "no" for whether the words work.

zh: 性别是生物学的，而社会性别是文化的，这是重要的区分。
en: The distinction between sex, which is biological, and gender, which is cultural, is an important one.

zh: 据推测，社会性别的区分和人类文化一样古老——约250万年——而且起源于早期人类男性与女性的生物学差异。
en: Presumably, gender differences are as old as human culture—about 2.5 million years—and arose from the biological differences between early human males and females.

zh: 追溯到那时，男性个头约比女性大一倍，就如今天在大猩猩、猩猩和狒狒那类种群中那样，后者都与人类密切相关。
en: Back then, males were about twice the size of females, as they are today among such species as gorillas, orangutans, and baboons, all of which are closely related to humans.

zh: 然而，随着人类的演化，两性生物学差异从根本上缩小了。
en: As humans evolved, however, the biological differences between the two sexes were radically reduced.

zh: 因此，除了与生殖直接有关的差异外，曾经存在的社会性别角色差异的生物学基础大致消失了。
en: Thus, apart from differences directly related to reproduction, whatever biological basis that once existed for gender role differences largely has disappeared.

zh: 性别是生物学的，而社会性别是文化的，这是重要的区分。
en: The distinction between sex, which is biological, and gender, which is cultural, is an important one.

zh: 据推测，社会性别的区分和人类文化一样古老——约250万年——而且起源于早期人类男性与女性的生物学差异。
en: Presumably, gender differences are as old as human culture—about 2.5 million years—and arose from the biological differences between early human males and females.

zh: 追溯到那时，男性个头约比女性大一倍，就如今天在大猩猩、猩猩和狒狒那类种群中那样，后者都与人类密切相关。
en: Back then, males were about twice the size of females, as they are today among such species as gorillas, orangutans, and baboons, all of which are closely related to humans.

zh: 然而，随着人类的演化，两性生物学差异从裉本上缩小了。
en: As humans evolved, however, the biological differences between the two sexes were radically reduced.

zh: 因此，除了与生殖直接有关的差异外，曾经存在的社会性别角色差异的生物学基础大致消失了。
en: Thus, apart from differences directly related to reproduction, whatever biological basis that once existed for gender role differences largely has disappeared.

zh: 与阶级和等级分层密切相关的是性别分层现象。
en: Closely associated with class and caste stratification is the related phenomenon of gender stratification.

zh: 例如，在前面我们对性别作为一种组织原则的讨论中，我们看到，在一些社会（不是所有社会）中，男性和女性可能被视为不平等的，前者的地位高于后者的地位。
en: For instance, in our earlier discussion of sex as an organizing principle, we saw that in some (but not all) societies, men and women may be regarded as unequal, with the former outranking the latter.

zh: 一般而言，在其他方面存在分层的社会中，也存在性别上的不平等；因此，在西方世界那些具有阶级结构的社会中，妇女地位历来就低于男子。
en: Generally speaking, sexual inequality is characteristic of societies stratified in other ways as well; thus women historically have occupied a position of inferiority to men in the class-structured societies of the Western world.

zh: 然而，在其他方面未分层社会中有时也会看到性别不平等。在这样的情况中，男性和女性总是在肉体和精神上彼此分割开来的。
en: Nevertheless, sexual inequality sometimes may be seen in societies not otherwise stratified; in such instances, men and women are always physically as well as conceptually separated from one another.

zh: 如果一个男子穿着像一个女子，那么这仍然普遍被看作是忧虑的起因，而且很可能导致精神病治疗的干预。
en: If a man dresses as a woman, it is still widely considered a cause for concern and is likely to lead to psychiatric intervention.

zh: 传统上由妇女干的活还没有被看成是男子适合干的。
en: Nor have jobs women traditionally filled been seen as desirable for men.

zh: 相比之下，妇女有更大的自由穿上男子风格的服装，承担传统上由男子从事的工作，即便这样做会引起别人指责她们怎么“没有女子气”这些观点背后潜伏的是传统的价值观（习惯上与男子相关的工作比与女子相关的工作得到更髙的评价）以及儿童养育模式，它们造成两性性別身份问题，尽管问题对各个性别来说是各不相同的。
en: By contrast, women have more freedom to wear masculine-style clothing and to assume jobs men traditionally held, even though to do so may cause others to brand them as somehow unfeminine.Lying behind these views are traditional values (jobs customarily associated with men have been more highly valued than those associated with women) and a pattern of child rearing that creates gender identity problems for both sexes, although of a different sort for each sex.

zh: 虽然婚姻根据男女之间持久的性关系加以界定，但它不应与交配混淆。
en: Although defined in terms of a continuing sexual relationship between a man and woman, marriage should not be confused with mating.

zh: 虽然在婚姻内有交配，但它经常也在婚外发生。
en: Although mating occurs within marriage, it often occurs outside of it as well.

zh: 与交配不同的是，婚姻以社会、法律和经济的力量为后盾。
en: Unlike mating, marriage is backed by social, legal, and economic forces.

zh: 在某些社会，新家庭通过婚姻形成，但这并不符合所有社会的情况。
en: In some societies, new families are formed through marriage, but this is not true for all societies.

zh: 特兰西瓦尼亚匈牙利人与罗马尼亚人之间的关系问题不能被理解为像大不列颠或法兰西的穆斯林与“基督徒”之间一样的关系。
en: The question of the relations of Hungarians and Romanians in Transylvania cannot be thought of in the same terms as the relations of Muslims and "Christians" in Great Britain or France.

zh: 土地、历史和语言之间的关系与此毫不相干。
en: The link with land, history and language has nothing to do with it.

zh: 要界定这两个群体，以“少数”对“多数”来理解可能会相称一些。

en: To speak in terms of "minority" versus "majority" implies some symmetry in what defines both groups.

zh: 利奇（Leach 1989: 137-8）说，和小说一样，人类学描述的特征是“来自于作者人格的某些方面。否则那还能是什么呢？我最先了解的自我就是我自己。当马凌诺夫斯基描写特罗布里安德岛民时就是在描写他自己，当埃文思-普里查德写努尔人时他也是在写他自己”。
en: As in a novel, Leach elaborated (1989:137–8): features of anthropological accounts ‘are derived from aspects of the personality of the author. How could it be otherwise? The only ego I know at first hand is my own. When Malinowski writes about Trobriand Islanders he is writing about himself; when Evans-Pritchard writes about the Nuer he is writing about himself In short, ‘cultural differences, though sometimes convenient, are temporary fictions’ (ibid.).

zh: 总而言之，“文化差异，尽管有时会显得比较便捷，但都是转瞬即逝的虚构”（同上）。
因为社会中存在着很大的权力悬殊，那些有权势的人才能够比其他群体的人更加有效地提升他们自己的世界观，并且制造一种“当然”氛围，从而使得深层意识形态的观念成为这个被想当然的社会的主要部分。
en: Because of considerable power disparities in society, the powerful are able to promote their own world-view much more efficiently than other groups and to give it an air of "naturalness", thereby making deeply ideological notions part and parcel of the taken-for-granteds of society.

zh: 虚假意识的观念具有直接的吸引力。
en: The notion of false consciousness has an immediate appeal.

zh: 看起来好像被压迫的群体不知道他们自己的利益，否则他们就会反叛，不是吗？
en: It seems likely that oppressed groups do not know their own good; otherwise they would have revolted, would they not?

zh: 另一方面，对于人类学家这个社会的局外人而言，要令人信服地辩论：一个群体是其成员自身所没有意识到的错觉的受害者，却远非这么简单。
en: On the other hand, it is far from easy for an anthropologist, an outsider to society, to argue convincingly that a group is the victim of delusions of which its members are not themselves aware.

zh: 研究者有什么权利可以宣称，他们对一个群体的“客观利益”的了解程度比该群体自己还要深刻？
en: With what right can researchers claim that they know the "objective interests" of a group better than they themselves do?

zh: 在人们把大部分时间用于谋生活动的社会中，财富差异程度不大，这种社会通过调整机制和互惠制度保持那种状况，调整机制和互惠制度的作用是以一种相当公平的方式来分配现有微不足道的财产。
en: In societies where people devote most of their time to subsistence activities, gradations of wealth are small, kept that way through leveling mechanisms and systems of reciprocity that serve to distribute in a fairly equitable fashion what little wealth exists.

zh: 显示社会威望，即经济学家索尔斯坦˙凡勃伦所谓的炫耀性消费(conspicuous consumption),在有实质性剩余产品生产出来的社会中，是财富分配的强有力的驱动力。
en: Display for social prestige, what economist Thorstein Veblen called conspicuous consumption, is a strong motivating force for the distribution of wealth in societies where a substantial surplus is produced.

zh: 当然，长期以来，人们已经认识到，在西方社会，当一个人与别人争威望时，炫耀性消费起到显著作用。
en: It has, of course, long been recognized that conspicuous consumption plays a prominent role in Western societies as individuals compete with one another for prestige.

zh: 我们离开纳亚尔人之前，需要指出的是，在他们的社会，没有任何东西是与北美社会的已知家庭类似的，这一点是很重要的。
en: Before we leave the Nayar, it is important to note that nothing in this society is comparable to the family as we know it in North America.

zh: 形成家户的群体不包括姻亲(affinal kin),即由婚姻建立夫妻关系(conjugal bond)所加入的那些个人就如在第九章我们将证明的，家户并不非得是像我们所知道的那种家庭。
en: The group that forms the household does not include affinal kin, or individuals joined by a conjugal bond established by marriage.As will be shown in Chapter 9, a household group does not have to be a family as we know it.

zh: 在纳亚尔人中，家户完全是由我们通常所谓的“血缘”亲属组成的，“血缘”亲属技术上被称为血亲（consanguineal kin)。
en: Among the Nayar the household is composed wholly of what we often call "blood" relatives,lechnicallknowacon-sanguineal kin.

zh: 性关系是与非血亲、因此而住在另一个家户的那些人的关系。
en: Sexual relations are with those who are not consanguineal kin and thus live in other households.

zh: 这把我们引 向另一个人类普遍的问题:乱伦禁忌。
en: This brings us to another supposed human universal, the incest taboo.

zh: 如果我们用熟悉的术语把家庭定义为必须是父亲、母亲和孩子的话，那么我们就必须说，像纳亚尔人(我们在第九章将看到，他们并不是唯一的案例)那样的民族的确没有家庭。
en: If we were to define the family in familiar terms, as requiring fathers, mothers, and children, then we would have to say people like the Nayar (who, as we shall see in Chapter 9, do not constitute a unique case) do not have families.

zh: 然而，我们可以用较少种族中心主义的方式把家庭定义为：由一个女子和她扶养的孩子以及至少一个通过婚姻或血源关系加入的成年男子组成的群体。
en: We can, however, define the family in a less ethnocentric way as a group composed of a woman and her dependent children and at least one adult male joined through marriage or blood relationship.

zh: (非传统家庭的主题将在第九章讨论。
）纳亚尔人形成血缘家庭(consanguine),它由女子、她们扶养的子女以及女子的兄弟组成。
en: The Nayar form a consanguine family, consisting as it does of women, their dependent offspring, and the women's brothers.

zh: 对不计其数的男人和女人来说，这不是问题。
en: Yet for innumerable women and men this is not the case.

zh: 没有民族可以归属：他们是另一类的“局外人”、移民、寻求避难所的人、民族解放运动成员。
en: There is no nation to belong to: they are "outsiders" of another kind, migrants, asylum seekers, members of national liberation movements.

zh: 我们不能假设女人或男人与民族和民族主义的关系：那属于我们需要提问而寻找答案的事情。
en: We cannot assume either women’s or men's relation to nations or nationalisms: it is something about which we need to ask questions, seek answers.

zh: 行为环境的最后方面是规范定向。
en: A final aspect of the behavioral environment is the normative orientation.

zh: 在源头上纯粹是文化的价值、理想和标准，就如树木、河流和山脉一样，是个人行为环境的一部分。
en: Values, ideals, and standards, which are purely cultural in origin, are as much a part of an individuals behavioral environment as are trees, rivers, and mountains.

zh: 没有它们，人们在评价他们自己的行为或别人的行为时就会没有任何依据。
en: Without them people would have nothing to judge their actions or those of others against.

zh: 简言之，自我意识的自我评价方面不能被看作是实用的。
en: In short, the self-appraisal aspect of self-awareness could not be made functional.

zh: 与文化的任何方面一样，一个社会与另一个社会的自我概念有相当大的差异。
en: Like any aspect of culture, conceptions of the self vary considerably from one society to another.

zh: 佩诺布斯科特印第安人，是在某一时期依靠捕鱼、狩猎和采集野生食物为生的民族 (寻食者），他们的后代今天仍然生活在北美东北地区的林地里，可以作为一个范例。
en: The Penobscot Indians, a people who at one time relied on fishing, hunting, and the gathering of wild plants (food foraging) for subsistence, and whose descendants still live today in the wood¬lands of northeastern North America, serve as an example.

zh: 寻食社会的一个重要特点是它的平等主义。
en: An important characteristic of the food-foraging society is its egalitarianism.

zh: 寻食者通常是髙度流动的。而且又缺乏动物或机械运输工具，特别是去远处获取食物时，他们必须能不承担许多东西行进。
en: Food foragers are usually highly mobile, and, lacking animal or mechanical transportation, they must be able to travel without many encumbrances, especially on foodgetting expeditions.

zh: 例如，在朱瓦西人中，每个个人的所有物的平均重量在25磅以下。
en: The average weight of an individual's personal belongings among the Juhoansi, for example, is just under 25 pounds.

zh: 寻食者的物质产品必须限制在最低限度的必需品上，它们包括用于狩猎、采集、捕鱼、建屋的工具，以及制造工具、烹饪器具、捅捉机和网。
en: The material goods of food foragers must be limited to the barest essentials, which include implements for hunting, gathering, fishing, building, and making tools, cooking utensils, traps, and nets.

zh: 他们很少有机会积累奢侈品或剩余物品，而且没有谁能拥有比别人多得多的物品，这一事实有助于限制地位差异。
en: They have little chance to accumulate luxuries or surplus goods, and the fact no one owns significantly more than others helps to limit status differences.

zh: 年龄和性别通常是重要的地位差别的唯一根源。
en: Age and sex are usually the only sources of significant status differences.

zh: 另外一种对压制性变迁的常见反应是复兴，这是我们在第十三章已经讨论过的一种文化过程。
en: Another common reaction to forcible change is revitalization, a process already touched upon in Chapter 13.

zh: 复兴可以被看作是由社会中的成员进行的一种刻意尝试，他们想通过迅速接受一种带有多项创新的模式来建设一种更加令人满意的文化。
en: Revitalization may be looked upon as a deliberate attempt by some members of a society to construct a more satisfactory culture by the rapid acceptance of a pattern of multiple innovations.

zh: 一旦主要的文化纽带、社会关系和活动被打破，而无意义的活动又被外界力量强加进来。个体和群体通常就会做出幻想、退缩和逃离的反应。
en: Once primary ties of culture, social relationships, and activities are broken and meaningless activity is imposed by force, individuals and groups characteristically react with fantasy, withdrawal, and escape.

zh: 复兴运动的事例在美国历史上一直很常见，每当社会中有相当一部分人发现他们的生活条件与“美国之梦”的价值相偏离的时候，就会出现这种运动。
en: Examples of revitalization movements have been common in the history of the United States whenever significant population segments have found their conditions in life to be at odds with the values of uthe American Dream.

zh: 所有文化都共享某些基本的特点，研究这些特点可以阐明文化本身的性质和功能。
文化不可能没有社会而存在，社会是为了生存而相互依赖的有组织的人群。由规则支配的关系被称为社会结构。社会结构使社会团结在一起在一种文化内部并非一切都是一致的。一个原因是，在任何社会中男性与女性的角色总是存在某种差异。
en: All is not uniform within a culture; one reason is that some differences exist between male and female roles in any human society.

zh: 人类学家用社会性别这一术语指文化分派给男女生物学差异的解释或意义。
en: Anthropologists use the term gender to refer to the elaborations or meanings cultures assign to the biological differences between men and women.

zh: 年龄差异也是普遍的,在某些文化中，还存在其他亚文化变化形式。
en: Age variation is also universal, and in some cultures other subcultural variations occur as well.

zh: 亚文化共享某个较大文化的至关重要的假定，而遵守一套特别不同的规则。
en: A subculture shares certain overarching assumptions of the larger culture while observing a distinctively different set of rules.

zh: 基本结构包括直接交换的各种体系，也就是说，一个集团与另一个集团互换妻子。
en: Elementary structures include systems of direct exchange, where a group may ‘take’ wives from the same group it ‘gives’ wives to.

zh: 最简单的一种形式就是一个男人与其母亲的兄弟的女儿 (MBD)  或父亲的姊妹的女儿(FZD)结婚，就像在南美和澳大利亚的一些地方那样。
en: The simplest type is one involving marriage between a man and his mother’s brother’s daughter (MBD) or father’s sister’s daughter (FZD), as in some parts of South America and Australia.

zh: 基本结构还包括延迟直接交换制度。
en: Elementary structures also include systems of delayed direct exchange.

zh: 社会阶级在几个方面是外显的。

en: Social classes are manifested in several ways.

zh: 一个是通过言词评价（verbal evaluation）人们对他们自己社会中的其他人所说的话。
en: One is through verbal evaluation—what people say about others in their own society.

zh: 对此，任何东西都可能被挑出来受到关 注，并被加以赞同或不赞同的评价:政治的、军事的、宗教的、经济的或者专业的角色，财富和财产，亲属关系，个人性质(比如肤色）,社区活动，语言，以及很多其他特性。
en: For this, anything can be singled out for attention and spoken of favorably or unfavorably: political, military, religious, economic, or professional roles; wealth and property; kinship; personal qualities (skin color, for example); community activity; linguistic dialect; and a host of other traits.

zh: 绘画艺术既可以被看成是具象的，也可以被看成是抽象的，而实际上，送些类别只是代表一个连续变化体的两极。
en: Pictorial art may be regarded as either representational or abstract, though in truth these categories represent polar ends of a continuum.

zh: 非洲南部的岩石艺术说明了研究艺术可采用的三种研究方式。
en: The rock art of southern Africa illustrates three ways the study of art may be approached.

zh: 美学的和叙事的研究方式集中关注事物怎样得到描绘，以及什么事物得到描绘。它们本身很少揭示艺术究竟是什么，并可能表达出有关创造该艺术的民族的歪曲看法。
en: The aesthetic and narrative approaches focus on how and what things are depicted.By themselves they reveal little about what the art is all about and may convey a distorted view of the people responsible for it.

zh: 只有阐释的研究方式能够揭示另一个民族艺术的意义。这种研究方式需要借用丰富的民族志和其他各祌可靠的资料。
en: Only the interpretive approach can reveal the meaning of another peopled art.This approach requires drawing on a rich body of ethnography and often other sets of data.

zh: 重要的是认识到，稳定和变迁都包含在演化的调适内，而且一且达到令人满意的调适，变迁程度太大却可能使它失效。
en: It is important to recognize that stability as well as change is involved in evolutionary adaptation and that once a satisfactory adaptation is achieved, too much change may cause it to break down.

zh: 因此，一段重大变迁可能紧随着长期的相对稳定。
en: Thus, episodes of major change may be followed by long periods of relative stability.

zh: 例如，在公元前3500年，新英格兰西北部和魁北克南部的生活方式已演化成形，很适合那个时代的环境状况。
en: For example, by 3500 B.C., a way of life had evolved in northwestern New England and southern Quebec that was well attuned to the environmental conditions of the times.

zh: 因为那些状况在以后的5000年左右或多或少仍然是稳定的，所以人们的生活方式也依然如此，这是可以理解的。
en: Since those conditions remained more or less stable for the next 5,000 years or so, it is understandable that people's lifeways also remained stable.

zh: 普遍进化论作为单线进化论的教条的一种软化 ， 出现于 20 世纪初。
en: Universal evolutionism emerged in the early twentieth century as a softening of the tenets of unilinear evolutionism.

zh: 根据新的田野民族志和考古证据，确切的跨文化一致且遍布世界的单线进化阶段不能再维持下去了。
en: In light of new ethnographic and archaeological evidence, precise unilinear phases, consistent cross-culturally and throughout the world, could no longer be sustained.

zh: 所以取而代之，假定存在更  广泛的、“普遍的”进化阶段，比如“蒙昧”、 “野蛮”、“文明”（其中摩尔根所支持的）之间的经典划分等。
en: So instead, broad, ‘universal’ phases of evolution were postulated, such as the classical division between ‘savagery’, ‘barbarism’, and ‘civilization’ (championed by Morgan, among others).

zh: 我们简略地考察当代北美社会的做法，就可以看到婚姻与交配区别。在北 美社会，一夫一妻制（monogamy)——获得单个配偶——是唯一合法的婚姻形式。
en: The distinction between marriage and mating may he seen by looking, briefly, at practices in contemporary North American society, where monogamy—the taking of a single spouse—is the only legally recognized form of marriage.

zh: 不仅其他形式得不到法律认可，而且财产和财富得以从一代传到下一代的继承制度也以一夫一妻制婚姻制度为根据。
en: Not only are other forms not legally sanctioned, but also systems of inheritance, whereby property and wealth are transferred from one generation to the next, are predicated upon the institution of monogamous marriage.

zh: 相比之下，交配模式经常不是单配偶的。
en: Mating patterns, by contrast, are frequently not monogamous.

zh: 不仅在美国和加拿大通奸绝不是罕见的，而且异性个体——特别是未婚的年轻人——婚外同居已被认为是可接受的。
en: Not only is adultery far from rare in the United States and Canada, but also it has become increasingly acceptable for individuals of the opposite sex particularly young people who have not yet married—to live together outside of wedlock.

zh: 然而，他们通过研究各个时代和各个地方的所有人，不断努力使偏见问题最小化，他们不使自己局限于当代西方民族的研究。人类学家已经发现，要充分理解人的观念和行为的复杂性，必须研究过去的和现在的所有的人。
en: However, they constantly seek to minimize the problem by studying the whole of humanity in all times and places, and they do not limit themselves to the study of recent Western peoples； anthropologists have found that to fully understand human behavior, all humans, past and present, must be studied.

zh: 不要再说任何其他特点,这种绝对独一无二的跨文化和长期的历史视角，使文化人类学与其他社会科学区别开来它为人类学提供了远比其他任何研究人类的学科更为丰富的数据库，它也可以应用于任何当前的问题。
en: More than any other feature, this unique cross-cultural and evolutionary perspective distinguishes cultural anthropology from the other social sciences.It provides anthropology with far richer data than those of any other social science, and it also can be applied to any current issue.

zh: 作为一个适当的案例，让我们看一看，在美国，人们安排婴儿睡眠的风俗是：婴儿与其父母、特别是与其母亲分开睡。
en: As a case in point, consider the way infants in the United States are routinely made to sleep apart from their parents, their mothers in particular.

zh: 对大多数北美人来说，这可能是完全正常的，但是跨文化研究表明“一起睡”是一种普遍情况。
en: To North Americans, this seems normal, but cross- cultural studies show that "co-sleeping" is the rule.

zh: 虽然玛格丽特˙米德在20世纪30年代早期对三种不同社会中的性别和气质作了比较，是关于儿童养育对人格影响的大部分跨文化研究，是由比阿特丽斯·怀廷和欧文·L·柴尔德或他们的同事在最近做出的。
en: Although Margaret Mead compared sex and temperament in three different societies in the early 1930s, most cross-cultural studies of child rearing effects on personality have been carried out more recently by John and Beatrice Whiting and Irving L. Child or their associates.

zh: 他们的工作已经证明一些显著的规律。
en: Their work has demonstrated a number of apparent regularities.

zh: 例如，我们有可能在广泛概括的层面上区分两种不同的儿童养育模式，为方便起见，我们可以把它们称为“依附训练”和“独立训练”。
en: For example, it is possible to distinguish between two different patterns of child rearing at a broad level of generalization, which we may label for convenience "dependence training" and "independence training".

zh: 也有人指出，外围区域——尤其是非洲、拉丁美洲和大部分亚洲地区——大部分为世界市场提供原材料，其价格由富裕国家的需求来决定。
en: It has also been pointed out that the peripheral areas – notably Africa, Latin America and most of Asia – largely produce raw materials for the world market, at prices determined by the demand in the rich countries.

zh: 这种受到马克思主义思想影响的理论，被叫做依靠理论，因为它强调了外围的贫困国家对富裕国家的根本依靠，以及后者对前者的剥削。
en: This kind of theory, much of it influenced by Marxist thought, is called dependency theory, since it stresses the fundamental dependence of the peripheral, poor countries on the rich ones and the exploitation of the former by the latter.

zh: 虽然它可以揭示很多问题，但总体上它是抽象的而且并不总是符合版图（Worsley 1984，1990）。
en: Although it can be very revealing, it is general and abstract and does not always fit the territory (Worsley 1984, 1990).

zh: 就算是游牧民，他们的神话在人类学中也被认为可用环境来解释，他们所经过的熟悉的、古老的和适当的地方，不仅已经固定在记忆中，而且他们的财产也附着于这些地方，因为对他们来说，这个环境是永久的、循环的、标准的和传统的；在认知上，他们从未移动。
en: Even if the subjects were nomads, their myths were regarded anthropologically as making of the environment through which they passed a known place, an old place, a proper place, not only fixed in memory but to which their belonging was stationary because permanent, cyclical, normative and traditional; cognitively, they never moved.

zh: 就算研究对象不断处于日常时空之外的仪式过程——通过礼仪、朝圣、追求幻觉——并寻找他们生活的神圣中心（Eliade 1954: 12—20)，这些反结构事件实际上使他们进一步固定了中心；作为特殊的、非凡的、异常的经验，这些仪式只是强调了固定在社会环境中的日常身份，并赋予其合法性而已。
