en: It was his reading of the ethnographic literature that anthropologists had been defining institutions cross-culturally as "marriage" when said institutions in fact had "no feature in common other than that they are concerned with the conceptual roles of male and female" (ibid.: 70).

zh: 解放给了被解放的奴隶以政治、经济和社会自由，信仰转变给了他们在基督世界里的新生活，再生的可能性。传教士的圣地之梦依赖于有着新性别秩序的村落。
en: Emancipation had given enslaved men and women their political, economic and social freedom.Conversion gave them a new life in Christ, the possibility to be born anew.The missionary dream of this new Jerusalem depended on new villages with a new gender order.

zh: 村落被设计成小教堂和传教士的房子在中央，整齐的村舍环绕周围，真正的基督教家庭居于其中。
en: The villages were designed with the chapel and mission-house at the centre, surrounded by neat cottages, occupied by proper Christian families.

zh: 但在他那些解构的著作中，德里达超越了这些并进而关注批评得以产生的环境，关注什么是解释和话语的元层次。
en: But Derrida goes beyond this in his work of deconstruction to focus on the circumstances in which criticism takes place, in what is a meta-level of explanation and discourse.

zh: 首先，典型的批评都是通过关注概念的起源而不是现在的状态来解构它们的，原因在于当起源已经消失之时，起源的“痕迹”仍然明显。
en: In the first place, criticism typically deconstructs concepts by focusing on their origins rather than just their present state, in such a way that the "trace" of the origin is always evident even after it has becomeabsent.

zh: 但痕迹还作为起源的对立面而构成了起源，因为只有通过痕迹我们才能发现起源。
en: But the trace also constitutes the origin as its opposite, since it is only through the trace that we discern the origin.

zh: 最后，新世界可以“变形”的方式产生。
en: And finally, new worlds can be made by way of ‘Deformation’.

zh: 一个世界可以通过扭曲、减少或再说明一些元素得到更新，或者也可通过主题的变奏来实现。
en: A world is renewed by distorting, reducing or elaborating upon, some of its elements, and by making variations on its themes.

zh: （通过再阐释权力和意识形态，每次互动、每个人都受到了影响，福柯对社会的解构使马克思主义的批判发生了形变；结果是每个核心的控制体系都破碎成拙劣模仿的副本、最终无法控制的瞬间。）
en: (A Foucauldian deconstruction of society deforms the Marxian critique, for instance, by elaborating upon the themes of power and ideology to the extent that every interaction and every body is implicated; the result is that any overarching system of control fragments into a palimpsest of parodic, ultimately uncontrollable moments.)

zh: 出于论证的目的，我们将克利福德˙格尔兹的解释人类学与詹姆斯˙克利福德的文本主义的元人类学并置起来。
en: For the sake of the argument, let us juxtapose Clifford Geertz's interpretive anthropology to James Clifford's textualist metaanthropology.

zh: 如果格尔兹仍然寻求通过他对虚构化的场景的有限运用来捕捉和操纵那些在虚构化场景中才得以展现的异国情调，那么文本主义与解构主义的转向就会有这样的危险：即制造出更多更高明的关于其他文本的档案系统以及想象着世界上的其他人都在努力做着同样的事情。
en: If Geertz is still seeking to conjure and capture the demons of exoticism—theater states, shadow plays, cock fights— through his limited use of fictionalized stagings in which they can appear to us, the textualist/deconstructive move runs the risk of inventing ever more clever filing systems for others' texts and of imagining that every one else in the world is hard at work doing the same thing.

zh: 为了使讨论不致偏离方向，应当强调的是，我并不是想说，克利福徳的事业到目前为止进行得很不完善。
en: Lest the argument run away in directions of its own, I should stress that I am not saying that Clifford's enterprise has up to the present been any thing but salutary.

zh: 按照生物和文化进化来讲述人类的故事这一范型有许多优点。
en: This paradigm, which tells the human story in terms of biological and cultural evolution, has many advantages.

zh: 最大的优点是它的范围。
en: Its greatest one is its scope.

zh: 它提供了一个框架，这个框架可以容纳最多样的数据和研究模式。
en: It provides a framework within which to fit the most diverse data and modes of research.

zh: 干枯的头颃、陶器的破片和陌生的语言，从仅仅是满足一些人的好奇心，变成人类历史和文化模式的证据。
en: Shrunken heads, potsherds, and exotic languages are removed from the status of mere curiosities and become evidence of human history and cultural pattern.

zh: 然而，生命巨链和进化理论之间存在两个重要差异。
en: However, there are two important differences between the Great Chain of Being and the theory of evolution.

zh: 第一，“进化”概念既包含时间方面，也包含空间方面：事物随着时间变化或 进化。
en: First, the concept ‘evolution’ has a temporal as well as a spatial aspect: things change or evolve through time.

zh: 第二，生命巨链的经典概念是以物种不变性理念为基础的，与之相反，在其生物形式上，进化论则依赖于相反概念，即物种的可变性。
en: Secondly, whereas the classic notion of the Great Chain of Being was based on the idea of the fixity of species, the theory of evolution, in its biological form, depends on the contrary notion of the mutability of species.

zh: 低等形式进化为高等形式。
en: Lower forms evolve into higher forms.

zh: 许多其他领域影响深远的作品也出现在德语国家中历史相对论在学术中占支配地位的这一初期阶段，包括宗教和法律领域的历史学家以及历史哲学家的作品。这些学者中没有人遵循主流的民族主义方向。
en: A number of influential works from other fields emerged in these first phases of historicist academic dominance in the German-speaking countries.These were works by a few historians of religion and law and philosophers of history, none of whom followed the nationalist mainstream.

zh: 他们一方面怀着历史学家的兴趣，转向了更广范围的、比较性的主题。这一兴趣反映着人文发展阶段的一些启蒙兴趣的痕迹。与此同时，他们也已吸取了对世界文化多样性的越来越多的洞察。
en: On the contrary, they turned to wider, comparative issues with a historian's interest that still echoed some of the Enlightenment interest in the stages of humanity's development while already absorbing the growing number of insights into the world’s cultural diversity.

zh: 这已经在许多方面预示着进化论在世界范围内的兴起。
en: This was already foreshadowing in rich ways the international rise of evolutionism.

zh: 这方面的一个例子就是瑟维斯（Service)的进化潜力定律。
en: An example is Service's law of evolutionary potential.

zh: 这一所谓的定律坚持认为，文化进化中的突破更有可能发生在文明的周围而不是中心。
en: This so-called law holds that breakthroughs in cultural evolution are more likely to occur at the periphery than at the center of a civilization.

zh: 历史是一场接力赛：一个重要的群体携带交接棒跑到一个地方，然后把它传给一个处于边缘的群体，后者会在一段时间变成重要群体。
en: History is a relay race: A central group carries the baton of civilization to a certain point, then hands it to a peripheral group that becomes, for a time, central.

zh: 随着历史在地理上的曲折进行，最后的变成最先的，最先的则变成最后的。
en: The last become first, then the first last,as history proceeds in a geographical zigzag.

zh: 人们还没有提出对于乱伦禁忌真正令人信服的解释。
en: A truly convincing explanation of the incest taboo has yet to be advanced.

zh: 当然，不断有建议表明，它可能是对于避免近亲繁殖的潜在倾向而在文化上苦心经营的结果。
en: Certainly, there are persistent hints that it may be a cultural elaboration of an underlying biological tendency toward avoidance of inbreeding.

zh: 对动物行为的研 究已轻证明，在比较太型、寿命长、成热慢、智力髙的种类中，这种倾向普遍存在。
en: Studies of animal behavior have shown such a tendency to be common among relatively large, long-lived, slow-to-mature, and intelligent species.

zh: 人类在各方面都有资格成为这一群的成员。
en: Humans qualify for membership in this group on all counts.

zh: 大部分其他灵长目动物也一样包括与人类关系最密切的那些灵长目动物——狒狒和黑猩猩。
en: So do a number of other primates, including those most closely related to humans—chimpanzees.

zh: 尽管它们很少显示性抑制，但是这些类人猿的确倾向于避免在同胞兄弟姐妹之间以及在雌性与其雄性后代之间的近亲交配。
en: Although they exhibit few sexual inhibitions, chimpanzees do rend to avoid inbreeding between siblings and between females and their male offspring.

zh: 可是，为了实观事物的某种形式，为了给人、事物和事件设定某种秩序，就必须排斥或避开另一些人、事物和亊件；毎一个概念和信息的组织方式都体现了对其他潜在的秩序与意义的某种禁忌。
en: To realize one pattern of things, however, to configure one order of people, things and events in the universe, is to exclude and eschew other ones; every concept and organization of information represents a type of taboo against other potential orderings and meanings.

zh: 对于个体来说，认可某一识别体系，就意味着忽视其他个体可能采取的识别体系。
en: For individuals to realize one set of identities, therefore, is to negate others those same individuals might have assumed.

zh: 不仅如此，未来的认知内容会因现有的图式而具有某种路径依赖性。
en: Not only that, existing schemata tend to act as canalizing devices for what is cognized in future.

zh: 现在，实证主义和阐释观点在人类学和社会科学内都可以找到，伴随着各自大量的阴影和着色。
en: Now, within anthropology and the social sciences are found both the positivist and the interpretive viewpoints, with myriad shadings and colorings of each.

zh: 不过，简单来说，我们可以认为，实证主义在社会科学(心理学、社会学、经济学）中占据主导地位，阐释则在民族志中占有主导地位。
en: Simplifying, however, we can identify the dominant viewpoint in the social sciences – psychology, sociology, economics – as positivist and an influential viewpoint in ethnography as interpretive.

zh: 实证主义社会学家和阐释民族志学者之间一个有些被夸张的对比，有助于突出其各自特有的逻辑。
en: A somewhat overstated contrast between the positivist social scientist and the interpretive ethnographer serves to highlight the distinctive logic of each.

zh: 然而，我们可以用较少种族中心主义的方式把家庭定义为：由一个女子和她扶养的孩子以及至少一个通过婚姻或血源关系加入的成年男子组成的群体。（非传统家庭的主题将在第九章讨论。
en: We can, however, define the family in a less ethnocentric way as a group composed of a woman and her dependent children and at least one adult male joined through marriage or blood relationship.

zh: ）纳亚尔人形成血缘家庭（consanguine），它由女子、她们扶养的子女以及女子的兄弟组成。
en: The Nayar form a consanguine family, consisting as it does of women, their dependent offspring, and the women's brothers.

zh: 在这种社会里，虽然男子与女子结婚，但并不作为一个家户的成员居住在一起。
en: In such societies, men and women get married but do not live together as members of one household.

zh: 相反，他们生活在他们从小长大的家户之中，男子与他们的妻子“交换”性活动。
en: Rather, they spend their lives in the households they grew up in, with the men "commuting" for sexual activity with their wives.

zh: 男女的经济合作发生在姐妹与兄弟之间而不是丈夫与妻子之间。
en: Economic cooperation between men and women occurs between sisters and brothers, rather than husbands and wives.

zh: 对印度的研究和列维-斯特劳斯的影响一样使得迪蒙转向了结构主义，因为他认为这种理论立场能够最好地解释他的印度材料 (Dumont 1986)。
en: It was India as much as Lévi-Strauss that converted Dumont to structuralism, since he thought that this approach explained his Indian material best (see 1986).

zh: 但是在牛津做讲师的那四年的经历（1951—1955) 也让他直接接触到了英国的经验主义，在那里他取代了拉德克利夫-布朗学派的功能主义者M.斯利尼瓦（M.Shnivas)——他自己把这段在牛津的经历称为“第二次训练”。
en: But he also had direct exposure to British empiricism through his four years as a lecturer in Oxford (1951–1955), where he replaced the Radcliffe-Brownian functionalist M. Srinivas — he referred to his Oxford experience as "a second training."

zh: 后来迪蒙返回法国，并继续到印度的北部做田野工作，这次调查他显然不太满意，相关出版物也极少。
en: Dumont then returned to France, then proceeded to India to undertake fieldwork in the north, with which he was apparentlyless satisfied and about which he published little.

zh: 1957年他回到巴黎担任印度社会学教授，随后又在EPHE任比较社会学教授并在那里一直干到退休。在EPHE他和戴维˙波科克（David Pocock)—起创办了《印度社会学进展》这本重要的期刊，其目的在于把印度人类学从原来的各种民俗学的、进化论的和功能主义的老路上拉出来从而使其进入到结构主义的轨道上去，这项事业显然是以《社会学年鉴》为蓝本的。
en: In 1957, now back in Paris with a chair in the sociology of India and later in comparative sociology at the EPHE, where he remained until he retired, he launched the important journal Contributions to Indian Sociology with David Pocock, the aim being to draw the anthropology of India away from its various folkloric, evolutionist, and functionalist origins and onto the path of structuralism, a venture obviously modeled on the Année sociologique.

zh: 在拉德克利夫-布朗（例如Radcliffe-Brown 1931)的澳大利亚田野民族志中，他提倡比较观点，并以当时发现的土著社会结构的完整复合体来解释澳大利亚土著亲属体系的多样性。
en: In his Australian ethnography, Radcliffe-Brown (e.g., 1931) advocated a comparative perspective and explained the diversity in Aboriginal kinship systems in terms of the full complex of Aboriginal social structure found at the time.

zh: 作为推崇归纳法的学者，他相信有一天人类学可以通过比较发现“社会的自然法则”（虽然他自己并没有做太多研究）。
en: An inductivist, he believed that anthropology would one day discover through comparison the ‘natural laws of society’ (though he himself did not get very far in the effort).

zh: 作为经验论者，他反对推测构成社会的体系或制度起源，并认为人类学家只应该研究他们所发现的那些东西。
en: As an empiricist, he opposed speculation about the origins of the systems or institutions which make up society and argued that anthropologists should study just what they find.

zh: 人们鼓励，或至少比依附训练成为惯例的社会更加容忍侵犯行为和性行为。
en: Displays of aggression and sexuality are encouraged or at least tolerated to a greater degree than where dependence training is the rule.

zh: 在学校，甚至在家庭，人们都强调竞争。
en: In schools, and even in the family, competition is emphasized.

zh: 在美国，我们已走向极端，把婴儿期的生物学功能——吃、睡、哭叫、排泄——转变为父母与子女之间的竞争。
en: In the United States, we have gone to the extreme of turning the biological functions of infancy—eating, sleeping, crying, and elimination 一into contests between parents and offspring.

zh: 在我们的学校，相当多的资源投入到了竞技运动，人们在教室之内也培养竞技：公开的形式,诸如拼单词比赛以及有奖竞赛等；隐蔽的形式，诸如按学生成绩分布曲线评级分类。
en: In our schools, considerable resources are devoted to competitive sports, but competition is fostered within the classroom as well: overtly, through devices such as spelling bees and competition for prizes, and covertly, through devices such as grading on a curve.

zh: 夸扣特尔人被描述为恰好相反——作为酒神精神的一个例证。
en: Kwakiutl are described as the opposite – an example of a Dionysian culture.

zh: 在宗教仪式上，领舞者进入深度迷乱状态。
en: In their religious ceremonies the chief dancer goes into deep trance.

zh: 他口吐白沫，浑身剧烈颤抖。为安全起见，通常身上要绑四根绳子（分别由四个人拉住）。
en: He foams at the mouth, trembles violently, and typically has to be tied up with four ropes (each held by a different person) to keep him from doing any damage.

zh: 因此，婚后居住安排完全不是任意的，实际上是适应性的。
en: A newly married couple may adopt one of five common patterns of residence whose prime determinants are ecological circumstances, although other factors enter in as well.

zh: 一种选择是从父居（patrilocal residence）。这正是玛雅人采取的居处模式：妇女与其丈夫一起到她丈夫在其中长大的那个家户中居住。
en: One option is patrilocal residence; as just described for the Maya, a woman goes to live with her husband in the household he grew up in.

zh: 偏爱这种安排在于男性在维持生计中起主导地位的作用，尤其是如果他们拥有能够积累的财产，如果一夫多妻制是一种习俗，如果战事足以造成特别重要的男性之间的合作，如果存在一种由男性掌握权力的复杂的政治组织的时候。
en: Favoring this arrangement are societies with a predominant role for men in subsistence, particularly if they own property that can be accumulated, if polygyny is customary, if warfare is prominent enough to make cooperation among men especially important, and if an elaborate political or ganization in which men wield authority exists.

zh: 进一步说，需要认识到，有一些要求自决的情况已经超出了联合国或其他有组织的国际程序力所能及的范围。
en: Furthermore, it is necessary to keep in mind that a number of other situations in which claims for self-determination have been put remain outside the reach of the UN or any other organised international process.

zh: 有时，这些情况则不断以政治、军事冲突形式来拖延历史进程。
en: Sometimes these situations continue to be characterised for protracted historical periods by political and military conflict.

zh: 毫无疑问，鉴于现实情况如此复杂多样，一贯为国际接受的关于自决的政治原理并不存在。
en: It is not surprising that in view of such diversity no coherent and internationally accepted political doctrine of self-determination exists.

zh: 在所有分层社会或多或少都有流动。
en: Mobility is present to a greater or lesser extent in all stratified societies.

zh: 开放的阶级社会是指人们在其中最容易流动的那些社会。
en: Open-class societies are those with the easiest mobility.

zh: 然而，在大多数情况下，变动仅限于社会阶梯中向上或向下移动一级。
en: In most cases, however, the move is limited to one rung up or down the social ladder.

zh: 流动程度与下述因素有关，比如较高的教育，或者在社会中占支配地位的家庭组织类型。
en: The degree of mobility is related to the type of family organization that prevails in a society.

zh: 在扩大家庭是常态的社会中，流动常常受到严格的限制。
en: Where the extended family is the norm, mobility tends to be severely limited.

zh: 独立的核心家庭则使流动变得更加容易。
en: The independent nuclear family provides an easier situation for mobility.

zh: 这些不同的视角集合在一起导致了对许多经典民族志个案的重新评价，如丛林区的昆人（Kung)、夸扣特尔人和霍皮人（Hopi)，它容许我们重新思考一些已经成为关于人类本性和文化的常识的结论。
en: The bringing together of these different perspectives has led to a reevaluation of several of the classic ethnographic cases, such as those of the Kung Bushmen, the Kwakiutl, and the Hopi, allowing us to rethink the conclusions that had become received knowledge about human nature and culture.

zh: 例如，在亚马逊流域。
en: Consider, for example, Amazonia.

zh: 近期的考古学已经将此区域的史前记录向前扩展到1.2万年以前，它揭示出的早期社会的复杂性远远超出了之前的预期。这使得人们对认为这是一种拥有较低生产力的边缘环境的假设为基础的理论产生了怀疑（Roosevelt 1994)。
en: Recent archaeology that has extended the prehistoric record back to twelve thousand years ago has revealed much greater early complexity than had been expected, casting doubt on theories based on the assumption that this was a marginal environment with low productive capacity (Roosevelt 1994).

zh: 同样地，通过采用民族史方法研究欧洲人的征服对亚马逊流域的人类组织在人口规模和生态学上的影响所得到的发现，使曾一度盛行的民族志分析受到了质疑，其主题从战争到神话涵盖甚广。
en: Similarly, the uncovering through ethnohistory of the demographic and ecological impact of European conquest on human organization in Amazonia has called into question prevalent ethnographic analyses on topics from warfare to myth.

zh: 这一系列的证据和这些解释模式被证明在理解复杂社会和当代社会时是有帮助的，相比于理解传统人类学所感兴趣的社会，对复杂社会和当代社会的理解才是现今文化人类学更为经常关注的焦点。
en: This range of evidence and these modes of interpretation are proving as useful for understanding the complex and contemporary societies on which cultural anthropology is now more often focused,as for comprehending societies of traditional anthropological interest.

zh: 这尤其符合于那些没有将其对象历史化的表述，它们在一种“民族志的当前”(事实上总是过去）描绘异域社会。
en: This is especially true of representations that have not historicized their objects, portraying exotic societies in an "ethnographic present" (which is always, in fact, a past).

zh: 这种共时性的悬置有效地将他者文本化，在一种既不在时间的流动中，也不在同样暧昧不明、变动的历史的当前创造出一种真实感，这种真实感包括并定位了他者、民族志作者和读者。
en: This synchronic suspension effectively textualizes the other, and gives the sense of a reality not in temporal flux, not in the same ambiguous, moving historical present that includes and situates the other, the ethnographer, and the reader.

zh: 用约翰尼斯˙费边的话说：“异时的”表述已经弥漫在20世纪的科学民族志里，它们用罗萨尔多所反对的神话化方式鼓励寓言性的挪用。
en: "Allochronic" representations, to use Johannes Fabian's term, have been pervasive in twentieth-century scientific ethnography.They invite allegorical appropriations in the mythologizing mode Rosaldo repudiates.

zh: 但他很快恢复了镇定，接着又召集主教们到楼上开会并对他们进行恐吓和威胁。
en: But he soon rallied sufficiently to bully the bishops whom he had summoned to attend upon him upstairs.

zh: 众人告诉亨利，托马斯把他们申斥了一顿并且警告他们今后不得对他进行任何世俗的指控和审判。
en: They told him that Thomas had reprimanded them and forbidden them to judge him henceforth on any secular charge.

zh: 亨利闻言大为恼怒，并说这是对克拉伦顿法令第11条的刻意违犯，因为这一条法令规定主教必须参加所有由国王受理和审判的案件，除非这些案件是暴力和凶杀的血案。
en: Angrily, Henry replied that this was a clear violation of Article XI of the Constitutions of Clarendon, which bound the bishops to participate in all of the king's trials and judgments unless these involved the shedding of blood.

zh: 奥马哈制(Omaha system，因内布拉斯加州奧马哈印第安人而得名），是与母系的克劳制相对应的父系系统。
en: The Omaha System (named for the Omaha Indians of Nebraska) is the patrilineal equivalent of the matrilineal Crow system.

zh: 因此，母亲及其姐妹共用一个称呼，父亲及其兄弟共 用一个称呼,而平表兄弟姐妹则与兄弟和姐妹共用另一个称呼（参见图10.9)。
en: Thus, a mother and his brother are merged under another, and parallel cousins are merged with brothers and sisters (Figure 10.9).

zh: 母亲一方的交表兄弟姐妹提高了一个辈分，而父亲一方的交表兄弟姐妹则等同于“自 我”的子女一辈。
en: Cross cousins on the maternal side are raised a generation, while those on the paternal side are equated with ego5s children generation.

zh: 这样,一个父系世系群的女人为另一个父系世系群的男人所生的子女，就降低了一个辈分。
en: Thus, children born of women from one patrilineage for the men of another patrilineage are lowered by one generation.

zh: 克利人与他们猎捕的动物属于一个单一的道德群体，其成员相互认可并互尽义务。
en: The extent to which the animals are really seen as choosing to give themselves is not entirely clear from the ethnography.

zh: 克利人了解动物的需求和敏感性，在他们的日常活动中会将它们考虑在内。同样，动物也了解克利人的需求，像他们的亲属那样在他们需要帮助的时候满足他们的需求。克利猎手们会得到动物朋友的协助，他们与这些动物建立了长期的伙伴关系（1979:139—140）。
en: Cree hunters go to considerable lengths to outwit their quarry (Scott1989:199), and some Cree myths present hunting as a struggle between hunter and animal (Tanner 1979:149).

zh: 礼物在人的社区（居所）和动物的领地(丛林）之间进行交换。
en: Hunting is also likened to a sexual relationship in which the hunter seduces the animal with charms and songs.

zh: 动物将它们自己作为食物赠给克利人，克利人则以敬献烟草作为回报，从烟囱里飘出的袅袅炊烟将烧烤中的食物又带回了丛林（Tanner 1979:172— 174)。
en: Reluctant animals may be tricked into giving themselves up against their will (Bird-David 1993:113).

zh: 克利人向动物尽义务时，肉的分配以及对动物不可食用 部分的处理起着重要作用（Scott 1989:203—204)。
en: On the other hand, a hunter who has no success should not be too disappointed, because "it is wrong to expect more than is offered freely by a partner in reciprocity" (Scott 1989:204), and the reciprocal nature of the relationship is stressed repeatedly in Tanner's description.

zh: 刻板印象也可以发挥自我实现的预言的功能。
en: Stereotypes may also function as self-fulfilling prophecies.

zh: 例如，一个优势群体在学校里可能会因为宣称劣势群体天生愚蠢的系统攻击而将他们变成学校的劣等生。
en: A dominating group may, for example, turn a dominated group into school dunces by systematically bombarding them with statements to the effect that they are born stupid.

zh: 也有许多刻板印象与社会事实没有明确的关系。
en: There are also many stereotypes with no clear relationship to social facts.

zh: 在许多社会对食人族的控告就是典型的例子：它们通常都是错误的（Arens 1978)。
en: Accusations about cannibalism in many societies are typical examples: they are usually false (Arens 1978).

zh: 刻板印象为种族边界提供了意识形态的合法化（不要与他们中的人结婚！）并加强了群体内聚力（我们都不喜欢他们是一件好事）。
en: Stereotypes provide ideological legitimation of ethnic boundaries ("Don't marry one of those!") and strengthen group cohesion ("It's a good thing we're not like them").

zh: “当地人的观点”是主位，而人类学家的分析视角是客位。
en: The "native's point of view" is emic, whereas the analytical perspective of the anthropologist is etic.

zh: 但是， 尽管人类学家的目标是用受访者的感知方式重现现实，却有三个理由可以说明这种结果不可能成为一种主位描述。
en: However, even if the anthropologist aims to reproduce reality the way it is perceived by the informants, there are three reasons why the result may never be an emic description.

zh: 首先，我们必须经常在两种不同的语言之间进行翻译，而翻译与原样是有区别的。
en: First, we must usually translate between two different languages, and the translation is different from the original.

zh: 第二，我们使用书写作为复制口述段落的工具，而当它们被转化成书面文字的时候，言语的意义有了改变。
en: Second, we use a written medium to reproduce oral statements, and the meaning of utterances changes when they are transformed into writing.

zh: 第三，人类学家永远不可能与他或她所描写的人一模一样。
en: Third, the anthropologist can never become identical with the people he or she writes about.

zh: 因此，唯一真正可能的人类学主位描述只能是由他们本国人用母语所写。
en: The only truly emic descriptions possible in anthropology are therefore accounts written by natives in their vernacular.

zh: 科学活动必须使自身适应于现实的结构。它必须具有足够锐利的工具和极有条理的方法，才能有效地把握现实，使之为我们所理解。
en: Scicncing must adapt itself to the structure of reality; its tools must be so shaped and its techniques so ordered as to grasp reality effectively and render it intelligible to us.

zh: 因此，这就意味着我们将有三种从事科学活动的方式。一种是从整体上领会现实界空间一时间属性的方式，两种属于辅助和派生的方式，分别探讨这一属性的两个侧面之一，即空间和时间。
en: This means, therefore, that we shall have three ways of sciencing: one which grasps the space-time property of reality in its entirety, and two subsidiary and derivative ways, each of which deals with one of the two aspects of this property, viz., space and time.

zh: 人们会发现，全部“科学”或科学活动，都可以被这样那样地归入这三个范畴之中.除这三者之外，再无其它的科学活动方式了。
en: All of "science" or sciencing will be found to be assignable to one or another of these three categories; there is no way of sciencing apart from these three.

zh: 大多数口号希望达到的效果是劝说，特別是说服讲演者的听众——虽然讲演者往往发现自己也会被自己的言语说服——这一点在政治领域或许十分常见。
en: The effect which rhetoric most often intends is persuasion, in particular the persuasion of an audience by a speaker—although a speaker might also be found to be persuaded by his own voicing of his words—and this is perhaps most clearly seen in the realm of politics.

zh: 口号可以看作是讲演者的手段，用来获得或加强对政治环境的控制。
en: Rhetoric can be seen as an instrument by which a speaker gains or increases control over a political environment.

zh: 一旦这种控制规范化、制度化，那么控制语言、控制发言权就成为权力和权威的核心基础。
en: And once this control becomes routinized, institutionalized, then control over language, over the right to speak, may be defined as an essential base of power and authority.

zh: 叙事似乎是最容易记录和搜集的一种口头艺术。
en: Narratives seem to be one of the easiest kinds of verbal arts to record or collect.

zh: 也许因为它们也是最适于公开发行的一种口头艺术而且在北美文化中最受欢迎，所以它们得到大量研究和关注。
en: Perhaps because they also are the most publishable, with popular appeal in North American culture, they have received the most study and attention.

zh: 一般而言，叙事分为三个基本的再出现的类别：神话，传奇和故事。
en: Generally, narratives have been divided into three basic and recurring categories: myth, legend, and tale.

zh: 此外，他们还会毁灭贵重物品：将咸鱼扔掉并焚烧帐篷和地毯。博厄斯大约在世纪之交的时候写道，往昔岁月，他们甚至会将奴隶们扔进大海以夸耀他们的财富。
en: In addition, they destroyed valuables, throwing salt fish away and setting fire to tents and carpets; in the old days, Boas wrote around the turn of the century, they even threw slaves into the sea to show off their wealth.

zh: 在接下来举行的另一场盛会上，首领主人在毁灭能力上将会超越前一位主人。
en: At the return party, the hosting chief would have to surpass the previous host in destructive capabilities.

zh: 能够毁掉最多财物的那位首领，将会在地区的等级制度中获得最髙的级别。
en: The chief who could afford to destroy most, achieved the highest rank in the regional hierarchy.

zh: 类似于夸富宴的其他制度也在许多别的民族中存在。
en: Institutions similar to the potlatch exist among many other peoples.

zh: 浪费的目的是为了建立一种自己居于顶点的政治等级制度。
en: The purpose of the waste is to establish a political hierarchy with oneself on top.

zh: 莫斯（Mauss 1954）在法国习俗中识别出了一种类似于夸富宴的温和形式，那里的人们试图通过赠送奢侈的结婚礼物而超越其他人。
en: Mauss (1954) has identified a milder form of potlatch in the French custom of trying to surpass others by giving lavish wedding presents.

zh: 莫斯将夸富宴制度描述成是更普遍的互惠现象的一种“扭曲的”形式，而在许多社会中，互惠是一种重要的社会制度。
en: Mauss describes the potlatch institution as a "perverted" form of the more widespread phenomenon of reciprocity, which is an important social institution in many societies.

zh: 跨国公司在世界并非什么新事物（17世纪的荷属东印度公司就是一个很好的例子），但它们只是在20世纪后半期才变得普遍起来。
en: Multinational corporations are not new in the world (the Dutch East India Company is a good example from the 17th century), but they were not common until the 1950s.

zh: 现在，它们已经成为世界上的一支重要力址。
en: Since then they have become a major force in the world.

zh: 这些现代巨人实际上是多个不同国籍的公司组成的集团，它们依靠共同的所有权这根纽带联结起来，并对共同经营策略负责。
en: These modern-day giants are actually clusters of corporations of diverse nationality joined together by ties of common ownership and responsive to a common management strategy.

zh: 通常，这些跨国公司都受位于某国的总公司的严密控制，它们跨越不同国家的国界组织和整合生产，这种生产是服务于在公司董事会会议室里达成的利益，而不管这些利益与这些公司所在国人民的利益是否一致。
en: Usually tightly controlled by a head office in one country, these multinationals organize and integrate production across the boundaries of different countries for interests formulated in corporate boardrooms, irrespective of whether or not these are consistent with the interests of people in the countries where they operate.

zh: 危地马拉和墨西哥南部的玛雅人也生活在扩大家庭中。
en: The Maya of Guatemala and southern Mexico also live in extended family households.

zh: 在他们的许多社区中，父亲的房屋建在一小块空场地的一边，而儿子则带着他们的妻子住在这块场地其他边缘的房屋中（参见图9）。
en: In many of their communities, sons bring their wives to live in houses built on the edges of a small open plaza, where on one edge their father's house already stands (Figure 9.2).

zh: 许多家庭活动就在这片场地上进行，妇女们可以在这里编织，男人们可以在这里招待客人，孩子们则在一起玩耍。
en: Numerous household activities occur on this plaza; here women may weave, men may receive guests, and children play together.

zh: 父亲是一家之主，大多数的重要决定都由他做出。
en: The head of the family is the sons's father, who makes most of the important decisions.

zh: 家庭所有成员为了共同的利益一起工作，并作为一个整体与外人打交道。
en: Ail family members work together for the common good and deal with outsiders as a single unit.

zh: 图腾制理论中还有西格蒙德•弗洛伊德（Freud 1960 [1913]:140 -55各处）的解释。
en: Interesting among theories of totemism is that of Sigmund Freud (1960 [1913]: 140–55 passim).

zh: 虽然其理论基本上属于拉马克式，但弗洛伊德在达尔文观点和神学家威廉•罗伯逊•史密斯的思想基础上建立了他的理论。
en: Though essentially a Lamarckian, he built his theory on the ideas of Darwin and also of theologian William Robertson Smith.

zh: 弗洛伊德试图同时解释的是图腾制度的起源、祭祀和乱伦禁忌这些所有问题。

en: What he sought to explain was no less than the origin of totemism, sacrifice, and the incest taboo all at once.

zh: 在1848年革命失败之前以及之后的一段时间，浪漫主义和民族主义双重浪潮都是影响广泛和异质的运动，包含了差不多一样多的知识分子、工人和商人；这两个运动既有左翼也有右翼。
en: Before and for some time after the failed 1848 revolution, the twin currents of Romanticism and nationalism were broad, heterogeneous movements that comprised intellectuals as much as workers and businesspeople;they were movements with both left and right wings.

zh: 民族主义和浪漫主义都倾向于把新的重心放在本国农村地区。
en: Nationalism and Romanticism both favored a new focus on rural homelands.

zh: 浪漫主义崇尚拥抱乡间生活，因为它在寻求田园诗般和谐的审美境界，这些美学价值观后来对民族主义新政治运动产生了标准化影响。
en: Romanticism embraced the domestic countryside because of its search for a retreat into the aesthetics of idyllic harmony.In turn, these new aesthetic values had a standardizing impact upon the new political movements of nationalism.

zh: 正如汉娜·阿伦特（Hannah Arendt)指出的，在德语国家以及大多数中北欧地区中，民族主义对理想生活的浪漫主义想象被看作是一种向国家所宣称的农村根基的回归 (Arendt 1958)。
en: As Hannah Arendt pointed out, the ideal life in the Romantic imaginary of nationalism in the German-speaking countries,as much as in most of Central and Northern Europe, was perceived as a return to a natio's alleged rural roots (Arendt 1958).

zh: 大多数村民都是亲戚，他们实行的婚姻制度是我们所称做的双边交表婚（参见第八章），意思是一个年轻女性必须与一个男人结婚，而这个男人必须是她母亲的兄弟的儿子同时也是她父亲的姐妹的儿子。
en: Most of the inhabitants are relatives.They practise a system of marriage that we would call bilateral cross-cousin marriage (see Chapter 8), which means that a young woman must marry a man who is recognised as her mother's brother's son and her father's sister's son.

zh: 他们的亲属称谓是分类的，也就是说，他们使用亲属称呼描述整个类别的人群，从生物意义上说，这些人并不一定有关系（参见第七章和第十一章）。
en: Their kin terminology is classificatory; in other words, they use kin terms to describe whole categories of persons whom they are not necessarily biologically related to (see Chapters 7 and 11).

zh: 比起多贡人，雅诺马马人的劳动分工相对简单一些，大致是按照性别和年龄进行分工。
en: The Yanomamö have a less complex division of labour than the Dogon; it generally follows gender and age.

zh: 最年幼的和最年长的有权不参加劳动，女人主要负责农活，只有男人外出打猎。
en: The youngest and the oldest are entitled not to work, while the women are mainly responsible for agricultural activities, and only the men go hunting.

zh: 村子的首领和巫师是村子里的最高权威。
en: The village headman and the shaman are the highest authorities in the villages.

zh: 这些职务都不是世袭的；他们要通过出色的人品和与他人对权力的角逐才能获得。
en: Neither of these offices is hereditary; they are achieved through outstanding personal qualities and through successfully competing for power with others.

zh: 他们的亲属称谓是分类的，也就是说，他们使用亲属称呼描述整个类别的人群，从生物意义上说，这些人并不一定有关系（参见第七章和第十一章）。
en: Their kin terminology is classificatory; in other words, they use kin terms to describe whole categories of persons whom they are not necessarily biologically related to (see Chapters 7 and 11).

zh: 比起多贡人，雅诺马马人的劳动分工相对简单一些，大致是按照性别和年龄进行分工。
en: The Yanomamö have a less complex division of labour than the Dogon; it generally follows gender and age.

zh: 最年幼的和最年长的有权不参加劳动，女人主要负责农活，只有男人外出打猎。
en: The youngest and the oldest are entitled not to work, while the women are mainly responsible for agricultural activities, and only the men go hunting.

zh: 村子的首领和巫师是村子里的最高权威。
en: The village headman and the shaman are the highest authorities in the villages.

zh: 这些职务都不是世袭的；他们要通过出色的人品和在与他人对权力的角逐中获胜才能获得。
en: Neither of these offices is hereditary; they are achieved through outstanding personal qualities and through successfully competing for power with others.

zh: 核心家庭是现代社会中的一种重要制度，而且在许多这样的社会中，亲属制度对于个人的职业机会、政治归属、居住地点等等而言，都是决定性的。
en: The nuclear family is an important institution in modern societies, and in many such communities kinship is decisive for one's career opportunities, political belonging, place of residence and more.

zh: 但在资本劳动力市场，表面上是基于正式的自愿契约和个人成就——而不是亲属制度义务和所属的身份。
en: The capitalist labour market, however, is ostensibly based on formally voluntary contracts and individual achievement – not on kinship commitments and ascribed identity.

zh: 因此，习惯上把基于家族的组织当做一种与官僚组织的对比，并且可能也是一种威胁，后者是现代社会中的劳动力市场和政治管理系统的特征。
en: It is therefore customary to regard the kin-based organisation as a contrast, and possible threat, to the bureaucratic organisation characteristic of both the labour market and the system of political administration in modern state societies.

zh: 基于家族的组织的基础是对特定个人的忠诚，而官僚组织理想的基础是对抽象原则的忠诚，特别是法律和契约职责。
en: Kin-based organisation is based on loyalty to specific persons, while bureaucratic organisation ideally is based on loyalty to abstract principles, notably the law and contractual obligations.

zh: 同族可能有互相帮助的义务，而官僚主义者必须使自己面对不同的人时都遵从同一程序和原则。
en: Kinsmen may be obliged to help each other out, whereas bureaucrats have committed themselves to following identical procedures and principles no matter who they are dealing with.

zh: 例如，从这些项目中得到的数据，可以使体质人类学家更好地理解哪些DNA控制哪些体质特点，以及我们早期的祖先怎样适应他们所处的自然环境。
en: For example, the data available in these projects will allow physical anthropologists to better understand which DNA controls which physical features and how our early ancestors adapted to their physical environments.

zh: 它也将会使得我们更加充分地了解我们自身及与我们最接近的非人类灵长类动物共享的进化历史。
en: It will also allow us to more fully understand the evolutionary history we share with our closest nonhuman primate relatives.

zh: 最后，它将会提供给学者关于体质多样性的其他标志，超越以前所依赖的血型或肤色。
en: Finally, it will give scholars other indicators of physical variation than those on which they have relied in the past, such as blood type or skin color.

zh: 他提到的最著名的例子之一是巴黎咖啡馆的侍者，是如何谨慎而专业地努力发散出“身为侍者”的味道：依靠他的凝视、他的手势以及在他走动时平衡装满饮料的托盘的优雅姿态，以一种看似冷淡的方式、穿过厨房的门，他清楚地表达了作为侍者应该如何。
en: One of his most famous examples is the waiter at a Parisian cafe, who cautiously and professionally tries to exude "waiterness".By virtue of his gaze, his gestures and his elegant way of balancing a full tray of drinks while he swings, in a seemingly nonchalant way, through the kitchen doors, he gives a clear expression of being a waiter.

zh: 但是，如果他在家也以这种角色对待他的妻子，过不了多久，她大概就会提出离婚。萨特在其对角色扮演的哲学描述中，提出了一个此后一直被众多社会学家和人类学家所追随的话题：他们关心行动者操控身份以及因此而解放自己的能力——并非同样地是从身份中，而是从某些身份似乎包含的明显的强制中。
en: However, if he were to maintain this role at home with his wife, she would presumably file for a divorce within a few weeks.In his philosophical descriptions of role enactment, Sartre brings up a topic which has since been pursued by many sociologists and anthropologists.They have focused on the ability of actors to manipulate their statuses and thereby liberate themselves – not from the statuses as such, but from the apparent coercion certain statuses seem to imply.

zh: 韦伯借鉴了齐美尔的观点，乍一看，他比后者更加形式主义。
en: Weber borrowed from Simmel and, at first glance, he was the more formalist of the two.

zh: 韦伯发展了反经验主义的“理想类型”（idea types)这一概念，是指我们对于事物如何发挥作用的想象理解。
en: He developed the anti-empiricist notion of ‘ideal types’ – our imagined understandings of how things work.

zh: 他认为，要想理解社会学体系中的个别事件，进行想象理解是必需的。
en: He argued that these are necessary in order to comprehend individual events in a social system.

zh: 第二，人类学家都力图避免陷入当地理性观念的重置语境，这会使他们的资料显得“杂乱”。不合逻辑或冲突矛盾或许证实的是另一种与西方观念不同的逻辑和途径。
en: Secondly, anthropologists have sought to avoid a recontextualization of local notions of rationality; what appears "chaotic" in their data, illogical and contradictory, may well evidence an alien logic and way of ordering matterwhich does not accord with Western notions.

zh: 关于理性的讨论中（Wilson l970；Hollis and Lukes 19821；Overing 1985a),人类学家一直在探索可以使自己的资料避免受到经验性合理条件和西方正统逻辑规则干扰的方法。
en: In debates over rationality, therefore (Wilson 1970; Hollis and Lukes 1982; Overing 1985a), anthropologists have sought ways of avoiding construing their data via the empirically based truth conditions and formal rules of logic of the West.

zh: 前者于1940年出版，与关于这同一民族的其他两部书和多篇文章一起，长期以来一直被认为是典范性的民族志著作。
en: The former, published in 1940, has long been recognized, along with two other books and various articles on the same people, as an exemplary ethnographic work.

zh: 后者于1975年出版，由一个著名的法国社会史学家撰写，由于它被认为创造性地利用一种审讯记录以构建一个14世纪法国村庄的“民族志”分析，已经获得了广泛的赞誉。
en: The latter, published in 1975 by a noted French social historian, has received wide acclaim for its innovative use of an inquisition register to construct an "ethnographic" analysis of a fourteenth-century French village.

zh: 勒华拉杜里的这种介入与其他关于历史学和人类学的实验性著作一起被称颂为开创了这样的可能性：让历史学更具有民族志特性和让民族志更具有历史性。
en: Le Roy Ladurie's intervention, among other experimental works of history and anthropology, has been hailed as opening the possibility of a more ethnographic history and a more historical ethnography.

zh: 如果从建立机构的数量上比较，历史人类学在1989年之前的一个10年中仍然比社会人类学强大，而今天则反过来了：社会人类学成为德语国家现在的主流趋势。
en: If compared quantitatively according to the number of institutional positions, historical anthropology was still stronger than social anthropology in the pre-1989 decade, whereas today the reverse is true: social anthropology has become a mainstream tendency in the German-speaking countries of the present.

zh: 在1989年之前很早的时候，当社会人类学者接手了苏黎世、维也纳和西柏林的三个最大的大学院系的时候，这一缓慢的转变已经显露出来并被预见了。
en: This gradual transformation already was indicated and anticipated when, long before 1989, social anthropologists took over the three largest university departments in Zürich, Vienna, and West Berlin.

zh: 当民族社会学通常还是一个德语术语之时，社会人类学也已对经济和宗教主题给予了应有的关注。
en: While Ethnosoziologieoften continued to be the German term, social anthropology has also included due attention to economic and religious topics.

zh: 此外，许多身为历史人类学家 (如施勒希尔、约翰逊和杰特马）的有影响的学者自己也在某种程度上从事社会人类学研究，并在他们的学生中推广。
en: In addition, a number of influential scholars who are primarily historical anthropologists (Schlesier, Johansen, Jettmar) also pursued social anthropology to some extent themselves and promoted it among their students.

zh: 连续一夫一妻制是一个男子或一个女子与一系列配偶结婚的婚姻形式。
最近数十年中，由于离婚和再婚，这种形式在北美中产阶级中越来越普遍。
然而，在妇女做大量生产性工作的社会中，一夫多妻制可作为一种手段，为家户增添财富。
en: Yet in societies where women do most of the productive work, polygyny may serve as a means of generating wealth for a household.

zh: 尽管在特定社会极少数婚姻是一夫多妻的，但人们也认为它是恰当的婚姻形式，在世界大多数社会，它甚至还是人们优先选择的婚姻形式。
en: Although few marriages in a given society may be polygynous, it is regarded as an appropriate, and even preferred, form of marriage in the majority of the world's societies.

zh: 因为有剩余男子的社区不多，所以一妻多夫制，即妇女有几个丈夫的习俗是不常见的。
en: Since few communities have a surplus of men, polyandry, or the custom of a woman having several husbands, is uncommon.

zh: 几个男人与几个女人相互有性接触权的群婚也是罕见的。
en: Also rare is group marriage, in which several men and several women have sexual access to one another.

zh: 夫兄弟婚通过规定寡妇与她已故丈夫的兄弟结婚来为妇女提供保障，妻姐妹婚规定鳏夫与他已故妻子的姐妹结婚。
en: The levirate ensures the security of a woman by providing that a widow marry her husband's brother; the sororate provides that a widower marry his wife's sister.Serial monogamy is a form in which a man or woman marries a series of partners* In recent decades, this pattern has become increasingly common among middle-class North Americans as individuals divorce and remarry.

zh: 对打破乱伦禁忌者的惩罚并非都是严厉的；但是，直系亲属之间的婚姻一直都是被严格禁止的。乱伦禁忌为什么是普遍的？
en: Sanctions against violations of the incest taboo are not universally strong; however, marriage between close kin is always strictly prohibited.Why is the incest taboo universal?

zh: 从泰勒和弗洛伊德的时代以来，提出了各种解释方案。
en: Since the time of Tylor and Freud, several explanations have been put forward.

zh: 一些人类学家指出，规则的社会优势包括：通过吸收新成员和跨越家族边界铸造联盟，使群体得以扩张（参见第八章）。
en: Several anthropologists have pointed out the social advantages of the rule, including the expansion of the group through the inclusion of new members and the forging of alliances across kin boundaries (see Chapter 8).

zh: 与世系群不同，氏族的居住地往往是分散的而非集中于某地。
en: Unlike lineages, clan residence is usually dispersed rather than localized.

zh: 在缺少居处统一性的情况下，氏族的身份认同往往通过图腾得到强化。图腾通常是自然界的符号化，它能够提醒成员他们拥有一个共同的祖先。
en: In the absence of residential unity, clan identification is often reinforced by totems, usually symbols from nature that remind members of their common ancestry.

zh: 联族或半偶族是一个包含两三个氐族的单系继嗣群体，这些氐族被认为拥有共同的血统。
en: A phratry is a unilineal descent group of two or more clans that supposedly share a common ancestry.

zh: 如果一个社会只有两个这样的群体，它们就被称作半偶族。
en: If there are but two such groups, they are called moieties.

zh: 或许除了作为个人的深层的东西之外，良知还是人体构造中比血管之类更为重要的构成部件。
en: Except, perhaps, that conscience seems deeper within one, a more intimate part of one's make-up, than semi-circular canals.

zh: 血管只是一种机械手段，而良知则是人类本身、人的自我的组成部分。
en: After all, these canals are merely a mechanical device, whereas a conscience is an integral part of one's self, one's ego.

zh: 然而，由于全部判断都是在直接经验的基础上作出的，我们仍然可能为幻觉所欺骗，而这正是目前这个实例中所出现的状况。
en: Yet, for all the conviction that immediate experience carries, we can still be tricked by illusion.And this is exactly what has happened in the present instance.

zh: 在沿缅因州海岸线的半岛和岛屿上曾实行这种居处模式。在那里，正如前面提到过的，扩大家庭的家户是建立在两可居基础上的。
en: This was once the situation on the peninsulas and islands along the Maine coast, where, as already noted, extended family households were based upon ambilocal residence.

zh: 这种居处模式在以寻食为生的民族当中特别普遍。例如，非洲依图利森林中的姆布蒂人就采取这种居处模式。
en: The same residential pattern is particularly common among food-foraging peoples, as among the Mbuti of Africa's Ituri forest.

zh: 裂变是指一个大的世系群分裂成新的小世系群，而原先的那个世系群则成为氏族。
en: Fission is the Small Places， Large Issuestting up of a large lineage group into new, smaller ones, with the original lineage becoming a clan.

zh: 氏族成员宣称他们源自同一个袓先，但却并不确切地知道与那个袓先的系谱联系。
en: Clan members claim descent from a common ancestor but without actually knowing the genealogical links to that ancestor.

zh: 与世系群不同氏族的居住地往往是分散的而非集中于某地。
en: Unlike lineages, clan residence is usually dispersed rather than localized.

zh: 在缺少居处统一性的情况下，氏族的身份认同往往通过图腾得到强化。图腾通常是自然界的符号化,它能够提醒成员他们拥有一个共同的祖先。
en: In the absence of residential unity, clan identification is often reinforced by totems, usually symbols from nature that remind members of their common ancestry.

zh: 联族或半偶族是一个包含两三个氏族的单系继嗣群体，这些氏族被认为拥有共同的血统。
en: A phratry is a unilineal descent group of two or more clans that supposedly share a common ancestry.

zh: 如果一个社会只有两个这样的群体，它们就被称作半偶族。
en: If there are but two such groups, they are called moieties.

zh: 虽说亚历山大（Alexander)用快刀斩乱麻的方式砍断了“戈耳狄俄斯之结”但却未能解开它。
en: But Alexander merely cut the Gordian knot; he did not untie it.

zh: 我们也没有“解决”这一精神-肉体问题，因为在人类的反应话动受到困扰的形式中，是不可能解决这个问题的。
en: Neither have we "solved" the mind-body problem, for in the form in which it has plagued the reflecting portion of mankind, it is insoluble.

zh: 但是我们已经找到了对付它的办法。
en: But we have disposed of it.

zh: 我们并没有证明，而且也不可能证明不存在宇宙实体或独立于肉体的精神。
en: We have not proved, nor can it be proved, that there is no cosmic entity, mind, which has an existence independent of bodies.

zh: 这些财产每一代由一名男性首领或其他男性头领控制，他继承了这些权利和义务，但因为继嗣只通过女性追溯，所以一个男性无法从他的父亲那里继承这些东西。这样，首领位置的继承是由一个男性传给他外甥的。
en: These properties are controlled each generation by a male chief or other leader who inherits these rights and obligations, but because descent is traced exclusively through women, a man cannot inherit these from his father.Thus, succession to positions of leadership passes from a man to his sister?s son.

zh: 由于这个原因，一个按常规管理其继嗣群体财产的男性，将带着他的妻子与他继承的那个人——他的舅舅生活在一起。
en: For this reason, a man who is in line to take control of his descent group5s assets will take his wife to live with the one he will succeed—his mother's brother.

zh: 这使他能够观察他怎样管理小村庄的事务，还能学会口述传统和巫术——他需要这些东西来成为一个有效的首领。
en: This enables him to observe how the older man takes care of his hamlet's affairs, as well as to learn the oral traditions and magic he will need to be an effective leader.

zh: 我们应该注意到，这种社会流动性并没有就这样挑战了种姓等级制度：相反，它公开地支持了它。
en: This kind of social mobility, we should note, does not challenge the caste hierarchy as such: rather, it openly endorses it.

zh: 这种被称为种姓冲突的政治冲突是一种不同的类型。
en: The type of political conflict spoken of as caste conflict is of a different kind.

zh: 潘（Pan）这个种姓是低级的、仪式上肮脏的和贫穷的种姓，其首领为甘地的种姓平等的观念所激励。
en: The Pan caste was a lowly, ritually polluting and poor caste whose leaders were inspired by Gandhi's notions of caste equality.

zh: 在一些场合，他们试图进入只为高级种姓服务的庙宇，但却被驱逐出来。
en: On several occasions they had tried to enter a temple reserved for the high castes, but had been evicted.

zh: 于是他们建造了自己的庙宇，并宣布他们自己是一个干净的种姓。
en: They then built their own temple and declared themselves a clean caste.

zh: 这个策略并没有被比斯帕拉的其他种姓所接受，他们将其看成是对规则的公然违背，而这无助于提高潘这个种姓被社会所定义的等级。
en: This strategy was not accepted by the other castes in Bisipara, who saw it at a blatant breach of rules, and it did not help in improving the socially defined rank of the Pan caste.

zh: 对于潘这个种姓来说，由于经济原因，采取制酒者的那种策略也是不可行的。
en: To the Pan caste, the strategy followed by the distillers was not feasible for economic reasons.

zh: 于是他们中的部分人开始采取第三种行动路线，试图通过竞争性的价值层次来提高他们的等级，也就是公共服务。
en: Thus some of them began to follow a third course of action, trying to improve their rank through a rivalling value hierarchy, namely the public service.

zh: 从人类学的观点来看，这需要进行经验主义的研究。
en: From an anthropological point of view, this needs to be studied empirically.

zh: 阿帕杜莱 （Appadurai 1990）因而提出了一个探究当代世界文化流动的研究框架。
en: Appadurai (1990) has thus proposed a framework for exploring cultural flow in the contemporary world.

zh: 他区分了全球文化流动的五种维度，它们发挥作用的方式各不相同。
en: He distinguishes between five dimensions in global cultural flow, which have different ways of functioning.

zh: 种族景观（the ethnoscape）如指“形成了我们生活在其中的易变的世界的那些人的景观”，也就是，世界人口统计学的特征——旅游、移居、流亡、差旅，还有那些稳定的社区。
en: The ethnoscape refers to "the landscape of persons who constitute the shifting world in which we live"; in other words, the demographic attributes of the world – tourism, migration, exile, business travel, but also stable communities.

zh: 科技景观（the	techoscape）的意思是“全球的……科技的……构造”，它在重要的方面形成了文化流的意义，也包括了参差不齐的全球的科技分布。
en: The technoscape means the "global configuration … of technology", which in important ways shapes the flow of cultural meaning, and also includes the uneven global distribution of technology.

zh: 长期以来一直令人类学家以及人类行为的其他研究者着迷的文化规则是乱伦禁忌（incest taboo）。
en: A cultural rule that long has fascinated anthropologists as well as other students of human behavior is the incest taboo.

zh: 这种乱伧禁忌至少在父母与相反性别的孩子之间，通常也在同胞兄弟姐妹之间禁止有性关系。
en: This prohibits sexual relations at least between parents and children of opposite sex and usually siblings as well.

zh: 除了涉及同胞兄弟姐妹的几个例外，乱伦禁忌曾被认为是普遍的，这在某种程度上变成对人类学家的挑战：既要解释乱伦禁忌被信以为真的普遍性，也要解释乱伦一般被视为那样令人厌恶的行为的原因。
en: Once thought to be universal, save for a few exceptions involving siblings, the taboo has became something of a challenge for anthropologists to explain, both regarding this supposed universality and why incest commonly should be regarded as such loathsome behavior.

zh: 人们已经给出许多解释。
en: Many explanations have been given.

zh: 其中，在不同时期有点流行的、最简单和最不令人满意的解释以“人的本性”为根据，即人类对乱伦有某种本能的厌恶。
en: Of those that have gained some popularity at one time or another, the simplest and least satisfactory is based on "human nature"一that is, some instinctive horror of incest.

zh: 世界各地的许多部族社会都规定或更喜欢男性与他母亲的兄弟的女儿结婚。
en: Many tribal societies throughout the world prescribe or prefer that the male marry the daughter of his mother's brother.

zh: 不过，同样是在这些社会，却又禁止生物学上关系非常紧密的表亲婚姻，像父亲的兄弟的儿子与母亲的姐妹的女儿之间的婚姻。
en: Yet these same societies forbid the marriage of cousins who are biologically just as close, that is, parallel cousins where the linking relative is the same sex as the parent, as in father's brother's son and mother's sister's daughter.

zh: 这一风俗的原因太过复杂，以至于不能在这里援引；其要点是，虽然乱伦禁忌可能很普遍或广泛存在，但是具体的禁忌则是变化多样。
en: The reasons for this custom are too complex to cite here; the point is that, although the incest taboo may be universal or widespread, the specific prohibition varies.

zh: 进一步，在这种方式下，科学的理解仍然是相当客现的，这只不过是因为我们运用的推理风格决定了客观性的尺度……需要通过推理才能证明的那一类命题，只是因为推理的风格才具有了一种实在性，才可能被判断为真或伪”（第49，65页）。
en: Furthermore, science understood in this way remains quite objective "simply because the styles of reasoning that we employ determine what counts as objectivity....Propositions of the sort that necessarily require reasoning to be substantiated have a positivity, a being true or false, only in consequence of the styles of reasoning in which they occur" (49, 65).

zh: 福柯所谓的真理与谬误的统治，或者游戏，既是历史实践的组成部分，又是它的产物。
en: What Foucault has called the regime, or game, of truth and falsity is both a component and a product of historical practices.

zh: 其他的程序和对象同样有可能合乎它的标准。

en: Other procedures and other objects could have filled the bill just as well and have been just as true.

zh: 个体在观点、世界观和身份获得上的多样性，或多或少是有意识的，思想、言论和行动上矛盾的演变也具有策略性。
en: This diversity of perspectives, of world-views and identities possessed by an individual can be more and less conscious, the deployment of contradictions in thought, speech and action more and less strategic.

zh: 矛盾可以隐匿在生活的瞬间，通过意识的存在启动记忆中的思想、感受、理解和情感，这就是弗吉尼亚·伍尔芙所说的“存在的瞬间”（Virginia Woolf 1976）。
en: Contradiction may be disguised by the momentariness of life, by the way that conscious existence turns on momentary thoughts, feelings, apprehensions, emotions, on what Virginia Woolf refers to as ‘moments of being’ (1976).

zh: 因此，当矛盾出现在他们对世界做出解释时，出现在他们赋予人和事意义时，个体生活中的矛盾将会被每一时刻的实践压力吞噬——绝对的秩序使得某一特定观点被强加到那一时刻——并被时时刻刻发生的他们的意识生活的不断变迁所淹没。
en: Hence, while contradictory in their interpretations of the world, in the meanings they imparted to people and events, nevertheless, the contradictoriness of individual lives may be swallowed up by the experiential intensity of each moment—by the absoluteness of order which one particular perspective leads them to attribute to that moment—and by the constant movement of their conscious lives from moment to moment.

zh: 一直以来有一种说法:科学人类学也是一种“艺术”，民族志具有文学品质。
en: It has long been asserted that scientific anthropology is also an "art," that ethnographies have literary qualities.

zh: 我们经常听说，某位著者的写作很有风格，某些描述生动或很有说服力 (难道不是所有精确的描述都有说服力吗？）。
en: We often hear that an author writes with style, that certain descriptions are vivid or convincing (should not every accurate description be convincing?).

zh: 一部作品在描述了事实之外，还被认定表达年动或经过艺术构思；表现力和修辞功能被认为是装饰性的 或仅仅是更有效地提出客观分析或描述的方法。
en: A work is deemed evocative or artfully composed in addition to being factual; expressive, rhetorical functions are conceived as decorative or merely as ways to present an objective analysis or description more effectively.

zh: 因此，问题的事实部分至少在原则上是可以同它们的传达方式分离的，但民族志的文学或修辞之维不再可能如此容易地被分割开来。
en: Thus the facts of the matter may be kept separate, at least in principle, from their means of communication.But the literary or rhetorical dimensions of ethnography can no longer be so easily compartmentalized.

zh: 它们在文化科学的每一层面都很活跃。
en: They are active at every level of cultural science.

zh: 确实文学”方法这个概念对于“人类学”这一学科来说，起了严重的误导作用。
en: Indeed, the very notion of a "literary" approach to a discipline, "anthropology," is seriously misleading.

zh: 在我们讨论语言的语音和形态时，我们简略地考察了语言的内部组织——它的音系学、形态学、句法和语法。
en: In our discussion of the sound and shape of language, we looked briefly at the internal organization of language—its phonology, morphology, syntax, and grammar.

zh: 正是对语言的描述性研究，注重记录和说明一种特殊语言在其历史上任一时期出现的所有特点。
en: Of various approaches to linguistics, descriptive linguistics is concerned with registering and explaining all the features of a particular language at any one time in its history.

zh: 例如，描述语言学专家注重现代法语或西班牙语目前发生作用的方式，仿佛它们是独立的系统，它们内部是一致的，从来不考虑它们发展的历史原因。
en: This approach concentrates, for example, on the way modern French or Spanish functions now, as if it were a separate system, consistent within itself, without any reference to historical reasons for its development.

zh: 然而，语言就如文化的其他部分一样有其历史。
en: Yet languages, like the rest of culture, have histories.

zh: 苏丹制或描述制（Sudanese or Descriptive system），是在非洲苏丹南部的民族中发现的，苏丹制由以得名。
en: The Sudanese or descriptive system is found among the peoples of southern Sudan in Africa—hence the name Sudanese.

zh: 除此之外，尽管它已经在中国农村逐步取代易洛魁亲属称谓制，但它还是在世界上很少社会中才见到。
en: Otherwise, it is found among few of the world's societies, although it has come to replace Iroquois terminology among rural Ghinese.

zh: 在这一制度中，母亲的兄弟与父亲的兄弟他们的称谓是有区别的，而父亲的兄弟和父亲的称谓也是不同的；母亲的姐妹和母亲是不同的，并且与父亲的姐妹也是区分开来的。
en: In this system, the mother's brother is distinguished from the father’s brother, who is distinguished from the father; the mother's sister is distinguished from the mother, as well as from the father's sister.

zh: 每一个堂表兄弟姐妹的称谓都彼此区分，并且他们和兄弟姐妹也是有区别的。
en: Each cousin is distinguished from all others, as well as from siblings.

zh: 因此它比其他任何一 种制度（包括英裔美国人所使用的那种）都要精确，这或许就是它为何如此稀少的一个原因。
en: It is therefore more precise than any of the other systems (including that used by Anglo Americans), which may be one reason it is so rare.

zh: 几乎没有什么社会将一个人所有的姑姨婶、叔伯舅、堂表兄弟姐妹以及自己的亲兄弟姐妹一一区分开来。
en: In few societies are all aunts, uncles, cousins, and siblings treated differently from one another.

zh: 例如，据一项保守的估计，20世纪80年代至少有1500个亚诺马密人死去，其中大多是蓄意大屠杀的受害者，他们是涌入巴西北部的牛仔和矿工。
en: For example, as a conservative estimate, at least 1,500 Yanomami died in the 1980s, often as victims of deliberate massacres, as cattle ranchers and miners poured into northern Brazil.

zh: 到1990年，亚诺马密人在巴西的土地已经有70%被违宪征用了；他们的鱼类供给受到河流里水银污染的毒化；而且疟疾、性病和肺结核猖獗。
en: By 1990, 70% of the Yanomami's land in Brazil had been unconstitutionally expropriated; their fish supplies were poisoned by mercury contamination of rivers； and malaria, venereal disease, and tuberculosis were running rampant.

zh: 亚诺马密人以每年10%的速度死去，而他们的出生率几乎已降到了零。
en: The Yanomami were dying at the rate of 10% a year, and their fertility had dropped off to near zero.

zh: 很多村子里已经没有儿童和老人，幸存的人们怀着对灭绝的极度恐惧等待着他们的命运。
en: Many villages were left with no children or old people, and the survivors awaited their fate with a profound terror of extinction.

zh: 人类学家一直都在批判城市化、大型社会，赞扬小型民间社区的美德。
en: Anthropologists have been among those critical of the urbanized, large-scale society, while praising the virtues of the small folk community.

zh: 人类学家与其他人一起，已经指出现代社会中的异化与丧失信心的无家可归者。
en: Anthropologists, along with others, have pointed to the alienation and despair in modern society, the dreary abode of the "homelessmind".

zh: 这些批评采取了许多形式，其中一种则是这样：都市社会使现代化技术的先进性变成一种自然系统，因为对手缺席；它是机械地组织而成，通过方法和目标，而不是经由文化通过意义组织而成，因此它是无意义的。
en: These criticisms take many forms, but one is this, that the sheer technological sophistication of modern, urban society renders it a kind of natural system by default; it is organized technically, by means and ends, rather than culturally, by meaning, hence it is meaningless.

zh: 这正是传统民俗研究中特别有意思的一类故事。
en: This is precisely the kind of tale of special interest in traditional folklore studies.

zh: 它是一个在世界各地都很受欢迎的“傻瓜”故事，它在印度、中东、巴尔干半岛、意大利、西班牙、英格兰、美国和非洲西部有着各种各样的版本。
en: It is an internationally popular "numbskull" tale; versions of it have been recorded in India, the Middle East, the Balkans, Italy, Spain, England, and the United States, as well as in West Africa.

zh: 它表现一个基本主题（motif）或故事情境——父亲和儿子想要取悦每一个人——这一主题在世界各地成千上万的民俗中一再出 现。
en: It is classified or cataloged as exhibiting a basic motif or story situation—father and son trying to please everyone—one of the many thousands found to recur in world folktales.

zh: 尽管细节上有差别，但每一个版本在事件发生的顺序上都有相同的基本结构——有时又被叫作故事的句法：一个农民父亲和儿子在一起干活,然后买了一头载货的牲口，两人带着牲口外出进行一次短途旅行，父亲骑驴，受人批评，儿子骑驴，又受人批评，两个人都步行，两个人都受批评，因而得出结论。
en: Despite variations in detail, every version has about the same basic structure in the sequence of events, sometimes called the syntax of the tale: a peasant father and son work together, a beast of burden is purchased, the three set out on a short excursion, the father rides and is criticized, the son rides and is criticized, both walk and are criticized, and a conclusion is drawn.

zh: 但是民族主义和民主的基本前提是密切相关的：人民 (people)先于国家（state）,国家属于人民。
en: But the essential premises of nationalism and democracy are closely related: the notion that the people precedes the state and that the state belongs to it.

zh: 在许多文献中，尤其是在法国大革命开创性时期中，“人民”与“民族”这两个词语是交互使用的。这种联系还不止于此。
en: In much of the literature, especially in the seminal period of the French Revolution, the words "people" and "nation" are used interchangeably.And the connection does not stop there.

zh: 在某种意义上，人类学之于这些学科,就如实验室之于物理学和化学:是其理论必不可少的检验根据。
en: Anthropology is to these disciplines what the laboratory is to physics and chemistry：the essential testing ground for their theories.

zh: 文化人类学可以划分为考古学、语言人类学和民族学（通常被称为社会文化人类学，参见图l.l），虽然每个分支有自己的专业兴趣和方法，但它们都研究文化资料。
en: Cultural anthropology may be divided into the areas of archaeology, linguistic anthropology, and ethnology (often called sociocultural anthropology; Figure 1.1).Although each has its own special interests and methods, all deal with cultural data.

zh: 考古学家、语言学家和民族学家对研究主题采取不同的研究方式，但是，它们每一学科都捜集和分析有助于说明人类文化相似性和差异性的数据，以及在任何地方不同文化发展、调适和持续变迁的方式。
en: The archaeologist, the linguist, and the ethnologist take different approaches to the subject, but each gathers and analyzes data useful for explaining similarities and differences among human cultures, as well as the ways cultures everywhere develop, adapt, and continue to change.

zh: 在某种意义上，人类学之于这些学科，就如实验室之于物理学和化学：是其理论必不可少的检验根据。
en: Anthropology is to these disciplines what the laboratory is to physics and chemistry: the essential testing ground for their theories.

zh: 文化人类学可以划分为考古学、语言人类学和民族学（通常被称为社会文化人类学，参见图l.l），虽然每个分支有自己的专业兴趣和方法，但它们都研究文化资料。
en: Cultural anthropology may be divided into the areas of archaeology, linguistic anthropology, and ethnology (often called sociocultural anthropology; Figure 1.1).Although each has its own special interests and methods, all deal with cultural data.

zh: 考古学家、语言学家和民族学家对研究主题采取不同的研究方式，但是，它们每一学科都捜集和分析有助于说明人类文化相似性和差异性的数据，以及在任何地方不同文化发展、调适和持续变迁的方式。
en: The archaeologist, the linguist, and the ethnologist take different approaches to the subject, but each gathers and analyzes data useful for explaining similarities and differences among human cultures, as well as the ways cultures everywhere develop, adapt, and continue to change.

zh: 关于人权有很多“相互冲突的规范逻辑”理论模式可以考虑。
en: A number of ideal-types of "competing normative logics" (Falk 1980) concerning human rights may be identified.

zh: 在西方过去的两个世纪里，最为盛行的逻辑就是“集权主义”。
en: For much of the past two centuries in the West, the prevailing logic has been what might be termed "statist".

zh: 也就是说，民族一国家主张自己的主权以及他们自己在司法和政治上的平等权利；而且他们的公民权利是内部或者国内的事务，不受其他国家特权的干渉。
en: That is, nation-states have demanded the right to their own sovereignty and their own juridical and political equality; as such, the rights of their citizens are internal or domestic matters, and it is outwith the prerogative of members of other states to intervene.

zh: 这种逻辑脱胎于“霸权主义的”逻辑。
en: Statist logic was a development out of "hegemonic" logic.

zh: 民族语言学研究语言，因为语言与社会、文化的其他部分以及人类行为有关。
en: Ethnolinguistics deals with language as it relates to society, the rest of culture, and human behavior.

zh: 某些语言人类学家，追随本杰明˙李˙沃尔夫，已提出语言塑造人们的思维和行为方式的理论。
en: Some linguists, following Benjamin Lee Whorf, have proposed that language shapes the way people think and behave.

zh: 其他人却认为语言反映现实。
en: Others have argued that language reflects reality.

zh: 虽然语言是灵活的和能适应新环境的，但是术语一日制定出来往往使自身永久化，它在很大程度上反映说话者的信念和社会关系。
en: Although linguists find language flexible and adaptable, they have found that once a terminology is established, it tends to perpetuate itself and to reflect much about the speakers' beliefs and social relationships.

zh: 例如，亲属称谓有助于揭示家庭的结抅是怎样的，亲属关系是亲密还是疏远，对亲属关系持什么样的态度。
en: Kinship terms, for example, help reveal how a family is structured, what relationships are considered close or distant, and what attitudes are held toward relationships.

zh: 同样，性別语言揭示在社会中男性和女性的相互关系。
en: Similarly, gender language reveals how the men and women in a society relate to one another.

zh: 民族学家研究的根基是民族志（ethnography）。
en: Fundamental to the ethnologist, approach is descriptive ethnography.

zh: 只要有可能，民族学家就设法生活在他正研究的那些人之中而成为民族志学家。
en: Whenever possible, the ethnologist becomes ethnographer by going to live among the people under study.

zh: 这种田野工作的意图，不只在于描述他们的文化，而且也要说明文化各方面的相互关系。通过参与观察（participant observation）与人们同吃一样的食物，说他们的语言，亲身体验他们的风俗和习惯——与任何非参与性人类学家或其他社会科学家所能做到的相比，民族志学家试图在更大程度上理解他们的生活方式；在你正做着田野工作的社会里，由于你学会了如何以那个社会接受的方式行事，那么你就最有效地学到了一种文化。
en: Through participant observation—eating a peopled food, speaking their language, and personally experiencing their habits and customs—the ethnographer can understand their way of life to a far greater extent than any nonparticipant anthropologist or other social scientist ever could; one learns a culture best by learning how to behave acceptably in the society where one is doing fieldwork.

zh: 要成为所研究文化的参与观察者并不意味着，为研究战争频繁的文化，民族志学家要加入人们的战斗；但是由于生活在好战的人群中，民族志学家应当能够理解战争是如何与整个文化结构相契合的。
en: Participant observation of the culture under study does not mean the ethnographer must join in a peopled battles in order to study a culture where warfare is prominent; but by living among a warlike people, the ethnographer should be able to understand the role of warfare in the overall cultural scheme.

zh: 如柯尔斯顿·哈斯査普所说，民族志的现在时并不意味着不受时间影响是其他社会的一个特点，“但是我们确实强调民族志知识胜过经验主义的知识”（Kirsten Hastrup 1992，p.128）,因为它加深了我们对于人类总体状态的理解。不考虑历史演进地对社会生活进行研究，这一点也有一种明显的方法论优势。
en: As Kirsten Hastrup argues, the ethnographic present does not imply that timelessness is a feature of other societies, "but we do stress that ethnographic knowledge transcends the empirical" (1992, p. 128) in that it deepens our understanding of the human condition in general.There is also a clear methodological advantage involved in the synchronic study of social life.

zh: 人类学可以被描述为你在河水中跋涉以及河水流动时你进行探究的过程，而历史学家却被迫研究干涸的河床。
en: Anthropology may be described as the process whereby one wades into a river and explores it as it flows by, whereas historians are forced to study the dry riverbed.

zh: 你不可能对过去的事情进行参与观察。
en: One cannot engage in participant observation of the past.

zh: 列维·斯特劳斯认为（1961: 386）我们自己的民族中心主义是与某种实际存在的或仪式上的食人习俗的道德基础相关的。
en: Lévi-Strauss comments (1961:386) on our own ethnocentrism in being appalled on moral grounds by either actual or ritual cannibalism.

zh: 谴责食人行为，意味着某种身体复活的观念，与身体在物质上被解体相对应。
en: To condemn cannibalist practices implies for instance a belief in bodily resurrection, which would be compromised with the material destruction of the corpse.

zh: 这作为一种宗教性的信仰和那些仪式性的食人行为所依据的信仰如出一辙。
en: This would be a religious belief of the same order as those in which ritualized cannibalism is practised.

zh: 在1984年，古迪由欧内斯特˙盖尔纳（Ernest Gellner，1925—1995)所接替，后者同样关注那些在前辈的工作中从没有处于过中心地位的实质性问题：如苏联和东欧的政治与人类学以及穆斯林世界中的思维和社会，此外还有最具广泛影响性的民族主义的性质及其在欧洲的历史发展。
en: In 1984 Goody was succeeded by Ernest Gellner (1925–1995), who likewise focused on substantive themes that had not been central to the work of the preceding generation: politics and anthropology in the Soviet Union and Eastern Europe; thought and society in the Muslim world; and most broadly influential, the nature of nationalism and its historical development in Europe.

zh: 盖尔纳出生在布拉格，在牛津接受的哲学训练，后被授予伦敦经济学院的一个哲学教职。
en: Gellner was born in Prague, was trained at Oxford as a philosopher, and had been appointed to a post in philosophy at the LSE.

zh: 他是对英国哲学的语言学转向进行批判的一个突出人物，著有广受赞誉的《词与物》（1959)。
en: He played a distinctiverole as a critic of the linguistic turn in British philosophy with his celebrated book Words and Things (1959).

zh: 那时他正在伦敦经济学院的同事们的指导下在南非进行人类学田野作业，并选择把自己的职业身份转为社会人类学家。
这就是我向第二组撰稿人提出的问题：他们中一位是国际法方面的杰出理论家和实践者，再一位是国际关系方面的学术权威。前者是达尼洛·蒂尔克（Danilo Türk)，在民族自决的特殊表演中扮演着重要的角色。他的国家斯洛文尼亚在1991年6月宣布独立，从此南斯拉夫联盟开始瓦解（恰巧，他现在在联合国担任斯洛文尼亚代表）。
en: This was the question I posed to the next pair of contributors: an outstanding theorist and practitioner of international law, and a leading academic authority on international relations.The former, Danilo Türk, played an important role in a specific act of national self-determination, when his country, Slovenia, declared itself independent in June 1991, thereby initiating the formal dissolution of the Yugoslav Federation.(Appropriately enough, he now represents Slovenia at the United Nations.)

zh: 下面我要论证，这些超越的意义不是“附加”在“单纯的”原始记录之上的抽象观念或者解释；相反，它们是使记录富有意义的条件。
en: I argue below that these kinds of transcendent meanings are not abstractions or interpretations "added" to the original "simple" account.Rather, they are the conditions of its meaningfulness.

zh: 民族志文本不可能摆脱寓言性，郑重地接受这一事实将改变它们可以被写作和阅读的方式。
en: Ethnographic texts are inescapably allegorical, and a serious acceptance of this fact changes the ways they can be written and read.

zh: 用肖斯塔克的试验作为研究案例，我将检査最近把文本内的各寓言层次辨识为明确的“多种声音”的趋势。
en: Using Shostak's experiment as a case study I examine a recent tendency to distinguish allegorical levels as specific "voices" within the text.

zh: 最后，我认为，民族志写作——被看作铭写（inscription)或文本化——的真正活力在于扮演一种救赎式的（redemptive）西方寓言。
en: I argue, finally, that the very activity of ethnographic writing—seen as inscription or textualization—enacts a redemptive Western allegory.

zh: 这样一来，个体抽象出来的个人结构就会产生具体效应：实际上，正是通过在整体的他者和自我之间建立起相互关联这种方式，个体才成为对他们自己而言具有真实性的事物。
en: Thus do individuals' abstract personal constructs have concrete consequences.Indeed, it is by claiming a relevance which a host of others has for them, and which they have for others, that individuals' own selves become real to them.

zh: 在世界中认知并命名对象就是赋予它们实体性和稳定性，（按照贝特森的说法（Bateson l951: 217）)就是将某种形式强加于另一个熵的世界，从而创造出“信息”。而且根据他们自己的假定所采取的行动对于个体来说是相互激发的。
en: Cognizing and naming objects in the universe is to give them shape and stability, to impose form upon an otherwise "entropic" universe and so to create "information" (in Bateson’s terms (1951:217)), and acting with their selves upon their assumptions is for individuals to vitalize both.

zh: 我们最多只是擅用工具的能工巧匠，巧妙地周旋于符号网络当中，尽管我们既没有发明这网络也无法控制它，我们能够期待的只 是随着语言母体中的符号之间的联系与差别而发生的偶然事件。
en: At best, we are bricoleurs, skilfully operating amongst networks of signs which we did not invent and do not control.What we can mean is a contingent matter dependent upon relations and differences between signs in a linguistic matrix.

zh: 这不存在原创性，只有无休止的不得要领的游戏：从一个符号到另一个符号的循环模仿。
en: There is no originality here, only an endless discursive play: of signs relating to other signs in a parodic circle.

zh: 我们无法找到通往现实之路，也不存在绝对的指示或真实的存在——即神或人——只有漫无边际的“没有开始也不会结束的模仿”。
en: There can be no escape to reality or an absolute referentiality or a real presence—God or Man—only discursive ‘mimesis without origin or end’.

zh: 人可以说是在有意识地操控他们的生活，创造出他们生活所凭依的意义和规则，而不会屈从于无意识或先决的力量，也不会屈从于毫无根据的理由和约束。
en: Human beings should be seen to be in conscious control of their lives, creating the meanings and regularities by which they live and not subject to unconscious or determining forces, to independent causes and constraints.

zh: 他们可以被描述成自然、社会、文化或历史环境的占有者。
en: They should be described as possessing agency with regard to natural, social, cultural or historical phenomena.

zh: 最重要的是，使人类生活的复杂性具有表象上的正义：针对人类生活的个体性和共性、它的特质、模糊性和微妙性以及它的传统主义、它的快乐和荣誉以及它的残酷性和默然。
en: Above all, representational justice should be done to the complexities of human life: to its individuality and commonality, its idiosyncrasy, ambiguity and nuance as much as its conventionalism, its pleasures and glories as well as its cruelties and ignorances.

zh: 西方和非西方民族所进行的仪式活动同样都表达了这样一种信仰：人们可以借助某种规定的方式使超自然力量以某种方式起作用。
en: Ritual practices of peasant and non-Western peoples are often an expression of the belief they can make supernatural powers act in certain ways with certain prescribed formulas.

zh: 这是经典人类学的巫术概念。
en: This is the classic anthropological notion of magic.

zh: 詹姆斯˙弗雷泽爵士区分了两种巫术原则——“同类相生”（即模拟巫术）和接触巫术。
en: Sir James Frazer differentiated two principles of magic—"like produces like", or imitative magic, and the law of contagion.

zh: 作为一种有效的方法，巫技的作用是使个人能够为自己的不幸找到解释而又 不用自己承担任何责任。
en: Witchcraft functions as an effective way for people to explain away personal misfortune without having to shoulder any of the blame.

zh: 甚至恶巫技也能在社会控制领域起积极作用。
en: Even malevolent witchcraft may function positively in the realm of social control.

zh: 它还可以在不破坏更大群体规范的情况下，为敌对和挫败情绪提供一条发泄途径。
en: It also may provide an outlet for feelings of hostility and frustration without disturbing the norms of the larger group.

zh: 母方交表兄弟姐妹婚姻（cross-cousin marriage）（参见图8.2），指一个男子娶其母亲兄弟的女儿，或者一个女子嫁给其父亲姐妹的儿子（交表兄弟姐妹是指母亲兄弟的儿女或父亲姐妹的儿女）。在许多社会，从寻食者（如澳大利亚的原住民）到集约经营的农民（诸如印度南部的各个不同民族），这种姑与表兄弟姐妹婚姻是优先的婚姻形式。
en: Matrilateral cross-cousin marriage (Figure 8.1)—that is, of a man to his mother's brother's daughter or of a woman to her father's sister's son (a cross cousin is the child of a mother's brother or a father's sister)—is a preferred form of marriage in a variety of societies ranging from food foragers (Australian Aborigines, for example) to intensive agriculturists (such as among various peoples of South India).

zh: 在寻食民族中，就财产方面看，他们几乎没有继承，这种婚姻有助于建立并维持社会群体之间亲戚相关的联系。
en: Among food-foraging peoples, who inherit relatively little property, such marriages help establish and maintain ties of solidarity between social groups.

zh: 在一段相对较长的时间里，性别在人类学研究中都是被忽视的。这似乎有点令人惊讶，因为性别身份很可能是个人身份中最为根本的基础。
en: Gender was for a long time relatively neglected in anthropological research, which is perhaps surprising, since gender identity may well be the most fundamental basis for personal identity.

zh: 经常因为其民族志的细节描写而备受赞赏的马林诺夫斯基，如今被认为完全忽视了重要的女性制度并夸大了男性对特罗布里恩德社会的再生产的贡献（Weiner 1988）。
en: Malinowski, who has often been praised for his ethnographic detail, is now said to have neglected important women's institutions completely and exaggerated the contribution of men to the reproduction of Trobriand society (Weiner 1988).

zh: 在许多其他的经典研究中，社会行动者也或多或少地被视为与社会上的男性等同。
en: In many other classic studies too, social actors are more or less seen as equivalent to social men.

zh: 这种视角可以被称为大男子主义（andros在希腊语中是“男人”的意思）。
en: This kind of perspective may be called androcentric (andros is Greek for man).

zh: 1970年代以后，情况似乎产生了变化，性别成为人类学研究中的一个核心话题。
en: It seems to be changing, and gender has been a central topic in anthropological research since the 1970s.

zh: 部分研究关注“原初的母权制”的概念：18世纪学界很普遍的一个观点是，人类社会最初是由女性统治的。
en: Some of this research has concerned the notion of the "original matriarchy": the idea, common in nineteenth-century scholarship, that human society was originally ruled by women.

zh: 从这个角度，有人认为，这类在许多民族中间流传很广的观念，很可能是由男人创造出来的错误观念，目的是为了证明他们凌驾于女人之上的权力是正当的（Bamberger 1974）。
en: In this regard, it has been argued that such notions, which are widespread among many peoples, are probably myths created by men to justify their own power over women (Bamberger 1974).

zh: 可见，牧羊人的民主的、热爱自由的性格来自他们作为游牧民的谋生方式——恰恰也是这一点决定了他们的这一性格。
en: The shepherds' democratic, freedom-loving character thus derives from, as it is determined by, their nomadic mode of subsistence.

zh: 这位历史学家就是用这样一种方式赋予他的人物这祥一种受尊敬的性格。
en: The historian in this manner endows his subjects with a character to be revered.

zh: 牧羊人生活在一个纯粹男性化的畜牧世界，他们在这里感到骄傲、自由、不受世俗财物的牵扯，并且不用与妇女或者说家户纠缠在一起。
en: The shepherds reside within a purely masculine pastoral world, where they are proud, free, unencumbered by worldly goods, and without attachments to women or households.

zh: 虽然作为“乡下的一个游牧的半无产阶级”与市场联系在起，但是这些人据信能够自由地迁徙，可以超越封建压迫的势力范围。
en: Though linked to the market as a "rural nomad semi-proletariat," these men purportedly move at liberty beyond the reach of feudal oppression.

zh: 这位历史学家不加限制地把他的乌托邦憧憬浓缩在一句话里。他说皮埃尔˙莫里是一个快乐的牧羊人”(第135页）。
en: The historian encapsulates his Utopian vision by saying, without qualification: "Pierre Maury was a happy shepherd" (135).

zh: 与较早期的工具相比，穆斯捷工具一般比较轻、比较小。
en: Mousterian tools are generally lighter and smaller than those of earlier traditions.

zh: 先前的人只能从整个石核中得到两三块石片，而尼安德特人的工具制造者可以得到许多比较小的石片，他们对这些石片熟练地进一步加以修磨、磨尖。
en: Whereas previously only two or three flakes could be obtained from the entire core, Neanderthal tool-makers obtained many more smaller flakes, which they skillfully retouched and sharpened.

zh: 他们的工具组合也包括比以前时期更多样化的工具类型：手斧、石片、刮器、钻器、刨木用的凹口石片，以及多种可装在木棒上做成矛的尖状器。
en: Their tool kits also contained a greater variety of types than the earlier ones： hand axes, flakes, scrapers, borers, notched flakes for shaving wood, and many types of points that could be attached to wooden shafts to make spears.

zh: 这多种多样的工具促进了对于食物资源的有效利用，也提高了衣服和居所的品质。
en: This variety of tools facilitated more effective use of food resources and enhanced the quality of clothing and shelter.

zh: 最晚直到19世纪60年代，穆尔曼第二代的学生中已有很多人都发现了他们老师的偏见和机会主义倾向。
en: By the 1960s at the latest, many among Mühlmann's second generation of students sensed the biases and opportunistic priorities of their teacher.

zh: 在某种程度上，这也与他的另一本有影响的书《人类学史》 (1948/1986)有关。
en: To an extent this also had to do with another of his influential books, Geschichte der Anthropologie (1948/1986).

zh: 这一部人类学历史完全以一种片面的、辩护式的且以德国为中心的视角呈现了这一学科领域的发展变化。
en: This history of anthropology presented a profoundly one-sided, apologetic, and Germano-centric perspective of the field's evolution.

zh: 到1986年又再版了几次，该书几乎成了关于这一主题唯一的德语教科书。
en: Republished several times until 1986, it was virtually the only textbook on the topic available in German.

zh: 许多学生都能而且确实都选择了英语或法语教科书，或者被好的老师推荐这样做。
en: Many students could and did resort to English or French textbooks, or were recommended to do so by good teachers.

zh: 但是，在其他一些地方，三代德语区人类学的学生都是从一个与纳粹主义牵涉较多的人所写的书中来学习他们学科的历史的。
en: Where this was not the case, however, three generations of Germanspeaking anthropology students learned the history of their field from a book by someone who had been most heavily involved with Nazism.

zh: 世界卫生组织（WHO）估计，在世界各地，有3600万人感染HIV(艾滋病病毒——大部分艾滋病病人有这种病毒）在2000年11月，艾滋病病毒和艾滋病最沉重地打击了撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲和东南亚地区，同时美国艾滋病病例累积总数达92万。
en: The World Health Organization (WHO) estimates 18.5 million adults are infected with HIV (the virus present in most people wrth AIDS) worldwide, with 4.5 million of those people diagnosed with AIDS.While HIV and AIDS has hit areas of Sub-Saharan Africa and Southeast Asia hardest, as of June 1996, the Centers for Disease Control report a cumulative total of 548,102 AIDS cases in the United States, with 343,000 deaths.

zh: 在我工作的加利福尼亚旧金山市，人口不到80万，有报告说，自1980年以来，已有24509例艾滋病 病例，16838人死于艾滋病。
en: Where I work in San Francisco, California, a city of less than 800,000 people, there have been 24,509 AIDS cases and 16,838 deaths from AIDS reported since 1980.

zh: 在这些病例中有22161例发生在该市同性恋者和与男女两性都有性行为的男子中。
en: Of these cases, 22,161 are among gay and bisexual men in the city.

zh: 阐释主义已经成为一个基础——后来用来扞击人们所断言的人类学的殖民心态和帝国主义基础。
en: The interpretivism already present served as a foundation – as did latter-day attacks on the alleged colonial mentality and imperialist foundation of anthropology.

zh: 同一时期，女权主义人类学成长起来，进而对男权主义模式提出挑战，反思成为田野民族志方法的格言。写作和阅读在新的具有文学性的人类学中有了理论意义。
en: In the same time period, feminist anthropology grew and further challenged androcentric models, reflexivity became a byword of ethnographic method, and writing and reading took on theoretical significance in the new, literarily aware an- thropology.

zh: 然而，在某一级上实行外婚制的社会，可能在另一级上实行内婚制。例如，在特罗布里恩德岛民中，每个人都必须在其氏族或世系群之外婚配（外婚制）。然而，由于合法的性伴侣可能在某人自己的社区内寻觅到， 所以一般也实行村落内婚制，尽管这不是强制性的。
en: However, since eligible sex partners are to be found within one's own community, village endogamy, though not obligatory, is commonly practiced.

zh: 饶有兴趣的是，外婚制包括或不包括哪些亲戚，在不同的社会有很大的差异。
en: Interestingly, a wide variety exists among societies as to which relatives are or are not covered by exogamy rules.

zh: 例如，天主敎会一直禁止第一级的堂表兄弟姐妹之间的婚姻，而这样的婚姻在美国的31个州是非法的。在其他19个州，这类婚姻不是非法的，在欧洲也不是非法的。
en: In Europe, for example, the Catholic Church has long had a prohibition on marriages to first cousins, and in the 19th century such marriages were illegal in most of the United States.

zh: 此外，在其他许多社会，第一级堂表兄弟姐妹是优先选取的配偶。尽管有相反的虚构信念，但第一级堂表兄弟姐妹结婚生的孩子没有很大的风险。
en: In numerous other societies, however, first cousins are preferred spouses.

zh: 在田野工作、甚至是在比较分析中，内省和外省都是交互发挥作用的。
en: In fieldwork and even in comparative analysis, introspection and extrospection interact.

zh: 田野工作和比较分析并非只是一种收集数据的机械方式，而是关于自我与文化反射的一部分，可以使一个人意识到关于我们的文化什么是独特的、什么是共同的。方法是，通过从他人/他文化的角度看自己来理解他人。
en: Fieldwork and comparative analysis are not merely mechanical ways to gather data but are part of a reflection on self and culture that can alert one to what is unique and what is common about our culture.The trick is to grasp the other while seeing oneself (or one's culture) sharply in terms of the other.

zh: 危险是，一个人会在他者那里看到太多或太少的自己，即过于主观或客观。
en: The danger is that one will see too much or too little of oneself in the other – excesses of subjectivity or objectivity.

zh: 进入和转出年龄等级，可由个人来完成，或者由于生物学的区别，比如说青春期，或者由于得到社会认可的地位，比如说结婚或生孩子。
en: Entry into and transfer out of age grades may be accomplished individually, either by a biological distinction, such as puberty, or by a socially recognized status, such as marriage or childbirth.

zh: 尽管年龄等级的成员们可能具有很多共同点，可能参加相似的活动，可能彼此合作，还可能拥有相同的志向和抱负，但他们的成员资格可能不完全与生理年龄相符。
en: Whereas age-grade members may have much in common, may engage in similar activities, may cooperate with one another, and may share the same orientation and aspirations, their membership may not be entirely parallel with physiological age.

zh: 从年纪较小的等级进入年纪较大的等级的具体时间，往往是由仪式来确立的——犹太人的男孩成人仪式就是一个很好的例子。虽然年长群体的成员一般期望年轻群体的成员尊敬他们，并且承认自己对年轻人负有一定的责任，但这并不必然意味着一个年龄等级比另一个年龄等级更好，或者更糟，甚或更重要。
en: A specific time is often ritually established for moving from a younger to an older grade.Although members of senior groups commonly expect deference from and acknowledge certain responsibil-ities to their juniors, this does not necessarily mean one grade is better or worse or even more important than another.

zh: 在史前文化水平上，部族群体之间当然会有某些战争。
en: On preliterate cultural levels there was of course some fighting between tribal groups.

zh: 争夺优良的猎场与渔场或其它自然资源，为真实或想象（巫术）的伤害而进行报复，导致了一定的部族冲突。
en: Competition for favored hunting and fishing grounds or other natural resources, vengeance for real or fancied (e.g., magical) injuries, led to a certain amount of intertribal conflict.

zh: 但尚不存在为大规模的、系统的和持久的战争所必需的因素。
en: But the factors necessary for large scale and systematic and sustained warfare w^ere lacking.

zh: 然而，作为农业革命的结果，这些因素被提供出来了。
en: These were supplied, however, as a consequence of the Agricultural Revolution.

zh: 这些可能会使我们相信亲属制度不再重要了。
en: This may lead us to believe that kinship has ceased to be important.

zh: 但是，在其社会组织的潜力之外，它还具有重要的象征维度。
en: However, it has important symbolic dimensions in addition to its social organisational potential.

zh: 在大多数已知的人类社会中，那就是，亲属制度是对于主观归属、安全感和个人身份的一个主要关注点。
en: It is, in most known human societies, a main focus for subjective belongingness, sense of security and personal identity.

zh: 在这些领域，似乎很明显的是，亲属制度至少部分地被诸如民族主义等隐喻的亲属制度意识形态所取代。
en: In these fields, it seems clear that kinship has at least partly been replaced by metaphoric kinship ideologies such as nationalism.

zh: 民族主义将民族呈现为家族群体的一种隐喻。
en: Nationalism presents the nation as a metaphoric kin group.

zh: 和家系的思维方式一样，它强调“我们”和“他们”之间的对比，并且，尽管在其内部可能是追求平等和普遍性的，在关系到其他民族的时候却支持排他主义（参见第十八章）。
en: Like lineage ideologies, it stresses the contrast between "us" and "them", and although it may be internally egalitarian and universalistic, it favours particularism in relation to other nations (see Chapter 18).

zh: 在特定的司法语境里，民族也可能像事实上的家系那样发挥作用。
en: The nation may also function as a de facto lineage in certain judicial contexts.

zh: 如果一个公民死后而没有个人的继承者，国家会继承他的财产；在某些情况下，国家也可能对孩子们承担起做父母的责任。
en: If a citizen dies with no personal inheritors, the state inherits the estate.The state may also, in certain cases, assume the parental responsibility for children.

zh: 大多数北美人熟悉的配偶家庭形式是独立的核心家庭，尽管它急剧衰退，但在美国和加拿大仍被广泛地视为一种理想。
en: The form of conjugal family most familiar to most North Americans is the independent nuclear family, which in spite of its precipitous decline is still widely regarded as the "standard" in the United States and Canada.

zh: 在这些国家中，年轻人在超过一定的年龄之后就不希望与自己的父母生活在一起，而一对夫妇也并没有一种道德上的责任要把自己因年迈而生活无法自理的父母接到自己家中。
en: In these countries it is not considered desirable for young people to live with their parents beyond a certain age, nor is it considered a moral responsibility for a couple to take their aged parents into their home when the parents no longer can care for themselves.

zh: 退休社区和护理院可以提供这些服务，把年老的父母接到自己的家中，一般不仅被视为是一种经济负担， 而且也是对该家户的隐私和独立性的一种威胁。
en: Retirement communities and nursing homes provide these services, and to take aged parents into one's home is commonly regarded as not only an economic burden but also a threat to the households privacy and independence.

zh: 列维－斯特劳斯对人类心智共同性的另一重要探寻，就是我们前面所说的第二个例子：以雅克布森的“辅音三角”和“元音三角”理论为基础的所谓“烹饪三角”。
en: One of the most indicative of Le ́vi-Strauss’ excursions into the universality of the human mind is that of our second example: the ‘culinary triangle’, based on Jakobson’s ‘consonant triangle’ and ‘vowel triangle’.

zh: 列维－斯特劳斯最早在1965 年的一篇文章中提出这一观点。而后又对此进行了数次论证，特别是在《神话学》第三卷的结尾部分。（Le ́vi - Strauss 1978b [1968]: 471-95)
en: Le ́vi-Strauss first published on the idea in an article in 1965, and this was followed by several discussions, notably in the conclusion to the third volume of the Mythologiques (Le ́vi-Strauss 1978b [1968]: 471–95).

zh: 在肯尼亚北部的游牧民族中，家庭支配的动物数目与可用来照料动物的妇女数目直接相关。
en: Among the Turkana, a pastoral nomadic people of northern Kenya, the number of animals at a family disposal is directly related to the number ( adult women available to care for them.

zh: 男子拥有的妇女越多，照顾家畜的妇女就越多，家庭财富就可能越充裕。
