en: This and his early political opposition to Stalinism should signify a need for caution regarding others’ later attempts to claim him for Marxism, but Algeria was perhaps also an early demonstration to him of the social constraints on individual agency.

zh: 将相异性概念引入人类学，这本身反映出学科如今对自身历史和其独特的科学客观化进程中的种种不公正之处的清醒认识。
en: The incorporation of the concept of alterity into anthropology itself reflects a strong contemporary awareness within the discipline of the iniquities of its past, its own particular programme of scientific objectification.

zh: 它必须面对将他者建构进现代性视野时自己的中心主义（di Leonardo 1998)。
en: It must face its own centrality in the provision of constructions of otherness central to the vision of modernity (cf. di Leonardo 1998).

zh: 由于失去了清白，如今人类学处于一个“自我反思的时代”，在批判后现代的宏大叙事时往往掺合进其他后现代的声音。
en: Having lost its innocence, anthropology is now in an "age of self-reflection", a process through which it often joins other post-colonial voices in a critique of the grand narratives of modernism.

zh: 这一论断表明民族志作者中业已形成一种惯习，即将民族志写作定义为高于和对立于旧有的不太专业化的写作体裁，诸如游记（travel books) 、个人回忆录、报刊文章，以及传教士、移民和殖民地官员等人的记述。
en: The statement is symptomatic of a well-established habit among ethnographers of defining ethnographic writing over and against older, less specialized genres, such as travel books, personal memoirs, journalism, and accounts by missionaries, settlers, colonial officials, and the like.

zh: 虽然专业的民族志并不会取代所有这些体裁，但被认为将夺取后者的权威地位并纠正它们的滥用。
en: Although it will not supplant these genres altogether, professional ethnography, it is understood, will usurp their authority and correct their abuses.

zh: 在几乎所有的民族志中，被称为“单纯的旅行者”、“随意的观察者”等漫不经心的人物时不时地出现，结果只是让严肃的科学家来纠正或证实他们认识上的肤浅。
en: In almost any ethnography dull-looking figures called "mere travelers" or "casual observers" show up from time to time, only to have their superficial perceptions either corrected or corroborated by the serious scientist.

zh: 体质人类学的另一个主要专业是对现今人类变异的研究。
en: Another major concern of physical anthropology is the study of present-day human variation.

zh: 虽然我们是单个 人种的全部成员，但我们还是在明显或不那么明显的许多方面各不相同。
en: Although we are all members of a single species, we differ from each other in many obvious and not so obvious ways.

zh: 我们不仅在诸如肤色或鼻子形扰等可见特质方面不同，而且也在我们的血型和我们对某 种疾病易感性等生物化学的遗传因子方面不同。
en: We differ not only in such visible traits as the color of our skins and the shape of our noses but also in such biochemical factors as our blood types and our susceptibility to certain diseases.

zh: 为了达到对人类变异以及这种变异与人们生活于其中的不同环境相关方式的更为全面的理解，体质人类学家应用所有现代分子生物学技术。
en: The physical anthropologist applies all the techniques of modern molecular biology to achieve a fuller understanding of human variation and the ways it relates to the different environments people have lived in.

zh: 随着人类学和世界进入新千年，两者都已发生了改变——这些改变可能会像某些人宣称的那样并不具有根本性，但却无疑是重要的。
en: As Anthropology and the world have moved toward and into the new millennium, both have changed, not so radically, perhaps, as some would announce but nonetheless importantly.

zh: 这一修订版就是为了回应那些改变，同时依然保留了那些贯穿人类学发展历程中非常重要的关注和概念。
en: This revised edition responds to those changes while retaining concerns and concepts which remain salient throughout Anthropology's first century and into the present.

zh: 三个这样持续不变的关注就是文化、田野工作和相关性。
en: Three of these abiding foci are culture, fieldwork, and relevance.

zh: 与那位历史学家所描绘的富尼埃形成对照的是，埃文思-普里査德在评论他在 “引言”中对于田野工作难忘的记叙时，用下述谦逊的说法来袒露自己对于努尔人的知识：“我居住在努尔人中的全部时间大概是一年。我认为一年的时间并不足以去对一个民族进行社会学的研究，对于一个处在满是敌意的环境中的棘手的民族来说更是如此。面1935年的远征历程和1936年的远征历程都是因为严重的疾病过早地结束了调查，（第14页)埃文思-普里査德没有炫耀地展示他的成功，而是以平实描述不断反复的田园牧歌式的幕同插曲的方式断断续续地叙述他的田野作业。
en: In contrast with the historian's portrait of Fournier, Evans-Pritchard comments on his memorable introductory fieldwork account by making the following modest claim for his knowledge of the Nuer: "My total residence among the Nuer was thus about a year. I do not consider a year adequate time in which to make a sociological study of a people, especially of a difficult people in adverse circumstances, but serious sickness on both the 1935 and 1936 expeditions closed investigations prematurely" (14).Rather than parade his successes, Evans-Pritchard punctuates his fieldwork narrative by flatly describing repeatedly ruined bucolic interludes.

zh: 在努尔人中争端频繁，就像在其他有相似组织的民族中一样，在分支世系群制度下，它们可能导致广泛的世仇。
en: Disputes among the Nuer are frequent, as they are among other groups with similar organization, and under the segmentary lineage system, they can lead to widespread feuds.

zh: “豹皮首领”的行动使这种社会分裂可能的根源最小化。
en: This possible source of social disruption is minimized by the actions of the ritual conciliation office.

zh: “豹皮首领”不是真正的首领，他是调解仪式职位的承担者。豹皮酋领没有政治权力，并且被视为身于世系群网络之外。
en: The leopard-skin chief has no political power and is viewed as standing outside the lineage network.

zh: 他所能做的一切，就是努力说服结怨的世系群接受用“血牛”偿还，而不是再夺一个人的性命。
en: All he can do is try to persuade feuding lineages to accept payment in blood cattle rather than taking another life.

zh: 他的调解给每一方一个体面的让步机会以免太多人被杀死；但如果参与方为了某种原因而不愿意妥协的话，那么豹皮首领是无权强加给他们一个协议的。
en: His mediation gives each side the chance to back down gracefully before too many people are killed; but if the participants are for some reason unwilling to compromise, the leopard-skin chief has no authority to enforce a settlement.

zh: 调整机制在那些不允许财产权威胁平等社会秩序的社区中存在，就如在墨西哥髙原和危地马拉的许多玛雅人村落和市镇中那样。
en: Leveling mechanisms are found in communities where property must not be allowed to threaten a more-or-less egalitarian social order, as in many Maya villages and towns in the highlands of Mexico and Guatemala.

zh: 在这些社区中，重负体制的功能是抽出人们可能积累的任何过多的财富。
en: In these communities, cargo systems function to siphon off any excess wealth people may accumulate.

zh: 重负体制是一种公民宗教等级制度，在轮流的基础上，它把大部分社区的公职和礼仪职务结合起来。
en: A cargo system is a civilreligious hierarchy, which, on a revolving basis, combines most of a community's civic and ceremonial offices.

zh: 所有职务都向所有人开放，最终每个人实际上至少任一个职务一期，每一任期延续一年。
en: All offices are open to all men, and eventually virtually every man has at least one term in office, each term lasting for 1 year.

zh: 这一等级制度是金字塔形的，这就是说在比较低的层次上有比较多的职位，向顶端职位逐级递减。
en: The scale is pyramidal, which means more offices exist at the lower levels, with progressively fewer toward the top.

zh: 跳蚤市场也提出关于止式的和非正式的市场经济部门的问题。
en: Flea markets also raise the issue of the distinction between the informal and formal sectors of the market economy.

zh: 非正式经济（informal economy）可以被定义为：商品生产者和服务提供者以种种理由逃避政府控制（编目、管理或其他种类的公众监督或审计供应可出售商品的体制）。
en: The informal economy may be defined as the system whereby producers of goods and services provide marketable commodities that for various reasons escape enumeration, regulation, or other type of public monitoring or auditing.

zh: 这类做法可能包罗差不多各个方面：供应市场的菜蔬和花果、制作和销售啤酒或含酒精的饮料、从事维修或建筑工作、乞讨、在街上兜售商品、从事礼仪服务、贷款、贩卖毒品、扒窃以及赌博等等，这里只提到一小部分。
en: Such enterprises may encompass just about anything： market gardening, making and selling beer or other alcoholic beverages, doing repair or construction work, begging, selling things on the street, performing ritual services lending money, dealing drugs, picking pockets, and gambling, to mention just a few.

zh: 人类最独特的特征或许是说话能力。
en: Perhaps the most distinctive feature of humanity is the ability to speak.

zh: 不单人类使用符号交流。
en: Humans are not alone in the use of symbolic communication.

zh: 许多研究业已表明，其他一些动物——特别是类人猿一-以声音和姿势可以起到类似于人类言语的作用；然而没有任何其他动物形成像人类所具有的那么复杂的符号交流系统。
en: Studies have shown that the sounds and gestures some other animals make—especially apes—may serve functions comparable to those of human speech； yet no other animal has developed a system of symbolic communication as complex as that of humans.

zh: 归根到底，语言使人类能够保留其文化并使它代代相传。
en: Ultimately, language is what allows people to preserve and transmit their culture from generation to generation.

zh: 研究人类语言的文化人类学分支学科被称为语言人类学(Linguistic Anthropology)。
en: The branch of cultural anthropology that studies human languages is called linguistic anthropology.

zh: 语言学家可能从事于语言描述(句子形成或动词词形变化的方式)或者语言历史(随时间推移语言的发展和相互变化的情况)的研究。
en: Linguists may deal with the description of a language (the way a sentence is formed or a verb conjugated) or with the history of languages (the way languages develop and influence each other with the passage of rime).

zh: 从结构主义的角度看，所谓的“同感”是毫无道理的，因为它被排斥在日常分类标准之外且无法分类。
en: From the point of view of the structural, such communitas appeared anarchic because it was marginal and unclassifiable in terms of everyday criteria.

zh: 可是这两种形式的人类关系对保持社会延续性来说都是必需的，同样人们也需要在两种经验状态中做出选择。
en: And yet, both modalities of human relationship were necessary for societal continuity; equally, individuals needed to alternate between the two experiential states.

zh: “同感”的创造性力量引领着个体和社会进行可能的革新，而将这些创造性的力量规制到各种类别与关系的规范中去的过程，在清算传统与发起新行动之间提供了一个稳定的传导机制。
en: For, the creative power of communitas fashioned the being of individuals and communities in liberating, potentiating ways, while the routinization of this creative togetherness into normgoverned distinctions and relations afforded a stability conducive to taking stock and taking action.

zh: 另一方面，还存在一种人类学的观点，认为所有的文化行为都是间生性的，都是文化同化的产物。
en: On the other hand, there is an anthropological view that sees all cultural activity as belonging to hybridity, as being a product of cultural assimilation.

zh: 换句话说，由于人们一直在交换、改变、加工、合并文化元素，从来就不曾存在过“确定类型”或“纯粹系统”这样的东西。
en: In other words, there has never been such a thing as an ‘authentic type’, or a ‘pure system’, for people are always exchanging, changing, processing, incorporating, elements of culture.

zh: 从这个角度得出的主张是我们一直都是间生物。
en: From this perspective the position is that we have all always been hybrids.

zh: 然后，她接着讨论当代西方社会中的身体毁损（文身，等等）、易性癖和同性恋，将它们视为然后，她接着讨论当代西方社会中的身体毁损（文身，等等）、易性癖和同性恋，将它们视为对这种“二元形式”或男性/女性对比的挑战。
en: She then goes on to discuss body mutilation (tattooing, etc.) in contemporary Western societies, transsexualism and homosexuality as practices that seem to pose a serious challenge to this "binary form" or male/female contrast.

zh: 在许多社会，反复被指出的是，同性恋的男人被归类为是一种“中间的”性别——既非完全的男性，也非完全的女性，并且在许多社会（包括毛里求斯），有着一种广泛的观念，认为女同性恋者从生物学上说多少与异性恋的女性有些不同。
en: It has time and again been shown that gay men are, in many societies, classified as an "intermediate" gender – neither wholly male nor wholly female, and in many societies (including Mauritius) there is a widespread notion that lesbians are somehow biologically different from heterosexual women.

zh: 在所谓的“酷儿理论（queer theory）”这一新兴研究领域中，这种逻辑运用到极致，因为生殖器、性别身份、性身份和性之间的关系都是被问题化的。
en: In the emergent field of inquiry known as "queer theory", this kind of reasoning is developed to great sophistication, in that the relationship between genitals, gender identity, sexual identity and sexual practices is problematised.

zh: 社区是社会科学中最广泛和最经常运用的概念之一。
en: The concept of community has been one of the widest and most frequently used in social science.

zh: 与此同时，关于这一概念的精确定义尚未确定。
en: At the same time a precise definition of the term has proved elusive.

zh: 在那些较为有名的定义中就有罗伯特·雷德菲尔德（Robert Redfield 1960: 4）对此的定义，他认为社区具有四个基本特征：社会范围的小规模；成员思想状态和行动的同质性；在广泛的需求范围和时间内自给自足；对自身特点的清醒认识。
en: Among the more renowned attempts remains that of Robert Redfield (1960:4), who identified four key qualities in community: a smallness of social scale; a homogeneity of activities and states of mind of members; a self-sufficiency across a broad range of needs and through time; and a consciousness of distinctiveness.

zh: 这些人、就如20世纪的许多其他人一样，都试图逃避政治。
en: These men, like so many others in the twentieth century, were trying to escape from politics.

zh: 然而，这并不意味着他们漠视权力的关系，远非如此。
en: This did not mean, however, that they were unconcerne d with power relationships.Far from it.

zh: 他们的目标，也就是一种专家政治的自我殖民，发展出了一种崭新的权力关系的形式，其中“良性的”社会、经济与文化关系得到展现。
en: Their goal, a kind of technocratic self-colonization, was to develop a new form of power relations where "healthy" social, economic, and cultural relations could unfold.

zh: 要想整合进这一图景之中，就需要发明出一种新的统怀，由此能够使（对他们而言的）法国致命的颓废以及个体主义的倾向得到重新塑造。
en: Integral in this scheme was the need to invent a new governmentality through which the (to them) fatally decadent and individualistic tendencies of the French could be reshaped.

zh: 为了将此付诸实施，他们对一种现代秩序与技术的新的表征都给予了建构和明确的表述。
en: They constructed and articulated both new representations of a modern order and technologies for its implementation.

zh: 这些表征就是现代的社会事实。
en: These representations are modern social facts.

zh: 很显然，黑人男子还不能被纳入政体，牙买加只是一块殖民地，还不是一个国家。我所要说明的是，不考虑性别和殖民地因素，就不能理解不列颠民族形成的关键时刻。
en: Black men were clearly not ready to constitute a body politic, Jamaica was a colony, not a nation.Critical moments in the construction of the British nation, I am suggesting, cannot be made sense of outside the gendered and colonial context.

zh: 议会成员在考虑女人的和男人的投票权时，也捎上了牙买加，这些都是有关的讨论，“民族”从帝国那里获得了具体的和特别的意义。
en: Members of Parliament debated Jamaica alongside women's suffrage and men's suffrage – it was all part of a related discussion, and "nation" derived its particular and concrete meanings from "empire".

zh: 在血统的父系原则之外，居住模式也是婚后从夫居，意思是新婚夫妇要住在男方的家里或至少住在他的吉那里。
en: In addition to the patrilineal principle of descent, the pattern of residence is virilocal.This means that the newly married settle in the man's household or at least in his ginna.

zh: 通过这种方式，所有最重要的资源都由多贡的男人所控制——土地权利、政治、孩子们和亲戚们——在同一个地理范围内集中。
en: In this way, all of the most important resources controlled by the Dogon men – land rights, politics, children and relatives – are concentrated in the same geographical place.

zh: 系统看起来对男人最有利，他们掌握了最重要的资源。
en: The system seems to be most beneficial to the men, who control the most important resources.

zh: 父系和从夫居的社会里，妇女是局外人并常常伴随着危险：在有些非洲社会，她们很容易被控告为有巫术。
en: Women in patrilineal and virilocal societies are outsiders and are often associated with danger; in some African societies they are prone to be accused of witchcraft.

zh: 她们自己的父系亲属可能在另一个遥远的村子里，某种意义上，她们整个的婚姻生活是在一群陌生人中间度过。
en: Their own agnates may be far away in a different village, and in a certain sense they live among strangers throughout their married lives.

zh: 因此已婚妇女相当于对家系内聚力的威胁，因为她们是这个社群的外来人。
en: Married women thus represent a threat to the cohesion of the lineage, since they are strangers within the community.

zh: 这使我们联想到在第四章提到过的，家户和家系之间存在的潜在冲突。
en: This reminds us of the potential conflict, mentioned in Chapter 4, between the household and the lineage.

zh: 然而，由于合法的性伴侣可能在某人自己的社区内寻觅到，所以一般也实行村落内婚制，尽管这不是强制性的。
en: However, since eligible sex partners are to be found within one's own community, village endogamy, though not obligatory, is commonly practiced.

zh: 饶有兴趣的是，外婚制包括或不包括哪些亲戚，在不同的社会有很大的差异。
en: Interestingly, a wide variety exists among societies as to which relatives are or are not covered by exogamy rules.

zh: 例如,天主敎会一直禁止第一级的堂表兄弟姐妹之间的婚姻，而这样的婚姻在美国的31个州是非法的。在其他19个州，这类婚姻不是非法的，在欧洲也不是非法的。
en: In Europe, for example, the Catholic Church has long had a prohibition on marriages to first cousins, and in the 19th century such marriages were illegal in most of the United States.

zh: 此外，在其他许多社会，第一级堂表兄弟姐妹是优先选取的配偶。尽管有相反的虚构信念,但第一级堂表兄弟姐妹结婚生的孩子没有很大的风险。在19世纪，爱德华˙泰勒爵士提出一个命题：对于近亲交配的抉择是：“在外嫁娶，或者灭绝”。
en: In numerous other societies, however, first cousins are preferred spouses.In the 19th century, Sir Edward Tylor advanced a proposition that alternatives to inbreeding were either "marrying out or being killed out".

zh: 一个稍显粗糙但却长期存在并且相当有用的类形学，建立在生存方式的基础之上：例如，狩猎、采集、畜牧、农业和工业。
en: A crude but long-standing and rather useful typology is based on mode of subsistence: hunting and gathering, herding, farming, industry, for example.

zh: 然后当社会及文化特质与这些生存方式中的一个或其他共同发生时，它们就会被注意到。
en: Social and cultural traits are then noted when they commonly occur in association with one or the other of these modes of subsistence.

zh: 例如，大一统的国家官僚，主要出现在食物增长或工业社会，而不是在那些单纯依靠狩猎和采集的社会。
en: For example, centralized state bureaucracy is found primarily in foodgrowing or industrial societies, not in those relying solely on hunting and gathering.

zh: 这些描述不那么套式化，具有相对感，一个原因是，他们都关注文本技巧的无效性（ineffectiveness)——也就是対这些技巧有意识的使用：移情、梦的转译、讲故事、多声音和多视角、突出幽默的颠覆和多个身份/传统/文化的辩证并置，以及对覇权话语的批评。
en: One of the reasons for the relative sense that these portraits are less stereotyped is their attention to the ineffectiveness of textual techniques—that is, the self-conscious employment of such devices as transference, dream-translation, talk-story, multiple voices and perspectives, the highlighting of humorous inversions and dialectical juxtaposition of identities/traditions/cultures, and the critique of hegemonic discourses.

zh: 在流行术语行话的今天，他们展示了后现代主义知识的文本间性、交互参照和跨语言形态。
en: In the fashionable jargon of the day, they illustrate intertextuality, inter-reference, and the interlinguistic modalities of post-modernist knowledge.

zh: 在实践的层面，这样的自我意识和高超技巧能重振民族志作品的活力，而后者再一次可以完成人类学的文化批评承诺：让人意识到那些被理所当然地接受下来的方式其实是社会文化的建构，而对此我们可以行使自己的职责。
en: On the practical level, such selfconscious and virtuoso technique could contribute to a reinvigorated ethnographic literature, one that can again fulfill the anthropological promise of cultural criticism: of making our taken-for-granted ways recognizable as sociocultural constructions for which we can exercise responsibility.

zh: 族群归属只是20世纪晚期更一般的文化动力学模式的一个领域或一个样本。
en: Ethnicity is merely one domain, or one exemplar, of a more general pattern of cultural dynamics in the late twentieth century.

zh: 少数族群的自传写作相应于当代关于文本性、知识和文化的理论，是后者的镜子和例证。
en: Ethnic autobiographical writing parallels, mirrors, and exemplifies contemporary theories of textuality, of knowledge, and of culture.

zh: 两种写作形式都提示了文化批评的强有力样式。
en: Both forms of writing suggest powerful modes of cultural criticism.

zh: 它们是后现代的，这在于它们采用了如下一系列技法：双重焦点或视点互换，多重现实的并置。文本间性和交互参照，通过家族相似进行比较。
en: They are post-modern in their deployment of a series of techniques: bifocality or reciprocity of perspectives, juxtapositioning of multiple realities, intertextuality and inter-referentiality, and comparison through families of resemblance.

zh: 在当今文化间的对话和冲突的可能性都在不断增加的时代，民族志写作可能会从既处理族群归属又处理文本性、知识和文化的作家那里获得教益。
en: Insofar as the present age is one of increasing potentialities for dialogue, as well as conflict, among cultures, lessons for writing ethnography may bé taken from writers both on ethnicity and on textuality, knowledge, and culture.

zh: 从博厄斯到格尔茨，美国人类学对文化一直有一种持久的、抽象的兴趣。不过，格尔茨避免采用静态抽象而转向更动态的研究。
en: Culture was the abiding abstract interest of American anthropology from Boas to Geertz (with the latter steering clear of static abstraction in favour of a more dynamic approach).

zh: 但对“文化”到底是什么，却总是没有一致的看法。
en: This does not mean that there has always been uniformity about what ‘culture’ is.

zh: 文化变迁包括创新、传播、文化遗失和涵化。
en: The mechanisms involved in cultural change are innovation, diffusion, cultural loss, and acculturation.

zh: 变迁的最终来源是通过创新：一些新的做法、工具或原理。
en: The ultimate source of change is innovation: a new practice, tool, or principle.

zh: 其他个人接受这一创新，于是它就变成社会分享的了。
en: Other individuals adopt the innovation, and it becomes socially shared.

zh: 首次创新是对一些新原理的偶然发现——例如黏士经火焙烧能够变得永久坚硬这一发现。
en: Primary innovations are chance discoveries of new principles—for example, the discovery that the firing of clay makes the material permanently hard.

zh: 二次创新是通过对已知原理的应用而带来的改进——例如，用已知的技术将黏土烧铸成人们所熟悉的物体。
en: Secondary innovations are improvements made by applying known principles—for example, modeling the clay to be fired by known techniques into familiar objects.

zh: 首次创新可以促进快速的文化变迁，并激发其他发明。
en: Primary innovations may prompt rapid cultural change and stimulate other inventions.

zh: 一种创新被接受的机会，部分地（而非全部地)取决于它相对于自己将要取代的那种方法或物体的明显可见的优越性。
en: An innovation's chance of acceptance depends partly, but not entirely, on its perceived superiority to the method or object it replaces.

zh: 文化精神是指文化规范定义的某一特定文化或特定事件的习俗、传统，还有各种感情和情感的总合。
en: Ethos refers to the customs, the traditions, also the feelings, the collective emotions, either of a given culture or of a given event which is defined according to cultural norms.

zh: 更确切地说，是指它们带有区别性的特征或精神。
en: More specifically it refers to their distinctive character or spirit.

zh: 这些概念是相关的，至少在他对国民性的研究中，由于跨文化的定义，文化精神似乎决定于某一文化的文化表象和另一文化表象的关系。
en: These concepts are related, and at least in his national character study ethos seems to depend for its cross-cultural definition on the relation between the eidos of one culture and that of another.

zh: 关于文化多元主义，我们能看到一些熟悉的例子:在瑞士，意大利的、德国的和法国的文化并存；在比利时，说法语的瓦隆人和说德语的佛兰德人拥有的文化遗产是有些不同的；在加拿大，说法语和说英语的加拿大人生活在一个多元的社会中（但在那里，对大多数原住民的平等承认仍成问题）。
en: Some familiar examples of cultural pluralism may be seen in Switzerland, where Italian, German, and French cultures exist side by side; in Belgium, where the French Walloons and the Flemish have somewhat different cultural heritages; and in Canada, where French- and English-speaking Canadians live in a pluralistic society (but where most native people are not accorded equal recognition).

zh: 但是，在这些例子中间，没有哪种文化差异有在非西方的多元社会中所见到的那么大。
en: In none of these cases, though, are the cultural differences (save those of native people in Canada) of the magnitude seen in many a non-Western pluralistic society.

zh: 作为这种社会及其伴生问题的一个例子，我们来看一看中美洲危地马拉这个国家。
en: As an example of one such society—and its attendant problems—we will look at the Central American country of Guatemala.

zh: 他随后又将这个十一项的范式略微简化。
en: He follows this eleven-fold paradigm with a slightly simpler one.

zh: 这是一个建立在七项“基本需求”和各自对应的“文化反应”之间关系之上的范式 (Malinowski 1944：91-119 )。
en: This is the one built on the relationship between seven ‘basic needs’ and their respective ‘cultural responses’ (1944: 91– 119).

zh: 接着，他继续提出一个四项的范式，在他看来，这四项的关联依然相当复杂，“工具性需要”与它们各自的“文化反应”。
en: He then goes on to a four-fold one, relating what he sees as four, rather complex, ‘instrumental imperatives’ with their respective ‘cultural responses’.

zh: 虽然人类学家会从发展或不发展的宏大理论中吸收洞见，他们主要关心的是，在不同的知识系统和文化活动之间的遭遇战中，如何展现地方的变化。
en: Although anthropologists may draw insights from the grand theories of development or underdevelopment, their main concern has been to show local variations in the encounters between different systems of knowledge and cultural practices.

zh: 详细的民族志对殖民和后殖民状况的描述说明了需要一种比全球化关系的一般模型所能提供的更加细微的理解。
en: Detailed ethnographies describing colonial and postcolonial situations have indicated a need for a more nuanced understanding than that provided by the general models of global relationships.

zh: 奥利维亚·哈里斯（Olivia Harris 1995，pp.108–113）写到拉丁美洲的文化复杂性，特别是安第斯地区，她提出了一种描绘变化的类型学，由此，不同知识体系之间的社会性遭遇能够得以概念化。
en: Olivia Harris (1995, pp. 108–13), writing on cultural complexity in Latin America and particularly the Andean area, has proposed a typology depicting variations in the ways in which social encounters between knowledge systems can be conceptualised.

zh: 文化过程还是一个积累的过程，新的成分时时地汇入文化流程之中，增大了其总量。
en: The culture process is also cumulative; new elements enter the stream from time to time and swell the total.

zh: 就文化有助于日益使人实现对自然力的控制和为人类生活提供更大的安全保障而言，它又是一个进步的过程。
en: The culture process is progressive in the sense that it moves toward greater control over the forces of nature, toward greater security of life for man.

zh: 因此，文化是--个符号的、持续的、积累的和进步的过程。
en: Culture is, therefore, a symbolic, continuous, cumulative, and progressive process.

zh: 朱利安·斯图尔德使用文化类型的概念说明地理区域内的变化。
en: Julian Steward used the concept of culture type to explain variations within geographic regions.

zh: 他的观点是，根据特殊的技术以及那种技术最适合的特殊环境特点来考察一种文化。
en: In this view a culture is considered in terms of a particular technology and of the particular environmental features that technology is best suited for.

zh: 一个社会的社会组织和政治组织是影响如何运用技术以保证持续生存的另外一些因素。在社会谋生方式中起作用的这些文化特点是其文化核心。
en: The social and political organization of a society are other factors that influence how technology can be used to ensure survival.The features of a culture that play a part in the way the society makes a living are its culture core.

zh: 人类学家可以探索文化核心类型与环境类型之间的直接关系。
en: Anthropologists can trace direct relationships between types of culture cores and types of environments.

zh: 实际上到了20世纪70年代， 马克思主义者同文化生态论 者在许多问题上的结论越来越趋相似。
en: In fact by the 1970s, if not earlier, Marxists and cultural ecologists were coming to similar conclusions on a number of issues.

zh: 斯图尔德 (Steward 1955 )将马克思主义基础结构称为“文化核心" (cultural core),他认为,文化核心是与环境开发有关的，并且是文化进化得以实现的基础。
en: Steward (1955) called the Marxist base the ‘cultural core’ (that related to exploitation of the environment and upon which, he argued, cultural evolution operated).

zh: 同样，马克思主义者上层建筑的概念类似于斯图尔德的“整体文化” (total culture) (文化传播得以实现的基础）概念。
en: Likewise, the Marxist idea of superstructure resembled Steward’s idea of the ‘total culture’ (upon which cultural diffusion operated).

zh: 在他的文化进化的一般模型中，区别了社会文化一体化的不同水平，他的意思大致等同于本书在前面讨论过的小规模和大规模，也就是社会的不同大小和复杂程度。
en: In his general model of cultural evolution, he distinguishes between different levels of sociocultural integration, by which he means roughly the same thing as in the discussion earlier in this book on small and large scale, namely the varying size and complexity of societies.

zh: 不过，在斯图尔德的设想中，物质因素决定了一个社会的社会文化一体化的水平。
en: In Steward's scheme, however, material factors determine a society's level of sociocultural integration.

zh: 以他自己的著作中的肖肖尼印第安人（Shoshonean Indians）为例证，一体化的最低水平是家庭的整合程度，最高水平是国家的整合程度。
en: The lowest level of integration, exemplified by the Shoshonean Indians in his own work, was that of the family.The highest level was that of the state.

zh: 文化精神是指文化规范定义的某一特定文化或特定事件的习俗、传统，还有各种感情和情感的总合。
en: Ethos refers to the customs, the traditions, also the feelings, the collective emotions, either of a given culture or of a given event which is defined according to cultural norms.

zh: 更确切地说，是指它们带有区别性的特征或精神。
en: More specifically it refers to their distinctive character or spirit.

zh: 这些概念是相关的，至少在他对国民性的研究中，由于跨文化的定义，文化精神似乎决定于某一文化的文化表象和另一文化表象的关系。
en: These concepts are related, and at least in his national character study ethos seems to depend for its cross-cultural definition on the relation between the eidos of one culture and that of another.

zh: 认识论相对论 (epistemological relativism)把描写性相对论中最可行的形式作为其出发点。
en: Epistemological relativism takes as its starting point the strongest possible form of descriptive relativism.

zh: 它结合了认为文化多样性实际上是无限的这样一种极端文化决定论。
en: It combines an extreme cultural-determinist position with a view that cultural diversity is virtually limitless.

zh: 在这里我们有必要先区分一下"一般文化决定论" (general  cultural determinism，认为存在一个普遍曲为人类所独有的文化模式，在这个模式下又有各文化的不同，如人类的“心理一致性")和“特殊文化决定论" (particular cultural  determinism,认为根本不存在这样一种人类文化模式）。
en: It is important here to distinguish between generic cultural determinism (which holds that there is a universal but uniquely human cultural pattern within which cultures vary, i.e., the ‘psychic unity’ of humankind) and particular cultural determinism (which holds that there is no such thing).

zh: 瓦佩人对于祖先之灵的关注，是说明内化控制（或者文化控制）的一个很好的例子,这种控制是指这样一些信念：它们如此根深蒂固，以至于所有人都必须亲身对他或她的行为负责。
en: The Wape concern about ancestral ghosts is a good example of internalized, or cultural, controls beliefs so thoroughly ingrained that each person becomes personally responsible for his or her own conduct.

zh: 文化控制（cultural control)可以被设想为心灵的内化控制，它与社会控制(social ccmtrol)相反，社会控制涉及外部强制。
en: Cultural control may be thought of as control by the mind, as opposed to social control, which involves overt coercion.

zh: 在北美社会也 能找到文化控制的例子；例如，人们之所以避免犯乱伦之忌，与其说因为害怕法律惩罚,还不如说因为一想到这种事他们就有一种强烈的厌恶感，而且在做这种事时 他们会感到羞耻。
en: Examples of cultural control also can be found in North American society; for instance, people refrain from committing incest not so much from fear of legal punishment as from a sense of deep disgust at the thought of the act and from the shame they would feel in performing it.

zh: 朱利安·斯图尔德使用文化类型的概念说明地理区域内的变化。
en: Julian Steward used the concept of culture type to explain variations within geographic regions.

zh: 他的观点是，根据特殊的技术以及那种技术最适合的特殊环境特点来考察一种文化。
en: In this view a culture is considered in terms of a particular technology and of the particular environmental features that technology is best suited for.

zh: 一个社会的社会组织和政治组织是影响如何运用技术以保证持续生存的另外一些因素。在社会谋生方式中起作用的这些文化特点是其文化核心。
en: The social and political organization of a society are other factors that influence how technology can be used to ensure survival.The features of a culture that play a part in the way the society makes a living are its culture core.

zh: 人类学家可以探索文化核心类型与环境类型之间的直接关系。
en: Anthropologists can trace direct relationships between types of culture cores and types of environments.

zh: 这种渐进论的陈述赋予了人类学进化论从单线进化到普遍进化，再到多线进化研究的特征。
en: This gradualist statement characterizes much in evolutionist anthropology from the unilinear, to the universal, to the multilinear approaches.

zh: 然而，它同达尔文和马克思的观点（参见第六章）依然存在一些矛盾。
en: Yet it is contradictory to the ideas of both Darwin and Marx (see chapter 6).

zh: 今天，无论今天有关文化起源的具体理论是否能够存在下去，渐进论同变革论之间的争论今天似乎仍将继续。
en: The debate today between gradualists and revolutionists seems set to continue, whether today’s specific theories of culturo-genesis survive or not.

zh: 文化区域是不同的社会遵循相同生活模式的地区，因为不同的地理区域在气候和地貌上往往是不一致的，新的发现并不总是传播到每一个群体。
en: A culture area is a geographic region where various societies follow similar life patterns.Since geographic regions are not always uniform in climate and topography, new discoveries do not always spread to every group.

zh: 环境的变化也有利于技术的变化，因为不同地区的需要可能是完全不同的。
en: Environmental variation also favors variation in technology, since needs may be quite different from area to area.

zh: 朱利安·斯图尔德使用文化类型的概念说明地理区域内的变化。
en: Julian Steward used the concept of culture type to explain variations within geographic regions.

zh: 他的观点是，根据特殊的技术以及那种技术最适合的特殊环境特点来考察一种文化。
en: In this view a culture is considered in terms of a particular technology and of the particular environmental features that technology is best suited for.

zh: 每一位人类学家都会专门研究一些文化区域——他／她在那里做田野工作。
en: Each and every anthropologist specializes in the study of some culture area – that where he or she does fieldwork.

zh: 但是，文化区域的重要性由于田野民族志作者的理论兴趣不同而呈多样性。
en: Yet the importance of the culture area varies according to the theoretical interest of the ethnographer.

zh: 从广义上说，区分两种文化区域研究是大有裨益的。
en: Broadly, it is useful to distinguish two kinds of culture-area approach.

zh: 第一种文化区域研究是发展自德奥传播论的美国人类学观点，另一种是更多的传播研究，它绝不是一种单一思想流派或者国家传统，而是“区域比较" (regional comparison）。
en: The first is that of American anthropology as it developed from German-Austrian diffusionism.The other, a much more diffuse approach, and in no sense a single school of thought or national tradition, is that of ‘regional comparison’.

zh: 我们看到，在埃赫那顿去世后，这些文化趋势在埃及仍持续了若干世纪。
en: We observe these cultural trends continuing in Egypt for centuries after Ikhnaton's death.

zh: 王室将整合机构中的宗教方面排除出去的企图归于失败，因为它必然会失败。到目前为止，社会整合与社会调节的宗教方面尚未在任何一个国家中排除出去，因为苏联重建教会特别清晰地表明了这一点。
en: The attempt of the throne to eliminate the ecclesiastical component of the integrative mechanism failed, as fail it must; the ecclesiastic aspect of social integration and regulation has not yet been eliminated from any nation so far, as the re-establishment of the church in the Soviet Union makes emphatically clear.

zh: 拉策尔和弗罗贝纽斯之后，弗里兹•格雷布内尔和威廉•施密特继续领导文化圈研究。
en: After Ratzel and Frobenius, Fritz Graebner and Wilhelm Schmidt took the lead in Kulturkreis studies.

zh: 格雷布内尔是一位博物馆学家，集中研究首先跨越大洋洲然后遍布全球的物质文化的相似件。
en: Graebner, a museologist, concentrated on similarities in material culture, first across Oceania and later throughout the world.

zh: 拉策尔一直强调文化质量，而格雷布内尔则喜欢量化尺度。
en: Ratzel had emphasized the qualities of cultures, and Frobenius had favoured a quantitative dimension.

zh: 同时，在德语区中出现了一种瑞士社会人类学，有段时间人们把类学它当成法兰克福和维也纳学派的“理论郊区”一样对待（这样来解释欧内斯特˙盖尔纳）。
en: Simultaneously, an emerging Swiss social anthropology in German was treated for a while as if it were a theoretical suburb of Frankfurt and Vienna (to paraphrase Ernest Gellner).

zh: 例如在弗赖堡，施密特的圣言会（Societas Verbi Divini)的思想体制保持着重要的学术前沿位置（这种情况在1980年代才改变）。
en: In Freiburg/Fribourg, for instance, Schmidt's Societas Verbi Divini (SVD) order maintained an important academic outpost (this was to change only in the 1980s).

zh: 圣言会领导的期刊《人类学家》作为这一领域三到四份主要德语期刊之一而重新出现。
en: The SVD-led journal Anthropos also reemerged as one of the field's three or four leading journals in German.

zh: 在巴塞尔，著名的纺织品研究专家艾尔弗雷德˙布勒（Alfred Buhler)和他的团队在文化形态学和文化圈理论中沉迷了好一阵子。
en: In Basel it took eminent textile specialist Alfred Bühler and his team a while to disentangle from cultural morphology and culture circle theory.

zh: 体质人类学家研究作为生物有机体的人，追溯人类动物的演化发展，考察过去和现在人类内部的生物学变异。
en: Physical anthropologists study humans as biological organisms, tracing the evolutionary development of the human animal and looking at biological variations within the species, past and present.

zh: 文化人类学对人类文化惑兴趣，或者对社会的生活方式感兴趣。
en: Cultural anthropologists are concerned with human cultures, or the ways of life in societies.

zh: 在文化人类学领域有考古学家、语言学家和民族学家。考古学家通常从过去的文化出发研究物质对象，试图以此解释人类行为：语言学家研究语言，文化借助语言得以维持并代代相传；民族学家研究已观察到、体验到的文化，与他们想要了解其文化的那些人进行讨论。
en: Within the field of cultural anthropology are archaeologists, who seek to explain human behavior by studying material objects, usually from past cultures; linguists, who study languages, by which cultures are maintained and passed on to succeeding generations; and ethnologists, who study cultures as they have been observed, experienced, and discussed with persons whose culture they seek to understand.

zh: 这些轨迹在本质上被生态环境所限制，也就是说，被技术的历史决定性，以及自然环境的非常重要的更深层的限定因素所限制。
en: These trajectories were essentially limited by ecological circumstances, that is, by historical determinations of technology and the very important further limiting factor of the natural environment.

zh: 从而，多线进化论与文化生态学的理念紧密地联系在一起。通过类比生物物种形成理论，多线进化论也与生物学中的达尔文思想的观点存在某些相似之处。
en: Thus multilinear evolutionism became closely bound with the idea of cultural ecology.It also shares a certain similarity with Darwinian thought in biology, by its analogy with the biological theory of speciation.

zh: 然后，他们着手研究大部分来自美国原住民、非洲裔美国人、两班牙裔美国人家庭的儿童，通过他们的理论框架解释邦研究成果来进一步“确认”这一观点。
en: They then proceeded to "confirm" this idea by studying children, mostly from Native American, African American, and Hispanic populations, interpreting the results through the protective screen of their theory.

zh: 相比较而言，对“义化上受剥夺”儿童的文化所做的民族志研究揭示不同的情况。
en: By contrast, ethnographic research on the cultures of "culturally deprived" children reveals a different story.

zh: 他们非但没有受到文化剥夺，而是具有复杂精美、熟练的、有适应力的文化，这些文化只不过不同于教育体系采纳的文化罢了。
en: Far from being culturally deprived, they have elaborate, sophisticated, and adaptive cultures that are simply different from the ones espoused by the educational system.

zh: 虽然一些人仍然坚持文化剥夺理论，但这种理论是受文化束缚的， 它只不过说，人们“被剥夺我的文化”。
en: Although some still cling to it, the cultural-deprivation theory is culture bound and is merely a way of saying people are "deprived" of my culture.

zh: 你无法证明，这些儿童不说恰如其分的西班牙语、美国黑人的本地英语(有时被称为Ebonics或“黑人英语”），或任何其他语言；显然，对于他们的文化视为重要的事情，他们做得很好。
en: One cannot argue that such children do not speak adequate Spanish, Ebonics (sometimes called "Black English"), or whatever; clearly they do well with what is considered important in their cultures.

zh: 最著名的“文化复合体”或者”特质复合体”的个案是由著名的研究非洲的非洲裔美国人类学家梅尔维尔•赫斯科维茨提出的(Herskovits 1926 )。
en: The best-known example of a ‘culture complex’ or ‘trait complex’ was one proposed by the famous American anthropologist of Africa and African-America, Melville Herskovits (1926).

zh: 他称之为“东非养牛复合体 (cattle complex of East Africa)”。
en: He called it the ‘cattle complex of East Africa’.

zh: 在那里发现了养牛，还有游牧、父系继嗣、年龄组、彩礼、牲畜与祖先的联系，还有许多互相联系的文化特质。
en: Where cattle are found, so too are nomadism, patrilineal descent, age sets, bridewealth, the association of livestock with the ancestors, and a host of other interrelated culture traits.

zh: 赫斯科维茨和德国学者都说文化特质的分布状态在彼此关联中存在，就是说，并不是任意分布的。
en: Both Herskovits and the German writers spoke of distributions of traits existing in relation to each other, that is, not distributed randomly.

zh: 文化相对主义怍为研究工具不管有多么重要，人们都不必永远中止判断,我们也不必捍卫任何民族参与任何文化实践的权利，不管具有怎样的破坏性。
en: Essential though cultural relativism is as a re-search tool, it does not require suspension of judgment forever or that we must defend the right of any people to engage in any practice, no matter how reprehensible.

zh: 最为必要的 是，在对我们感兴趣的文化有充分理解之前，我们要避免不成熟的判断。
en: All that is necessary is that we avoid premature judgment until we have a proper understanding of the culture we are interested in.

zh: 那时，而且只有在那时，人类学家才可能采取批判的立场。
en: Then, and only then, may one adopt a critical stance.

zh: 就如戴维·梅伯里-莱维斯所强调的:“你免不了作判断，只不过推迟作判断而已，旨在以后作明智的判断。”
en: As David Maybury-Lewis emphasizes: One does not avoid making judgements, but rather postpones them in order to make informed judgements later.

zh: 自然科学本身也确实不止一次地遇到障碍。
en: On more than one point, the natural sciences themselves found an obstacle in faith.

zh: 但是，当人成为科学的对象时，这种抵制就变得犹为激烈。
en: But it is especially when man became an object of science that the resistance became fierce.

zh: 有宗教信仰的人难免对把人当作自然物并象对其它事物一样加以研究，以及将道德事实当成自然事实而感到厌恶。
en: The believer, indeed, cannot but find repugnant the idea that man is to be studied as a natural being, analogous to others, and moral facts as facts of nature.

zh: 众所周知，这类公众情绪在其所采取的不同形式之下，是如何阻碍心理学和社会学[文化学]的发展的。
en: It is well known how these collective sentiments, under the different forms they have taken, have hindered the development of psychology and sociology [culturology].

zh: 它是否被接受还与创新者的声望及接受群体有关。
en: Its acceptance is also connected with the prestige of the innovator and recipient groups.

zh: 传播是一个社会向另一个社会借用一种文化元素。
en: Diffusion is the borrowing by one society of a cultural element from another.

zh: 文化遗失是指在有或者没有替代品的情况下，对一些特性或习俗的废弃。
en: Cultural loss involves the abandonment of some trait or practice with or without replacement.

zh: 人类学家给予涵化以相当多的关注。
en: Anthropologists have given considerable attention to acculturation.

zh: 涵化源于不同文化的群体之间密切而直接的接触，并在一方或双方群体的文化模式上造成重大变化。
en: It stems from intensive firsthand contact of groups with different cultures and produces major changes in the cultural patterns of one or both groups.

zh: 实际或威胁使用武力总是涵化中的一个因素。
en: The actual or threatened use of force is always a factor in acculturation.

zh: “萨丕尔－沃尔夫假说”顾名思义是由沃尔夫和他的导师提出的。
en: The ‘Sapir–Whorf hypothesis’, as this idea became known, bears the name of both Whorf and his mentor.

zh: （爱德华• 萨丕尔是博厄斯的学生，也是“文化与人格”研究和人类语言学的创始人。
en: (Edward Sapir was himself a student of Boas and a practitioner of both ‘culture and personality’ studies and anthropological linguistics.)

zh: ）这一假说在理论上认为，思维方式不只仅有“我们的”和“他们的”这两种，而是多种多样的。而且每种思维方式与思想者的语言是相联系的。
en: In principle, the hypothesis suggests that there are not just two forms of thought, ‘ours’ and ‘theirs’, but a multiplicity of forms of thought, each associated with the language of its thinkers.

zh: 普遍进化论作为单线进化论的教条的一种软化，出现于 20 世纪初。
en: Universal evolutionism emerged in the early twentieth century as a softening of the tenets of unilinear evolutionism.

zh: 根据新的田野民族志和考古证据，确切的跨文化一致且遍布世界的单线进化阶段不能再维持下去了。
en: In light of new ethnographic and archaeological evidence, precise unilinear phases, consistent cross-culturally and throughout the world, could no longer be sustained.

zh: 所以取而代之，假定存在更广泛的、“普遍的”进化阶段，比如“蒙昧”、 “野蛮”、  “文明”（其中摩尔根所支持的）之间的经典划分等。
en: So instead, broad, ‘universal’ phases of evolution were postulated, such as the classical division between ‘savagery’, ‘barbarism’, and ‘civilization’ (championed by Morgan, among others).

zh: 新闻写作和文学很难描述，因为它们较少有明确的学术规范，主要是察觉和讲述被视作值得看和听的不论什么东西。
en: The writing of journalism and literature is difficult to characterize, for these are less academic disciplines than ways of perceiving and telling about whatever is deemed worth seeing and hearing.

zh: 不过，我们还是可以从中看出一些倾向。
en: Still, certain tendencies can be noted.

zh: 标准的头版头条新闻的目标是“得到新闻”。
en: Standard front-page journalism is aimed at "getting the news".

zh: 就像沃夫（Evelyn Waugh)的Scoop一书中幽默地描绘的，那一努力可能会将新闻工作者置于一个异乎寻常的地方，但他通常不会发现有必要甚或有可能深入当地社区成为其中的一部分，通常，进入社区，得到故事，随后他就会离开那里。
en: As humorously depicted in Evelyn Waugh’s Scoop, that endeavor may locate the journalist in exotic places, but he does not usually find it necessary or even possible to become deeply part of the local community; normally, he moves in, gets his story, and moves out.

zh: 格尔兹说，他的人类学是一种寻求意义的阐释的（interpretive)人类学，但它不是一门寻找解释（explanation)的科学。
en: His anthropology, he said, was an interpretive one in search of meaning; it was not a science in search of explanation.

zh: 随着他对实证主义社会科学越来越排斥，格尔兹转向了解释学，并且尤其转向了文学批评。
en: Increasingly hostile to positivist social science, Geertz turned to hermeneutics and specifically to literary criticism.

zh: 文化对他来说是一种民族志作者越过当地人的肩膀阅读出来的文本，他为他的方法了贴上了“深描”（thick description)的标签，通过这种方法，他能够“对解释进行解释”（explicate explications)。他用民族志例子，如巴厘岛的斗鸡来对这一点进行了说明。
en: Culture for him was a text that the ethnographer read over the shoulders of the native.He labeled his method "thick description," through which he would "explicate explications," and he illustrated it with ethnographic examples such as the Balinese cockfight.

zh: 为了理解人类的生活，想办法全盘了解他们的经验世界就非常必要；而为了在这方面获得成功，只注意一些选定的“变量”是不够的。
en: In order to understand people's lives, it is therefore necessary to try to grasp the totality of their experiential world; and in order to succeed in this project, it is inadequate to look at selected "variables".

zh: 显然，对于一个不常见到金钱和工资的社会来说，诸如“年收人”这样的概念是毫无意义的。
en: Obviously, a concept such as "annual income" is meaningless in a society where neither money nor wagework is common.

zh: 这种论述可以被看做是对我族中心主义的驳斥。
en: This kind of argument may be read as a warning against ethnocentrism.

zh: 这个术语（ethnocentrism 来自希腊语“ethnos”，意思是“一个人”）意味着从某人的价值观念去评价别人以及用某人自己的话语去描述他们。某人自己的“ethnos”（包括他的文化价值观）完全被放置到判断依据的中心。在这样的思维框架里，其他人必然变成是对某人拙劣的仿制品。
en: This term (from Greek "ethnos", meaning "a people") means evaluating other people from one's own vantage-point and describing them in one's own terms.

zh: 如果苏丹的努尔人不能通过抵押买到房子，他们的社会就显得不如我们的社会完美。
问题：错译改1：为了理解人类的生活，想办法全盘了解他们的经验世界就非常必要；而为了在这方面获得成功，只注意一些选定的“变量”是不够的。
显然，对于一个不常见到金钱和工资的社会来说，诸如“年收人”这样的概念是毫无意义的。这种论述可以被看做是对我族中心主义的驳斥。这个术语（ethnocentrism 来自希腊语“ethnos”，意思是“一个民族”）意味着从某人的价值观念去评价别人以及用某人自己的话语去描述他们。某人自己的“ethnos”（包括他的文化价值观）完全被放置到判断依据的中心。
en: One's own "ethnos", including one's cultural values, is literally placed at the centre.

zh: 在这样的思维框架里，其他人必然变成是对某人拙劣的仿制品。
en: Within this frame of thought, other peoples would necessarily appear as inferior imitations of oneself.

zh: 如果苏丹的努尔人不能通过抵押买到房子，他们的社会就显得不如我们的社会完美。
en: If the Nuer of the Sudan are unable to get a mortgage to buy a house, they thus appear to have a less perfect society than ourselves.

zh: 他们的观点源于一种缺失感：现代社会缺乏传统意义上的家，这种家具有固定性和物理上的中心，具有绝对的价值观念和统一的实体。
en: Their ideas derive from a sense of loss: that in the modern world there has been lost a traditional home of fixity and physical centredness, of absolute values and a unified reality.

zh: 如今这种“原初”社会文化环境被连根拔起，后来的也不能成为真正意义上的家。
en: Now uprooted from this first and ‘original’ socio-cultural milieu, no succeeding one becomes truly home.

zh: 个体穿行于多重的生活世界，却未能找到一个家。
en: Individuals are in transit between a plurality of life-worlds but come to be at home in none.

zh: 博格等人把这种情形描述成常态、精神上和认知上的：混乱的社会迁移与世界观上形而上学的无家之感有关，后者又与个人在自我意识层次上的疏离有关。
en: Berger et al. describe this condition as at once normative, spiritual and cognitive: the anomy of social movement correlates with a metaphysical sense of homelessness in the cosmos which correlates with personal alienation on the level of consciousness.

zh: 在关于无家可归者的作品中，霍米˙巴哈巴哈提供了一些好建议。
en: In his writings on the unhomely, Homi Bhabha is offering some good advice.

zh: 通过证明无家可归者在原本就很少属于他们自己的领地上是没有权力的，他的目标是找到一条让他们自己获得权力的途径。
en: By demonstrating to the powerless the unhomely territory which is singularly their own, his aim is to suggest a way through which they could begin the process of self-empowerment.

zh: 他倡导“识别文学”的发展，希望人们能够以此来表述、否定和传承他们自己的历史愿望。
en: He calls for the development of a "literature of recognition", through which these peoples could find the means to signify, negate and initiate their own historic desire.

zh: 通过发现他们自己的声音，他们的作品将能够最终动摇传统的文化支配关系。
en: By discovering their own voices, their writings could have revisionary force toward the end of destabilizing traditional relations of cultural domination.

zh: 人类长期以来抱有万能的幻觉。
en: Man has long cherished the illusion of omnipotence.

zh: 这种幻觉使人的自我感到满足和舒适。
en: It is flattering and comforting to his ego.

zh: 在过去，人相信能够控制天气，无数的原始民族为祈求雨水、平息大风和预防暴风雪而举行各种仪式。
en: In days gone by, man has believed that he could control the weather; countless primitive peoples have had rituals for making rain, stilling high winds, or averting storms.

zh: 很多民族举行仪式，希望依赖它们而“控制”太阳在天空中的行程。
en: Many have had ceremonies by means of which the course of the sun in the heavens could be "controlled."

zh: 随着科学的进展，人以自己为万能的信念已逐渐减弱了，但仍然认定人能控制自己的文明。
en: With the advance of science, however, man's faith in his omnipotence has diminished.But he still believes that he can control his civilization.

zh: 推测无言贸易的各种原因，在某些情况下，它也许因缺乏共同语言而无言。
en: The reasons for silent trade only can be postulated, but in some situations trade may be silent for lack of a common language.

zh: 无言贸易较常起的作用是控制不信任的情境，使得关系保持和睦。
en: More often it may serve to control situations of distrust so as to keep relations peaceful.

zh: 在真正现实的意义上，良好的关系是通过抑制关系维持的。
en: In a very real sense, good relations are maintained by preventing relations.

zh: 不排除其他因素的另一种可能性是，在身份难题也许使得口头交流不能加以考虑的地方,无言贸易却使交换成为可能。
en: An other possibility, which does not exclude the others, is that it makes exchange possible where problems of status might make verbal communication unthinkable.

zh: 尽管有潜在的障碍，但不管怎样，无言贸易为两个群体之间的物品交换提供了途径。
en: In any event, it provides for the exchange of goods between groups in spite of potential barriers.

zh: 常规的时间一空间亦是美的和道德的；为公正牺牲和共同集体物品的再分配提供了一个范例。
en: Then again, the routinization of space—time was also aesthetic and moral; it provided a model for redistributive justice, sacrifice, and the common, collective good.

zh: 家是微观意义上的社区，通过开放和经常性的交流、劳动分工、权利和义务、共进晚餐以及资源的轮换等手段来协调其成员。这超越了极权模式。
en: Homes were communities in microcosm which coordinated their members by way of open and constant communication, a division of labour, rights and duties, a commensal meal, and a rotation of access to resources.

zh: 后者采取强制性的手段控制成员的思想、身体和言论以维护稳定。
en: They encompassed total-prestatory systems which exerted possibly tyrannous control over their members' minds, bodies and tongues in their search for solidarity.

zh: 这一点可以从“是”或“不是”的姿势表达中看出来。
en: This point can be further demonstrated by gestural expressions for "yes" and "no".

zh: 在北美，一个人点头表示“是”或者摇头表示“不是”。斯里兰卡人也对确有其事的问题点头回答“是”，但如果被请求去做某事，则低斜一下头表示“行”。
en: In North America, one nods the head for "yes", or shakes it for ano.n The people of Sri Lanka, also, will nod to answer "yes", to a factual question, but if they are asked to do something, a slow sideways movement of the head means "yes".

zh: 在希腊，点头意味着“是”，而猛一回头把脸提起来则表示“否”；同时,眼睛往往闭着，眉毛提起来。
en: In Greece, the nodded head means "yes", but "no" is indicated by jerking the head back so as to lift the face, while the eyes are often closed and the eyebrows lifted.

zh: 诸如此类的身体运动和姿势，通常被称为习惯性姿势，它们在不同文化之间是有差异的，是不得不加以学习的。
en: Body movements and gestures such as these, which vary cross-culturally and have to be learned, are known as conventional gestures.

zh: 更准确地说（Steiner 1975：46）），“社区语言”，无论其社会轮廓是否一致，都是言语元素和不可化约的个体意志的源源不断的多样化聚合”。
en: More precisely (Steiner again (1975:46)): ‘the language of a community, however uniform its social contour, is an inexhaustibly multiple aggregate of speech-atoms, of finally irreducible personal meanings’.

zh: 因此，在使用一个代码时，我们发现说者和听者既利用一个多少有着共同性的公认语言，同时也利用多少有些差异的个人辞典和个人习语，在两者之间以不可预知的方式创立随机性关联。
en: In using a code, therefore, we find speaker—hearers drawing upon a more or less common vulgate and also upon a more or less private thesaurus, an idiolect, making contingent connections in unpredictable ways.

zh: 个体经验和企图与社会背景与习俗通过种种不可化约的特殊方式混合在一起。
en: Individual experiences and intentions and social contexts and conventions mix in irreducibly specific ways.

zh: 所有分层社会至少都提供一些流动（mobility），这有助于减轻任何不平等系统内部所固有的紧张。
en: All stratified societies offer at least some mobility, and this helps to ease the strains in any system of inequality.

zh: 甚至连印度的种姓制度——其主导意识形态自称该制度内部所有的安排都是静止不动的——也有着令人吃惊的弹性和流动，而并非所有这一切都与最近的“现代化”带给印度的变化有关。
en: Even the Indian caste system, with its guiding ideology that pretends all arrangements within it are static, has a surprising amount of flexibility and mobility, not all of it associated with the recent changes "modernization" has brought to India.

zh: 一个恰当而生动的例子是，在拉贾斯坦邦中，那些拥有和控制最多的土地、富裕且政治上掌权的人并非如人所料是武士等级/而是最低等级。
en: As a rather dramatic case in point, in the state of Rajasthan, those who own and control most land and who are wealthy and politically powerful are not of warrior caste, as one would expect, but are of the lowest caste.

zh: 这些批评者像许多其他的人类学家一样，将现代化理论当作其强烈谴责的对象。
en: These critics were among the many anthropologists for whom modernization theory was anathema.

zh: 他们对此的看法是：现代化理论实际上歪曲了现实并且它作为一种关于进步和现代性的意识形态，取代了对多种变化进程的寻找。
en: They saw it as distorting realities on the ground and as substituting an ideology of progress and modernity for a search for diverse processes of change.

zh: 他们同样关注它的政策意义，尤其是它看待第三世界欠发达地区的方式以及相应开展的一系列发展计划。
en: They were also concerned about its policy implications, especially in the way it viewed underdevelopment and development programs in the Third World.

zh: 因此，当时许多关于复杂社会的人类学研究提出了对现代化方法的批评并且提供了替代分析。
en: A good deal of anthropological work on complex societies at the time thus offered critiques of modernization approaches and proposed alternative analyses.

zh: 有一些清晰的事例，可以说明现代主义是正确的。
en: There are some very clear cases where modernism holds true.

zh: 爱沙尼亚人就是一个例子。
en: Take the Estonians.

zh: 在19世纪初，他们甚至没有自己的名字。
en: At the beginning of the nineteenth century they did not even have a name for themselves.

zh: 与邻居德意志、瑞典公民和贵族以及俄国统治者不同，他们被简单地归为生活在陆地上的人。
en: They were simply referred to as people who lived on the land, as opposed to German or Swedish burghers and aristocrats and Russian administrators.

zh: 区别不在于现象的复杂性而在于懂得你的课题是什么，以及如何去解决它。
en: The difference lies not in complexity of phenomena but in knowing what youi problem is and how to attack it.

zh: 物理学家知道什么是他的课题和如何着手解决课题。社会科学家却做不到这点。
en: The physicist knows what his problem is and how to go about solving it; the social scientist does not.

zh: 而这种状况的原因在于，若干世纪以来，在物理学领域中理论观点和科学技术已趋于成熟和完善；反之，科学之被引入社会领域不过是不久前的事情。
en: And the reason for this is that the point of view and the techniques of science have been growing and maturing in the physical domain for centuries, whereas they were introduced into the social realm only yesterday.

zh: 这种情况发生在一个城市主导的国家里，这个国家的大规模城市化在两个多世纪前就开始了，150年来农村人口都少于城市，大约90%的人口居住在城市、小镇或郊区。
en: This is the case in an overwhelmingly urban country, where mass urbanization began more than two centuries ago, where the rural population has been outnumbered for some 150 years, and where some 90% of the population now resides in city, town or suburb.

zh: 英国人对乡村的强烈喜好从未食减，就像有人说的，“乡村”是情致所在，值得保护和拜访（Palmer等 1977: 739)。
en: What may be described as a British love-affair with the rural continues unabated: the "countryside"as a place of sentiment, to preserve and to visit (Palmer et al. 1977:739).

zh: “乡村牧歌”是流传最广最持久的神话：在这个浪漫的想法和理想中，如今被托管给农村人口的乡村是人们最合适的、健康的、原始的，可能也是最后的栖居之地。
en: "The rural idyll" remains one of the most widespread and abiding myths in common circulation: a romantic idea and ideal of the rural as the proper, the healthy, the original, maybe too the eventual, place of people’s habitation, and which the current rural population holds in trust.

zh: 然而，盖尔纳说他原则上不反对人类学的相对主义。
en: However, Gellner says he is not in principle against anthropological relativism.

zh: “关于达致宽容的情境化解释，我的主要观点是”，他写道，“需要谨慎为之”（第32页）。
en: "My main point about tolerance-engendering contextual interpretation," he writes, "is that it calls for caution" (32).

zh: 但是为什么要对“达致宽容的”(与达致不宽容相对立）的情境化解释保持谨慎，他没有解释。
en: But why such caution is reserved for "tolerance-engendering" as opposed to intolerance-engendering contextual interpretations is not explained.

zh: 毕竟，盖尔纳早就坚持认为，所有被翻译的句子注定要受到要么“好”要么“坏”的评价。
en: After all, Gellner insisted earlier that all translated sentences are bound to be received either as "Good" or as "Bad."

zh: 为什么我们只是怀疑那些显得“好”的句子？
en: Why should we be suspicious only of those that appear "Good"?

zh: 如果是因为“最初就决定将本土论断S从有利的方面加以解释，而这将决定将多少情境纳人考虑之中”(第33页），那么，我们也许能通过采用非同情的态度来逃脱这个恶性循环？
en: If "it is the prior determination that S, the indigenous affirmation, be interpreted favourably, which determines just how much context will be taken into consideration" (33), can we perhaps escape this vicious circularity by adopting an unsympathetic attitude?

zh: 这些标志在那时的波多黎各是与财产的微分途径紧密相连的。
en: Such markers were, in Puerto Rico at this time, closely linked with differential access to property.

zh: 但是，这些无须成为例证。
en: However, this need not be the case.

zh: 如同经济学家索尔斯坦·维布伦（Thorstein Veblen）所显示的（Veblen 1953 [1899]）那样，作为一种印象管理的形式，美国人会为了获得身份符号而努力，以便造成他们比实际的状况更为富有的印象。
en: As the economist Thorstein Veblen has shown (1953 [1899]), Americans may strive to acquire status symbols, as a form of impression management, to give the impression that they are better off than they actually are.

zh: 维布伦将这种策略叫做炫耀性消费。
en: Veblen calls this kind of strategy conspicuous consumption.

zh: 不久以前，皮埃尔·布迪厄建立了一种“文化阶级”的系统理论，将法国作为他的主要经验实例（Bourdieu 1979；也可参见Jenkins 1993）。
en: More recently, Pierre Bourdieu has developed a systematic theory of "cultural classes", taking France as his chief empirical example (Bourdieu 1979; see also Jenkins 1993).

zh: 在群体内发生的交换一般采取泛化互惠或平衡互惠的形当交换在两个群体之间进行时，就可能有敌对和竞争的倾向。
en: Exchanges that occur within a group of people generally take the form of generalized or balanced reciprocity.When they occur between two groups, at least a potential for hostility and competition is apt to exist.

zh: 因此，这类交换可能采取消极互惠的形式，除非人们做好某种安排，确保交换大致接近于平衡。
en: Therefore, such exchanges may well take the form of negative reciprocity, unless some sort of arrangement has been made to ensure at least an approach to balance.

zh: 物物交换是消极互惠的一种形式，通过这种交换，一个群体的稀缺物品与另一个群体的合意物品相交换。
en: Barter is one form of negative reciprocity, involving the exchange of scarce items from one group for desirable goods from another group.

zh: 交换时要计算相对价值，尽管双方外表上满不在乎，与一个群体内部交换更加平衡的性质相比，精明的交易更是惯例。
en: Relative value is calculated, and despite an outward show of indifference, sharp trading is more the rule, when compared to the more balanced nature of exchanges within a group.

zh: 对话模式原则上不是自传性的；它们并不必然导致过度的自我意识或自我专注。
en: Dialogical modes are not, in principle, autobiographical; they need not lead to hyper self-consciousness or self-absorption.

zh: 如巴赫金（Bakhtin 1981)指出的，在任何复杂地再现的话语空间（民族志的话语空间，或者在巴赫金的例子里，现实主义小说的话语空间），对话过程都层出不穷，众声喧哗。
en: As Bakhtin (1981) has shown, dialogical processes proliferate in any complexly represented discursive space (that of an ethnography, or, in his case, a realist novel).Many voices clamor for expression.

zh: 在传统民族志中，通过给一个声音以压倒性的权威功能，而把其他人当作可以引用或转写其言语的信息来源，“被访人”，复调性受到限制和整编。
en: Polyvocality was restrained and orchestrated in traditional ethnographies by giving to one voice a pervasive authorial function and to others the role of sources, "informants," to be quoted or paraphrased.

zh: 一旦承认对话论和复调是文本生产的模式，单声部的权威就受到质疑，这种权威也被揭示为一门主张再现文化的科学的特性。
en: Once dialogismi and polyphony are recognized as modes of textual production, monophonie authority is questioned, revealed to be characteristic of a science that has claimed to represent cultures.

zh: 龙头山区域的土墩墓藏中出土的器物也较为丰富,主要有坛、罐、双耳罐、瓿、豆、鬲、觑、盉、鼎、盂、铜环、钵、纺轮、斧、铲、锛、璜、削、器盖等,虽然出土器物较少,但是除了器型较为复杂外,还有不少独特的器物的出土,器物摆放也较有规律性,文化内涵极为丰富。
en: The grave-goods that were unearthed as artifacts from the Longtou Mountain mound tombs could be classified into diversified categories, including main altar, jars, pots with double ears, Bu, Dou, Li, Yan, He, Ding, Yu, copper rings, bowls, spinning wheel, ax, shovel, adze, semicircular jade ornament, razor, lid, etc.Although they did not appear in large quantities, many of the artifacts unearthed were quite unique.They were also placed according a certain pattern and carried abundant cultural connotations.

zh: 从器物的出土状况和器形、质地等各方面可以看出,龙头山土墩墓具有一定的独特性,通过与周边地区及本地区的土墩墓的比较,可以看出,龙头山土墩墓群与千峰山土墩墓群虽然存在有一定的差异,但是整体文化内涵和文化类型应该是一致的。
en: The state, shape, texture and other aspects of these unearthed artifacts showed the uniqueness of these mound tombs.If we compare them with those unearthed in nearby regions, we shall notice that although Longtou mountain mound tombs and Qianfeng mountain mound tombs are different in many aspects, the overall cultural connotations and types are consistent.

zh: 与周边其他地区的土墩墓相比存在有较为明显的差异。
en: This is not the case with other tombs in the surrounding area, where a major distinction is made.

zh: 据此,可以初步认为,龙头山土墩墓群应该与千峰山土墩墓群共同形成了这个地区独特的区域文化。
en: Accordingly, we can hold the preliminary view that the Longtou mountain mound tombs should share the same unique regional culture with the Qianfeng mountain tombs.

zh: 龙头山土墩墓群存在有一个连续性和过渡性,很有可能是一个长期的持久的使用的墓地,应该是一个较为重要的小区域的活动中心,它的独特性,说明了安徽南陵在这一时期,应该是一个具有突出特征的独特的文化区域,是一个重要的文化源地。
en: The continuity and transition of the Longtou mountain mound tombs can be seen as the evidence of a long-term and sustainable use of the cemetery.It should have been a important activity center of this small area.During this period,Nanling county of Anhui province should be a prominent cultural region with unique cultural characteristics.It might also be an important cultural birthplace.

zh: 这种二分法认为，女人局限于私人和内在的领域，所以在男性的公共与政治领域中会受到贬低。
en: The distinction assumes that women are imprisoned within the domain of the private and the domestic, and therefore devalued by the male public and political arena.

zh: 女性主义思想对政治理论、心理学和道德哲学的一个最主要的贡献就是质疑了在公共与私人之间的划分 (Gilligan 1982; Benhabib 1992；Baier l994)。
en: One of the chief contributions of feminist thought to political theory, psychology and moral philosophy is to question this line that divides the public and the private (cf. Gilligan 1982; Benhabib 1992; Baier 1994).

zh: 女人被束缚在私人领域，限制在正义的判断之外，在当代关于正义和社区的理论中处于一种无形地位。
en: Women, being bound to the domain of the private, have been confined beyond the pale of justice where they take an invisible place within contemporary theories of justice and community.

zh: 我已经描述过了各种争论所带来的剧痛，其中包括后现代主义的支持者与批评者之间的争论和在此之前的政治经济学与解释主义之间的争论，以及更早的唯物主义与心智主义之间的争论。
en: I have described the throes of the debate between advocates and critics of postmodernism, and before that the debate over political economy versus interpretivism, and before that the debate over materialism versus mentalism.

zh: 当每次转向一种新的对立时，早期的对立就被宣布为过时了。每一个阶段也存在着超越这些分歧的努力。
en: With each turn to a new opposition, the earlier ones were declared to be outdated, and in each phase too there were efforts to transcend the differences.

zh: 在1990年代，我们仍然面对着学科内的又一个认识论分歧，它形成了第二条断层线：即存在于实证主义者和建构主义者之间的分歧。
en: In the 1990s we were faced with yet another epistemological division within the discipline, which formed a second fault line: that between positivism and constructivism.

zh: 从某种意义上来说，这是关于后现代主义争论的一种延续，但是那些接受了社会建构主义预设的人涵盖了更为广泛的理论观点，而不仅仅是文本主义的后现代主义。
en: In a sense, this was a continuation of the argument about postmodernism, but those who accept the premises of social constructivism cover a much wider range of theoretical positions than just textualist postmodernism.

zh: 在受怀特影响的大量学者中间，马文·哈里斯（Marvin Harris）在他自己的理论中坚持唯物主义决定论，他称之为文化唯物主义，而萨林斯（Marshall Sahlins）在1960年代做出了从新进化论到受结构主义影响的符号人类学的转变。
en: Among the major scholars influenced by White, Marvin Harris has retained the materialist determinism in his own theory, which he calls cultural materialism, while Marshall Sahlins in the 1960s made the move from neo-evolutionism to a symbolic anthropology influenced by structuralism.

zh: 文化生态学，很大程度上是北美的特产，源于斯图尔德和怀特的学说，代表了一种在人类学和生物学之间进行的罕见合作。
en: Cultural ecology, largely a North American speciality, sprang from the teachings of Steward and White, and represented a rare collaboration between anthropology and biology.

zh: 特别是在1960年代，这类研究很多：最著名的无疑是拉帕波特（Roy Rappaport）的《献给祖先的猪》（Pigs for the Ancestors，1968），它试图从生态学的角度去解释新几内亚高地一种反复出现的仪式。
en: Especially in the 1960s, many such studies were carried out; the most famous is doubtless Roy Rappaport's Pigs for the Ancestors (1968), an attempt to account for a recurrent ritual in the New Guinean highlands in ecological terms.

zh: 另外，在1970年代，尤其是在拉美地区，马克思主义者的农民研究的高潮，明显也要归功于斯图尔德。
en: However, the upsurge of Marxist peasant research, especially in Latin America, in the 1970s, was clearly also indebted to Steward.

zh: 并且，那份工作可能会使他们长时间分开。
en: Furthermore, their work may keep them away for prolonged periods.

zh: 如果夫妻双方都是雇工（这种情况越来越多，因为夫妇们发现只靠一个人的收入越来越难以维持自己所希望达到的生活标准），“工作指向哪里就到哪里”的要求可能会把丈夫和妻子引往不同的方向。最主要的是，新居制往往要求夫妇两人与双方的亲戚都要分开。
en: If both spouses are employed, (as is increasingly the case, since couples find it ever more difficult to maintain their desired standard of living on one income), the requirement for workers to go where their jobs take them may pull the husband and wife in different directions.On top of all this, neolocal residence tends to isolate husbands and wives from both sets of kin.

zh: 因为在夫妻之间不再存在清楚确定的责任模式了，所以他们必须为自己建立这些模式。
en: Because clearly established patterns of responsibility no longer exist between husbands and wives, couples must work these out for themselves.

zh: 新闻写作和文学很难描述，因为它们较少有明确的学术规范，主要是察觉和讲述被视作值得看和听的不论什么东西。
en: The writing of journalism and literature is difficult to characterize, for these are less academic disciplines than ways of perceiving and telling about whatever is deemed worth seeing and hearing.

zh: 不过，我们还是可以从中看出一些倾向。
en: Still, certain tendencies can be noted.

zh: 标准的头版头条新闻的目标是“ 得到新闻”。
en: Standard front-page journalism is aimed at "getting the news".

zh: 就像沃夫（Evelyn Waugh）的Scoop一书中幽默地描绘的，那一努力可能会将新闻工作者置于一个异乎寻常的地方，但他通常不会发现有必要甚或有可能深入当地社区成为其中的一部分，通常，进入社区，得到故事，随后他就会离开那里。
en: As humorously depicted in Evelyn Waugh’s Scoop, that endeavor may locate the journalist in exotic places, but he does not usually find it necessary or even possible to become deeply part of the local community; normally, he moves in, gets his story, and moves out.

zh: 在英语里，“房子”和“猫”这两个词适合这一框架，我们说它们属 于同一形式类，但“思考”一词则不适合这一框架。
en: In English, the words house and cat will fit this frame and can be said to belong to the same form class, but the word think will not.

zh: 另一种对名词来说可能的替换框架可能是“……死了”，“猫”这个词适合这一框架,而“房子”则不适合。
en: Another possible substitution frame for nouns might be "The died", in which the word will fit, but not the word bouse.

zh: 因此，我们可以识别出我们名词的子类：在这种情况中，我们可以称之为“有生命的”或“无 生命的”子类。
en: Thus the linguist can identify subclasses of English nouns: in this case, "animate" or "inanimate" subclasses.

zh: 对该语言的所有词汇可以按同样的程序处理，使用必要的许多不同的框架，一直到我们有一本准确描述该语言所有词汇可能用法的词典或字典。
en: The same procedure can be followed for ail the words of the language, using as many different frames as necessary, until a lexicon, or dictionary, can be created that accurately describes the possible uses of all the words in the language.

zh: 性别分层的产生似乎通常看起来与高度集权国家的发展相联系。
en: The rise of gender stratification often seems to be associated with the development of strongly centralized states.

zh: 例如，在中美洲的玛雅人中，过去和现在的基本社会单位是互补的性別对子。
en: For example, among the Maya of Central America the basic social unit in the past and today is the complementary gender pair.

zh: 在家户这一层面，男子种植庄稼并买进其他原材料，妇女把它们变成食物、织物和其他文化物品。
en: On the household level, men raise the crops and bring in the other raw materials the women transform into food, textiles, and other cultural objects.

zh: 同样的互补性也存在于礼仪和政治当中，但在公元前最后一个世纪，在玛雅的蒂卡尔城，事情开始发生变化。
en: The same complementarity existed in public ritual and politics, but in the last century B.C. at the Maya city of Tikal, this situation began to change.

zh: 人们期望该妇女与其女性丈夫角色保持一致，放宑女性性别身份，而理想的做法是像男子一样穿着和行为。
en: In keeping with her role as female husband, this woman is expected to abandon her female gender identity and, ideally, dress and behave as a man.

zh: 实际上，这种理想没有完全实现，因为一生的习性难以彻底改变。
en: In practice, the ideal is not completely achieved, for the habits of a lifetime are difficult to reverse.

zh: 一般说来，只是在家庭最具有性别身份象征意义的活动情境中，女性丈夫才彻底完全装扮成男性身份。
en: Generally, it is in the context of domestic activities, which are most highly symbolic of female identity, that female husbands most completely assume a male identity.

zh: 女一女婚姻当事方的各个个体都享有一些利益。
en: The individuals who are parties to woman/woman marriages enjoy several advantages.

zh: 通过取得男性身份，不育的或无子的妇女在很大程度上提高了自己的地位，甚至达到接近与男子平等的地位，南迪社会的男子在其他方面比妇女占有更加优越的地位。
en: By assuming a male identity, a barren or sonless woman raises her status considerably and even achieves near equality with men, who otherwise occupy a far more favored position in Nandi society than women.

zh: 在灵长目动物中，人类女性从事性活动的能力非同寻常，只要她想要或她的文化告诉她合适就行，不考虑她是否在受孕期。
en: Among primates, the human female is unique in her ability to engage in sexual behavior whenever she wants to or whenever her culture tells her it is appropriate, irrespective of whether or not she is fertile.

zh: 虽然这种活动可能强化个体之间的社会联系，但性接触权的竞争也有破坏性，因此，任何社会都有控制性接触的规则，乱伦禁忌几乎是普遍的，它禁止父母与其子女之间的性关系，通常也禁止同胞兄弟姐妹之间的性关系。长期以来，人类学家一直对乱伦禁忌有兴趣，但是还没有提出对禁忌的真正令人信服的解释。
en: Although such activity may reinforce social bonds between men and women, competition for sexual access also can be disruptive, so every society has rules that govern such access.The near universality of the incest taboo, which forbids sexual relations between parents and their children, and usually between siblings, long has interested anthropologists, but a truly convincing explanation of the taboo has yet to be advanced.

zh: 如马其顿宪法的通过遭到占30%人口的阿尔巴尼亚人强烈反对。
en: The Macedonian constitution, for example, was strongly opposed by and passed without the consent of its 30 percent Albanian minority.

zh: 克罗地亚宪法受到塞尔维亚人、斯洛文尼亚人、斯洛伐克人、匈牙利人和穆斯林的批评。
en: The Croatian constitution was criticised by its Serb, Slovene, Slovak, Hungarian and Muslim minorities.

zh: 以色列、马来西亚、泰国和其他国家民族身份的定义，引起了阿拉伯人、非马来人和非泰人类似的反对。
en: The Israeli, Malaysian, Thai and other definitions of national identity have provoked similar objections respectively from their Arab, nonMalay and non-Thai minorities.

zh: 关于虚假意识的问题，人类学家几乎没有必要采取一种什么立场。
en: It is rarely necessary for an anthropologist to take a stance regarding the issue of false consciousness.

zh: 当我们用比较的方法研究政治系统时，通常没有必要决定这个群体在其世界观和意识形态上是“对的”还是“错的”。
en: When we study political systems comparatively, it is usually unnecessary to decide whether the group is "right" or "wrong" in its world-view and ideology.

zh: 毕竟，对政治进行的人类学比较研究涉及说明政治系统是如何发挥功能的，以及在政治系统内部人们是如何行动或被阻止行动的，同时还要展示意识形态和社会实践之间的关系。
en: Above all, the comparative anthropological study of politics is concerned with showing how political systems function and how people act or are prevented from acting within them, as well as indicating the relationship between ideology and social practice.

zh: 不过，我们应该记住，行动者很少能够看到全局和他们的行动后果，而人类学家的分析任务之一就在于解决这一问题。
en: It should nevertheless be kept in mind that actors rarely see the full context and consequences of their acts, and that the anthropologist's analytical task consists in working this out.

zh: 丹尼尔˙丹尼特（Danniel Denett),《被解释的意识》（1991): 大脑是一个“预测机器'根据“平行分布的程序”规则运作。
en: Daniel Dennett, Consciousness Explained (1991): the brain is an "anticipation machine", working on a principle of "parallel distributed processing".

zh: 意识是一种幻象，是一系列的“多元转换”的提升，并不存在“叙事重心”，也没有连续性。
en: Consciousness is an illusion, a series of shifting "multiple drafts" with no "centre of narrative gravity" and no continuity.

zh: 不存在笛卡尔所谓的心灵剧场使“我是”汇集在一起；而感官经验和看待事物的方式远不是不可言说或完全主观性的。
en: There is no Cartesian theatre where "I am" comes together; moreover, the qualia of experience, the way things seem, are far from ineffable or merely subjective.

zh: 炫耀性消费的形式也发生在某些寻食社会和农耕社会中，就如北美西北沿海地带的印第安人的夸富宴，或在巴布亚新几内亚许多社会中头人所设的慷慨宴席所说明的。
en: A form of conspicuous consumption also occurs in some nonindustrial societies, as illustrated by the potlatches Indians on the Northwest Coast of North America give or the lavish feasts Big Men in many societies of Papua New Guinea give.

zh: 在这两种情况里，在以前数月内辛勤积累的食品和其他各种财富，公开赠送给他人。
en: In both cases, food and various other items of wealth, laboriously accumulated over several preceding months, are all given away to others.

zh: 西方的观察者往往将这种富丽堂皇的展示视作极大的浪费，这就是加拿大政府数年来一直抑制夸富宴的一个理由。
en: Western observers are apt to see such grandiose displays as wasteful in the extreme, which is one reason why the Canadian government sought for many decades to suppress potlatches.

zh: 然而，对参与其中的人来说, 这些赠品实现了重要的社会和政治目标，就如下面的分析所证明的那样。
en: To the people involved, however, these giveaways accomplish important social and political goals, as the following analysis demonstrates.

zh: 一个世系群(比如霍皮人的世系群或中国的宗族)是一个由血缘亲属组成的法人继嗣群体，这些亲属经由已知的联系环节，按系谱追溯他们源自共同袓先的血统。
en: A lineage (such as those of the Hopi or the Chinese tsu) is a corporate descent group composed of consanguineal kin who trace descent genealogically through known links back to a common ancestor.

zh: 世系群这个术语通常用于单系继嗣形式是惯例的地方，但有些两可系继嗣群体也与此相似，就像刚刚讨论过的犹太人家庭圈。
en: The term is usually employed where a form of unilineal descent is the rule, but some ambilineal groups are similar, such as the Jewish family circles just discussed.

zh: 世系群重视祖先，群体成员只要与共同祖先的关系得到证明就能得到承认。
en: The lineage is ancestor oriented; membership in the group is recognized only if relationship to a common ancestor can be traced and proved.

zh: 在很多社会，个体除了作为世系群的成员之外，没有其他的法律或政治地位。
en: In many societies an individual has no legal or political status except as a lineage member.

zh: 寻食是最古老、最普遍类型的人类调适。
en: Food foraging is the oldest and most universal type of human adaptation.

zh: 我们应把社会组织的重要要素归功于性別分工、食物分享，以及作为日常活动中心的大本营，而且在那里实现食物的分享。
en: To it we owe such important elements of social organization as the sexual division of labor, food sharing, and a home base as the center of daily activity and where food sharing is accomplished.

zh: 完全不同的调适，包括农业和畜牧业，在世界某些地区在9000—11000年前开始发展起来。
en: Quite different adaptations, involving farming and animal husbandry, began to develop in some parts of the world between 9,000 and 11,000 years ago.

zh: 借助于简单的手工工具种植家用植物的园艺，使比较永久的定居以及分工的重组成为可能在畜牧条件下，依靠放牧的家畜群，游牧生活得以持续，但是与其他民族互动的新模式发展起来了。
en: Horticulture—the cultivation of domestic plants with simple hand tools—made possible more permanent settlements and a reorganization of the division of labor Under pastoralism—reliance on raising herds of domestic animalsnomadism continued, but new modes of interaction with other peoples were developed.

zh: 男人娶第二个妻子的另一个理由是要证明他们在社会中的地位。
en: Another reason for a man to take on secondary wives is to demonstrate his high position in society.

zh: 但是，在男人并不做大部分生产性工作的地方，他们必须特别勤奋地工作以供养多个妻子，实际上很少有人供养得起。
en: But where men do most of the productive work, they must work exceptionally hard to support more than one wife, and few actually do so.

zh: 一般来说，在寻食社会中出色的猎手或男性萨满教萨满(“医师”），或者在农业或游牧社会中特别富裕的人，最易于实行一夫多妻制。
en: Usually, it is the exceptional hunter, a male shaman ("medicine man") in a food-foraging society, or a particularly wealthy man in an agricultural or pastoral society who is most apt to practice polygyny.When he does, it is usually of the sororal type, with the cowives being sisters.

zh: 他娶多个妻子，经常是姐妹型的，共夫妻子是姐妹。由于婚前她们就生活在一起了，姐妹们继续这样与其丈夫一起生活，而不是占有其自己独立的住宅。
en: Having already lived together before marriage, the sisters continue to do so with their husband, instead of occupying separate dwellings of their own.

zh: 在门诺派的严谨派中，人们可以看到美国亚文化的一个例子。门诺派严谨派老会社在16世纪新教革命席卷欧洲时起源于中欧；今天该会社的成员数约6万人，大部分生活在宾夕法尼亚州、俄亥俄州和印第安纳州。
en: One example of a subculture in the United States can be seen in the Amish.The old-order Amish originated in Austria and Moravia during the Reformation; today members of this order number about 60,000 and live mainly in Pennsylvania, Ohio, and Indiana.

zh: 他们是和平主义者、平均地权论者，他们生活的宗旨是其宗教信仰。
en: They are pacifistic, agrarian people whose lives focus on their religious beliefs.

zh: 他们珍视简朴、勤勉工作和高度的邻里合作。
en: They value simplicity, hard work, and a high degree of neighborly cooperation.

zh: 他们穿着独特的、朴素的服装，甚至今天还依靠马匹来运输和干农活。
en: The Amish dress in a distinctive plain garb and even today rely on the horse for transportation as well as agricultural work.

zh: 他们几乎不可能与非门诺派严谨派的人联姻。
en: They mingle as little as possible with the non-Amish.

zh: 这就是研究者为什么会被言词评价误导的一个原因，因为人们所说的可能并不完全与社会现实相符。
en: This is one reason why a researcher may be misled by verbal evaluation, for what people say may not correspond completely with social reality.

zh: 例如，埃及的官方语言是古典阿拉伯语——《古兰经》(伊斯兰教最神圣的文本)的语言。
en: As an example, the official language of Egypt is Classical Arabic, the language of the Quran (the most holy of Islamic texts).

zh: 尽管这种语言被赋予很髙的价值，但在埃及没有人在日常交往中使用它，人们只在官方文件或正式场合才使用它。
en: Though it is highly valued, no one in Egypt uses this language in daily interaction; rather, it is used for official documents or on formal occasions.

zh: 那些熟练掌握这种语言的人不是上层阶级的，而是中下层阶级的。
en: Those most proficient in it are nor of the upper class but, rather, of the lower-middle classes.

zh: 这些人在公立学校中接受教育（在那里,古典阿拉伯语是学校教育的语言），并在政府官僚部门供职（那里要求使用古典阿拉伯语的场合最多）。
en: These are the people educated in the public schools (where Classical Arabic is the language of schooling) and who hold jobs in the government bureaucracy (which requires the most use of Classical Arabic).

zh: 事实上，明了正确的言语方式的能力展现了一个人成为社区中完整意义上的成员的资格。
en: Indeed, competency in knowing appropriate styles of speaking may represent one of the primary determinants by a community of its full members.

zh: 构成不同言语环境的是“言语事件”，即不同角色的扮演者的不同部分，而构成言语事件的是个体的“言语行动”。
en: Making up different speech situations will be "speech events"—the different parts of the different role-players—and constitutive of speech-events will be individual "speech-acts".

zh: 后者亦在社会背景中被形式化，以便形式与内容能够和环境与情景、说者和发言者、听者和受众、目的和目标、“要素”（语调、风格或情绪）“渠道”（口头的或书面的）和流派类型（祈祷、谚语、诗歌或演讲）这些融为一体。
en: These latter too will be formalized within the group context so that form and content will gel with setting and scene, speaker and addresser, addressee and audience, purpose and goal, "key"(tone, manner or spirit)"channel" (oral or written) and genre (prayer, say, poem or lecture).

zh: 尽管非洲南部的岩石艺术经常被轻蔑地贴上“原始”和“简单”的标签，但这里的讨论表明：它绝非如此。无论这种艺术本身，还是嵌入其中的信仰系统，都不能被描述成是远古“简单”。
en: Although southern African rock art is all too often dismissively labeled as "primitive' or "simple," the discussion here shows that it is anything but. Neither the art itself nor the belief system it embedded in can be described as remotely "simple.

zh: 要理解这样一种艺术，只盯着一幅画看是不够的，这需要花很多功夫，但为此付出努力是值得的。
en: " Understanding such art requires a good deal more than simply staring at a picture, but the effort is well worth making.

zh: 一夫一妻制，或接纳一个配偶,是最普遍的婚姻形式，首先是由于经济的原因。
en: Monogamy, or the taking of a single spouse, is the most common form of marriage, primarily for economic reasons.

zh: 一个男子必须有一定量的财富才负担得起一夫多妻制的费用，在同一时间娶不止一个妻子。
en: A man must have a certain amount of wealth to afford polygyny, or marriage to more than one wife at the same time.

zh: 然而，在妇女做大量生产性工作的社会中，一夫多妻制可作为一种手段，为家户增添财富。
en: Yet in societies where women do most of the productive work, polygyny may serve as a means of generating wealth for a household.

zh: 一夫一妻制是北美人最熟悉的婚姻形式。
en: Monogamy is the form of marriage North Americans are most familiar with.

zh: 由于经济而非道德的原因，它也是最普遍的婚姻形式。
en: It is also the most common, but for economic rather than moral reasons.

zh: 在许多实行一夫多妻制的社会中，一个男子必须足够的富裕才负担得起一夫多妻（monogamy），即娶一个以上妻子的费用。
en: In many polygynous societies, a man must be fairly wealthy to afford polygyny, or marriage to more than one wife.

zh: 在新几内亚西部的长保库人中，理想是尽可能多地拥有妻子，而且一个女子实际上鼓励她的丈夫花钱娶另外的妻子。
en: Among the Kapauku of western New Guinea, the ideal is to have as many wives as possible and a woman actually urges her husband to spend money on acquiring additional wives.

zh: 如果她能证明他有聘礼的钱而拒不再娶，她甚至有法律上的权利与他离婚。
en: She even has the legal right to divorce him if she can prove he has money for bride-prices and refuses to remarry.

zh: 依附训练（dependence training）增进在执行指派任务时的顺从性，并鼓励个体留在群体内部。
en: Dependence training promotes compliance in the performance of assigned tasks and favors keeping individuals within the group.

zh: 这一模式一般与扩大家庭有关。这种扩大家庭由在同一象户内部的几个丈夫一妻子一孩子的单位构成，在主要以自耕自给农业为经济基础的社会里最容易看到。
en: This pattern is typically associated with extended families, which consist of several husband-wife-children units within the same household and which are most apt to be found in societies with an economy based on subsistence farming.

zh: 这种家庭是十分重要的，因为它们为耕作土地、照料饲养的牲畜以及其他他们认为生存所必需的副业经济事务提供必要的大量劳动力。
en: Such families are important, for they provide the large labor force necessary to rill the soil, tend whatever flocks are kept, and carry out other part-time economic pursuits considered necessary for existence.

zh: 然而，这些大家庭本身形成某种潜在的破坏性紧张关系。
en: These large families, however, have built into them certain potentially disruptive tensions.

zh: 小心翼翼地为了避免陷入一种过于简单的还原主义的解释，布洛克可能比任何更早些的人类学家更加谨慎地分析了仪式的意识形态的维度。
en: Careful to avoid a simplistic reductionist explanation, Bloch analysed the ideological dimension of ritual perhaps more carefully than any earlier anthropologist.

zh: 他的主要观点之一，与很多其他人类学家一样，认为仪式和仪式符号论被迫显得模糊不清，是因为它们代表了一个充满了矛盾的社会世界，所以，“意识形态的信息不能简单地作为一种陈述而被主张……因为从它最真实的本性来说，是与人类在世界的经验相矛盾的”（Bloch 1986，p.195）。
en: One of his main points, which he shares with many other anthropologists, is that rituals and ritual symbolism have to be ambiguous because they are representations of a social world that is contradictionridden.So "the message of ideology cannot be maintained simply as a statement... because it is by its very nature in contradiction with human experience in the world" (Bloch 1986, p. 195).

zh: 这很重要，意识形态总是简单化的并且利用了等级制度和特定的社会秩序。
en: This is important.Ideology always simplifies and imposes hierarchy and a particular social order.

zh: 在梅日纳的例子中，作为受到被割礼仪式影响的意识形态，也被用来证明典礼用的暴力是正当的。
en: In the case of the Merina, ideology as mediated by the circumcision ritual also served to justify state violence.

zh: 仪式的迂回的意识形态维度，在现代国家社会中和它在非现代国家中一样明显（参见Handelman 1990）。
en: In modern state societies, the oblique ideological dimension of ritual is no less evident than in non-modern societies (see Handelman 1990).

zh: 种姓的首领因而努力要将他们的经济资本转化成仪式化洁净度。
en: The leaders of the caste thus tried to convert their economic capital into ritual purity.

zh: 首先他们必须通过被总称为梵语化（sanskritisation）的过程使自己的行为得到净化，他们还要停止举行低级种姓的典型仪式行为（例如动物献祭），同时，在其他方面要采取婆罗门教的规范，成为素食者，等等。
en: First they had to purify their own practices through what is generally known as Sanskritisation.They ceased to perform typical low-caste rituals (such as animal sacrifice) and adopted Brahmanic rules in other respects as well, becoming vegetarians and so on.

zh: 不过，制酒者想要被认可为高级种姓，还需要提高在贾吉摩尼系统内部的地位，而这是最困难的部分。
en: For the distillers to be recognised as a high caste, however, they also had to improve their position within the jajmani system, and this was the most difficult part.

zh: 和肮脏的制酒者一起进入贾吉摩尼关系的每一个种姓在当地等级组织中都有被他们超越的风险；另一方面，制酒者有足够的金钱能够支付各种服务。
en: Each caste which entered into a jajmani relationship with the polluting distillers risked being surpassed by them in the local hierarchy; on the other hand, the distillers were able to pay well for services.

zh: 最后，他们成功地——在超越了阶梯的好几个梯级以后——使婆罗门为他们施行了仪式服务，并因此被认为成为了一个干净的种姓，但是他们付出了大量的金钱作为代价，他们将高级经济地位转换成了高级仪式地位。
en: Eventually they succeeded – after having passed through several rungs on the ladder – in having Brahmins perform ritual services for them and were thereby considered a clean caste, but at the cost of a considerable amount of money.They converted a high economic position into a high ritual position.

zh: 我只讨论了三种产生或延续族裔差异的外在压力——法律和政治的限制、强制移民的后果和类型学外貌划分。
en: I have discussed only three kinds of exogenous pressures that serve to create or perpetuate ethnic differences – legal and political restrictions, the consequences of coerced migration, and phenotypical appearances.

zh: 但是含义是清楚的。
en: But the implication is clear.

zh: 族裔差异通常是被迫的——或者至少是强力引导的——选择的方式也有限。
en: Ethnic differences are often compelled – or at least strongly induced – and are only in a limited way chosen.

zh: 它更多地是一个个人经验问题以及用动态多元的方式指代外界的问题。
en: It is more a question of personal experience and of the dynamic and multiple ways of referring to the external world.

zh: 事实上，起源于欧洲的多元文化主义问题是由于从（上个世纪——译者）60年代起，突然从第三世界涌入了成千上万的大批移民欧洲。
en: In fact the question of multiculturalism has arisen in Europe, since the sixties, through the sudden and massive influx of millions of immigrants from the Third World.

zh: 这些移民大部分（并不是所有情况下）有着非常不同的文化、语言和宗教背景。
